[\[1a\]]
[\[1a.1\]]@#/_/rgyud 'bum pa bzhugs so/_/
[\[1b\]]
[\[1b.1\]{D544}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_sid+d+ha e ka bI ra ma hA tan+t+ra rA dza nA ma/_bod skad du/_dpa' bo gcig pu grub pa zhes bya ba'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[1b.2\]]'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dpa' bo gcig grub dpa' bo'i gtso/_/rab mchog smra ba rnams kyi mchog_/'gro ba'i bla ma 'jam rdo rjes/_/'jig rten don 
[\[1b.3\]]du rgyud rab gsungs/_/lha nyid gsang sngags tshul gyis ni/_/dngos grub thams cad stsol mdzad pa/_/sngags pas de nyid bsgoms nas ni/_/de grub na ni 'grub 'gyur te/_/sngags 
[\[1b.4\]]pa lus ni rnam dag dang /_/gang tshe dngos grub phra mo 'grub/_/snod du gyur pa'i lus la ni/_/dngos grub chen po rab tu skye/_/rim pa 'di yis 'di la ni/_/sa la sogs pa 'thob 
[\[1b.5\]]pa skye/_/sngags pas yid bzhin nor bu ltar/_/rtag tu sems can don byed do/_/de ltar mkhyen nas thugs brtses non/_/rdo rje 'chang sogs kyis zhus tshe/_/grub pa'i gsang 
[\[2a\]]
[\[2a.1\]]sngags bsdus pa ni/_/'gro ba'i don du gsungs pa yin/_/oM kA lu me lu kA lu me stam+b+ha ya s+shi lA baR+ShaM tuShA ra ny+tsa luts+tsha i luts+tsha i swA hA/_gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di ni legs par bzlas na ser ba gcod par byed do/_/dran pa 
[\[2a.2\]]nyid dang thal ba la mngon par bzlas pas ser ba 'bab pa'am kha ba 'bab pa gcod par 'gyur zhing gang du 'dod pa der 'gro'o/_/de bzhin du glog dang rlung dang rdo rje dang thog 'bab pa la sogs pa med par byed do/_/oM ga ru Da haM sa he/_tsa la tsa la swA hA/_sngags 
[\[2a.3\]]kyi rgyal po 'di dran pa nyid ni ser ba 'bab pa zlog par byed do/_/rdo rgyus kyis rnga pa Ta ha la bris shing /_rnga lcag la mngon par bzlas pa'i rnga pa Ta ha'i sgras ser ba 'bab pa zlog par byed do/_/de bzhin du dung la sogs pa'i sgras kyang bya'o/_/oM he he/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_
[\[2a.4\]]ban+d+ha ban+d+ha/_d+hA ra ya d+hA ra ya/_ni run+d+ha ni run+d+ha/_che ge mo ur+N+Na ma Ni swA hA/_gsang sngags kyi rgyal po 'di sngon du bsnyen pa'i tshogs 'bum phrag gcig yongs su bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/glog dang rlung dang rdo rje dang thog 'bab pa'am kha ba la sogs pa dran pa 
[\[2a.5\]]tsam nyid kyis zlog par byed do/_/thal ba dang yungs kar la mngon par bzlas na/_char ches pa gcod pa dang byi ba dang sbrang ma la sogs pa'i mchu 'ching bar byed do/_/skyed mos tshal dang zhing la bya dang 'bu srin dang byi ba rnams kyis nye bar 'tshe ba zlog par byed do/_/
[\[2a.6\]]dur khrod kyi ras la ming dang bcas pa'i sngags bris la spra tshil gyis gtums te/_dur khrod kyi bum par bcug nas kha bcad de/_de nyid du sbas pas mngal rengs par 'gyur ro/_/phyung nas 'o ma dang chus bkrus te chu la bor pas zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/yung ba'am/_
[\[2b\]]
[\[2b.1\]]ba blas gro ga'am gos sam lo ma la mngon par bris te/_spra tshil gyi nang du gtums pa'i sngags 'di grog mkhar gyi sa las 'jigs byed kyi gzugs su byas pa de'i snying gar bcug ste de'i kha thal bas bkang nas sbas na/_rgol pa dang phyir rgol ba'i kha rengs par byed do/_/
[\[2b.2\]]rtsod sbyong byed pa na gzugs de nyid kyi lce la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i tsher ma bdun gyis btsugs na kha 'ching bar byed par 'gyur ro/_/rdo rgyus kyis kham phor la bris te thal bas bkang la/_kha sbyar te sbas na mi snyan pa brjod pa kha rengs par byed do/_/rdza mkhan 
[\[2b.3\]]kyi lag pa phyis pa'i 'jim pa las/_lug gi gzugs su byas pa'i snying gar spra tshil gyis gtums pa'i sngags bcug na khros pa'i kha rengs par byed do/_/ske'am dpung pa la sngags btags na g.yul ngogs kyi mtshon cha'i dbal zhi bar byed do/_/grog mkhar gyi 'jim 
[\[2b.4\]]pa las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po'i rkang pa'i mthil du sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bcug ste/_bzhi mdor sbas na 'gro ba dang 'ong ba thams cad rengs par byed cing rtag par byed pa thams cad rengs par byed do/_/gro ga'am gos la sngags kyi rgyal po 'di bris la spra tshil gyis [(]gtums [,]btums [)] 
[\[2b.5\]]te de nyid kyi khong par bcug la/_bum pa sar pa chus bkang ba'i nang du bcug na yongs su brtag pa rengs par byed do/_/bla gos kyi mtha' ma la sngags rjes su dran zhing mdud pa bcings pas lam du rkun po la sogs pa rengs par byed cing /_nags kyi ba men la sogs pa rwa can 
[\[2b.6\]]dang mche ba can rnams rengs par byed do/_/bong pa la lan bdun sngags te chur bcug na/_chu na rgyu ba'i kha 'ching bar byed do/_/dur khrod kyi ras la pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs kyi skyes bu'i gtso bo'i ming smos pa'i sngags sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su bris la/_sna tshogs rdo rje'i phyi rol du yi ge 
[\[2b.7\]]la~M brgyad bris shing phyi rol dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan par bris te/_phyogs rdo rjes brgyan pa'i spra tshil las byas pa'i tshogs kyi bdag po'i khong par bcug pa'i sngags/_pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs kyi sa mtshams kyi bar du bcug na dpung gi tshogs rengs par byed do/_/
[\[3a\]]
[\[3a.1\]]sngags oM gnyis kyi kha sbyor du bcug la yi ge Tha zung gis yongs su bskor ba/_phyi rol du yi ge la~M brgyad kyis bskor ba dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyis non pa sna tshogs rdo rjes nye bar mdzes par byas pa/_grog mkhar gyi 'jim pa las byas pa'i tshogs kyi 
[\[3a.2\]]bdag po'i khong par bcug la/_dur khrod kyi bum pa'i nang du bcug nas dur khrod du sbas pa'am/_phub ma'i sbyin sreg gis pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs rengs par byed do/_/grong khyer tshig pa'i me la mngon du phyogs shing sngags 'dis mngon par bsngags pa'i chu snyim pa bdun rab tu 
[\[3a.3\]]gtor na khyim gang bsrung bar 'dod pa'i khyim de srung bar byed do/_/thal bas mgul pa bcings pas skyugs pa zlog par byed do/_/mthe'u chung gi rtse dam du btsir la sngags brjod pas skyigs bu med par byed do/_/thal ba la mngon par bsngags pas mig rengs pa sos par 
[\[3a.4\]]byed do/_/'brum bu la sogs pa rnam par 'tshe ba la ras kyi dum bu la bris te/_khyim gang gi sgor btags pa'i khyim der 'brum bu la sogs pa rnam par 'tshe ba zlog par byed do/_/nya dang sha dang chang dang 'bras chan la sogs pa sbyin par 'gyur ba las grong gi phyi rol gyi char gtor 
[\[3a.5\]]ma chen po gtang bar bya ba dang yam shing lnga dang 'bru lnga'i bye brag mar la btags pas grong gi dbus su zhi ba'i thab khung byas la sbyin sreg byas na bdud dang rnam par 'tshe ba thams cad rengs par byed do/_/gang 'ga' zhig la grong la sogs pa 'byin par 'gyur ba la bzlas pa 
[\[3a.6\]]tsam gyis zlog par byed do/_/rtag tu bzlas na lha dang lha ma yin dang lto 'phye chen po rnams kyis mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/dpal rje btsun sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mngon par byang chub pa'i dus su/_bdud bzhi las rgyal bar bya ba'i don du sngags kyi rgyal po 'di mdzod spu las 
[\[3a.7\]]rnam par phyung ba'i phyir mdzod spu'i nor bu zhes bya bar grags pa yin no/_/gseg ma la mngon par bsngags te gtor bas sbrul dag 'byer bar byed do/_/khyim gyi rtsig ngos la rdo rgyus la mngon par bsngags pas bris na sbrul gyis zil gyis non par mi 'gyur ro/_/yang na rdo leb la 
[\[3b\]]
[\[3b.1\]]sngags gzong bus brkos te bris pa sbas na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]dang sbrul gdug pa rnams khyim mam grong ngam grong khyer du sbas na ci srid 'dod pa'i bar du mche ba 'ching bar byed do/_/phyung bas grol bar 'gyur ro/_/sngags 'di ma bsgrubs su zin kyang las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/gseg 
[\[3b.2\]]ma la sogs pa la yongs su bzlas te gtor na mche ba can thams cad kyi mche ba 'ching bar byed do/_/dbang chen gyi dkyil 'khor gyis khyab pa'i sna tshogs rdo rje'i dbus su bsgrub par bya ba'i ming dang bcas pa'i sngags thams cad bri bar bya'o/_/dur khrod kyi ro bsregs pa'i shing 
[\[3b.3\]]gi phur bu la lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa sgo'i steng du sbas na/_skyed kyis 'tsho ba thams cad kyi skyed med par byed do/_/phyung bas grol bar 'gyur ro/_/oM ni hi ni ts+tsha le a b+ha ya b+ha yaM ka ri/_e lu be lu tsu le lu/_shi lA ya Da i dza ha ye/_paT+Ta i dzaT+Ta/_e pe lu A ga 
[\[3b.4\]]sa pa the ke ra te/_i a tu mud+d+hA ri ma d+ha ri khi n+ni khi l+la mo ha ni thi b+hi dza kA raM dza hi thA kA ro Ni hi ThaHThaHswA hA/_sngags kyi rgyal po 'di sngar ma smos pa'i las thams cad ma bsgrubs su zin kyang byed par 'gyur ro/_/de las gzhan yang mngon par 'dod pa'i las de dag thams cad byed 
[\[3b.5\]]par the tshom med do/_/lan tshwa dang ske tshe mnyam pa'i sbyin sreg gam phub ma'i sbyin sreg gis pha rol gyi dpung gi tshogs rnams 'byer bar byed do/_/oM am+sha sim+sha ka s+yA su dzo me phe Da e du s+yA su swA hA/_zhes byung ngo /_/oM am bA shim b+hA kap+pa su dzo me phi du p+bA su/_sngags kyi rgyal 
[\[3b.6\]]po 'di ma bsgrubs su zin kyang rtag tu bzlas na 'jigs pa thams cad zlog par byed do/_/rdo rje'i chu'i thig les dgra bo thams cad rmongs par byed cing khros pas rab tu dang bar byed do/_/bcings pa la bzlas na bcings pa grol bar byed do/_/phongs par gyur pas bzlas na rnyed pa 'grub 
[\[3b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/e Shon thi to/_hu lu hu dz+wa la dzi twe/_oM Shot+thi to hu lu hu lu/_dzA lA dzi hwa twe hu lu ru trai ba pra ti rAts+tsha tu hu lu swA hA/_hu lu hu lu ya trai bo t+thi to hu lu ta trai ba pra ti gats+tshan+tu hu lu hu lu swA hA/_sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang rnam par rtsod pa thams cad la bzlas pa 
[\[4a\]]
[\[4a.1\]]byas pas zhi bar byed do/_/phub ma'i sbyin sreg gis kyang thams cad du zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/ji ltar rnyed pa'i me tog la sngags rjod de/_chu la bskur na thams cad du zhi bar 'gyur zhing rnam par rgyal ba thob par the tshom med do/_/grong khyer tshig pa'i me la mngon du phyogs pas 'dug 
[\[4a.2\]]ste/_mngon par bsngags pa'i chu snyim pa bdun gtor na/_khyim gang bsrung bar 'dod pa'i khyim de srung bar byed cing mes tshig pa'i me'i kha las thar bar byed do/_/rkang gnyis dang rkang bzhi'i mche ba la phub ma'i sbyin sreg gis zhi bar byed do/_/oM pad+me pad+mA k+Shi pad+ma su b+ha ge phuH/_
[\[4a.3\]]pad+me pad+ma/_ak+She pad+ma/_su b+ha ge phuHswA hA/_sngags 'di thal ba la bzlas te bskus pas mig rgya btab pa rengs pa sos par byed do/_/byabs pas mig rengs pa sos par byed do/_/lan bdun mngon par bsngags pas mig gis khros pa mthong ma thag tu rab tu dad par byed do/_/
[\[4a.4\]]lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i chus gdong bkrus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar byed do/_/rtsig pa la ming smos pa'i sngags rdo rgyus kyis bris na mig nad thams cad 'joms par byed do/_/dben par 'dug ste sems rtse gcig pas skyes bu'i mig gnyis la mngon par bsngags 
[\[4a.5\]]pa byas na/_gang gi tshe g.yon pa 'gul bar gyur pa de'i tshe/_bsams pa'i dgos pa 'grub par ston pa yin no/_/g.yas pa 'gul bar byed na mi dge ba'i dgos pa ston par byed do/_/oM mo tsa ni mo tsa ya/_mo k+Sha ni mo k+Sha ya/_dzI baM bar de swA hA/_'dis mngon par 
[\[4a.6\]]bsngags pa'i til mar gyis skye ba'i sgo la bskus na/_sbrum ma bde bar btsa' bar byed do/_/bcings pa la mngon du phyogs par byed pas/_lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i chu snyim pa bdun mngon par gtor ba dus gsum du byas pas bcings pa rnams grol bar byed do/_/
[\[4a.7\]]gur gum mam gi wang gis gro ga la mngon par bris te/_bcings pa'i mgo bo la btags na bcings pa las grol bar byed do/_/rtag tu bzlas na bcings pa grol bar byed do/_/oM ha ri marka Ta nA ma/_sa hA sra bA huH/_de ba da ta taM/_ban d+ha nAn mok+ShA ya swA hA/_rdo rgyus la 
[\[4b\]]
[\[4b.1\]]mngon par bsngags pas sa'i steng du yang dang yang du bris te/_lugs las bzlog pas phyis na bcings pa las grol bar byed do/_/lo ma la ming dang sngags su bcas pa mngon par bris te/_mgo bo la btags na bcings pa thams cad grol bar 'gyur ro/_/oM tA ri Ni tA ra ya/_
[\[4b.2\]]mo tsa ni mo tsa ya/_mo k+Sha ni mo k+Sha ya/_dzI ba~M ba ra de swA hA/_sngags kyi rgyal po 'di legs par bzlas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur zhing /_lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i til mar gyis skye ba'i sgo la bskus na sbrum ma bde bar btsa' bar 'gyur ro/_/lan bdun mngon par 
[\[4b.3\]]bsngags pa'i chu 'thungs na/_mngal 'khyim pa bde bar btsa' bar byed do/_/rtag tu bzlas pas bdag dang gzhan 'ching ba las thar bar 'gyur ro/_/ske'am dpung pa la bsrung ba btags pas 'jigs pa thams cad las srung bar byed do/_/oM tA re tut+t+wa re tu re mok+Sha ya dzI baM swA hA/_
[\[4b.4\]]sngags kyi rgyal po 'di sngar smos pa'i bya ba byed par 'gyur ro/_/gur gum gyis gro ga la gang gi ming smos pa'i sngags mngon par bris la spra tshil du gtums te/_dri zhim po'i chus bkang ba'i bum pa gsar pa'i nang du bcug ste/_me tog dri zhim po la sogs pas dus gsum du mchod 
[\[4b.5\]]pa byas na 'thab pa dang 'thab mo dang rtsod pa thams cad las rnam par rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/gur gum gyi gro ga la gang gis ming smos pa/_oM e raN+Da s+ya ba ne kA ko_/rang gA tI ra mu ya s+thi taHyi ba tu dU ta/_yA nI yam+pi shal+yA b+ha ba tu gurbi NI/_oM e raN+Da ba ne kA gaHgang+gA tI ra mu ba s+thi taHpi ba tu dU taHsA nI 
[\[4b.6\]]yam+bi shal+yA b+ha ba tu gur+b+bi swA hA/_lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i chu khyor ba gsum pho nyar 'ongs pas 'thungs na/_sbrum ma bde bar btsa' bar byed do/_/oM a ma ra Ni dzI ban ti ye swA hA/_sngags kyi rgyal po 'di legs par bzlas na las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/mngon par 
[\[4b.7\]]bsngags pa'i chu 'thungs na 'brum bu 'ong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lus las skyes pa'i dug mi bzad pa dang spre'u dug dang sbrul dug la sogs pa'i rma la yung ba dang a ru ra dang ru rta la sogs pa la yongs su bzlas te bskus na rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/nad dang rnam par 'tshe ba 
[\[5a\]]
[\[5a.1\]]thams cad la sngags mdud bcings na zhi bar byed do/_/rtag tu bzlas na tshe zad pa yang tshe lo brgya thub par 'gyur ro/_/mar dang til gyi sbyin sreg gis thams cad zhi bar byed do/_/mngon par bsngags pa'i sman gyi btungs pas nad thams cad las yongs su thar bar 
[\[5a.2\]]byed do/_/lan brgya bkrus pa'i mar la mngon par bsngags pas na ba'i yan lag la bskus na rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/mgo'i nad la til mar la bsngags te bskus pas rang bzhin du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gdug pa'i rma la chu la bsngags nas gtor 
[\[5a.3\]]bas sos par 'gyur ro/_/spri ha'i nad la be dang la sogs pa'i mtshon gyis gtubs na spri ha bcad par 'gyur ro/_/ni rgun d+hi dang nim pa'i rtsa ba rma bya'i mjug sgro dang bcas pa gcig tu sbyar la/_brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i bdug pas bdugs na/_rims nyin 
[\[5a.4\]]gcig pa dang /_nyin gnyis pa dang /_nyin gsum pa dang /_nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa sel bar byed cing /_'byung po dang /_sha za dang /_tshangs pa dang /_srin po la sogs pa sel bar 'gyur ro/_/bud med bu shi bas lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i bum pas 
[\[5a.5\]]khrus byas na bu gson po dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gro ga la bris pa'i sngags rked pa'am dpung pa la btags pas mngal srung bar 'gyur ro/_/sngags rjes su dran pas g.yul ngogs su 'jug na rgyal ba rnyed par 'gyur zhing byabs pas nad thams cad sel bar byed do/_/oM pA 
[\[5a.6\]]da tsA la ne swA hA/_sngags kyi rgyal po 'di sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho gas legs par bsgrubs na las thams cad byed do/_/phol mig gi 'jigs pa la mngon par bsngags pa'i chu 'thungs na phol mig med par 'gyur ro/_/gro ga'am shog gu la bris te sgo la btags pas phol 
[\[5a.7\]]mig med par 'gyur ro/_/'di ni 'tshe ba thams cad la mar la btags pa'i til gyi sbyin sreg gis srung ba chen po yin no/_/khwa'i sgro lag pas bzung ste bzlas pa khri byas la gang gi khang pa'i steng gi logs su sbas pas de 'byer bar byed do/_/oM pi shA tsi par+N+Na sha wa ri sarbo 
[\[5b\]]
[\[5b.1\]]pa dra ba nA sha ni swA hA/_rig pa chen mo 'di ma bsgrubs su zin kyang rkang gnyis pa dang rkang bzhi pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'tshe ba sel bar byed cing /_las thams cad [(]byad [,]byed [)]par 'gyur ro/_/sbyin sreg gam bzlas pa'am khrus sam sngags mdud dam mngon par bsngags pa'i chu 
[\[5b.2\]]'thungs pa'am byabs pas nad thams cad sel bar byed do/_/gro ga la gur gum gyis bris pa'i sngags ske'am dpung pa la btags na rtsod sbyong la rgyal ba thob par 'gyur zhing /_rims nyin bzhi pa la sogs pa mi bzad pa las rnam par grol bar 'gyur ro/_/srin po 
[\[5b.3\]]la sogs pa'i 'jigs pa sel bar byed cing /_'thab pa dang 'khrug pa dang rtsod pa dag las rgyal ba sgrub par byed do/_/stag dang chu srin dang lto 'phye chen po dang rkun po la sogs pas mi mthong zhing rtag tu bzlas na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/oM Ar+ya tr-i tI yA/_
[\[5b.4\]]a mu ka s+ya tsak+Shu stam+b+ha ya ti ThaHThaHswA hA/_tshes gang la mig na bar gyur pa de la rtsig pa'am spang leb la rdo rgyus kyis tshes bris la yi ge e kha sbyar gsum du bya'o/_/oM tsaN+Da ma hA ro Sha Na hUM phaT/_sngags kyi rgyal po 'di lan cig bzlas pas sdig pa thams cad nges par sreg 
[\[5b.5\]]par byed do/_/'byung po la sogs pa'i gdon gyis zin pa la yungs kar la sogs pas brdegs pas gdon thams cad 'byer bar byed do/_/kham phor la rdo rgyus kyis bris te sgo la btags pas gsar du btsas pa'i byis pa srung bar byed do/_/spra tshil gyis gzugs sor 
[\[5b.6\]]bzhi pa byas pa de'i snying gar bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa'i sngags mngon par bris te bcug la de'i kha la tsher ma btsugs na phyir rgol ba'i kha phur bus btab par 'gyur ro/_/rkang pa la btsugs na 'gro ba dang 'ong ba rengs par byed do/_/snying ga la btsugs na khro ba 'joms par 
[\[5b.7\]]byed do/_mi'i rje ngar gyi rus pa'i phur bu'am/_lcags kyi phur bus gdab par bya'o/_/ming nas bzung zhing yan lag gang dang gang la phur bus gdab pa de dang de 'jig par 'gyur ro/_/dgra bo'i sgo'i 'og tu sbas na 'byer bar byed do/_/dur khrod kyi thal ba la 
[\[6a\]]
[\[6a.1\]]mngon par bsngags pas sgo'i ya them la gtor na 'byer ro/_/ral gri la mngon par bsngags la g.yul du 'jug na rgyal ba sgrub par byed do/_/bya ba gang la 'jug pa na gtor ma nye bar bstabs na de dang de 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/sngags pa 
[\[6a.2\]]dge ba'am mi dge ba'i las gang 'dod pa bzlas pa tsam gyis byed do/_/oM ka s+ye span+da span+da twaM/_sU n+ya be sh+ma ni ma ma twa thA span+da ya s+tha/_span+da si ba dza Ni swA hA/_oM kA shi span+da ka she span+da twaM n+ye shU n+ya be sh+ma ni a sma kar+N+Na ta thA span+da ya thA span+da si ba dza Na swA hA/_mig 'gul bar gyur na 
[\[6a.3\]]byabs pas zhi bar byed do/_/oM dzaM b+he mo hi hri da ya mA brtA ni hUM phaT swA hA/_/sngags kyi rgyal po 'di tho rangs bya rog sgra mi grag pa'i dus su/_lan bdun mngon par bsngags pa'i chus gdong bkrus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal la ba mar dang pad+ma dkar po'i 
[\[6a.4\]]skud pa'i sdong pos du ba blangs la/_brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa byas pa des mig la bskus pas bud med thams cad yid 'phrog par byed do/_/rgyal la kha thur du bltas pa'i me tog gi rtsa ba dang shi ri khaN+Da dag sbyar la/_brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa des thig ler 
[\[6a.5\]]byas na rje bo khros pa de rab tu sad par byed do/_/ku co dang 'thab pa dang rtsod pa dag las rgyal bar 'gyur ro/_/cho ga bzhin rtag tu bzlas pas grong khyer bskyod pa skyed par byed do/_/oM staM b+ha ni/_staM b+ha ya/_dzaM b+ha ni/_dzaM b+ha ya/_mo ha ni/_mo ha ya/_rak+Sha ni Ni/_rak+Sha ya mAM/_
[\[6a.6\]]bar di sid+d+ha lo tsa ni swA hA/_sangs rgyas spyan gyi snying po 'dis 'jigs pa thams cad sel bar byed do/_/dpa' bo gcig pu grub pa rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las le'u dang po rdzogs so//_//rab sad legs par sangs rgyas pa'i/_/slob ma yon tan gzhi yin pa/_/
[\[6a.7\]]bla ma la gus mkhas pa la/_/rgyud kyi rgyal po bshad par bya/_/oM na mo bi ma la tsan+d+rA ya/_de ba pu trA ya/_sa t+ye na d+h+ri ya ti lo kaHsa t+ye na pa ri gr-i h+ya te sa t+ye na d+harmaHs+thi to lo kaHsa t+ye brah+ma sa tAn naM/_sa t+yaM bud+d+hash+tsa d+harma sh+tsa saM g+hash+tsa gu Na sA ga raHa ne nas t+yaM bA kye na k+Shi pra mA bi sha darba Ne/_
[\[6b\]]
[\[6b.1\]]tad+ya thA/_oM sa ra sa ra/_si ri si ri/_su ru su ru/_me ru man+da ra pra ti kA sa A bi sa A bi sha/_kai lA sa kU Ta pu trA ya na maHswA hA/_yan ma yA tsin ti taM kAr+yaM ta ta sarba bru hi ta twA ta/_At+mA N+bAMbA pa rA bA shu b+ham+bA ya/_di bA shu b+haM/_nang par gtsang ba'i sa phyogs su dkyil 'khor byas 
[\[6b.2\]]shing bum pa bzhag la/_lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i zla ba la mchod pa rgya che ba byas nas me long la mngon par bsngags te/_khye'u 'am bu mo legs par khrus byas la gos legs par bkrus pa bskon cing /_tsan+dan dkar po'i lde gus yan lag byugs la me tog dri zhim po'i phreng ba 
[\[6b.3\]]mgul du btags pa/_grong ba'i chos kyis rab tu ma nyams pa la bstan na ji ltar bsams pa'i dgos pa phyin ci ma log par ston par 'gyur ro/_/dgongs sngas drung du dkyil 'khor nye bar byugs la/_bcom ldan 'das dang lha'i bu dri ma med pa'i zla ba la mchod pa rgya chen po byas 
[\[6b.4\]]la/_brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas cang mi smra bar nyal na dge ba dang mi dge ba ji ltar bsams pa bzhin ston par 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas na 'jig rten gsum gyi spyod pa ston par 'gyur ro/_/oM shra ba Na pi shA tsi ni muN+De swA hA/_ba ru ra'i shing ngam n+ya gro d+ha'i shing gi rtsa bar 'dug la/_cang 
[\[6b.5\]]mi smra bar 'bum phrag gcig bzlas na grub par 'gyur te 'jig rten gsum gyi spyod pa yang ston par 'gyur ro/_/yang na legs par khrus byas la gos gtsang ma bgos te dben par 'dug la khri bzlas pas grub par 'gyur ro/_/dgongs nyal kar ru rta la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon 
[\[6b.6\]]par bzlas nas gdong dang rkang pa gnyis bkrus na/_rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba rnam par ston par 'gyur ro/_/oM na maHsap+tA nAM/_samyak+saM bud+d+ha/_ko TI nAM/_tad+ya thA/_oM tsa le tsu le/_tsun+da swA hA/_bIr+ya sa t+ya pA di ni ba ra de ka thA ya swA hA/_gong du bshad pa'i cho gas me long 
[\[6b.7\]]ngam ral gri'am mar me'am chu snod la ston par byed do/_/lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i chus gdong bkrus la mi smra bar nyal na rmi lam du dge ba dang mi dge ba ston par 'gyur ro/_/oM mu tsi li swA hA/_mo ha ni swA hA/_dan ti li swA hA/_gsang sngags 'di khri bzlas na 'grub 
[\[7a\]]
[\[7a.1\]]par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la mchod pa rgya chen po byas nas lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa'i chus gdong bkrus te/_dgos pa yid la byed pa'i bzlas pas mi smra bar nyal na bcom ldan 'das rang 
[\[7a.2\]]gi gzugs su mthong bar 'gyur zhing dge ba dang mi dge ba rmi lam du dmigs par 'gyur ro/_/oM pra dz+wA la hUM phaT/_bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten mgon po'i snying po 'di lan 'bum phrag bcu bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/gong du smos pa'i cho gas dge ba dang mi dge ba rmi 
[\[7a.3\]]lam du ston par 'gyur ro/_/oM namaHsa man+ta bud+d+hA nAM/_a pra ti ha ta shA sa nA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_ku mA ra rU pi NaM dar+sha ya/_At+mA nAM/_bi b+hU Shi ta me da par be b+hU tiM Shi ta sa mud b+hA ba ya/_swa pa nAM ni be da ya/_ya thA b+hU taM hUM hUM phaT phaT swA hA/_rje btsun 'jam dpal gzhon nu'i bris sku'am 
[\[7a.4\]]lugs ma'i mdun nam sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten la ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te/_brgya phrag bdun bzlas pa byas na rmi lam du bdag nyid dmigs shing gzhan dag gis kyang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/oM kar+N+Na bi shA tsi kar+N+Na me ka thA ya hu~M phaT/_sha za'i shing gi drung gi rtsa bar 
[\[7a.5\]]khams gsum rnam par rgyal ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas shing /_de nyid du mi smra bar 'dug ste/_sha dang nya sha dang mi sha dang 'dzam bu ti ka la mngon par bsngags pa'i gtor ma nye bar bstabs la dus gsum du sngags bzlas na/_zhag dang po la mtshan ma nye bar ston par byed cing phyis 'ong 
[\[7a.6\]]ba 'grub par 'gyur zhing /_de la sogs ba srid pa gsum gyi spyod pa rnam par ston par byed do/_/zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig la tshangs pa gsod pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/oM tsa tur+b+hu dza tsa turmu kha ShaT mu kha/_bi kri tA nan kar+N+Na pi shA tsi ma a kAR+Sha ya hu~M phaT/_dur khrod du gshin rje 
[\[7a.7\]]mthar byed kyi bris sku'i mdun du bzlas pa byas na zhag bdun nas sha za rna sgrogs 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/oM bud+d+ha tsu ru mA tsu ru ke swA hA/_sku gdung dang bcas pa'i mchod rten nam rje btsun sangs rgyas kyi spyan sngar bsnyen pa cho ga khri bzlas la/_de'i 'og tu ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas nas 
[\[7b\]]
[\[7b.1\]]nyal ba'i dus su brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_bdag gang nas skyes par gyur gang du skye bar 'gyur zhes yid la bsams shing nyal na 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i skye ba dmigs par 'gyur bar the tshom med do/_/gal te zla ba drug gi nang rol tu 'chi bar 'gyur na de'i tshe rmi lam du bdag gam 
[\[7b.2\]]gzhan gyi mgo bo mi mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du mngon par bsngags pa'i me long bltas pa na khye'u 'am bu mo gang gi mgo bo mthong bar ma gyur pa de'i zla ba drug gi nang du 'chi bar 'gyur ro/_/rdo lig bu mig dang shing a gas ti dkar po'i rtsa ba reng bur byas te/_brgya rtsa 
[\[7b.3\]]brgyad mngon par bsngags pas mig la byugs na/_gang dag zla ba drug gi nang du 'chi bar 'gyur ba'i rkang gnyis dang rkang bzhi de dag thams cad kyi mgo bo med pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/oM swap+na bi lo ki ni sid d+ha lo tsa ni swap+naM/_me ka thA ya swA hA/_sngags 
[\[7b.4\]]kyi rgyal po 'di gong nas smos pa'i cho gas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/oM a di ti de ba data taM/_me de hi da dA ba ya swA hA/_chu'i nang du zhugs te bu mo gang gang gi ched du bzlas pa byed pa de de nyid la ster bar byed do/_/yi ge 'bum bzlas pa byas pa pri yang ku'i me 
[\[7b.5\]]tog gam pa la sha'i me tog gi sbyin sreg 'bum gyis dpal chen po grub par byed do/_/mtshan mo 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis sbyin sreg byas nas/_grong gang gi ched du sbyin sreg bzlas pa byed pa de rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma rnams sam bil pa rnams kyi 'bras bu'i sbyin sreg 
[\[7b.6\]]'bum gyis rgyal rigs su skyes pa rgyal srid rnyed par 'gyur zhing gzhan dag gis dpal chen po thob par byed do/_/ji lta ba bzhin du rnyed pa'i me tog rnams kyi sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bdun gyis 'byor pa mi zad par 'gyur ro/_/oM dza ye/_bi dza ye/_a dzi te/_a pa rA dzi te swA hA/_
[\[7b.7\]]sring mo bzhi'i snying po'i sngags kyi rgyal po 'di gong du bshad pa'i cho gas 'bum phrag bzhi bzlas na/_gong du bshad pa'i cho gas las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/oM me g+holkA ya swA hA/_pa la sha'i me tog gam yam shing gis sbyin sreg 'bum phrag gcig byas na gser srang 'bum 
[\[8a\]]
[\[8a.1\]]rnyed par 'gyur zhing bu mo don du gnyer bas kyang gang mngon par 'dod pa'i bu mo rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/oM ka ma la bA si ni/_ka ma le ma hA lak+Sh+mi ra dz+ya~M me de hi bar de swA hA/_gsang sngags 'di ni dpal chen po'i snying po'o/_/rtag tu bzlas pa byas na phun sum tshogs 
[\[8a.2\]]pa'i mchog ster bar 'gyur ro/_/ji lta ba bzhin du rnyed pa'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis dpal chen por 'gyur zhing mngon par 'dod pa'i bu mo 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/ras bal gyi sa bon gyi tshad tsam gu gul gyi ri lu mngar gsum la btags pa'i sbyin sreg 'bum mam pad+ma'i 
[\[8a.3\]]sbyin sreg 'bum gyis rgyal srid sgrub par byed do/_/oM nan tu nar ni ba ra ded ni bar de/_gi ni ki Ni khi Ni/_la la khi Ni la khi Ni/_shri yaM me da da bau Sha Ta swA hA/_dga' byed ma'i sngags kyi rgyal po 'di ni gong du bshad pa'i las thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/oM dzam b+he 
[\[8a.4\]]mo he swA hA/_rje btsun ma sgrol ma la ka ra bI ra'i me tog gis mngon par mchod de/_sngags kyi rgyal po yi ge 'bum bzlas na yid la re ba thams cad rdzogs par byed do/_/oM ba su d+hA ri Ni swA hA/_oM shrI ba su swA hA/_oM ba su shrI ye swA hA/_oM shrI ba su mu khI swA hA/_oM 
[\[8a.5\]]shrI ba su ma ti shrI ye swA hA/_bdag nyid dzam+b+ha la'i gzugs su bsgom la/_rang gi snying ga'i zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su ba su d+hA ra gser gyi mdog can phyag gnyis pa rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_shar phyogs la sogs pa'i phyogs na lha mo bzhis bskor ba g.yas kyis 
[\[8a.6\]]mchog sbyin pa/_g.yon gyis 'bras kyi snye ma bsnams pa bsgoms la yid la re ba rdzogs par byed do/_/ba'i lci bas dkyil 'khor gru bzhi khru do pa'i tshad du byas la/_dus gsum du me tog dri zhim pos mchod de stong phrag bzhi bzlas pa byas na zla ba drug gis yid la re ba thams cad 
[\[8a.7\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/ji lta ba bzhin du rnyed pa'i me tog gi sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bzhi byas na dpal chen por 'gyur zhing /_yi ge 'bum bzlas na dpal chen po 'grub par byed do/_/gu gul gyi ri lu'i sbyin sreg 'bum byas na/_yid la re ba yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/oM ba 
[\[8b\]]
[\[8b.1\]]su d+hA ri Ni a mu ke ka n+yAM me de hi/_dA pa ya swA hA/_sngags 'di chu'i nang du zhugs nas khrus byas te 'bum phrag bzhi nges par bzlas pa byas na/_mngon par 'dod pa'i bu mo thob par 'gyur ro/_/mtshan mo 'o ma can gyi yam shing gis grong gi ming nas smos nas sbyin sreg 'bum byas 
[\[8b.2\]]na grong rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/oM ba su d+ha ri Ni swA hA/_oM tsan+d+ra kAn t+yai swA hA/_oM dat+t+wa yai swA hA/_oM ba su dat+t+wa yai swA hA/_oM A r+yA yai swA hA/_oM su b+ha drA yai swA hA/_oM gup+tA yai swA hA/_oM de byai swA hA/_oM swa ra swa t+yai swA hA/_gser gyi byang bu'am dngul gyi byang bu'am zangs 
[\[8b.3\]]ma'i byang bu'i me tog la 'dab ma brgyad pa'i dbus su ba su d+hA ra/_shar la sogs pa'i 'dab ma la tsan+d+ra kA n+t+yA la sogs pa gnod sbyin mo rnams mngon par bris pa'i byang bu gnyis kha sbyar du byas pa'i nang du mar dang sbrang rtsi dang ka ra bcug ste/_gong du bshad pa'i cho gas sngar smos 
[\[8b.4\]]pa'i las rnams byed par 'gyur ro/_/dbus su ni oM dzam+b+ha la dza len+du ya swA hA/_phyogs su ni oM ma Ni b+ha drA ya swA hA/_oM pUr+N+Na b+ha drA ya swA hA/_oM d+ha na dA ya swA hA/_oM bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/_mtshams su ni oM ki li mA li swA hA/_oM tsi bi kuN+Da li ni swA hA/_oM mu khen+du ya swA hA/_
[\[8b.5\]]oM tsa ran+du ya swA hA/_gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po chen po brgyad kyis yongs su bskor ba'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ni ba su d+hA ri dang bcas pa gser gyi mdog can/_ne'u le dang bI dza pU ra sa bon gyis bkang ba phyag na bsnams pa/_gsus pa 'phyang ba/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa/_
[\[8b.6\]]gong du bshad pa'i gnod sbyin mo dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po dang bcas pa la/_dus gsum du mchod pa byas nas/_bsgoms shing bzlas pa byas na bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid stsol bar mdzad do/_/tho rangs chu khyor ba brgya rtsa brgyad sbyin pa dang bya rog 
[\[8b.7\]]gi skad mi grag par chu'i nang du zhugs te/_bzlas pa byas pa de'i gter mi zad cing 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/yang na gser la sogs pa'i byang bu la ba su d+hA ra gnod sbyin mo dang bcas pa dang /_byang bu gnyis pa la bcom ldan 'das dzam+b+ha la gnod sbyin gyis bskor ba yang dag 
[\[9a\]]
[\[9a.1\]]par bris la/_kha sbyar du byas te mnyes par byas na dngos grub chen po brgyad kyang ster bar mdzad na/_grub pa gzhan lta smos kyang ci dgos/_dpa' bo gcig pu grub pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las le'u gnyis pa rdzogs so//_//oM badzra 
[\[9a.2\]]tIk+Sh+Na/_duHkhats+tshe da pra dz+nyA dz+nyA na mUrta ye/_dz+nyA na kA ya bA gI shwa ra a ra pa tsa nA ya te namaH/_bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje dpa' bo gcig pu grub pa/_ston ka'i zla ba'i 'od ltar dkar ba/_phyag g.yon na ut+pa la sngon po bsnams pa/_g.yas kyis mchog sbyin par bdag nyid 
[\[9a.3\]]bsams la/_oM A d+ya nud pan na pra kr-i te/_pra b+hA swa raM/_su bi shud+d+ha/_d+harma d+hA tu/_tri sap+tA hA ta swa ra swa ti pA Ni mu pa la b+ha te/_zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis dbyangs can gyi ngag thob par 'gyur zhing /_zla ba drug gis ngag gi dbang phyug 'grub par byed do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[9a.4\]]ngag gi dbang phyug mngon sum du mthong zhing thos pa 'dzin pa yang thob par 'gyur ro/_/shu dag zho phyed kyi tshad la lan brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par bsngags pa/_tho rangs 'o ma'am mar ram til mar dang lhan cig zla ba gcig 'thungs na glen pa dang dig pa med par byed do/_/khu byug 
[\[9a.5\]]dar ma'i skad dang 'dra bar dbyangs snyan cing tshig gsal bar 'gyur ro/_/zla ba drug goms par byas na ma thos pa'i bstan bcos mngon du 'gyur zhing /_thos pa nam yang brjed par mi 'gyur te thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/oM bA kye daM namaH/_rje btsun gsung gi dbang phyug gi 
[\[9a.6\]]snying po 'di gong ma bzhin ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas goms par byas na gong du bshad pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/rgya mtshor 'gro ba'i chu bo la ske ba tsam gyis chu la rgal la dzA ti'i me tog gi phun pa 'bum phrag gcig blangs nas sngags brjod cing /_/phun pa re re 
[\[9a.7\]]rgyun phyogs su 'bab par 'gyur ba las/_phun pa gcig rgyun las bzlog par 'ong ba de so la ma reg par mid na thos pa 'dzin pa la sogs stsol bar mdzad do/_/ji lta ba bzhin rnyed pa me tog gi sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bzhi byas na ngag gi dbang phyug dang mtshungs par 'gyur 
[\[9b\]]
[\[9b.1\]]ro/_/sman b+h+ra ma'i phye ma zho bzhi tsam la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas la tho rangs dkyil 'khor byas te/_ci 'byor pas bcom ldan 'das 'jam pa'i rdo rje la yang dag par mchod de/_mar ram rang skyur dang sbyar nas 'thungs na zla ba drug gis thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[9b.2\]]tshig gi bdag po'i dbyangs snyan par yang skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho gas yi ge 'bum bzlas na sngags kyi rgyal po 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/phyis zla ba gzas zin pa dang nyi ma gzas zin pa na lcags las byas pa'i ral gri rang gi lag pas blangs te/_zla ba mi 
[\[9b.3\]]snang ba ji srid grol bar gyur pa de srid bzlas pa byas na ral gri'i rig pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'khor lo dang /_rdo rje dang /_rtse gsum pa dang /_mda' dang /_tho ba dang /_zhags pa la sogs pa bsgrub par bya zhing /_rig pa la sogs pa dang bcud kyis len la 
[\[9b.4\]]sogs pa 'dus byas pa bsgrub par bya'o/_/yang na mig sman nam thig le'am rkang pa bsku ba'am dbang du byas pa'i rdzas bsdus te bsgrub par bya'o/_/'o thug gam zho dang zan nam mar dang bcas pa khar dang bcas pas snod bkang ste/_lag pas bkab nas bzlas pa byas te 'thungs 
[\[9b.5\]]na lo lnga brgyar 'tsho bar 'gyur ro/_/mA shA khar bcug nas bzlas pa byas te mid na sdeb sbyor dang thos pa 'dzin pa dang smra mkhas pa dang yid gzhungs par 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma'i sbyin sreg 'bum gyis bcom ldan 'das mngon sum du 'gyur ro/_/bil ba'i sbyin sreg 'bum gyis 
[\[9b.6\]]'jig rten gsum gyi rgyal srid 'grub par byed do/_/ji lta ba bzhin du rnyed pa'i me tog gi sbyin sreg gis ngag gi dngos grub thob par 'gyur ro/_/mar la btags pa'i 'bru lnga'i sbyin sreg 'bum phrag bzhi byas pa tsam gyis gnod sbyin mo dang klu'i bu mo la sogs pa 'gugs par byed 
[\[9b.7\]]do/_/de bzhin du yam shing lngas kyang bya'o/_/rtag tu goms par byas na tshe 'di nyid la sangs rgyas nyid kyang bsgrub par byed par 'gyur ro/_/oM hrIHhUM/_sngags kyi rgyal po 'di 'bras bu mnyam por ster bar byed do/_/oM hrIHma hA mA yAng ge ma hA sA ra swa t+yai namaH/_rje btsun 
[\[10a\]]
[\[10a.1\]]'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying po 'dis las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/oM pra kr-i ti pa ri shud+d+hAH/_sarba d+harmAHpra krI t+yA/_pa ri shud+d+ho\u0f85ha~M/_sa bA h+yA b+h+yan ta ra na ma i ti/_zhes bya bas phyi dang nang du rgyu ba dang mi rgyu ba dang bcas pa'i sna tshogs pa dang bdag nyid rang 
[\[10a.2\]]bzhin gyis yongs su dag par bsam la/_pad+ma dkar po khru bdun pa'i tshad dang de'i steng du zla ba'i dkyil 'khor/_de'i steng du phyag gnyis pa pad+ma dang mchog sbyin gyis rnam par mdzes pa/_bcom ldan 'das ma thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin gyi sku can/_gcig tu gzhan la phan 
[\[10a.3\]]'dogs pas bzhugs pa/_sgrub pa po rnams la mngon par 'dod pa'i dngos grub stsol ba la dgyes pa/_ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba tsan+dan dkar po'i lde gus byugs shing me tog gis mdzes par brgyan pa/_na bza' dkar po dang mu tig gi phreng bas thugs ka mdzes par byas pa/_
[\[10a.4\]]sku rin po che sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i sku las yongs su spros pa'i 'od zer stong gis mtha' yas shing dpag tu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams snang bar byed pa/_lo bcu gnyis kyi na tshod du 'khrungs pa'i sku can/_ngag gi dbang phyug ma chen mor bdag nyid rnam par bsam mo/_/mdun du shes 
[\[10a.5\]]rab ma dang g.yas su yid gzhungs ma dang /_rgyab tu blo ma dang /_g.yon du dran pa ma gong du smos pa'i yon tan thams cad kyis mdzes par lha mo rnam par bsam par bya'o/_/de'i 'og tu lte ba'i phyogs su zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi dbus su yi ge oM mdog dkar po rnam par bsams 
[\[10a.6\]]la de las byung ba'i ngag gi dbang phyug gi rang bzhin ma lus pa'i phreng ba rgyun mi 'chad pa'i 'byung bar rnam par bsam zhing /_gcig pu der phyogs pa'i yid can gyi sngags pas nges par bdag nyid kyi lte ba'i dbus na gnas pa mi smra bas bzlas pa byas na/_zla ba gcig gis dbyangs 
[\[10a.7\]]can gyi ngag rab tu 'thob par 'gyur zhing zla ba gsum gyis tshangs pa gsod pa yang 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/zla ba drug gis dbyangs can dang ngag mnyam par 'gyur ro/_/ra yi 'o ma a ru tsha ba gsum/_/pa tha shu dag se gru sen d+ha pa/_/lan bdun sngags pa'i mar dag ni/_/'thungs 
[\[10b\]]
[\[10b.1\]]na dbyangs can 'grub par 'gyur/_/ra yi 'o ma bre bzhi dang /_/sman rnams srang gcig tsam gyi tshad/_/mar bre gang dang mkhas pa yis/_/rim gyis me chung la bskol bya/_/zla gcig tsam zhig rab sbyar na/_/bla med tshig ni thob 'gyur zhing /_/zla drug nye bar longs spyod 
[\[10b.2\]]pas/_/ngag gi dbang phyug mngon sum 'gyur/_/shu dag shing mngar sen d+ha pa/_/a ru bca' lga la la phud/_/ru rta pi pi zi rar bcas/_/rnam btags ngag ni dag par byed/_/lha la me tog dri [{]bzangs so[,]bzang ngo [}]gas/_/nang par yang dag mchod nas ni/_/lan bdun 
[\[10b.3\]]sngags byas zos nas ni/_/zla ba drug gis thos 'dzin byed/_/zla ba gsum gyis tshig bdag 'gyur/_/zla ba gcig gis blo ldan zhing /_/khu byug gzhon nu'i skad bzhin du/_/dbyangs snyan pa ni skye bar 'gyur/_/gangs can skyes pa'i a ru'am/_/gangs can skyes pa'i 
[\[10b.4\]]shu dag la/_/tho rangs lan bdun mngon bsngags nas/_/zla gcig zos nas zla de la/_/tshig bdag po dang yid gzhungs dang /_/dbyangs snyan shes rab ldan pa yang /_/skye bar 'gyur zhing zla drug gis/_/thos pa 'dzin par yang 'gyur ro/_/oM bAg+dA di ni/_
[\[10b.5\]]bA tsarma ni yats+tsha sa ra swa tI ma hA shwe te swA hA/_pad+ma las skyes pa'i dkar mo chen mo'i snying po 'di ni/_gong du bshad pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/oM arka mA li ni/_ki Ni ki Ni khi Ni khi Ni swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das dpa' bo gcig pu grub pa gsung gi rang bzhin 
[\[10b.6\]]ma lus pa'i po ti bsnams pa/_phyag g.yas kyis shes rab kyi ral gri phyar ba/_gzhon nu'i gzugs can 'jam pa'i rdo rjer bdag nyid bsams la/_mdun du nyi ma'i phreng ba dbyangs can chen po dang rgyab tu dpal chen mo dang g.yas su skra can ma dang g.yon du nye ba'i skra can ma rnam par 
[\[10b.7\]]bsam par bya ste/_ston ka'i zla ba ltar dkar ba bsgom par bya'o/_/de ltar bsgoms pa la gnas shing nges par gnas pas ci 'byor pa'i mchod pa byas te/_sngon du bstan pa'i cho gas sngags 'di gong du smos pa'i rim pas/_'bum phrag bzhi bzlas la/_de nas dbyangs can gyi mar ram/_
[\[11a\]]
[\[11a.1\]]brah+ma'i mar srang gcig tsam la yongs su bzlas te/_bdag nyid la dbyangs can gyi phyag gis rab tu stsol bar yongs su rtog cing /_ting nge 'dzin la gnas pas btung bar bya'o/_/de la brah+ma'i mar 'di ni/_/brah+ma yi khu ba 'o ma dang /_/mar srang sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_/
[\[11a.2\]]yung ba dang ni ma la ti/_/dur byid a ru rar bcas pa/_/de dag cha ni srang re dang /_/pi pi ling dang byi dang ka/_/sen d+ha bi dang kha rar bcas/_/de dag srang gi bzhi char shes/_/sman rnams dag ni btags nas kyang /_/de la 'di dag blugs byas la/_/de dag thams cad cha 
[\[11a.3\]]mnyam pa/_/me chung ngu la de bskol bya/_/de nas 'thungs pa tsam gyis ni/_/bla med ngag ni dag 'gyur dang /_/mtshan bdun nye bar longs spyod pas/_/mi'am ci dang skad mtshungs 'gyur/_/zla gsum nye bar longs spyod pas/_/mi ni shes rab gnas su 'gyur/_/zla 
[\[11a.4\]]gsum rab tu sbyor ba yis/_/thos pa mchog ni 'dzin par 'gyur/_/zla ba drug gis mngon sum du/_/mi ni ngag dbang mtshungs par gyur/_/mdze nad [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dag dang ni/_/za byed chen po bdun 'joms byed/_/oM a nan ta dz+nyA na shrI ye/_many+dzu shrI ye namaH/_gong du 
[\[11a.5\]]smos pa'i lha mo bzhis bskor ba'i ngag gi dbang phyug tu bdag nyid bsams la/_sngar bshad pa'i rim pas sngags bzlas pa byas na/_gong du smos pa'i las thams cad byed par 'gyur ro/_/oM a ra pa tsa na d+hIHswA hA/_dben par dkyil 'khor byas te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[11a.6\](]dag [,]ngag [)]gi dbang phyug dang bla ma rje btsun yang dag par mchod de/_bde ba'i stan la 'dug nas byang chub tu sems bskyed par bya'o/_/de nas oM swa b+hA ba shuHsarba d+harma swa b+hA ba shud d+ho\u0f85haM/_zhes bya ba'i sngags lan gsum gyi bar du brjod de/_bdag dang 'jig rten rang bzhin gyis 
[\[11a.7\]]rnam par dag par bsams la stong pa nyid mngon du byas nas/_pad+ma dkar po'i steng gi zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi steng na bzhugs pa/_sku mdog dkar po ral gri dang po ti bsnams par bdag nyid yud tsam gyis yongs su grub par rnam par bsams la/_ngag gi dbang phyug bdag 
[\[11b\]]
[\[11b.1\]]nyid kyi g.yas su skra can dang g.yon du nye ba'i skra can ma rin po che'i pad+ma bsnams pa sku mdog dkar mo rnam par bsam mo/_/mdun du nyi ma'i 'od mdog dkar po nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor la bzhugs pa ut+pa la bsnams pa dang /_rgyab tu zla ba'i 'od zla ba'i dkyil 'khor la 
[\[11b.2\]]bzhugs pa ut+pa la bsnams pa rnam par bsam par bya'o/_/de nas rang gi snying ga la 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i tshogs yongs su 'phro ba'i yi ge a yongs su bsams la/_de yongs su gyur pa'i 'khor lo rtsibs brgyad pa ngag gi rang bzhin ma lus pas rnam par 
[\[11b.3\]]spras pa/_yongs su gsal bar byed pa myur du 'khor bar bsam par bya'o/_/de ltar goms par byas pa las zla ba drug gis sngon ma thos pa'i bstan bcos thams cad kyang don dang gzhung gi sgo nas mngon sum du 'gyur zhing /_lo gcig gis ngag gi dbang phyug dang mtshungs 
[\[11b.4\]]par 'gyur ro/_/a ra pa tsa na'i 'khor lo'i cho ga'o/_/oM bA gI shwa ri muM/_sngags 'di snga ma bzhin du bzlas pas/_gong du smos pa'i 'bras bu rnams 'byin par 'gyur te/_'khor lo'i dbus su yi ge muHdmar po 'bar ba'i phreng ba'i tshogs can blta bar bya'o/_/shes rab 
[\[11b.5\]]kyi 'khor lo'i cho ga'o/_/oM d+harma d+hA tu/_bA gI shwa ri muM swA hA/_sngar bshad pa'i rim pas lnga po'i bdag nyid du bsams la/_yi ge muM gyi snying po can gyi 'khor lo rtsibs bcu drug pa rnam par bsam par bya'o/_/de ltar rnam par bsams na sngar bshad pa'i 'bras bu rnams skyed par 
[\[11b.6\]]'gyur ro/_/oM badzra tIk+Sh+Na ba ra da muHswA hA/_bdag nyid yi ge muHyongs su gyur pa las me'i phung po lta bus phyogs kyi dkyil 'khor snang bar byed pa/_ngag gi dbang phyug dpa' bo gcig pu grub par yud tsam rnam par bsams la/_rang gi snying gar yi ge oM las yongs su 
[\[11b.7\]]gyur pa'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer brgya stong gis rnam par spras pas/_'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa snang bar byed pa rnam par bsams par byas nas/_zla ba drug tsam gyis ngag gi dbang phyug dang mtshungs par skye zhing /_sngar smos pa'i 'bras bu rnams 'dis skyed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[12a\]]
[\[12a.1\]]dpa' bo gcig pu grub pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po chen po las le'u gsum pa rdzogs so//_//la bA NAM b+ha so shi tIk+Sh+No si u da gro si b+ha yaM ka raH/_a mu ka s+ya/_da hA gA trA Ni/_da ha mA sa~M/_da ha twa tsaM na khA n+ya bi da ha s+thi ni a s+thi ni b+h+yo madz+dza kaM da ha/_la bA NaM/_ts+tshin+da ti/_
[\[12a.2\]]la bA NaM/_b+hin de ti/_la ba Na~M pa tsa ti/_sho Ni taM la ba Ne hri ya mA ne ku to ni da ku do ra tiHya di ba sa ti yo dza na sha te/_na dI nAM tsa sha tAn ta re nag re lo ha prA kA re kr-ISh+Na sar+d+da kr-I tA ku le ta tre pa ba sa mA ni hi la ba Na ban d+ha pu ra skr-i taH/_oM tsi tsi tsi ci bi klo li bi klo li a mu kaM sA d+ha na pa ri pA raM me ba sa mA 
[\[12a.3\]]na ya swA hA/_sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga khri byas la de'i 'og tu bsgrub pa brtsam par bya ste/_me tog dang ldan pa'i shing mya ngan med pa'i rtsa bar bzhugs pa'i rje btsun 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs sku mdog dmar po phreng ba dang na bza' dmar po'i rgyan gyis rjes su byugs pa phyag bzhis 
[\[12a.4\]]zhags pa dang lcags kyu dang gzhu dang mda' bsnams pa sgeg pa'i cha lugs can/_g.yas dang g.yon gyi phyogs na sgrol ma dang khro gnyer can gnyis dang bcas par bdag nyid rnam par bsams la dus gsum du tshwa'i sbyin sreg brgya rtsa brgyad byas na/_nyi ma bdun gyis skyes pa'am bud 
[\[12a.5\]]med dbang du 'gyur ro/_/zhag nyi shu rtsa gcig gis skyes bu chen po dbang du 'gyur ro/_/tshwa dang btsas pa'i spra tshil gyis bsgrub par bya ba'i gzugs sor bzhi pa'i tshad du byas la/_seng ldeng gi me mdag du ba med pa la dus gsum du sngags brjod pas bsros na gang gi ming 
[\[12a.6\]]nas bzung ba de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/rdo rje chu la sbangs pa'i tshwa la lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas pa sbyin par bya zhing zos pa tsam gyis dbang du 'gyur ro/_/oM la ba NAM b+ho si tI k+Sh+no si u da gro si hr-i da yaM ga ma a mu ka s+ya hr-i da yaM/_pi taM nA sti/_lo ki tsi ki ha sa kaHoM tsi Ti tsi Ti/_bi klo li/_
[\[12a.7\]]bi klo li/_ma hA bi klo li/_ma hA bi klo li/_a mu kaM me ba sa mA na ya swA hA/_sngon du bsnyen pa'i cho ga snga ma bzhin du byas la/_dus gsum du tshwa chu khyor gang gi ming dang 'thungs na de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/tshwa dang ske tshe cha mnyam por byas pa gang gi ming dang bcas de sbyin sreg byas na de dbang du 
[\[12b\]]
[\[12b.1\]]'gyur ro/_/oM ku ru kul+le swa ha/_rje btsun 'phags ma sgrol ma'i snying po srid pa gsum dbang du bya ba'i las rnams thogs pa med par 'gugs par grags pa sngar smos pa'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas te/_yi ge 'bum bzlas pa byas la phyis me tog dang bdug pa dang byug pa 
[\[12b.2\]]dang phye ma dang so rtsi la sogs pa gang la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/spos dri zhim pos bdag nyid bdugs na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/me tog dmar po'i sbyin sreg gang gi ming dang byas pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/bza' ba dang btung ba la mngon par bsngags te gang 
[\[12b.3\]]la byin pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/skyes bu chen po dbang du byed pa la yungs kar dkar po'i sbyin sreg bya'o/_/phyis tshes grangs dang rgyu skar dang zhag bzang po la bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/_gro ga'am gos la gur gum mam gi wang ngam ga pur la sogs pa ut+pa la'i 
[\[12b.4\]]'dab ma lta bu'i rtsibs bcu drug pa'i 'khor lo bris la/_'khor lo'i dbus su sgrub pa po dang bsgrub bya'i ming dang bcas pa'i sngags bri bar bya'o/_/'dab ma rnams la ku ru kul+le zhes bya ba'i yi ge bzhis brten pa'i dbus su bsgrub bya gcig pu'i ming bri bar bya'o/_/phyi rol nas yi 
[\[12b.5\]]ge oM rim pa gsum du byas pa'i 'khor lo la skud pa dmar pos bcings nas/_spra tshil gyi rang bzhin can gyi gzugs kyi snying ga'i dbus su bcug la/_seng ldeng gi me mdag la dus gsum du bsros na rkang pas 'gugs par byed do/_/skyes pa'am bud med dbang du byed na/_zangs 
[\[12b.6\]]ma'i khab kyis rkang pa phug la bsros pas dbang du 'gyur ro/_/yi ge ya~M las yongs su gyur pa'i rlung gi dkyil 'khor yongs su bsams la/_de'i steng du yongs su gnas pa'i bsgrub par bya ba skra ma bcings shing gcer bu mgrin pa zhags pas bcings pa snying ga la lcags kyu bsnun 
[\[12b.7\]]pa/_rlung gi shugs can gyi rig sngags kyis thams cad drangs te sgrub pa po'i rkang pa'i drung du lhung zhing bya ba thams cad rnam par bsam par bya'o/_/goms par byas pas nam mkha' la 'dren par yang bsgoms pa tsam gyis 'gyur ro/_/mar dang sbrang rtsi ka ra lhung bzed kyi nang du bcug ste/_
[\[13a\]]
[\[13a.1\]]dus gsum du me tog dri zhim po la sogs pas mngon par mchod cing sngags bzlas na gang 'dod pa de dbang du 'gyur ro/_/pad+ma dkar po'i skud pa'i sdong bu byas la ba ser skya'i mar gyis so ma btang ba'i kham phor la du ba chags pa la brgya rtsa brgyad mngon par 
[\[13a.2\]]bsngags pas mig la bskus na skye bo thams cad dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/dur khrod du ka pA chen po la pad+ma dkar po'i skud pa'i sdong bu dang snum chen pos mar ngo'i tshes brgyad dam bcu bzhi'i nub mo du ba bsgrub par byas la/_des mig la bskus na thams cad dga' bar 'gyur 
[\[13a.3\]]ro/_/a ma le/_bi ma le/_ku ma ku me/_sa ma ye na/_bad d+ho si/_bin dwa na/_bin dwa na/_its+tsha/_its+tsha/_yA de bo bar+Sha ti/_bing+h+yo ta ya ti/_gar+dz+dza ti/_gar+dz+dza ti/_bisma ya ma hA rA dza/_sa mA d+hi bar+d+ha ta yan/_de be b+h+yo/_ma nu She b+h+yo/_gan d+ha ra be b+h+yo/_shi khi gra hA 
[\[13a.4\]]de ba/_A nan+da s+ya/_gra hA NI yA/_a ga ma nA ya kra ma NI yA dzu ho mi ha swA hA/_sngags kyi rgyal po 'dis bsnyen pa'i cho ga byas la/_khang pa'i mdun gyi dbus su ba lci byugs la gru bzhir bres te/_dUr ba'i gcal bkram nas me sbar la/_ar ka'i me tog brgya rtsa brgyad blangs nas/_
[\[13a.5\]]sngags bzla zhing me tog re re me la sbyin sreg byas na/_'dod pa'i skyes pa'am bud med 'gugs par 'grub par 'gyur zhes mkhas pas de ltar shes par byas la gus par bya'o/_/dpa' bo gcig pu grub pa'i rgyud kyi rgyal po las le'u bzhi pa rdzogs so//_//rgya gar 
[\[13a.6\]]gyi mkhan po chen po dI paM ka ra shrIdz+nyA na dang /_lots+tsha ba dge slong dge ba'i blo gros kyis bsgyur/_dge slong tshul khrims rgyal bas gtan la phab pa//[ {D545}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_A r+ya many+dzu shrI swA khyU to nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_'phags 
[\[13a.7\]]pa 'jam dpal gyi zhal nas gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_d+harma d+hA tu ni gar dzi ta rA dzA ya/_ta thA ga tA ya/_a r+ha te samyak+saM bud+d+hA ya/_na mo 
[\[13b\]]
[\[13b.1\]]many+dzu shri ye/_ku mA ra b+hU tA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM dz+nyA nA lo ke/_tri rat+na baM sha saM d+hA ra Ni/_b+ha ga ba ti/_a bA yaM dA di/_a bA yaM dat+te me bo d+hi tsit+ta/_badzra pa ri pA la ya/_sa man+ta/_a ba b+hA se na/_ha na ha na sarba satwa saM ta na pa ti taM/_kle shA nu ts+tshe dA ya/_ba da la k+Sha Na/_a laM kr-i ta sha rI re/_bo 
[\[13b.2\]]d+hi satwa shi shU pa ti pA la ya/_bud d+hA na de shA ya/_de ba/_nA ga_/yak+Sha/_gan+d+harba/_a su ra/_ga ru Da/_kin na ra/_ma ho ra ga_/ba shes+tha pA ya/_a pa yaM da da ti swA hA/_gzungs 'di'i phan yon ni lan gcig brjod pas kyang bskal pa stong du las kyi sgrib pa bsags pa 'byang 
[\[13b.3\]]bar 'gyur ro/_/'chi kar yang 'phags pa 'jam dpal mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug thor tshugs kyis dbu brgyan pa'i sku yang mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/mdor na gzungs 'di'i phan yon ni mtha' yas so/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal 
[\[13b.4\]]gyi zhal nas gsungs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//rgya gar gyi mkhan po dz+nyA na gar+b+ha dang /_lots+tsha ba ban+de klu'i dbang pos bsgyur/_rgya gar gyi mkhan po bi shud+d+ha siM ha dang /_zhu chen gyi lots+tsha ba ban+de de ba tsan+d+ras gtan la phab pa//_//_
[\[13b.5\]{D546}]@#/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'jam pa'i mgon la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas yang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba 
[\[13b.6\]]der thal mo sbyar ba btud nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis rig pa mthong bar bgyi ste/_rig pa dam pa 'di smras na ni ngo mtshar du 'gyur ro/_/thams cad dang 
[\[13b.7\]]ldan pa'i 'khor des byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_'jam dpal legs so legs so/_/'jam dpal khyod kyis rig pa smros shig_/bdag gis bcom ldan 'das kyis gsung gis smra bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[14a\]]
[\[14a.1\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snying po chos thams cad la phyag 'tshal te mchod pa byas nas rig pa smras so/_/na maHsarba ta thA ga te b+h+yaHna mo many+dzu shri ye/_bo d+hi sa twA ya/_oM many+dza bar many+dza g+ho Sha/_
[\[14a.2\]]ha na ha na/_pa tsa pa tsa/_ma tam ta/_ma tha ma tha/_bi d+h+waM sa ya bi d+h+waM sa ya/_ka ra ka ra/_tru Ta tru Ta/_b+hany+dza b+hany+dza/_a b+hi sa a b+hi sa/_tu Ta tu Ta/_tru Ta tru Ta/_s+phu Ta s+phu Ta/_hr-i da ya baM d+ha ni/_namaHsaM bo d+ha ni/_pra b+he sa/_pra b+he sa/_lo ta lo ta/_kr-i ta gr-i ta/_kri da kri da/_kri Ta 
[\[14a.3\]]kri Ta/_ha sa ha sa/_pra ban d+ha/_pra ban d+ha/_A bi sha A bi sha/_hUM hUM hUM/_phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_gang zhig gis nam phyed na lan gsum brjod/_nyi ma la yang lan bdun brjod pa byas na/_rig pa chen mo thob par 'gyur ro/_/mi rnams kyi [(]sha [,]sho [)]lo ka sum brgya 'dzin par 
[\[14a.4\]]'gyur ro/_/'di'i cho ga ni tsan+dan gyis dkyil 'khor byas te/_zhun mar gyis mar mes kyang mchod nas stong phrag brgyad bzlas na 'grub par 'gyur/_ma grub kyang [(]sha [,]sho [)]lo ka brgya nyi ma re re la 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis bstan pa 'dis ma grub na 
[\[14a.5\]]gang zhig mtshams med pa lnga byas na bdag kyang de dang 'dra bar mtshams med pa lnga byas par 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyis dmod btsugs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//[{D547}]na mo many+dzu shri ye/_ku mA ra b+hU tA ya/_bo d+hi satwA ya/_ma ha satwa ya/_
[\[14a.6\]]ma hA ka ru Ni kA ya/_tad+ya thA/_oM a ra dze bi ra dze/_shud d+he/_bi shud d+he/_sho d+ha ni/_bi sho d+ha ni/_a ma le/_bi ma le/_dza ye/_ba hi ni/_ru ru tsa le hUM hUM hUM/_phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_gang gis gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed/_klog par byed/_ston par byed pa de ni blo rno ba 
[\[14a.7\]]dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/lan cig bton na gzungs brgya 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/bskal pa stong du bsags pa'i sdig pa ma lus par byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gcig bzlas na rig pa'i gnas lnga la mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gnyis bzlas na 
[\[14b\]]
[\[14b.1\]]thos pa 'dzin par 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'jam dpal gyi sku mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyis dam bcas pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//[{D548}]'phags pa 'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/oM bA kye te dzA ya/_oM bA kye Sha She swa/_oM bA 
[\[14b.2\]]kye khan dza ye/_oM bA kye niSh+Tha a/_oM bA kye ya na maHoM bA kye daM na maH/_'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan 'di nyid lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas pas mtshams med pa lnga'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad 'byang ngo /_/'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan rdzogs so//_//
[\[14b.3\]{D549}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya many+dzu shrI b+haT+TA ra ka s+ya pra dz+nyA bud+d+hi bar+d+ha na nA ma d+hA ra NI/_bod skad du/_rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs/_dkon mchog gsum phyag 'tshal lo/_/na mo many+dzu shri ye ku mA ra ya/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[14b.4\]]oM a ra dze/_bi ra dze/_shud d+he bi shud d+he/_sho d+ha ni bi sho d+ha ni/_sho d+ha ya bi sho d+ha ya/_a ma le bi ma le dza ya ba ti ru ru tsa le hUM hUM hUM/_phaT phaT phaT swA hA/_gang zhig 'di 'dzin pa de zla ba gcig gis blo dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dbyangs snyan par 'gyur ro/_/gzugs 
[\[14b.5\]]bzang bar 'gyur ro/_/lan cig bklags na bskal pa stong gi bar du 'khor ba la rgyab kyis phyogs par 'gyur ro/_/bcangs pa tsam gyis skye ba dran par 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gcig bzlas na mkhas par 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gnyis bzlas na rig pa 'dzin 
[\[14b.6\]]par 'gyur ro/_/'bum phrag gsum bzlas na 'jam dpal gyi zhal mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te mtshams med pa lnga byas pas grub par ma gyur na de'i tshe nga nying mtshams med pa lnga byed pa yin zhing /_nga nyid kyis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bslus par gyur 
[\[14b.7\]]cig_/rje btsun 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi shes rab dang blo 'phel ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//[{D550}]'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi sngags yi ge 'bru gcig pa'i cho ga_/tad+ya thA/_oM k+Sh+NIM/_gsang sngags yi ge 'bru gcig pa 'di rab tu gsang ba ste/_
[\[15a\]]
[\[15a.1\]]don thams cad sgrub par byed pa/_las thams cad byed pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po/_re ba thams cad yongs su skong bar mdzad pa ste/_so shing la bsngags nas bcangs na so na ba 'byang ngo /_/mig na ba la rgyam tshwa btags pa la lan bdun bsngags te 
[\[15a.2\]]mig bkang na mig nad sel to/_/mi'i khong du mtshon gyi dum bu lus pa la zhun mar rnying pa la lan bdun nam/_brgya rtsa brgyad bsngags te blud pa'am/_rma khar bskus na mtshon gyi dum bu 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/zas ma zhu ba dang /_sbos te gsud pa dang /_tshad pas 'khru ba la mu rang 
[\[15a.3\]]tshwa'am/_rgyam tshwa'am/_yang na lan tshwa gzhan gang yang rung ba la lan bdun bsngags te zos na nad de las grol te de nyid kyi nyin par sos par 'gyur ro/_/klad pa na ba la bya rog gi sgro la lan bdun bsngags te byabs na nad de sos par 'gyur ro/_/'jam dpal gyi yi ge 'bru gcig 
[\[15a.4\]]pa'i gzungs rdzogs so//_//[{D551}]thams cad mkhyen pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal rnon po la bstod pa/_mthing nag mdzes pas 'jam par 'tsher ba'i dbu/_/lcang lo rdzings bskyod mthing gi mtsho ltar g.yo/_/dge ba'i spyi gtsug 
[\[15a.5\]]mtshan mchog g.yas su 'khyil/_/gtsug tor 'phags pas skye bos bltar mi mthong /_/srid pa'i sdug bsngal ma lus gzhom pa dang /_/mthu chen byin gyis rgol ba gzhom pa'i phyir/_/dbu rgyan cod pan rgyal ba'i mchog gsang zhing /_/chos kyi rgyal thabs dbang gi pha 
[\[15a.6\]]rol phyin/_/rin chen spug dang ut+pal 'dra ba yi/_/shin tu dngas par dkar nag phyed pa'i spyan/_/smin tshugs mdzes pas zla ba tshes ltar 'khyug_/mig 'dzums zur gyis lta bas byams pa'i rtags/_/sil snyan rnam dag mtshan rab 'bru chags pa/_/rin chen 
[\[15a.7\]]ma lus rnam pa du mas spras/_/rgyal bas zhing mang rnam pa sna tshogs su/_/rnam thar dpag yas chos sgo grangs med gnas/_/shangs kyi dbyibs legs skye bo yongs las 'phags/_/mtho la yid tsam zur la legs pa'i mtshan/_/drang la chu phran 'dra bar mdzes pa'i 
[\[15b\]]
[\[15b.1\]]tshul/_/bzang legs bskal pa brgyar yang bltar mi ngoms/_/pad+ma le brgan tshon ltar dmar ba'i sgros/_/yid gzhungs sel ba 'khyil ba bzang legs sku/_/mdog sdug tshu skyes snang ba mtsho lo bzhin/_/shin tu dang pa'i yid kyis 'dzum pa mdzad/_/zhal 
[\[15b.2\]]ras zla 'dra gser gyi mdog gis rgyas/_/'od kyi dkyil 'khor gser phreng du mas spras/_/gsal ba'i 'od phung nyi ma brgya bas lhag_/'od zer sna tshogs sprin phung bzhin du 'phro/_/chos dbyings 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyis sgra sgrogs pa/_/ka la ping ka lta bur yid 'phrog 
[\[15b.3\]]mdzad/_/sang sang dbyangs rab gsung dbyangs rab bsgrags pa/_/seng ge'i nga ro gser gyi dril ltar 'khrol/_/skyes mchog mdzad pa rgam par mdzad pa'i sku/_/cha lugs bzhin 'chang gzi brjid 'phags pa'i skru/_/gzhon nu'i tshul chags shin tu gzhon par gda'/_/
[\[15b.4\]]gdul bya'i skye bo gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis gdul/_/dbu rgyan rin chen rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/mu tig do shal gser gyi rgyan du bkod/_/pad+ma lha yi na bza' sil ma bsnams/_/g.yas na mtshon mchog bsnams pa thabs kyis 'dul/_/dpe med rno ba shes rab 
[\[15b.5\]]nyid du nges/_/chos dbyings tshul nyid yang dag brjod pa dang /_/mi shigs rdo rje gtan nas 'bigs pa'i tshul/_/g.yon pa shes rab pha rol phyin pa dang /_/blang dor gnyis med bsam gyis mi khyab dbyings/_/zab mo'i chos nyid thugs su chud pa'i don/_/
[\[15b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis 'jam dpal rnon po la bstod pa rdzogs so//_//[{D552}]'jam dpal ngag gi dbang phyug la bu mo brgyad kyis bstod pa/_gzhon nu'i sku lus 'chang ba po/_/ye shes sgron mes rab brgyan zhing /_/'jig rten gti mug mun sel ba/_/'jam 
[\[15b.7\]]pa'i dbyangs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyid kyi mdangs bzang tshogs kyis ni/_/zla ba rgyas pa zil gnon zhing /_/ma rig rnam par bsal gyur pa/_/'jam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ma bgyis zur phud gsal ba la/_/nor bu 'bar ba'i sku mnga' zhing /_/
[\[16a\]]
[\[16a.1\]]nyid ni kun du dga' ba'i sku/_/'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdud rtsi 'dra zhing 'jam la zab/_/yid 'ong gsung gi sgra sgrogs pa/_/dam pa chos kyi rin chen mdzod/_/'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/gang gA'i chu thigs ltar grangs med/_/'jig rten 
[\[16a.2\]]khams kun ma lus par/_/nyon mongs dri ma rab spangs pa'i/_/'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/mche ba gtsigs shing bsgyings pa yi/_/'jigs pa'i sku yi tshul gyis ni/_/gshin rje'i dregs pa 'joms mdzad pa/_/'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal bstod/_/rang gi 
[\[16a.3\]]spyan dang mdangs 'dra ba'i/_/ut+pal sngon pos rab mdzes pa/_/lhung bzed phyag na bsnams pa yi/_/'jam dpal khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas la/_/rgya cher mchod dang bstod pa yis/_/grol ba'i lam ni ston pa po/_/'jam dpal khyod la phyag 
[\[16a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/bu mo brgyad kyis bstod pa rdzogs so//[ {D553}]@#/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA mASh+Ta sha ta kaM_/bod skad du/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa zhes bya ba/_bcom ldan 'das ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma la 
[\[16a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/'das dang ma byon da ltar gyi/_/rgyal ba gang lags de kun gyi/_/yum ni dge ma khyod lags te/_/khyod ni lha mo rgyal ba'i sras/_/rang bzhin med pa'i rang bzhin can/_/sangs rgyas yum gyur de yi mtshan/_/dge ma bdag gis brjod par bgyi/_/'byor par 'dod pas 
[\[16a.6\]]mnyan par gyis/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_lam gyi rnam pa mkhyen pa nyid dang /_rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_ma nor ba de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa de bzhin nyid dang /_bden pa dang /_de kho na dang /_yang dag 
[\[16a.7\]]pa dang /_phyin ci ma log pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid dang /_mtshan ma med pa nyid dang /_smon pa med pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid dang /_chos nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_chos gnas pa nyid dang /_chos mi 'gyur ba nyid dang /_chos skyon med 
[\[16b\]]
[\[16b.1\]]pa nyid dang /_chos kyi mtshan nyid dang /_chos bdag med pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid med pa nyid dang /_sems can med pa nyid dang /_srog med pa nyid dang /_gso ba med pa nyid dang /_skyes bu med pa nyid dang /_gang zag med pa nyid dang /_brjod par bya ba dang /_brjod par bya ba ma yin pa dang /_sems dang 
[\[16b.2\]]yid dang rnam par shes pa dang bral ba dang /_mnyam pa med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pa dang bdag gi ba med pa dang /_rgyags pa med pa dang /_spros pa med pa dang /_spros pa dang bral ba dang /_spros pa thams cad dang bral ba dang /_spros pa thams cad las shin tu 'das pa dang /_sangs 
[\[16b.3\]]rgyas thams cad kyi yum dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad skyed pa dang /_nyan thos thams cad 'dzin pa dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad skrun pa dang /_'jig rten thams cad 'dzin pa dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs zad mi shes pa bsags pa dang /_ye shes 'bab pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul mdzad pa 
[\[16b.4\]]dang /_lha'i mig rnam par sbyong bar mdzad pa dang /_lha'i rna ba rab tu dang bar mdzad pa dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes par mdzad pa dang /_sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par mdzad pa dang /_'chi 'pho ba dang /_skye ba shes par mdzad pa dang /_nyon mongs pa thams cad zad par mdzad pa dang /_'phags 
[\[16b.5\]]pa dang /_gtsang ba dang /_bsangs pa dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la gnas pa dang /_yang dag par spong ba'i shugs dang ldan pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul gyi rkang pa bzhi'i zhabs dang ldan pa dang /_dbang po sbyong bar mdzad pa dang /_stobs mdzad pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba med pa dang /_byang chub kyi yan lag 
[\[16b.6\]]bdun gyi rin po ches mdzes par byas pa dang /_nor bdun sbyin par mdzad pa dang /_'phags pa'i lam yan lag brgyad pa ston pa dang /_mthar gyis gnas pa'i snyoms par 'jug pa dgu ston par mdzad pa dang /_dbang bcu sgrub pa dang /_sa bcu la gnas par mdzad pa dang /_stobs bcu yongs 
[\[16b.7\]]su rdzogs par mdzad pa dang /_zad par gyi skye mched bcus mdzes par byas pa dang /_shes pa bcu sgrub pa dang /_bag la nyal bcu'i dgra 'jig par mdzad pa dang /_bsam gtan rnams sgrub par mdzad pa dang /_gzugs med pa'i khams las yang dag par 'da' bar mdzad pa dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[17a\]]
[\[17a.1\]]sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa dang /_shes pa thams cad mdzad pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad rdzogs par mdzad pa dang /_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa 
[\[17a.2\]]nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid 
[\[17a.3\]]stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_ma byung ba dang /_ma skyes pa dang /_ma 'gags pa dang /_chad pa med pa dang /_rtag pa med pa dang /_don gcig pa ma yin pa dang /_don tha dad pa ma yin pa dang /_'ong ba med pa dang /_'gro ba med pa dang /_rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba rnam par bsgom pa dang /_rab tu 
[\[17a.4\]]brtag par bya ba ma yin pa dang /_rnam par shes par bya ba ma yin pa dang /_gzhi med pa dang /_mtshan nyid med pa dang /_brtag par bya ba ma yin pa dang /_rig par bya ba ma yin pa dang /_thog ma dang tha ma 'jig pa med par mdzad pa dang /_g.yo ba med par mdzad pa dang /_gnyis su med pa dang /_gnyis su med pa ma yin pa dang /_zhi ba 
[\[17a.5\]]dang /_blo 'jug pa rnam par spangs pa dang /_gnyen po med pa dang /_ma gos pa dang /_nam mkha'i lam dang 'dra ba dang /_yod pa dang med par brjod pa ma yin pa dang /_rmi lam gyi ngo bo nyid dang /_sgyu ma lta bu'i chos nyid dang /_mgal me bskor ba dang 'dra bar chos thams cad ro gcig pa nyid do/_/su zhig shes rab kyi pha 
[\[17a.6\]]rol tu phyin pa'i mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad pa 'di 'don pa de ngan song thams cad las rab tu thar bar 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas thams cad kyis kyang dgongs par 'gyur ro/_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis kyang rtag par rgyun du srung ba dang /_skyob pa dang /_sbed pa byed par 'gyur ro/_/de'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag kyang 
[\[17a.7\]]rtag tu rgyun mi 'chad par dran par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'phags ma shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma/_mos pa la byams ma/_yon tan dpag tu med pa dang ldan ma/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ye shes kyis rnam par mkhyen pa nyid/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi phyag bzhes pa la 
[\[17b\]]
[\[17b.1\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di lta ste/_oM pradz+nye pradz+nye ma hA pradz+nye/_pradz+nyA a ba b+hA se/_pradz+nyA A lo ka ka re/_a dz+nyA na bi d+ya ma ne/_sid d+hi/_su sid d+hi/_sid d+h+ya ma ne/_b+ha ga ba ti sar+b+bAM ga sun dA ri/_b+ha ga ba ti/_brta sa li/_pra sA ri ta haste/_sa mA shwA sa ka ri/_tiSh+Tha tiSh+Tha/_kam pa kam pa/_tsa la tsa la/_rA ba rA ba/_gardza gardza/_A gats+tsha/_A gats+tsha/_b+ha ga ba ti 
[\[17b.2\]]mA bi lam+ba swA hA/_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di 'dzin na shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'bum bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/rtag tu bzlas brjod byas na de'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang skye ba dran pa dang /_yid gzhungs shing shes rab mtshungs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/dus gsum gyi de 
[\[17b.3\]]bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos ma lus par bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/gsang sngags dang /_rig sngags thams cad kyang yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di nas shi 'phos nas kyang skye ba dran pa dang /_yid gzhungs shing shes rab chen por 'gyur ro/_/'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mtshan brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[17b.4\]]pa rdzogs so//_//[{D554}]rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya kau shi ka pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA nA ma/_bod skad du/_'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kau shi ka zhes bya ba/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab na bya 
[\[17b.5\]]rgod kyi phung po'i ri la dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma thams cad kyang gzhon nur gyur pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_kau shi ka de la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di yin te/_shes rab kyi pha 
[\[17b.6\]]rol tu phyin pa ni gnyis su blta bar mi bya/_gnyis ma yin par yang ma yin/_mtshan mar ma yin/_mtshan ma ma yin par yang ma yin/_blang bar yang ma yin/_dor bar yang ma yin/_bsnan par ma yin/_bsnan pa med par yang ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs par ma yin/_kun nas nyon mongs pa ma yin par yang ma yin/_rnam par byang bar 
[\[17b.7\]]ma yin/_rnam par byang ba ma yin par yang ma yin/_spang bar ma yin/_spang ba ma yin par yang ma yin/_gnas su ma yin/_gnas su ma yin par yang ma yin/_sbyor bar ma yin/_sbyor ba ma yin par yang ma yin/_'brel par ma yin/_'brel par ma yin par yang ma yin/_rkyen du ma yin/_rkyen ma yin par yang ma yin/_chos su ma 
[\[18a\]]
[\[18a.1\]]yin/_chos ma yin par yang ma yin/_de bzhin nyid ma yin/_de bzhin nyid ma yin par yang ma yin/_yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin/_yang dag pa'i mthar ma yin par yang ma yin no/_/kau shi ka de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i don ni 'di lta ste/_chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nyid mnyam 
[\[18a.2\]]mo/_/chos thams cad zab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zab bo/_/chos thams cad dben pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dben no/_/chos thams cad g.yo ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa g.yo ba med do/_/chos thams cad rlom sems med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rlom sems med do/_/
[\[18a.3\]]chos thams cad 'jigs pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'jigs pa med do/_/chos thams cad bag tsha ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bag tsha ba med do/_/chos thams cad ro gcig pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa ro gcig go/_/chos thams cad skye ba med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[18a.4\]]pa skye ba med do/_/chos thams cad 'gags pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'gags pa med do/_/chos thams cad nam mkha' lta bu'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa nam mkha' lta bu'o/_/gzugs mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/_/de bzhin du tshor ba dang /_'du shes dang /_'du byed 
[\[18a.5\]]rnams dang /_rnam par shes pa mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/_/sa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/_/de bzhin du chu'i khams dang /_me'i khams dang /_rlung gi khams dang /_nam mkha'i khams dang /_rnam par shes pa'i khams mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med 
[\[18a.6\]]do/_/ri rab mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/_/rgya mtsho mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/_/rdo rje mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mnyam mo/_/chos thams cad dbyer med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dbyer med do/_/chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid dmigs su med pa'i phyir shes 
[\[18a.7\]]rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i ngo bo nyid dmigs su med do/_/chos thams cad bsal ba med par mnyam pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsal ba med par mnyam mo/_/chos thams cad byed pa med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa byed pa med do/_/chos thams cad bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsam gyis 
[\[18b\]]
[\[18b.1\]]mi khyab bo/_/de bzhin du sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_thabs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang /_stobs kyi pha rol tu 
[\[18b.2\]]phyin pa dang /_ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'khor gsum yongs su dag pas mu med pa'i phyir shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa mu med do/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya ba ni 'di ltar stong pa nyid [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad de/_'di lta ste/_nang stong pa nyid dang /_phyi stong pa nyid dang /_phyi nang stong pa nyid dang /_stong pa nyid stong pa nyid dang /_chen po 
[\[18b.3\]]stong pa nyid dang /_don dam pa stong pa nyid dang /_'dus byas stong pa nyid dang /_'dus ma byas stong pa nyid dang /_mtha' las 'das pa stong pa nyid dang /_thog ma dang tha ma med pa stong pa nyid dang /_dor ba med pa stong pa nyid dang /_rang bzhin stong pa nyid dang /_chos thams cad stong pa nyid dang /_rang gi mtshan nyid stong pa nyid dang /_mi dmigs pa stong 
[\[18b.4\]]pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa stong pa nyid dang /_ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid dang /_dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid stong pa nyid de/_mdor na stong pa nyid 'di ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa zhes bya'o/_/skar ma rab rib mar me dang /_/sgyu ma zil pa chu bur dang /_/rmi lam glog dang sprin lta bu/_/'dus byas de ltar blta bar 
[\[18b.5\]]bya/_/na mo b+ha ga ba t+yai Ar+ya pradz+nyA pA ra mi tA yai/_oM d+hIHhrIHshrI shru ti smr-i ti ma ti ga ti bi dza ye swA hA/_'gag pa med cing skye med la/_/chad pa med cing rtag pa med/_/tha dad don min don gcig min/_/'ong ba med cing 'gro med la/_/spros pa zhi bas zhi ba yi/_/rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ston pa/_/rdzogs 
[\[18b.6\]]pa'i sangs rgyas gang yin pa/_/smra mchog de la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_dge slong de dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma 
[\[18b.7\]]yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do//_//'phags pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kau shi ka zhes bya ba rdzogs so//_//
[\[19a\]]
[\[19b\]]
[\[19b.1\]{D555}]@##/_/rgya yi skad du/_tA shin kyin kwang mya'u tsa'i shin wang kyin/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po theg pa chen po'i mdo/_bam po dang po/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 'tshal 
[\[19b.2\]]lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod spungs pa'i ri shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi dbyings zab mo sangs rgyas thams cad kyi spyod yul de bzhin gshegs pa'i gnas na dge slong chen po'i dge 'dun khri phrag dgu khri brgyad stong dang 
[\[19b.3\]]thabs cig tu bzhugs te/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa sha stag_/glang po che'i rgyal po ltar shin tu rnam par byang ba sha stag_/zag pa zad pa sha stag_/nyon mongs pa med pa sha stag_/sems shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag_/shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba sha stag_/bya 
[\[19b.4\]]ba byas pa sha stag_/khur bor ba sha stag_/bdag gi don rab tu rnyed pa sha stag_/srid pa'i sbyor ba yongs su zad pa sha stag_/dam pa'i dbang mchog thob pa sha stag_/tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la gnas pa sha stag_/thabs dang shes rab tu ldan par mkhas pa'i rgyan gyis 
[\[19b.5\]]brgyan pa sha stag_/rnam par thar pa brgyad dang ldan pa sha stag_/pha rol du yongs su phyin pa sha stag ste/_de dag gi ming la 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang /_tshe dang ldan 
[\[19b.6\]]pa bzang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ga yA 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa chu bo 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_de la gcig ma gtogs pa 
[\[19b.7\]]de ni tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo ste/_de la sogs te nyan thos kyi dge 'dun chen po rnams phyi dro'i dus na so so'i ting nge 'dzin las langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na pa der lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/_g.yas phyogs nas lan 
[\[20a\]]
[\[20a.1\]]gsum bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong snyed kyang de na 'dus par gyur te/_thams cad kyang klu'i rgyal po chen po ltar gzi brjid kyi byin gyi mthu che ba/_shin du 
[\[20a.2\]]grags pa dang ldan pa/_cang shes dang ldan pa/_sbyin pa dang tshul khrims yongs su dag pa mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed pa dang /_yongs su dag pa/_bskal pa grangs med pa nas bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus su ldan pa/_bsam gtan thams cad las yongs su 'das pa/_
[\[20a.3\]]dran pa mngon par gzhag pa/_shes rab kyi sgo yongs su 'byed pa/_rnal 'byor dang thabs dang dbang gis rnam par rol ba/_mngon par shes pa dang /_gzungs dang ldan pa/_spobs pa yongs su mi zad pa nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spangs pa/_nyon mongs pa'i bshal 
[\[20a.4\]]thag yongs su gcod pa/_ring po mi thogs par thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang ldan par 'gyur ba/_bdud dang /_bdud kyi dmag yongs su 'joms pa/_chos kyi rnga rab tu sgrogs pa/_mu stegs thams cad yongs su zlog pas bsam pa rnam par dag par sbyor ba/_dam 
[\[20a.5\]]pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/_lha dang mi thams cad yongs su sgrol ba/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyan yongs su sgrub pa/_rgyud drug gi skye bo yongs la phan 'dogs pa/_ye shes chen po phun sum tshogs pa/_bzod pa chen po dang yongs su ldan pa/_byams pa 
[\[20a.6\]]chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang ldan pa'i sems la gnas pa/_gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i stobs chen po dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du rgyu zhing mchod pa byed pa/_yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar mi 'jug pa/_ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa'i mthar yongs su mi zad pa'i 
[\[20a.7\]]yi dam gyi smon lam chen po bskyed pa/_sangs rgyas mang po las shin du zab mo'i rgyu rnam par dag pa bskyed pa/_dus gsum gyi chos ma skyes pa'i bzod pa thob pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las yongs su 'das pa/_'jig rten gyi don sbyor ba la mkhas pa/_
[\[20b\]]
[\[20b.1\]]ston pa chen pos dgongs te gsungs pa'i chos shin du bkod pa rgya cher ston pa/_stong pa'i mtshan nyid rnam par dag pa'i zab mo la mkhas pa/_the tshom yongs su spangs pa sha stag ste/_de dag gi ming la 'di lta ste/_bsgribs pa med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i byang chub sems 
[\[20b.2\]]dpa' dang /_chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar sems bskyed pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_brtson 'grus yongs su ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_yongs su mi skyo ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byams pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'jam dpal byang chub 
[\[20b.3\]]sems dpa' dang /_spyan ras gzigs byang chub sems dpa' dang /_gzungs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' dang /_spobs pa chen po'i rgyan gyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' dang /_ri rab mchog gi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rgya mtsho chen po zab mo'i 
[\[20b.4\]]rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan chen po'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sa'i snying po'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nam mkha'i snying po'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rin po che'i phyag dbang 
[\[20b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rdo rje'i thal mo byang chub sems dpa' dang /_dga' ba'i stobs byang chub sems dpa' dang /_chos kyi stobs byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'od rgyan chen po byang chub sems dpa' dang /_gser gyi 'od rgyan chen po byang chub sems dpa' dang /_tshul 
[\[20b.6\]]khrims rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rtag tu ting nge 'dzin byang chub sems dpa' dang /_shes rab rnam par dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_brtson 'grus dka' thub byang chub sems dpa' dang /_bsam pa nam mkha' ci bzhin byang chub sems dpa' dang /_
[\[20b.7\]]smon lam chen po yongs su mi gcod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sman gtong byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyon mongs pa'i nad rnam par sel ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sman gyi rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' dang /_'phags par dga' ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[21a\]]
[\[21a.1\]]dang /_gong du lung bstan pa thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen 'od gtsang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen chos skyong byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen grags can dga' byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen mtha' yas grags byang chub 
[\[21a.2\]]sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen seng ge sgra byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen gleng po che'i rgyal po'i sgra byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen bkra shis byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen rin chen yon tan byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen nyi ma'i snying po byang chub 
[\[21a.3\]]sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen zla ba'i snying po byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen skar ma'i 'od byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen me 'od byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen glog 'od byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen 'brug sgra byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen 
[\[21a.4\]]shes rab char yongs su snyoms pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen char gyi rgyal po yongs su dag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen me tog sdong po'i rgyal po byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen pad+ma sngon po'i bsung byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin rin po che'i tsan+dan 
[\[21a.5\]]sku rnam par bsil ba byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen mun pa rnam par sel ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_sprin chen lta ba'i rab rib rnam par sel ba'i byang chub sems dpa' dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i 'khor de dag phyi dro'i dus na so so'i ting 
[\[21a.6\]]nge 'dzin las langs nas bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas g.yas phyogs nas lan gsum du bskor ba byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_lits+tsha bI gzhon nu 'bum phrag 'bum brgyad 
[\[21a.7\]]stong yang der 'dus par gyur te/_de dag gi ming la gzhon nu seng ge'i 'od dang /_gzhon nu seng ge'i blo gros dang /_gzhon nu chos byin dang /_gzhon nu dbang po sbyin dang /_gzhon nu 'od chen dang /_gzhon nu dpal chen dang /_gzhon nu sangs rgyas skyabs dang /_gzhon nu chos 
[\[21b\]]
[\[21b.1\]]skyabs dang /_gzhon nu dge 'dun skyabs dang /_gzhon nu rdo rje skyabs dang /_gzhon nu nam mkha' skyabs dang /_gzhon nu nam mkha' sgra sgrogs dang /_gzhon nu rin po che'i snying po dang /_gzhon nu bkra shis mchog gi snying po dang /_de dag gzhon nu thams cad kyi gtso bor 
[\[21b.2\]]gyur nas/_bla na med pa'i byang chub tu gnas te theg pa chen po'i dad pa so sor rnyed nas/_phyi dro'i dus na bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/_g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_phyogs 
[\[21b.3\]]gcig tu 'khod do/_/gzhan yang 'di lta ste/_lha'i sras po bzhi khri nyis stong yang der 'dus par gyur te/_de dag gi ming la 'di lta ste/_lha'i sras po mthong na dga' ba dang /_lha'i sras po yid dga' ba dang /_lha'i sras po nyi ma'i 'od dang /_lha'i sras po zla ba'i gtsug
