[\[42a.7\]]bas gnod pa mi bgyid cing rnam par 'tshe ba'i bsam pa ma mchis pa dang /_skye bo rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su mchi zhing thams cad kyis byang chub kyi spyod pa mngon par sgrub par 'gyur ba ste/_'di dag ni phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[42b\]]
[\[42b.1\]]bdag cag kyang rtag par mdo sde 'di rgya cher spel ba'i slad du 'di ltar mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin pa'i gang zag de'i slad du rjes su 'brang zhing gang na gnas pa'i gnas der sman pa dag bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag legs so/_/legs so/_/
[\[42b.2\]]de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_khyod kyi rab tu brtson pa'i sems kyi mdo sde'i rgyal po shin tu gya nom pa 'di spel ba nyid kyis yang dag pa'i chos yun ring du 'jig rten na gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las sku 
[\[42b.3\]]gsum rnam par 'byed pa'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mngon sum du shin tu gya nom pa'i chos thos pas dga' mgu rangs par gyur te/_sems rtse gcig tu yid la bsams nas rang gi 
[\[42b.4\]]gnas su phyin pa dang /_mtshan mo nyal ba'i rmi lam na gser gyi rnga bo che 'od zer shin tu 'bar ba nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dang mtshungs pa zhig mthong ste/_'od zer de las phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams rin po che'i shing drung na bai DUr+ya'i gdan la bzhugs nas 
[\[42b.5\]]'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor ba la chos 'chad pa yang mthong /_bram ze zhig gis gser gyi rnga brdungs pa las sgra chen po byung ste/_sgra de las sdig pa bshags pa'i chos kyi tshigs su bcad pa shin tu gya nom pa dag bstan pa yang mdzes pa'i tog gis 
[\[42b.6\]]thos pas thams cad ma lus par yid la bzung ste dran pa rtse gcig tu gnas par gyur to/_/nam langs pa dang 'khor brgya stong tshad med pa mang pos yongs su bskor te mchod pa'i yo byad rnams thogs nas rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer nas phyir byung ste/_bya 
[\[42b.7\]]rgod phung po'i ri ga la ba der dong nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar phyin pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas me tog dang spos dag bkram ste/_g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de thal mo sbyar nas gus pas 
[\[43a\]]
[\[43a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gi g.yar lam na bram ze zhig gis gser gyi rnga shin tu gya nom pa brdungs pa las sgra chen po byung ste/_sgra de las sdig pa bshags 
[\[43a.2\]]pa'i chos kyi tshigs su bcad pa shin tu gya nom pa dag bstan pa bdag gis thams cad yongs su bzung ste dran lags na/_bcom ldan 'das thugs rje chen pos bdag gis bshad par gnang bar mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su 
[\[43a.3\]]bcad de gsol pa/_/bdag gis mdang sum g.yar lam na/_/gser gyi rnga ni chen po zhig_/dbyibs ni shin tu khyad par 'phags/_/kun nas 'od zer khyab par ldan/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor mtshungs pas na/_/snang bas kun tu khyab par bgyis/_/phyogs 
[\[43a.4\]]bcu'i 'jig rten gang bar mthong /_/sangs rgyas mang po thams cad kun/_/rin chen ljon shing drung dag tu/_/bai DUr+ya yi gdan bzhugs te/_/'khor ni brgya stong tshad med snyed/_/gus pas yongs su bskor bar mthong /_/de nas bram ze zhig gis ni/_/gser gyi rnga 
[\[43a.5\]]chen brdungs pas na/_/rnga chen de yi sgra las ni/_/tshigs bcad gya nom 'di skad smras/_/gser 'od rnga las gya nom sgra byung bas/_/stong gsum chen po'i 'jig rten kun khyab nas/_/ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal mi bzad dang /_/mi yi sdug bsngal mang po gang 
[\[43a.6\]]yin pa/_/gser gyi rnga sgra mthu stobs dbang gis ni/_/nyon mongs sgrib pa thams cad gtan zhi nas/_/dper na thub dbang bcom ldan ji bzhin du/_/'jigs pa bsal nas bde ba nyid du shog_/bcom ldan 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen por ni/_/spyod bsags 
[\[43a.7\]]thams cad mkhyen ni bsgrubs pas na/_/sems can byang chub yan lag ldan mdzad nas/_/mthar ni yon tan rgya mtsho phyogs par mdzad/_/gser 'od dam pa'i rnga chen sgra 'di ni/_/thos pa kun ni tshangs dbyangs thob par shog_/bla med byang chub 'bras bu 
[\[43b\]]
[\[43b.1\]]thob gyur nas/_/chos kyi 'khor lo gya nom rtag bskor shog_/tshe ni bskal pa bsam mi khyab gnas nas/_/ji bzhin chos bshad skye dgu phan byed shog_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal mang po rgyun bcad nas/_/'dod sdang gti mug la sogs zhi bar shog_/sems 
[\[43b.2\]]can gang zhig ngan 'gro gnas gyur nas/_/me chen rab 'bar lus kun khyab pa dag_/rnga sgra dam pa 'di ni thos gyur na/_/sdug bsngal bral nas sangs rgyas skyabs 'gror shog_/thams cad sngon gnas shes pa grub gyur nas/_/'das pa'i tshe rabs brgya stong 
[\[43b.3\]]dran par shog_/thub pa'i gtso bo yang dag dran gyur nas/_/de bzhin gshegs bstan zab mo thos par shog_/gser gyi rnga dbyangs dam pa thos pa'i dbang /_/rtag par sangs rgyas rnams ni nyer bsten nas/_/thams cad sdig pa'i las ni yongs spangs 
[\[43b.4\]]te/_/rnam dag dge phyogs 'ba' zhig spyod par shog_/lha dang mi yi srog chags thams cad kun/_/gus pa'i smon lam rtse gcig 'debs pa dag_/gser gyi rnga sgra dam pa thos gyur nas/_/bsam pa rnams ni yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/
[\[43b.5\]]sems can gang zhig mnar med lhung gyur nas/_/dmyal ba'i 'bar mes lus ni nyon mongs te/_/mgon skyabs med cing 'khor bar gang gnas pa/_/thos par gyur na sdug bsngal zhi bar 'gyur/_/lha mi [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dud 'gro'i skye gnas su/_/sdug 
[\[43b.6\]]bsngal bgegs mang mngon du myong 'gyur ba/_/gser gyi rnga dbyangs dam pa thos gyur na/_/sdug bsngal spangs nas thar pa thob par 'gyur/_/da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/_/rtag tu bzhugs pa rkang gnyis gtso/_/thugs rje chen po thugs 
[\[43b.7\]]kyis ni/_/brtse bas bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/sems can gang zhig skyabs ma mchis/_/mgon ni bgyid pa ma mchis pa/_/de lta bu yi rnam pa la/_/skyabs chen dag ni bgyid par shog_/bdag gis sngon ni bgyis pa'i sdig/_/las ngan shin tu 
[\[44a\]]
[\[44a.1\]]lci ba rnams/_/deng bdag stobs bcu'i spyan sngar ni/_/thams cad rtse gcig rab tu bshags/_/bdag gis sangs rgyas yid ma ches/_/bla ma gnyen bshes ma gus dang /_/dge ba mang po ma spyad pas/_/rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa'am/_/
[\[44a.2\]]bdag gis mtho btsun rus rigs dang /_/longs spyod dag ni snyems pa dang /_/dar la bab pas dregs gyur nas/_/rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa'am/_/rtag tu log pa'i bsam bskyed nas/_/ngag gis tshig ngan smras pa dang /_/kha na ma tho ma mthong nas/_/rtag tu las ngan 
[\[44a.3\]]bgyis pa 'am/_/rtag tu byis pa'i blo spyad nas/_/ma rig mun pas sems g.yogs dang /_/mi dge'i grogs po'i rjes 'brangs nas/_/rtag tu las ngan bgyis pa 'am/_/rtsed mo dga' ba rnams kyi rgyus/_/mya ngan dag dang ldan 'gyur zhing /_/'dod chags 
[\[44a.4\]]zhe sdang dkris pas na/_/de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am/_/mi dge'i grogs po bsten pa dang /_/phrag dog ser sna bsam pa dang /_/dbul phongs gya gyu spyad pas na/_/de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am/_/sdig mang dag la mi mos kyang /_/'jigs skrag dag dang bcas 
[\[44a.5\]]pa'am/_/rang dbang dag ni ma mchis pas/_/de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am/_/rnam par g.yeng ba'i bsam pa dang /_/khong khro 'khon du 'dzin pa dang /_/bkres skom dag gis gdungs pa'i rgyus/_/de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am/_/bza' dang btung 
[\[44a.6\]]dang gos dag dang /_/bud med dag la chags srid pa'i/_/nyon mongs mes ni bsregs pas na/_/de slad sdig rnams bgyis pa 'am/_/sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun la/_/gus pa'i sems ni ma skyed pa'i/_/'di 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa/_/deng 
[\[44a.7\]]bdag thams cad so sor bshags/_/rang rgyal byang chub sems dpa' la/_/gus pa'i sems ni ma mchis pa'i/_/'di 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa/_/deng bdag thams cad so sor bshags/_/mi shes dam chos skur pa dang /_/pha ma sri zhu ma 
[\[44b\]]
[\[44b.1\]]bgyis pa'i/_/de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa/_/deng bdag thams cad so sor bshags/_/gti mug dang ni nga rgyal dang /_/'dod chags zhe sdang mthu yis ni/_/de 'dra'i sdig mang gang bgyis pa/_/deng bdag thams cad so sor bshags/_/bdag 
[\[44b.2\]]gis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams/_/sangs rgyas grangs med gang mchod pa/_/sems can rnams ni rab drangs nas/_/sdug bsngal bgegs rnams bral bgyid shog_/sems can dag ni thams cad kun/_/sa bcu la ni gnas gyur te/_/bsod 
[\[44b.3\]]nams ye shes yongs rdzogs nas/_/mngon sangs skye dgu 'dren par shog_/bdag gis sems can kun gyi slad/_/bskal ba brgya stong dka' spyad nas/_/shes rab chen po'i stobs kyis ni/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mthar bgyid shog_/bdag gis 
[\[44b.4\]]srog chags kun gyi slad/_/gser 'od mchog tu rnam par rgyal/_/zab mo'i mdo sde bshad nas ni/_/las ngan rnams ni bsal bar shog_/gang zhig bskal pa brgya stong du/_/sdig lci dag ni bgyis pa rnams/_/skad cig tsam zhig mthol bshags 
[\[44b.5\]]na/_/sdig pa mang po ma lus byang /_/gser 'od dam pa 'di bzhin du/_/de ltar bshags pa bgyis gyur na/_/sdug bsngal las mang thams cad kun/_/'di yi dbang gis myur du 'byang /_/ting 'dzin mchog ni brgya stong dang /_/bsam gyis mi 
[\[44b.6\]]khyab gzungs rnams dang /_/dbang stobs byang chub lam yan lag_/rtag tu sgom yang skyo mi 'gyur/_/bdag gis rin chen phun tshogs nas/_/sa bcu la ni phyin gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas yon tan yongs rdzogs te/_/'khor bar 'bab pa sgrol bar shog_/
[\[44b.7\]]bdag gis sangs rgyas mtsho las ni/_/shin tu zab mo yon tan mdzod/_/gya nom ye shes bsam dka' ba/_/phun sum tshogs pa thob par shog_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad kun/_/bdag la so sor gzigs dgongs nas/_/thugs rje chen po'i 
[\[45a\]]
[\[45a.1\]]thugs kyis ni/_/bdag gis bshags pa bzhes su gsol/_/bdag gis bskal pa mang por ni/_/las ngan mang po bgyis pas na/_/de yi dbang gis sdug bsngal myong /_/thugs rjes byang bar mdzad par smon/_/bdag gis las ngan mang 
[\[45a.2\]]bgyis pa/_/rtag tu mya ngan 'jigs sems skyes/_/spyod lam bzhi po kun tu yang /_/dga' ba'i 'du shes yod ma mchis/_/sangs rgyas thugs rje chen po ldan/_/sems can 'jigs pa sel mdzad na/_/bdag gis bshags pa bzhes nas ni/_/mya 
[\[45a.3\]]ngan sdug bsngal bral bar smon/_/bdag la nyon mongs sgrib pa dang /_/rnam smin las ni ci mchis pa/_/thugs rje chen po'i chab kyis ni/_/rab bkrus byang bar mdzad par smon/_/bdag gis sngon chad sdig pa dang /_/da ltar las ngan bgyis pa rnams/_/
[\[45a.4\]]rtse gcig sems kyis mnol bshags na/_/thams cad rab tu byang bar shog_/ma 'ongs pa yi las ngan rnams/_/bsdams te slong bar yong mi bgyid/_/gal te 'gal ba mchis na yang /_/nams kyang 'chab par yong mi bgyid/_/lus gsum 
[\[45a.5\]]ngag gi rnam pa bzhi/_/yid kyi las ni rnam pa gsum/_/sems can rnams ni 'ching bgyid pas/_/thog ma med nas rgyun mi 'chad/_/spyod pa 'di gsum dbang gis na/_/mi dge las bcu bgyis gyur pas/_/de 'dra'i nongs pa mang po rnams/_/de dag 
[\[45a.6\]]thams cad so sor bshags/_/bdag gis las ngan mang bgyis pas/_/sdug bsngal rnam smin rang nyid myong /_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar ni/_/bsam pa thag pas so sor bshags/_/'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di dag dang /_/'jig rten khams ni gzhan 
[\[45a.7\]]dag tu/_/dge ba'i las mang ci mchis pa/_/deng bdag thams cad yi rang ngo /_/mi dge las bcu rab spangs nas/_/dge bcu lam ni mngon bsgrubs te/_/sa bcu dag la rab gnas nas/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rtag mthong smon/_/bdag gis 
[\[45b\]]
[\[45b.1\]]lus dang ngag yid kyis/_bsod nams ye shes las bsgrubs pa'i/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di yi mthus/_/bla med ye shes myur grub shog_/deng bdag stobs bcu'i spyan sngar mngon sum du/_/sdug bsngal bgegs mang sna tshogs mthol zhing bshags/_/byis pa 
[\[45b.2\]]srid gsum rmongs pa'i bgegs dag dang /_/rtag par las ngan lci bar bgyis pa'i bgegs/_/bdag gis log pa'i 'dod pas bsags pa'i bgegs/_/rtag tu srid bskyed 'khor bar 'gyur ba'i bgegs/_/'jig rten 'di la mngon zhen chags pa'i bgegs/_/
[\[45b.3\]]byis pa thams cad kun gyi nyon mongs bgegs/_/sems myos rnam g.yeng phyin ci log pa'i bgegs/_/mi dge grogs po dag la brten pa'i bgegs/_/'khor ba dag la 'dod chags zhen pa'i bgegs/_/zhe sdang gti mug glen pas sdig bgyis bgegs/_/
[\[45b.4\]]mi khom brgyad skye mi dge grogs po'i bgegs/_/bsod nams yon tan ma bsags pa yi bgegs/_/deng bdag rgyal ba kun gyi spyan sngar ni/_/sdig pa'i las ngan mtha' yas bgyis pa bshags/_/deng bdag bde gshegs kun la skyabs su mchi/_/
[\[45b.5\]]bla med yon tan mtsho la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/gser gyi ri ltar phyogs bcu gsal mdzad pa/_/byams dang thugs rjes bdag ni gzung du gsol/_/sku ni gser mdog rnam dag dri mi mnga'/_/spyan ni rnam dag bai DUr+ya dang 'dra/_/dpal dang gzi brjid 
[\[45b.6\]]grags dang ldan pa'i gtso/_/thugs rje shes rab nyi mas mun sel ba/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od kyis kun gsal mdzad/_/shin tu rnam dag dri med rdul dang bral/_/thub pa'i zla bas gsal mdzad rab bsil ba/_/sems can nyon mongs gdung ba sel bar 
[\[45b.7\]]mdzad/_/sum cu rtsa gnyis mtshan gyis rab brgyan cing /_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs/_/yon tan bsam dka' mtshungs pa ma mchis pas/_/nyi 'od lta bur 'jig rten gsal bar mdzad/_/kha dog bai DUr+ya 'dra dri med mnga'/_/zla ba nya 
[\[46a\]]
[\[46a.1\]]ltar nam mkha' dag la bzhugs/_/shel mchog dam pa'i dra bas gser sku bsgribs/_/'od zer sna tshogs dag gis rab tu brgyan/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal chu bo'i nang du ni/_/rga nad mya ngan chu yis ded pas na/_/de 'dra'i sdug bsngal rgya mtsho bzod dka' ba/_/
[\[46a.2\]]sangs rgyas nyi ma'i 'od kyis gtan du bskams/_/deng bdag stong gsum 'jig rten rmad byung gtso/_/thams cad mkhyen pa spyi btud phyag 'tshal lo/_/'od zer rab gsal gser mdog 'dra ba'i sku/_/dpe byad dam pa sna tshogs dag gis brgyan/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu tshad 
[\[46a.3\]]shes dka' zhing /_/sa chen rdul ni bgrang du ma mchis dang /_/ji ltar ri rab srang grangs gzhal dka' zhing /_/nam mkha' dag la mu mtha' ma mchis ltar/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyi yon tan de bzhin te/_/sems can thams cad kun gyis rig mi 'gyur/_/bskal pa 
[\[46a.4\]]tshad med snyed du rab bsams kyang /_/yon tan rgya mtsho'i pha mtha' rtogs mi 'gyur/_/sa chen 'di yi ri brag ji snyed pa/_/rdul phran bzhin du gses kyang brtsir rung zhing /_/rgya mtsho'i chab ni spu rtses gzhal rung yang /_/sangs rgyas yon tan bgrang bar rngo mi thogs/_/
[\[46a.5\]]sems can thams cad lhan cig 'dus nas ni/_/bcom ldan grags pa'i chos ni thams cad dang /_/mtshan bzang rnam dag dkon mchog bsngags brjod kyang /_/de yi pha mtha' dpag par yongs mi 'gyur/_/bdag gi dge ba'i las mang ci mchis pas/_/myur 
[\[46a.6\]]du bla na ma mchis gtso grub nas/_/yang dag chos bshad skye dgu phan btags te/_/thams cad sdug bsngal mang las thar bgyid shog_/bdud kyi dmag tshogs stobs chen rab btul nas/_/bla med dam chos 'khor lo bskor bar shog_/bskal pa grangs med bsam mi 
[\[46a.7\]]khyab gnas nas/_/bdud rtsi'i ro yis sems can tshim bgyid shog_/'das pa'i rgyal ba rnams ni ji lta bzhin/_/pha rol phyin drug yongs su rdzogs bgyid shog_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur nas/_/nyon mongs btul te sdug bsngal bsal bar shog_/bdag 
[\[46b\]]
[\[46b.1\]]gis rtag tu tshe rabs dran gyur nas/_/'das pa'i skye ba brgya stong dran pa dang /_/rtag par thub pa'i gtso bo dran gyur te/_/sangs rgyas zab mo'i chos ni thos par shog_/bdag gi dge ba'i las ni 'di rnams kyis/_/rgyal ba tshad med dag la bsnyen bkur nas/_/mi dge ba yi 
[\[46b.2\]]rgyu kun yongs spangs te/_/yang dag dam chos rtag tu sgrub par shog_/'jig rten thams cad sems can ji snyed pa/_/sdug bsngal spangs nas bde ba thob par shog_/dbang po ma tshang ji snyed mchis pa dag_/de dag lus kyi mtshan rnams yongs rdzogs shog_/sems can 
[\[46b.3\]]gang zhig nad kyi sdug bsngal gyis/_/lus ni nyam chung skyabs bgyid ma mchis pa/_/thams cad nad kyi sdug bsngal ra bzhi nas/_/dbang po kha dog mthu ni rgyas par shog_/gang gis rgyal chos 'gal bgyis bsad la thug_/sdug bsngal mang gtses mya ngan rab skyes nas/_/
[\[46b.4\]]de yis sdug bsngal mi bzad myong ba'i tshe/_/mgon skyabs dag ni bgyid pa ma mchis dang /_/gang dag gzhu brdeg mtshon chas bcings pa dang /_/gnod byed yo byad sna tshogs lus nyon mongs/_/mya ngan brgya stong tshad med myong ba na/_/lus sems rab gzer bde ba cung 
[\[46b.5\]]zad med/_/de dag thams cad bcings shing brdegs pa dang /_/sdug bsngal nyon mongs dag las thar bar shog_/bsad la thug pa dag ni srog thob nas/_/sdug bsngal mang po thams cad gtan zad shog_/sems can gang zhig bkres skom gdungs gyur pa/_/ro 
[\[46b.6\]]mchog dam pa sna tshogs 'thob par shog_/long bas gzugs mthong 'on pas sgra thos dang /_/thing pos 'gro nus lkugs pa smra nus shog_/dbul phongs sems can rin chen gter thob nas/_/bang mdzod rab rgyas rgud pa ma mchis te/_/thams cad bde mchog dam pa 
[\[46b.7\]]rab rnyed nas/_/sems can sdug bsngal myong ba ma mchis shog_/lha mi thams cad mthong bar mos pa yi/_/byad bzhin dam pa rab mdzes thob gyur nas/_/bde ba tshad med mngon sum myong gyur te/_/longs spyod 'byor rgyas bsod nams ldan par shog_/sems can 
[\[47a\]]
[\[47a.1\]]de dag rol mo bsams pa bzhin/_/sgra mchog mang po mngon du 'byung bar shog_/chu 'dod gser gyi me tog steng 'phyo ba/_/rab bsil rdzing bu mngon du snang bar shog_/sems can de dag ji ltar bsams pa bzhin/_/bza' btung gos dang khri dang stan 
[\[47a.2\]]rnams dang /_/gser dngul dang ni rin chen bai DUr+ya/_/rgyan phreng thams cad phun sum tshogs par shog_/sems can mi snyan thos par mi 'gyur zhing /_/phan tshun mi mthun mthong bar ma gyur cig_/lus kyi byad bzhin thams cad rab mdzes shing /_/so sor byams pa'i 
[\[47a.3\]]sems kyis brtse bgyid shog_/'jig rten bde ba'i yo byad longs spyod rnams/_/yid la bsams tshe thams cad 'byor par shog_/nor rnams rnyed pa phongs pa ma mchis par/_/bgo bsha' bgyis te sems can gtong bar shog_/bdug spos phye ma dang ni byug spos dang /_/
[\[47a.4\]]me tog sna tshogs kha dog gcig min pa/_/nyin re dus gsum shing las lhung gyur nas/_/yid bzhin longs spyod dga' bskyed par shog_/sems can thams cad phyogs bcu'i rgyal gtso dang /_/theg gsum rnam dag gya nom chos kyi sku/_/byang chub sems 
[\[47a.5\]]dpa' dang ni rang rgyal dang /_/nyan thos dge 'dun mchod pa bgyid par shog_/rtag tu ma rabs dag tu mi skye zhing /_/mi khom brgyad po dag tu mi ltung dang /_/dal 'byor mi yi gtso bor skyes gyur te/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas rim gro bgyid par shog_/rtag par 
[\[47a.6\]]phyug po dag gi khyim skyes te/_/nor dang rin chen bang mdzod rgyas pa dang /_/byed bzhin grags pa dpe zla ma mchis te/_/tshe ring bskal pa grangs med gnas par shog_/bud med thams cad kun ni phor gyur nas/_/dpa' zhing sems rno blo gros shin tu che/_/thams 
[\[47a.7\]]cad byang chub sems dpa'i lam spyad nas/_/pha rol phyin drug sgrub la brtson par shog_/rtag par phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas tshad med snyed/_/rin chen shing rgyal drung du gshegs nas ni/_/bai DUr+ya yi gdan la rab bzhugs te/_/chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mthong bar 
[\[47b\]]
[\[47b.1\]]shog_/gal te 'das pa dang ni da ltar tshe/_/srid gsum 'khor nas las rnams bgyis pas na/_/yid du mi mchi ngan 'gro thob gyur pa/_/thams cad ma lus gtan du byang bar shog_/sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtshor ni/_/'khor ba'i zhags pas dam du 
[\[47b.2\]]bcings pa ni/_/shes rab ral gri dag gis bcad bsal te/_/sdug bsngal spangs nas byang chub myur thob shog_/sems can gang gis 'dzam gling 'di dag dang /_/yang na 'jig rten gzhan dag tu yang rung /_/bsod nams rgyun mchog sna tshogs ci bsgrubs pa/_/
[\[47b.3\]]de dag thams cad kun la yi rang ngo /_/bsod nams dngos po dag la yi rang dang /_/lus dang ngag yid dge ba mang bgyis des/_/las mchog dam pa 'di dag rtag 'phel nas/_/bla med byang chub chen po myur thob smon/_/phyag bgyis sangs rgyas yon tan bsngags 
[\[47b.4\]]pa dang /_/bsam pa dang zhing rnyog pa ma mchis pas/_/bsngo zhing smon lam btab pa'i bsod nams des/_/bskal pa drug cu'i ngan 'gro 'das par smon/_/rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo dang /_/bram ze la sogs rigs mchog dam pa rnams/_/thal sbyar rtse 
[\[47b.5\]]gcig sangs rgyas bsngags brjod na/_/skye ba rtag par kun du tshe rabs dran/_/dbang po tshang zhing lus ni yongs rdzogs te/_/yon tan dam pa thams cad phun tshogs 'gyur/_/ma 'ongs pa yi skye ba thams cad du/_/rtag par lha mi rnams kyis blta bar shog_/
[\[47b.6\]]sangs rgyas gcig dang sangs rgyas bcu dag las/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba bsgrubs nas thob pa min/_/sangs rgyas brgya stong dge rtsa bskyed pas na/_/'gyod tshangs chos 'di thos par gyur pa yin/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsol pa gsan pa dang /_
[\[47b.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis ji ltar rmi lam du gser gyi rnga bo che las byung ba'i sgras de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan bsngags pa brjod pa dang /_'gyod tshangs bya ba'i chos bstan pa 
[\[48a\]]
[\[48a.1\]]mthong ba gang yin pa de gang la la zhig gis thos par gyur na bsod nams shin tu mang po 'thob par 'gyur zhing sems can la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa dang /_kha na ma tho ba'i sgrib pa yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/khyod kyi las mchog dam pa 'di dag thams cad 
[\[48a.2\]]ni 'das pa'i dus su bsngags pa brjod cing smon lam btab pa'i sngon gyi bag chags kyi rgyu rkyen dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs pa'i mthus rgyu rkyen 'di dag khyod la bstan pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces 
[\[48a.3\]]bka' stsal pa thos nas thams cad rab tu dga' zhing mngon par yid ches nas bka' bzhin du spyod par gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las rmi lam na 'gyod tshangs byed pa mthong ba'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//gser 'od 
[\[48a.4\]]dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po/_bam po gsum pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i rnam par rtog pa la bzhugs te shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs pa dang /_sku'i spu'i bu gnas kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong 
[\[48a.5\]]tshad med pa snyed dang ldan pa'i 'od zer chen po bkye bas phyogs bcu'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dag gi tshad dang dper byar med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur to/_/snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten dag tu 'od zer gyis snang bar byas pas sems can gang 
[\[48a.6\]]dag mi dge ba bcu'i las dang /_mtshams med pa lnga'i kha na ma tho ba dang /_dkon mchog gsum la skur pa btab pa dang /_bla ma dang nye ba dag la sri zhu ma byas pa dang /_mkhan po dang bram ze dag la brnyas shing nga rgyal byas pas sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[48a.7\]]dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas su ltung bar gyur pa de dag so so nas 'od zer gyi snang ba de dag gi gnas su phyin par gyur pas sems can de dag 'od zer de mthong ba dang /_'od zer gyi mthus thams cad kyis bde ba dang /_shin tu sdug cing mdzes pa'i gzugs kyis mtshan 
[\[48b\]]
[\[48b.1\]]phun sum tshogs pa dang /_bsod nams dang ye shes kyis brgyan nas sangs rgyas rnams mthong bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe brgya byin dang /_lha'i 'khor thams cad dang /_gang gA'i lha mo dang /_'khor mang po rnams 'od zer rmad du byung ba mthong ba dang /_thams cad bcom ldan 
[\[48b.2\]]'das kyi spyan sngar lhags te g.yas phyogs su lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po bcom ldan 'das kyis byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i 
[\[48b.3\]]lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub gnyer zhing 
[\[48b.4\]]theg pa chen po mngon par bsgrubs pas ji ltar phyin ci log tu gyur pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su gzung bar bgyis lags/_sngon mngon par 'dus bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa'i kha na ma tho ba ji ltar bshags na yongs su 'byang bar 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[48b.5\]]'das kyis brgya byin lha'i dbang po la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu deng khyed kyis tshad med dpag tu med pa'i sems can rnams rnal 'byor bsgom nas rnam par dag pa'i rnam par grol ba'i bde ba 'thob par bya ba dang /_'jig rten thams cad la snying brtse zhing phan par 'dod 
[\[48b.6\]]pa legs so legs so/_/sems can gang la la zhig las kyi sgrib pa'i dbang gis sdig pa rnams mngon par 'dus byas pa gang yin pa des nan tan brtson 'grus bskyed de nyin mtshan dus drug tu/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la 
[\[48b.7\]]btsugs nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te/_sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar bsdus nas ngag gi sgo nas bdag nyid kyis 'di skad du phyogs bcu nad ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes nas dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor 
[\[49a\]]
[\[49a.1\]]lo yongs su bskor ba/_chos kyi 'khor lo 'dzin cing gsal bar mdzad pa/_chos kyi char chen po phab pa/_chos kyi rnga chen po brdung ba/_chos kyi dung chen po bus pa/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po btsugs pa/_chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'dzin pa/_thams 
[\[49a.2\]]cad sems can rnams la sman cing bde bar mdzad pa'i slad du rtag par chos kyi sbyin pa gtong ba/_skye dgu rmongs pa rnams drangs nas 'bras bu chen po thob pa la bkod de/_rtag tu bde ba mngon sum du mdzad par bzhed pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la 
[\[49a.3\]]skyabs su mchi ste mgo bos phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag yang dag pa'i shes rab dang /_yang dag pa'i spyan dang /_yang dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mnyam pas sems can gyi dge sdig gi las mkhyen cing gzigs pa 
[\[49a.4\]]thams cad la lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sems rtse gcig tu spyi bos btud de gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag gis thog ma ma mchis pa'i dus nas sdig pa'i rjes su 'brangs te sems can rnams dang lhan cig tu las kyi sgrib pa kha na ma tho ba bgyis pa dang /_'dod 
[\[49a.5\]]chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug gis kun du dkris shing bcings pas sangs rgyas ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang /_chos ma 'tshal ba'i dus dang /_dge 'dun ma 'tshal ba'i dus na dge sdig ma 'tshal ba'i dbang gis lus dang ngag dang yid kyi sgo nas 
[\[49a.6\]]mtshams ma mchis pa ngan sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la mtshal phyung ba dang /_yang dag pa'i chos la skur pa btab pa'am/_dge 'dun mthun pa'i dbyen bgyis pa dang /_dgra bcom pa bkum pa'am/_pha ma bkum ba'am/_lus kyi rnam pa 
[\[49a.7\]]gsum dang /_ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dang /_yid kyi spyod pa rnam pa gsum gyi dbang gis mi dge ba bcu'i las bdag nyid kyis bgyis pa dang /_gzhan bgyid du stsal ba dang /_gzhan bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_dge ba'i gang zag rnams la nan gyis skur pa 
[\[49b\]]
[\[49b.1\]]btab pa dang /_bre srang gis bslus pa dang /_yang dag pa ma lags pa la yang dag par bzung ba dang /_mi gtsang ba'i bza' ba dang btung ba gzhan dag la stsal ba dang /_'gro ba drug po de dag tu mchis pa'i pha ma ji snyed pa dag la phan tshun gnod pa bgyis pa dang /_
[\[49b.2\]]mchod rten gyi dkor brkus pa dang /_phyogs bzhi'i dge 'dun gyi dkor dang /_mngon sum gyi dge 'dun gyi dkor rang dbang bgyis te yongs su spyad pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i chos dang 'dul ba la bslab par ma mos pa dang /_mkhan po dang /_
[\[49b.3\]]bla ma'i gdams ngag gi rjes su mi 'brang ba dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_theg pa chen po'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrubs pa dag la smad par dga' bas rnal 'byor sgom pa'i gang zag rnams sems la 'gyod pa bskyed pa dang /_bdag pas khyad 
[\[49b.4\]]par du 'phags pa zhig mthong na phrag dog bskyed pa dang /_chos kyi sbyin pa dang /_zang zing gi sbyin pa dag la rtag par ser sna dang /_phangs pa'i sems bskyed pa dang /_ma rig pas bsgribs shing log par lta bas sems rmongs par gyur pa dang /_dge ba'i 
[\[49b.5\]]rgyu ma bskyed pas sdig pa 'phel bar gyur pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la smod pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa dang /_chos la chos ma lags par bshad pa dang /_chos ma lags pa la chos su bshad pa la sogs pa 'di lta bu'i sdig pa mang po rnams 
[\[49b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das yang dag pa'i shes rab dang /_yang dag pa'i spyan dang /_yang dag pa'i mkhyen pa dang /_yang dag pa'i mnyam pas thams cad mkhyen cing thams cad gzigs pa dag la deng bdag srog phyogs nas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi spyan sngar 
[\[49b.7\]]thams cad mthol zhing bshags so/_/thams cad mngon du phyung nas 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid do/_/sngar ma bgyis pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams slan chad mi bgyid do/_/sngar bgyis pa'i kha na ma tho ba rnams deng thams cad mthol zhing bshags so/_/ngan 
[\[50a\]]
[\[50a.1\]]'gro sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi 'gro ba dang /_lha ma yin gyi 'khor dang /_mi khom pa brgyad po dag tu ltung bar 'gyur ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa dang /_bdag gis tshe 'di la bgyis pa'i las kyi sgrib pa 
[\[50a.2\]]ci mchis pa thams cad zhu byang nas sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa ci mchis pa ma 'ongs pa na mi myong bar smon to/_/ji ltar 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa na las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa ma lus par mthol zhing bshags 
[\[50a.3\]]pa de bzhin du bdag gis las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa yang mthol zhing bshags so/_/thams cad mngon du phyung ste 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid do/_/sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byang bar smon to/_/ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa rnams yang bgyid pa'i thugs mi thub bo/_/ma 
[\[50a.4\]]'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa na las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa ma lus par mthol zhing 'chags pa de bzhin du bdag gis las kyi sgrib pa yang mthol zhing bshags so/_/thams cad mngon du phyung nas 'chab cing 
[\[50a.5\]]sbed par mi bgyid do/_/sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byang bar smon to/_/ma 'ongs pa'i sdig pa rnams yang bgyid pa'i thugs mi thub bo/_/da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pa dag 
[\[50a.6\]]las kyi sgrib pa ci mchis pa mthol zhing 'chags pa de bzhin du bdag gis las kyi sgrib pa yang mthol zhing bshags so/_/thams cad mngon du phyung nas 'chab cing sbed par mi bgyid do/_/sngar bgyis pa'i sdig pa rnams zhu byang bar smon to/_/ma 'ongs pa'i 
[\[50a.7\]]sdig pa rnams yang bgyid pa'i thugs mi thub po zhes brjod par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir gang gis sdig pa byas pa zhig yod na/_skad cig tsam du yang 'chab cing sbar mi rung na nyin gcig gam/_mtshan gcig nas dus ring po'i bar du lta smos 
[\[50b\]]
[\[50b.1\]]kyang ci dgos/_gang la la zhig gis sdig pa byas nas rnam par dag pa yongs su tshol bar 'dod cing sems la ngo tsha ba dang bcas pas ma 'ongs pa na gdon mi za bar sdig pa'i rnam par smin pa yod do zhes mngon par yid ches nas 'jigs shing skrag pa chen po skyes pa 
[\[50b.2\]]des 'di ltar bshags par bya'o/_/'di lta ste/_dper na mi la la zhig mes mgo thod bsregs sam/_gos bsregs par gyur na myur ba kho nar me gsod par byed de/_gal te me zhi bar ma gyur na sems kyis bde ba thob par mi 'gyur ro/_/gang gis sdig pa 
[\[50b.3\]]byas na yang de bzhin du mthol zhing bshags nas myur ba kho nas yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/gang la la zhig phyug po'i khyim du skyes nas nor dang rin po che mang po dang ldan par 'dod pa dang /_gzhan yang sems bskyed nas theg pa chen po bsgom par 'dod na yang 'gyod 
[\[50b.4\]]tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/cho rigs btsun pa'i bram ze dang /_/rgyal rigs dang /_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin po che sna bdun dang ldan pa'i khyim bdag tu skye bar 'dod na yang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang 
[\[50b.5\]]bar bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gal te rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha dang /_sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha dang /_'thab bral gyi lha dang /_dga' ldan gyi lha dang /_'phrul dga'i lha dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lhar skye bar 'dod na yang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las 
[\[50b.6\]]kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/gal te tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs chen gyi lha dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal gyi lha dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas kyi lha dang /_sprin 
[\[50b.7\]]med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu che ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_gya nom snang dang /_shin tu mthong dang /_'og min [(]kyi [,]gyi [)]lhar skye bar 'dod na yang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/gal te rgyun 
[\[51a\]]
[\[51a.1\]]du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu yongs su gnyer bar 'dod na yang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/gal te rig pa 
[\[51a.2\]]gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi rang dbang thob pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer ba dang /_mthar thug pa'i sar phyin nas thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /_yongs su dag pa'i ye shes dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i 
[\[51a.3\]]ye shes dang /_mi g.yo ba'i ye shes dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thams cad mkhyen pa yongs su gnyer bar 'dod na yang 'gyod tshangs byas nas las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni rgyu dang rkyen las 
[\[51a.4\]]skye bas de bzhin gshegs pas kyang tha dad pa'i mtshan nyid 'gag par 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsungs te/_rgyu rkyen tha dad pa'i phyir 'di ltar 'das pa'i chos rnams 'gag cing zad par 'gyur bas las kyi sgrib pa ji snyed pa ma lus par 'gyur ba yang 'du byed kyi chos rnams 
[\[51a.5\]]mngon du ma skyes pa gang yin pa de dag deng gdod skye bar 'gyur bas ma 'ongs pa'i las kyi sgrib pa yang ldang bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu chos thams cad stong zhing de bzhin gshegs pas kyang bdag dang /_gang zag dang /_sems can dang /_srog 
[\[51a.6\]]med pa dang /_skye ba dang /_'gag pa med pa dang /_'du byed kyi chos kyang med do zhes gsungs pas so/_/rigs kyi bu chos thams cad ni ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi la brten pas brjod du yang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das 
[\[51a.7\]]pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'di ltar yang dag pa'i don shin tu gya nom pa la zhugs nas mngon par yid ches pas gus pa'i sems skyes par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni sems can med cing ngo bo nyid kyi gzhi yod pa zhes bya ste/_don de'i phyir 
[\[51b\]]
[\[51b.1\]]'gyod tshangs kyis las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyang bar bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gang gis chos rnam pa bzhi dang ldan par gyur na las kyi sgrib pa yongs su bsal nas gtan du yongs su byang bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_log pa'i bsam pa mi skye zhing yang 
[\[51b.2\]]dag pa'i dran pa phun sum tshogs par gyur pa dang /_shin tu zab pa'i don dag la skur pa mi 'debs pa dang /_spyod pa dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' dag thams cad mkhyen pa yin no/_/snyam pa'i bsam pa bskyed pa dang /_sems can rnams la byams pa tshad med pa skyes pa ste/_'di dag ni rnam 
[\[51b.3\]]pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_rtse gcig sems kyis theg gsum srung /_/zab mo'i chos la skur mi 'debs/_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i 'du shes skyed/_/byams sems las kyi sgrib pa sbyong /_/rigs 
[\[51b.4\]]kyi bu shin tu bsal bar dka' ba'i las kyi sgrib pa ni rnam pa bzhi yod de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_byang chub sems dpa'i sdom pa las shin tu lci ba'i kha na ma tho ba byas pa dang /_theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la sems kyis skur pa btab pa dang /_rang gi dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar mi 
[\[51b.5\]]byed pa dang /_srid pa gsum la mngon par zhen nas nges par 'byung ba'i sems med pa gang yin pa'o/_/gzhan yang las kyi sgrib pa'i gnyen por gyur pa rnam pa bzhi yod de/_bzhi gang zhe na/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams 
[\[51b.6\]]cad la bsam pa thag pa nas nye bar bsnyen nas kha na ma tho ba thams cad bshags par byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dam pa'i chos zab mo bshad par gsol ba 'debs pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams 
[\[51b.7\]]ji snyed pa dag la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo ba gang yin pa'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[52a\]]
[\[52a.1\]]bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten na skyes pa dang /_bud med ji snyed mchis pa dag las theg pa chen po'i spyod pa spyod par rngo thogs pa yang mchis spyod par rngo mi thogs pa yang mchis na ji ltar sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dag la rjes su yi rang 
[\[52a.2\]]bar bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu sems can gang la la zhig theg pa chen po sgom par mi nus mod kyi/_'on kyang nyin mtshan dus drug tu bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar te pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas gus pas 
[\[52a.3\]]thal mo sbyar te sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar bzhag nas rjes su yi rang bar byed nas bsod nams tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur bas 'di skad du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can gang dag da ltar sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims dang /_sems kyi shes rab mngon par 
[\[52a.4\]]sgrub pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad la deng bdag shin tu dang bas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/zhes brjod par gyur na de ltar rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi dbang gis gdon mi za bar shin tu btsun zhing khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa mtshungs pa med pa mchog tu gya nom pa'i 'bras 
[\[52a.5\]]bu thob par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du 'das pa dang ma 'ongs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/gzhan yang da ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang po pas byang chub tu sems bskyed pa las byung ba'i bsod nams ji 
[\[52a.6\]]snyed pa dag dang /_bskal pa chen po brgya 'das nas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa las byung ba'i bsod nams chen po gang yin pa dang /_mi skye ba'i bzod pa thob pa nas phyir mi ldog pa dang /_tshe gcig gis dbang bskur bar 'gyur ba'i bar dag las byung ba'i bsod 
[\[52a.7\]]nams kyi phung po gang yin pa de dag thams cad la yang 'di ltar bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su yi rang zhing bsngags pa brjod par bya'o/_/de bzhin du 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa dag la yang rjes su yi rang zhing bsngags 
[\[52b\]]
[\[52b.1\]]pa brjod par bya'o/_/gzhan yang da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na yang dag pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa/_byang chub gya nom pa brnyes pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad sems can mtha' yas pa rnams yongs su bzla ba'i phyir bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba/_
[\[52b.2\]]thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa btang ba/_chos kyi rnga brdungs pa/_chos kyi dung bus pa/_chos kyi rgyal mtshan btsugs pa/_chos kyi char phab pa dag gis thugs brtse bas sems can thams cad la bskul zhing yongs su btul bas thams cad mngon par yid ches 
[\[52b.3\]]par gyur nas chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa'i dbang gis zad mi shes pa'i bde ba thob pa la bkod pa gang yin pa dang /_gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' dang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis bsod nams bsags pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa dang /_sems 
[\[52b.4\]]can gang gis 'di 'dra ba'i bsod nams da dung phun sum tshogs par ma gyur pa dag thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba gang yin pa de dag la bdag rjes su yi rang ngo /_/de bzhin du 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan 
[\[52b.5\]]thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas rnams kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa thams cad la yang bsam pa thag pa nas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/zhes brjod par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na rjes su yi rang ba gang yin pa des bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa rnyed thob par 'gyur ro/_/gang 
[\[52b.6\]]gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad nyon mongs pa spangs te dgra bcom pa mngon par grub par gyur la/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig nam 'tsho'i bar du rtag par 
[\[52b.7\]]gos dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha dang /_gsos sman mchog dam pa rnams kyis mchod pa dang rim gro byas pas 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa des 'di ltar snga ma lta bur rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams de dang bskrun na stong gi cha gcig tsam du yang nye bar mi 
[\[53a\]]
[\[53a.1\]]'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni grangs dang bcas shing tshad dang bcas pas bsod nams thams cad yongs su sdud par mi 'gyur la rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de la ni tshad med cing grangs 
[\[53a.2\]]med pas dus gsum gyi bsod nams thams cad yongs su sdud par byed pas de'i phyir gang la la zhig dge ba'i rtsa ba khyad par can 'phel bar 'dod pas 'di ltar rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/bud med gang la la zhig bud med kyi lus yongs 
[\[53a.3\]]su bsgyur nas skyes pa'i lus yongs su 'grub par 'dod na yang rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams mngon par sgrub par byed na gdon mi za bar yid la bsams pa bzhin du tshe 'di nyid la skyes pa'i lus mngon par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin 
[\[53a.4\]]lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams gang lags pa de ni 'tshal bar gyur na slad ma'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba dang /_da ltar gyi byang chub sems dpa' rnams yang 
[\[53a.5\]]dag pa'i rnal 'byor sgom par 'gyur bar bgyid pa'i slad du bskul ba dang /_gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_lha'i dbang po rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa 
[\[53a.6\]]yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer ba gang yin pa des nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_theg pa chen po'i lam bsgom par 'dod na yang gang zag des nyin mtshan dus drug tu snga ma lta bu'i spyod lam gyis sems rtse gcig du dran pa nye bar gzhag 
[\[53a.7\]]nas 'di skad du deng bdag phyogs bcu na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes par gyur kyang bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo da dung ma bskor ba dang /_rnam par smin pa'i sku spangs nas yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 
[\[53b\]]
[\[53b.1\]]bzhed pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la bdag bsam pa thag pa nas spyi bos btud de phyag bgyis nas sems can thams cad yongs su bsgral zhing bde bar bgyi ba dang /_sngar gong du bstan pa ltar bas pa ma mchis pa'i bde ba 'thob par bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi 'khor lo 
[\[53b.2\]]chen po yongs su bskor ba dang /_chos kyi char pa chen po dbab pa dang /_chos kyi sgron ma chen mo sbar ba dang /_don gyi tshul gsal bar mdzad pa dang /_thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i chos kyi sbyin pa btang nas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs 
[\[53b.3\]]par bskul zhing gsol ba 'tshal lo/_/deng bdag gis bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa 'di dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/ji ltar 'das pa dang /_da ltar gyi byang chub 
[\[53b.4\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bskul ba dang /_gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams de dag byang chub tu yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du bdag gis kyang bskul ba dang gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang lags pa de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[53b.5\]]pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gal te gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byas pa bas gang la la zhig 
[\[53b.6\]]gis de bzhin gshegs pa la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po bskor bar gsol ba btab pas 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de snga ma bas ches khyad par du 'phags te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni zang zing gi sbyin pa yin la 'di ni chos kyi sbyin pa yin pas so/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[53b.7\]]stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste sbyin pa btang ba lta re zhig zhog gi_/gal te gang la la zhig gis gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/_sangs rgyas 
[\[54a\]]
[\[54a.1\]]thams cad la mchod pa byas pa bas bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de bas kyang ches khyad par du 'phags so/_/chos kyi sbyin pa ni khyad par du 'phags pa'i phan yon rnam pa lnga dang ldan te/_lnga gang zhe na/_dang po chos kyi sbyin pa 
[\[54a.2\]]gang yin pa de ni bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs par byed la/_zang zing gi sbyin pa ni de lta ma yin pas so/_/gnyis pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni sems can khams gsum nas 'byin par byed pa yin la/_zang zing gi sbyin pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni 'dod 
[\[54a.3\]]pa'i khams las mi 'da' bas so/_/gsum pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi sku yongs su dag par byed pa yin la/_zang zing gi sbyin pas ni gzugs 'ba' zhig 'phel bar byed pas so/_/bzhi pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni der mthar thug pa med pa 
[\[54a.4\]]yin la zang zing gi sbyin pa ni zad par 'gyur bas so/_/lnga pa chos kyi sbyin pa gang yin pa de ni ma rig pa yongs su gcod par byed la/_zang zing gi sbyin pa ni 'dod pa'i srid pa tsam thul bar 'gyur bas so/_/de lta bas na rigs kyi bu bskul ba dang /_gsol ba btab 
[\[54a.5\]]pa'i bsod nams ni tshad med dpag tu med pas dpe byar sla ba ma yin no/_/nga sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongs su bskor bar bskul bas dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i dbang gis de lta bas na deng brgya byin dang /_
[\[54a.6\]]tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pas nga la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongs su bskor bar gsol ba btab pa yin te/_rigs kyi bu chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar bskul ba ni sems can rnams yongs su sgrol zhing bde bar byed pa yin pa'i phyir ro/_/nga sngon byang chub kyi spyad 
[\[54a.7\]]pa spyod pa na de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs shing yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba btab pas na dge ba'i rtsa ba de la brten nas ngas stobs bcu dang /_bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams 
[\[54b\]]
[\[54b.1\]]pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_ma 'dres pa'i chos grangs med pa snyed brnyes par gyur pa yin te/_nga lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pas yongs su mya ngan las 'das par 'gyur yang /_nga'i yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten na yun ring bar gnas par 'gyur ba yin 
[\[54b.2\]]no/_/nga'i chos kyi sku gang yin pa de ni rnam par dag cing dpe zla med pas mtshan mchog dam pa sna tshogs dang /_mkhyen pa tshad med pa dang /_dbang tshad med pa dang /_yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i tshad med pa dang ldan zhing /_sems can thams cad la phan 
[\[54b.3\]]'dogs par mdzad pas bskal pa bye ba brgya stong snyed du brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi skus ni chos thams cad yongs su sdud par mdzad la chos thams cad kyis ni chos kyi sku yongs su sdud par mi byed do/_/chos kyi sku rtag par gnas kyang rtag 
[\[54b.4\]]pa'i lta bar ltung bar mi 'gyur ro/_/'gag par 'gyur yang chad pa'i lta bar 'gyur ba ma yin pas sems can gyi tha dad pa'i lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par bshig nas sems can gyi yang dag pa'i lta ba rnam pa sna tshogs bskyed par mdzad do/_/sems can 
[\[54b.5\]]thams cad kyi 'ching ba dgrol bar mdzad kyang dgrol bar bya ba ci yang mi mnga'o/_/sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pas yongs su ma smin pa gang yin pa de ni yongs su smin par mdzad la/_yongs su smin pa gang yin pa de ni rnam par grol bar mdzad 
[\[54b.6\]]kyang mngon par 'du mdzad pa yang mi mnga'/_/g.yo ba yang mi mnga' bas 'du 'dzi las thag ring du gyur pa rab tu dben zhing mdzad pa mi mnga' bas rang dbang du gyur cing bde bar gyur pa/_dus gsum las yang dag par 'das kyang dus gsum ston par mdzad pa 
[\[54b.7\]]nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las nges par 'byung ba/_byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis bsgrub par bya ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang sku tha dad par gyur pa med pa yin te/_'di dag thams cad kyang bskul zhing gsol ba 
[\[55a\]]
[\[55a.1\]]btab pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs kyis brnyes pa yin pa'i phyir 'di lta bu'i chos kyi sku ngas deng brnyes pa yin te/_de lta bas na gang dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'dod pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig 
[\[55a.2\]]gcig gam/_tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam gzhan dag la ston par byed pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de yang tshad med par gyur pa yin na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo chen po yongs su bskor bar bskul zhing 'jig rten na yun ring du bzhugs 
[\[55a.3\]]nas yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' bar gsol ba 'debs pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin lha'i dbang pos yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[55a.4\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer zhing theg pa gsum gyi lam bsgom par 'tshal bas dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchis pa ji ltar thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes su yongs su bsngo bar bgyi ba lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i dbang po brgya byin la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[55a.5\]]rigs kyi bu sems can gang dag byang chub yongs su gnyer zhing theg pa gsum gyi lam bsgom pas dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa yongs su bsngo bar 'dod pa des nyin mtshan dus drug tu gus pas sems rtse gcig tu 'di skad ces/_bdag gis thog ma med pa'i 'khor ba nas 
[\[55a.6\]]dkon mchog gsum po dag gi thad du rnal 'byor bsgoms pas yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa dang /_tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi srog chags dag la zan changs gcig tsam byin pa dang /_dge ba'i tshig gang gis rtsod pa dag gi bsdums 
[\[55a.7\]]byas pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song nas bslab pa'i gnas rnams yang dag par blangs pa dang /_'gyod tshangs byas pa dang /_bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang rjes su yi rang ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa de dag deng bdag gis thams cad gcig tu 
[\[55b\]]
[\[55b.1\]]bsdus te 'gyod cing phangs pa med pa'i sems kyis sems can thams cad la yongs su btang ngo /_/rnam par grol ba'i phyogs kyis yongs su bzung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mkhyen cing gzigs pa/_dpag tu med pa 
[\[55b.2\]]dang /_thogs pa mi mnga' ba'i rnam par dag pas 'di ltar bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa dag thams cad mtshan ma'i sems la mi gnas shing mtshan ma'i sems kyang mi spyod par sems can thams cad la yongs su btang ba de bzhin du/_bdag gis bsod 
[\[55b.3\]]nams las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ci yod pa de dag thams cad kyang sems can thams cad la yongs su gtong ste/_thams cad kyis yid bzhin gyi lag pa thob nas nam mkha' las rin po che phyung ste sems can thams cad kyi re ba yongs su bskang bar gyur cig_/longs 
[\[55b.4\]]spyod zad mi shes pa dang /_shes rab mthar thug pa med pa dang /_dam pa'i chos kyi spobs pa thogs pa med pa thob nas sems can thams cad thun mong du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa 
[\[55b.5\]]thob par gyur cig_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di'i rgyus dge ba'i chos tshad med pa bskyed pa gang yin pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/gzhan yang 'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' chen po rnams spyad pa spyod pa na bsod nams kyi dge 
[\[55b.6\]]ba'i rtsa ba thams cad rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par yongs su bsngos pa dang /_da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa dag gis ji ltar yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin du bdag gis bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ji snyed pa thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/
[\[55b.7\]]dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di dag gi dbang gis sems can thams cad dang dus gcig tu yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas sangs rgyas gzhan dag ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub kyi shing drung du byang chub kyi snying po la gnas te bsam gyis mi khyab pa thogs 
[\[56a\]]
[\[56a.1\]]pa med pa'i rnam par dag pa dang /_zad mi shes pa'i chos kyi gzungs dang /_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la gnas nas bdud sdig can gyi dmag tshogs tshad med pa dag pham par byas te mkhyen pa dang /_gzigs pa mngon par rtogs nas 'di 
[\[56a.2\]]ltar de dag thams cad skad cig gcig la gsal bar rtogs te nam gyi cha smad la bdud rtsi'i chos thob nas zil dngar gyi don mngon sum du gyur te/_bdag dang sems can thams cad sangs rgyas tshe dpag tu med pa dang /_sangs rgyas 'phags pa'i 'od dang /_
[\[56a.3\]]sangs rgyas dam pa'i 'od dang /_sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa dang /_sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa'i 'od dang /_sangs rgyas seng ge'i 'od dang /_sangs rgyas 'od brgya pa dang /_sangs rgyas dran pa'i 'od dang /_sangs rgyas rin chen mtshan dang /_sangs 
[\[56a.4\]]rgyas rin chen 'bar dang /_sangs rgyas 'bar ba'i 'od dang /_sangs rgyas rgyas par 'bar ba'i 'od dang /_sangs rgyas bkra shis bla ma'i rgyal po dang /_sangs rgyas dam pa'i sgra dang /_sangs rgyas bkod pa'i mchog dang /_sangs rgyas chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_
[\[56a.5\]]sangs rgyas bla ma 'phags pa'i sku dang /_sangs rgyas mngon par dga' ba'i gzugs sku dang /_sangs rgyas 'od zer kun du snang mdzad dang /_sangs rgyas tshangs pa rnam dag rgyal po dang /_sangs rgyas bla ma'i rang bzhin la sogs pa ji lta ba bzhin du gya nom par mngon par 
[\[56a.6\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa yang dag par mkhyen pa de dag 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar longs spyod rdzogs pa dang /_sprul pa'i sku bstan te bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub brnyes nas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 
[\[56a.7\]]'khor lo yongs su bskor te sems can yongs su bzlas pa bzhin du bdag kyang de bzhin du gyur cig ces rgya cher gong du bstan pa bzhin du brjod par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu shin tu dang ba'i dad pa dang ldan pa'i skyes pa'am bud med gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu 
[\[56b\]]
[\[56b.1\]]rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyong ba'i le'u 'di len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton du 'don pa dang /_dran pas mi brjed par byas te gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston par byed na bsod nams kyi phung po tshad 
[\[56b.2\]]med dpag tu med pa snyed thob par 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste dper na/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed yod pa thams cad dus gcig tu mi'i lus mngon par grub par gyur la/_mi'i lus thob nas kyang thams cad rang sangs 
[\[56b.3\]]rgyas kyi lam mngon par grub par gyur te/_skyes pa'am/_bud med gang la la zhig gis nam 'tsho'i bar du bkur sti dang /_bla mar byas te yo byad rnam pa sna bzhi po dag gis mchod par byas te/_rang sangs rgyas re re la yang so so nas ri'i rgyal po ri rab dang 
[\[56b.4\]]mnyam pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste/_rang sangs rgyas de dag yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang rin po che las mchod rten brtsigs nas mchod pa byas te mchod rten de dag kyang dpag tshad bcu gnyis kyi tshad tsam du mtho zhing me tog 
[\[56b.5\]]dang spos dang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan dang gdugs mang po dag gis rtag par mchod pa byas na rigs kyi bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_gang zag de dag gis thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni ci mang ba yin snyam mam/_lha'i dbang pos gsol pa/_
[\[56b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das shin tu mang lags so/_/rigs kyi bu gal te gang la la zhig gis gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las las kyi sgrib pa yongs su sbyong ba'i le'u 'di len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton du 'don 
[\[56b.7\]]pa dang /_dran pas mi brjed par byas te gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par ston pas 'thob pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de sngar bstan pa'i mchod pa byas pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de dang bsgrun na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro_/brgya stong dang /_bye ba'i char 
[\[57a\]]
[\[57a.1\]]yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_tshad dang dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar mi 'gro'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo de dag yang dag pa'i spyod pa la gnas nas phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la bla na med 
[\[57a.2\]]pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar gsol ba 'debs par byed na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams rab tu dgyes nas bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur bas so/_/rigs kyi bu ngas ji skad bstan pa bzhin du sbyin pa thams cad kyi nang na chos kyi sbyin pa ni mchog tu 
[\[57a.3\]]gyur pa yin pas de'i phyir rigs kyi bu dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so/_/gsum la skyabs su 'gro zhing bslab pa thams cad bsrung bar bskul nas nyams par ma byas pa dang /_las gsum stongs par ma gyur pas kyang dpe byar mi 
[\[57a.4\]]nus so/_/'jig rten thams cad kyi mthu dang nus pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du theg pa gsum po dag tu byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so/_/dus gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na sems can ji snyed yod pa thams cad 
[\[57a.5\]]thogs pa med pa thob nas bsod nams tshad med pa myur du yongs su rdzogs par gyur pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so/_/dus gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i sems can thams cad thogs pa med par byang chub gsum po dag thob par byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so/_/
[\[57a.6\]]dus gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i sems can thams cad myur du ngan 'gro bzhi po'i sdug bsngal las 'byung bar bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so/_/dus gsum gyi zhing dag na yod pa'i sems can thams cad mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa shin tu lci ba dag yongs su sbyang 
[\[57a.7\]]bar bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so/_/sdug bsngal thams cad las thar bar bya bar bskul bas kyang dpe byar mi nus so/_/'jigs shing skrag pa dang sdug bsngal gyis gzir cing nyon mongs pa thams cad las grol bar byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so/_/dus 
[\[57b\]]
[\[57b.1\]]gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi spyan sngar sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams ji snyed pa dag la rjes su yi rang bar bskul nas byang chub kyi smon lam btab pas kyang dpe byar mi nus so/_/sdig pa'i spyod pa dang /_gshe zhing spyo ba'i las yongs su bsal bar bskul ba dang /_
[\[57b.2\]]yon tan thams cad yongs su rdzogs par smon pa dang /_skye ba thams cad du dkon mchog gsum po thams cad la mchod pa dang /_bla mar bya ba dang bsngags pa brjod par bskul ba dang /_sems can rnams bsod nams kyi spyod pa yongs su dag pa mngon par sgrub par 
[\[57b.3\]]bskul nas byang chub yongs su rdzogs par byas pas kyang dpe byar mi nus pas de'i phyir 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi dus gsum gyi dkon mchog gsum la bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su rdzogs par bya bar bskul 
[\[57b.4\]]ba dang /_bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su bskor bar bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa dang /_bskal pa tshad med pa snyed du 'jig rten na bzhugs nas chos mchog dam pa zab mo bshad par bskul zhing gsol ba btab pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ni 
[\[57b.5\]]shin tu zab pas gang gis kyang dpe byar mi nus par rig par bya'o/_/de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /_gang gA'i lha mo dang /_tshangs pa'i rgyal po dang /_rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha tshad med pa rnams stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus 
[\[57b.6\]]mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos pas thams cad yongs su 
[\[57b.7\]]bzung ste klog pa dang /_g.yar ton du 'don pa dang /_kun chub par bgyis te/_gzhan dag la rgya cher yang dag par bstan nas chos 'di la brten te rab tu gnas par bgyid do/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag bla na ma mchis pa yang dag par 
[\[58a\]]
[\[58a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal bas don 'di mtshan nyid khyad par du 'phags pa'i rjes su 'brangs nas chos bzhin du spyod pa'i slad du'o/_/de nas tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin la sogs pas chos bshad pa'i gnas de nyid du me tog man+dA ra ba 
[\[58a.2\]]rnam pa sna tshogs kyis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor bas stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyis chen po thams cad rab tu g.yos par gyur to/_/lha'i rnga bo che dang /_rol mo thams cad kyang ma dkrol bar sgra rang byung ste/_gser gyi kha dog 
[\[58a.3\]]gi 'od zer bkye bas 'jig rten gyi khams kun du khyab par bkang ste sgra dbyangs dam pa byung bar gyur pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin la lha'i dbang pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di dag thams cad ni gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde'i 
[\[58a.4\]]byin gyis brlabs kyi mthu lags pas byams pa dang thugs rjes rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su skyob cing phan 'dogs pa dang rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel zhing las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su sbyong bar mdzad lags so/_/bcom 
[\[58a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu ngas mngon par dran te sngon byung ba 'das pa'i bskal pa brgya stong tshad med pa snyed 'das pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs 
[\[58a.6\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_bskal pa 'bum phrag drug brgya brgyad cu'i bar du 'jig rten na bzhugs so/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od 
[\[58a.7\]]chen snang mdzad kyis lha dang /_mi dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_sems can thams cad yongs su mya ngan las bzlas nas bde bar mdzad pa'i phyir 'jig rten du byung ba na/_'dus pa dang po la chos bstan pas srog 
[\[58b\]]
[\[58b.1\]]chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong snyed yongs su mya ngan las bzlas nas thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pas zag pa rnams zad nas rig pa gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_thogs pa med pa'i rang dbang dang ldan par gyur to/_/
[\[58b.2\]]'dus pa gnyis pa'i tshe yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong dgu bcu yongs su mya ngan las bzlas nas thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob nas zag pa rnams zad nas rig pa gsum dang /_mngon par shes pa drug dang /_thogs pa med 
[\[58b.3\]]pa'i rang dbang dang ldan par gyur to/_/'dus pa gsum pa'i tshe na yang srog chags bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong dgu bcu yongs su mya ngan las bzlas nas thams cad kyis dgra bcom pa'i 'bras bu thob pas zhes bya ba yang rgyas par gong ma bzhin no/_/rigs 
[\[58b.4\]]kyi bu nga de'i tshe bud med kyi lus su gyur te/_ming ni bsod nams rin po che'i 'od ces bya'o/_/'dus pa gsum pa'i tshe yang bcom ldan 'das de la nye bar bsnyen nas gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di yongs su bzung ste bklag pa dang /_kha ton du bton nas gzhan dag la 
[\[58b.5\]]rgya cher yang dag par bstan te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer ba'i phyir de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das des nga la bu mo bsod nams rin po che'i 'od 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs 
[\[58b.6\]]rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa 'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa'i/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan te/_bud med kyi lus 
[\[58b.7\]]spangs nas de tshun chad ngan 'gro bzhi las yang dag par 'das te/_lha dang mi'i nang du skyes nas bde ba'i mchog myong bar gyur to/_/tshe rabs stong phrag bzhi brgya brgyad cu'i bar du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byas te/_deng yang dag par mngon par rdzogs par sangs 
[\[59a\]]
[\[59a.1\]]rgyas pa'i bar du yang grags pa 'jig rten gyi khams kun du gang zhing rgyas par gyur pa yin no/_/de nas de'i tshe 'khor 'dus pa chen po thams cad kyis de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo yongs su 
[\[59a.2\]]bskor nas chos mchog dam pa bshad pa mthong bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams mi mjed 'di nas shar phyogs su sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma brgya stong snyed 'das pa na 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i bkod pa zhes bya ba yod de/_de bzhin 
[\[59a.3\]]gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad ces bya ba da ltar de na bzhugs te/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pas chos mchog dam pa bshad nas skye dgu rnams la phan 'dogs par mdzad pas khyod kyis mthong ba ni sangs rgyas de yin no/_/rigs kyi 
[\[59a.4\]]bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rin po che'i rgyal po 'od chen snang mdzad ces mtshan thos par gyur na/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po thob par 'gyur ro/_/bud med gang 
[\[59a.5\]]la la zhig de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshan thos par gyur na 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de de'i thad du gshegs par 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba'i dbang gis nams kyang bud med kyi lus len par mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gser 
[\[59a.6\]]'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di ni rnam pa sna tshogs kyis phan 'dogs shing rnam pa sna tshogs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel ba dang /_las kyi sgrib pa rnams yongs su sbyong bar byed do/_/rigs kyi bu dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_
[\[59a.7\]]dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gang na gnas pa'i gnas der gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par byed na yul de ni bsod nams kyi phan yon rnam pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_yul 
[\[59b\]]
[\[59b.1\]]de'i rgyal po nad med cing bgegs rnams dang bral ba dang /_tshe ring zhing thogs pa med par 'gyur ba dang /_phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra med cing dmag tshogs dpa' bar 'gyur ba dang /_bde ba'i longs spyod rgyas shing yang dag pa'i chos 'phel bar 'gyur ba gang yin pa'o/_/
[\[59b.2\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'di ltar mi'i rgyal po de la brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin gyi 'khor rnams kyis rtag par lhan cig srung bar byed pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i 'khor rnams la bka' stsal 
[\[59b.3\]]pa/_rigs kyi bu dag dngos po 'di dag bden nam/_de nas brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin gyi 'khor rnams kyis skad mthun par bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin 
[\[59b.4\]]te/_yul gang dag na mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di yang dag par bshad pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton du 'don par bgyid na yul gyi bdag po de dag la bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pas rtag par mchis nas yongs su srung bar bgyid par mchi 
[\[59b.5\]]ba dang /_gnas pa na yang lhan cig gnas par bgyid do/_/rgyal po de la gdon bgegs dang rgol ba'i dgra zhig mchis na yang de dag thams cad bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pas rab tu zhi bar bgyid do/_/mya ngan dang rims nad la sogs pa yang bsal zhing 
[\[59b.6\]]sos par bgyid pa nas tshe 'phel ba dang /_dge ba'i rtags 'byung ba dang /_smon pa rnams bsams pa bzhin 'grub pa dang /_rtag tu dga' ba bskyed par bgyid do/_/bdag cag gis yul de na dmag tshogs ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad dpa' zhing 
[\[59b.7\]]brtson par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu dag legs so legs so/_/khyed kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du khyed kyis mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_yul gyi bdag po de dag chos bzhin du spyod pa'i dus 
[\[60a\]]
[\[60a.1\]]na 'bangs thams cad kyang rgyal po'i rjes su mngon par sgrub cing chos bzhin du spyod par byed pas khyed la sogs pa yang gzugs dang stobs dang phan yon mchog thob par 'gyur zhing gzhal med khang 'od dang ldan pa dang 'khor rnams kyang brtson zhing rgyas par 
[\[60a.2\]]'gyur bas so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das de de bzhin no zhes gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gnas gang du mdo sde dam pa 'di yang dag par ston cing klog pa dang /_spel ba'i 
[\[60a.3\]]yul de'i blon po chen po dang /_nang blon rnams phan yon rnam pa bzhi thob par 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_dang po ni phan tshun 'dum zhing nye bar sems pa dang /_bla mar byed cing sdug par sems pa'o/_/gnyis pa ni rtag par mi'i rgyal po'i snying du sdug cing 
[\[60a.4\]]bkur ba dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_yul chen po dang /_yul chung ngu'i mi rnams kyis btsun par byed pa'o/_/gsum pa ni nor la yang dam par 'dzin cing chos la btsun par byed pa dang /_'jig rten pa'i khe mi tshol bas snyan pa'i sgra kun du 
[\[60a.5\]]grags nas mang po kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur ba'o/_/bzhi pa ni tshe ring zhing bde skyid par 'gyur ba ste 'di dag ni phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/gal te yul gyi bdag po gang la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di yang dag par ston par byed na dge sbyong dang /_bram ze rnams 
[\[60a.6\]]phan yon khyad par du 'phags pa rnam pa bzhi thob par 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_dang po ni gos dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman rnams kyis phongs pa med pa gang yin pa'o/_/gnyis pa ni thams cad sems bde bar yid 
[\[60a.7\]]la sems shing klog pa dang kha ton 'don par 'gyur ba'o/_/gsum pa ni ri dang nags tshal dag la gnas pa na bde bar gnas pa thob par 'gyur ba'o/_/bzhi pa ni sems kyis ji ltar smon pa bzhin thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba ste/_'di dag ni khyad par du 'phags 
[\[60b\]]
[\[60b.1\]]pa'i phan yon rnam pa bzhi zhes bya'o/_/gal te yul la lar mdo sde 'di yang dag par ston par byed na mi thams cad dar zhing skyid pa dang /_rims nad rnams med pa dang /_tshong pa dang 'gron po phan tshun 'gro ba'i nor dang rin po che mang du thob pa dang /_bsod nams khyad par du 
[\[60b.2\]]'phags pa thob par 'gyur te/_'di dag ni yon tan gyi phan yon rnam pa sna tshogs zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_'khor mang po rnams kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[60b.3\]]mdo sde zab mo 'di lta bu mngon du gnas par gyur na de bzhin gshegs pa'i byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun yang 'jig rten na gnas shing nub par mi 'gyur la/_nam mdo sde 'di lta bu nub par gyur pa na yang dag pa'i chos kyang nub par 'gyur bar rig par bgyi 
[\[60b.4\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_de lta bas na khyed kyis gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di las tshig gcig gam sde gcig kyang rung ste/_thams cad sems rtse gcig tu yang dag par bklag 
[\[60b.5\]]par bya/_yang dag par kha ton du gdon par bya/_yang dag par mnyan par bya/_yang dag par gzung bar bya/_yang dag par yid la bsam par bya zhing yang dag par bsgoms nas/_sems can mang po'i ched du rgya cher yang dag par bstan te yongs su 
[\[60b.6\]]spel bar byed na yun ring por bde bskyed cing bsod nams kyi phan yon mtha' med do/_/de nas 'khor mang po rnams kyis bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas thams cad phan yon khyad par du 'phags pa thob par gyur pas rab tu dga' zhing mgu 
[\[60b.7\]]bas yang dag par bzung bar gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las las kyi sgrib pa rnam par sbyong ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po/_bam po bzhi pa/_
[\[61a\]]
[\[61a.1\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po seng ge'i mtshan thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer 'bar ba 'khor bye ba phrag tshad med pa snyed dang lhan cig tu ston las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus 
[\[61a.2\]]pa'i thal mo sbyar nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas me tog dang spos dang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs kyis mchod pa byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[61a.3\]]rgyu dang rkyen du zhig gis ni byang chub kyi sems 'thob par 'gyur/_gang ni byang chub kyi sems zhes bgyi lags/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub gang lags pa de la ni da ltar gyi sems kyang dmigs su ma mchis/_ma 'ongs pa'i sems kyang dmigs su ma mchis/_
[\[61a.4\]]'das pa'i sems kyang dmigs su ma mchis pa lags so/_/byang chub las gud na yang byang chub kyi sems dmigs su ma mchis lags so/_/byang chub ces bgyi ba ni tshig gis brjod du ma mchis pas sems kyang gzugs ma mchis pa/_mtshan ma ma mchis pa/_
[\[61a.5\]]dngos po dang las ma mchis pa/_mngon par 'du bgyi ba ma lags pa/_sems can yang dmigs su ma mchis shing khong du chud par yang mi 'gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos zab mo 'di'i don gang lags pa rig par 'gyur lags/_bcom ldan 
[\[61a.6\]]'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_byang chub kyi dngos po dang /_las ni shin tu gya nom pas mngon par 'du bya bar yang dmigs par mi 'gyur la byang chub las gud na yang byang chub kyi sems dmigs par mi 'gyur bas byang 
[\[61a.7\]]chub ces bya ba ni brjod du med pa/_sems kyang brjod du med pa/_gzugs dang mtshan ma med pa/_dngos po dang las med pa/_sems can thams cad kyang dmigs su med pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub dang sems gnyi ga yang de bzhin nyid du mtshungs pa'i 
[\[61b\]]
[\[61b.1\]]phyir dang mngon du byed pa dang /_mngon du bya ba mnyam par gyur pa'i phyir te/_'on kyang chos rnams shes par bya ba med pa ni ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang gis de ltar shes par bya ba gang yin pa de ni chos rnams mngon par 
[\[61b.2\]]rtogs pa dang /_byang chub dang byang chub kyi sems legs par bshad pa zhes bya'o/_/byang chub kyi sems gang yin pa de ni 'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/_sems kyang de bzhin no/_/sems can yang de bzhin te/_
[\[61b.3\]]'di la mtshan nyid gnyis yang dag par dmigs su med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos thams cad la skye ba med pa'i phyir ro/_/byang chub kyang dmigs su med/_byang chub kyi ming yang dmigs su med/_sems can dang sems can gyi ming yang dmigs su med/_
[\[61b.4\]]nyan thos dang nyan thos kyi ming yang dmigs su med/_rang sangs rgyas dang rang sangs rgyas kyi ming yang dmigs su med/_byang chub sems dpa' dang byang chub sems dpa'i ming yang dmigs su med/_sangs rgyas dang sangs rgyas kyi mtshan yang dmigs su med/_
[\[61b.5\]]spyod pa dang spyod pa ma yin pa yang dmigs su med/_spyod pa dang spyod pa ma yin pa'i ming yang dmigs su med de/_'di ltar dmigs su med pa'i phyir rab tu dben pa'i chos thams cad la rab tu gnas pa yin te/_'di yang bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba la brten 
[\[61b.6\]]nas skye bar 'gyur ba yin no/_rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_rin po che'i ri'i rgyal po ri rab thams cad la phan 'dogs par byed pa de bzhin du byang chub kyi sems 'di yang sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i phyir 'di ni dang po sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o/_/
[\[61b.7\]]rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste dper na/_sa chen po bzhin du dngos po mang po yongs su 'dzin par byed pa'i phyir 'di ni gnyis pa tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_seng ge gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa gcig pu 'gro ba la 'jigs 
[\[62a\]]
[\[62a.1\]]pa med pa de bzhin du skrag cing dngang ba dang bral bar gyur pa'i phyir 'di ni gsum pa bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_rlung gi dkyil 'khor stobs po che shugs drag cing myur ba bzhin du sems la nur ba med pa'i phyir 'di ni bzhi pa 
[\[62a.2\]]brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang rtseg ma them skas bzhi dang ldan pa/_sgo bzhi nas shin tu bsil ba'i rlung gis bus pas shin tu bde ba myong ba bzhin du bsam gtan gyi chos kyi gter yongs 
[\[62a.3\]]su btsal nas gang zhig rgyas par byed pa'i phyir 'di ni lnga pa bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer rgyas par gyur pa de bzhin du sems 'dis kyang myur ba kho nar 'khor ba'i ma rig pa'i mun nag 'joms 
[\[62a.4\]]par byed pa'i phyir 'di ni drug pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_tshong dpon gyis thams cad kyi sems la smon pa yongs su rdzogs par byas pa de bzhin du sems 'dis kyang 'khor ba'i lam nyam nga ba las yongs su 'das nas yon 
[\[62a.5\]]tan gyi rin po che 'thob par byed pa'i phyir 'di ni bdun pa thabs mkhas pa'i ye shes khyad par du 'phags pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_zla ba yongs su dag cing shin tu rgyas pa la rab rib med pa bzhin du sems 'dis kyang spyod yul thams cad 
[\[62a.6\]]las rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs par byed pa'i phyir 'di ni brgyad pa smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i dmag la dbang ba'i blon po chen po yid bzhin du dbang byed pa bzhin du sems 'dis kyang sangs rgyas 
[\[62a.7\]]kyi zhing yongs su dag pa shin tu brgyan pa dang yon tan tshad med pas skye dgu rnams la rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed pa'i phyir 'di ni dgu pa stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya'o/_/'di lta ste dper na/_nam mkha' la 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po bzhin du sems 'dis 
[\[62b\]]
[\[62b.1\]]kyang spyod yul thams cad la thogs pa med cing gnas thams cad du rang dbang thob nas dbang bskur ba'i sar phyin par byed pa'i phyir 'di ni bcu pa ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rgyu zhes bya ste/_'di lta bu'i rgyu bcu la khyed kyis rab tu brtson pas bslab par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang 
[\[62b.2\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/lnga gang zhe na/_dad pa'i dbang po dang /_snying rje dang /_'dod pa yongs su tshol ba'i sems med pa dang /_sems can thams 
[\[62b.3\]]cad yongs su sdud pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su tshol ba gang yin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems 
[\[62b.4\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/lnga gang zhe na/_las rnam pa gsum yongs su dag par gyur pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen mngon par 'du 
[\[62b.5\]]mi byed pa dang /_ngan 'gro'i sgo rnams gcod cing bde 'gro'i sgo 'byed pa dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis las yang dag par 'da' ba dang /_bsod nams thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems 
[\[62b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[62b.7\]]lnga gang zhe na/_'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang gi nyon mongs pa gdul bar nus pa dang /_lus dang srog la phangs pa med par bde ba yongs su mi tshol zhing 'du shes nye bar zhi bar byed pa dang /_sngon gyi las la bsams nas sdug bsngal dang phrad par gyur na yang dang du len 
[\[63a\]]
[\[63a.1\]]par nus pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje'i bsam pa bskyed nas sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa zab mo thob par gyur pa gang yin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[63a.2\]]sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/
[\[63a.3\]]lnga gang zhe na/_nyon mongs pa rnams dang lhan cig gnas par mi mos pa dang bsod nams yongs su rdzogs par ma gyur gyi bar du bde ba nyams su len par mi byed pa dang /_dka' ba sna tshogs spyod pa la yongs su skyo ba'i bsam pa mi skye ba dang /_byams pa dang snying rje 
[\[63a.4\]]chen pos yongs su bsdus nas phan 'dogs pa'i thabs mkhas pas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su gnyer bar smon pa gang yin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams brtson 
[\[63a.5\]]'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/lnga gang zhe na/_dge ba'i chos rnams 
[\[63a.6\]]yongs su bsdus nas rnam par rtog par mi byed pa'i phyir dang /_rtag par rnam par grol bar smon cing mtha' gnyis la mngon par zhen par mi byed pa'i phyir dang /_mngon par shes pa thob nas sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed par smon pa'i phyir dang /_
[\[63a.7\]]chos kyi dbyings yongs su sbyangs nas sems kyi dri ma sel bar byed pa'i phyir dang /_sems can gyi nyon mongs pa'i rtsa ba yongs su gcod par byed pa'i phyir te/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs 
[\[63b\]]
[\[63b.1\]]su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/lnga gang zhe na/_rtag par sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_gsal 
[\[63b.2\]]zhing thabs mkhas pa thams cad la mchod cing nye bar brten nas yongs su skyo ba mi skyed cing rgyab kyis phyogs par mi byed pa dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis chos zab mo bshad pa de dag sems kyis rtag tu thos par mos shing yongs su mi skyo ba dang /_chog pa'i bsam 
[\[63b.3\]]pa med pa dang /_don dam pa dang /_kun rdzob kyi shes rab dam pas rab tu rnam par 'byed par mos pa dang /_bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa thams cad myur du spong ba dang /_'jig rten pa'i mkhyud dpyad dang /_rig pa'i gnas lnga'i chos thams cad mngon
