[\[63b.4\]]par rtogs pa gang yin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la 
[\[63b.5\]]brten nas thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/lnga gang zhe na/_sems can thams cad kyi mos pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_sems kyi spyod pa'i bye brag thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa dang /_chos tshad med pa rnams kyi gnyen po'i 
[\[63b.6\]]sgo thams cad sems kyis gsal bar rtogs pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje chen po'i ting nge 'dzin las 'byung zhing 'jug pa dag la rang dbang thob pa dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa rnams bsgoms nas yongs su smin cing phun sum tshogs par bya bar mos pa dang /_
[\[63b.7\]]sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ma lus par yongs su bsdus nas mngon par rtogs par smon pa gang yin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa ye shes dam pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed 
[\[64a\]]
[\[64a.1\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/lnga gang zhe na/_chos thams cad gzod ma nas mi skye mi 'gog_/yod pa ma 
[\[64a.2\]]yin/_med pa yang ma yin pa dag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi don gyi tshul mchog dam pa dag la dri ma dang bral zhing rnam par dag par so sor brtags nas sems bde bar gnas pa dang /_mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa'i 
[\[64a.3\]]sems kyi de bzhin nyid mngon par 'du bya ba med pa/_spyod pa med pa/_tha dad pa ma yin pa/_mi g.yo ba dag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang /_sems can rnams la phan gdags par 'dod pa'i phyir kun rdzob kyi bden pa dag la sems bde bar gnas pa dang /_zhi gnas 
[\[64a.4\]]dang lhag mthong dus gcig tu mnyam par spyod pa dag la sems bde bar gnas pa gang yin pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems 
[\[64a.5\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas/_stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed do/_/lnga gang zhe na/_yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa dang legs nyes rab tu shes pa dang /_sems 
[\[64a.6\]]can thams cad kyi shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i chos la gzud par byed pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'khor bar 'khor ba dag gi las kyi rkyen rnams yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rab tu shes pa dang /_sems can rnams kyi dbang po dang rang bzhin rnam pa gsum yang dag 
[\[64a.7\]]pa'i ye shes kyi stobs kyis rnam par 'byed cing khong du chud par byed pa dang /_sems can rnams la tshul bzhin du yang dag par bstan nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/_yongs su smin par byas nas ye shes kyi stobs kyis yongs su sgrol ba gang yin pa ste/_rigs kyi 
[\[64b\]]
[\[64b.1\]]bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni chos rnam pa lnga la brten nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su 
[\[64b.2\]]rdzogs par byed do/_/lnga gang zhe na/_chos rnams kyi legs nyes rab tu rnam par 'byed par byed pa dang /_nag po dang /_dkar po'i chos yongs su mi spong zhing yang dag par sdud par byed pa dang /_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa dag la yongs su mi skyo zhing mngon par 
[\[64b.3\]]mi dga' ba dang /_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pas mthar thug pa'i gnas su phyin par gyur pa dang /_dbang bskur ba mchog thob pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la sogs pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par gyur pa gang yin 
[\[64b.4\]]pa ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu pha rol tu phyin pa'i don gang yin zhe na/_'di lta ste phan 'dogs pa mchog mngon par sgrub pa gang yin pa 
[\[64b.5\]]de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/shin tu zab pa'i ye shes chen po tshad med pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/spyod pa dang spyod pa ma yin pa'i chos dag la sems kyis mngon par zhen pa med pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i 
[\[64b.6\]]don to/_/'khor ba'i nyes dmigs dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i yon tan yang dag par rig cing yang dag par so sor rtog pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/gti mug dang ldan pa'i gang zag dang /_shes rab dang ldan pa'i gang zag thams cad 
[\[64b.7\]]yongs su sdud par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/chos rin po che gya nom pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu ston pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/thogs pa med pa'i rnam par grol ba dang /_shes rab yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa gang yin 
[\[65a\]]
[\[65a.1\]]pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/chos kyi khams dang sems can gyi khams yang dag par rnam par phye nas shes par gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/sbyin pa la sogs pa nas ye shes kyi bar dag phyir mi ldog pa'i gnas su phyin par 
[\[65a.2\]]gyur pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin 
[\[65a.3\]]pa'i don to/_/mngon par byang chub nas sangs rgyas kyi stobs bcu dang /_bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba bzhi dang /_ma 'dres pa'i chos la sogs pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la mtshan nyid 
[\[65a.4\]]gnyis su med par rtogs pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/thams cad la phan 'dogs shing yongs su zlos pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/mu stegs can thams cad nye bar 'ongs nas gang 'dri ba dag la legs par rnam par bshad nas 'dul 
[\[65a.5\]]bar byed pa gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu gya nom pa rnam pa bcu gnyis yongs su bskor ba gang yin pa de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/mngon par zhen pa med cing mthong ba med pa dang /_skyon dang 'brel ba med pa gang yin pa 
[\[65a.6\]]de ni pha rol tu phyin pa'i don to/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med dpag tu med pa rnams rin po che'i gter rnam pa sna tshogs kyis kun tu gang ba dag 
[\[65a.7\]]byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams sa gzhi lag mthil ltar mnyam pa kha dog shin tu 
[\[65b\]]
[\[65b.1\]]gya nom pa tshad med pa dpag tu med pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa dang /_yongs su dag pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyi rnam pa dag byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang 
[\[65b.2\]]ba 'di lta ste/_bdag nyid kyi lus shin tu dpa' la go chas rab tu brgyan pas phyir rgol ba thams cad pham par byed pa dag byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 
[\[65b.3\]]'di lta ste/_phyogs bzhi nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor gyis me tog dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par gtor bas sa gzhi kun du khyab par bkram pa dag byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa la snga 
[\[65b.4\]]rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/_rin po che'i phreng ba sna tshogs kyis lus kun tu khyab par brgyan pa mgo me tog gi cod pan gyis brgyan pa dag byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa la snga 
[\[65b.5\]]rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/_rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi rdzing bu them skas kyi lam bzhi dang ldan pa/_gser gyi bye ma kun tu bdal ba/_yongs su dang zhing dri ma med pa/_yon tan brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus kun tu gang ba/_me tog ut+pa la dang /_ku mu 
[\[65b.6\]]da dang /_puN+Da ri kas kun tu bkram pa/_me tog gi rdzing bu'i nang na rnam par rtsen pa dag shin tu bde skyid pa dang /_yongs su dag cing dpe zla med pa dag byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa la 
[\[65b.7\]]snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa'i mdun du sems can rnams sems can dmyal bar ltung bar 'gyur ba'i rigs pa dag 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthus ltung bar yang mi 'gyur la smas pa yang med/_'jigs shing skrag pa yang med par 
[\[66a\]]
[\[66a.1\]]gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/_bdag nyid kyi lus kyi g.yas g.yon na seng ge'i rgyal pos yongs su bsrungs pas gcan 
[\[66a.2\]]gzan mang po thams cad skrag cing 'jigs par gyur pa dag byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa la snga rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 'khor 'bum phrag tshad 
[\[66a.3\]]med pas yongs su bskor nas mchod pa byed pa dang /_spyi bo'i gdugs dkar po rin po che sna tshogs tshad med pa dag gis rab tu brgyan pa dag byang chub sems dpas thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa la snga 
[\[66a.4\]]rtags kyi mtshan ma snang ba 'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gser gyi kha dog kun tu 'phro ba/_'od zer yongs su dag pa/_tshad med pa/_thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa la tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'bum phrag tshad med pa dag gis yongs su bskor nas 
[\[66a.5\]]bkur sti dang mchod pa byas pas bla na med pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu gya nom pa yongs su bskor ba dag byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu mthong bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sa dang po la ci'i phyir rab tu dga' ba zhes bya zhe na/_'di ltar thog ma kho nar 'jig 
[\[66a.6\]]rten las 'das pa'i sems sngon ma thob pa deng gdod thob nas sgrub pa chen po dag ji ltar smon pa bzhin du mngon par grub par gyur pas rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba'i phyir sa dang po ni rab tu dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/dri ma shin tu phra mo dang 'chal pa'i tshul khrims kyi nyes pa thams cad 
[\[66a.7\]]yongs su dag par gyur pas de'i phyir sa gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab dang ting nge 'dzin tshad med pa'i 'od zer snang bar bsgul bar mi nus shing thul bar mi 'gyur ba dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs rtsa bar gyur pas de'i phyir sa gsum pa ni 'od byed 
[\[66b\]]
[\[66b.1\]]pa'i sa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab kyi mes nyon mongs pa rnams bsregs nas 'od kyi snang ba 'phel bar byed pa dang /_byang chub kyi phyogs sgom par byed pas de'i phyir sa bzhi pa ni 'od 'phro ba'i sa zhes bya'o/_/thabs mkhas pas bsgoms pa'i ye shes mchog rang dbang du gyur 
[\[66b.2\]]pa shin tu 'thob par dka' ba'i phyir dang /_mthong ba dang bsgoms pas spang bar bya ba'i nyon mongs pa gdul bar dka' ba thul bar gyur pa'i phyir sa lnga pa ni shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba zhes bya'o/_/spyod pa'i chos rgyun chad pa med par gsal bar mngon sum du gyur pa dang /_
[\[66b.3\]]mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa thams cad mngon sum du gyur pas de'i phyir sa drug pa ni mngon sum du gyur pa zhes bya'o/_/zag pa med pa la bar chad med pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pa dang /_rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin yun ring po nas bsgoms pa'i phyir dang /_
[\[66b.4\]]sa de rnam par dag cing thogs pa med par gyur pa'i phyir sa bdun pa ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa bsgoms pas rang dbang du gyur nas nyon mongs pa rnams kyis bsgul bar mi nus pas de'i phyir sa brgyad pa ni mi g.yo ba zhes bya'o/_/
[\[66b.5\]]tha dad par gyur pa'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad bstan pa la rang dbang thob nas nyes pa med cing 'brel pa med par shes rab 'phel bar byed pa dang /_dbang du gyur cing thogs pa med par gyur par de'i phyir sa dgu pa ni legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o/_/chos kyi sku nam 
[\[66b.6\]]mkha' dang 'dra ba dang /_shes rab sprin chen po lta bur gyur nas thams cad kun tu khyab par g.yogs par byed pa'i phyir de lta bas na sa bcu pa ni chos kyi sprin zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu bdag dang chos la mtshan ma yod par mngon par zhen pa'i ma rig pa dang /_'khor ba'i ngan 
[\[66b.7\]]'gro la skrag cing 'jigs pa'i ma rig pa ste/_ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa dang po la sgrib par byed do/_/bslab pa'i gnas shin tu phra mo dag la shes bzhin med pas nyams par byas pa'i ma rig pa dang /_las kyi 'du byed rnam pa sna tshogs slong bar byed pa'i ma rig pa ste/_
[\[67a\]]
[\[67a.1\]]ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa gnyis pa la sgrib par byed do/_/ma thob pa thob par 'dod pa la sred cing mngon par zhen pa'i ma rig pa dang /_gzungs khyad par du 'phags pa dag la sgrib par byed pa'i ma rig pa ste/_ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa gsum 
[\[67a.2\]]pa la sgrib par byed do/_/snyoms par 'jug pa'i ro myang ba la mngon par dga' ba'i ma rig pa dang /_shin tu gya nom pa'i chos rnam par dag pa la sred cing mos pa'i ma rig pa ste/_ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bzhi pa la sgrib par byed do/_/'khor ba la rgyab kyis 
[\[67a.3\]]phyogs pa'i ma rig pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon par gzhol ba'i ma rig pa ste/_ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa lnga pa la sgrib par byed do/_/rnal 'byor mngon du rgyu ba'i ma rig pa dang /_mtshan ma rigs pa mngon du snang ba'i ma rig pa ste/_ma rig pa 'di 
[\[67a.4\]]gnyis kyis ni sa drug pa la sgrib par byed do/_/mtshan ma shin tu phra mo rnams la mngon sum du spyod pa'i ma rig pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa'i yid la byed pa la mngon par dga' ba'i ma rig pa ste/_ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bdun pa la sgrib par byed do/_/mtshan 
[\[67a.5\]]ma med par sgom pa la mngon par rtsol ba'i ma rig pa dang /_mtshan ma la dbang thob pa la mngon par zhen pa'i ma rig pa ste/_ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa brgyad pa la sgrib par byed do/_/bstan par bya ba'i don tshad med pa dang /_ming dang tshig dang /_yi ge tshad med 
[\[67a.6\]]pa gnyis po 'di dag la mi mkhas pa'i ma rig pa dang /_tshig gi spobs pa yid bzhin du ma gyur pa'i ma rig pa ste/_ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa dgu pa la sgrib par byed do/_/rdzu 'phrul chen po ston pa la rang dbang ma thob pa'i ma rig pa dang /_shin tu phra ba'i gsang ba'i las kyi 
[\[67a.7\]]dngos po khong du ma chud pa'i ma rig pa ste/_ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni sa bcu pa la sgrib par byed do/_/spyod yul thams cad la shes bya phra mos bsgribs pa'i ma rig pa dang /_nyon mongs pa shin tu phra ba'i gnas ngan len gyi ma rig pa ste/_ma rig pa 'di gnyis kyis ni 
[\[67b\]]
[\[67b.1\]]sangs rgyas kyi sa la sgrib par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sa dang po la sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do/_/sa gnyis pa la tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do/_/sa gsum pa la bzod pa'i pha rol 
[\[67b.2\]]tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do/_/sa bzhi pa la brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do/_/sa lnga pa la bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do/_/sa drug pa la shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do/_/sa bdun pa la thabs mkhas pa'i 
[\[67b.3\]]ye shes mchog gi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do/_/sa brgyad pa la smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do/_/sa dgu pa la stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do/_/sa bcu pa la ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyod par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 
[\[67b.4\]]byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams ni sems bskyed pa dang pos rin chen mchog gi ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do/_/sems bskyed pa gnyis pas yid du 'ong ba'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do/_/sems bskyed pa 
[\[67b.5\]]gsum pas shin tu bsgul bar dka' ba'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do/_/sems bskyed pa bzhi pas phyir mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do/_/sems bskyed pa lnga pas rin po che'i me tog gi ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par 
[\[67b.6\]]byed do/_/sems bskyed pa drug pas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od zer 'bar ba'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do/_/sems bskyed pa bdun pas smon lam thams cad yid bzhin du mngon par grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do/_/sems 
[\[67b.7\]]bskyed pa brgyad pas mngon sum du gnas par byed pa'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do/_/sems bskyed pa dgu pas ye shes kyi snying po'i ting nge 'dzin yongs su sdud cing skyed par byed do/_/sems bskyed pa bcu pas dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin yongs 
[\[68a\]]
[\[68a.1\]]su sdud cing skyed par byed do/_/rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa rnam pa bcu zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyis sa dang po las thob pa'i 
[\[68a.2\]]gzungs gang yin pa de ni yon tan la gnas pa'i stobs zhes bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags bka' stsal pa/_tad+ya thA/_pUr+Na ma nor the/_do ho do ho/_yA bta sUr+ya/_a ba b+hA sa tA/_yA bad tsan+d+re/_dau dan+te/_tA bad rak+Sha mAn daN+Da 
[\[68a.3\]]pa ri hA raM ku ru swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/_gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don 
[\[68a.4\]]cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na 'di lta ste/_stag dang /_spyang ki dang /_seng ge dang /_gcan gzan ma rungs pa'i rigs kyi rnam pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang /_mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang /_gdon bgegs dang /_sdug 
[\[68a.5\]]bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur zhing sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas sa dang po mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa gnyis pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni 
[\[68a.6\]]shin tu bde ba'i gnas zhes bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ut+to li/_tsi ri tsi ri/_ut+to rA to rA NA ma/_shAn+to/_shAn+to/_ut+to li/_hu lu hu lu swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs sngags 'di ni gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa 
[\[68a.7\]]gnyis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/_gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas 
[\[68b\]]
[\[68b.1\]]phyir rgol ba dang /_gdon bgegs dang /_sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar 'gyur zhing sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas sa gnyis pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[68b.2\]]pos sa gsum pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni shin tu rgyal bar dka' ba'i stobs zhes bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_dan+thi ke/_pan+thi ke/_ka ra thA/_kau ra thi/_ke yU re/_dan+te le swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das 
[\[68b.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa gsum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/_gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_
[\[68b.4\]]mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang /_gdon bgegs dang /_sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa las thar bar 'gyur zhing sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas/_sa gsum pa mi brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub 
[\[68b.5\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa bzhi pa las thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni rgya cher phan 'dogs pa zhes bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_shi ri shi ri/_di ma di ma ni/_d+ha ri d+ha ri Ni/_shi ri shi ri Ni/_bi sha lA/_bi sha lA/_ba sha ba sha ni/_ban+d+ha ni ye swA hA/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[68b.6\]]gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa bzhi pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin te/_gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing yongs su 'dzin par byed na 
[\[68b.7\]]gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas phyir rgol ba dang /_gdon bgegs dang /_sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba'i 'jigs pa rnams las thar bar 'gyur zhing sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol nas sa bzhi pa mi 
[\[69a\]]
[\[69a.1\]]brjed cing rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa lnga pa las 'thob pa'i gzungs gang yin pa de ni yon tan sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa zhes bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ha ri ha ri Ni/_tsi ri tsi ri Ni/_
[\[69a.2\]]rimA Ni/_saM ka ri mA Ni/_sA ma bA sa ni/_dzam+b+ha ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_mo ha ni/_swa yaM b+huk+ke swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa lnga pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[69a.3\]]yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs te/_gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di kha ton du 'don cing 'dzin par byed na 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams las thar ba dang /_gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs 
[\[69a.4\]]pa dgra dang rkun po dang /_glo bur gyi gnod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_sdug bsngal rnams dang /_sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol te sa lnga pa mi brjed par dran no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa drug pa las/_gzungs thob pa'i 
[\[69a.5\]]ming yongs su rgyas pa'i ye shes zhes bya'o/_/gzungs la/_tad+ya thA/_bi to ri/_bi to ri/_ma ri Ni/_ka li ka li/_bi d+ho han+te/_lu lu lu lu tsu lu tsu lu to lU ba to lU ba sha sha shats+tsha/_pa ri sha/_swa sti sarba satwA nAM/_sid+d+h+ya nU ma ma man+t+ra/_pa da ni swA hA/_rigs 
[\[69a.6\]]kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa drug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs te/_gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'dzin na 
[\[69a.7\]]'jigs shing skrag pa las thar ba dang /_gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dgra dang /_rkun po dang /_blo bur gyi gnod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_sdug bsngal rnams dang /_sgrib pa lnga 
[\[69b\]]
[\[69b.1\]]las rnam par grol te/_sa drug pa mi brjed par dran no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos sa bdun pa las gzungs thob pa'i ming rgyal ba'i chos kyi spyod pa zhes bya ste/_gzungs la/_tad+ya thA/_dza ha dza ha ru/_dza ha dza ha dza ha ru/_bai 
[\[69b.2\]]lu ke bai lu ke/_a mr-i tag Ni/_pu ru Sha Ni/_be ru te ke pa ru bat+ta/_bi d+he he ke/_bin+da bi le ni/_a mr-i lu te ki/_bai dzu yu bai dzu yu swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis 
[\[69b.3\]]sa bdun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs te/_gang la la gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'dzin na 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams las thar ba dang /_gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi 
[\[69b.4\]]ma yin pa la sogs pa dgra dang /_rkun po dang /_glo bur gyi gnod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi rnam pa dang /_sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol te/_sa bdun pa mi brjed par dran no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[69b.5\]]po sa brgyad pa las gzungs thob pa'i ming ni mi zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ste/_gzungs la/_tad+ya thA/_shi ri shi ri shi ri Ni/_mi te mi te/_ka ri ka ri/_he ru he ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_ban+d+ha ni swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed kyi grangs 
[\[69b.6\]]las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa brgyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs te/_gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'dzin na 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams las thar ba dang /_gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang /_yi 
[\[69b.7\]]dgas ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dgra dang /_rkun po dang /_glo bur gyi gnod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_sdug bsngal dang /_sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol te sa brgyad pa mi brjed par dran no/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems 
[\[70a\]]
[\[70a.1\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa dgu pa las gzungs thob pa'i ming dpag tu med pa'i sgo zhes bya ste/_gzungs la/_tad+ya thA/_ha ri tsan+Da li ke/_ku la ma b+ha dri/_to ra si pa ta pa ta si/_shi ri shi ri ga shi ri ga pi shi ri swa swasti/_sarba sa twa naM swa ha/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 
[\[70a.2\]]'di ni gang ga'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa dgu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs te/_gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'dzin na 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams las thar ba dang /_gcan 
[\[70a.3\]]gzan ma rungs pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dgra dang /_rkun po dang /_glo bur gyi gnod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_sgrib pa lnga las rnam par grol te sa dgu pa mi brjed par dran no/_/rigs kyi 
[\[70a.4\]]bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa bcu pa la gzungs thob pa'i ming rdo rje'i ri 'joms pa zhes bya ste/_gzungs la/_tad+ya thA/_sid+d+he su sid+d+he/_mo tsa ni/_mo k+Sha ni/_muk+te bi muk+te/_a ma le bi ma le da ma le/_mAng+ga le/_hi ra N+ya gar+b+he/_rat+na gar+b+he/_sa man+ta b+ha dre/_sarba 
[\[70a.5\]]ar+tha swa d+ha ni/_ma na se/_ma hA ma na se ad b+hu te/_a t+yad b+hu te a ra dze/_bi ra dze a tsa te a mr-i te a ra dze bi ra dze prah+me prah+ma swa re pU ra Ni pU ra Ni ma no ra the swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i bkra shis kyi tshig ste/_'di ni gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed 
[\[70a.6\]]kyi grangs las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis sa bcu pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs te/_gang la la zhig gis gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'dzin na 'jigs shing skrag pa las grol te/_gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]
[\[70a.7\]]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pa dgra dang /_rkun po dang /_glo bur gyi gnod pa dang /_gdug cing gnod pa thams cad bsal cing zad nas sgrib pa lnga las grol te sa bcu pa mi brjed par dran no/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' seng ge'i mtshan nyid 'od 
[\[70b\]]
[\[70b.1\]]'phro bas sangs rgyas kyis bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i gzungs bshad pa 'di thos nas 'dug pa'i stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas gus par sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[70b.2\]]te tshigs su bcad pa 'dis sangs rgyas la bstod do/_/dpe med de la gus phyag 'tshal/_/shin tu zab pa'i mtshan nyid chos/_/skye bo yang dag shes stor ba/_/sangs rgyas nyag gcig 'dren cing sgrol/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shes rab spyan/_/chos kyi mtshan 
[\[70b.3\]]nyid gcig mi gzigs/_/yang dag chos kyi spyan gyis ni/_/yongs su brtags pa bsam mi khyab/_/chos gcig kyang ni skye ba med/_/chos gcig kyang ni 'gog pa med/_/de ltar mnyam par gzigs pas na/_/bla na med pa'i gnas su son/_/'khor 
[\[70b.4\]]ba dag kyang mi 'jigs te/_/mya ngan 'das la yang mi gnas/_/mtha' gnyis la yang mi chags pas/_/de phyir mya ngan 'das pa thob/_/dag dang ma dag phyogs la yang /_/bcom ldan 'das kyis ro gcig mkhyen/_/rnam par mi rtog dbyings kyis ni/_/
[\[70b.5\]]mchog tu rnam dag thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das ni mtha' med sku/_/yi ge 'bru gcig ma bshad kyang /_/slob ma mang po rnams dag la/_/chos kyi char gyis rgyas par mdzad/_/skye bo mtshan ma sangs rgyas gzigs/_/sna tshogs thams cad kun 
[\[70b.6\]]kyang mkhyen/_/'on kyang sdug bsngal de dag la/_/rtag par 'dren cing skyob par mdzad/_/skyid sdug rtag dang mi rtag dang /_/bdag yod bdag med la sogs pa/_/gcig dang tha dad ma yin te/_/mi skye 'gog pa'ang ma yin no/_/de la sogs pa'i gzhung mang 
[\[70b.7\]]po/_/bshad pa'i phyir ni rnam pa yod/_/dpe ru lung stong brag ca 'dra/_/sangs rgyas nyag gcig mngon par mkhyen/_/chos kyi dbyings la bye brag med/_/de phyir theg pa tha dad med/_/skye bo dag ni bsgral ba'i phyir/_/bstan pa rnam pa gsum yang yod/_/
[\[71a\]]
[\[71a.1\]]de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po 'dug pa'i stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas gus par sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces 
[\[71a.2\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po dkon zhing dpag tu med pa 'di thog ma dang bar ma dang tha mar dge gzhung dang tshig 'bru bzang po sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad grub par nus pa 'di 'dzin cing 'chang ba'i 
[\[71a.3\]]mi ni sangs rgyas thams cad la lan glon pa zhes bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu de de bzhin te/_de de bzhin no/_/khyed kyis smras pa bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'di mnyan cing thos pa ni kun kyang bla na med pa yang 
[\[71a.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog go/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu mdo sde 'dis ni phyir mi ldog pa'i sa'i byang chub sems dpa' mchog gi dge ba'i rtsa ba smin cing grub par nus so/_/'di ni mchog gi chos kyi phyag rgya'o/_/'di ni mdo sde thams 
[\[71a.5\]]cad kyi rgyal po ste/_mnyan cing thos pa dang /_'chang zhing 'dzin pa dang /_klog cing 'don par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu skye bo rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyed pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ma smin pa/_sangs rgyas rnams la ma bsnyen pas ni mchog gi mdo sde 
[\[71a.6\]]'di mnyan cing thos par mi nus so/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las nyan cing 'chang na sdig pa mi dge ba'i las kyi sgrib pa thams cad byang zhing zad nas mchog tu rnam par dag cing rtag par sangs rgyas mthong nas sangs rgyas rnams dang /_dge ba'i 
[\[71a.7\]]bshes gnyen mchog tu spyod pa'i ming dang mi 'bral zhing rtag par dam pa'i chos thos nas phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la gnas pa dang /_mchog gi gzungs kyi sgo mi zad mi 'grib par thob par 'gyur te/_'di lta ste/_rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya mchog gi yon tan 'byung ba'i 
[\[71b\]]
[\[71b.1\]]gzungs mi zad mi 'grib pa dang /_sems can thams cad kyi yid dang /_spyod pa dang /_tshig la thogs pa med pa'i gzungs mi zad mi 'grib pa dang /_nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa mtshan nyid kyi 'od kyi gzungs mi zad mi 'grib pa dang /_zla ba rgyas pa'i mtshan 
[\[71b.2\]]nyid 'od kyi gzungs mi zad mi 'grib pa dang /_slad pa thams cad thul nas yon tan 'phel ba'i gzungs mi zad mi 'grib pa dang /_rdo rje'i ri bsnyil ba'i gzungs mi zad mi 'grib pa dang /_bshad du mi rung ba rgyu rkyen gyi snying po bshad mi nus pa 'chang ba'i gzungs 
[\[71b.3\]]mi zad mi 'grib pa dang /_bden par smra ba'i chos la thogs pa med pa'i sgra'i gzungs mi zad mi 'grib pa dang /_nam mkha' dri ma med pa'i sems dang /_spyod pa'i phyag rgya'i gzungs mi zad mi 'grib pa dang /_mtha' med pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku thams cad 
[\[71b.4\]]mngon du snang ba'i gzungs mi zad mi 'grib pa dang /_rigs kyi bu 'di la sogs te mi zad mi 'grib pa'i gzungs thams cad kyi tshad kyi sgo grub cing thob pa'i phyir byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas 
[\[71b.5\]]kyi zhing thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi skur sprul nas bla na med pa dam pa'i chos 'chad do/_/chos kyi de bzhin nyid ni mi g.yo mi gnas mi 'gro mi 'ong ba'i phyir ro/_/skye bo thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba grub cing smin par byas kyang skye bo gcig smin par yang mi mthong ngo /_/chos sna tshogs 'chad mod kyi 
[\[71b.6\]]tshig 'bru la mi g.yo mi gnas mi 'gro mi 'ong ngo /_/skye zhing 'gog pa ston kyang skye shing 'gog pa med par khong du chud do/_/ci'i rgyus na 'du byed kyi chos rnams la 'gro ba dang 'ong ba med ce na/_chos so cog gi ngo bo nyid tha dad pa med pa'i phyir ro/_/chos 'di 'chad pa'i 
[\[71b.7\]]tshe byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'bum phrag sum khri mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob bo/_/dpag tu med pa'i byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi nur ba thob bo/_/dpag tu med mtha' med pa'i dge slong dang dge slong ma chos la 
[\[72a\]]
[\[72a.1\]]chos kyi mig gtsang ma thob bo/_/dpag tu med pa'i skye bo byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/rgyal po'i chos kyis 'khor kun bzlog_/zab cing yangs mchog mthong bar 
[\[72a.2\]]dka'/_/skye bo dmus long 'dod pas khebs/_/mi mthong phyir ni sdug bsngal len/_/de nas phal mang po lhan cig tu 'dug pa langs te sangs rgyas kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas sangs rgyas la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gnas gang 
[\[72a.3\]]na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di 'chang ba dang /_klog cing kha ton du bgyid pa der bdag cag la sogs pa phal mang po rnams thams cad der mchis te nyan pa'i 'khor bgyi'o/_/chos 'chad pa'i mkhan po de la phan pa dang /_bde zhing skyid pa dang /_bsgribs 
[\[72a.4\]]pa med pa dang /_lus dang yid bag yangs su bgyi'o/_/bdag cag la sogs pas sems thag pa nas mchod cing yang phal mang po nyan pa de dag bde zhing skyid par bgyi'o/_/ga la gnas pa'i yul de na dgra dang /_'jigs shing skrag pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_
[\[72a.5\]]mu ge dang /_nyon mongs pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/yul gyi mi dar zhing rgyas par bgyi'o/_/chos 'di bshad pa'i gnas kyi dkyil 'khor gyis der lha dang /_mi ma yin pa dang /_skye bo rnams kyis mi rdzi/_mi 'chag_/mi gtsang ba la sogs 
[\[72a.6\]]pas mi bsgo'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos 'chad pa'i gnas de mchod rten nyid lags pas na bdug pa dang /_me tog dang ba dan dang /_gdugs kyis mchod par bgyi'o/_/bdag cag la sogs pas rtag par bsrungs nas rgud cing dmas pa las 
[\[72a.7\]]bral bar bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kyis phal mang po la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyed la sogs pas mdo sde mchog 'di la brtson par bsgoms na de ni dam pa'i chos 'jig rten na yun du bzhugs pa zhes bya'o/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog 
[\[72b\]]
[\[72b.1\]]tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las shin tu rnam par dag pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste drug pa'o//_//gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po/_bam po lnga pa/_de nas sangs rgyas kyis byang chub shing gi lha dge ba'i lha mo la 'di skad 
[\[72b.2\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/da khyod kyis shes par gyis shig_/bzang po dpal byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan mo'i rmi lam du gser gyi rnga las sgra chen po byung ste/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bstod pa dang /_'gyod tshangs kyi chos mthong ba de'i rgyu khyed la sogs pa la rgya 
[\[72b.3\]]cher bshad pa 'di shin tu legs par nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_'das pa'i tshe rgyal po gser klu'i dbang po zhes bya bas rtag par pad+mo ka ma la lta bus phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la bstod cing bsngags so/_/de nas phal mang po la bstod pa'i 
[\[72b.4\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsungs so/_/gang rgyal snga ma gang dag byung ba dang /_/phyogs bcu dag na gang dag bzhugs pa dang /_/rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag bstod do/_/thub dbang zhi ba rab zhi rnam par dag_/kha 
[\[72b.5\]]dog gser dang 'dra bar snang ba'i sku/_/sangs rgyas dbyangs ni dbyangs kun nang na snyan/_/tshangs pa'i sgra skad shin tu bsgrags pa'i gsung /_/rkang drug rma bya snag tsha 'dra ba'i dbu/_/sngon po rab bskums bya dang 'dra bar mdzes/_/dung dang kha ba lta bur dkar ba'i 
[\[72b.6\]]tshems/_/gser gyis spras pa lta bur rtag tu snang /_/sdo zhing yangs la shin tu dri med spyan/_/me tog ut+pal sngon po kha 'bus 'dra/_/ljags kyi kha dog bzang yangs pad+ma 'dra/_/pad+ma skyes par snang ba'i pad+mo 'dra/_/smin mtshams dung dang pad+ma'i rtsa ba 'dra/_/
[\[72b.7\]]g.yas phyogs 'khyil pa kha dog bai DUr+ya/_/zla ba tshes shing zla ba phra ba 'dra/_/thub pa mgon sku 'bar ba bung ba 'dra/_/'jam [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]gser gyi thur ma 'dra ba yi/_/zhal las 'phags zhing lham mer gyur pa'i shangs/_/rab mchog dam pa 'phags pa ri yi 
[\[73a\]]
[\[73a.1\]]mchog_/rgyal ba kun gyi rtag tu 'jam pa'o/_/ba spu'i khung nas re re 'byung ba ste/_/spu byung ba ni g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba/_/sngon po zlum po lta bur skyes pa'o/_/sngon po brgyan pa rma bya'i mgul ltar mdzes/_/skyes ma thag tu rab tu snang 
[\[73a.2\]]ba'i sku/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten thams cad gang bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal thams cad zhi/_/bde ba kun gyis sems can ngoms par mdzad/_/sems can dmyal dang byol song 'gro ba dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lha gnas mi yi 'gro ba dang /_/
[\[73a.3\]]sems can bde ba kun gyis tshogs par mdzad/_/ngan song 'gro ba thams cad rab zhi mdzad/_/kha dog bzang po gser dang 'dra ba'i mdzes/_/shin tu sbyangs pa'i gser dang 'dra ba'i sku/_/bde gshegs zhal ni dri med zla ba 'dra/_/mdzes par gyur cing shin tu dri 
[\[73a.4\]]med zhal/_/yan lag gzhon par gyur cing 'jam pa'i sku/_/'gro zhing gnon pa'i seng ge'i mchog dang 'dra/_/phyag phyang dbang ba rab tu 'phyang bar gyur/_/rlung gis sA la'i lcug ma bskyod pa bzhin/_/'dom gang 'khor bar 'bar ba'i 'od zer gtong /_/nyi ma stong dang 'dra bar shin tu lhan/_/
[\[73a.5\]]thub pa'i dbang po dri ma med pa'i sku/_/thams cad mtha' yas zhing kun snang bar gyur/_/zla ba lta bur snang byed 'dra bar gyur/_/zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya phrag stong kun tu/_/de dag 'od ni thams cad med par gyur/_/sangs rgyas lham mer snang 
[\[73a.6\]]bar gyur pa'i phyir/_/sangs rgyas nyid byed 'jig rten sgron mar gyur/_/sangs rgyas nyin mo nyi ma brgya stong gis/_/brgya phrag stong gi zhing rnams kun tu yang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma sems can mthong /_/bsod nams brgya phrag stong gis 
[\[73a.7\]]bsgrubs pa'i sku/_/yon tan thams cad kyis ni brgyan pa'i sku/_/rgyal phyag bal glang rgyal po'i sna dang 'dra/_/rab 'bar shin tu dri med rkang lag mchog_/sa yi steng gi rdul dang mnyam pa dang /_/sangs rgyas gang 'das rdul phran mnyam pa 
[\[73b\]]
[\[73b.1\]]dang /_/gang dag 'byung ba rdul phran mnyam pa dang /_/gang dag bzhugs pa rdul phran mnyam pa dang /_/rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag 'tshal ba/_/lus dang ngag dang yid ni dang bas so/_/me tog rab tu sbyin dang dri rab sbyin/_/kha dog brgya yang shin 
[\[73b.2\]]tu sems bzang gis/_/bdag gi lce brgyas sangs rgyas yon tan rnams/_/bskal pa stong du brjod par mi nus so/_/rgyal ba dag gi dge ba gang rdzogs pa/_/snying po mchog rab sna tshogs du ma dag_/rgyal ba gcig gi yon tan brjod mi nus/_/
[\[73b.3\]]lce stong gis kyang [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]bshad par ni/_/rgyal ba kun gyi nus pa ci zhig smon/_/yon tan gcig la rgya cher bshad pa yang /_/lha dang 'jig rten thams cad rgya mtshor gyur/_/srid pa'i thog ma man chad kun chu gang /_/tshad gzung bar ni ba spu'i rtse mos nus/_/
[\[73b.4\]]bde bar gshegs pa'i yon tan gcig mi nus/_/bshad pa mchod pa bstod pa thams cad kyang /_/lus dang ngag yid dag ni dang ba ste/_/bdag gis bsod nams 'bras bu mchog gang bsags/_/de yis sems can rgyal ba thob par shog_/rgyal 
[\[73b.5\]]pos sangs rgyas de ltar bstod nas su/_/rgyal po smon lam 'di ltar 'debs par byed/_/ga la ga lar bdag skyes gyur pa na/_/ma 'ongs pa yi bskal pa mtha' med par/_/rnga 'di 'dra ba'i rmi lam mthong bar shog_/bshags pa 'di 'dra der ni thos 
[\[73b.6\]]par shog_/rgyal bstod pad+ma'i 'byung gnas 'di dang 'dra/_/skye ba brgyar yang de na thob par shog_/sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mnyam pa med/_/gang de bskal pa stong du dkon pa ste/_/de dag rmi lam du yang thos par shog_/de dag nyin mor 
[\[73b.7\]]gyur na bshad par bya/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni sems can dgrol/_/pha rol phyin pa drug ni rdzogs par bya/_/byang chub bla med phyi nas thob par shog_/dgra med zhing ni bdag gis thob par shog_/rnga rab byin pa'i rnam smin 'bras bu dang /_/
[\[74a\]]
[\[74a.1\]]rgyal ba thams cad bstod pa'i rgyu yi phyir/_/shAkya thub pa'i dbang po mngon mthong shog_/bdag gis lung bstan pa yang der thob shog_/gang 'di bdag gi bu pho gnyis po dag_/gser gyi dpung pa'i dbang dang gser gyi 'od/_/khye'u 
[\[74a.2\]]'di gnyis kyang de nas thob par shog_/byang chub bla na med pa'i lung bstan kyang /_/sems can gang dag skyabs dang dpung gnyen med/_/mgon med sdug bsngal song bar gyur pa dag_/ma 'ongs bskal pa kun tu de dag la/_/mgon dang skyabs 
[\[74a.3\]]dang dpung gnyen gyur par shog_/sdug bsngal 'byung ba zad par byed pa dang /_/bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog_/ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyad pa ni/_/de dag ji tsam thog ma'i mtha' yod par/_/gser 'od dam par bshags pa byas 
[\[74a.4\]]pas na/_/bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho skems par shog_/bdag gi rgya mtsho las ni byang bar shog_/bdag gi bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs par shog_/bdag gi ye shes rgya mtsho rnam dag shog_/ye shes dri ma med pa'i 'od rab kyis/_/yon tan 
[\[74a.5\]]kun gyi rgya mtshor 'gyur bar shog_/byang chub yon tan rin chen rdzogs par shog_/gser 'od bshags pa byas pa'i stobs kyis su/_/bdag gi bsod nams 'od ni thob par shog_/bdag gi byang chub rnam dag 'di thob shog_/dri med ye shes 
[\[74a.6\]]snang ba dam pa yi/_/bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni thob par shog_/bsod nams 'od ni lham mer gyur pas na/_/'jig rten gsum po kun gyi gtso bor shog_/bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang /_/
[\[74a.7\]]bde ba thams cad rgya mtsho 'dra ba dang /_/ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyod par shog_/ji tsam thog ma'i mthar ni gyur pa dang /_/'jig rten gsum na zhing mchog ci 'dra ba/_/rgyal ba kun gyi yon tan mtha' yas ldan/_/yon tan mtha' yas pa 
[\[74b\]]
[\[74b.1\]]yi zhing de 'dra/_/bdag gis ma 'ongs dus na thob par shog_/bzang dpal khyod kyis shes par gyis/_/gser dpung dbang po yul rgyal pos/_/smon lam 'di 'dra bskyed myong ba/_/de ni khyod kyi lus nyid yin/_/sngon gyi dus na bu gnyis yod/_/
[\[74b.2\]]gser gyi dpung dang gser gyi 'od/_/de ni dngul gzugs dngul 'od de/_/nga las lung bstan thob pa'o/_/phal mang pos bshad pa de thos nas kun gyis byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_da ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na yang 'gyod tshangs 'di spyod smon lam btab/_
[\[74b.3\]]gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las pad+ma lta bu'i dpes bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das 'khor mang po'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rab gnas la 
[\[74b.4\]]'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu gser rgyal ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs yod do/_/rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams mngon sum du mthong zhing bkur sti dang mchod pa byed 
[\[74b.5\]]par 'dod pas gzungs 'di yongs su gzung bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzungs 'di ni 'das pa dang ma byon pa dang da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pas so/_/de lta bas na gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par byed pa gang yin pa 
[\[74b.6\]]de ni bsod nams chen po dang ldan zhing 'das pa'i sangs rgyas tshad med pa rnams las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa deng yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ba yin no/_/tshul khrims yongs su dag pa mi zhig mi nyams shing thogs pa med pa dang gdon mi za bar chos zab mo'i slor 
[\[74b.7\]]'jug par 'gyur ba rig par bya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi sgrub pa'i cho ga bka' stsal pa/_sngar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de/_sems rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag byas nas/_de'i 'og tu sngags 
[\[75a\]]
[\[75a.1\]]gdon par bya'o/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang 'phags pa rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs 
[\[75a.2\]]rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang phyogs kyi sangs 
[\[75a.3\]]rgyas lha'i rnga sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yangs pa'i yon tan mang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yon tan snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[75a.4\]]kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun tu snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas spobs brtsegs rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rnam par rgyal ba'i pad+ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mnyam par gzigs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[75a.5\]]rin chen gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin chen bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dri ma med pa'i 'od zer la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas spobs rab dgongs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[75a.6\]]rnam dag zla ba'i 'od zer mtshan grags rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas me tog bkod pa'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas snang ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas legs 'od dri med grags pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs 
[\[75a.7\]]rgyas rtog pa 'jigs med dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bsnyengs pa mi mnga' ba'i grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras 
[\[75b\]]
[\[75b.1\]]gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa 
[\[75b.2\]]'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po lag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa'i yid la phyag 
[\[75b.3\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen po thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dge ba'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal 
[\[75b.4\]]lo/_/gzungs la/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_tat+ya thA/_ku Ti/_ku Ti ni/_i mi ri to/_ko Sha Ni i mi ri Ne/_i rI swA hA/_sangs rgyas kyis dge gnas byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/gzungs 'di dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi yum ste/_
[\[75b.5\]]rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig gis gzungs 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med mtha' med par skye bar 'gyur ro/_/grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti dang mchod pa dang btsun zhing bstod pa byas pa yin no/_/sangs 
[\[75b.6\]]rgyas de rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/dge gnas la la gzungs sngags 'di 'chang na gos dang /_zas dang /_nor bu dang /_rin po che dang /_mang du thos shing mkhas pa dang /_nad med cing tshe ring ba yid bzhin du 'thob ste/_bsod 
[\[75b.7\]]nams shin tu mang du 'phel lo/_/ji ltar smon cing sgrub po cog kyang yid bzhin du mi 'grub pa med do/_/dge gnas sngags 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin pa ni bla na med pa'i byang chub ma grub kyi bar du rtag par byang chub sems dpa' gser mkhar ri dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams 
[\[76a\]]
[\[76a.1\]]pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ma hA ping gal la sogs pa dang lhan cig gnas te/_
[\[76a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis srung bar byed do/_/dge gnas shes par gyis shig_/gzungs sngags 'di 'don pa'i tshe cho ga 'di ltar bya'o/_/thog mar khri rtsa brgyad tshang bar bton nas bsnyen pa'i cho ga bya'o/_/de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du dkyil 'khor brgyan 
[\[76a.3\]]nas tshes gcig gi nyin par khrus byas gos sar pa gyon bdug pa bsregs me tog bkram mchod pa sna tshogs dang kha zas kyis mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs pa byas te/_dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas thog mar sngar smos pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams 
[\[76a.4\]]kyi mtshan nas brjod de/_shin tu sems thag pa nas sngon gyi nyes pa 'gyod nas pus mo g.yas pa sa la btsugs te sngags stong rtsa brgyad rdzogs par 'don to/_/lus drang por 'dug ste ci la smon pa de la bsam mo/_/de nas nyi ma shar ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha 
[\[76a.5\]]zas gtsang ma za gcig tu bza'o/_/zhag bco lnga lon nas dkyil 'khor de nas de phyung na mi de bsod nams dang gzi brjid bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_smon cing sgrub bo cog mi 'grub pa med do/_/gal te yid bzhin du ma grub na yang dkyil 'khor der zhugs nas yid bzhin 
[\[76a.6\]]du ma grub phyin cad rtag par gdon cing mi brjed par bya'o/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las gser rgyal gyi gzungs kyi le'u ste brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags de bka' stsal nas byang chub 
[\[76a.7\]]sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_'khor mang po rnams la phan gdags shing de kho na nyid kyi don dam pa shin tu zab pa khong du chud par mdzad par bzhed pa'i phyir stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin yang bstan pa'i ched du tshigs su bcad de 
[\[76b\]]
[\[76b.1\]]bka' stsal pa/_nga yis mdo sde zab mo gzhan dag las/_yang dag stong nyid dam chos rgyas bshad pa/_deng 'dir mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las kyang /_stong nyid bsam gyis mi khyab mdo tsam bshad/_/zab mo'i chos ni rgya chen mang po la/_/sems can shes med rig par 
[\[76b.2\]]mi nus pas/_/de phyir ngas 'dir mdo 'di bstan pas na/_/stong pa'i chos ni rab tu rtogs par 'gyur/_/thugs rje chen pos sems can brtse ba'i phyir/_/shin tu thabs mkhas rgyu rkyen mchog dag gis/_/ngas deng 'khor 'dus chen po 'di nang du/_/bstan pas 
[\[76b.3\]]de dag stong don gsal rtogs 'gyur/_/lus 'di grong stong 'dra bar shes byas te/_/rgyal po drug gnas phan tshun yong mi shes/_/yul drug rkun po tha dad dbang gnas pa/_/so sor phan tshun mi shes de bzhin no/_/mig gi dbang po rtag par gzugs la lta/_/
[\[76b.4\]]rna ba'i dbang po sgra snyan rgyun mi 'chad/_/sna yi dbang pos rgyun du dri yul ma nom/_/lce yi dbang pos rtag par ro zhim myong /_/lus kyi dbang pos yang 'jam reg bya len/_/yid kyi dbang pos chos rig skyo mi shes/_/dbang po 'di drug dngos po'i rjes 'brang bas/_/so 
[\[76b.5\]]so rang yul dag pa rtog pa bskyed/_/rnam shes sgyu sprul 'dra bas yang dag min/_/dbang po gnas nas mi dben 'dod pas tshol/_/dper na mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa ltar/_/rnam shes drug po dbang gnas de bzhin no/_/sems ni kun tshol gnas kyi rjes su 
[\[76b.6\]]'jug_/dbang rten yul dmigs dngos po rnam rig pas/_/rtag par gzugs sgra dri ro reg la sred/_/chos la spyod pas skad cig tsam mi gnas/_/rkyen ni ji bzhin dbang drug kun rgyug pas/_/mkha' la bya 'phur thogs pa med par 'dra/_/dbang po rten byed 
[\[76b.7\]]de la ltos nas ni/_/phyi rol yul ni rnam par rig par nus/_/lus 'di shes med byed pa po yang med/_/rang bzhin mi brtan rkyen las ltos nas 'grub/_/yang dag ma yin rnam rtog las skyes pas/_/'khrul 'khor bzhin du las kyi dbang gis 'jug_/sa chu me 
[\[77a\]]
[\[77a.1\]]rlung lhan cig lus bsgrubs pas/_/rgyu rkyen ji bzhin tha dad 'bras bu thob/_/lhan cig gnas kyang phan tshun gnod byas pas/_/sbrul gdug bzhi po gzeb gcig gnas pa 'dra/_/'byung chen sbrul bzhi rang bzhin tha dad pas/_/lhan cig 
[\[77a.2\]]gnas kyang mtho dang dma' ba yod/_/steng 'og 'gro zhing lus ni kun du khyab/_/'di dag mthar ni zad pa'i chos su 'gro/_/sbrul gdug rnam pa bzhi po 'di dag las/_/sa chu sbrul gnyis phal cher thur du 'bying /_/me rlung sbrul gnyis rang bzhin yang bas 
[\[77a.3\]]na/_/mi mthun 'di dbang nad mang skye bar 'gyur/_/sems dang rnam shes lus 'di gnas nas ni/_/dge sdig las ni sna tshogs byed pas na/_/lha mi ngan 'gro gsum du song nas ni/_/las stobs ji bzhin lus ni len par byed/_/nad dang phrad nas lus ni 
[\[77a.4\]]shi ba'i 'og_/bshang gci mi gtsang thams cad kun tu gang /_/rul myags 'bus gtses blta bar yong mi mos/_/dur khrod bor nas shing rul 'dra bar 'gyur/_/khyod kyi chos rnams de ltar blta bar byos/_/ci phyir bdag dang sems can yod par 
[\[77a.5\]]'dzin/_/chos rnams thams cad 'dzad pas mi rtag ste/_/thams cad ma rig rkyen gyi mthu las byung /_/'byung chen de dag yang dag min pas na/_/yang dag yod min rang bzhin skye med pas/_/de phyir 'byung chen ngo bo stong par bshad/_/'di dag stong 
[\[77a.6\]]zhing yang dag min rig byos/_/ma rig rang bzhin gzod ma nyid kyis med/_/rkyen mang mthu ltos tshogs las yod pa min/_/dus rnams kun tu yang dag blos stong pas/_/de phyir nga yis ma rig yin par bshad/_/'du byed rnam shes rkyen byas ming 
[\[77a.7\]]gzugs yod/_/skye mched drug dang reg tshor rjes su skye/_/sred len srid skye rga shi bskyed pas na/_/mya ngan smre sngags 'khrug pa rjes su 'brang /_/sdug bsngal sna tshogs las ngan rtag dkris gzer/_/'khor bar 'khor ba dag la tshad dus med/_/rang 
[\[77b\]]
[\[77b.1\]]bzhin yod min ngo bo nyid stong yang /_/tshul bzhin ma yin rnam par rtog pa bskyed/_/nga yis nyon mongs thams cad rab spangs nas/_/rtag par yang dag ye shes mngon rgyu bas/_/lnga phung khang khyim thams cad stong rtogs nas/_/byang chub yang dag gnas ni btsal 
[\[77b.2\]]ba yin/_/nga yis bdud rtsi grong chen sgo phye nas/_/gya nom bdud rtsi snod ni bstan pa yin/_/yang dag bdud rtsi ro ni brnyes nas kyang /_/rtag par bdud rtsi skye dgu sbyin pa btang /_/ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs/_/ngas ni chos kyi dung chen mchog 
[\[77b.3\]]kyang bus/_/ngas ni chos kyi sgron chen rab kyang sbar/_/ngas ni chos kyi char chen dam pa phab/_/nyon mongs dgra rnams rab tu pham byas te/_/bla med chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng /_/'khor ba'i mtsho las skye dgu rmongs pa bzlas/_/nga yis ngan 'gro 
[\[77b.4\]]gsum gyi sgo yang bcad/_/nyon mongs 'bar mes sems can rab bsregs te/_/mgon dang skyabs byed med pa dag la ni/_/rab bsil bdud rtsi'i de dag tshim byas nas/_/lus dang sems kyi gdung ba zhi bar byas/_/des na ngas ni bskal pa tshad med snyed/_/
[\[77b.5\]]de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la gus mchod byas/_/tshul khrims rab bsrungs byang chub gzhol nas ni/_/chos sku bde ba'i gnas su btsal ba yin/_/gzhan la mig dang rkang lag rna ba dang /_/bu dang chung ma bran btang phangs pa med/_/nor dang rin chen 
[\[77b.6\]]bdun gyi rgyan phreng dag_/slong ba dag la thams cad yongs su btang /_/bzod sogs pha rol phyin pa kun bsgoms pas/_/sa bcu yongs rdzogs yang dag mngon sangs rgyas/_/de phyir nga ni thams cad mkhyen brjod kyang /_/sems can gang yang gzhal bar nus pa med/_/
[\[77b.7\]]gal te stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten khams/_/sa chen 'di las skyes pa'i dngos rnams dang /_/nags tshal ljon shing sA lu til rnams dang /_/'od ma la sogs yal ga ji snyed pa/_/'di la sogs pa'i dngos po bcad gtubs te/_thams cad rdul phran phye mar byas 
[\[78a\]]
[\[78a.1\]]pa dag_/gang ni bsdus spungs tshad ni shes dka' dang /_/de bzhin nam mkha'i khams ni gang ba yi/_/phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams dag ni thams cad na/_/stong gsum stong chen 'jig rten ji snyed pa'i/_/sa rnams rdul gyi phye mar byas gyur na/_/
[\[78a.2\]]rdul gyi tshad ni bgrang bar mi nus pas/_/sems can thams cad shes pa ci yod pa/_/shes pa de kun mi gcig rab byin nas/_/'di ltar de yi shes pa tshad med pas/_/rdul phran de yi grangs ni shes rung yang /_/bcom ldan thub pas skad cig gang mkhyen pa/_/
[\[78a.3\]]shes ldan de dag lhan cig gzhal bcug na/_/bskal pa bye ba mang po'i grangs snyed du/_/[{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam yang brtsi zhing shes mi nus/_/de'i tshe 'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin zab mo 'di lta bu bkas bshad pa thos pa dang /_
[\[78a.4\]]sems can tshad med pa snyed 'byung ba chen po bzhi dang /_phung po lnga po dag rang bzhin nyid kyis stong pa dang /_dbang po drug dang yul drug po dag yang dag pa ma yin pas 'ching ba bskyed par mngon par rtogs par gyur nas/_'khor ba yongs su spangs te/_nges par 
[\[78a.5\]]'byung ba yang dag par sgrub par smon lam btab nas shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis rab tu dga' bar gyur pas ji skad bstan pa bzhin du gus pas spyod par gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde'i rgyal po las stong pa nyid kyi rang bzhin bstan 
[\[78a.6\]]pa'i le'u ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas lha'i bu mo yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro 'khor mang po'i nang du chos zab mo thos pas dga' mgu rangs par gyur nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te 
[\[78a.7\]]gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis don gyi tshul zab mo dag la rnal 'byor bsgoms pa'i chos gang lags pa bkas bshad du ci gnang zhes gsol nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_bdag gis 'jig 
[\[78b\]]
[\[78b.1\]]rten snang mdzad dang /_/rkang gnyis gtso bo mchog la ni/_/byang chub sems dpa' yang dag spyod/_/zhu na thugs rjes gnang bar smon/_/bcom ldan rigs kyi lha mo la/_/gal te the tsom yod gyur na/_/khyod kyis yid bzhin zhus shig dang /_/rnam phye bstan pa 
[\[78b.2\]]bya zhes gsungs/_/de nas lha mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/byang chub sems dpa' ji lta bur/_/byang chub yang dag spyad spyod na/_/bdag dang gzhan la sman slad du/_/'khor ba mya ngan 'das spangs 'gyur/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs 
[\[78b.3\]]kyi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/_chos kyi dbyings la brten te byang chub kyi chos spyad nas mnyam pa nyid kyi chos spyod pa bsgom par bya'o/_/ji ltar chos kyi dbyings la brten te byang chub kyi chos la spyad nas mnyam pa nyid kyi spyod pa bsgom par bya zhe na/_'di ltar phung po lnga po dag gis 
[\[78b.4\]]chos kyi dbyings ston par byas pas chos kyi dbyings gang yin pa de nyid phung po lnga yin yang phung po lnga yang brjod du med la phung po lnga ma yin pa yang brjod du med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te chos kyi dbyings phung po lnga yin par gyur na ni chad pa'i lta bar 'gyur la/_gal te 
[\[78b.5\]]phung po lnga dang tha dad par gyur na ni rtag pa'i lta bar 'gyur bas mtshan nyid gnyis dang bral ba/_mtha' gnyis la mngon par ma chags pa/_bltar med pa/_blta bar bya ba las yang dag par 'das pa/_ming med pa/_mtshan ma med pa gang yin pa de ni chos kyi dbyings bstan 
[\[78b.6\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi lha mo ji ltar phung po lnga po dag gis chos kyi dbyings ston par byed ce na/_'di ltar phung po lnga dag ni rgyu dang rkyen las skye ba ma yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te rgyu dang rkyen las skyes pa zhig yin par gyur na skyes zin pa'i phyir skye 'am/_ma skyes 
[\[78b.7\]]pa'i phyir skye/_gal te skyes zin pa zhig yin na ni rgyu dang rkyen dgos pa ci zhig yod/_gal te ma skyes pa zhig skye na ni nams kyang skye ba dmigs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ma skyes pa'i chos gang yin pa de ni yod pa ma yin pa ming med pa mtshan ma med pa 
[\[79a\]]
[\[79a.1\]]dgag par bya ba ma yin pa dper byar mi rung ba/_rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed par bya ba ma yin pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi lha mo 'di lta ste/_dper na rnga'i sgra gang yin pa de ni shing la yang brten/_ko ba dang dbyug gu dang lag pa la sogs pa la brten pa'i phyir sgra 
[\[79a.2\]]'byung bar 'gyur yang 'di ltar rnga'i sgra gang yin pa de ni 'das pa yang stong /_ma 'ongs pa yang stong /_da ltar byung ba yang stong ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rnga'i sgra gang yin pa de ni shing las kyang mi 'byung /_ko ba las kyang mi 'byung /_dbyug gu dang lag pa las kyang mi 
[\[79a.3\]]'byung /_dus gsum las kyang mi 'byung bas de ni ma skyes pa'o/_/ma skyes pa gang yin pa de ni 'gag par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/'gag par mi 'gyur ba gang yin pa de ni gang nas kyang mi 'ong ngo /_/gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de ni gang du yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur ro/_/
[\[79a.4\]]gang du yang 'gro ba med pa gang yin pa de ni rtag par yang ma yin/_/chad par yang ma yin no/_/rtag par yang ma yin chad par yang ma yin pa gang yin pa de ni gcig pa yang ma yin tha dad pa yang ma yin pas so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te 'di gcig pa zhig yin na 
[\[79a.5\]]ni chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad par 'gyur ro/_/gal te de lta yin na ni so so'i skye bo rnams kyang yang dag pa'i bden pa mthong nas bla na med pa yang dag pa'i bden pa dang ldan pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa thob par 'gyur ba'i rigs na/_de lta ma yin pas de'i phyir gcig pa yang 
[\[79a.6\]]ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/gal te tha dad do zhe na/_sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'du byed kyi mtshan nyid thams cad kyang mngon par zhen pa dang bcas pa yin pas nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba las rnam par grol bar mi 'gyur zhing bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[79a.7\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'phags pa'i gang zag thams cad ni 'du byed dang 'du byed ma yin pa dag la yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid du mnyam par rtogs pas de'i phyir tha dad pa yang ma yin te/_de lta 
[\[79b\]]
[\[79b.1\]]bas na phung po lnga po dag ni yod pa ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin/_rgyu dang rkyen las ma skyes pa/_rgyu dang rkyen med pa las skyes pa yang ma yin par rig par bya'o/_/'phags pas shes par bya ba yin gyi gzhan gyi spyod yul ma yin pa'i phyir tshig dang tha snyad kyis rig par mi 
[\[79b.2\]]'gyur ba/_ming med pa/_mtshan ma med pa/_rgyu med pa/_rkyen med pa/_dpe med pa/_thog ma dang tha ma med par rab tu dben pa/_gzod ma nyid nas rang bzhin gyis stong pa yin pas de'i phyir phung po lnga po dag gis chos kyi dbyings ston par nus pa yin no/_/rigs 
[\[79b.3\]]kyi lha mo rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub yongs su gnyer bar 'dod pas don dam pa dang kun rdzob las gud na yongs su tshol bar byed na de ni shin tu dpag cing bsam par dka' ba yin te/_so so'i skye bo 
[\[79b.4\]]dang 'phags pa'i spyod yul gyi ngo bo nyid ni gcig pa yang ma yin/_tha dad pa yang ma yin pas kun rdzob kyang mi spong la don dam pa dang yang mi 'bral bar chos kyi dbyings la brten nas byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad par bya'o/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' 
[\[79b.5\]]stsal pa dang /_rigs kyi lha mo dga' mgu rangs par gyur nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas sems rtse gcig tu mgo bos phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[79b.6\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gong du ji skad bka' stsal pa'i byang chub kyi yang dag pa'i don la spyod pa gang lags pa de dag la deng bdag gis bslab par bgyi'o/_/de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos 'khor mang po'i 
[\[79b.7\]]nang du lha mo yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces smras so/_/byang chub kyi spyod pa 'di ni shin tu bsgrub par dka' ba yin na/_deng khyed kyis ji ltar byang chub kyi spyod pa la rang dbang thob par 'gyur/_de nas rigs kyi lha mos tshangs pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[80a\]]
[\[80a.1\]]kye tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad gsungs pa ltar na 'di ni yang dag par shin tu zab pa yin pas so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis de'i don shes par mi 'gyur gyi 'di ni 'phags pa'i spyod yul yin pas shin tu gya nom zhing shes par dka' 
[\[80a.2\]]ba yin no/_/gal te deng bdag gis chos 'di la brten nas bde bar gnas par thob pa bden te mi rdzun par gyur na dus ngan pa'i snyigs ma lnga'i sems can tshad med grangs med/_mtha' med pa thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu gyur nas mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan te 
[\[80a.3\]]skyes pa yang ma yin bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug ste bde ba tshad med pa myong ba dang /_lha'i me tog dam pa'i char mngon par 'bab pa dang /_lha'i rol mo'i cha byad rnams ma dkrol bar rang sgra 'byung ba dang /_mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad phun 
[\[80a.4\]]sum tshogs par gyur cig_/ces de'i tshe rigs kyi lha mos de skad ces smras ma thag tu dus ngan pa'i snyigs ma lnga'i sems can ji snyed pa thams cad gser gyi kha dog tu gyur nas skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan te skyes pa yang ma yin bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas rin po 
[\[80a.5\]]che'i pad+ma la 'dug ste bde ba tshad med pa dag la longs spyod par gyur pas gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i gzhal med khang ji lta ba bzhin du ngan 'gro rnams kyang med de/_rin po che'i ljon shing phred du dkris shing rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gis 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu 
[\[80a.6\]]gang bar gyur to/_/gzhan yang lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi me tog gi char yang mngon par phab/_lha'i rol mo rnams kyang byas te/_rigs kyi lha mo yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro yang bud med kyi lus yongs su bsgyur nas tshangs pa'i lha'i lus su gyur to/_/de nas tshangs pa'i 
[\[80a.7\]]rgyal po chen pos byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod ji ltar byang chub kyi spyad pa yongs su spyod par byed/_smras pa/_kye tshangs pa'i rgyal po gal te chu'i zla ba byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed na bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa 
[\[80b\]]
[\[80b.1\]]spyod par byed do/_/gal te rmi lam byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed na bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed do/_/gal te smig rgyu byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed na bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed do/_/gal te lung pa'i brag cha byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed 
[\[80b.2\]]na bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod par byed do/_/de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos de skad ces smras pa thos pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod don gang la brten nas tshig 'di skad smra bar byed/_smras pa/_kye tshangs pa'i rgyal po 
[\[80b.3\]]chos gcig 'ga' tsam yang de kho na nyid kyi mtshan nyid ma yin pa med mod kyi 'on kyang rgyu dang rkyen gyi dbang gis mngon par grub pa yin no/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te de lta bu yin par gyur na 'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyang bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[80b.4\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i rigs so/_/smras pa/_khyod ci la bsams te 'di skad du smra bar byed/_ci gti mug dang ldan pa'i gang zag kyang tha dad/_shes rab dang ldan pa'i gang zag kyang tha dad/_byang chub kyang tha dad/_byang chub ma 
[\[80b.5\]]yin pa yang tha dad/_rnam par grol ba yang tha dad/_rnam par grol ba ma yin pa yang tha dad pa zhig yin snyam mam/_tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'di ltar chos rnams ni mnyam zhing tha dad pa med de/_chos kyi dbyings 'di la de bzhin nyid tha dad par 'gyur ba med pas mngon par 
[\[80b.6\]]zhen par bya ba'i bar zhes bya ba yang med de 'phel ba med cing 'grib pa med par 'gyur ba yin no/_/kye tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'di lta ste dper na sgyu ma mkhan nam/_sgyu ma mkhan gyi slob ma sgyu ma ston pa la shin tu mkhas pa zhig gis lam gyi bzhi mdor gseg ma dang rtswa dang shing gi 
[\[80b.7\]]lo ma la sogs pa blangs te phung po gcig tu spungs nas sgyu rtsal rnams kyis glang po che'i tshogs dang /_rta'i tshogs dang /_shing rta dang /_dmag la sogs pa'i tshogs dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang /_bang mdzod rnam pa sna tshogs skye bo mang po rnams kyis 
[\[81a\]]
[\[81a.1\]]mthong bar 'gyur ba mngon par sprul par gyur na sems can gang dag glen zhing gti mug can du gyur pa/_dpyod par mi nus pa/_sgyu ma'i rtsa ba mi shes pa dag gis mthong zhing thos par gyur na/_'di snyam du bdag gis mthong zhing thos pa'i glang po che dang rta la 
[\[81a.2\]]sogs pa'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag ni yang dag par yod pa yin gyi/_gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa yin no snyam du sems pas phyis legs par so sor rtog cing sems pa yang med do/_/gang blo dang ldan pa dag ni de lta ma yin te/_sgyu ma'i rtsa ba rab tu shes pas gal te mthong 
[\[81a.3\]]ngam thos par gyur na yang 'di snyam du bdag gis ji ltar mthong ba'i glang po che dang /_rta la sogs pa'i tshogs gang yin pa de dag ni yod pa ma yin gyi sgyu ma'i dngos po mig slu bar byed pa tsam zhig yod par zad de/_mi bden pas glang po che la sogs pa dang bang mdzod 
[\[81a.4\]]rnams yod do snyam du mi sems pas ming tsam zhig yod par zad kyi yang dag par ni ci yang med do snyam du sems pas bdag nyid kyis ji ltar mthong zhing thos pa de dag la yang yang dag pa nyid du 'dzin par yang mi byed la/_phyis dpyod cing sems pa'i tshe yang yang dag 
[\[81a.5\]]pa ma yin par rab tu shes par 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du blo dang ldan pa dag gis kyang chos thams cad la yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid med par rtogs pas kun rdzob kyi rjes su ji ltar mthong ba dang /_ji ltar thos pa bzhin du dngos po ston cing rjod par byed kyi bden pa'i tshul 
[\[81a.6\]]yid la byed pa'i tshe ni de lta ma yin te/_btags pa tsam du yang dag pa'i don rab tu ston par byed pa'i phyir ro/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal po byis pa so so'i skye bo 'jig rten las 'das pa'i 'phags pa'i shes rab kyi mig ma thob pa dag ni chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid 
[\[81a.7\]]brjod du med pa mi shes pa'i phyir byis pa so so'i skye bo dag 'du byed dang 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos mthong ngam thos par gyur na 'di ltar yang dag par yod pa yin no snyam du bsams nas mngon par zhen pa bskyed nas don dam par chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med 
[\[81b\]]
[\[81b.1\]]pa yin par mi shes so/_/'phags pa'i gang zag gang yin pa de dag ni 'du byed dang /_'du byed ma yin pa'i chos mthong ngam thos par gyur na ci nus ci lcogs kyis yang dag par yod pa yin no snyam du mngon par zhen pa skyed par mi byed pas thams cad du yang dag 
[\[81b.2\]]pa'i 'du byed kyi chos dang yang dag pa'i 'du byed ma yin pa'i chos med kyi mi bden pas bsams pa'i 'du byed dang /_'du byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid gang yin pa de dag ni ming tsam zhig yod pas yang dag pa'i ngo bo nyid ci yang med do snyam du rig cing khong du chud par 
[\[81b.3\]]gyur kyang 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag kun rdzob kyi rjes su gzhan dag yang dag pa'i don rtogs par bya bar 'dod pa'i phyir yang dag par ston par byed pa yin no/_/de bzhin du tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'phags pa'i gang zag de dag kyang 'phags pa'i shes pa dang mthong bas 
[\[81b.4\]]chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med par rtogs par gyur kyang 'du byed dang /_'du byed ma yin pa'i chos 'di ltar gzhan dag rtogs par bya ba'i phyir kun rdzob kyi ming dang tha snyad rnam pa sna tshogs ston par byed pa yin no/_/de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen pos 
[\[81b.5\]]byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces smras so/_/sems can ji snyed cig gis yang dag pa'i chos zab mo 'di lta bu khong du chud par 'gyur/_smras pa/_kye tshangs pa'i rgyal po sgyu ma'i skyes bu mang po'i sems dang sems las byung 
[\[81b.6\]]ba'i chos kyis yang dag pa'i chos zab mo 'di lta bu khong du chud par 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/_sgyu mas sprul pa'i skyes bu gang yin pa de dag ni ngo bo nyid kyis yod pa ma yin na/_'di dag gi sems dang sems las byung ba gang las skyes par 'gyur/_
[\[81b.7\]]smras pa/_gang gis chos kyi dbyings yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin par shes pa'i sems can de dag gis don zab mo 'di shes par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la tshangs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[82a\]]
[\[82a.1\]]'das byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pas don zab mo 'di lta bu mngon par rtogs par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_tshangs pa'i rgyal po khyod 
[\[82a.2\]]kyis ji skad smras pa de bzhin du yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro 'dis bstan nas khyed mi skye ba'i chos kyi bzod pa sgom zhing bslab par sems bskyed pa yin no/_/de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po tshangs pa'i 'khor mang po dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la 
[\[82a.3\]]gzar nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro'i rkang pa la mgo bos phyag byas nas 'di skad du shin tu dkon zhing ngo mtshar che'o/_/bdag cag ni deng skyes bu chen po 'di dang phrad pas yang dag pa'i chos thos par gyur to/_/zhes smras so/_/
[\[82a.4\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i rgyal po la 'di skad ces yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ni ma 'ongs pa na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_
[\[82a.5\]]bla na med pa'i skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen 'bar ba dpal gyi snying po zhes bya bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/le'u 'di bstan pa na byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag sum stong bla na med pa yang dag 
[\[82a.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa thob par gyur to/_/lha'i bu 'bum phrag brgyad stong dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_mi phal pa tshad med grangs med pa snyed ni rdul spangs shing dri ma dang bral nas chos kyi mig rnam par dag pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[82a.7\]]de'i tshe 'khor mang po de'i nang nas dge slong 'bum phrag lnga bcu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa las byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog pa rnams byang chub sems dpa' yid bzhin rin chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa thos pas thams cad shin tu brtan par gyur 
[\[82b\]]
[\[82b.1\]]nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i smon lam mchog yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur bas yang byang chub tu sems bskyed nas/_so so nas rang gi gos phud de byang chub sems dpa' la mchod pa byas nas mchog tu brtson pa'i sems bla na med pa bskyed de/_smon lam 'di skad du bdag 
[\[82b.2\]]cag bsod nams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ci bsags pa thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yongs su bsngo'o/_/zhes smon lam btab bo/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal po dge slong mang po 'di dag ni bsod nams 'di la brten nas ji skad bstan 
[\[82b.3\]]pa bzhin du mngon par bsgrubs pas bskal pa chen po dgu bcu 'das nas khong du chud cing go bar 'gyur bas 'khor ba las nges par 'byang bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong mang po de dag la khyed bskal pa grangs med pa sum cu 'das nas mngon 
[\[82b.4\]]par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_bskal pa'i ming ni rgyal bar dka' ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya'o/_/zhing gi ming ni dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ste/_dus gcig tu bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas 
[\[82b.5\]]thams cad ming mthun par smon lam gyi bkod pas brgyan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya bar 'gyur zhing mtshan rnam pa bcu dang ldan par 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di gang gis yang dag par mnyan nas 
[\[82b.6\]]yongs su 'dzin par byed na gzi byin chen po'i stobs dang ldan par 'gyur bas gang la la zhig gis bskal pa chen po brgya stong du ma'i bar du thabs dang mi ldan par pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su spyad pa las rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gser 
[\[82b.7\]]'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di yi ger bris nas zla ba phyed phyed cing sems rtse gcig tu klog gam/_kha ton du 'don par byed na 'di'i bsod nams gang yin pa de snga ma'i bsod nams dang bskrun na brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas bgrang ba dang dpe dang rgyu'i bar du yang nye bar 
[\[83a\]]
[\[83a.1\]]mi 'gro'o/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal po de'i phyir ngas deng khyod kyis bslab par bya zhing dran pa yongs su bzung nas gzhan dag la rgya cher bstan par bya'o zhes bstan pa yin no/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su spyad pa na ji ltar 
[\[83a.2\]]dpa' bo g.yul ngor 'jug pa bzhin du lus dang srog la phangs pa med par 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di yongs su spel zhing yang dag par bzung bklags kha ton du bton nas gzhan dag la yang dag par bstan te tshangs pa'i rgyal po 'di lta ste dper na 'khor los 
[\[83a.3\]]sgyur ba'i rgyal po gal te 'jig rten na 'dug par gyur na rin po che sna bdun yang nub par mi 'gyur la/_gal te rgyal po tshe zad par gyur na rin po che sna bdun yod pa dag kyang de nyid du nub cing zad par 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal po de bzhin du gser 'od dam pa mchog 
[\[83a.4\]]tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di gal te 'jig rten na gnas par gyur na ni bla na med pa'i chos kyi rin po che rnams kyang nub par mi 'gyur la/_gal te mdo sde 'di med par gyur na ni gnas de nyid du nub par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di sems rtse 
[\[83a.5\]]gcig tu mnyan nas yongs su gzung bar bya/_bklag par bya/_kha ton du gdon par bya/_gzhan dag la bstan par bya zhing yi ger 'dri bar bskul nas brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa spyad de/_lus dang srog la yang phangs pa med par rab tu brtson par byed na bsod nams 
[\[83a.6\]]kyi nang na mchog tu 'gyur bas nga'i slob ma rnams kyis de bzhin du rab tu brtson pas rnal 'byor bsgom par bslab par bya'o/_/de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po tshangs pa'i 'khor tshad med pa snyed dang /_brgya byin dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang lhan 
[\[83a.7\]]cig tu stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis gser 'od dam 
[\[83b\]]
[\[83b.1\]]pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde 'di dang /_chos 'chad pa'i mkhan po gang lags pa de dag yongs su bsrung zhing spel bar bgyid la/_gal te bgegs bgyid pa zhig mchis na yang bdag cag gis yongs su bsal nas dge ba mang po dang ldan pa dang /_kha 
[\[83b.2\]]dog dang /_mthu stobs dang ldan pa dang /_spobs pa la thogs pa ma mchis pa dang /_lus dang sems bag yangs su 'gyur ba dang /_nyan pa'i 'khor rnams bde ba myong bar bgyid do/_/yul gang na gnas pa der mu ge dang /_phyir rgol ba'i dgra dang /_mi 
[\[83b.3\]]ma lags pa dag gis 'tshe zhing gnod pa bgyid par gyur na/_bdag cag lha'i 'khor rnams kyis yongs su bsrungs nas skye bo rnams bde skyid cing longs spyod rgyas pa dang /_glo bur gyi gnod pa rnams ma mchis par bgyid de/_'di dag thams cad kyang bdag 
[\[83b.4\]]cag dang lha'i 'khor rnams kyi mthu lags so/_/gang la la zhig gis mdo sde 'di la mchod pa bgyis na bdag cag kyang sangs rgyas ji lta ba bzhin du tha dad pa ma mchis pa'i bsam pas bkur sti dang mchod pa bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen 
[\[83b.5\]]po dang /_tshangs pa'i 'khor rnams nas rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa'i bar dag la bka' stsal pa legs so legs so/_/khyed kyis chos zab mo gya nom pa thos nas mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di dang mdo sde 'dzin pa dag la yongs su bsrungs shing yongs su 
[\[83b.6\]]bskyabs pas bsod nams khyad par du 'phags pa mtha' med pa snyed thob nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas de'i tshe tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pas bcom ldan 'das kyis de 
[\[83b.7\]]skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas rab tu dga' ste spyi bos blangs par gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las stong pa nyid la brten nas smon lam yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//
[\[84a\]]
[\[84a.1\]]de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_lha'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang /_lha'i rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang /_lha'i rgyal po mig mi bzang cig char stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_
[\[84a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni sangs rgyas thams cad kyis 
[\[84a.3\]]rtag par dgongs shing gzigs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bkur sti bgyis pa/_lha dang klu thams cad kyis rtag par mchod pa/_lha'i 'khor rnams kyis rtag par dga' ba skyed pa/_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis rtag par bsngags pa brjod pa/_
[\[84a.4\]]nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/_lha'i gzhal med khang thams cad gsal bar bgyid pa/_sems can thams cad la khyad par du 'phags pa'i bde ba stsol ba/_sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi 'gro 
[\[84a.5\]]ba rnams kyi sdug bsngal nye bar zhi bar bgyid pa/_'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad rab tu sel ba/_phas kyi dgra thams cad phyir zlog par bgyid pa/_mu ge'i dus ngan pa'i tshe lo legs par bgyid pa/_rims nad kyi sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar bgyid pa/_
[\[84a.6\]]ltas ngan pa thams cad dang /_sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa brgya stong rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni 'di lta bu'i bde ba stsol cing bdag cag la yang sman par bgyid pa lags na/_bcom 
[\[84a.7\]]ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du rgya cher bkas bshad du gsol/_bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 'khor dang bcas pas bla na ma mchis pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi ro 'di thos par gyur na mthu stobs dang ldan zhing gzi byin 'phel ba dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan zhing dpa' 
[\[84b\]]
[\[84b.1\]]bar 'gyur ba dang /_rdzu 'phrul yang ches lhag cing khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi yang chos yang dag pa mngon par sgrub cing rtag par yang dag pa'i chos bstan nas chos kyis [(]'jin [,]'jig [)]rten 'dul bar bgyid pas 
[\[84b.2\]]bdag cag gis lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_grul bum dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po dag dang /_mi'i rgyal po rnams kyang rtag par yang dag pa'i chos kyis 'jig rten 'dul ba la dgod par
