[\[84b.3\]]bgyid pas sdig pa rnams 'gog cing yongs su sel bar bgyid do/_/mi'i mdangs 'phrog par bgyid pa'i 'dre srin byams pa dang snying rje ma mchis pa ci mchis pa thams cad kyang thag ring du mchi bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po bzhi yang 
[\[84b.4\]]gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_gnod sbyin brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed dang bcas pas lha'i mig rnam par dag pa mi las yang dag par 'das pas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir lta bar bgyid cing yongs su bskyab pa dang yongs su bsrung bar bgyid de/_bcom ldan 
[\[84b.5\]]'das rgyu dang rkyen des na bdag cag rgyal po rnams kyang 'jig rten skyong ba zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/gzhan yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yul gyi rgyal po gang la la zhig la phas kyi rgol ba'i dgra rnams rtag par nye bar mchis te gnod pa bgyis par gyur tam/_mu ge dang rims nad 
[\[84b.6\]]mang pos gnod par gyur tam/_ltas ngan gyi dngos po brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed byung bar gyur na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la bkur sti dang mchod pa bgyid pa'i dge slong chos 
[\[84b.7\]]smra ba gang la la mdo sde 'di len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog cing kun chub ba zhig mchis par gyur na bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi de'i thad du mchis te go bar bgyis nas de la skul zhing gsol ba 'debs par bgyid de/_chos smra ba de yang bdag cag gi rdzu 'phrul gyis go bar 
[\[85a\]]
[\[85a.1\]]bgyis pa'i mthus yul khams der mchis nas gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di rgya cher yang dag par spel bar bgyid pas mdo sde 'di'i mthus gnod pa dang /_ltas ngan gyi dngos po brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa de dag thams cad nye bar 
[\[85a.2\]]zhi zhing yongs su sel bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba yul der mchis par gyur na mdo sde 'di yang yul der gshegs par rig par bgyi lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[85a.3\]]de'i tshe yul de'i rgyal po de chos smra ba'i thad du mchis nas des chos bstan pa gang lags pa mnyan par bgyi'o/_/thos nas kyang rab tu dga' bas chos smra ba de la bkur sti dang /_mchod pa dang /_rim gro bgyis te/_shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas yongs su bsrungs nas mya ngan 
[\[85a.4\]]dang gnod pa ma mchis par bgyis te/_mdo sde 'di yang dag par bstan nas thams cad la phan gdags par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen des na bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi po thams cad sems rtse gcig tu mi'i rgyal po de dang /_yul gyi mi thams cad yongs su 
[\[85a.5\]]bsrungs nas gnod pa rnams spong zhing rtag par bde ba la 'god par bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa zhig mchis par gyur na de'i tshe mi'i 
[\[85a.6\]]rgyal po des ci dang ci 'tshal ba sbyar te/_mchod pa bgyis nas phongs pa ma mchis par bgyid par gyur na bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis yul gyi bdag po de dang yul gyi mi thams cad rab tu bde bar bgyid cing gnod pa rnams thag ring du spong bar bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[85a.7\]]gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton du 'don par bgyis pa la mi'i rgyal po des mchod pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_bla mar bgyis te bsngags pa brjod par bgyid na bdag cag rgyal po de rgyal po rnams kyi nang na mchog tu btsun pa 
[\[85b\]]
[\[85b.1\]]dang gus pas bla mar bgyis pas yul gyi rgyal po gzhan rnams kyis kyang bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro/_/'khor mang po rnams de skad ces thos pa dang rab tu dga' bas yongs su 'dzin par gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las 
[\[85b.2\]]rgyal po chen po bzhis lha dang mi rnams la blta zhing brtag pa'i le'u ste bcu gcig pa'o//_//gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po/_bam po drug pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis gser 'od dam 
[\[85b.3\]]pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde la bkur sti dang /_mchod pa byas pa dang /_mdo sde 'dzin pa dag la yongs su skyob pa dang /_yongs su srung bar byed pa gsan pa dang /_legs so legs so/_/zhes bsngags pa brjod nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po khyed cag ni 'das 
[\[85b.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa snyed la bkur sti dang /_rim gro dang /_mchod pa dang /_bla mar byas nas bsngags pa brjod de dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa dang /_yang dag pa'i chos mngon par bsgrubs nas rtag par yang dag pa'i chos bstan te/_'di 
[\[85b.5\]]ltar chos kyis 'jig rten 'dul ba yin pas khyed cag yun ring po nas sems can rnams la rtag par phan 'dogs shing byams pa chen po'i sems bskyed nas bde ba sbyin par smon pa'i rgyu dang rkyen des na khyed cag da ltar rnam par smin pa mchog la longs spyod pa yin no/_/
[\[85b.6\]]mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba'i mdo sde 'di la bkur sti byas nas mchod pa byed pa zhig yod na khyed kyis nan tan bskyed de yongs su bsrungs nas bde ba 'thob par bya'o/_/khyed cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_'khor gzhan 
[\[85b.7\]]rnams dang /_gnod sbyin brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa snyed kyis mdo sde 'di yongs su srung bar byed na des 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang dag pa'i chos yongs su bsrung bar 'gyur bas khyed cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 
[\[86a\]]
[\[86a.1\]]dang /_lha'i 'khor gzhan rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams dang /_lha ma yin dang 'thab pa'i tshe rtag tu rgyal ba'i phan yon 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/khyed cag mdo sde 'di yongs su bsrung zhing yongs su 'dzin par byed na mdo sde 'di'i mthus sdug bsngal mang po 
[\[86a.2\]]dang /_phyir rgol ba'i dgra dang /_mu ge dang /_nad dang /_rims nad thams cad rab tu zhi zhing yongs su sel bar byed pas de'i phyir khyed kyis gal te 'khor bzhi po dag mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton du 'don pa mthong bar gyur na rab tu 
[\[86a.3\]]brtson pa'i sems kyis yongs su bsrungs nas gnod pa bsal te bde ba sbyin par bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di 
[\[86a.4\]]skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di slad ma'i dus kyi tshe yul lam/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_ri'am/_nags tshal lam/_'brog dgon pa'i gnas gang yang rung ba dag tu yongs su spel zhing 
[\[86a.5\]]gnas par gyur pa na/_yul de'i rgyal pos mdo sde 'di sems rtse gcig tu mnyan nas yongs su bzung ste bsngags pa brjod nas mchod par bgyid pa dang /_mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la yo byad sbyar te mchod pa bgyis nas shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis yongs su 
[\[86a.6\]]bsrungs te gnod cing mi bde ba dag yongs su spong bar bgyid na/_rgyu dang rkyen des bdag cag rgyal po de dang mi mang po rnams yongs su bsrungs nas bde ba la bkod de/_mya ngan dang /_sdug bsngal rnams thag ring du spangs nas tshe 'phel ba dang /_gzi byin phun sum tshogs par 
[\[86a.7\]]bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das yul gyi rgyal po des 'khor bzhi po dag mdo sde 'di yongs su 'dzin pa mthong nas gus pas yongs su bsrungs te pha ma bzhin du ci 'tshal ba thams cad sbyar te mchod par bgyid na/_bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis rtag par yongs su bsrungs 
[\[86b\]]
[\[86b.1\]]nas sems can mang po kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur bar bgyid pas/_de'i slad du bdag cag gnod sbyin dang 'dre srin tshad ma mchis pa dang bcas par mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di gang du spel ba'i gnas der lus sbas nas yongs su skyob pa dang /_yongs su srung ba bgyid pas bgegs rnams 
[\[86b.2\]]dang bral bar 'gyur ro/_/mdo sde 'di nyan pa'i gang zag dang rgyal po la sogs pa la yang yongs su srung zhing rjes su dran par bgyid pas gnod pa yongs su bsal nas bde ba la 'god pa dang /_phyogs gzhan nas mchis pa'i dgra rnams kyang slar zlog par bgyid par bgyid do/_/
[\[86b.3\]]mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di nyan pa'i tshe nye 'khor na gnas pa'i dgra phyir rgol ba dmag rnam pa bzhi bshams te/_yul de dag gzhom mo snyam du sems par gyur na yang bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i byin gyi brlabs kyi mthus de'i tshe nye 'khor gyi dgra de la 
[\[86b.4\]]phyir rgol ba'i dgra tha dad pa gzhan mchis nas gzhom par bgyid cing /_de'i yul khams su ltas ngan mang po dang rims nad rnams 'byung bar 'gyur bas de'i tshe rgyal po des de lta bu mthong ba dang /_dmag rnam pa bzhi bshams nas yul der chas te gzhom par bgyid pa na bdag cag 
[\[86b.5\]]kyang de'i tshe gnod sbyin dang 'dre srin gyi 'khor tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa snyed dang bcas par so so nas rang gi lus sbas te yongs su bsrungs nas grogs bgyis pas de nyid kyis phyir rgol ba'i dgra de rang dul bar 'gyur bas yul khams der mchi ba'i thugs kyang mi thub na/_phan 
[\[86b.6\]]tshun dmag dang mtshon gyis 'thab pa lta smos kyang ci 'tshal lags/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po bzhi po khyed kyis 'di ltar mdo sde 'di yongs su skyong zhing yongs su srung bar byed pa legs so legs so/_/nga sngon 
[\[86b.7\]]'das pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma 'das pa na dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs spyad nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas te/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid brnyes nas chos 'di bstan pa yin pas mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig 
[\[87a\]]
[\[87a.1\]]mdo sde 'di yongs su bzung nas bkur sti dang mchod pa byed na/_gnod pa rnams nye bar zhi nas rab tu bde bar 'gyur/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal rnams yongs su srung bar 'gyur/_phyir rgol ba'i dgra rnams zlog par 'gyur/_'dzam bu'i 
[\[87a.2\]]gling du gtogs pa'i rgyal po thams cad la gnod pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa'i dngos po rnams gtan med par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'di na yod pa'i grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_ri dang /_grong rdal brgyad khri bzhi stong dag gi mi'i rgyal po 
[\[87a.3\]]brgyad khri bzhi stong po rnams kyang so so nas rang rang gi yul du longs spyod kyi bde ba myong zhing rang dbang dang ldan par 'gyur/_/nor dang rin po che dpal 'byor gyis rgyas pa dag la longs spyod par byed pas phan tshun 'phrog par mi byed cing sngon gyi rgyu ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par smin pa dag la 
[\[87a.4\]]longs spyod par byed pas/_bsam pa ngan pa bskyed nas gzhan gyi yul la 'dod pas yongs su tshol ba med de/_thams cad 'dod pa chung zhing phan 'dogs pa'i bsam pa skye bar 'gyur/_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_bcing ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal yang med par 
[\[87a.5\]]'gyur/_yul de dag na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang rang bzhin gyis bde ba myong bar 'gyur/_bla 'og mthun zhing chu dang 'o ma 'dres pa lta bur sems kyis phan tshun sdug cing bkur bar 'gyur/_rab tu dga' bas rnam par rtse bar 'gyur/_byams pa dang /_snying rjes phan 
[\[87a.6\]]'dogs shing dge ba'i rtsa ba 'phel bar byed pas rgyu dang rkyen des na 'dzam bu'i gling 'di rab tu bde zhing lo legs pa dang /_mi rnams rgyas shing rab tu gang bar 'gyur/_sa chen po mthu dang ldan par 'gyur/_grang dro ran par 'gyur/_dus tshigs mi mthun pa med par 
[\[87a.7\]]'gyur/_nyi ma dang /_zla ba dang /_gza' dang /_rgyu skar rnams kyang sngon gyi gnas las 'pho zhing 'gyur ba med par 'gyur/_rlung dang char pa yang dus bzhin du ldang zhing 'bab par 'gyur/_ltas ngan rnams dang 'bral bar 'gyur/_nor dang rin po che rnams 'byor 
[\[87b\]]
[\[87b.1\]]cing rgyas par 'gyur/_sems la ser sna'i 'jungs pa med cing rtag par sbyin pa gtong bar 'gyur/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/_mi rnams tshe 'phos par gyur na yang phal cher mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur bas lha'i 'khor rnams rab tu 'phel bar 
[\[87b.2\]]'gyur bar rig par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po dag ma 'ongs pa'i dus na mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig_/mdo sde 'di mnyan te yongs su bsrungs nas gus pas mchod pa byed pa dang /_mdo sde 'dzin pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la bla mar byed cing bsngags pa brjod par 'dod pa dang /_gzhan 
[\[87b.3\]]yang khyed 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin gyi 'khor brgya stong tshad med pa snyed la phan pa dang /_bde bas phan 'dogs par 'dod na de'i phyir rgyal po des rtag par mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di mnyan nas yongs su gzung bar byas te/_yang dag pa'i chos kyi chu bdud rtsi'i ro mchog dam pa 'di 
[\[87b.4\]]thos pa'i dbang gis khyed la sogs pa'i lus dang sems kyi mthu stobs 'phel bar byed pas brtson 'grus dang ldan zhing dpa' ba dang /_bsod nams dang gzi byin rnams rab tu rgyas par 'gyur ro/_/mi'i rgyal po de dag gal te sems rtse gcig tu mdo sde 'di mnyan nas yongs su 'dzin 
[\[87b.5\]]par byed na de ni yangs shing rgya che ba dang /_shin tu dkon pa'i mchod pas yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la mchod pa byed par 'gyur te/_gang gis nga la mchod pa byas pa gang yin pa de ni 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[87b.6\]]bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong mang po rnams la mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/gang gis dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur bas/_rgyu dang rkyen des na khyed la sogs pas rgyal po de 
[\[87b.7\]]dang /_btsun mo dang /_slas dang /_'khor rnams yongs su bsrungs nas gnod cing nyam nga ba med par byas te/_pho brang bsrung ba'i lha rnams kyang rtag tu bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba la 'god par byed na/_bsod nams bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_yul de 
[\[88a\]]
[\[88a.1\]]dag na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyang 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/_dngos po ngan pa thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[88a.2\]]slad ma'i dus kyi tshe mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig 'di ltar gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di nyan par mos pa dang /_bdag nyid dang /_btsun mo dang /_rgyal bu nas pho brang nang gi slas la sogs pa'i bar dag dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_pho brang yongs su srung 
[\[88a.3\]]zhing skyob pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i dga' ba mchog dam pa dang /_rab tu dben pa'i bde ba 'thob par 'tshal ba dang /_tshe 'di nyid la rgyal thabs btsun zhing mtho ba dang /_dbang phyug dang ldan zhing dar ba dang /_rtag tu 'phel bar 'tshal ba dang /_gzhan yang bsam gyis 
[\[88a.4\]]mi khyab pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa yongs su sdud pa dang /_rang gi yul du phyir rgol ba'i dgra dang /_mya ngan dang /_'khrug pa dang /_gdon bgegs kyi dngos po rnams ma mchis par 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar mi'i rgyal po 
[\[88a.5\]]des bag ma mchis pas sems g.yeng bar mi bgyi zhing shin tu gus pa bskyed de bsam pa thag pa nas mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di mnyan cing yongs su gzung bar bgyi'o/_/chos nyan par 'tshal ba'i tshe/_sngar rgyal po la gces pa'i pho brang mchog dam pa rab tu 
[\[88a.6\]]brgyan te gsal ba'i phyogs su spos chab kyis chag chag btab ste/_me tog mchog dam pa sna tshogs mngon par gtor nas seng ge'i khri chos kyi gdan khyad par du 'phags pa btsugs te/_rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan nas rin po che sna tshogs kyi gdugs dang /_rgyal 
[\[88a.7\]]mtshan dang /_ba dan bsgreng ste/_rin thang ma mchis pa'i sbos bsregs nas rol mo rnams bgyi'o/_/rgyal po des de'i tshe yongs su dag par khrus bgyis te/_spos kyi byug pas lus bskus nas gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos te/_rgyan phreng rnams kyis brgyan nas 
[\[88b\]]
[\[88b.1\]]stan dma' ba la mchis te/_mtho ba'i bsam pa mi bskyed par dbang phyug gi thabs yongs su spang bar bgyi'o/_/nga rgyal rnams spangs te sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar gzhag nas mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o/_/chos smra ba'i mkhan po la ston pa chen po'i 'du shes 
[\[88b.2\]]bskyed par bgyi'o/_/pho brang nang gi btsun mo dang /_rgyal bu dang /_slas dang /_'khor rnams la byams pa dang /_brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas rab tu dga' bas phan tshun blta bar bgyi'o/_/shin tu mthun pa'i mdangs kyis tshig 'jam por smra bar bgyi'o/_/bdag nyid 
[\[88b.3\]]kyi lus dang sems la dga' ba chen pos kun du khyab par bgyi'o/_/deng bdag ni shin tu bsam par dka' zhing khyad par du 'phags pa'i phan yon chen po yangs shing rgya che ba 'di lta bu 'thob par 'gyur ro snyam du bsams nas mdo sde'i rgyal po de la rab tu mchod par bgyi'o/_/de ltar 
[\[88b.4\]]bsams lags nas chos smra ba'i mkhan po der mchis pa mthong bar gyur na shin tu gus pas dkon pa'i 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la bka' stsal pa/_'di ltar chos smra ba'i mkhan po de mi bsu bar mi bya'i/_de'i 
[\[88b.5\]]tshe mi'i rgyal po des gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos nas rgyan dang /_phreng ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan te/_bdag nyid gdugs dkar po dang /_spos dang /_me tog thogs nas dmag gi dpung bshams te/_rol mo rgyas par byas nas rkang gis grong khyer nas phyir 
[\[88b.6\]]byung ste/_bkra shis kyi dngos po thob par bya ba'i phyir gus pa'i 'du shes bskyed nas chos smra ba'i mkhan po de bsu bar bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir mi'i rgyal po des bdag nyid kyis bkur sti dang /_mchod pa de lta bu bya dgos she na/_mi'i rgyal po de 
[\[88b.7\]]rkang pa bteg cing rkang pa bzhag pa na gom pa re re zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong po rnams la bkur sti dang /_mchod pa dang /_rim gro dang /_bla mar byed par 'gyur zhing /_gzhan yang bskal pa'i grangs de snyed kyi 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las 
[\[89a\]]
[\[89a.1\]]yang dag par 'da' bar 'gyur bas so/_/gzhan yang ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa'i grangs de snyed du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po'i longs spyod mchog khyad par du 'phags pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur/_gom pa re re bor ba'i dbang gis tshe 'di nyid 
[\[89a.2\]]la yang bsod nams 'phel bas rang dbang du rgyal po byed cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par smin pa dang ldan pa dang /_mang po kun gyis bkur bar 'gyur/_bskal pa 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med pa snyed du lha dang mis yongs su spyad pa'i rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang dag 
[\[89a.3\]]la longs spyod par 'gyur/_skye ba thams cad du rgyal po byed par 'gyur/_tshe ring bar 'gyur/_tshig gi spobs pa dang ldan pas lha dang mi kun gyis mngon par yid ches par 'gyur/_'jigs shing skrag pa med par 'gyur/_grags pa chen po dang ldan zhing mang po kun gyis 
[\[89a.4\]]yongs su blta bar 'gyur/_lha dang mi'i nang du khyad par du 'phags pa'i bde ba dag la longs spyod par 'gyur/_mthu stobs chen po thob par 'gyur/_gzi byin chen po'i yon tan dang ldan par 'gyur/_lus kyi mtshan ma gya nom zhing shin tu mdzes pas dpe zla med par 'gyur/_lha 
[\[89a.5\]]dang mi'i ston pa mthong bar 'gyur/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad par 'gyur/_bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa mngon par grub cing phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar shes par bya ste/_mi'i rgyal po de dag gis yon tan gyi phan yon rnam pa sna 
[\[89a.6\]]tshogs tshad med pa de lta bu mthong ba'i phyir bdag nyid dpag tshad gcig nas dpag tshad brgya stong du ma'i bar du chos smra ba'i mkhan po bsu bar bya zhing /_chos smra ba'i mkhan po la sangs rgyas kyi 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/slar grong dang /_grong khyer du phyin nas kyang deng de bzhin gshegs 
[\[89a.7\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa bdag gi pho brang du gshegs nas bdag gi mchod pa bzhes te bdag la chos ston par mdzad do/_/bdag kyang chos thos pa'i dbang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur bas 
[\[89b\]]
[\[89b.1\]]'di nyid sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma dang phrad par gyur pa yin no/_/deng bdag gis ni shin tu yangs shing rgya che ba mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa'i bde ba'i yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i 
[\[89b.2\]]sangs rgyas rnams la mchod cing rim gro byas so/_/deng bdag gis ni gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas kyi sdug bsngal thams cad rtsa ba nas bton to/_/deng 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs 
[\[89b.3\]]pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rab tu bskyed do/_/deng sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal las bton nas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba la bkod do/_/deng tshad med mtha' med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i bsod nams 
[\[89b.4\]]kyi phung po rab tu bsags so/_/pho brang nang gi slas dang skye bo mang po bde ba la bkod nas yul rnams rab tu zhi bar byas pas/_gnod pa dang /_dug gdug pa dang /_mi ma rungs pa med cing phyogs gzhan nas 'ong ba'i dgra rnams nye bar 'ongs nas gnod pa mi byed pa dang /_mya ngan dang 
[\[89b.5\]]nad rnams med par 'gyur ro snyam du bsam par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po de dag gis de ltar yang dag pa'i chos la btsun par byas shing bla mar byas pa dang /_mdo sde dam pa 'di yongs su 'dzin pa'i dge slong dang /_dge slong ma dang /_/
[\[89b.6\]]dge bsnyen dang /_dge bsnyen ma dag la mchod pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_bla mar byas shing bsngags pa brjod pa las byung ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang yin pa de dag dang /_bsod nams mchog gang yin pa de dag thog ma kho nar khyed 'khor dang bcas pa las yongs su sngo bar byed 
[\[89b.7\]]na mi'i rgyal po de dag bsod nams chen po'i dge ba'i las kyi rgyu dang /_rkyen dang ldan par 'gyur bas tshe 'di nyid la dbang chen po thob nas gzi byin chen po rab tu 'phel bar 'gyur/_dpal dang mtshan mchog rnams kyis rab tu brgyan par 'gyur/_phyir rgol ba thams cad yang dag pa'i chos 
[\[90a\]]
[\[90a.1\]]kyis tshar gcod par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig de ltar yang dag pa'i chos la gus pas bkur sti bgyis nas mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyid pa 
[\[90a.2\]]dang /_mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i 'khor bzhi po dag la bkur sti dang /_mchod pa dang /_bla mar bgyis nas bsngags pa brjod par bgyid pa na/_de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po des bdag cag rnams dga' bar bgyi ba'i slad du chos kyi gdan dang nye ba'i phyogs gcig tu spos chab kyis chag chag 
[\[90a.3\]]btab ste/_me tog mchog dam pa mang po mngon par gtor nas rgyal po chen po bzhi mchis pa'i stan yang bshams te bting bar gyur na/_bdag cag kyang rgyal po de dag dang lhan cig yang dag pa'i chos nyan par bgyid do/_/rgyal po des kyang bdag cag la phan 'dogs pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[90a.4\]]ci mchis pa'i bsod nams kyi skal ba gang lags pa bdag cag la yang yongs su bsngo bar bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe mi'i rgyal po des chos smra ba la chos bshad par gsol ba btab nas stan la mchis pa'i tshe bdag cag gi slad du spos mchog dam pa sna tshogs bsregs nas mdo sde 'di la mchod 
[\[90a.5\]]par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe spos kyi bdug pa de dag skad cig ma gcig la nam mkha' la mngon par 'phags nas bdag cag rnams kyi gzhal med khang du mchis te/_spos kyi gdugs su 'gyur bas bdag cag lha'i 'khor rnams kyis kyang spos kyi dri mchog de tshor bar 'gyur/_
[\[90a.6\]]spos kyi du ba de yang gser gyi 'od dang ldan pas bdag cag gnas pa'i khang khyim nas tshangs pa'i gnas dang /_brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /_lha mo spobs pa chen mo dang /_lha mo dpal chen mo dang /_sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang /_sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde 
[\[90a.7\]]dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_lha'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po dang /_lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po dang /_sde dpon chen po rin chen bzang dang /_'phrog ma'i bu 'khor lnga brgya pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i gnas kyi bar thams cad kyang 
[\[90b\]]
[\[90b.1\]]rab tu gsal bar bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta bu la sogs pa'i 'khor rnams kyis rang rang gi gzhal med khang du spos kyi bdug pa des skad cig yud tsam cig la spos kyi gdugs su gyur par yang mthong la spos kyi dri yang tshor bar 'gyur/_'od zer gyi kha dog gis lha'i 
[\[90b.2\]]gzhal med khang thams cad gsal bar bgyid pa yang mthong bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la bka' stsal pa/_spos kyi 'od zer des gzhal med khang de dag 'ba' zhig gsal bar byas nas spos kyi gdugs su gyur te 'od zer chen po 'gyed 
[\[90b.3\]]pa ma yin te/_mi'i rgyal po de dag lag pas pog phor bzung ste/_spos mchog dam pa bsregs nas mdo sde 'di la mchod pa byed pa'i tshe spos kyi du ba de thang cig yud tsam gcig la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na yod pa'i nyi ma dang /_zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /_ri'i 
[\[90b.4\]]rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang /_gling bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgya dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i khang khyim thams cad 
[\[90b.5\]]gsal bar byas nas nam mkha' kun du gang zhing rgyas pa dang /_spos kyi bdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag sprin gyi gdugs su gyur te/_gdugs de yang gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pas lha'i khang khyim thams cad gsal bar byed de/_'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[90b.6\]]rten gyi khams na spos kyi sprin dang /_spos kyi gdugs rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed yod pa thams cad ni gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po'i gzi byin gyi mthu las gyur pa yin no/_/mi'i rgyal po de dag lag tu pog phor thogs nas mdo sde 'di la mchod par 
[\[90b.7\]]byed pa'i tshe spos kyi bdug pa rnam pa sna tshogs gang yin pa de dag stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di 'ba' zhig tu khyab par 'gyur ba ma yin gyi/_skad cig yud tsam gcig gis phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa bye ba khrag 
[\[91a\]]
[\[91a.1\]]khrig brgya stong tshad med mtha' med pa kun du khyab cing /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyi nam mkha' kun du spos kyi gdugs su gyur nas kun du gsal bar byed pa yang de bzhin te/_de'i tshe sangs rgyas mang po de dag spos gya nom pa'i dri gang yin pa de dag kyang rig cing mkhyen/_
[\[91a.2\]]spos kyi bla re dang /_gser gyi kha dog de dag kyang gzigs nas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis cho 'phrul bstan nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mang po de dag gis mthun par gzigs shing 
[\[91a.3\]]so sor brtags te/_gsung mthun par chos smra ba'i mkhan po de la skyes bu chen po khyod kyis shin tu zab pa'i mdo sde gya nom pa 'di rgya cher yongs su spel nas/_bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med mtha' med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa legs so legs so/_/
[\[91a.4\]]zhes bsngags pa brjod par 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di lta bu mnyan nas thos pa'i bsod nams gang yin pa de'i tshad kyang shin tu mang ba yin na/_yi ger 'dri ba dang /_len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang dag par ston pa dang /_ji 
[\[91a.5\]]skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par sgrub pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu dag sems can gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos par gyur pa gang yin pa de dag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang 
[\[91a.6\]]chub las phyir ldog par mi 'gyur bas so/_/de'i tshe phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams gsung gcig tu chos kyi stan la 'dug 
[\[91a.7\]]pa'i chos smra ba'i mkhan po de la legs so legs so/_/zhes bsngags pa 'di brjod nas rigs kyi bu khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_brtson 'grus kyi stobs kyis dka' ba brgya stong tshad med pa snyed mngon par bsgrubs te/_tshogs yongs su rdzogs par byas nas 'phags pa mang 
[\[91b\]]
[\[91b.1\]]po las yang dag par 'das te/_khams gsum las nges par byung nas gtso bo mchog tu gyur te byang chub kyi shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/_khyad par du 'phags pa rnams kyis yongs su brgyan par 'gyur/_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na rkyen 
[\[91b.2\]]dang ldan pa'i sems can rnams yongs su skyob par 'gyur/_shin tu 'jigs su rung ba'i bdud kyi dmag tshogs rnams tshar gcod par 'gyur/_shin tu rnam par dag pa'i chos rnams dang /_shin tu zab pa'i bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub rab tu rtogs par 'gyur 
[\[91b.3\]]ro/_/rigs kyi bu khyod rdo rje'i stan la 'dug nas sangs rgyas rnams kyis rab tu bsngags pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bla na med pa/_shin tu zab pa gya nom pa rnam pa bcu gnyis yongs su bskor bar 'gyur/_bla na med pa'i chos kyi rnga chen po mchog tu gyur pa rab tu rdung bar 'gyur/_bla na 
[\[91b.4\]]med pa'i chos kyi dung shin tu gya nom pa 'bud par 'gyur/_bla na med pa'i chos kyi rgyal mtshan khyad par du 'phags pa sgreng bar 'gyur/_bla na med pa'i chos kyi sgron ma shin tu gsal bar spar bar 'gyur/_bla na med pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs par 'gyur/_nyon 
[\[91b.5\]]mongs pa'i dgra'i 'ching ba tshad med pa yongs su gcod par 'gyur/_sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed mtha' med cing 'jigs su rung ba'i rgya mtsho las yongs su bzlas par 'gyur/_mu med pa'i skye shi'i 'khor ba las thar bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bye ba 
[\[91b.6\]]khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed dang phrad par 'gyur ro/_/zhes gsung bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni 
[\[91b.7\]]slad ma dang /_da ltar gyi tshe yon tan tshad ma mchis pa 'di lta bu yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas de'i slad du mi'i rgyal po gang gis mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa 'di thos par gyur pa de ni sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa lags pas 
[\[92a\]]
[\[92a.1\]]mi'i rgyal po de dag la bdag cag rnams yongs su bsrung zhing rjes su dran par bgyid do/_/gzhan yang bsod nams kyi phan yon tshad ma mchis pa snyed mthong ba'i slad du bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_'khor gzhan rnams dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]'bum 
[\[92a.2\]]phrag brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed rang rang gi gzhal med khang rnams su spos kyi bdug pa'i sprin gyi gdugs dang /_cho 'phrul rnam pa sna tshogs pa de dag mthong ba/_de'i tshe bdag cag rang gi lus mi snang bar bgyis nas chos nyan pa'i slad du rgyal po de'i pho brang yongs su gtsang zhing 
[\[92a.3\]]mdzes par brgyan pa chos 'chad pa'i gnas su mchi bar 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin du tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_lha mo spobs pa chen mo dang /_dpal gyi lha mo chen mo dang /_sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang /_sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon 
[\[92a.4\]]chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /_lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po dang /_sde dpon chen po rin chen bzang dang /_'phrog ma'i bu 'khor lnga brgya pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_lha dang gnod sbyin la sogs 
[\[92a.5\]]pa'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed kyang chos nyan pa'i slad du so so nas rang rang gi lus mi snang bar bgyis te/_mi'i rgyal po de'i pho brang shin tu khyad par du 'phags pa chos kyi gdan shin tu mdzes par bgyis pa chos bshad pa'i gnas su mchi bar 'gyur 
[\[92a.6\]]lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_'khor gzhan rnams dang /_gnod sbyin rnams thams cad sems rtse gcig tu mi'i rgyal po de dag dang lhan cig tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen bgyis nas bla na ma mchis pa'i chos kyi sbyin bdag chen por 
[\[92a.7\]]'gyur ba'i rgyus bdud rtsi'i ros bdag cag tshim par gyur pas/_de'i slad du bdag cag rgyal po de la yongs su bsrungs nas gnod pa rnams yongs su bsal te bde ba thob par bgyid do/_/de'i pho brang dang /_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_yul rnams su yang sdig pa dang ltas 
[\[92b\]]
[\[92b.1\]]ngan pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid do/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi cig car thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig rang gi yul du mdo sde 'di bzhugs par gyur kyang yongs su spel bar yang 
[\[92b.2\]]mi bgyid la sems kyis kyang spong bar bgyid cing nyan par yang mi mos/_mchod par yang mi bgyid/_bla mar yang mi bgyid/_bsngags pa brjod par yang mi bgyid la/_'khor bzhi po dag mdo sde 'dzin pa mthong bar gyur na yang /_bla mar mi bgyid cing mchod pa dang /_
[\[92b.3\]]rim gro yang mi bgyid na bdag cag dang /_'khor gzhan rnams dang /_lha tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyang shin tu zab cing gya nom pa'i chos 'di thos par mi 'gyur bas bdud rtsi'i ro la rgyab kyis phyogs shing yang dag pa'i chos kyi rgyud kyang stor bar 'gyur/_gzi byin dang 
[\[92b.4\]]mthu stobs kyang ma mchis par 'gyur/_ngan 'gro 'phel bar bgyid cing lha dang mi rnams yongs su nyams par 'gyur/_'khor ba'i chu bor bying bar 'gyur zhing /_mya ngan las 'das pa'i shul dang gol bar 'gyur bas bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi 
[\[92b.5\]]dang /_'khor gzhan rnams dang /_gnod sbyin la sogs pa de lta bu'i dngos po mthong bar gyur na yul de yongs su spong bar bgyid la/_yongs su skyob cing yongs su bsrung ba'i sems kyang ma mchis par 'gyur ba lags so/_/bdag cag 'ba' zhig rgyal po de spong bar 
[\[92b.6\]]bgyid pa ma lags kyi yul skyong ba'i lha dge ba chen po tshad ma mchis pa rnams kyang yal bar bor nas mchi bar 'gyur lags so/_/de ltar yal bar bor ba'i dbang gis yul der gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur zhing rgyal thabs kyang stor bar 'gyur/_mi'i tshogs 
[\[92b.7\]]thams cad kyang dge ba'i sems ni ma mchis kyi gcig la gcig 'ching ba dang /_gsod pa dang /_gshe ba dang /_rtsod pa dang /_phan tshun phra ma dang /_gya gyu bgyid cing nongs pa ma mchis pa la chad pa gcod pa 'ba' zhig sems pas/_nad dang /_rims nad rnams 
[\[93a\]]
[\[93a.1\]]'byung bar 'gyur/_gza' mjug [{]rings [,]ring [}]yang nas yang du 'byung bar 'gyur/_gdugs gnyis cig car 'char bar 'gyur/_gza' 'jug pa la rgyun chad pa ma mchis par 'gyur/_gzha' dkar nag gis bkra shis pa ma lags pa'i mtshan ma 
[\[93a.2\]]ston par 'gyur/_skar mda' ltung zhing sa g.yo bar 'gyur/_khron pa'i nang nas sgra 'byung bar 'gyur/_char dang rlung drag po dus ma lags par 'bab cing ldang bar 'gyur/_rtag par mu ge'i gnod pa 'byung bar 'gyur/_'bru rnams yongs su smin par mi 'gyur/_phas 
[\[93a.3\]]kyi rgol ba'i dgra mang pos gtses pas yul gyi mi rnams sdug bsngal gyi gnod pa mang po myong bar 'gyur/_yul gyi sa phyogs kyang yid du mi mchi zhing mngon par dga' ba ci yang ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_lha 
[\[93a.4\]]brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa dang /_sngon yul skyong ba'i lha dge ba chen po rnams kyis yongs su spangs nas/_mchi ba'i tshe ltas ngan pa'i dngos po brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa de lta bu dag 'byung bar 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig yul skyong zhing rtag 
[\[93a.5\]]par bde ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'tshal ba dang /_skye bo mang po rnams bde ba la 'god par 'tshal ba dang /_phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar bkum nas rang gi yul khams gtan du rgyas shing dar bar 'tshal ba dang /_yang dag pa'i bstan pa 'jig rten du gnas nas sdug 
[\[93a.6\]]bsngal gyi gnod pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos rnams nye bar zhi bar 'gyur bar 'tshal na/_bcom ldan 'das yul gyi bdag po de dag gis gdon mi 'tshal bar mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di mnyan nas yongs su gzung bar bgyi zhing mdo sde 'di klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_
[\[93a.7\]]len pa dang /_'dzin pa dag la yang bsnyen bkur ba dang /_rim gro dang /_mchod par bgyid na/_bdag cag dang /_tshad ma mchis pa'i lha'i 'khor gzhan rnams chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus bla na ma mchis pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi ro myong bar 
[\[93b\]]
[\[93b.1\]]'gyur bas bdag cag 'khor dang bcas pa la sman par 'gyur zhing lha gzhan rnams kyang sman yon mchog thob par 'gyur lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di ltar mi'i rgyal po des sems rtse gcig tu mdo sde 'di mnyan nas yongs su bzung ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 
[\[93b.2\]]'das 'di ltar tshangs pa chen pos kyang sems can rnams la rtag par 'jig rten dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos yang dag par bstan/_brgya byin lha'i dbang pos kyang bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs yang dag par bstan/_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan 
[\[93b.3\]]pa'i drang srong rnams kyis kyang bstan bcos mang po bstan te/_bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa dang /_brgya byin dang /_mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong gis bstan bcos bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed bstan mod kyi/_'on kyang sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[93b.4\]]ldan 'das kyis byams pa dang thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs nas lha dang mi'i tshogs rnams kyi ched du gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa bkas bshad pa gang lags pa sngar bstan pa de dag dang bsgrun na/_bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'gyur snyed kyis ches khyad par du 'phags 
[\[93b.5\]]pas dper bgyir yang ma mchis lags so/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling na rgyal po ji snyed mchis pa de dag yang dag pa'i chos kyis 'jig rten btul nas sems can la bde ba'i dngos po stsal ba dang /_bdag dang 'khor rnams yongs su bsrungs nas sdug 
[\[93b.6\]]bsngal gyi gnod pa ma mchis par bgyid pa dang /_gzhan yang phas kyi rgol bas gnod pa bgyid pa ma mchis pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba ci snyed pa thams cad thag ring du spong ba dang /_yul gyi gdon bgegs rnams yongs su bsal nas yang dag pa'i chos kyis 'dul zhing rtsod pa 
[\[93b.7\]]ma mchis par bgyid pa'i slad du'o/_/de'i slad du mi'i rgyal po rnams so so nas rang gi yul du chos kyi sgron ma sbar te mtha' yas pa rnams gsal bar bgyis nas lha'i tshogs dang rang rang gi 'khor rnams la sman par bgyi'o/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_
[\[94a\]]
[\[94a.1\]]lha dang /_gnod sbyin gyi 'khor tshad ma mchis pa dang /_'dzam bu'i gling na lha dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ci mchis pa thams cad rgyu dang rkyen 'di'i dbang gis bla na ma mchis pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi ro myong bar 'gyur zhing gzi byin chen po'i mthu stobs dang ldan pa/_'od 
[\[94a.2\]]kyi snang ba phun sum tshogs pa dang /_sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_gzhan yang slad ma'i dus kyi tshe bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis shing bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed du rtag par shin tu bde ba'i longs spyod myong ba dang /_gzhan yang sangs 
[\[94a.3\]]rgyas tshad ma mchis pa snyed mnyes par bgyis nas dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/_de nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas/_'di lta bu'i sman yon tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa thams cad kyang thugs rje chen po 
[\[94a.4\]]tshangs pa'i 'khor las yang dag par 'das pa mkhyen pa chen po brgya byin pas lhag pa/_dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su spyad pa mngon par shes pa lnga dang ldan pa'i drang srong las khyad par du 'phags par gyur pas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong 'gyur snyed kyis ches lhag par 
[\[94a.5\]]gyur te brjod du ma mchis pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis sems can rnams kyi ched du 'di lta bu'i mdo sde shin tu gya nom pa yang dag par bkas bshad nas 'dzam bu'i gling gi yul gyi bdag po thams cad dang /_mi'i tshogs 
[\[94a.6\]]mang po rnams 'jig rten na chos kyi cho ga dang yul yongs su skyong zhing mi rnams gdul ba dang bskul bar bya ba'i dngos po ji snyed pa de dag gsal bar khong du chud pa las gyur pa lags te/_mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus thams cad bde ba thob pa'i bsod 
[\[94a.7\]]nams kyi phan yon 'di dag thams cad kyang ston pa chen po shAkya thub pas byams pa dang /_thugs rje'i mthus mdo sde 'di rgya cher yang dag par spel ba las gyur pa lags pas/_bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen de'i slad du mi'i rgyal po rnams kyis mdo sde dam pa 'di 
[\[94b\]]
[\[94b.1\]]yongs su bzung ste/_mchod pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_bla mar bgyis nas bsngags pa brjod par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_'di lta bu la sogs pa'i yon tan khyad par du 'phags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag gis thams cad la sman par bgyis pas de'i slad 
[\[94b.2\]]du mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po zhes bgyi ba lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag la yang 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyed cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_'khor gzhan rnams dang lha'i 'khor bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[94b.3\]]brgya stong tshad med pa rnams mi'i rgyal po de dag gal te sems rtse gcig tu mdo sde 'di mnyan nas mchod pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_bla mar byas te/_bsngags pa brjod pa mthong nas yongs su bsrungs te/_gnod pa rnams yongs su sel bar byed na/_khyed cag rab 
[\[94b.4\]]tu bde ba myong bar 'gyur bar byed do/_/gal te 'khor bzhi po dag gis mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par spel bar byed na des ni lha dang mi'i nang na sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgya cher yang dag par byas pa yin pas sems can tshad med pa snyed la phan btags pa yin te/_'di lta 
[\[94b.5\]]bu'i gang zag gang yin pa de la khyed kyis rtag par bsrung zhing yongs su bskyab par bya'o/_/'di lta bu'i 'khor bzhi po dag rkyen gzhan gyis phan tshun gnod pa byed pa med par byos la/_de dag lus dang sems rab tu dben zhing bde bas mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par 
[\[94b.6\]]spel nas phyi ma'i mtha' ji srid pa'i bar du sems can phan 'dogs pa la rgyun chad pa med par byos shig_/de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs 
[\[94b.7\]]kyi cho ga mchis te/_sems can gang la la zhig yongs su 'dzin par mos na yon tan tshad ma mchis pa dang ldan par 'gyur zhing bdag gis rtag par bsrungs bas sems can de sdug bsngal spangs nas bde ba thob par 'gyur/_bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rnam pa gnyis 
[\[95a\]]
[\[95a.1\]]yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur lags so/_/gang zhig yongs su 'dzin par 'tshal bas sngar lus bsrung ba'i sngags 'di gdon par bgyi'o/_/sngags ni 'di lta ste/_na mo bai shra ba NA ya/_ma hA rA dzA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ra ra ra ra/_ku no ku no/_/
[\[95a.2\]]khu no khu no/_ru No ru No/_sa ba sa ba/_ka ra ka ra/_ma hA bi ka raM/_ma hA bi ka raM/_ma hA kA la/_ma hA rA dza/_rak+Sha rak+Sha tu/_bdag nyid kyi ming brjod par bya/_mAM sarba satwA nAny+tsa swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das sngags 'di 'don pas skud pa dkar po la lan bdun sngags 
[\[95a.3\]]kyis btab ste lan re mdud pa re re bor nas dpung pa la bcings na/_de'i don gdon mi 'tshal bar 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/spos mang po 'di lta ste/_gu gul dang /_tsan+dan dang /_du ruska dang /_ta ka ra'i pog 'di rnams cha mnyam par gcig tu bsres te sug par pog 
[\[95a.4\]]phor thogs nas pog bsregs te mchod par bgyi'o/_/khrus yongs su dag par bgyis te/_gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos nas khang pa dben par sngags bzlas te lha'i rgyal po rnam thos bdag g.yar drang bar bgyi lags so/_/sngags ni 'di lta ste/_na mo bai shra ba NA ya/_ma 
[\[95a.5\]]hA d+ha na dA ya/_tsaN+De shwa rA ya/_A kar+Sha/_a pa ra dzi ta/_tsaN+De shwa ra/_pa ra ma kA ru Ni ka_/sarba satwA hi ta tsin+tA/_bdag gi ming brjod/_ma ma d+ha na bar+ng+ho/_pa ra ye shwa ra/_swa yaM A kar+Sha ya swA hA/_sngags 'di lan bdun tshang bar bzlas na de'i rjes la sngags kyi snying po gdon 
[\[95a.6\]]par bgyi'o/_/sngags 'don pa'i tshe sngar dkon mchog gsum la gus par phyag bgyis nas lha'i dbang po rnam thos kyi ming nas 'don par bgyid na/_nor rdzas rnams stsol cing sems can rnams ci dang ci smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas bde ba stsol bar 
[\[95a.7\]]bgyid do/_/de ltar phyag bgyis nas de'i rjes la rgyal po rnam thos kyi yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i sngags kyi snying po 'don par bgyid na/_yid bzhin gyi bde ba stsol bar bgyid do/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po 
[\[95b\]]
[\[95b.1\]]che'i sngags kyi snying po smras pa/_na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo bai shra ba NA ya/_ma hA rA dzA ya/_tad+ya thA/_si mi si mi/_su mu su mu/_tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/_tsa ra tsa ra/_sa ra sa ra/_ka ra ka ra/_ki li ki li/_ku ru ku ru/_mu ru mu ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_san+d+dA ya/_At+ma nAM ni ta 
[\[95b.2\]]t+yan an+tar+d+hA tu swA hA/_na mo bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/_d+ha na dA ya swA hA/_ma no ra tha pa ri pU ra ya swA hA/_sngags 'don pa'i tshe sngar lan stong tshang bar bzlas nas/_de'i rjes la khang pa gtsang ma dag tu ba lang gi lci bas dog sa la zhal zhal bgyis te dkyil 'khor chung ngu zhig bgyis nas 
[\[95b.3\]]zas ci 'byor bas sems rtse gcig tu mchod par bgyi'o/_/rtag par pog spos dam pa bsregs nas dud pa rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi'o/_/sngags kyi snying po snga ma gdugs mtshan du sems dran pa nye bar gzhag nas/_bdag nyid kyis thos pa tsam du zlos shing gzhan gyis rig 
[\[95b.4\]]par mi bgyid na/_de'i tshe rnam thos kyi bu sha ni shi zhes bgyi ba gzhon nu'i gzugs nye bar bstan te/_drung du mchis nas 'di skad du ci'i phyir bdag gi pha 'bod ces 'dri bar 'gyur bas lan du 'di skad ces bdag dkon mchog gsum mchod pa'i don du nor 'tshal na/_de bzhin du 
[\[95b.5\]]stsal bar gsol zhes smra bar bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe sha ni shi tshig de thos pa dang slar pha'i thad du mchis nas pha la 'di skad du deng dge ba spyod pa'i mi zhig sems rtse gcig tu dkon mchog gsum mchod de/_nor gyis phongs pa'i slad du yab la gsol ba 'debs so zhes bgyis 
[\[95b.6\]]pa dang /_phas khyod myur du song la nyin gcig bzhin du de la kAr+NA pa Na brgya brgya byin cig ces mchi bar 'gyur te sngags 'don pas de lta bu'i mtshan ma mthong bar gyur na don 'grub par 'gyur bar rig par bgyis nas gcig pu khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du bdug spos bsregs te mchis nyal 
[\[95b.7\]]ba'i khri'i drung du spos kyi sprog ma gcig bzhag nas rtag par nam langs pa'i tshe sprog ma'i nang du nor ci thob pa blta bar bgyi'o/_/rtag par nor thob pa'i tshe de nyid kyi gdugs la spos dang me tog dang /_zhal zas kyis dkon mchog gsum la mchod cing dbul phongs pa rnams la 
[\[96a\]]
[\[96a.1\]]stsal nas bas par bgyi'o/_/bsris te gzhag par mi bgyi'o/_/sems can rnams la byams pa dang snying rje'i bsam pa bskyed par bgyi/_zhe sdang dang g.yo sgyu dang /_gnod sems kyi bsam pa bskyed par mi bgyi'o/_/gal te zhe sdang skyes par 
[\[96a.2\]]gyur na/_dngos grub kyi mthu stor bar 'gyur bas rtag par sems bsrungs te zhe sdang bskyed par mi bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang sngags 'dzin pas rtag par lha'i rgyal po rnam thos bdag dang /_bu dang /_bu mo dang /_'khor rnams rjes su dran par bgyis te bsngags pa brjod na 
[\[96a.3\]]rtag par dge ba bcu po dag gis bstangs te/_lha de dag bsod nams kyi mthu 'phel zhing rgyas pa dang /_dge ba mang po kun du 'phel nas byang chub mngon par rtogs par 'gyur bar bgyid na/_lha mang po de dag gis dngos po de lta bu mthong ba dang /_thams cad rab tu dga' bas 
[\[96a.4\]]lhan cig tu nye bar mchis te/_sngags 'don pa'i gang zag de la yongs su bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang sngags 'dzin pa de tshe ring zhing lo tshad ma mchis pa snyed du gnas par 'gyur/_ngan song gsum dang rtag tu bral zhing rtag par gnod pa ma mchis par 'gyur/_yid bzhin 
[\[96a.5\]]gyi nor bu rin po che dang gter rnams 'thob par 'gyur/_mngon par shes pa dang /_dbang phyug dang /_smon pa thams cad mngon par 'grub par 'gyur/_gal te blon thabs 'tshal na yang yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur/_gcan gzan thams cad kyi skad kyang 'tshal bar 
[\[96a.6\]]'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te sngags 'don pa'i tshe bdag gi lus mngon du ston par mthong bar 'tshal na tshes brgyad dam/[ {]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i gdugs la ras dkar po la sangs rgyas kyi sku gzugs shig sbyin dang tshon sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa bri bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[96a.7\]]sku gzugs 'dri ba'i ri mo mkhan de yang bslab pa'i gnas brgyad yang dag par blang bar bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi g.yon phyogs su dpal gyi lha mo'i gzugs bri bar bgyi'o/_/sangs rgyas kyi g.yas phyogs su rgyal po rnam thos bdag dang /_bu dang /_bu mo dang /_
[\[96b\]]
[\[96b.1\]]'khor rnams kyi gzugs bris nas/_mchis pa'i stan legs par bshams te me tog sna tshogs bkram nas spos mchog dam pa bsregs te gdugs mtshan rgyun chad pa ma mchis par mar me sbar bar bgyi'o/_/bza' ba dang btung ba mchog dam pa sna tshogs kyis gus pa'i 
[\[96b.2\]]sems bskyed de dus gsum du mchod pa bgyis nas sngags gdon par bgyi'o/_/brnyas pa'i sems bskyed par mi bgyi'o/_/bdag g.yar 'dren pa'i tshe sngags 'di gdon par bgyi'o/_/na maHshrI kaN+ThA ya/_bud d+hA ya/_na mo bai shra ba NA ya/_yak+Sha rA dzA ya/_
[\[96b.3\]]ma hA rA dzA ya/_a ti rA dzA ya/_na maHshrI ma hA de bi ye/_tad+ya thA/_ta ra ta ra/_tu ru tu ru/_ba ra ba ra/_su shud+d+ho su shud+d+ho/_ha na ha na/_ma Ni ka na ka/_badzra bai DUr+ya/_muk+ti kA baM kr-i ta/_sha rI rA ya/_sarba sa twA nAM hi ta kA ma/_bai shra ba Na/_shrI ya de bI pra b+hA ya/_e 
[\[96b.4\]]hi e hi/_mA bi lam+ba/_gUr+Na gUr+Na/_pa ra s+ya/_pa ra s+ya/_da dA hi ma ma a mu ka nA ma s+ya/_dar+sha na kA ma s+ya dar+sha naM/_ma ma ma na/_pra la ha dA ya swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngags 'don pa'i mi de dang /_gzhan yang de lta bu'i mchod pa rgyas par bgyis 
[\[96b.5\]]mthong bar gyur na byams shing sdug pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas bdag byis pa gzhon nu'i gzugs sam/_rgan po'am/_dge slong gi gzugs su lus bsgyur nas sug pa na yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che dang gser gyi snod thogs te/_dkyil 'khor 
[\[96b.6\]]gyi nang du zhugs te lus kyis gus pa bstan te/_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan nas brjod de sngags 'don pa de la khyod kyis bsam pa bzhin du smon pa rnams 'grub par bya'o zhes mchi bar 'gyur lags so/_/nags tshal gyi nang du mi snang bar 'tshal lam/_rin po che mngon par 
[\[96b.7\]]'grub par bgyid pa dang /_skye bo mang po kun gyi snying du sdug cing bkur bar 'tshal lam/_gser dang dngul la sogs pa'i nor rnams yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal lam/_sngags kyi dngos grub 'grub par 'tshal lam/_mngon par shes pa dang /_tshe shin tu ring 
[\[97a\]]
[\[97a.1\]]ba dang /_longs spyod mchog dam pa yongs su gnyer bar 'tshal na yang bsam pa bzhin du mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis par 'gyur lags so/_/deng bdag gis re zhig dngos po 'di tsam zhig bstan pa lags te/_gal te yang gzhan dag yongs 
[\[97a.2\]]su gnyer bar bgyid na yang thams cad ji ltar smon pa bzhin du mngon par 'grub cing rin po che'i gter bas pa ma mchis pa dang /_yon tan mthar thug pa ma mchis pa yang mngon par 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/gal te nyi ma dang zla ba dog sa la ltung bar 'gyur yang 
[\[97a.3\]]srid/_sa chen po res 'ga' gzhan du 'gyur yang srid kyi bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'di ni nam yang chab 'tshal bar mi 'gyur bas rtag par yid bzhin gyi bde ba 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gis mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di len pa dang /_/
[\[97a.4\]]'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha don du 'don pa des sngags 'di 'don par bgyid na/_ngal ba ma mchis par cho ga rnams myur du 'grub par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das deng bdag gis dbul phongs pa dang /_sdug bsngal gyi gnod par 'gyur ba'i sems 
[\[97a.5\]]can de dag gi ched du sngags 'di bstan pas phan yon chen po thob nas thams cad phyug cing skyid pa dang rang dbang dang ldan zhing gnod pa ma mchis pa 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/bdag gis nam 'tsho'i bar du gang zag de'i rjes su 'brangs nas yongs su bsrungs te/_gnod pa 
[\[97a.6\]]rnams yongs su sel bar bgyid do/_/gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yongs su bzung nas spel bar bgyid pa dang /_sngags 'don pa'i gang zag de la gom pa brgya tshun chad du 'od kyis kun du gsal bar bgyid lags so/_/bdag 
[\[97a.7\]]gis gnod sbyin brgya stong ji snyed mchis pa yang rtag par rim gro bgyid cing ji ltar mos pa bzhin du g.yog bgyis pas yid bzhin du mi 'grub pa gang yang ma mchis lags so/_/bdag gis bden tshig smra ba la mi mad pa ma mchis par ni bcom ldan 'das nyag gcig dbang du gyur cing 
[\[97b\]]
[\[97b.1\]]mkhyen par gyur pa lags so/_/de'i tshe lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyis sngags 'di smras pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sems can thams cad kyi dbul phongs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba dral nas bde ba 'thob par bya ba dang /_mdo 
[\[97b.2\]]sde 'di 'jig rten du rgya cher spel ba'i phyir rig sngags 'di bshad pa legs so legs so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po cig car stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la mgo bos phyag byas te/_pus mo g.yas 
[\[97b.3\]]pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te/_tshigs su bcad pa gya nom pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi yon tan la mngon par bstod pa/_bcom ldan zhal ni zla gtsang nya 'dra zhing /_/nyi ma stong gis 'od zer bkye dang mtshungs/_/spyan ni dag yangs pad+ma 
[\[97b.4\]]sngon po 'dra/_/tshems dkar gtams pa dper na dung dang mtshungs/_/bcom ldan yon tan mtha' med rgya mtsho 'dra/_/rin chen gya nom tshad med bden pa bsags/_/mkhyen pa'i yon tan chab kyis rtag rgyas shing /_/ting 'dzin dam pa brgya stong rab tu gang /_/zhabs 
[\[97b.5\]]mthil 'khor lo'i mtshan ni thams cad mdzes/_/lte ba mu khyud rtsibs stong kun rab mnyam/_/phyag dang zhabs kyi dra bas kun brgyan pas/_/ngang pa'i rgyal bzhin mtshan ni phun sum tshogs/_/bcom ldan sku 'od gser gyi ri bo 'dra/_/rnam dag khyad 'phags dpe zla yod 
[\[97b.6\]]ma mchis/_/ri rab bzhin du yon tan kun rgyas pas/_/bcom ldan ri rgyal khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/mtshan dang dpe byad mkha' bzhin dpag mi rig_/zla ba stong bas lhag par 'od zer bkye/_/smig rgyu sgyu ltar bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/thugs zhen mi mnga' 
[\[97b.7\]]khyod la bdag phyag 'tshal/_/de'i tshe rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde mchog 'di ni/_/bla med stobs bcu dag gis rab tu 
[\[98a\]]
[\[98a.1\]]gsungs/_/khyed cag rgyal po bzhi yis rab bsrungs la/_/rab dga' nur ba med pa'i sems skyed cig_/mdo sde'i rin chen gya nom zab mo 'di/_/sems can thams cad bde ba sbyin par byed/_/sems can de dag bde bar gyur pa'i phyir/_/rtag tu 
[\[98a.2\]]'dzam gling rab tu spel bar 'gyur/_/stong chen 'jig rten khams ni 'di dag tu/_/sems can rnam pa thams cad ji snyed pa/_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dud 'gro sems can dmyal ba yi/_/sdug bsngal 'gro ba de kun sel bar byed/_/'dzam gling 'di na gnas pa'i rgyal po dang /_/gzhan 
[\[98a.3\]]yang sems can rnam pa thams cad kun/_/mdo sde'i mthu yis rtag tu rab dga' zhing /_/nad mang sdug bsngal bsal bas chom rkun med/_/yul der mdo sde rgya cher spel ba'i phyir/_/rab bde lo legs mi mthun gnod pa med/_/gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan 
[\[98a.4\]]nas/_/cho rigs btsun zhing don ni gnyer ba dang /_/yul na lo legs rtsod pa med 'dod na/_/sems la bsams bzhin thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/pha rol dgra rnams phyir ni zlog byed cing /_/rang gi yul khams rtag tu bde bar 'gyur/_/mdo sde'i rgyal po 
[\[98a.5\]]dam pa 'di yi mthus/_/sdug bsngal mang spong mya ngan 'jigs pa med/_/rin chen shing rgyal khyim na gang gnas pa/_/bde ba'i yo byad thams cad skyed pa ltar/_/mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te/_/mi rgyal dag la yon tan mchog sbyin byed/_/dper na rab 
[\[98a.6\]]dang chu ni grang mo yis/_/skom pa'i gdung ba rnams ni sel ba ltar/_/mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te/_/bsod nams mos pa'i sems ni yongs rdzogs byed/_/mi zhig gya nom rin chen gzeb bdog na/_longs spyod sems la bsams bzhin 'byor pa ltar/_/
[\[98a.7\]]mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa'ang de bzhin te/_/bsod nams bsams bzhin 'grub pas rgud pa med/_/lha yi bdag po khyed dang lha tshogs kyis/_/mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa gyis/_/gal te bstan bzhin mdo sde 'dzin byed na/_/shes rab gzi byin thams cad phun tshogs 
[\[98b\]]
[\[98b.1\]]'gyur/_/da ltar phyogs bcur bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas kun/_/mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni gsung dgongs pas/_/klog 'don 'dzin pa dag ni gzigs gyur na/_/legs so ngo mtshar che zhes bsngags par 'gyur/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di ni nyan byed na/_/lus dang 
[\[98b.2\]]sems ni dga' rangs mgu ba skye/_/rtag par gnod sbyin brgya phrag mang po yis/_/gang du gnas pa der ni de srung byed/_/'jig rten khams 'di'i lha ni mang po rnams/_/de yi grangs ni tshad med bsam mi khyab/_/thams cad mdo sde'i dbang po 'di nyan pas/_/rab 
[\[98b.3\]]dga' srung byed nur ba ci yang med/_/gang zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan na/_/mthu che rab dpa' rtag par dbang dang ldan/_/mi yi 'khor mang thams cad phan 'dogs pas/_/gnod pa rab spong snang ba 'phel bar byed/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis tshigs 
[\[98b.4\]]su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/_dga' mgu rangs par gyur pas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis ni sngon chad nam yang mdo sde zab mo shin tu gya nom pa 'di lta bu ma thos so zhes rab tu dga' ba'i shugs kyis mchi ma 
[\[98b.5\]]blags te ngus nas lus kyi yan lag 'dar zhing g.yo bar gyur te/_ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po bsam gyis mi khyab pa mngon du gyur pas lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dang /_man dA ra ba chen po dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par gtor te/_khyad par du 'phags 
[\[98b.6\]]pa'i mchod pa byas nas yang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi la so so nas gnod sbyin gyi 'khor lnga brgya lnga brgya mchis pas rtag par gnas de dang de dag tu mdo sde 'di dang /_chos smra ba de dag la yongs su 
[\[98b.7\]]bsrung zhing yongs su skyob par byed pas ye shes kyi snang bas yongs su skyob par bgyid do/_/gal te mdo sde 'di'i tshig dang /_don bskyud pa zhig mchis na yang bdag cag gis de dag rjes su dran zhing mi bskyud par bgyi ba'i slad du gzungs kyi sgo shin tu khyad par du 
[\[99a\]]
[\[99a.1\]]'phags pa stsal nas yongs su rdzogs par bgyid do/_/gzhan yang mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di gang du gnas pa der sems can rnams la rgya cher spel zhing myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid lags so/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 
[\[99a.2\]]mang po'i nang du chos 'di bstan pa na sems can tshad med pa snyed shes rab chen po'i spobs pa thob nas bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa snyed yongs su bsdus te mya ngan gyi gnod pa dang bral nas rab tu dga' ba'i sems thob par gyur pas bstan bcos sna tshogs la rab tu 
[\[99a.3\]]mkhas pa dang /_nges par 'byung ba'i lam thob nas phyir mi ldog par gyur pas myur du byang chub mngon par rtogs par gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag gis yul bsrung ba'i le'u ste bcu 
[\[99a.4\]]gnyis pa'o//_//gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po/_bam po bdun pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu chos kyi rnam grangs mngon par zhen pa med pa'i 
[\[99a.5\]]gzungs zhes bya ba yod de/_de ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i chos/_'das pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su bzung ba/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mar gyur pa yin no/_/zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[99a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gzungs zhes bgyi ba gang gi tshig dang don gang zhig lags/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs zhes bgyi ba ni phyogs dang gnas ma lags pa/_phyogs dang gnas ma lags pa 
[\[99a.7\]]yang ma lags so zhes de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu khyod theg pa chen po la yang dag par gzhol zhing /_theg pa chen po la mngon par yid ches nas/_theg pa chen po la bla mar byas 
[\[99b\]]
[\[99b.1\]]pa legs so legs so/_/khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin du gzungs zhes bya ba ni phyogs dang gnas yod pa yang ma yin/_phyogs dang gnas med pa yang ma yin/_chos kyang ma yin/_chos ma yin pa yang ma yin/_'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa 
[\[99b.2\]]yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin/_dngos po yang ma yin/_dngos po ma yin pa yang ma yin/_rkyen yang ma yin/_rkyen ma yin pa yang ma yin/_'du byed kyang ma yin/_'du byed ma yin pa yang ma yin/_chos skye bar 'gyur ba yang med/_chos 
[\[99b.3\]]'gag par 'gyur ba yang med mod kyi/_'on kyang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan gdags pa'i phyir de skad du bstan pa yin te gzungs 'di'i yon tan gyi nus pa dang yang dag pa'i lam gyi tshul dang mthu stobs rnam par gzhag pa gang yin pa de ni sangs rgyas rnams 
[\[99b.4\]]kyi yon tan dang /_sangs rgyas rnams kyi tshul khrims dang /_sangs rgyas rnams kyi bslab pa dang /_sangs rgyas rnams kyi gsang ba'i dgongs pa dang /_sangs rgyas rnams kyi skye ba'i 'byung gnas yin pa'i phyir mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs mchog tu gya nom pa'i chos 
[\[99b.5\]]kyi rnam grangs zhes bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bde bar gshegs pas bdag la gzungs 'di'i cho ga gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol/_gal te byang chub 
[\[99b.6\]]sems dpa' rnams kyis 'di la gnas par gyur na bla na ma mchis pa'i byang chub las ldog par mi 'gyur zhing yang dag pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs nas gnas ma mchis pa dang /_rang bzhin gyi spobs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i dngos po 
[\[99b.7\]]thob nas 'phags pa'i lam la gnas par 'gyur ba 'di dag thams cad kyang gzungs 'di thob par 'gyur ba'i slad du'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu legs so legs so/_/de de bzhin no/_/de de bzhin te/_khyod kyis ji skad smras pa 
[\[100a\]]
[\[100a.1\]]bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di thob par gyur na/_gang zag de ni sangs rgyas dang tha dad pa med par rig par bya'o/_/gang la la zhig gis byang chub sems dpa' de la mchod cing bkur sti byed pa dang /_bla mar byed cing yo 
[\[100a.2\]]byad sbyin par byed na de ni sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa byas pa yin par rig par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gang zag gzhan gang la la zhig gzungs 'di thos nas len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton du 'don pa dang /_mngon par yid ches par gyur pa de la 
[\[100a.3\]]'di ltar sangs rgyas dang tha dad pa med par bkur sti byas nas mchod cing rim gro byas na rgyu dang rkyen des bla na med pa'i 'bras bu thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags bka' stsal pa/_tad+ya thA/_san d+hA ra Ni/_uta d+hA ra Ni/_su saM pra tiSh+Thi te/_su nA 
[\[100a.4\]]ma/_su pra tiSh+Thi te/_bi dza ya ba la/_sat+t+ya pra ti dz+nyA/_su A ro ha/_dz+nyA na pra ti/_ut+pA da ni/_a ba nA ba ni/_a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni/_a b+hi ba ya hA ra/_shu b+ha ba ti/_su ni shri ta/_ba hu guM b+ha/_a b+hi ba dA swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu 
[\[100a.5\]]mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs kyi tshig 'di la byang chub sems dpa' gang la la zhig rab tu gnas nas yang dag par 'dzin par byed na/_gang zag de ni bskal pa gcig gam/_bskal pa brgya'am/_bskal pa stong ngam/_bskal pa brgya stong gi bar du yang dag pa'i 
[\[100a.6\]]smon lam bskyed pa mthar thug pa med cing ral gri dang /_dbyug pa dang /_dug dang /_chu dang /_me dang /_gcan gzan ma rungs pa rnams kyis de'i lus la gnod par byed mi nus par rig par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs 
[\[100a.7\]]'di ni 'das pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum dang /_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pas so/_/shA ri'i bu gang la la zhig gis grangs med pa bcu'i stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams rin 
[\[100b\]]
[\[100b.1\]]po che sna bdun gyis yongs su bkang ste de bzhin gshegs pa la phul nas bskal pa grangs med pa'i bar du na bza' dang /_zhal zas mchog dam pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi mchod pa byas pa bas/_gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di ni tha na tshig gcig tsam yang dag par bzung ba las 
[\[100b.2\]]byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de ches rab tu mang ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs shin tu zab pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir ro/_/de'i tshe tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_'khor 
[\[100b.3\]]mang po rnams la de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur pas thams cad kyis yongs su 'dzin par mos par gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las mngon par zhen pa med pa'i gzungs kyi le'u ste bcu 
[\[100b.4\]]gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che zhes bya ba'i gzungs gnod pa thams cad ring du spong 
[\[100b.5\]]ba 'brug dang glog ma rungs pa thams cad 'gog cing 'jil bar byed pa yod de/_de ni 'das pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa yin pas/_ngas kyang deng mdo sde 'di lha dang mi rnams la phan pa 
[\[100b.6\]]dang /_'jig rten la brtse ba dang /_thams cad yongs su bsrungs nas bde ba 'thob par bya ba'i phyir 'khor mang po khyed la yang dag par bstan par bya'o/_/de nas 'khor mang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa 
[\[100b.7\]]thos pa dang /_so so nas sems rtse gcig tu bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du bltas nas rig sngags mnyan par gyur to/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_khyed cag legs par nyon cig_/'di nas shar phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po a ga ta 
[\[101a\]]
[\[101a.1\]]zhes bya ba dang /_lho phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po sha te ru zhes bya ba dang /_nub phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po tsu te kwang zhes bya ba dang /_byang phyogs na glog 'od snang ba'i rgyal po su ta ma ni zhes bya ba so so na yod de/_rigs kyi 
[\[101a.2\]]bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis glog gi rgyal po 'di dag gi ming thos shing phyogs shes par gyur na/_gang zag de 'jigs shing skrag pa'i dngos po thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur zhing glo bur gyi gnod pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/gal te gang du gnas 
[\[101a.3\]]pa'i gnas der phyogs bzhi'i glog gi rgyal po 'di dag gi ming yi ger bris par gyur na gang du gnas pa'i gnas de dag tu 'brug dang glog gis 'jigs pa med cing gdon bgegs dang gnod pa'i sgrib pa med par 'gyur/_dus ma yin par glo bur du 'chi ba thams cad 
[\[101a.4\]]thag ring du spong bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs sngags bka' stsal pa/_tad+ya thA/_ni mi ni mi ni min+d+ha ri in dre s+t+rai lo ka_/lo ka ni/_shi ri sho la ba ti/_ha rak+Sha ha rak+Sha/_bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba'i gnas 'dir 'jigs shing skrag pa thams 
[\[101a.5\]]cad dang /_sdug bsngal thams cad kyis 'tshe ba dang /_'brug dang /_glog dang /_thog 'bab pa dang /_glo bur du 'chi bar 'gyur ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang bral bar gyur cig swA hA/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po spyan ras gzigs 
[\[101a.6\]]kyi dbang phyug 'khor mang po'i nang du 'dug pa'i stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag kyang deng lha dang mi rnams la sman par bgyi ba dang /_
[\[101a.7\]]'jig rten la brtse ba dang /_thams cad yongs su bsrungs nas bde ba 'thob par bgyi ba dang /_mthu chen po'i stobs dang ldan zhing smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs gang 
[\[101b\]]
[\[101b.1\]]lags pa mdo tsam zhig bstan par bgyi'o/_/de nas gzungs sngags smras pa/_tad+ya thA/_ka Te/_bi ka Te/_ni ka Te/_pra t+yar+thi ke_/pra t+ya mi tre/_shud+d+he muk+te/_bi ma le/_pra b+hA swa re/_aN+Da re/_paN+Da re/_shwe te/_paN+Da ra bA si ni/_ha ri kaN+Da ri/_ping+ga la/_
[\[101b.2\]]a k+Shi da d+hi mu khi rak+Sha rak+Sha/_bdag ming 'di zhes bgyi ba'i gnas 'dir 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad dang /_sdug bsngal gyis 'tshe ba nas glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad bral bar gyur cig_/bdag gis sdig pa'i dngos po ngan pa thams cad mi mthong zhing rtag par 
[\[101b.3\]]byang chub sems dpa' 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi thugs rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs kyis dgongs shing yongs su bsrung bar gyur cig swA hA/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas 
[\[101b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang deng lha dang mi rnams la sman pa cher bgyi ba dang /_'jig rten la brtse ba dang /_thams cad yongs su bsrungs nas gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa dang /_smon pa rnams yid bzhin 
[\[101b.5\]]du 'grub par bgyi ba'i ched du mi pham pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs bshad par bgyi'o/_/de nas gzungs sngags smras pa/_tad+ya thA/_mu ni mu ni/_mu ni na d+ha ri/_mu ni ma ti ma ti/_su ma ti/_ma hA ma ti/_hA hA hA hA ma b+ha yan+tI ti pA pa/_badzra pA Ni A ha drA bi Da swA hA/_bcom 
[\[101b.6\]]ldan 'das bdag gis gzungs sngags 'di ni mi pham par srung ba zhes bgyi ste/_skyes pa'am bud med gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu yang dag par bzung ste yi ger 'dri ba dang /_klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_mi bskyud cing rjes su dran par bgyid na bdag gdugs mtshan du 
[\[101b.7\]]de la yongs su bsrung bar bgyid pas 'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad nas glo bur du 'chi ba thams cad thag ring du spong bar 'gyur lags so/_/de nas mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po stan las langs te/_gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[102a\]]
[\[102a.1\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la yang shin tu gya nom pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs kyi gzungs lha dang mi rnams la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa/_'jig rten la rab tu 'tshe ba thams cad yongs su srung bar bgyid pa/_gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan 
[\[102a.2\]]pa/_smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid pa mchis te/_gzungs sngags de bshad par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li mi li/_tsi li swA hA/_brah+mapU re swA hA/_brah+ma swa re swA hA/_brah+ma b+hi su gar+b+he/_puSh+pa saM sta re swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi gzungs 'di 
[\[102a.3\]]ni tshangs pa'i chad pas bcad pa zhes bgyi ste gzungs 'di 'dzin pa dag la yongs su bsrung bar bgyid pas mya ngan gyis gnod pa dang /_sdig pa'i las rnams thag ring du spong zhing /_glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad kyang yongs su spong bar bgyid do/_/de nas brgya byin 
[\[102a.4\]]lha'i dbang po stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la yang badzra sha ni zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs rig sngags chen mo 'jigs shing skrag pa dang /_gdon bgegs thams cad rab tu sel ba/_glo 
[\[102a.5\]]bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad thag ring du spong ba sdug bsngal las drangs nas bde ba stsol ba lha dang mi rnams la sman par bgyid pa mchis te gzungs de bshad par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ni ba rA Ni/_ban+d+ha mA dan+ti ma ti ti ti ti/_gau rI gan+d+ha ri/_tsaN+Da li/_mA tang+gi/_puk+ka si/_pa 
[\[102a.6\]]ra Na le hi na ma d+h+ya ma d+ha ri Ni/_ma la ni/_da la ma da de/_tsa drA bA krI/_sha ba ri sha ba ri swA hA/_de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos dang /_lha'i rgyal po yul 'khor srung dang /_lha'i rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang /_lha'i rgyal po mig mi bzang cig car stan las langs te gus 
[\[102a.7\]]pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la yang sems can thams cad la mi 'jigs pa sbyin pa zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs sdug bsngal gyis nyon mongs pa las rtag par yongs su bskyabs nas bde ba thob par bgyid 
[\[102b\]]
[\[102b.1\]]pa tshe 'phel bar bgyid cing nad kyi sdug bsngal ma mchis par bgyid pa glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad thag ring du spong bar bgyid pa mchis te gzungs sngags de brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_puSh+pe/_su puSh+pe/_d+hu ma pa ri hA re/_Ar+ya pra sha ste shAn+ti/_nirmu k+te/_maM 
[\[102b.2\]]ga l+ya/_hi ra N+ya gar+b+he stu te/_sta bi te swA hA/_de nas yang klu'i rgyal po chen po mang po 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po nA ga si dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang /_klu'i rgyal po gya nom 'od la sogs pa stan las 
[\[102b.3\]]langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag la yang yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs glog ma rungs pa 'gog par bgyid pa/_'jigs shing skrag pa rnams rab tu sel ba/_
[\[102b.4\]]lha dang mi rnams la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa/_'jig rten la snying brtse ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa/_gzi byin chen po'i mthu dang ldan pa/_smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub pa/_glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad thag ring du spong ba/_dug thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid 
[\[102b.5\]]pa/_byad stems dang /_sngags dang /_bkra mi shis pa'i dngos po thams cad yongs su sel bar bgyid pa mchis te/_bdag cag gzungs sngags 'di bcom ldan 'das la 'bul na thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_bdag cag klu'i 'gro ba 'di dang bral nas ser 
[\[102b.6\]]sna'i 'dod pa gtan du spang ba'i slad du bzhes su gsol/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_ser sna'i 'dod pa 'di'i dbang gis 'khor ba na sdug bsngal mang po myong bar 'gyur bas/_bdag cag ser sna'i 'dod pa'i sa bon yongs su gcod par 'tshal lags so/_/de nas gzungs sngags 
[\[102b.7\]]smras pa/_tad+ya thA/_a tsa le/_a ma re/_a mr-i te/_ak+Sha ye/_a b+hi ye/_pu N+yai pa r+ya ba te/_sarba pA paM pra sha mA ni ye swA hA/_AR+Ya pu N+ya so bA ki ye swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la la zhig rig sngags 'di g.yar kha nas brjod 
[\[103a\]]
[\[103a.1\]]par bgyid dam/_yi ger bris te glegs bam du bgyis nas 'chang zhing 'dzin par bgyid dam/_klog cing 'don par bgyid dam/_gus pas mchod par bgyid na/_'brug dang glog dang thog mi 'bab cing skrag pa dang 'jigs pa dang sdug bsngal 
[\[103a.2\]]gyis nyon mongs pa dang /_mya ngan dang nad dang glo bur du 'chi ba'i bar thams cad thag ring du spong bar 'gyur/_dug dang byad stems dang mi la gnod pa bgyid pa'i stag dang /_seng ge dang /_spyang ki dang /_sbrul gdug pa rnams dang /_sbrang ma dang /_sbrang bu mchu [{]rings [,]ring [}]
[\[103a.3\]]la sogs pas kyang gnod pa bgyid par mi 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa legs so legs so/_/gzungs sngags 'di dag thams cad mthu chen po dang ldan pas sems can gyi mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems 
[\[103a.4\]]la bsam pa'i dngos po rnams yongs su rdzogs par byed/_rgya cher phan 'dogs par byed do/_/sems rtse gcig tu ma byas pa ni ma gtogs so/_/khyed cag the tsom ma za shig_/de nas 'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pa dang /_
[\[103a.5\]]rab tu dga' bas mngon par yid ches par gyur nas bka' yang dag par bzung bar gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che'i gzungs kyi le'u ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas lha mo 
[\[103a.6\]]spobs pa chen mo 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das chos smra ba'i mkhan po gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 
[\[103a.7\]]'di yang dag par ston par bgyid na/_bdag gis shes rab 'phel bar bgyis nas rgyan dang ldan pa'i tshig gis spobs pa phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/_/gal te chos smra ba'i mkhan po de mdo sde 'di'i tshig 'bru dang /_yi ge dang /_tshig gi don bskyud pa zhig mchis na yang 
[\[103b\]]
[\[103b.1\]]thams cad rjes su dran zhing legs par khong du chud par bgyis nas gzungs kyi kun 'dzin thogs pa ma mchis pa stsal bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di sems can gang dag sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa 
[\[103b.2\]]ba bskyed nas yongs su 'dzin par bgyid pa de dag gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher spel nas myur du nub par mi 'gyur zhing sems can tshad ma mchis pa snyed mdo sde 'di thos pa'i dbang gis thams cad shin tu myur ba'i spobs pa dang /_bsam pa ma mchis pa'i shes 
[\[103b.3\]]rab chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thos nas bstan bcos sna tshogs dang /_sgyu rtsal rnams la rab tu mkhas pa dang /_'khor ba las myur du nges par byung nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar bgyid do/_/tshe 'di nyid la yang 
[\[103b.4\]]tshe 'phel zhing 'tsho ba'i yo byad rnams phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis mdo sde 'dzin pa'i chos kyi mkhan po de dag dang sems can gzhan gang mdo sde 'di mnyan par mos pa de dag gi ched du sman la sngags kyis btab nas khrus bgyi ba'i cho ga bshad 
[\[103b.5\]]par 'tshal te/_des de dag la gza' ma rungs pa ltas ngan ston pa ci mchis pa dang /_dang po btsas pa'i gza' skar dang /_phan tshun mi mthun par gyur pa dang /_nad kyi sdug bsngal dang /_'thab pa dang /_rtsod pa dang /_g.yul 'gyed pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa 
[\[103b.6\]]dang /_gdon bgegs dang /_byad stems dang /_dug dang /_ngan du bgyis pa dang /_sngags dang /_ro langs dang /_'di lta bu la sogs pa'i sdig pa rnams kyi sgrib pa dang bgegs bgyid pa thams cad yongs su bsal nas rab tu zhi bar bgyid pas blo dang ldan pa 
[\[103b.7\]]rnams kyis khrus kyi cho ga 'di ltar bgyis te/_des sman spos kyi ro dang ldan pa sum cu rtsa gnyis po 'di lta ste/_shu dag gi'u wang dang ni spri ka spos/_/gla rtsi ba bla dag dang shi ri sha/_/in dra hasta sha ma ka sha mi/_/thang chu dang ni shing tsha gla sgang dang /_a ga ru dang 
[\[104a\]]
[\[104a.1\]]tsan+dan ta ka ra/_/sa la ki dang gur kum ha la sa/_/na tra smig bcud su ki ma le dang /_/thang shing pa tra dang ni on sha la/_/sa la ke dang spra ba gu gul dang /_/yungs kar go snyod nA ga ge sar/_/sardza ra sa ru rta cha mnyam bgyi/_/skar ma rgyal la 
[\[104a.2\]]gcig tu btags nas ni/_/spos kyi phye ma de dag rab blangs te/_/sngags 'dis lan brgya rtsa brgyad gdab par bgyi/_/sngags ni 'di lta ste/_tad+ya thA/_su te/_kr-i te/_ka ma ta li/_na le dza na kar te/_hang+ka ra te/_in+d+ra dza li ni/_shaM ka ra dri/_pa shad dre/_a brta ka_
[\[104a.3\]]si ke na ku tra ku ka/_kha ke ba bIr+ye/_bi la ka bi la ma ti/_shI la ma ti/_shI la ma ti/_san+d+hi d+hu d+hu ma ba ti/_pa pang ku/_bany+tsi le/_shi ri sha ri/_sang+t+ya s+thi ti swA hA/_gal te chos bzhin khrus ni bgyid 'tshal na/_/dkyil 'khor gru bzhi khru brgyad pa bgyis nas/_/rab tu dben 
[\[104a.4\]]zhing bde ba'i gnas dag tu/_/don gang sgrub pa sems la dran par bgyi/_/ba lang lci bas dkyil 'khor byugs nas ni/_/steng du me tog kun tu dgram par bgyi/_/gser dngul snod ni shin tu gtsang ma dag_/ro mchog 'o ma sbrang rtsis dgang bar bgyi/_/dkyil 'khor de yi 
[\[104a.5\]]sgo bzhi dag tu yang /_/skyes bu bzhi zhig chos bzhin bsrung du stsal/_gzhon nu bzhi zhig lus ni rab brgyan nas/_/so sor grwa rer chab kyi bum pa thogs/_/der ni rtag par gu gul bsregs nas ni/_/dbyangs lnga'i rol mo rgyun mi 'chad par bgyi/_/dkyil 'khor de yi ngos 
[\[104a.6\]]bzhi dag tu yang /_/ba dan gdugs dang lda ldis mdzes par bgyi/_/dkyil 'khor nang du me long gsal ba dang /_/ral gri rnon po mda' bzhi gzhag par bgyi/_/dkyil 'khor dbus su gzhong khung cher stsal nas/_/'dzeg pa'i shing leb de yi steng du bzhag_/snga ma'i phyi ma 
[\[104a.7\]]chab dang sbyar nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor de yi nang du gzhag par bgyi/_/de ltar bkram zhing rnam par bzhag nas ni/_/de nas sngags bzlas dkyil 'khor mtshams bcad bgyi/_/mtshams bcad pa yi sngags ni 'di lta ste/_/sAd+ya the dan/_a ka ra ke_/na ya ne/_hi le 
[\[104b\]]
[\[104b.1\]]mi le gi le/_khi khi le swA hA/_/de ltar mtshams ni rab bcad nas/_/dkyil 'khor nang du zhugs nas ni/_/nyi shu rtsa gcig chab bsngags te/_/phyogs bzhi dag tu gtor bar bgyi/_/de nas spos chab dag la ni/_/brgya rtsa brgyad tshang sngags btab ste/_/ngos bzhir yol 
[\[104b.2\]]bas bskor nas ni/_/de 'og lus ni bkru bar bgyi/_/chab dang spos chab la gdab pa'i sngags ni 'di lta ste/_/tad+ya thA/_sa ga De bi ga De/_bi ga ta ba ti swA hA/_khrus bgyis lags nas khrus bgyis pa'i chab dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi nang du mchod par bgyis pa'i bza' ba dang /_
[\[104b.3\]]btung ba ci mchis pa gtsang po'am/_rdzing gi nang du dor bar bgyi zhing gzhan ni bsdu bar bgyi'o/_/de ltar khrus bgyis lags nas gos gtsang ma bgos te/_dkyil 'khor nas phyir byung nas khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du zhugs te/_sngags mkhan gyis de dag yi dam rgya chen po slad du 
[\[104b.4\]]stsal nas sdig pa sna tshogs gtan du bcad cing dge ba sna tshogs rtag par spyad nas sems can rnams la snying rje chen po bskyed par bgyi ste/_rgyu dang rkyen des na yid bzhin gyi bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa tshad ma mchis pa snyed thob par 'gyur lags so/_/yang tshigs su bcad de gsol 
[\[104b.5\]]pa/_sems can gang zhig nad kyi sdug bsngal nyen/_/sman spyad sna tshogs gsos kyang ma sos pa/_/khrus kyi cho ga 'di bzhin khrus bgyis te/_/gzhan yang mdo sde 'di ni klog bton nas/_/gdugs mtshan rtag par sems ni mi g.yeng bar/_/rtse gcig gus pas dang sems 
[\[104b.6\]]bskyed bgyid nas/_/nad kyi sdug bsngal bas par zhi bar 'gyur/_/dbul phongs thar nas nor dang ldan par 'gyur/_/phyogs bzhi yi gza' skar nyi zla yi lha/_/mthu yis rab bsrungs tshe ni ring bar 'gyur/_/bkra shis rab bde bsod nams yongs su 'phel/_/ltas ngan 
[\[104b.7\]]gnod pa thams cad sel bar bgyid/_/de'i 'og tu lus bsrung ba'i sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzla bar bgyi'o/_/sngags ni 'di lta ste/_/tad+ya thA/_sa me/_bi sa me swA hA/_sa ga De/_bi ga De swA hA/_sA ga ra saM bud d+hA ya swA hA/_skan d+ha mA tA ya swA hA/_nI la kaN+ThA 
[\[105a\]]
[\[105a.1\]]ya swA hA/_a pa rA dzi ta bir+ya ya swA hA/_hi ma ban+d+ha saM b+hu tA ya swA hA/_a ni bi la bak+tA ya swA hA/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_brah+ma Ne swA hA/_na maHsa ra swa t+yai ma hA de bi ye swA hA/_sid+d+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa dA swA hA/_d+ha ra to/_bi tsi ta/_brah+mA nu ma n+ya tu swA hA/_de nas lha mo spobs
