[\[105a.2\]]pa chen mo khrus kyi cho ga dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi sngags bshad nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas te bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig mdo sde'i 
[\[105a.3\]]rgyal po dam pa 'di len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kha ton du 'don pa dang /_yi ger bris nas spel ba dang /_ji skad bstan pa bzhin du spyod par bgyid na/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_'brog dgon pa'am/_ri 'am/_nags tshal lam/_dge slong 
[\[105a.4\]]ngam/_dge slong ma'i gnas gang yang rung ba dag tu gnas kyang rung ste/_bdag de'i ched du 'khor rnams dang lhan cig lha'i 'khor mo bgyis nas de'i thad du mchis te/_yongs su skyob pa dang bsrung ba bgyis nas nad kyi sdug bsngal dang /_skar mda' ltung ba dang /_ltas ngan 
[\[105a.5\]]dang /_rims nad dang /_'thab cing rtsod pa rnams sel bar bgyid/_rgyal po'i khrims kyis gzung ba dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_'dre srin ma rungs pas gnod par bgyid pa dang /_byad stems thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyis nas/_mdo sde 'dzin pa'i gang zag dge 
[\[105a.6\]]slong la sogs pa'i 'khor dang /_nyan pa'i 'khor rnams myur du 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po las yongs su bzlas nas byang chub las ldog par mi 'gyur bar phan 'dogs par bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces gsol pa gsan pa dang /_lha mo spobs 
[\[105a.7\]]pa chen mo la/_lha mo khyod kyis sems can tshad med cing mtha' med pa dag la phan pa dang /_bde bar bya ba'i ched du rig sngags de dag dang /_spos chus khrus bya ba dang /_dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa yang dag par bshad 
[\[105b\]]
[\[105b.1\]]pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas khyod kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di bsrungs nas myur du nub par mi 'gyur zhing rtag par rgya cher gnas par 'gyur bar byos shig_/de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 
[\[105b.2\]]byas nas rang gi stan la 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas bram ze kauN+Di n+yas chos kyi slob dpon gyis lung bstan pa bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus 'khor mang po'i mdun du lha mo spobs pa chen mo la mngon par bstod pa/_shes rab gsal dpa' spobs pa'i 
[\[105b.3\]]lha mo khyod/_/lha mi'i mchod pa dag gis mchod par 'os/_/grags pas 'jig rten kun du rgyas pas na/_/sems can thams cad re ba rdzogs par byed/_/ri rtse mthon po'i gnas mchog dag tu ni/_/rtswa bsdus khyim byas de na rab tu gnas/_/rgyun du rtswa 'jam mdun 
[\[105b.4\]]nas gos byas te/_/rtag par rkang pa ya gcig bkug ste 'greng /_/lha 'khor mang po thams cad 'dus nas lhags/_/thams cad rtse gcig sems kyis khyod la bsngags/_/shes rab spobs pa ldan pa'i lha mo khyod/_/tshig snyan gya nom thams cad sbyin par gyis/_/
[\[105b.5\]]de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mo des gsol ba btab pa mnyan nas gzungs sngags smras pa/_sAd+ya the dan/_mu re tsi re/_a ba dze/_a ba dza ba ti/_hing+gu le/_mid+gu le/_ping+ga la ba ti/_mung+ga She/_ma rI ts+yai/_swa ma ti/_da sha ma ti/_a g+h+ri tam g+h+ri ta ra tsi/_ta ra tsa ba 
[\[105b.6\]]ti/_tsi tsi ri/_shi ri mi ri/_ma nan+d+hi/_da ma khi/_ma rI ts+yai/_prA na pri ye/_lo ka dz+yeSh+The/_lo ka shreSh+The/_bi ra tse/_lo ka pri ya/_sid+d+ha pra te/_b+hI ma mu khi/_shu tsi tsa ri/_a pra ti ha te/_a pra ti ha ta bud+d+hi/_na mu tsi/_ma hA na mu tsi/_ma hA na mu tsi/_ma hA de byi/_pra ti/_grIhA/_
[\[105b.7\]]na ma ska rA na bdag gi ming brjod/_ma ma bud+d+hi/_dra sha hi bud+d+hi/_a pra ti ha ta/_b+ha tu/_si b+ha me/_bi shud tsi to/_sha sh+tha sho lo ka_/man+t+ra bi d+hi ka_/ka pi ya d+hi sho/_tad+ya thA/_ma hA pra b+hA be/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_bi tsa ro/_bi tsa to/_bi bud+d+hi/_bdag gi 
[\[106a\]]
[\[106a.1\]]ming brjod/_ma ma bud+d+hi/_bi shud+d+hi/_b+ha ga bad t+yaM/_be ba yaM/_spa ra sa t+ya/_ka ra de/_ke yU re/_ke yU ra ma ti/_hi li mi li/_a pa ya me/_ma hA de be/_bud+d+ha sa t+ya na/_d+harma sa t+ya/_saM g+ha sa t+ye na/_in+d+ra sa t+ye na/_ba ru Na sa t+ye na/_ye lo 
[\[106a.2\]]ke/_sa t+ya sa t+ye na/_te sha ma sa t+ye na/_sat+ti bad tsa ni ni/_a ba ha ya mi/_ma hA de be/_hi li mi li/_hi li mi li/_bi tsi da to/_bdag gi ming brjod/_ma ma bud+d+hi/_na mo b+ha ba ti/_ma hA de be sa ra sa t+ya sid+b+h+yan+tu man+t+ra pa dA ni swA hA/_de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos 
[\[106a.3\]]gzungs sngags 'di bstan nas bram ze de la 'di skad ces kye skyes bu chen po sems can rnams kyi ched du spobs pa gya nom pa dang /_rin po che dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_shes rab yongs su gnyer nas thams cad la rgya cher phan btags te myur du byang chub mngon du byed par 
[\[106a.4\]]'dod pa legs so legs so/_/de ltar shes par byas nas cho ga 'di gzung bar bya'o/_/zhes smras nas yang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_thog ma kho nar gzungs 'di kha ton du/_/byang zhing nor ba med par bklags nas ni/_/byin gyis rlob cing smon pa rdzogs 
[\[106a.5\]]bya'i phyir/_/dkon mchog gsum dang lha rnams skyabs 'gro zhing /_/sangs rgyas chos dang byang chub sems dpa' dang /_/rang rgyal nyan thos tshogs la gus phyag byas/_/de 'og tshangs dang brgya byin lha dbang dang /_/'jig rten skyong dang rgyal po chen po bzhis/_/rtag 
[\[106a.6\]]par tshangs par spyod pa thams cad la/_/rtse gcig yid kyis gus par phyag byas nas/_/dgon pa rab tu dben pa'i gnas dag tu/_/skad cher snga ma'i sngags dang cho ga gdon/_/sangs rgyas sku gzugs lha klu'i mdun dag tu/_/ji tsam 'byor bas mchod pa bsgrub 
[\[106a.7\]]par bya/_/sems can rnam pa de dag thams cad la/_/byams dang snying rjes brtse ba'i sems kyang bskyed/_/bcom ldan gser sku shin tu gya nom mtshan/_/g.yeng ba med sems rtse gcig dran par bya/_/bcom ldan yang dag chos ston dgongs mdzad pas/_/
[\[106b\]]
[\[106b.1\]]dbang po ji bzhin ting 'dzin sgom la 'god/_/de yi tshig gi don ni legs soms la/_/stong pa nyid brten rab tu bsgom par gyis/_/bcom ldan sku gzugs dag gi spyan sngar ni/_/rtse gcig yang dag dran pas gnas byed na/_/gya nom ye shes ting nge 'dzin dag 
[\[106b.2\]]dang /_/gzungs mchog dam pa dag kyang 'thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan gser zhal yang dag chos bstan nas/_/gya nom dbyangs kyis lha mi 'dul bar mdzad/_/ljags mtshan rkyen bzhin ngo mtshar rab ston pas/_/yangs ring stong gsum 'jig rten khyab 
[\[106b.3\]]par mdzad/_/bcom ldan gsung dbyangs gya nom de 'dra ba/_/rtse gcig dran na sems la 'jigs med 'thob/_/bcom ldan smon lam rgya chen btab pa'i dbang /_/ljags mtshan bsam gyis mi khyab 'di brnyes nas/_/chos rnams yod pa ma yin gsung mdzad 
[\[106b.4\]]pas/_/dper na nam mkha' chags pa med pa 'dra/_/bcom ldan gsung dbyangs dag dang ljags mtshan rnams/_/dran pa nye gzhag gzhal byed smon rdzogs 'gyur/_/gal te lha mo spobs chen mchod mthong ngam/_/slob mas slob dpon rjes slob mthong nas 
[\[106b.5\]]ni/_/gsang ba'i cho ga 'di blangs sgom byed dam/_/bla mar byed na sems la bsam pa 'grub/_/gang zhig ye shes dam pa mchog 'dod na/_/rtse gcig sems kyis chos 'di gzung bar bya/_/bsod nams ye shes yon tan 'phel byed pas/_/nges par 'grub 'gyur 
[\[106b.6\]]the tsom yongs ma bskyed/_/nor tshol dag ni nor mang rnyed par 'gyur/_/grags pa gnyer ba grags chen thob par 'gyur/_/nges 'byung tshol ba rnam par grol 'gyur bas/_/nges par 'grub 'gyur the tsom yongs ma bskyed/_/yon tan tshad med mtha' las ji snyed pa/_/
[\[106b.7\]]sems la bsams bzhin yongs su sdud par byed/_/gal te de ltar chos bzhin spyod nus na/_/nges par 'grub 'gyur the tsom yongs ma bskyed/_/gtsang ma'i gnas su gos sar bgos nas ni/_/dkyil 'khor che chung ci tsam nus par bya/_/bum pa gtsang ma bzhir 
[\[107a\]]
[\[107a.1\]]ni ro zhim bkang /_/me tog pog spos ci 'byor mchod par bya/_/lda ldi ba dan dag dang gdugs bres te/_/byug spos phye ma kun du khyab brgyan nas/_/sangs rgyas lha mo spobs chen mchod byed na/_/lha lus mthong bar 'dod na'ang smon bzhin 
[\[107a.2\]]'grub/_/lha mo spobs chen mdun du snga ma'i sngags/_/zhag ni nyi shu rtsa gcig gdon par bya/_/gal te lha de mthong bar ma gyur na/_/rtse gcig sems kyis zhag dgu dran par byed/_/nam gyi cha smad 'on kyang ma mthong na/_/gnas gtsang dam pa gzhan dag 
[\[107a.3\]]btsal nas ni/_/lha mo spobs chen gzugs ni rab bris te/_/mchod gnas bzlas brjod sems kyis mi btang zhing /_/gnyid dang le lo sems ni mi bskyed na/_/bdag dang gzhan la phan 'dogs mthar thug med/_/rnam smin gang thob skye dgu smin byed na/_/smon 
[\[107a.4\]]pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur/_/gal te yid bzhin ma grub zla ba gsum/_/yang na drug dang dgu dang lo gcig par/_/rab brtson gsol 'debs sems ni mi g.yo na/_/lha yi mig dang gzhan sems shes thob 'gyur/_/de nas bram ze kauN+Di n+yas de skad 
[\[107a.5\]]ces bstan pa thos pa dang /_dga' mgu rangs shing ngo mtshar du gyur pas 'khor mang po rnams 'di skad ces kye khyed cag lha dang mi'i 'khor mang po thams cad shes par byos la/_sems rtse gcig tu deng bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa'i chos la brten nas lha mo spobs pa 
[\[107a.6\]]mchog dam pa de dag la bsngags pa brjod pa nyon cig_/ces smras nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_'jig rten dag na dbang phyug thob 'gyur ba/_/lha mo mthu chen thob la gus phyag 'tshal/_/deng bdag gtso mo de la bsngags pa yang /_sngon gyi drang srong ji skad 
[\[107a.7\]]bstan pa bzhin/_/bkra shis yongs rdzogs sems ni bde bar gnas/_/sems gsal ngo tsha khrel yod grags dang ldan/_/ma ma byas te 'jig rten rab tu bskyed/_/rab dpa' rtag par brtson 'grus chen po spyod/_/thab mo'i g.yul du rtag par rgyun du rgyal/_/rab 
[\[107b\]]
[\[107b.1\]]dul byams sems bzod pa gsol bar byed/_/da ltar gshin rje'i sring mo chen mor gyur/_/gos su rtag par dar tshon sngon po gyon/_/sdug dang mi sdug byad bzhin kun dang ldan/_/mig ni mthong ba thams cad rab tu dngang /_/spyod mchog dam pa tshad med 'jig rten 
[\[107b.2\]]'das/_/phyogs shing mngon dang mi kun yongs su sdud/_/res 'ga' ri brag zab mo dag na gnas/_/res 'ga' brag phug gtsang po'i 'gram na gnas/_/res 'ga' ljon shing nags tshal chen por gnas/_/lha mo phal cher de dag kun du gnas/_/ri dang nags 
[\[107b.3\]]tshal mi rgod ji snyed pa/_/rtag par lha mo la ni mchod par byed/_/rma bya'i sgros ni rgyal mtshan ba dan byed/_/dus so cog tu rtag par 'jig rten skyong /_/stag dang seng ge spyang kis rgyun du bskor/_/gnag lug bya la sogs pas rten yang 'cha'/_/dril chen bsgrags 
[\[107b.4\]]nas sgra ni phyung bas na/_/bin d+ha'i ri la sgra ni kun du grags/_/res 'ga' rtse gsum tri shUl thogs byed cing /_/g.yas g.yon rgyun du nyi zla ru mtshon 'dzin/_/zla ba nag po'i tshes dgu bcu gcig la/_/de yi dus su rtag par mchod par bya/_/res 'ga' ba su lha chen sring 
[\[107b.5\]]mor ston/_/g.yul 'gyed mthong na rtag par snying yang brtse/_/sems can thams cad rnam par lta ba la/_/lha mo mchog tu gyur pas bdas pa med/_/res 'ga' ba rdzi'i bu mo dga' mor ston/_/lha dang 'thab tshe rtag par rgyal ba 'thob/_/'jig rten dag na yun ring 
[\[107b.6\]]gnas par byed/_/rab dul bzod dang khro gtum ston par byed/_/bram ze chen po rig pa'i chos bzhi dang /_/sgyu 'phrul sngags sogs thams cad rab tu rtogs/_/drang srong nang na rang dbang dag dang ldan/_/sa bon dang ni sa chen byed par nus/_/lha mo bu mo la sogs 
[\[107b.7\]]'dus pa'i tshe/_/rgya mtsho'i rlabs ltar nges par der yang 'du/_/klu dang gnod sbyin mang po'i tshogs kun gyi/_/gtso bor gyur pas rab tu dul bar byed/_/bud med nang na tshangs spyod mchog dang ldan/_/tshig byung dper na 'jig rten bdag po 'dra/_/rgyal po'i gnas na 
[\[108a\]]
[\[108a.1\]]pad+ma dag dang mtshungs/_/chu bo'i 'gram na gnas tshe gru zab bzhin/_/byad bzhin sdug mdzes zla ba nya ba 'dra/_/mang thos phun tshogs gnas dang rten yang byed/_/spobs pa mchog byung ri rtse mthon po 'dra/_/dran pa thams cad kun gyi gling yang byed/_/lha 
[\[108a.2\]]ma yin la sogs te lha tshogs rnams/_/thams cad 'di yi yon tan bsngags par byed/_/mig stong brgya byin lha yi dbang pos kyang /_/gus pa'i sems kyis lta zhing rab tu rtog_/sems can gang zhig re zhing tshol ba yod/_/de dag thams cad myur du 'grub par byed/_/
[\[108a.3\]]yid myur spobs dang chos 'dzin ldan byed pas/_/sa chen steng na mchog tu gyur pa yin/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams ni 'di dag tu/_/mar me che ltar rtag par kun gsal byed/_/tha na lha 'dre gcan gzan dag la yang /_/de dag bsams bzhin thams cad rdzogs byed 
[\[108a.4\]]'gyur/_/bud med rnams kyi nang na ri rtse 'dra/_/sngon gyi drang srong ji bzhin yun ring gnas/_/lha mo gzhon nu ji bzhin 'dod chags spangs/_/'jig rten bdag po ji bzhin bden tshig smra/_/'jig rten kun gyi khyad par rgyan rnams dang /_/'dod khams lha yi khang pa kun 
[\[108a.5\]]bltas na/_/lha mo 'ba' zhig gtso mor grags pas na/_/sems can mchog tu gyur pa yongs mi snang /_/gal te g.yul 'gyed 'jigs pa'i gnas dag dang /_/me dong lhung ba bdag ni mthong bar gyur/_/chu bo nyam nga chom rkun 'jigs pa'i tshe/_/'jigs pa de dag 
[\[108a.6\]]thams cad sel bar nus/_/gal te rgyal po'i khrims kyis bcings bsgrogs sam/_/gal te sha chags gsod par byed pa'i tshe/_/sems ni rtse gcig mi g.yo gnas gyur na/_/nges par mya ngan sdug bsngal kun las thar/_/dge sdig mi kun yongs su skyob pas na/_/
[\[108a.7\]]byams dang snying rje'i brtse ba rtag mngon snang /_/de phyir bdag ni bsam pa rtse gcig tu/_/lha mo che la phyag 'tshal skyabs su mchi/_/de nas bram ze des sngags dang /_bsngags pa brjod pa'i tshig gis lha mo de la mngon par bstod pa/_'jig rten gtso la phyag 'tshal 
[\[108b\]]
[\[108b.1\]]gus phyag 'tshal/_/mi rnams nang na kun gyi mchog gyur pas/_/'jig rten gsum po thams cad khyod la mchod/_/byad bzhin rab mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos/_/yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs lus rab brgyan/_/mig yangs pad+ma sngon po'i 'dab ma 'dra/_/bsod 
[\[108b.2\]]nams ye shes snang ba'i grags pas rgyas/_/dper na rin thang med pa'i nor bu mtshungs/_/deng bdag dam pa khyod la bsngags pas na/_/sems la bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur/_/yang dag yon tan bkra shis gya nom pa/_/pad+ma lta bur shin tu rnam 
[\[108b.3\]]par dag_/lus mdog rab mdzes kun gyis blta bar mos/_/mtshan mang ngo mtshar bsam gyis yang mi khyab/_/dri med ye shes 'od zer rab 'gyed pas/_/dran pas kun gyi nang na mchog tu gyur/_/ji ltar seng ge gcan gzan mchog gyur ltar/_/rtag par lag pa 
[\[108b.4\]]brgyad kyis bdag nyid brgyan/_/so sor mda' gzhu ral gri sta re dang /_/tho [{]rings [,]ring [}]lcags kyi 'khor lo zhags pa thogs/_/rab mdzes lha mo zla ba nya ba 'dra/_/tshig la thogs med dbyangs snyan 'byin par byed/_/sems can gang zhig sems la smon yod na/_/skyes bu dam 
[\[108b.5\]]pas bsams bzhin rdzogs par byed/_/brgya byin lha mang kun gyis khyod mchod nas/_/thams cad bsngags brjod skyabs su 'gro bar byed/_/bsam gyis mi khyab yon tan skyed byed pas/_/dus rnams rtag tu gus pa skyed par byed swA hA/_/gal te spobs chen lha mo 
[\[108b.6\]]gsol 'dod na/_/bsngags bstod tshig ni 'di las 'byung ba bzhin/_/nad par rnam dag sems kyis rtse gcig gdon/_/bsam pa'i dngos po thams cad bsams bzhin 'grub/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bram ze de la khyod kyis sems can rnams la phan gdags 
[\[108b.7\]]shing bde ba sbyin pa'i ched du/_lha mo de la bsngags pa brjod pas byin gyis rlob par gsol ba btab nas/_bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'thob par 'gyur ba legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal to//_//gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par 
[\[109a\]]
[\[109a.1\]]rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po/_/bam po brgyad pa/_de nas bram ze kauN+Di n+yas gong du bstan pa de lta bu'i mngon par bstod pa'i tshig dang /_sngags kyi tshig gis lha mo spobs pa chen mo la mngon par bstod nas 'khor mang po rnams la 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[109a.2\]]khyed cag lha mo spobs pa chen mo la gsol ba btab nas snying brtse bas byin gyis brlabs nas tshe 'di nyid la thogs pa med pa'i sems myur ba dang /_ye shes chen po dang /_tshig la shin tu mkhas pa dang /_shes pa rgya chen po 'thob pa dang /_'bel ba'i gtam gyis phan tshun lan 
[\[109a.3\]]'debs pa dang /_tshig 'bru'i rgyan yid bzhin du grub nas thogs pa med par 'dod na sems rtse gcig tu gus pas 'di ltar gsol ba gdab par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[109a.4\]]tshogs dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_nyan thos dang /_'phags pa thams cad dang /_'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas yang dag pa'i bden tshig mngon par grub pa dang /_dbang po ji lta ba bzhin du yang dag pa'i bden tshig gsung ba/_mi slu 
[\[109a.5\]]ba'i tshig gsung ba/_bskal pa chen po bye ba tshad med pa snyed du rtag par yang dag pa'i bden tshig gsung zhing /_yang dag pa'i bden tshig dang ldan pa thams cad la rjes su yi rangs nas phyag 'tshal lo/_/mi bden pa'i tshig mi gsung ba'i phyir yangs shing ring ba'i ljags phyung nas 
[\[109a.6\]]nyid kyi zhal dang /_'dzam bu'i gling dang gling bzhi pa dang stong dang stong gnyis pa dang /_stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa thams cad kun tu khyab par g.yogs nas nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad rab 
[\[109a.7\]]tu sel bar mdzad pa la gus par phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas ljags kyi mtshan de lta bu dang ldan pa thams cad la gus par phyag byas nas bdag ming 'di zhes bya ba shin tu gya nom pa'i spobs pa thams cad dang ldan par smon nas sems rtse gcig tu srog phrogs so/_/
[\[109b\]]
[\[109b.1\]]sangs rgyas rnams kyi spobs pa dam pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa'i spobs pa dam pa dang /_/rang rgyal 'phags pa'i spobs pa dam pa dang /_/zhugs bzhi 'bras bzhi'i spobs pa dam pa dang /_/'phags pa'i bden pa'i tshig gi spobs mchog dang /_/drang srong 
[\[109b.2\]]lha yi spobs pa dam pa dang /_/tshangs 'khor drang srong spobs pa dam pa dang /_/lha chen u ma'i spobs pa dam pa dang /_/skal ldan lha yi spobs pa dam pa dang /_/rgyal po ma na si yi spobs mchog dang /_/yid bzhin lha mo'i spobs pa dam pa dang /_/rgyal chen 
[\[109b.3\]]bzhi yi spobs pa dam pa dang /_/rab gnas lha yi bu yi spobs mchog dang /_/rdo rje gsang ba'i bdag po'i spobs mchog dang /_/khyab 'jug lha yi spobs pa dam pa dang /_/lha mo bi ma'i spobs pa dam pa dang /_/biSh+Nu'i lha mo'i spobs pa dam pa dang /_lha mo bzang mo'i 
[\[109b.4\]]spobs pa dam pa dang /_/shi ri ma ta'i spobs pa dam pa dang /_/ha ri tshig gi spobs pa dam pa dang /_/ma dang ma chen spobs pa dam pa dang /_/ha ri ta ma'i spobs pa dam pa dang /_/gnod sbyin rnams kyi spobs pa dam pa dang /_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal po'i spobs la gus phyag 
[\[109b.5\]]'tshal/_/las mchog ci mnga' thams cad bdag bstangs nas/_/spobs mchog dam pa mtha' med 'thob par shog_/bslu ba med la gus phyag 'tshal/_/rnam par grol la gus phyag 'tshal/_/'dod chags spangs la gus phyag 'tshal/_/'ching sgrib spangs la gus 
[\[109b.6\]]phyag 'tshal/_/rnam dag sems la gus phyag 'tshal/_/'od dang ldan la gus phyag 'tshal/_/bden tshig smra la gus phyag 'tshal/_/rdul chags med la gus phyag 'tshal/_/don mchog gnas la gus phyag 'tshal/_/'khor mang dag la gus phyag 'tshal/_/
[\[109b.7\]]spobs pa'i lha la gus phyag 'tshal/_/bdag gi tshig la thogs med shog_/bdag gis smon cing gnyer ba'i dngos/_/thams cad myur du grub par shog_/nad med rtag tu rab bde zhing /_/tshe ring lo nur 'thob par shog_/rig sngags kun la rab mkhas 
[\[110a\]]
[\[110a.1\]]shing /_/nan tan byang chub lam bsgoms nas/_/skye dgu rgya cher phan btags te/_/bsam pa myur du grub par smon/_/bdag gis bden tshig smras pa dang /_/bdag gis bslu med smras pa yis/_/lha mo'i spobs pa gang yin pa/_/bdag la 
[\[110a.2\]]grub par mdzad du gsol/_/lha mo khyod ni 'dir gshegs te/_/tshig thogs ma mchis bgyi slad du/_/bdag lus khar ni myur zhugs nas/_/yid myur spobs dang ldan par mdzod/_/bdag gi lce yi dbang po yis/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i spobs thob nas/_/
[\[110a.3\]]tshig de'i mthu stobs dbang gis ni/_/sems can rnams ni 'dul bar shog_/bdag ni tshig dag smras pa'i tshe/_/don ni ji bzhin grub gyur cig_/thos pa dag ni gus bskyed nas/_/byas pa chud gson ma gyur cig_/bdag gis spobs pa gnyer ba yi/_/
[\[110a.4\]]dngos po gal te ma grub na/_/lha mo'i bden tshig gang yin pa/_/thams cad [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa nyid du 'gyur/_/gang gis mtshams med sdig byas pa/_/sangs rgyas gsung gis 'dul bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin dgra bcom gang yin dang /_/drin gzo'i tshig ni ji snyed dang /_/
[\[110a.5\]]shA ri'i bu dang maud gal bu/_/bcom ldan 'khor mang mchog gyur pa/_/'di la sogs pa'i bden tshig rnams/_/thams cad bdag la grub par mdzod/_/deng bdag sangs rgyas nyan thos 'khor/_/thams cad 'dir ni spyan 'dren na/_/thams cad myur du 'dir 
[\[110a.6\]]gshegs te/_/bdag gi smon pa rdzogs mdzad smon/_/yang dag bden tshig gang gnyer ba/_/thams cad bslu ba ma mchis smon/_/gong du 'og min lha man chad/_/gnas gtsang ris kyi lha dag dang /_/tshangs chen tshangs lha nye phan dang /_/tshangs pa'i rgyal po'i 'khor 
[\[110a.7\]]rnams dang /_/stong gsum 'jig rten kun khyab dang /_/mi mjed 'jig rten bdag po dang /_/'khor ni mang po thams cad kun/_/deng bdag thams cad spyan 'dren na/_/byams dang thugs rje rab bskyed de/_/thams cad brtse bas gzung du gsol/_/gzhan 'phrul 
[\[110b\]]
[\[110b.1\]]dbang byed lha rnams dang /_/'phrul dga'i lha ni de dag dang /_/dga' ldan pa yi lha tshogs dang /_/byams pa mngon par rdzogs 'gyur dang /_/'thab bral ba yi lha rnams dang /_/sum cu rtsa gsum lha dag dang /_/rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha tshogs dang /_/lha mang 
[\[110b.2\]]'khor ni thams cad dang /_/sa chu me rlung lha rnams dang /_/ri rab brten nas gnas pa dang /_/mtsho bdun ri yi lha tshogs rnams/_/'khor ni mang por bcas pa dang /_/nor rgyas dang ni mgo lnga dang /_/nyi zla gza' skar lha dag dang /_/'di la sogs pa'i lha mang po/_/
[\[110b.3\]]'jig rten bde bar byed pas na/_/'di la sogs pa'i lha mang po/_/sdig pa'i las ni mi byed mos/_/sangs rgyas gus pa 'phrog ma dang /_/de yi bu sdug tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]dang /_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin dang /_/dri za dang ni lha ma yin/_/mi 'am ci yi 'khor rnams dang /_/
[\[110b.4\]]lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa/_/bdag ni bcom ldan mthu stobs kyis/_/de dag thams cad spyan 'dren na/_/byams dang snying rje'i sems bskyed nas/_/bdag la thogs med spobs pa stsol/_/lha dang mi yi 'khor rnams las/_/gzhan gyi sems ni rig gyur pa/_/
[\[110b.5\]]thams cad byin gyis brlabs nas ni/_/bdag la spobs pa dam pa stsol/_/nam mkha'i khams ni mthar thug dang /_/chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa na/_/sems can rnam pa ji snyed pas/_/bdag la spobs pa dam pa stsol/_/de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mos de skad ces 
[\[110b.6\]]gsol ba btab pa thos pa dang bram ze de la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye skyes bu chen po legs so/_/skyes pa'am/_bud med gang la la zhig sngags de dang /_sngags kyi mngon par bstod pa de dag la brten nas sngar gong du bstan pa bzhin du cho ga yang dag par blangs te/_
[\[110b.7\]]dkon mchog gsum la gus pas skyabs su 'gro zhing sems rtse gcig tu dran pa nye bar 'jog par byed na ci dang ci bsgrubs pa thams cad chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom pa'i mdo sde 'di yang dag par bzung ste/_klog cing 'don par byed na 
[\[111a\]]
[\[111a.1\]]smon pa thams cad 'bras bu dang ldan par 'gyur zhing myur du mngon par 'grub par 'gyur te/_sems rtse gcig tu ma byas pa ni ma gtogs so/_/de'i tshe bram ze de shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis rab tu dga' bar gyur pas thal mo sbyar nas spyi bos yang dag 
[\[111a.2\]]par blangs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo spobs pa chen mo la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi lha mo khyod kyis mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di rgya cher spel nas mdo sde yang dag par 'dzin pa dag la yongs su skyob pa dang /_yongs su bsrung ba byas pa dang /_sems 
[\[111a.3\]]can thams cad la phan gdags shing bde ba thob par bya ba'i ched du chos de lta bu bstan nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i spobs pa byin te/_bsod nams tshad med pa thob par gyur pa dang /_sems bskyed pa rnams myur du byang chub la gzhol bar byas pa legs so legs so/_/gser 
[\[111a.4\]]'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las lha mo spobs pa chen mo'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[111a.5\]]la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gal te dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di len pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_klog pa dang /_'don pa dang /_
[\[111a.6\]]gzhan dag la yang dag par ston par bgyid pa zhig mthong bar gyur na bdag gis sems rtse gcig tu gus pas bkur sti dang mchod pa bgyid do/_/chos smra ba de la 'di lta ste/_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_gsos sman dang /_yo byad ci 'tshal 
[\[111a.7\]]ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par sbyar te brel cing phongs pa ma mchis par bgyid do/_/gdugs mtshan du mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i tshig gi don ji snyed pa dag la so sor brtags te/_yid la bsams shing yongs su btsal nas bde bar gnas pa dang /_mdo sde 'di 'dzam bu'i 
[\[111b\]]
[\[111b.1\]]gling du rgya cher spel ba'i slad du sems can gang la la dag sangs rgyas brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa de dag rtag tu thos par 'gyur zhing /_myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed du lha dang mi'i 
[\[111b.2\]]longs spyod mchog rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur lags so/_/rtag par lo legs shing mu ge'i rgud pa gtan du sel bar 'gyur bas skye bo rnams gtan du bde ba myong bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams dang mjal bar 'gyur/_slad ma'i dus kyi tshe myur du 
[\[111b.3\]]byang chub chen po'i 'bras bu 'thob par 'gyur bas ngan 'gro gsum dang /_'khor ba'i sdug bsngal gyi bgegs gtan du gcod par 'gyur lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag mngon par dran lags te/_'das pa'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang 
[\[111b.4\]]dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bai DUr+ya dang gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i me tog snang ba dpal gyi yon tan rgya mtsho zhes bgyi ba mtshan rnam pa bcu dang ldan pa zhig byung ste bdag de las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun te/_de bzhin gshegs pa des byams pa dang thugs rje'i byin gyis brlabs kyi 
[\[111b.5\]]mthus brtse bar dgongs par gyur pa'i slad du deng bdag gang du bsams pa'i gnas de dang /_gang du bltas pa'i phyogs de dang gang du mchis pa'i yul de dang de dag tu sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed shin tu bde ba'i longs spyod myong zhing gos dang /_/
[\[111b.6\]]bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_'tsho ba'i yo byad dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_spug dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_byi ru dang /_'gron bu dang /_mu tig la sogs pa rin po che ci 'tshal ba thams cad phun sum tshogs par 'gyur ba lags so/_/
[\[111b.7\]]gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di klog cing 'don pa des gdugs gcig bzhin du spos sna tshogs bsregs nas me tog dam pa rnams kyis bdag gi ched du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[112a\]]
[\[112a.1\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas bai DUr+ya dang /_gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i me tog snang ba dpal gyi yon tan rgya mtsho de la mchod pa bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang gdugs gcig bzhin du dus gsum du bdag gi ming nas brjod cing rjes su dran par bgyis nas logs shig tu 
[\[112a.2\]]spos dang /_me tog dang /_zas mchog rnams kyis bdag la mchod cing rtag par mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di nyan par bgyid na bsod nams 'di lta bu dag 'thob par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_'di ltar mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin pa'i slad/_/
[\[112a.3\]]bdag dang 'khor rnams gnod pa kun dang 'bral/_/gos zas ci 'tshal phongs pa ma mchis 'gyur/_/gzi byin ldan zhing tshe yang dpag par dka'/_/sa yi ro yang rtag par 'phel bar 'gyur/_/lha rnams dus bzhin char ni rab tu 'bebs/_/lha 'khor de dag rab tu dga' 
[\[112a.4\]]bar 'gyur/_/skyed mos tshal dang 'bru yi lha rnams kyis/_/nags tshal ljon shing 'bras bu rab 'phel zhing /_/'bru rnams thams cad yongs su smin par bgyid/_/rin chen nor tshol bsam pa rdzogs 'gyur zhing /_/ci dang ci smon bsams bzhin 'grub par 'gyur/_/
[\[112a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal gyi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyis 'di ltar sngon gyi rgyud rjes su dran nas drin rjes su bsab pa'i phyir mchod pa byas pa dang /_mtha' yas pa'i sems can rnams la phan gdags shing bde bar bya ba'i ched du mdo sde 'di yongs su spel nas yon tan 
[\[112a.6\]]zad mi shes par byas pa legs so legs so/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las dpal gyi lha mo chen mo'i le'u ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la dpal gyi lha mo chen mos yang 'di skad ces 
[\[112a.7\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang phyogs na lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu'i grong khyer nor ldan zhes bgyi ba mchis te/_grong khyer de las mi ring ba na me tog dam pa'i bsod nams kyi 'od ces bgyi ba'i kun dga' ra ba mchis pa de na gzhal med khang mchog dam pa rin po che 
[\[112b\]]
[\[112b.1\]]sna bdun las mngon par grub pa zhig mchis te/_bcom ldan 'das bdag ni rtag par de na gnas lags pas gang la la zhig 'bru rnam pa lnga gdugs gcig bzhin du 'phel ba dang /_bang mdzod rnams rgyas shing gang bar 'tshal bas gus pas dang ba'i sems bskyed 
[\[112b.2\]]de khang pa gcig gtsang mar byas nas ba lang gi lci bas dog sa la zhal zhal bgyis te/_bdag gi gzugs rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa ri mor bris nas lus legs par bkrus te/_gos gtsang ma bgos nas byug pa dam pas byugs te khang pa gtsang ma'i nang du 
[\[112b.3\]]zhugs te/_bdag gi ched du gdugs re zhing dus gsum du sangs rgyas de'i mtshan dang /_mdo sde 'di'i mtshan nas brjod par sems bskyed de de bzhin gshegs pa bai DUr+ya dang gser gyi ri bo rin po che'i me tog snang ba dpal gyi yon tan rgya mtsho la phyag 'tshal lo/_/zhes brjod 
[\[112b.4\]]nas me tog dang spos rnams thogs te/_zhal zas bda' ba sna tshogs sems rtse gcig tu dbul bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang spos dang me tog dang bza' ba dang btung ba rnams kyis bdag gi gzugs brnyan la mchod par bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang bza' ba dang btung ba dag 
[\[112b.5\]]thogs te/_phyogs gzhan du gtor nas 'dre srin rnams la stsal bar bgyi'o/_/yang dag pa'i bden tshig gis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la gsol ba btab nas ci dang ci gnyer ba'i smon lam gdab par bgyi'o/_/gal te ji skad smras pa bzhin du [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa ma lags na gsol 
[\[112b.6\]]ba btab pa don dang ldan par mdzad du gsol zhes brjod par bgyi'o/_/de'i tshe dpal gyi lha mos dngos po de rig nas brtse ba'i sems skye bar 'gyur bas de'i khyim du nor dang 'bru rnams rab tu 'phel bar bgyid do/_/de nas sngags bzlas nas bdag g.yar drang bar bgyis te/_
[\[112b.7\]]sngar sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang byang chub sems dpa'i ming nas brjod de sems rtse gcig tu gus pas phyag bgyi'o/_/phyogs bcu dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug phud la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dri ma 
[\[113a\]]
[\[113a.1\]]med pa'i 'od zer rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser tog 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser brgya'i 'od kyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas gser gdugs rin po che brtsegs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/
[\[113a.2\]]sangs rgyas gser gyi me tog 'od zer rgyal mtshan la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas sgron ma chen po'i 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin po che chen po'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lho phyogs 
[\[113a.3\]]kyi sangs rgyas rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas lha'i rnga sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gser 
[\[113a.4\]]'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gser mdzod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu bshums la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' shin tu bde bar gnas pa la 
[\[113a.5\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gus par phyag bgyis nas de'i rjes la sngags bzlas te/_dpal gyi lha mo chen mo bdag g.yar 'dren par bgyid na sngags 'di'i mthus yongs su gnyer ba'i dngos po rnams thams cad mngon 
[\[113a.6\]]par 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sngags ni 'di lta ste/_sAd+ya the dan/_pra ti pUr+Nu tsa re/_sa man+tA dar+sha Ne/_ma hA bi hA ra ga ti/_sa man+ta/_bi mA na ga ti/_ma hA kAr+ya/_pra ti prA ba Ne/_satwA ar+tha sa ma tA nu pra pU re/_a yA 
[\[113a.7\]]na/_d+harma tA/_ma hA b+ho gi ni/_ma hA mai tri/_u pa saM hi te/_hi tai Shi/_sa gr-i hI te/_sa mAr+tha a nu pA li ne swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing yongs su bzung bas bdag g.yar 'dren par bgyid na/_bdag gis 
[\[113b\]]
[\[113b.1\]]g.yar 'dren pa thos nas de'i thad du mchis te smon pa rnams 'grub par bgyid do/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ni dbang bskur ba'i cho ga'i tshig_/ting nge 'dzin mngon par 'grub pa'i tshig_/yang dag pa'i tshig_/slu ba ma mchis pa'i tshig_/yang dag pa'i spyod pa 
[\[113b.2\]]sems can rnams kyi yang dag pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba lags pas/_gang la la zhig sngags 'di yang dag par 'dzin cing klog pa dang /_'don pa des gdugs mtshan bdun gyi bar du yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i sdom pa yang dag par blangs nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe sngar so shing 
[\[113b.3\]]bcas te dag par bkrus nas snga dro'i dus kyi tshe spos dang /_me tog gis sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa bgyis te/_bdag nyid kyis dngos sdig bshags nas bdag dang sems can rnams smon pa myur du 'grub par bgyi ba'i slad du yongs su bsngo zhing smon lam gdab par 
[\[113b.4\]]bgyi'o/_/khang pa gcig gtsang mar bgyis pa'am/_yang na dben pa'i gnas sam/_dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/_ba lang gi lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas tsan+dan bsregs te mchod par bgyi'o/_/stan mchog gcig bting ste ba dan dang gdugs kyis brgyan par 
[\[113b.5\]]bgyi'o/_/me tog dam pa rnams kyis dkyil 'khor gyi nang bkram ste sems rtse gcig tu sngags bzlas nas bdag der mchi bar re bar bgyi'o/_/bdag de'i tshe de la rjes su sems shing lta bar bgyid pas de'i khang par zhugs te stan la mchis nas de'i mchod pa len par 
[\[113b.6\]]bgyid do/_/de slan chad mi des g.yar lam na bdag mthong bar 'gyur bas ci dang ci smon pa'i dngos po rnams yang dag pa'i tshig gis bsgo nas go bar bgyid do/_/grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_'brog dgon pa'am/_dge 'dun gyi gtsug lag khang yang rung ste/_
[\[113b.7\]]ci dang ci smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas gser dang /_dngul dang /_nor dang /_rin po che dang /_ba lang dang /_lug dang /_'bru rnams dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_gos rnams yid bzhin du 'thob par 'gyur zhing /_bde ba 
[\[114a\]]
[\[114a.1\]]dang longs spyod mchog la yongs su longs spyod par 'gyur lags so/_/de ltar 'bras bu rnam par smin pa mchog dam pa thob nas kyang skal ba mchog gang lags pa des dkon mchog gsum la mchod cing bdag la yang stsal bar bgyi'o/_/chos kyi 
[\[114a.2\]]'dus pa rgya cher bshams nas bza' ba dang btung ba rnams sbyar te/_spos dang me tog gcal du bkram nas mchod par bgyi'o/_/mchod pa bgyis nas mchod par bgyis pa'i zas lhag ma ci mchis pa btsongs te/_rin blangs nas yang mchod par bgyid na bdag nam 'tsho'i 
[\[114a.3\]]bar du rtag tu de na gnas nas gang zag de la bsrung zhing bskyab pa dang /_phongs shing brel ba ma mchis pa dang smon pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do/_/dus dus su dbul phongs pa rnams la yang stsal bar bgyi zhing bdag gcig pu'i ched du ser snas phangs par mi 
[\[114a.4\]]bgyi'o/_/rtag par mdo sde 'di bklags nas rgyun 'chad pa ma mchis par mchod par bgyi ste/_bsod nams ci mchis pa de yang thams cad la gtong zhing byang chub tu yongs su bsngos nas 'khor ba las nges par 'byung zhing myur du rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur bar smon par 
[\[114a.5\]]bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal gyi lha mo la khyod kyis de ltar mdo sde 'di rgya cher spel nas bdag dang gzhan gnyis ka la phan pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa byas pa legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par 
[\[114a.6\]]rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las dpal gyi lha mo chen mos nor 'phel bar byed pa'i le'u ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//de nas sa'i lha mo brtan ma 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/
[\[114a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di da ltar ram/_slad ma'i dus kyi tshe gal te grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/_dgon pa'i gnas sam/_ri 'am/_phug gam/_nags tshal dag 
[\[114b\]]
[\[114b.1\]]na yang rung ste mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di spel bar bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag der mchis nas mchod pa dang /_bkur sti dang yongs su bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa bgyis te rgya cher spel bar bgyid do/_/sa phyogs gang yang rung ba dag tu chos smra ba'i mkhan 
[\[114b.2\]]po'i ched du khri mthon po btsugs te mdo sde 'di 'chad par bgyid na/_bdag rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus lus mi gda' bar bgyis nas der mchis te/_de'i rkang pa nas spyi bos 'degs par bgyid do/_/bdag chos thos par gyur nas kyang shin tu dang ba'i bsam pas rab tu 
[\[114b.3\]]dga' bar bgyid do/_/chos kyi ro thob pa'i dbang gis gzi byin 'phel bar 'gyur bas mgu ba tshad ma mchis pa thob par 'gyur te/_bdag nyid de lta bu'i phan yon thob pa nyid kyis sa chen po 'di yang dpag tshad stong phrag brgyad cu rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor la thug pa tshun chad sa'i 
[\[114b.4\]]bcud thams cad rab tu 'phel bar bgyid do/_/rgya mtsho bzhi tshun chad kyis chen po ji snyed pa de dag sa'i bcud rgyas shing rab tu gshin pas sngon bas kyang lhag pa dang /_ches khyad par du 'phags par bgyid do/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di na chu bo dang /_rdzing dang /_rdzing bu dang /_
[\[114b.5\]]ljon shing dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_rtsa ba dang /_sdong bu dang /_yal ga dang /_lo ma dang /_'bru rnam pa sna tshogs ci mchis pa de dag kyang dbyibs mdzes shing yid du mchi ba dang /_mang po kun gyis blta bar mos pa dang /_kha 
[\[114b.6\]]dog dang /_dri phun sum tshogs pa dang longs spyod du rung bar bgyid do/_/sems can gang gis bza' ba dang /_btung ba mchog de lta bu dag la longs spyod pa rnams kyang tshe ring zhing kha dog dang stobs dang ldan pa dang /_dbang po rnams bde zhing gzi byin 'phel ba dang /_bro 
[\[114b.7\]]nad rnams ma mchis pa dang /_sems kyi shes rab dpa' zhing ci yang rtsol rngo thogs par 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang sa chen po 'di las ji tsam du yongs su spyad par bgyi ba'i dngos po brgya stong ji snyed pa thams cad kyang phun sum tshogs par bgyid lags so/_/bcom 
[\[115a\]]
[\[115a.1\]]ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen des na 'dzam bu'i gling rnams su rab tu bde zhing lo legs pa dang /_mi rnams dar zhing rgyas pa dang /_gnod pa rnams ma mchis pas sems can ji snyed mchis pa de dag thams cad bde ba myong bar 'gyur lags so/_/de ltar lus dang 
[\[115a.2\]]sems kyis bde ba myong bar gyur nas kyang mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di la shin tu gus pa bskyed nas gang du gnas kyang rung ste/_thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba dang /_mchod pa dang /_bkur sti dang /_bla mar bgyis shing bsngags pa brjod par smon par bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang 
[\[115a.3\]]chos 'chad pa'i mkhan po chen po de dag gang du chos 'chad pa'i gnas der yang mchis te/_sems can rnams kyi ched du mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di 'chad par gsol ba gdab par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di bshad pa'i dbang gis bdag 
[\[115a.4\]]cag 'khor dang bcas pa thams cad la sman par 'gyur zhing 'od dang /_kha dog dang /_mthu stobs dang /_dpa' zhing gzi byin dang ldan pa dang /_byad bzhin shin tu sdug cing sngon bas ches khyad par du 'phags par 'gyur bas so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag sa'i lha mo brtan 
[\[115a.5\]]ma yang chos kyi ros tshim par gyur pa'i dbang gis 'dzam bu'i gling dpag tshad bdun stong tshun chad sa thams cad bcud dang ldan pa dang /_snga ma bzhin du sems can ji snyed pa thams cad kyang bde ba myong bar bgyid lags so/_/de lta bas na bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe sems can de 
[\[115a.6\]]dag gis kyang bdag gi drin bsab pa'i slad du bdag cag gdon mi 'tshal bar mdo sde 'di mnyan nas bkur sti dang /_rim gro dang /_mchod pa dang /_bla mar bgyis nas bsngags pa brjod par bgyi'o snyam du bsam par bgyi'o/_/de ltar bsams nas kyang gnas nas byung ste 
[\[115a.7\]]grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_khang khyim dang /_dgon pa'i gnas gang du chos bshad pa'i 'dus pa der mchis nas chos bshad pa'i mkhan po la spyi bos btud de phyag bgyis nas mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyi'o/_/mdo sde 'di mnyan nas kyang so so nas rang gi 
[\[115b\]]
[\[115b.1\]]gnas su mchis te rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed de/_'di skad du bdag cag deng shin tu zab cing bla na ma mchis pa'i chos gya nom pa thos pas 'di ni bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa snyed yongs su bsdus par gyur to/_/mdo sde'i mthu stobs kyi dbang gis 
[\[115b.2\]]bdag cag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa snyed la mchod cing rim gro bgyis pas ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal mi bzad pa dang bral bar gyur to/_/ma 'ongs pa'i tshe rabs brgya stong gi bar du yang rtag par mtho ris dang mi'i nang du skyes nas bde 
[\[115b.3\]]ba mchog myong bar 'gyur ro zhes brjod par 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe mi mang po de dag so so nas slar rang rang gi gnas su mchis nas kyang skye bo mang po rnams la mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las gsungs pa'i dpe gcig tsam mam/_le'u gcig tsam mam/_sngon gyi gtam rgyud gcig tsam 
[\[115b.4\]]mam/_de bzhin gshegs pa gcig gi mtshan tsam mam/_byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi ming tsam mam/_tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam mam/_yang tshig gcig tsam zhig sems can rnams la yang dag par ston par bgyid dam/_tha na mdo sde 'di'i 
[\[115b.5\]]mtshan tsam zhig brjod par bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das sems can de dag gang na gnas pa'i sa phyogs de dag thams cad bcud dang ldan zhing gzhan bas lhag par 'gyur ba dang /_sa chen po las skye bar 'gyur ba'i dngos po thams cad kyang rgya cher rab tu 'phel zhing rab tu rgyas 
[\[115b.6\]]par 'gyur bas sems can rnams shin tu bde ba'i longs spyod myong bar 'gyur ro/_/rin po che dang nor mang bar 'gyur/_sbyin pa legs par gtong bar 'gyur/_rtag par sems brtan zhing dkon mchog gsum la shin tu mngon par yid ches par 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[115b.7\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sems can gang la la zhig gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig gcig tsam zhig thos par gyur na yang tshe 'phos pa'i 'og 
[\[116a\]]
[\[116a.1\]]tu sum cu rtsa gsum dang /_lha'i gnas gzhan dag tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can gang la la zhig mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mchod par 'dod pa'i phyir khang khyim dag rab tu brgyan nas bla re gcig bre bar byed dam/_ba dan gcig tsam dpyangs par byed na rgyu dang rkyen 
[\[116a.2\]]des lha'i ris drug po dag tu ji ltar bsams pa bzhin du skye bar 'gyur bas rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang mchog dam pa dag la yid bzhin du longs spyod par 'gyur/_so so nas lha'i bu mo bdun stong dang phan tshun lhan cig rtse zhing nyin mtshan rtag par khyad par du 'phags pa'i 
[\[116a.3\]]bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag la longs spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen des na 'khor bzhi po las gang la la zhig chos kyi stan la mchis nas 
[\[116a.4\]]chos 'di yang dag par ston pa na/_bdag gdugs mtshan du gang zag de la yongs su srung zhing yongs su skyob par bgyid na/_rang gi lus mi gda' bar bgyis nas chos kyi stan gyi drung du mchis te de'i rkang pa la 'degs par bgyid lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das mdo sde 'di lta bu 'di ni 
[\[116a.5\]]sems can de dag gis sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pas na 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher 'phel zhing nub par mi 'gyur ba lags so/_/sems can gang gis mdo sde 'di mnyan par bgyid pa de dag ni slad ma'i dus kyi tshe bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa snyed 
[\[116a.6\]]kyi bar du lha dang mi'i nang du rtag par bde ba mchog la longs spyod par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas mang po dang mjal nas myur du bla na med par yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_ngan song gsum dang 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal myong bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/
[\[116a.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la sngags kyi snying po lha dang mi rnams la phan 'dogs shing thams cad la bde bar bgyid pa mchis te/_skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_'khor bzhi po dag las gang la la zhig 
[\[116b\]]
[\[116b.1\]]bdag gi lus yang dag pa mngon sum du mthong bar 'tshal ba des sems rtse gcig tu gzungs 'di yongs su 'dzin par bgyid na/_ji ltar smon pa thams cad yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do/_/'di lta ste/_nor dang rin po che'i gter dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_tshe ring ba'i 
[\[116b.2\]]sman dam pa gnyer ba dang /_sems can gyi nad mang po gso ba dang /_phyir rgol ba'i dgra pham par bgyi ba dang tha dad par smra ba rnams tshar gcod par 'tshal na khang pa gtsang mar bgyis te dkyil 'khor bgyi'o/_/lus bkrus te gos sar pa gtsang ma bgos nas rtswa'i stan gyi steng du mchis 
[\[116b.3\]]te ring bsrel dang sku gzugs kyi spyan sngar ram/_yang na ring bsrel dang bcas pa'i mchod rten gyi drung du bdug pa bsregs te/_me tog gtor nas bza' ba dang /_btung ba dag gis mchod pa bgyis te/_zla ba yar gyi ngo tshes brgyad la skar ma rgyal rdzogs pa na g.yar 'dren pa'i sngags 
[\[116b.4\]]'di bzla bar bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_tsi li tsi li/_tsu ru tsu ru/_ku ru ku ru/_ku Tu ku Tu/_to Tu to Tu/_ba ha ba ha/_ba ri sha ba ri sha swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das rig sngags 'di 'khor bzhi po las gang la la zhig gis lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas bdag g.yar 'dren par bgyid na 
[\[116b.5\]]bdag gis de'i ched du g.yar 'dren pa der mchi bar 'gyur lags so/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig bdag dngos po mngon sum du mngon par mthong zhing lhan cig gtam bgyid par 'tshal na yang snga ma bzhin du cho ga bshams nas gzungs 'di bzlas par 
[\[116b.6\]]bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_any+tsa ni/_kya li k+Sha ni/_shi shi d+ha ri/_ha ha hi hi/_ku ru ba re swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig sngags 'di 'don pa na lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas sngags snga ma yang 'don par bgyid na bdag gdon mi 'tshal bar lus mngon du bstan nas des ji 
[\[116b.7\]]ltar smon pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid pas nam yang chab mi 'tshal bar bgyid do/_/gal te sngags 'di 'don par 'tshal na sngar lus bsrung ba'i sngags 'di 'don par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_shi ri shi ri/_bA sha ka ti/_ta ti kuT+Ti/_pU ta/_pU de ri/_pU de ri/_
[\[117a\]]
[\[117a.1\]]Ti Te pa Ti/_ku ku Ti/_ka ba tsi li swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das sngags 'di 'don pa'i tshe tshon sna lnga'i skud pa blangs nas sngags lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_mdud pa nyi shu rtsa gcig bgyis nas/_dpung pa g.yon pa la bcings na slan chad lus bsrung 
[\[117a.2\]]ba bgyis pas 'jigs pa ma mchis par 'gyur ro/_/gang la la zhig sems rtse gcig tu sngags 'di zlos par bgyid na/_bsam pa rnams yid bzhin du 'grub par 'gyur te/_bdag sho be mi mchi ste/_bdag gi dbang du sangs rgyas dang chos dang dge 'dun dkon mchog gsum 
[\[117a.3\]]bzhugs pas mad pa nyid du rab tu mkhyen par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma la bka' stsal pa/_khyod yang dag pa'i bden tshig gi sngags kyis btab pa'i mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di dang /_chos smra ba dag la yongs su bsrung bar byas pa legs 
[\[117a.4\]]so legs so/_/rgyu dang rkyen 'dis khyod bsod nams kyi rnam par smin pa tshad med pa snyed 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i le'u ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//de nas gnod sbyin 
[\[117a.5\]]gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes bya ba gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad po dag dang lhan cig tu 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig la gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar 
[\[117a.6\]]nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di da ltar ram/_slad ma'i dus kyi tshe grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_ri'am/_dgon pa'am/_nags 
[\[117a.7\]]tshal lam/_rgyal po'i pho brang ngam/_dge 'dun gnas pa'i gnas dag tu yang rung ste/_yang dag par bstan nas rgya cher spel bar bgyid na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu der mchis 
[\[117b\]]
[\[117b.1\]]nas so so nas rang gi lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/_ci rigs par chos smra ba'i mkhan po de dang /_chos nyan pa'i 'khor de dag yongs su bsrungs nas gnod pa rnams spangs te rtag par bde ba myong bar bgyid do/_/skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo gang la 
[\[117b.2\]]la zhig mdo sde 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig tsam yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid dam/_tshig gcig tsam yang dag par 'dzin par bgyid dam/_mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan tsam smos par bgyid dam/_mdo sde 'di las gsungs pa'i de bzhin gshegs 
[\[117b.3\]]pa gcig gi mtshan tsam mam/_byang chub sems dpa' gcig gi ming tsam brjod par sems bskyed nas gus pas rim gro dang /_mchod pa bgyid na bdag gis yongs su bsrung zhing byin gyis brlabs nas gnod pa ma mchis par bgyis te sdug bsngal spangs nas bde ba 'thob par 
[\[117b.4\]]'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das ci'i slad du bdag gi ming yang dag shes zhes bgyi ba'i rgyu dang rkyen gang lags pa de ni bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis mngon sum du mkhyen pa lags te/_bdag gis chos rnams rig pa dang /_bdag gis chos thams 
[\[117b.5\]]cad kyi ji snyed pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi ji lta ba dang /_chos thams cad kyi rnam pa dang /_ngo bo nyid dang /_bye brag ji snyed pa thams cad gsal bar rtogs pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di ltar chos rnams bdag gis khong du chud par gyur pas bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba dang ldan pa 
[\[117b.6\]]dang /_bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi sgron ma dang ldan pa dang /_bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa dang /_bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa dang /_bdag dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnams mngon par rtogs 
[\[117b.7\]]par gyur pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis 'di ltar chos thams cad yang dag par rig_/yang dag par gsal bar rtogs/_yang dag par khong du chud/_yang dag par so sor rtogs par bgyid pas bcom ldan 'das rgyu dang rkyen de'i slad 
[\[118a\]]
[\[118a.1\]]du gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes bgyi ba lags te/_don de'i slad du bdag gis chos smra ba'i mkhan po de'i tshig gi spobs pa gsal zhing rgyan dang ldan pa dang /_gzi byin dang mdangs ba spu'i bu ga kun nas 'jug pa dang /_lus kyi mthu stobs 
[\[118a.2\]]dang ldan pa dang /_gzi byin dang ldan zhing dpa' ba dang /_dpag par dka' ba'i ye shes kyi snang ba thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dang /_yang dag pa'i dran pa thob nas spa gong ba ma mchis pa dang /_de'i lus la phan 'dogs shing nyams pa ma mchis pa dang /_dbang po rnams bde 
[\[118a.3\]]zhing rtag par dga' ba bskyed par bgyi'o/_/rgyu dang rkyen de'i slad du sems can gang dag sangs rgyas brgya stong du ma las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed nas bsod nams kyi las mngon par sgrub pa dag gi ched du 'dzam bu'i gling dag tu rgya cher spel nas myur du nub par mi 'gyur bar bgyid pas sems 
[\[118a.4\]]can de dag gis mdo sde 'di thos nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes kyi snang ba chen po dang /_bsod nams kyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa 'thob par 'gyur zhing slad ma'i dus kyi tshe yang bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig tshad ma mchis pa'i bar du bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i lha dang /_mi'i bde ba myong ba dang /_
[\[118a.5\]]rtag par sangs rgyas mang po dang mjal nas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /_ngan song gsum gyi sdug bsngal shin tu mi bzad pa dag kyang myong bar mi 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom 
[\[118a.6\]]ldan 'das la gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la gzungs mchis te/_sems can rnams la sman par bgyi zhing brtse ba'i slad du deng bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid kyis bshad par bgyi'o/_/
[\[118a.7\]]de nas sngags smras pa/_na mo bud+d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsa~M g+hA ya/_na mo pra h+mA ya/_na ma in+d+rA ya/_na mash+tsa tur NAM ma hA rA dzA nAM/_tad+ya thA/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_gau ri ma hA gau ri/_gan+d+ha ri/_ma hA gan+d+ha ri/_dri mi Di/_ma hA dri mi Di/_dan+Da khu khun ti/_ha ha ha ha 
[\[118b\]]
[\[118b.1\]]ha/_hi hi hi hi hi/_hu hu hu hu hu/_ha lo d+ha me/_gud+d+ha me/_tsa tsa tsa tsa/_tsi tsi tsi tsi/_tsu tsu tsu tsu/_tsaN+De shwa ra/_shi kha ra shi kha ra/_u tiSh+Tha he/_b+ha ga bAn saM bid dz+nyA ya swA hA/_gang la la zhig rig sngags 'di 'dzin par bgyid na bdag gis 'tsho ba'i yo byad sman dang /_bza' ba dang /_
[\[118b.2\]]btung ba dang /_gos dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_rin po che ngo mtshar che ba dag gis rim gro bgyid do/_/gal te skyes pa dang /_bud med dang /_khye'u dang /_bu mo dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che dang /_rgyan phreng gi rnam pa rnams yongs su gnyer bar bgyid na 
[\[118b.3\]]yang bdag gis thams cad sbyar nas ji ltar smon pa bzhin rgud cing phongs pa ma mchis par bgyid do/_/rig sngags 'di mthu chen po dang ldan pas sngags 'don pa'i tshe/_bdag myur du de'i thad du mchis nas thogs pa ma mchis par yid bzhin du 'grub par bgyid do/_/sngags 'di 'don 
[\[118b.4\]]pa'i tshe cho ga ci rigs par bgyis nas thog ma kho nar gnod sbyin yang dag shes kyi gzugs 'phang du chag bzhi lnga tsam mchis pa sug pa na dgra sta thogs pa ri mor bri bar bgyi'o/_/gzugs brnyan de'i mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir bgyis nas bum pa bzhi sbrang rtsi'i chab bam/_bu 
[\[118b.5\]]ram gyi chab kyis bkang ste bzhag nas byug spos dang /_phye ma dang /_bdug spos dang /_me tog dang /_phreng ba rnams kyang bkram par bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang dkyil 'khor gyi mdun du thab gcig bgyis te/_de'i nang du sol ba'i zhugs stsal nas mar dang yungs kar 
[\[118b.6\]]bsregs te/_snga ma'i sngags de lan brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas nas/_sngags lan re zhing lan cig bsregs na/_bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po rang nyid drung du mchis nas lus mngon du bstan te/_sngags 'don pa'i mi de la khyod ci dang ci dgos pa dang /_yid la ci 
[\[118b.7\]]'dod pa'i dngos po gang yin pa de smros shig ces 'dri bar bgyid do/_/bdag gis ji skad mchi ba bzhin yongs su gnyer ba'i dngos po rnam pa thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/_/gal te gser dang /_dngul dang /_gter 'tshal bar gyur tam/_yang na lha'i drang srong 
[\[119a\]]
[\[119a.1\]]du gyur nas nam mkha' la mchi bar 'tshal lam/_lha'i mig gi mngon par shes pa dang /_gzhan gyi sems 'tshal ba dang /_sems can thams cad la yid bzhin du rang dbang thob nas nyon mongs pa bcad de myur du rnam par grol ba thob pa la dgod 
[\[119a.2\]]par 'tshal na yang thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyid do/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyis 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan gdags pa'i phyir rig sngags 'di bshad de/_yang 
[\[119a.3\]]dag pa'i chos yongs su bsrungs nas bsod nams kyis mtha' yas pa rnams la phan btags pa legs so legs so/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes kyi le'u ste bcu 
[\[119a.4\]]dgu pa'o//_//de nas sa'i lha mo chen mo brtan ma zhes bya ba 'khor mang po'i nang nas stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[119a.5\]]'das yul rnams su mi'i rgyal po bgyid pa la gal te yang dag pa'i chos ma mchis par gyur na/_yul skyong zhing skye bo mang po rnams kyang gso ba'i rngo mi thogs la bdag nyid kyang yun ring du khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal thabs la gnas par mi 'gyur na/_bcom 
[\[119a.6\]]ldan 'das byams pa dang /_thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs te/_bdag la rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos yul skyong bar bgyid pa'i don gang lags pa bkas bshad du gsol/_/des na mi'i rgyal po rnams chos 'di thos pa'i 
[\[119a.7\]]dbang gis ji skad bstan pa bzhin du mngon par sgrub cing yang dag par 'jig rten 'dul ba dang /_khyad par du 'phags pa'i rgyal thabs gtan du bde zhing zhi ba dang /_yul na gnas pa'i skye bo thams cad la yang sman par 'gyur lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[119b\]]
[\[119b.1\]]'das kyis 'khor mang po'i nang du sa'i lha mo brtan ma la bka' stsal pa/_khyod legs par nyon cig_/sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe rgyal po stobs kyi gtso bo'i tog ces bya ba byung ngo /_/rgyal po de'i bu mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba zhig yod de/_spyi bo nas dbang 
[\[119b.2\]]bskur nas ring po ma lon par de nas rgyal po yab kyis mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos lha'i bdag po'i man ngag ces bya ba yod de/_nga sngon spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas yul gyi bdag po byas pa'i tshe nga'i yab 
[\[119b.3\]]shes pa'i stobs kyi gtso bo'i tog ces bya bas nga la rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos 'di bstan pas/_ngas bstan bcos 'di la brten nas lo nyi khri'i bar du yul legs par bskyangs te/_ngas skad cig gcig tsam gyi bar du yang chos ma yin 
[\[119b.4\]]pa spyad par bya'o snyam pa'i bsam pa byung ma myong ngo /_/deng khyod kyang de bzhin du chos ma yin pas yul skyong bar ma byed cig_/ci'i phyir rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan bcos zhes bya zhe na/_khyod deng legs par nyon cig dang khyod la bstan par bya'o/_/
[\[119b.5\]]de nas de'i tshe rgyal po stobs kyi gtso bo'i tog gis rgyal bu de la tshigs su bcad pa gya nom pa dag gis yang dag par bstan bcos mngon par bstan pa/_ngas ni sems can bde bya dang /_/'jig rten the tsom bcad pa dang /_/nyes dmigs mang po bsal ba'i phyir/_/
[\[119b.6\]]rgyal khrims bstan bcos bshad par bya/_/lha yi bdag po thams cad dang /_/mi yi rgyal po gang yin pa/_/dga' ba'i sems ni rab skyed la/_/thal mo sbyar nas ngas bshad nyon/_/sngon byung lha 'khor mang po rnams/_/rdo rje'i ri la 'dus pa na/_/rgyal 
[\[119b.7\]]bzhi stan las langs nas ni/_/tshangs chen la ni 'di skad zhus/_/tshangs bdag mchog tu gtsor gyur cing /_/lha yi nang na dbang phyug che/_/bdag cag la ni brtser dgongs nas/_/the tsom rnams ni gcad du gsol/_/ji ltar mi yi 'jig rten skyes/_/rgyal 
[\[120a\]]
[\[120a.1\]]po zhes ni bgyi bar 'gyur/_/gzhan yang rgyu rkyen gang gi slad/_/lha yi bu zhes bgyi bar 'gyur/_/ji ltar mir ni skyes pa la/_/gcig pu mi yi bdag po 'thob/_/ji ltar mtho ris gnas dag tu/_/lha yi rgyal po bgyid par 'gyur/_/de 
[\[120a.2\]]ltar 'jig rten skyong dag gis/_/tshangs rgyal de la zhus pa dang /_/de tshe tshangs pa'i bdag po yis/_/de dag la ni 'di skad smras/_/'jig rten skyong khyod shes par byos/_/sems can la ni phan bya'i phyir/_/nga la yul skyong chos dris pas/_/ngas bshad khyod kyis 
[\[120a.3\]]legs par nyon/_/sngon gyi las kyi mthu yis ni/_/lhar skyes rgyal por gyur pa yin/_/gal te mi nang gnas gyur nas/_/dbang sdud mi yi bdag po byed/_/lha rnams lhan cig byin brlabs nas/_/de 'og ma yi mngal du 'jug_/ma yi mngal na gnas pa na/_/lha 
[\[120a.4\]]rnams kyis ni srung bar byed/_/mi yi 'jig rten skyes gyur kyang /_/gtso mchog gyur phyir lha zhes bya/_/lha rnams kyis ni bsrungs pas na/_/lha yi bu zhes brjod pa yin/_/sum cu rtsa gsum bdag po yis/_/stobs bgos mi rgyal stongs par byed/_/lha ni mang 
[\[120a.5\]]po thams cad kyis/_/rang dbang stobs ni rab bstangs nas/_/chos min kun ni rab bsal te/_/sdig pa'i las ni skyed mi byed/_/sems can dge ba sgrub bskul nas/_/mtho ris gnas su skye bar byed/_/mi dang lha min 'khor dag dang /_/dri za dang ni srin 
[\[120a.6\]]po dang /_/gdol pa la sogs thams cad kyis/_/stobs kyi phyed ni stor bar byed/_/pha mas stobs phyed bstangs nas ni/_/sdig spong dge ba sgrub la 'dzud/_/lha rnams lhan cig rab bsrungs nas/_/dge sdig rnam smin ston par byed/_/dge sdig las 
[\[120a.7\]]ni byas gyur na/_/da ltar tshe 'di nyid la ni/_/lha rnams lhan cig rab bsrungs nas/_/dge sdig rnam smin ston par byed/_/yul mis sdig pa'i las byas la/_/rgyal spangs nan tur mi byed na/_/'di ni yang dag rigs pa min/_/chos bzhin chad pas gcad par 
[\[120b\]]
[\[120b.1\]]bya/_/gal te nyes mthong mi 'gog na/_/chos min rab tu 'phel 'gyur bas/_/rgyal po de yi yul khams su/_/g.yo sgyu mang du 'phel bar 'gyur/_/rgyal pos nyes byed mthong ba la/_/gal te zlog par mi byed na/_/sum cu rtsa gsum lha 'khor rnams/_/
[\[120b.2\]]thams cad khong khro'i sems skye 'gyur/_/rgyu des rgyal khrims nyams 'gyur zhing /_/g.yo sgyu 'jig rten 'phel 'gyur bas/_/pha rol dgra 'khor dag gis ni/_/yul de bcom nas 'jig par byed/_/gnas pa'i khyim dang yo byad dang /_nor bsags 
[\[120b.3\]]thams cad stor bar 'gyur/_/g.yo sgyu sna tshogs skyes pas na/_/phan tshun gcig la gcig kyang 'phrog_/yang dag chos kyis rgyal thob kyang /_/chos bzhin du ni mi spyod pas/_/yul mi thams cad 'thor 'gyur te/_/glang pos pad+ma'i rdzing brdzis 'dra/_/
[\[120b.4\]]rlung drag ldang la dus kyang med/_/mi 'phrod char ni dus min 'bab/_/rgyu skar ltas ngan mang po ston/_/nyi zla gcan zin 'od kyang med/_/rgyal pos yang dag chos spangs pas/_/'bru rnams me tog 'bras bu dang /_lo tog thams cad mi smin cing /_/yul na 
[\[120b.5\]]mu ge 'byung bar 'gyur/_/rgyal pos yang dag chos spangs nas/_/sdig chos mi ni ston byed na/_/gzhal med khang gnas lha rnams kyis/_/mthong nas mya ngan skye bar 'gyur/_/lha rgyal 'khor bcas de dag gis/_/'di skad du ni smra bar 'gyur/_/rgyal 
[\[120b.6\]]'dis chos min rab spyad nas/_/sdig pa'i grogs po bsten pas na/_/rgyal srid yun ring brtan mi 'gyur/_/lha rnams thams cad rab mi dga'/_/de dag khros par gyur pa'i phyir/_/yul de 'jig par 'gyur zhes zer/_/chos min mi ni rab brten pas/_/
[\[120b.7\]]yul khams 'phel bar 'gyur bas na/_/'thab rtsod g.yo sgyu mang por 'gyur/_/rims nad sdug bsngal mang po skye/_/lha yi bdag po srung mi byed/_/lha gzhan thams cad spong bar byed/_/de yi yul ni rang zhig nas/_/rgyal po sdug bsngal myong bar 
[\[121a\]]
[\[121a.1\]]'gyur/_/pha ma chung ma bu rnams dang /_/phu nu dang ni sring mo rnams/_/cig car sdug dang bral 'gyur zhing /_/tha mar bdag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/_/ltas ngan skar mda' dag kyang ltung /_/nyi ma gnyis ni cig car 'char/_/pha rol dgra 
[\[121a.2\]]ni nyer 'ongs pas/_/yul mi 'chi bar 'khrug phrad 'gyur/_/yul bkur blon po chen po rnams/_/nyes med glo bur 'chi bar 'gyur/_/glang po rta sogs gces pa rnams/_/thams cad 'thor zhing stongs par 'gyur/_/yul yul kun du dgra yod 
[\[121a.3\]]pas/_/mi ni phal cher dus min 'chi/_/'dre srin mang po yul zhugs pas/_/rims nad kun du 'phel bar 'gyur/_/yul mi blon po chen po dang /_/nye phan mang po thams cad kyang /_/sems ni g.yo sgyu bcas pas na/_/thams cad chos min spyod par 'gyur/_/
[\[121a.4\]]chos min spyod pa mthong gyur na/_/snying du sdug cing bkur bar byed/_/dge chos spyod pa'i mi dag la/_/sdug bsngal nyon mongs chad pas gcod/_/ma rungs byams shing bkur ba dang /_/dge ba chad pas bcad pa'i phyir/_/gza' skar rlung dang char pa rnams/_/
[\[121a.5\]]thams cad dus su rgyu mi 'gyur/_/nyes dmigs rnam gsum skye bar 'gyur/_/yang dag chos ni nub 'gyur zhing /_/sems can kha dog 'od mi ldan/_/sa yi bcud ni thur du 'bab/_/sdig bkur dge la brnyas pas na/_/gzhan yang nyes dmigs rnam gsum 
[\[121a.6\]]'byung /_/dus min sad dang ser ba 'bab/_/mu ge'i sdug bsngal kun du khyab/_/lo tog [(]'dras [,]'bras [)]bu mang po rnams/_/thams cad ro zhim nyams par 'gyur/_/de dag gi ni yul khams na/_/sems can phal cher na bar 'gyur/_/de yi yul na ljon shing 
[\[121a.7\]]rnams/_/sngon chad 'bras bu zhim chags pa/_/de yi dbang gis nyams 'gyur bas/_/kha rtsub ro mchog med par 'gyur/_/sngon gyi kun dga' nags tshal mchog_/snying du sdug cing rtse ba'i gnas/_/thams cad skams shing rnyings 'gyur bas/_/mthong 
[\[121b\]]
[\[121b.1\]]ba kun gyis mya ngan skye/_/sA lu nas dang lo tog rnams/_/ro zhim khad kyis med gyur pas/_/bza' tshe sems kyang mi dga' na/_/'byung chen 'phel byed ga la nus/_/sems can kha dog 'od nyams shing /_/mthu stobs zad cing nyams par 'gyur/_/kha zas 
[\[121b.2\]]mang po zos kyang ni/_/'grangs pa nyid du yong mi 'gyur/_/yul khams de na yod pa yi/_/sems can rnam pa ji snyed pa/_/stobs chung dpa' bshor med pas na/_/bya ba dag ni byed mi nus/_/yul mi phal cher nad thebs pas/_/sdug bsngal sna tshogs lus 
[\[121b.3\]]gzir 'gyur/_/'dre srin kun du khyab pas na/_/thams cad kun du srin por skye/_/rgyal pos chos min rab spyad nas/_/mi dge'i grogs po bsten pas na/_/'jig rten rnam pa gsum po kun/_/des na gnod pa sna tshogs myong /_/de 'dra'i nyes dmigs 
[\[121b.4\]]mtha' med pa/_/yul nas 'byung bar 'gyur ba yang /_/sdig can mi ni mthong 'gyur yang /_/yal bor ma bskrad pa las gyur/_/lha rnams kun gyis byin brlabs nas/_/yul gyi rgyal po byas gyur kyang /_/yang dag dam pa'i chos dag gis/_/yul 
[\[121b.5\]]khams yongs su srung mi byed/_/gang zhig dge spyod sgrub byed na/_/rtag tu mtho ris gnas su skye/_/gal te sdig pa'i las byas pa/_/tshe 'phos nges par ngan 'gror ltung /_/gal te rgyal pos yul mi rnams/_/thal rangs nyes pa byed 'jug na/_/
[\[121b.6\]]sum cu rtsa gsum lha tshogs rnams/_/thams cad rab gdungs sems skye 'gyur/_/lha rnams dang ni pha ma yi/_/bstan dag bzhin du mi byed pa/_/'di ni chos min mi yin pas/_/rgyal po sri zhu'i bu ma yin/_/gal te rang gi yul khams su/_/chos min 
[\[121b.7\]]spyod pa mthong ba'i tshe/_/chos bzhin chad pas gcod byed cing /_/yal dor sems ni mi bskyed na/_/de phyir lha tshogs mang po kun/_/rgyal po de la skyob par byed/_/byang chub spyod pa bsgrub pa'i phyir/_/sdig pa'i chos rnams zhi byed na/_/rgyal po tshe 'di nyid la ni/_/
[\[122a\]]
[\[122a.1\]]mthong ba'i rnam smin nges par myong /_/dge dang mi dge'i las dag la/_/spyod spong sems can bskul nas ni/_/dge sdig rnam smin bstan pas na/_/de phyir mi rgyal thob nas kyang /_/lha rnams lhan cig byin brlabs nas/_/thams cad yi 
[\[122a.2\]]rang 'gyur ba yin/_/bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir/_/yang dag chos kyis yul bskyang bya/_/g.yo sgyu byed pa mthong gyur na/_/chos bzhin chad pas gcad par bya/_/gal te rgyal thabs stor ba dang /_/srog 'bab rkyen zhig byung na yang /_/nams 
[\[122a.3\]]kyang sdig chos mi spyod cing /_/sdig pa mthong na spang bar bya/_/gnod pa'i nang na mchog lci bas/_/rgyal srid stor las lhag pa med/_/'di kun g.yo sgyu mi las gyur/_/des na chad pas gcad par bya/_/g.yo sgyu byed pa yod gyur na/_/rgyal srid dag kyang 
[\[122a.4\]]stor 'gyur zhing /_/rgyal srid dag kyang nyams 'gyur bas/_/glang chen me tog tshal zhugs 'dra/_/de yis mi rgyal byas kyang ni/_/chos kyis yul ni ma bskyangs pas/_/lha dbang thams cad mi dga' zhing /_/lha ma yin yang de bzhin no/_/de lta bas na chos bzhin 
[\[122a.5\]]du/_/sdig pa byed pa chad pas gcad/_/dge bas sems can gdul bya zhing /_/chos min rjes su 'brang mi bya/_/lus dang srog ni spang sla yi/_/mi dge grogs rjes 'brang mi bya/_/nye ba dang ni nye min pa/_/thams cad mnyam pa nyid du blta/_/yang dag chos 
[\[122a.6\]]kyis rgyal byed na/_/yul mi mi drang med pa'i phyir/_/chos rgyal grags dang ldan 'gyur bas/_/khams gsum kun du grags par 'gyur/_/sum cu rtsa gsum lha tshogs rnams/_/dga' nas 'di skad smra bar 'gyur/_/'dzam gling chos rgyal gang yin pa/_/
[\[122a.7\]]de ni bdag gi bu yin te/_/dge bas sems can 'dul byed cing /_/yang dag chos kyis yul bskyangs nas/_/yang dag chos spyod bskul bas na/_/bdag cag gnas su skye 'gyur zer/_/lha dang mi yi bu rnams dang /_/lha ma yin gyi 'khor rnams kyang /_/
[\[122b\]]
[\[122b.1\]]rgyal pos yang dag chos 'dul rgyus/_/rtag tu sems ni dga' bar 'gyur/_/lha tshogs thams cad rab dga' nas/_/mi rgyal de la srung bar byed/_/gza' skar rang gi lam rgyu zhing /_/nyi zla tshad las 'da' mi byed/_/rlung ni rtag par dus bzhin ldang /_/bdud 
[\[122b.2\]]rtsi'i char ni dus bzhin 'bab/_/lo tog thams cad smin legs pas/_/mi rnams mu ge med par 'gyur/_/lha tshogs mang po thams cad kun/_/rang gi pho brang gang 'gyur bas/_/de phyir mi rje khyod kyis ni/_/lus spangs yang dag chos spel byos/_/rin chen chos la 
[\[122b.3\]]bkur byed na/_/des na mang po bde 'gyur bas/_/rtag par yang dag chos bsten nas/_/yon tan bdag nyid brgyan par bya/_/'khor rnams rtag par rab dga' zhing /_/sdig pa rnams ni spong bar byed/_/chos kyis sems can 'dul byed pas/_/rgyun du bde ba 
[\[122b.4\]]'thob par 'gyur/_/mi rnams de dag thams cad kun/_/dge ba bcu ni spyod byed na/_/yul khams rtag par lo legs shing /_/yul ni zhi ba nyid du 'gyur/_/rgyal po chos kyis mi 'dul zhing /_/dge bas sdig spyod 'dul byed na/_/snyan pa'i grags pa 
[\[122b.5\]]'thob 'gyur zhing /_/sems can rnams ni bde bar byed/_/de nas de'i tshe sa chen po la gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po thams cad dang 'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi mi'i rgyal pos yul skyong ba'i chos kyi don bkas bshad pa thos pas thams cad 
[\[122b.6\]]ngo mtshar rmad du gyur pa dang /_rab tu dga' ba thob par gyur pas shin tu dang ba'i mngon par yid ches pa dag gis bka' yang dag par blangs te spyod par gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las rgyal po'i chos lugs yang 
[\[122b.7\]]dag pa'i bstan bcos bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po/_bam po dgu pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la rgyal po'i chos lugs yang dag pa'i bstan 
[\[123a\]]
[\[123a.1\]]bcos bkas bshad nas yang 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_khyed la sogs pa legs par nyon cig dang /_ngas deng khyod la sngon chos yang dag par spyod pa'i rgyu dang rkyen bshad par bya'o/_/de nas de'i tshe tshigs su bcad de bka' 
[\[123a.2\]]stsal pa/_ngas sngon 'khor los sgyur rgyal byas pa na/_/sa chen 'di dang rgya mtshor bcas pa btang /_/gling bzhi rin chen gyis ni rab bkang ba/_/thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la mchod/_/ngas sngon bskal pa dag ni tshad med snyed/_/rnam dag yang dag chos sku 
[\[123a.3\]]gnyer ba'i phyir/_/phangs pa'i nor dang rang gi lus srog kyang /_/ser sna med pa'i sems kyis yongs su btang /_/gzhan yang 'das pa'i bskal pa bsam dka' na/_/yang dag mkhyen pa rin chen gtsug phud byung /_/de bzhin gshegs de mya ngan 'das pa'i 'og_/
[\[123a.4\]]rgyal po legs skyes zhes bya 'jig rten byung /_/'khor los sgyur rgyal byas nas gling bzhi btul/_/rgya mtsho'i mthar thug tshun chad skyabs su dong /_/grong khyer ming ni gya nom sgra zhes bya/_/de tshe 'khor los sgyur rgyal de na gnas/_/rmi lam sangs rgyas bsod nams 
[\[123a.5\]]ye shes thos/_/chos smra rin chen brtsegs pa zhes bya ba/_/nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar mdzes stan 'dug nas/_/gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'chad pa'ang mthong /_/de tshe rgyal de rmi lam sad pa dang /_/rab tu dga' ba skyes nas lus kun khyab/_/nam langs 
[\[123a.6\]]rgyal po'i pho brang phyir byung nas/_/dge slong dge 'dun rnams kyi thad du song /_/'phags pa'i tshogs la gus pas rab mchod nas/_/tshogs chen mang po de la 'di skad dris/_/chos smra rin chen brtsegs pa zhes bgyi ba/_/yon tan phun tshogs sems can 
[\[123a.7\]]'dul mchis sam/_/de tshe chos smra chen po rin chen brtsegs/_/gnas khang gcig pur yang dag gnas nas ni/_/dran pa nyer gzhag mdo sde 'di bton pas/_/drang 'dug mi g.yo lus dang sems kyang bde/_/de tshe dge slong zhig gis rgyal khrid nas/_/rin 
[\[123b\]]
[\[123b.1\]]chen brtsegs pa de yi gnas su phyin/_/gnas khang nang du lus ni drang bsrang ste/_/'od dang mtshan mchog lus kun khyab par mthong /_/rgyal po de la 'di ni rin chen brtsegs/_/mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog gyur 'di lta ste/_/gser 'od dam pa shin tu gya nom mchog_/sangs 
[\[123b.2\]]rgyas spyod yul zab mo 'dzin ces smras/_/rgyal pos rin chen brtsegs la phyag byas nas/_/gus pas thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad smras/_/zla ba nya ltar zhal mdog mdzes gyur pa/_/gser 'od dam pa'i chos 'di bshad du gsol/_/rin chen brtsegs kyis rgyal po'i tshig 
[\[123b.3\]]mnyan nas/_/gser 'od dam pa 'di ni bshad gnang bas/_/stong gsum 'jig rten khams 'di kun khyab pa'i/_/lha mi thams cad rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/rgyal pos sa phyogs yangs shing gtsang ma'i gnas/_/rin chen gya nom mchog gis rab brgyan te/_/spos 
[\[123b.4\]]chu dam pa dag gis chag chag btab/_/me tog sna tshogs dag ni gcal du bkram/_/gnas mchog der ni stan mtho rab bting ste/_/ba dan bla re bres nas mdzes par byas/_/phye ma byug spos rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/_/bdug pa dag ni kun du khyab par byas/_/lha klu 
[\[123b.5\]]lha ma yin dang mi 'am ci/_/lto 'phye chen po dang ni gnod sbyin dang /_/lha rnams man dA ra ba'i char phab nas/_/thams cad nyer 'ongs stan mchog de la mchod/_/gzhan yang lha ni 'bum phrag brgya stong rnams/_/dam chos nyan mos thams cad der ni 'dus/_/chos smra 
[\[123b.6\]]dang po stan las langs pa'i tshe/_/thams cad lha yi me tog dag gis mchod/_/de tshe chos smra chen po rin chen brtsegs/_/shin tu lus bkrus gos gtsang rab bgos te/_/tshogs chen chos stan de drung song nas ni/_/thal sbyar rtse gcig sems kyis gus phyag 
[\[123b.7\]]byas/_/lha dbang lha tshogs lha yi bu mo rnams/_/thams cad me tog man dA ra yang gtor/_/lha yi rol mo brgya stong bsam mi khyab/_/mkha' la gnas nas sgra dbyangs snyan par phyung /_/de tshe chos smra chen po rin chen brtsegs/_/stan la 'dug ste skyil mo krung bcas nas/_/
[\[124a\]]
[\[124a.1\]]phyogs bcu'i zhing na bzhugs pa'i byams chen gtso/_/bye ba brgya stong de dag yid la bsams/_/sdug bsngal sems can thams cad ji snyed pa/_/thams cad byams sems mnyam pa nyer gzhag nas/_/gsol 'debs bdag po rgyal po legs pa'i phyir/_/
[\[124a.2\]]gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde rab tu bshad/_/rgyal pos de 'dra'i chos ni thos gyur nas/_/thal sbyar rtse gcig rjes su yi rang smras/_/ya mtshan chos thos mchi ma blags te ngus/_/lus dang sems ni dga' chen kun khyab gyur/_/de tshe yul bdag rgyal po legs skyes kyis/_/mdo 
[\[124a.3\]]sde 'di ni mchod par 'dod pa'i phyir/_/lag na yid bzhin nor bu thogs nas ni/_/sems can kun phyir smon lam 'di skad btab/_/'dzam gling 'di ni kun du khyab par yang /_/rin chen rgyan phreng char ni rab phab nas/_/nor dang yo byad rgud phongs ji snyed pa/_/thams cad 
[\[124a.4\]]yid bzhin bde ba myong bar shog_/de nas rin chen sna bdun char phab nas/_/gling bzhi kun du chog cing tshim byas pas/_/lus kyi rgyan phreng gos dang zas skom dang /_/ci dang ci 'dod phongs pa med par gyur/_/de tshe yul bdag rgyal po legs skyes kyis/_/gling 
[\[124a.5\]]bzhi rin chen char bab mthong ba dang /_/thams cad sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug phud kyi/_/bstan la zhugs pa'i dge slong dge 'dun mchod/_/'das pa'i rgyal po legs skyes gang yin pa/_/shAkya thub pa nga yin shes par byos/_/sngon yang sa chen mang po rab 
[\[124a.6\]]btang ste/_/rin chen dag gis gling bzhi yongs su bkang /_/sngon tshe chos mkhan chen po rin chen brtsegs/_/legs skyes de la gya nom chos bshad de/_/mdo sde'i rgyal po de dag bshad pa'i phyir/_/shar phyogs sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs grub pa yin/_/ngas ni mdo sde'i 
[\[124a.7\]]rgyal po 'di mnyan nas/_/thal sbyar rtse gcig yi rang brjod pa dang /_/rin chen sna bdun btang ba'i bsod nams kyis/_/rdo rje sku mchog 'di ni brnyes pa yin/_/gser 'od bsod nams brgya yi mtshan brgyan pas/_/mthong ba thams cad kun ni rab dga' zhing /_/
[\[124b\]]
[\[124b.1\]]sems can thams cad kun gyi snying du sdug_/lha tshogs mang po bye ba kun de bzhin/_/'das tshe bskal pa bye ba dgu bcu dgu/_/'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po dag kyang byas/_/yul khams chung ngur mi yi rgyal po byas/_/gzhan yang bskal pa brgya stong tshad med snyed/_/brgya 
[\[124b.2\]]byin lha yi dbang po dag kyang byas/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po dag byas te/_/phyogs bcu'i byams chen gtso la mchod pa yi/_/de yi grangs tshad shin tu mthar thug dka'/_/ngas sngon mdo thos rjes su yi rang dge/_/bsod nams phung po ci yod tshad shes dka'/_/bsod 
[\[124b.3\]]nams de dbang byang chub mngon rtogs nas/_/chos sku yang dag ye shes dam pa brnyes/_/de nas 'khor mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur nas thams cad kyis mdo sde gser 'od dam pa spel zhing rgyun mi 'chad par spyad par mos par 
[\[124b.4\]]gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las rgyal po legs skyes kyi le'u ste nyi shu gcig pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal gyi lha mo chen mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shin tu dang ba'i sems dad pa dang 
[\[124b.5\]]ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu'am/_/rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis 'das pa dang /_/ma byon pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la mchod pa'i yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang /_yangs shing rgya che ba dag gis mchod par byed par 'dod pa dang /_dus 
[\[124b.6\]]gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul zab mo shes shing rtogs par 'dod pa gang yin pa des gdon mi za bar sems rtse gcig tu mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ri 'am/_nags tshal gang yang rung ste/_gnas de dang de dag tu sems can rnams la rgya cher 
[\[124b.7\]]yang dag par bstan nas yongs su spel bar bya'o/_/chos nyan pa gang yin pa de yang rnam par g.yeng ba'i 'du shes spangs nas rna blags te sems rtse gcig tu gzhag par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo de dang 'khor mang po rnams la tshigs su bcad de bka' 
[\[125a\]]
[\[125a.1\]]stsal pa/_gang zhig sangs rgyas mang po la/_/bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa dang /_/de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi/_/spyod yul zab mo shes 'dod na/_/gal te gser 'od dam pa 'di/_/yang dag phye bshad mthong gyur na/_/de yi phyogs su nyer 
[\[125a.2\]]song nas/_/de yi drung du 'gro bar bya/_/mdo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/yon tan mang po spyod byed cing /_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho mtha' med las/_/sems can rnams ni thar bar byed/_/nga yi mdo 'di rnam bltas na/_/thog ma bar dang tha mar dge/_/shin tu 
[\[125a.3\]]zab pas dpag par dka'/_/dpe dag gis ni zla byar med/_/gang gA'i bye ma sa chen rdul/_/rgya mtsho'i chu dang nam mkha' dang /_/ri brag thams cad gang gis kyang /_/cha shas tsam yang dper byar med/_/chos dbyings zab mor 'jug 'dod na/_/mdo 'di sngar ni 
[\[125a.4\]]mnyan par bya/_/chos nyid mchod rten gang na bar/_/zab mo shin tu bde bar gnas/_/mchod rten 'di yi nang dag tu/_/shAkya thub pa nga yis ni/_/yid 'ong sgra dbyangs dam pa yis/_/mdo sde 'di bshad mthong bar 'gyur/_/des na grangs tshad bsam dka' ba'i/_/
[\[125a.5\]]bskal pa bye ba snyed du ni/_/lha dang mi yi nang skyes nas/_/rtag tu bde ba mchog myong 'gyur/_/mdo sde 'di ni mnyan pa yis/_/bdag ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/bsod nams phung po 'thob 'gyur zhes/_/de snyam du ni bsam par bya/_/gal te me chen phung po 
[\[125a.6\]]dag_/dpag tshad brgya ni gang gyur kyang /_/mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di mnyan phyir/_/dka' ba med par 'gro bar bya/_/de yi gnas su phyin nas ni/_/'di 'dra'i mdo 'di thos gyur na/_/sdig pa'i las rnams 'byang 'gyur zhing /_/rmi lam ngan pa sel bar 'gyur/_/
[\[125a.7\]]gza' skar ma rungs ltas ngan dang /_/byad stems log pa'i gdon la sogs/_/mdo sde 'di ni thos pa'i tshe/_/sdig pa mang po spong bar byed/_/stan mtho mchog ni rab brgyan nas/_/rab gtsang pad+ma 'dra ba la/_/chos smra steng du phyin nas ni/_/klu chen lta bur 
[\[125b\]]
[\[125b.1\]]'dug par bya/_/de la bde bar 'dug nas ni/_/zab mo'i mdo 'di bshad par bya/_/yi ger bris nas klog 'dzin dang /_/de yi don ni bshad par bya/_/chos smra stan ni spangs nas ni/_/phyogs gzhan dag tu song gyur kyang /_/khri stan mthon po de las ni/_/
[\[125b.2\]]cho 'phrul mtshan ma mang 'byung ba/_/res 'ga' chos smra mkhan po'i gzugs/_/stan mtho steng na 'dug par mthong /_/res 'ga' sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyang mthong /_/res 'ga' kun du bzang po'i gzugs/_/res 'ga' 'jam dpal lta bu dang /_/res 
[\[125b.3\]]'ga' byams pa gtso bo'i gzugs/_/stan mtho'i steng na 'dug par mthong /_/res 'ga' ya mtshan mtshan ma dang /_/lha ni mang po rnams kyi gzugs/_/yud tsam du ni mthong gyur kyang /_/de ma thag tu mi snang 'gyur/_/bkra 
[\[125b.4\]]shis mang po rdzogs byed pas/_/byas pa thams cad yid bzhin 'grub/_/yon tan rnams ni yongs rdzogs par/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad gsungs/_/mchog tu rnam rgyal grags dang ldan/_/nyon mongs mang po zhi bar byed/_/pha rol dgra rnams rab tu 
[\[125b.5\]]sel/_/g.yul 'gyed tshe na rtag par rgyal/_/rmi lam ngan pa thams cad med/_/dug dang gnod pa mang po zhi/_/las gsum sdig pa ci byas pa/_/mdo sde'i mthu yis byang bar byed/_/'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di dag kun/_/grags pa kun du rgyas par 'gyur/_/
[\[125b.6\]]'khon 'dzin dgra ni ji snyed pa/_/phan tshun 'khon ni gtong bar 'gyur/_/gal te dgra ni phyin gyur kyang /_/ming thos tsam gyis ldog 'gyur bas/_/mtshon cha g.yo ba mi ltos pas/_/dgra gnyis dga' ba skye bar 'gyur/_/tshangs rgyal dang ni brgya byin dbang /_/'jig 
[\[125b.7\]]rten skyong dang rgyal chen bzhi/_/lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dang /_/sde dpon chen po yang dag shes/_/klu yi rgyal po ma dros dang /_/klu yi rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_/mi 'am ci dang rol mo'i lha/_/lha mo yin dang gser 'dab bdag_/lha mo spobs pa chen mo dang /_/
[\[126a\]]
[\[126a.1\]]dpal gyi lha mo chen mo dang /_/'di la sogs pa lha yi gtso/_/so sor lha tshogs khrid nas ni/_/sangs rgyas rnams la mchod par byed/_/dkon mchog chos ni bsam mi khyab/_/rtag par dga' ba'i sems kyis ni/_/mdo sde la ni bkur sti 
[\[126a.2\]]byed/_/'di la sogs pa'i lha mang po/_/thams cad lhan cig 'grogs nas ni/_/bsod nams sgrub pa rnam bltas nas/_/lhan cig 'di skad smra bar byed/_/sems can 'di dag rab tu ltos/_/bsod nams yon tan che ldan zhing /_/dge rtsa brtson 'grus 
[\[126a.3\]]stobs kyis ni/_/bdag cag lha gnas skye 'gyur zer/_/mdo sde zab mo mnyan pa'i phyir/_/gus pa'i sems kyis der 'ongs nas/_/yang dag chos ni bkur ba'i phyir/_/chos kyi mchod rten mchod par byed/_/sems can kun la snying brtse bas/_/phan pa chen po
