[\[126a.4\]]byed pas na/_/mdo sde zab mo 'di dag gi/_/chos kyi rin chen snod kyang byed/_/chos kyi sgo 'dir gang zhugs pa/_/chos nyid la ni 'jug 'gyur bas/_/mdo sde gser 'od dam pa 'di/_/rtse gcig sems kyis mnyan par bya/_/sangs rgyas brgya stong tshad med la/_/
[\[126a.5\]]gang zag de dag mchod pas na/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba de dbang gis/_/mdo sde 'di ni thos pa yin/_/'di ltar lha yi bdag po dang /_/lha mo spobs pa chen mo dang /_/dpal gyi lha mo de dang ni/_/rgyal chen ris bzhi'i lha rnams dang /_/gnod sbyin 'khor ni grangs med pa/_/
[\[126a.6\]]dpa' zhing rdzu 'phrul ldan pa rnams/_/so sor phyogs bzhi dag nas ni/_/rtag tu 'ongs nas skyob par byed/_/nyi zla brgya byin lha dbang dang /_/rlung dang chu dang me yi lha/_/khyab 'jug dang ni phrag chen dang /_/gshin rje spobs pa lha mo dang /_/'jig rten mgon po la 
[\[126a.7\]]sogs pa/_/rab dpal gzi ldan thams cad kun/_/mdo sde 'dzin pa srung byed pas/_/nyin mtshan rtag par yong mi 'bral/_/gnod sbyin rgyal po stobs po che/_/mthu chen dang ni dbang phyug dang /_/gtso bo yang dag shes la sogs/_/gnod sbyin nyi shu rtsa brgyad 
[\[126b\]]
[\[126b.1\]]dang /_/gzhan yang gnod sbyin brgya stong rnams/_/rdzu 'phrul stobs chen ldan pa dag_/rtag par 'jigs pa'i gnas rnams su/_/nyer 'ongs gang zag de srung byed/_/lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin rgyal/_/'khor ni lnga brgya bcas pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[126b.2\]]chen po'i tshogs/_/rtag par nyer 'ongs de srung byed/_/rin chen rgyal po gnod sbyin dbang /_/de bzhin rdzogs bzang rgyal po dang /_/'brog gnas dang ni ku pe ra/_/zas sbyin kha dog ser po dang /_/'di la sogs pa'i gnod sbyin rgyal/_/so sor g.yog 'khor 
[\[126b.3\]]lnga brgyar bcas/_/thams cad nyer 'ong srung bar byed/_/sna tshogs sde dang dri za dang /_/'dam bu rgyal po rtag tu rgyal/_/nor bu gtsug dang ne gan dang /_/char pa'i dbang po de dag dang /_/mchog tu rgyal ba nag po che/_/su bar+Na dang ke sha dang /_/pany+tsi ka dang ra rkang dang /_/
[\[126b.4\]]de bzhin skal ba chen po dang /_/pra ma li chung chos skyong dang /_/spre'u rnams kyi ni rgyal po dang /_/khab spu dang ni nyi ma'i gnyen/_/rin chen gtsug phud srung bar byed/_/pra ni li chen na ku la/_/bdun pa dang ni 'dod mchog dang /_/mthu bo che dang gangs ri dang /_/
[\[126b.5\]]bde ba'i ri yang de bzhin te/_/thams cad rdzu 'phrul che ldan zhing /_/rab dpa' mthu stobs ldan pa yang /_/mdo sde 'di 'dzin mthong gyur na/_/thams cad 'ongs nas srung bar byed/_/ma dros klu yi rgyal po dang /_klu yi rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_btang bzung dang ni 
[\[126b.6\]]e la'i 'dab/_/dga' bo dang ni nye dga' bo/_/klu ni brgya stong mang po'i nang /_/rdzu 'phrul dang ni gzi byin ldan/_/mdo sde 'dzin pa srung byed pas/_/nyin mtshan rtag par yong mi 'bral/_/ba li dang ni sgra gcan dang /_/thags zangs ris dang sdom ba pa/_/
[\[126b.7\]]bong bu dpung dang phrag chen dang /_/de bzhin du ni rab dga' dang /_/lha min rgyal po gzhan rnams dang /_/lha yi tshogs ni grangs med pa/_/stobs chen rab tu dpa' ba rnams/_/thams cad 'ongs nas de srung byed/_/'phrog ma 'byung po rnams kyi ma/_/gnod 
[\[127a\]]
[\[127a.1\]]sbyin 'khor ni lnga brgya rnams/_/mi de gnyid log sad kyang rung /_/rtag par 'ongs nas srung bar byed/_/ma rungs pa dang gdug pa dang /_/gnod sbyin lag na dbyug thogs dang /_/dung chen dang ni so brtsegs ma/_/sems can kun gyi mdangs 
[\[127a.2\]]'phrog pa/_/de 'dra'i lha tshogs mang po rnams/_/mthu chen rdzu 'phrul ldan pa kun/_/mdo sde 'dzin pa rtag bsrungs pas/_/nyin mtshan rtag par yong mi 'bral/_/gtso mo spobs pa chen mo dang /_/lha yi bu mo tshad med dang /_/dpal gyi lha mo gtso mo dang /_/de 
[\[127a.3\]]yi 'khor ni mang po dang /_/sa chen 'di yi lha mo dang /_/lo tog kun dga' nags tshal lha/_/shing gi lha dang chu rlung lha/_/mchod rten lha la sogs pa dang /_/de la sogs pa'i lha mang po/_/dga' chen sems ni rab bskyed nas/_/mdo sde 'di ni 'dzin pa la/_/thams 
[\[127a.4\]]cad 'ongs nas srung bar byed/_/mdo sde 'dzin pa mthong gyur na/_/tshe dang kha dog stobs 'phel byed/_/gzi byin dang ni yon tan dang /_/mtshan mchog gis ni brgyan par 'gyur/_/gza' skar ltas ngan ston pa dang /_/de la nyam thag byur byung dang /_/rmi lam ltas 
[\[127a.5\]]ngan mthong ba yang /_/thams cad rab tu zhi bar byed/_/sa chen 'di yi lha mo yang /_/rab brtan gzi byin mthu stobs ldan/_/mdo sde 'di yi mthu yis ni/_/chos kyi ro yis rtag tshim pas/_/sa bcud thur du song ba yang /_/dpag tshad brgya ni yan chad du/_/
[\[127a.6\]]sa bcud gyen du 'phags byas nas/_/sa chen 'di ni snum par byed/_/sa yi rngams su dpag tshad ni/_/'bum phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad nas/_/rdo rje'i gzhi la thug pa'i bar/_/sa bcud thams cad gyen du 'phags/_/mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di thos dbang /_/
[\[127a.7\]]bsod nams phung po che thob pas/_/lha yi 'khor ni mang po rnams/_/thams cad phan yon thob par 'gyur/_/gzhan yang lha tshogs mang po rnams/_/mthu stobs 'od dang ldan 'gyur zhing /_/rab dga' rtag tu bde byed pas/_/nyams pa'i mtshan ma spong 
[\[127b\]]
[\[127b.1\]]bar 'gyur/_/'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di nang gi/_/nags tshal 'bras bu lo tog lha/_/mdo sde 'di yi byin brlabs kyis/_/sems ni rtag tu dga' thob pa/_/lo tog thams cad legs 'gyur zhing /_/kun du me tog dam pa dang /_/'bru rnams thams 
[\[127b.2\]]cad 'phel 'gyur bas/_/sa chen kun du rgyas par 'gyur/_/'bras bu'i ljon shing mang po dang /_/thams cad lo tog mchog skyes nas/_/dri zhim rtag par kun du 'thul/_/rtswa mang ljon shing rnams las kyang /_/me tog dam pa skye 'gyur zhing /_/'bras bu 
[\[127b.3\]]zhim po skye 'gyur bas/_/thams cad kun du gang bar 'gyur/_/'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di dag tu/_/klu yi bu mo tshad med snyed/_/rab tu dga' ba'i sems bskyed nas/_/thams cad kun du zhugs nas ni/_/me tog rnam pa du ma dang /_/de bzhin pad+ma dkar po dang /_/
[\[127b.4\]]pad+ma sngon po dmar po gnyis/_/bskyed nas rdzing kun gang bar 'gyur/_/mdo sde 'di yi byin brlabs kyis/_/nam mkha' gtsang zhing sgrib pa med/_/sprin dang khug rna yongs su sel/_/mun nag thams cad snang bar 'gyur/_/nyi ma'i 'od zer stong 'gyed pas/_/dri 
[\[127b.5\]]med 'od ni rnam par dag_/mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di yi mthus/_/gling bzhi yongs bskor gsal bar byed/_/mdo sde 'di yi byin brlabs kyis/_/lha yi bu rnams bstangs pas na/_/thams cad 'dzam bu'i gser dag gis/_/gzhal med khang ni byed par 'gyur/_/
[\[127b.6\]]nyi zla dang po 'char ba'i tshe/_/gling 'di mthong na rab dga' bas/_/rtag par snang ba chen po yis/_/thams cad kun du gsal bar byed/_/sa chen 'di la yod pa yi/_/pad+ma'i rdzing ni ji snyed pa/_/nyi mas dus bzhin gsal byed pas/_/kha ni mi 'byed gang yang 
[\[127b.7\]]med/_/'dzam bu'i gling ni 'di dag tu/_/lo tog 'bras bu sman rnams kun/_/thams cad legs shing smin 'gyur bas/_/sa chen kun du gang bar 'gyur/_/mdo sde 'di yi byin brlabs kyis/_/nyi zla snang bar byed pa'i gnas/_/rgyu skar tshad las mi 'da' 
[\[128a\]]
[\[128a.1\]]zhing /_/rlung char dus bzhin ldang 'bab pas/_/'dzam gling 'di dag kun du yang /_/yul rnams lo legs skyid par 'gyur/_/gang na mdo sde 'di bzhugs pa/_/phyogs gzhan dag las khyad par 'phags/_/gser 'od dam pa'i 
[\[128a.2\]]mdo sde 'di/_/gang du spel zhing 'don pa dang /_/rnam phye 'chad par byed pa'i gnas/_/bsod nams gong ma thob par 'gyur/_/de nas dpal gyi lha mo chen mo dang /_lha la sogs pa mang po de dag bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/_/
[\[128a.3\]]de thams cad rab du dga' bas mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di dag yongs su 'dzin par byed pa de dag la/_sems rtse gcig tu yongs su bsrungs nas mya ngan gyi gnod pa med cing rtag tu bde ba thob par 'gyur bas mos par gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par 
[\[128a.4\]]rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las lha dang gnod sbyin rnams kyis yongs su bsrung zhing 'dzin par byed pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gnyis pa'o//_//de nas de bzhin gshegs pas 'khor mang po'i nang du rgya cher yang dag par chos bshad nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes 
[\[128a.5\]]pa'i tog dang /_de'i bu gnyis po dngul gyi tog dang /_dngul gyi 'od ces bya ba gnyis po bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan par bzhed par gyur pa dang /_de'i tshe lha'i bu stong phrag bcu mchog tu rgyal ba'i 'od ces bya ba gtso bor gyur pa 
[\[128a.6\]]dang lhan cig tu sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas nas babs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas bcom ldan 'das kyi bkas bshad pa'i chos nyan par gyur to/_/de nas 
[\[128a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa snyed 'das pa na gser 'od ces bya ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams su bla na 
[\[128b\]]
[\[128b.1\]]med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur bas/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang /_zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na 
[\[128b.2\]]med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser dang rin po che'i ri bo'i rgyal po zhes bya bar gyur nas 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bstan 
[\[128b.3\]]pa'i chos rnams nub par gyur pa dang /_de'i tshe 'di'i bu chen po dngul gyi tog ces bya ba 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyal tshab tu gyur te/_/de'i tshe de'i ming bsgyur nas rnam dag tog ces bya bar 'gyur zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[128b.4\]]'gyur bas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser 
[\[128b.5\]]tog 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro/_/de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu bstan pa'i chos rnams nub par gyur pa dang /_'di'i bu chung ngu dngul gyi 'od de bzhin gshegs pa de'i rgyal tshab tu 'gyur bas 'jig rten gyi khams de nyid 
[\[128b.6\]]du mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi 
[\[128b.7\]]rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser 'od ces bya bar 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung bstan to/_/de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag gis skyes bu chen po gsum po de dag gis lung bstan pa yang thos/_'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam 
[\[129a\]]
[\[129a.1\]]pa 'di yang thos pas sems rab tu dga' ba skyes nas rnam par dag cing dri ma med par gyur pas dper na nam mkha' lta bur gyur to/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pas lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smin par thugs kyis mkhyen 
[\[129a.2\]]pas byang chub chen por lung bstan nas/_'di skad du lha'i bu khyed cag ma 'ongs pa'i bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag brgya stong tshad med grangs med pa snyed 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams dbang po'i tog mngon par 'phags pa zhes bya bar bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[129a.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_rus rigs kyang mthun/_ming yang mthun par 'gyur bas thams cad zhal dang spyan rnam par dag cing /_ut+pa la'i dri'i ri mo zhes bya ba mtshan rnam pa bcu phun sum tshogs par 'gyur te/_'di ltar rim bzhin du 
[\[129a.4\]]sangs rgyas stong phrag bcu 'jig rten du 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la byang chub kyi shing gi lha mos 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di dag ni sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i gnas nas chos mnyan pa'i slad 
[\[129a.5\]]du bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar mchis pa lags na/_ci'i slad du de bzhin gshegs pas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan par mdzad lags/_bdag gis ni lha'i bu 'di dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug phun sum tshogs par bsgoms nas 
[\[129a.6\]]dka' ba spyad de/_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mgo dang /_mig dang /_rkang dang /_klad rgyas dang /_g.yog 'khor dang /_bu dang /_'chis 'brang dang /_glang po che dang /_rta dang /_shing rta dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_mngag gzhug bgyid pa dang /_khang 
[\[129a.7\]]khyim dang /_kun dga' ra ba dang /_nags tshal dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_spug dang /_rdo'i snying po dang /_byi ru dang /_man shel dang /_dung dang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_gsos sman dag sbyin pa yongs su 
[\[129b\]]
[\[129b.1\]]gtong bar yang ma thos te/_byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong tshad ma mchis pa gzhan dag ni mchod pa'i yo byad mang pos 'das pa'i sangs rgyas 'bum phrag khrag khrig brgya stong grangs ma mchis pa snyed la mchod pa bgyis nas/_'di ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag so so 
[\[129b.2\]]nas bskal pa tshad ma mchis shing mtha' ma mchis pa snyed lon nas gdod de'i rjes la byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'thob par 'gyur ba lags na/_bcom ldan 'das lha'i bu 'di dag rgyu rkyen ni gang /_spyod pa mchog ni ji lta bu zhig mngon par bsgrubs/_dge ba'i rtsa ba ni ji 
[\[129b.3\]]lta bu zhig bskrun na lha'i gnas de nas 'dir mchis te/_yud tsam zhig chos thos pa 'di nyid kyis lung bstan pa thob par gyur lags/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bdag la bkas bshad de the tsom gyi dra ba gcad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis shing gi lha mo la bka' 
[\[129b.4\]]stsal pa/_rigs kyi lha mo khyod kyis ji skad smras pa bzhin te/_'di dag thams cad ni dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog dam pa'i rgyu dang rkyen dang nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba bsgrubs nas gdod lung bstan pa thob pa yin pas lha'i bu mang po 'di dag lha'i gzhal med khang mchog dam 
[\[129b.5\]]pa nas 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba spangs te/_ched du gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di mnyan du 'ongs pa yin pas chos thos par gyur nas kyang mdo sde 'di la sems kyis gus pa bskyed de/_bai DUr+ya yongs su dag pa ltar skyon gyi dri ma med par gyur pa dang /_gzhan yang byang chub sems 
[\[129b.6\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po gsum po 'di lung bstan pa'i dngos po yang thos pa dang /_gzhan yang 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe yun ring por yang dag pa'i spyod pa bsgrubs nas yi dam chen po blangs pa'i rgyu dang rkyen de'i phyir/_ngas ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[129b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro zhes lung bstan pa yin no/_/de dag shing gi lha mo des bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos nas/_rab tu dga' bas mngon par yid ches par gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog 
[\[130a\]]
[\[130a.1\]]tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu gsum pa'o//_//bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi lha mo legs par nyon la shin tu yid la zung shig dang /_lha'i bu stong phrag 
[\[130a.2\]]bcu po 'di dag gi sngon gyi smon lam gyi rgyu dang rkyen gang yin pa deng khyod la bshad par bya'o/_/rigs kyi lha mo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi bskal pa grangs med pa/_tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i tshe de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[130a.3\]]pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud ces bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/_rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe 
[\[130a.4\]]bcom ldan 'das de yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang dag pa'i chos nub par gyur nas gzugs brnyan gyi chos kyi tshe rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od ces bya ba zhig yod de/_rtag par yang dag pa'i chos kyis pha ma bzhin du mi rnams la rjes su ston par byed do/_/rgyal 
[\[130a.5\]]po de'i yul na tshong dpon chu 'dzin ces bya ba sman gyi rig pa la shin tu mkhas pa/_shes pa'i yan lag brgyad legs par khong du chud pa/_sems can gyi nad kyi sdug bsngal 'byung ba chen po bzhi mi mthun pa las gyur pa thams cad yongs su skyob cing gso bar byed pa zhig 
[\[130a.6\]]yod de/_rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe tshong dpon chu 'dzin de la bu chu 'bebs zhes bya ba byad bzhin sdug cing mdzes pa/_mang po kun gyis blta bar mos pa/_/rang bzhin gyis sems myur ba/_gtsug lag rnams legs par rtogs pa/_yi ge dang /_ri mo dang /_rtsis dang /_
[\[130a.7\]]grangs rnams mngon par mi rtogs pa gang yang med pa zhig yod par gyur to/_/de'i tshe rgyal po de'i yul khams na sems can brgya stong tshad med pa snyed nad kyi sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis rab tu gzir bar gyur pas tha na dga' bar gyur pa'i sems cung zad tsam yang med par 
[\[130b\]]
[\[130b.1\]]gyur to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs sems can brgya stong tshad med pa de dag nad kyi sdug bsngal myong bar gyur pa mthong ba dang /_snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed nas 'di snyam du sems can tshad med pa 'di snyed sdug bsngal mi bzad pas nyon mongs par gyur te/_bdag gi pha 
[\[130b.2\]]tshong dpon sman dpyad la shin tu mkhas shing shes pa'i yan lag brgyad legs par khong du chud de/_'byung ba chen po bzhi 'phel zhing 'grib pa las byung ba'i nad sna tshogs gso bar nus kyang rgas 'khogs pas lus kyi nyam chung zhing dma' ba dang /_'khar ba la brten nas 
[\[130b.3\]]gdod 'gro bas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal rnams su song nas nad kyi sdug bsngal rnams yongs su skyob par byed mi nus la/_deng sems can brgya stong tshad med pa snyed ni nad tshabs chen pos thebs pas yongs su skyob par nus pa med na/_deng bdag pha sman pa 
[\[130b.4\]]chen po'i drung du song la nad gso ba'i sman dpyad gsang ba dris te/_gal te shes par gyur na grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dag tu song la sems can rnams kyi nad rnam pa sna tshogs gsos te yun ring por bde ba myong bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bus 
[\[130b.5\]]de snyam du bsams nas pha'i thad du song ste/_rkang pa la mgo bos gtugs nas phyag byas te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de/_tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis pha la 'di skad ces dris so/_/bdag ni sems can bskyab pa'i slad/_/sman dpyad 
[\[130b.6\]]rnams ni zhu lags na/_/byams pa'i yab kyis brtser dgongs te/_/bdag la bkas ni bshad du gsol/_/ji ltar lus ni 'jig pa na/_/'byung chen rnams ni 'phel 'grib 'gyur/_/gzhan yang dus ni gang gi tshe/_/nad mang rnams ni skye 'gyur lags/_/
[\[130b.7\]]ji ltar zas skom 'tshal 'gyur na/_/bde ba dag ni myong 'gyur zhing /_/lus kyi nang gi me yi mthu/_/nyams shing gnod par mi 'gyur lags/_/sems can nad ni bzhi mchis te/_/rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang /_/kun 'dus pa yi nad lags na/_/de dag ji 
[\[131a\]]
[\[131a.1\]]ltar gso bar bgyi/_/gang gi tshe ni rlung nad ldang /_/gang gi tshe ni mkhris nad slong /_/gang gi tshe ni bad kan g.yo/_/gang gi tshe ni kun 'dus skye/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bus gsol ba btab pa thos pa dang /_tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_ngas deng 
[\[131a.2\]]drang srong rnying pa yi/_/nad gso dpyad la brten nas ni/_/rim bzhin khyod la rab bstan gyis/_/legs par nyon la sems can skyob/_/zla ba gsum ni dpyid kyi dus/_/zla ba gsum ni dbyar zhes bya/_/zla ba gsum ni ston gyi phyogs/_/zla ba gsum ni dgun zhes bya/_/
[\[131a.3\]]'di ni lo gcig las brtsams pas/_/gsum gsum so sor bshad par bya/_/gnyis gnyis dus tshigs gcig byas na/_/lo gcig dus ni drug tu 'gyur/_/dang po gnyis ni me tog dus/_/gsum dang bzhi pa tsha ba'i dus/_/lnga dang drug pa char pa'i dus/_/bdun dang 
[\[131a.4\]]brgyad pa ston gyi dus/_/dgu dang bcu pa grang ba'i dus/_/phyi ma gnyis ni kha ba'i dus/_/de ltar bye brag shes gyur na/_/'gal ba med par sman gtang bya/_/dus ni 'di dag rjes mthun par/_/zas skom legs par sbyor byed na/_/ltor ni myur du 'ju 'gyur bas/_/nad mang 
[\[131a.5\]]dag ni skye mi 'gyur/_/dus tshigs gal te log 'gyur zhing /_/'byung chen bzhi ni 'phos gyur la/_/de tshe gsos sman med gyur na/_/nges par nad kyi sdug bsngal skye/_/sman pas dus bzhi shes bya zhing /_/dus tshigs dug kyang shes par bya/_/lus kyi khams bdun 
[\[131a.6\]]rig byas nas/_/'gal ba med par zas sman gtong /_/ro yi khams dang khrag dang sha/_/rus dang rkang dang klad rgyas su/_/nad ni 'di dag zhugs pa'i tshe/_/gsor rung mi rung shes par bya/_/nad ni tha dad rnam bzhi yod/_/rlung dang mkhris pa bad kan dang /_/kun 'dus 
[\[131a.7\]]pa yi nad yin te/_/g.yo ba'i dus ni shes par bya/_/dpyid ka'i dus su bad kan g.yo/_/dbyar ni rlung nad skye bar 'gyur/_/ston gyi dus su mkhris pa rgyas/_/dgun ni gsum po cig car ldang /_/dpyid ni tsha rtsub dro ba bza'/_/dbyar ni snum dro lan tshwa skyur/_/ston 
[\[131b\]]
[\[131b.1\]]ni grang dang mngar dang snum/_/dgun ni rtsub skyur snum dang mngar/_/dus ni bzhi po 'di dag tu/_/sman dang zas skom gang bza' ba/_/gal te de bzhin za byed na/_/nad mang dag ni skye mi 'gyur/_/zos 'og na ba bad kan dbang /_/zhu tshe na ba mkhris las gyur/_/zhu 
[\[131b.2\]]'og ldang ba rlung gi dbang /_/dus dang sbyar nas nad shes bya/_/nad kyi rtsa ba shes gyur nas/_/nad ni ji bzhin sman gtang bya/_/nad dbyibs bye brag tha dad kyang /_/sngar ni rtsa ba shes par bya/_/rlung nad dag la snum bag gtang /_/mkhris pa'i nad ni 'khru na bzang /_/bad kan 
[\[131b.3\]]nad ni skyug par bya/_/kun 'dus la ni sman gsum dgos/_/rlung mkhris bad kan gsum ldan pa/_/de ni kun 'dus pa zhes bya/_/nad ldang dus ni shes gyur kyang /_/rang bzhin dag ni shes par bya/_/de ltar brtags te shes gyur nas/_/dus bzhin du ni sman gtang bya/_/
[\[131b.4\]]zas skom sman ni 'gal med pa/_/de ni sman pa mkhas zhes bya/_/shes pa'i yan lag brgyad rig na/_/sman dpyad rnams ni kun ba sdud pas/_/'di dag la ni gsal byas nas/_/sems can nad ni gso bar bya/_/gtar ba dang ni rmas snad dang /_/lus kyi nad dang 
[\[131b.5\]]'dre gdon dang /_/ma rungs dug dang byis pa dang /_/tshe bsring dang ni mthu skyed yin/_/sngar ni de yi kha dog dang /_/smra tshig rang bzhin rab brtags nas/_/de 'og rmi lam dris gyur na/_/rlung mkhris bad kan bye brag shes/_/skem rid mgo yi skra ngan cing /_/sems kyi rang 
[\[131b.6\]]bzhin mi brtan la/_/tshig mang rmi lam 'phur mthong ba/_/de ni rlung gi rang bzhin can/_/gzhon nur skra dkar skye ba dang /_/rngul che gsher ba mang ba dang /_/yid gzhungs rmi lam me mthong ba/_/de ni mkhris pa'i rang bzhin can/_/sems brtan lus ni mnyam la drang /_/
[\[131b.7\]]zhib rtog mgo dag snum zhing rlan/_/rmi lam chu dang rdzas dkar mthong /_/bad kan rang bzhin shes par bya/_/kun 'dus rang bzhin kun ldan pas/_/kha cig gnyis dang gsum dang ldan/_/phyogs gcig lhag par gang mang ba/_/de yi rang bzhin shes par byos/_/rang 
[\[132a\]]
[\[132a.1\]]bzhin rig par gyur nas ni/_/nad bzhin sman ni gtang bar bya/_/'chi ba'i mtshan ma med gyur na/_/mi de gsor rung ba zhes bya/_/dbang pos log par yul 'dzin cing /_/bla ma sman pa dag la brnyas/_/nye du dag la khong khro na/_/'chi ba'i mtshan mar 
[\[132a.2\]]shes par bya/_/mig yon kha dog dkar 'gyur zhing /_/lce gnag sna zur yo ba dang /_/rna ba'i 'khor lo sngo las gyur/_/ma mchu thur 'phyang 'chi ba'i mtshan/_/a ru ra ni rnam gcig la/_/ro ni rnam pa drug ldan te/_/nad ni thams cad sel byed pas/_/nyes med sman rnams 
[\[132a.3\]]kun gyi rgyal/_/'bras bu gsum dang tsha ba gsum/_/sman rnams nang na rnyed par sla/_/bu ram sbrang rtsi 'o ma mar/_/'di dag nad mang gso bar nus/_/de las gzhan pa'i sman rnams ni/_/nad dang sbyar te bskyed par bya/_/sngar ni brtse ba'i sems bskyed nas/_/nor dang khe la blta 
[\[132a.4\]]mi bya/_/ngas ni khyod la nad gso ba'i/_/gces pa'i don ni bstan pa yin/_/'di yis sems can gso byas na/_/mtha' med 'bras bu thob par 'gyur/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs pha las mngon sum du shes pa'i yan lag brgyad kyi don shes pa 
[\[132a.5\]]dang /_'byung ba chen po bzhi 'phel zhing 'grib pa dang /_dus tshigs mi mthun pa dang /_sman dpyad kyi cho ga thos pas legs par khong du chud par gyur nas/_bdag nyid nad mang po gso nus par rig par gyur pas grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal kun du khyab par 
[\[132a.6\]]de dang de dag tu song ste/_nad kyi sdug bsngal dang ldan pa'i sems can 'bum phrag brgya stong du ma de'i thad du lhags pa rnams la legs pa'i tshig gis spro ba bskyed nas 'di skad du nga ni sman pa'o/_/nga ni sman pa ste/_sman dpyad la shin tu mkhas pas deng khyed cag gi nad mang 
[\[132a.7\]]po gsos nas thams cad sos par bya'o zhes smras so/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe mi mang po rnams tshong dpon gyi bus legs pa'i tshig gis spro ba bskyed nas nad gso bar gnang ba thos pa dang /_de nas sems can nad tshabs chen pos btab pa brgya stong tshad med pa snyed cig tshig 
[\[132b\]]
[\[132b.1\]]de skad smras pa thos nas lus dang sems dga' mgu rangs shing ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba thos par gyur pas rgyu dang rkyen des nad kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed pa thams cad sos shing zhi bar gyur pas nyams stobs rtas te snga mkho bzhin du sos par gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe gzhan 
[\[132b.2\]]yang nad kyi sdug bsngal shin tu lci zhing gso bar dka' ba'i sems can brgya stong tshad med pa rnams kyang lhan cig tu tshong dpon gyi bu'i thad du lhags nas nad gso bar gsol ba btab pa dang /_de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bus sman gya nom pa dag btang nas thams cad sos par gyur te/_
[\[132b.3\]]rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu des yul khams de kun gyi nad kyi sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa'i sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du ma sos par byas so/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las nad rab tu zhi bar byas pa'i le'u ste nyi shu 
[\[132b.4\]]bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'beb kyis sngon rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od kyi yul khams su sems can gyi nad kyi sdug bsngal ji snyed yod pa 
[\[132b.5\]]dag gsos nas snga mkho bzhin du rtas te bde ba myong bar gyur ba dang /_de'i tshe sems can mang po de dag nad sos par gyur pa'i phyir bsod nams kyi las mang du bsags nas sbyin pa rgya cher btang ba la bdag nyid longs spyod par gyur pas thams cad lhan cig tshong dpon 
[\[132b.6\]]gyi bu'i thad du dong ste/_thams cad gus pa bskyed nas 'di skad du tshong dpon chen po'i bu bsod nams kyi dngos po shin tu legs par bskyed de bdag cag la phan btags nas bde bar 'tsho bar byas pa legs so legs so/_/khyod ni yang dag pa'i mthu chen po dang 
[\[132b.7\]]ldan pa'i sman pa'i rgyal po byams pa dang snying rje dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' yin te/_sman dpyad la shin tu mkhas pas sems can gyi nad kyi sdug bsngal tshad med pa dag legs par gsos so/_/zhes grong dang grong khyer kun du khyab par bsngags pa brjod 
[\[133a\]]
[\[133a.1\]]par gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu de'i chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i mdzod ces bya ba la bu gnyis yod de/_gcig gi ming ni chu rgyas zhes bya'o/_/gcig gi ming ni chu'i mdzod ces bya'o/_/de nas chu 'bebs kyis bu gnyis khrid nas mthar gyis 
[\[133a.2\]]grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal rgyu zhing dong ba las dgon pa'i gnas shin tu nyam nga ba zhig 'das pa dang /_de na 'phar ba dang /_spyang ki dang /_wa dang /_spra chen dang /_bya rgod la sogs pa gcan gzan gyi rnam pa sha khrag za zhing 'thung ba mang po phyogs gcig tu rgyug 
[\[133a.3\]]cing 'phur te dong ba mthong ngo /_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu de 'di snyam du gcan gzan 'di dag rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir phyogs gcig tu 'phur zhing rgyug par gyur/_bdag gis skad cig phyi bzhin du brtag go snyam du bsams nas/_/phyi bzhin du song ba las rdzing chen po dgon pa 
[\[133a.4\]]skyes zhes bya ba de ni chu zad la thug pas rdzing de'i nang na nya mang po yod pa mthong bar gyur to/_/chu 'bebs kyis mthong nas kyang snying rje chen po'i sems skyes pa dang /_de'i tshe shing gi lha zhig gis lus phyed tsam bstan nas 'di skad du legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod 
[\[133a.5\]]ni yang dag pa'i don dang ldan pa'i phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya bas nya 'di dag la snying brtse bas chu sbyin pa'i rigs so/_/rgyu dang rkyen rnam pa gnyis dang ldan pa'i phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya ste/_chu 'bab par byed pa dang /_chu sbyin par byed pa'o/_/deng khyod kyis ming ji lta ba bzhin du byos 
[\[133a.6\]]shig_/de nas chu 'bebs kyis shing gi lha la smras pa/_nya 'di dag gi grangs ji tsam zhig yod/_shing gi lhas smras pa/_grangs ni stong phrag bcu tshang ba snyed yod do/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bus grangs de snyed yod par thos pa dang /_lhag par snying rje'i 
[\[133a.7\]]bsam pa skyes par gyur to/_/de'i tshe rdzing chen po de yang nyi mas gdungs nas chu'i lhag ma [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]cig lus par gyur pas nya stong phrag bcu po de dag kyang 'chi ba'i sgor zhugs te lus kyis 'dre ldog byas pa na tshong dpon des mthong ba dang /_sems la re ba dang bcas pas mig mi 
[\[133b\]]
[\[133b.1\]]'dzums par rjes su 'brang zhing lta bar gyur to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bus dngos po de mthong nas phyogs bzhir brgyugs te/_chu btsal bar 'dod kyang rnyed par ma gyur pas yang phyogs gcig tu rnam par bltas pa las ljon shing chen po zhig mthong ba dang /_steng du 'dzegs 
[\[133b.2\]]nas yal ga dang lo ma bcad de bsil grib byas so/_/gzhan yang rdzing 'di'i chu gang nas 'ongs zhes yongs su btsal ba las chu bo chen po chu skyes zhes bya ba zhig mthong ngo /_/de'i tshe chu bo de'i 'gram na nya pa mang po yod pas nya blang ba'i phyir chu bo de'i gong du g.yang sa chen po yod 
[\[133b.3\]]pa'i gnas su chu bo nas 'bab tu mi ster bas chu dral ba'i gnas de yang shin tu bcos dka' bar gyur pas 'di snyam du gang ba 'di ni shin tu zab cing g.yang sa che bas mi brgya stong gis zla ba gsum gyi bar du yang gcod par mi nus na bdag gcig pus nus pa lta smos kyang ci dgos snyam 
[\[133b.4\]]mo/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu myur du rang gi grong khyer du song ste rgyal po chen po'i drung du phyin nas mgo bos rkang pa la phyag byas te phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas gus pas thal mo sbyar te/_'di skad du bdag gis rgyal po chen po'i mnga' ris na 'bangs la bro nad sna tshogs ci mchis pa 
[\[133b.5\]]gsos nas/_thams cad bde bar bgyis te/_mthar gyis ljongs rgyur mchis pa las 'brog dgon pa zhig tu mchis pa dang /_rdzing dgon pa chu skyes zhes bgyi ba de'i chab bas su nye bas de na nya stong phrag bcu mchis pa yang gdugs kyis skams pas ring po mi thogs par 'gum 
[\[133b.6\]]par 'gyur ba dag mthong lags na/_rgyal po chen po byams pa dang thugs rjes thugs brtse bar dgongs te glang po che nyi shu zhig chab dgal bar skad cig stsal du gsol/_/ji ltar bdag gis nad pa mang po dag la srog stsal ba de bzhin du nya de dag gi srog gi skyabs bgyid pa 
[\[133b.7\]]lags so zhes gsol to/_/de nas rgyal po chen pos kyang blon po chen po la sman pa'i rgyal po 'di la myur du glang po che byin cig ces bsgo'o/_/de'i tshe blon po chen pos kyang rgyal po'i bka' khyer nas tshong dpon gyi bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/kye skyes bu chen po legs so/_/khyod 
[\[134a\]]
[\[134a.1\]]bdag nyid glang po che'i lhas su song ste/_yid la ji ltar 'dod pa bzhin du glang po che nyi shu zhig 'dams te khyer la sems can la phan btags nas bde ba thob par gyis shig_/de nas chu 'bebs bu gnyis dang lhan cig tu glang po che nyi shu khrid de chang pa'i 
[\[134a.2\]]khyim nas rkyal pa mang po g.yar te/_chu dral ba'i gnas su phyin nas rkyal pa chus bkang ste glang po che la bkal nas rdzing gi drung du phyin te/_rdzing gi nang du blugs pa dang snga mkho bzhin du gang zhing rgyas par gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bus rdzing gi ngos bzhir 'khor bar 
[\[134a.3\]]bltas pa dang /_de nas nya mang po de dag kyang phyi bzhin 'brangs nas 'gram du rgyu bar gyur to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu yang 'di snyam du nya mang po 'di dag ci'i phyir bdag gi phyi bzhin 'brang /_gdon mi za bar bkres pa'i mes gdungs nas bdag la zas slong ba yin pas bdag 
[\[134a.4\]]gis sbyin par bya'o snyam du bsams nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis bu la 'di skad ces smras so/_/khyod kyis glang po che mchog tu stobs dang ldan pa zhig blangs te myur du khyim du deng la yab tshong dpon la gsol te/_khyim na bzar rung ba'i dngos po ci yod pa dang /_pha ma za 
[\[134a.5\]]ba'i skal ba dang /_bu dang chung ma dang /_bran dang /_bran mo'i skal ba ci yod pa thams cad kyang bsdus te khyer la shog shig_/de nas bu gnyis pha'i bstan pa mnyan nas glang po che mchog la zhon te/_rings par khyim du song nas mes po'i drung du phyin pa dang /_dngos po gong 
[\[134a.6\]]ma rgyas par smras nas khyim na bzar rung ba'i dngos po ci yod pa blangs te glang po che la bkal nas myur zhing rings par pha 'dug pa'i rdzing drung du phyin pa dang /_de nas chu 'bebs bu 'ongs pa mthong nas lus dang sems dga' mgu rangs par gyur te/_zas rnams blangs nas rdzing 
[\[134a.7\]]kun du khyab par gtor ba dang /_nya rnams zas thob pa dang thams cad 'grangs shing tshim par gyur to/_/yang 'di snyam du deng bdag gis zas yongs su btang nas nya rnams srog thob par gyur pas ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi tshe yang chos kyi zas yongs su btang nas sems can mtha' yas 
[\[134b\]]
[\[134b.1\]]pa rnams tshim par byed par gyur cig snyam mo/_/gzhan yang 'di snyam du bdag gis sngon dgon pa'i nags tshal na dge slong zhig theg pa chen po'i mdo sde klog pa las rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab mo'i don gces pa ston pa yang mthong zhing thos/_gzhan 
[\[134b.2\]]yang mdo sde las sems can gang la la zhig 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug phud kyi mtshan thos par gyur na mtho ris su skye bar 'gyur ro zhes gsungs pas/_deng bdag gis nya stong phrag bcu po de dag la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i 
[\[134b.3\]]chos zab mo yang bstan la de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug phud kyi mtshan yang brjod par bya'o/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di na sems can rnam pa gnyis yod de/_theg pa chen po la shin tu mngon par yid ches pa dang /_yid mi ches shing smod par byed pa ste/_de dag kyang 
[\[134b.4\]]mngon par yid ches pa'i sems 'phel bar bya'o snyam mo/_/de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu 'di snyam du bdag rdzing gi nang du zhugs te nya mang po de dag la chos zab mo shin tu gya nom pa bshad par bya'o snyam du bsams nas chu'i nang du zhugs te/_'di skad ces 'das pa'i de bzhin 
[\[134b.5\]]gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa'i skyes bu kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug phud la 
[\[134b.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'di sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na 'di ltar thugs dam bzhes te/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa gang dag 'chi ka'i dus kyi tshe nga'i ming thos par gyur na shi 'phos pa'i 'og tu sum cu rtsa gsum 
[\[134b.7\]]gyi lhar skye bar 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to zhes bsgrags so/_/de nas chu 'bebs kyis rdzing gi nya de dag la chos zab mo gya nom pa yang 'di skad du 'di yod pa'i phyir de yod/_'di skyes pa'i phyir de skye bar 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed/_'du byed kyi rkyen 
[\[135a\]]
[\[135a.1\]]gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len 
[\[135a.2\]]pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_'khrug pa 'byung ste/_sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di 'ba' zhig 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di 'gags pa'i phyir de 'gag par 'gyur ba 
[\[135a.3\]]'di lta ste/_ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed 'gag_/'du byed 'gags pas rnam par shes pa 'gag_/rnam par shes pa 'gags pas ming dang gzugs 'gag_/ming dang gzugs 'gags pas skye mched drug 'gag_/skye mched drug 'gags pas reg pa 'gag_/
[\[135a.4\]]reg pa 'gags pas tshor ba 'gag_/tshor ba 'gags pas sred pa 'gag_/sred pa 'gags pas len pa 'gag_/len pa 'gags pas srid pa 'gag_/srid pa 'gags pas skye ba 'gag_/skye ba 'gags pas rga shi 'gag_/rga shi 'gags pas mya ngan dang /_smre 
[\[135a.5\]]sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'gag par 'gyur te/_'di ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po 'di 'ba' zhig 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bshad do/_/chos 'di dag bshad nas gzhan yang rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i yan lag bcu gnyis dang 
[\[135a.6\]]mtshungs par ldan pa'i gzungs 'di bstan to/_/tad+ya thA/_bi tsa ni/_bi tsa ni/_bi tsa ni/_saMsh+tsa ni/_saMsh+tsa ni/_saMsh+tsa ni/_b+hi shi ni/_b+hi shi ni/_b+hi shi ni swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_na mi ni/_na mi ni/_na mi ni/_sha d+hi ni/_sha d+hi ni/_sha d+hi ni/_sra pra shi ni/_sra pra shi ni/_sra pra shi ni swA hA/_
[\[135a.7\]]tad+ya thA/_be tra ni/_be tra ni/_be tra ni/_tri shi ni ni/_tri shi ni ni/_tri shi ni ni/_u pa d+hi ni/_u pa d+hi ni/_u pa d+hi ni swA hA/_tad+ya thA/_b+ha bi ni/_b+ha bi ni/_b+ha bi ni/_sha ti ni/_sha ti ni/_sha ti ni/_sha ma ni ni/_sha ma ni ni/_sha ma ni ni swA hA/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das 
[\[135b\]]
[\[135b.1\]]kyis 'khor mang po rnams la tshong dpon gyi bu'i sngon gyi rgyu 'di bstan pa na lha dang mi'i 'khor rnams kyis shin tu ngo mtshar che'o zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi po dag so so nas gnas de nyid du mgrin gcig tu 'di skad ces smras so/_/legs so 
[\[135b.2\]]shAkya thub pa'i gtso/_/yan lag bcu gnyis mtshungs ldan pa/_/dam chos rig sngags bkas bshad nas/_/sdig bsal bsod nams 'phel bar mdzad/_/bdag cag kyang ni sngags brjod nas/_/dam pa'i chos ni srung bar bgyid/_/gang zhig 'gal bar bgyis nas ni/_/legs 
[\[135b.3\]]par rjes su mi 'brang na/_/ardza ka yi yal ga bzhin/_/mgo ni tshal pa bdun du 'gas/_/bdag cag bcom ldan spyan sngar ni/_/rig sngags lan cig brjod par bgyi/_/tad+ya thA/_hi ri mi gA te/_gan+d+ha ri/_tsan+d+ha ri/_d+ha ri dze b+ha re/_shi hi b+ha ri/_pu re pu re/_gu gu ma ti/_khi ra ma 
[\[135b.4\]]ti/_d+ha d+hi mu khi/_lau ru b+ha/_mu ru b+hi/_ku tsa mu ru gan+te/_tu ru tu ru tu ru bI r+ye/_a d+hi sid+d+hi/_da ba bye/_d+ha da ba bye/_uste/_u sta bad d+he/_an le bad d+he/_pa du ma bad d+he/_a su ma bad d+he swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu chu 
[\[135b.5\]]'bebs dang bu gnyis kyis rdzing de'i nya dag la chu dang zas byin nas chos bshad de slar rang gi khyim du dong ngo /_/tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs de dus gzhan zhig na ston mo la 'dus te/_ston mo sna tshogs byas nas chang gis ra ro ste nyal ba dang /_de'i tshe nya stong phrag bcu po de dag dus gcig tu tshe 'das 
[\[135b.6\]]nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pas/_de dag 'di snyam du bdag cag dge ba'i las kyi rgyu dang rkyen gang gis lha'i gnas 'dir skyes par gyur ces bsams nas phan tshun gcig la gcig 'di skad du bdag cag ni sngon 'dzam bu'i gling du dud 'gro'i skye gnas su lhung nas nya'i lus blangs 
[\[135b.7\]]pa las/_tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis bdag cag la chu dang zas byin nas/_gzhan yang bdag cag la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab mo dang gzungs kyang bshad/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug phud kyi mtshan nas kyang brjod pa'i rgyu 
[\[136a\]]
[\[136a.1\]]dang rkyen des bdag cag lha'i gnas 'dir skyes pa yin pas/_de'i phyir bdag cag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu de'i thad du dong la drin bsab pa'i phyir mchod pa bya ba'i rigs so zhes smras so/_/de nas lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag lha'i gnas de nas mi snang bar 
[\[136a.2\]]gyur te 'dzam bu'i gling du sman pa'i rgyal po chen po'i thad du lhags so/_/de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi bu de yang thog mthon po'i steng du bde bar gnyid log pa las lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag gis mu tig gi phreng ba stong phrag bcu ni mgo drung du bzhag_/yang stong phrag bcu ni rkang pa'i drung du 
[\[136a.3\]]bzhag_/yang stong phrag bcu ni g.yas phyogs su bzhag_/yang stong phrag bcu ni g.yon phyogs su bzhag ste/_me tog man+dA ra ba dang /_man+dA ra ba chen po'i char pus nub tsam du phab nas 'od kyis kun du snang bar byas te/_lha'i rol mo rnam pa sna tshogs las sgra dbyangs snyan pa dag 
[\[136a.4\]]byung bas 'dzam bu'i gling du gnyid log pa thams cad sad par byas so/_/tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyang gnyid log pa las sad par gyur pa dang /_de nas lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag gis mchod pa byas nas nam mkha' la 'phur te dong ngo /_/rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od kyi yul 
[\[136a.5\]]khams su yang gnas de dang de dag thams cad du lha'i me tog pad+ma dam pa'i char mngon par phab bo/_/lha'i bu mang po de dag sngon gyi gnas dgon pa'i rdzing drung du dong nas lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyi char mngon par phab ste/_de nas mi snang bar gyur nas slar lha'i gnas su dong ste/_yid bzhin du ci 
[\[136a.6\]]dga' bar 'dod pa lnga'i bde ba dag la longs spyod par gyur to/_/rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od kyang nam langs pa dang blon po chen po de dag la mdang sum rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir ya mtshan gyi mtshan ma de lta bu dag snang zhing 'od zer chen po dag kyang bkye bar gyur ces smras so/_/blon po chen 
[\[136a.7\]]pos gsol ba/_rgyal po chen po mkhyen par mdzod cig_/lha'i tshogs mang po rnams kyis tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi sdum par mu tig gi phreng ba stong phrag bzhi bcu dang /_me tog man+dA ra ba'i char mngon par phab pa pus nub tsam du bgyis lags so/_/rgyal pos blon po la 
[\[136b\]]
[\[136b.1\]]bsgo ba/_tshong dpon gyi khyim du song la de'i bu bos shig_/blon po chen pos bka' mnyan nas de'i khyim du song ste/_rgyal po'i bka' bzlas nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu bkug go/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu rgyal po'i drung du phyin pa dang /_mdang sum rgyu dang rkyen gang gi phyir ya 
[\[136b.2\]]mtshan che ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu dag byung bar gyur ces dris so/_/tshong dpon gyi bus smras pa/_bdag gis dpyad pa ltar na gdon mi 'tshal bar rdzing de'i nang gi nya mang po de dag mdo sde las gsungs pa bzhin du tshe 'das nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lhar skyes pas de dag drin la lan 
[\[136b.3\]]glan pa'i slad du ya mtshan che ba'i mtshan ma de lta bu bstan snyam bgyid lags so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ji ltar shes/_chu 'bebs kyis smras pa/_lhas pho nya 'ga' zhig dang /_bdag gi bu gnyis rdzing de'i drung du btang ste/_nya stong phrag bcu po de gum mam 'tsho brtags 
[\[136b.4\]]na mad dam mi mad mkhyen par 'gyur lags so/_/rgyal pos de skad smras pa thos nas pho nya dang /_de'i bu gnyis rdzing de'i drung du btang ba las rdzing gi nang na me tog man+dA ra ba mang po phung po chen por gyur pa dang /_nya mang po thams cad dus las 'das par mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang 
[\[136b.5\]]slar myur du log ste rgyas par rgyal po la gsol ba dang /_rgyal po yang de ltar gyur pa thos pas rab tu dga' bar gyur nas sngon chad de lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs 
[\[136b.6\]]kyi lha mo khyod kyis 'di ltar shes par bya ste/_sngon byung ba tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bya ba de ni nga nyid yin no/_/tshong dpon chu 'dzin ces bya ba de ni mdzes pa'i tog yin no/_/de'i bu gnyis las bu chen po chu rgyas zhes bya ba de ni dngul gyi tog ces bya ba 'di nyid do/_/de'i bu chung ngu chu'i 
[\[136b.7\]]mdzod ces bya ba de ni dngul gyi 'od ces bya ba 'di nyid yin no/_/rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug gi 'od ces bya ba de ni byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo khyod nyid yin no/_/nya stong phrag bcu po de dag ni lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po 'di nyid yin no/_/ngas sngon nya de dag la chu dang zas byin te tshim par byas nas rten 
[\[137a\]]
[\[137a.1\]]cing 'brel bar 'byung ba yan lag bcu gnyis pa'i chos zab mo dang mtshungs par ldan pa'i gzungs 'di bshad pa'i rgyu de dang /_gzhan yang de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug phud de'i mtshan nas brjod de bstan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba de'i rgyus mtho ris su skyes par gyur 
[\[137a.2\]]pas/_deng nga'i thad du 'ongs nas rab tu dga' bas chos mnyan pas ngas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan nas de dag gi ming bstan pa yin no/_/rigs kyi lha mo ji ltar ngas sngon srid pa rnams su 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe sems can tshad med pa 
[\[137a.3\]]snyed la rgya cher phan btags nas thams cad rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa de bzhin du khyed cag thams cad kyis kyang nan tan brtson 'grus kyis nges par 'byung ba yongs su gnyer nas/_bag med par mi bya'o/_/de nas 'khor 
[\[137a.4\]]mang po rnams de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pa dang /_thams cad kyis byams pa dang /_snying rje chen pos thams cad yongs su skyo ba dang /_nan tan brtson 'grus kyi dka' ba spyad nas/_gdod bla na med pa'i byang chub rtogs shing mngon du byed par 'gyur bar khong du 
[\[137a.5\]]chud par gyur pas shin tu dang ba'i sems kyis mngon par yid ches shing rab tu dga' bar gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi le'u ste nyi shu lnga pa'o//_//gser 'od dam pa mchog tu 
[\[137a.6\]]rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po/_bam po bcu pa ste tha ma/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po rnams la lha'i bu stong phrag bcu po de dag gi sngon gyi rgyu dang rkyen bkas bshad nas/_yang byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo dang 'khor mang po rnams la bka' stsal pa/_
[\[137a.7\]]ngas 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe byang chub sems dpa'i lam spyod pa na chu dang zas sbyin pa btang nas nya de dag gi srog la phan btags pa 'ba' zhig byas pa ma yin gyi/_shin tu phangs pa'i lus kyang yongs su btang ste/_de'i rgyu dang rkyen gang yin pa lhan cig blta bar bya'o/_/
[\[137b\]]
[\[137b.1\]]de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas lha'i gnas kyi steng dang /_lha'i gnas kyi 'og thams cad na mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba/_mchog tu btsun pa/_'od zer brgya stong du mas phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams gsal bar 
[\[137b.2\]]mdzad pa/_mkhyen pa thams cad phun sum tshogs par gyur pa/_yon tan yongs su rdzogs par gyur pa des dge slong rnams dang /_'khor mang po rnams dang thabs cig tu pany+tsa la'i ljongs su byon nas/_nags tshal sa gzhi shin tu mnyam la tsher ma rnams med 
[\[137b.3\]]pa me tog mchog dam pa dang rtswa 'jam po dag gis kun du khyab par bkram par gshegs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyis shing 'di'i drung du nga'i ched du stan thing shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bka' 
[\[137b.4\]]mnyan nas gdan bting ngo /_/bting zin nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gdan bshams lags na 'phags pas dus mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan gyi steng du skyil mo krung bcas te sku drang 
[\[137b.5\]]por bsrang nas/_yang dag pa'i dran pa nye bar bzhag ste bzhugs nas dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_khyed cag sngon dka' ba spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi lus kyi ring bsrel blta bar 'dod dam/_dge slong rnams kyis gsol ba/_bdag cag 
[\[137b.6\]]mthong bar mos lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das bsod nams brgyas rab tu brgyan pa/_mtshan dang dpe byad dang ldan pa'i phyag gis sa la bsnun pa dang /_de'i tshe sa chen po rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur pas sa gas shing bye bar gyur pa dang /_rin po che 
[\[137b.7\]]sna bdun gyi mchod rten rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas rab tu brgyan pa zhig mngon par 'phags te byung ba 'khor mang po kun gyis mthong nas ngo mtshar che ba'i bsam pa skyes par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te/_phyag mdzad nas g.yas 
[\[138a\]]
[\[138a.1\]]phyogs su bskor ba mdzad de slar gdan la bzhugs nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyis mchod rten 'di'i sgo phye shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos sgo de phye ste/_rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i sgrom bu rin po che 
[\[138a.2\]]mchog dam pas brgyan pa zhig mthong ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rin po che sna bdun las bgyis pa'i sgrom bu rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa zhig gda' lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' 
[\[138a.3\]]stsal pa/_khyod kyis sgrom phye shig de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos bka' mnyan nas phye ba dang ring bsrel kha dog dung dang me tog ku mu da 'dra ba zhig mthong nas bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/_sgrom gyi nang na ring bsrel kha dog dam pa gzhan las khyad par du 
[\[138a.4\]]'phags pa zhig gda' lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis skyes bu chen po'i rus pa 'dir khyer te shog shig_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos ring bsrel de blangs nas bcom ldan 'das la phul lo/_/bcom ldan 
[\[138a.5\]]'das kyis bzhes nas dge slong rnams la khyed kyis dka' ba spyad pa'i byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi ring bsrel bzhag pa la ltos shig ces bka' stsal nas tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' yon tan mchog ldan blo/_/rab dpa' brtson 
[\[138a.6\]]pas pha rol phyin drug rdzogs/_/rtag sgom byang chub phyir ni rgyun 'chad med/_/btang snyoms che bstan sems la ngal ba med/_/dge slong dag khyed cag thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi lus kyi ring bsrel la gus pas phyag byos shig_/ring bsrel 
[\[138a.7\]]'di ni tshul khrims dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyi dri tshad med pa dag gis yongs su bdugs pa/_bsod nams kyi zhing mchog dam pa yin pas shin tu phrad par dka'o/_/de nas dge slong rnams dang /_'khor mang po rnams kyis sems rtse gcig tu gus 
[\[138b\]]
[\[138b.1\]]pas thal mo sbyar te mgo bos ring bsrel la phyag byas nas/_sngon chad nam yang de lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod par gyur to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo mdun du 'phags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag byas nas bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[138b.2\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen po ni thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa lags pas sems can kun gyis bsnyen bkur bgyi ba lags na/_rgyu dang rkyen gang gi slad du lus kyi rus pa 'di la phyag mdzad lags/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[138b.3\]]kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo nga ni rus pa 'di'i rgyus myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas par gyur pas sngon gyi drin bsab pa'i phyir deng ngas phyag byas pa yin no/_/yang tshe dang ldan pa kun 
[\[138b.4\]]dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_ngas deng khyod dang 'khor mang po'i the tsom dang som nyi bcad pa'i phyir ring bsrel 'di'i sngon gyi rgyu dang rkyen gang yin pa yang dag par bshad kyis khyed cag legs par yid la byos la sems rtse gcig tu nyon cig_/tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos 
[\[138b.5\]]gsol ba/_bdag cag shin tu thos par mos lags na rnam par phye ste bkas bshad du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe yul gcig gi rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya ba shin tu phyug cing nor mang ba/_
[\[138b.6\]]bang mdzod rgyas pa/_dmag gi dpung rab tu dpa' ba/_mang po kun gyis bkur zhing ngag nyan pa/_rtag par yang dag pa'i chos kyis skye bo 'dul ba/_mi rnams dar zhing rgyas pa/_phyir rgol ba'i dgra med pa zhig yod de/_btsun mo dam pa byad bzhin shin tu sdug cing 
[\[138b.7\]]mdzes pa/_mang po kun gyis blta bar mos pa'i bu gsum yod de/_bu chen po'i ming ni sgra chen po zhes bya'o/_/bu 'bring po'i ming ni lha chen po zhes bya'o/_/bu tha [{]chungs kyi [,]chung gi [}]ming ni sems can chen po zhes bya'o/_/de'i tshe rgyal po chen po de rtse zhing ltad mo blta ba'i phyir ri 
[\[139a\]]
[\[139a.1\]]dang nags tshal kun du blta bar chas pa dang /_bu gsum po de yang phyi bzhin du dong ngo /_/me tog dang 'bras bu btsal ba'i phyir pha spangs te kun du 'khyam pa las 'od ma'i tshal chen po zhig tu phyin te ngal bsos so/_/de nas rgyal bu chen pos 'di skad du 
[\[139a.2\]]deng bdag ni sems skrag cing 'jigs par gyur na/_nags tshal 'dir gcan gzan ma rungs pa dag gis bdag cag gsod par mi 'gyur ram zhes smras so/_/rgyal bu 'bring pos yang 'di skad du bdag ni rang gi lus la dang po nas phangs pa med na snying du sdug pa 'di 
[\[139a.3\]]dang 'bral ba'i sdug bsngal zhing 'byung du dogs so zhes smras so/_/rgyal bu tha [{]chungs kyis [,]chung gis [}]pho bo gnyis la smras pa/_/'di ni lha dang drang srong 'du ba'i gnas/_/bdag la 'jigs dngangs 'bral ba'i mya ngan med/_/lus sems kun khyab dga' ba skyes pas na/_/khyad par 'phags 
[\[139a.4\]]pa'i yon tan 'thob par 'gyur/_/de'i tshe rgyal bu rnams so so nas rang gi sems la ci bsams pa'i dngos po dag smras nas mthar gyis mdun du dong ba las stag mo zhig bu bdun btsas nas zhag bdun lon pa bu rnams kyis bskor ba/_bkres pa dang skom pa dag gis rab tu 
[\[139a.5\]]gzir ba/_lus rid cing nyam chung ba ring po mi thogs par 'chi bar 'gyur ba zhig mthong ba dang /_rgyal bu chen pos 'di skad du kye ma stag mo 'di ni bu btsas nas zhag bdun lon te/_bu bdun gyis yongs su bskor bas zas btsal yang mi khom ste/_bkres pa dang skom pa dag 
[\[139a.6\]]gis rab tu gzir bas gdon mi za bar bu rnams za bar 'gyur ro zhes smras so/_/rgyal bu sems can chen pos smras pa/_stag 'di dag rtag par zas ji lta bu zhig za/_rgyal bu chen pos smras pa/_stag dang seng ge 'phar spyang rnams/_/sha khrag dron mo 'ba' zhig za/_/de las 
[\[139a.7\]]gzhan pa'i zas skom gyis/_/'di yi nyam chung sel mi nus/_/rgyal bu 'bring pos de skad smras pa thos pa dang 'di skad ces smras so/_/stag mo 'di ni rid cing nyam chung la bkres skom gyis nyon mongs pas srog gi lhag ma [{]chung zad [,]cung zad [}]tsam zhig lus na/_bdag cag gis ji ltar 
[\[139b\]]
[\[139b.1\]]'di ltar rnyed par dka' ba'i zas dang skom btsal bar nus/_su zhig ni 'di dag gi ched du rang gi lus dang srog spangs nas bkres pa dang skom pa'i sdug bsngal sel bar byed/_rgyal bu chen pos smras pa/_spang bar dka' ba thams cad kyi nang na bdag gi lus las lhag pa gang 
[\[139b.2\]]yang med do/_/rgyal bu sems can chen pos smras pa/_deng bdag cag ni so so nas rang gi lus la sred cing mngon par zhen pa dang /_shes rab med pas gzhan la phan 'dogs par mi nus kyi/_skyes bu dam pa dag ni snying rje chen po'i sems dang ldan pas rtag par gzhan la 
[\[139b.3\]]phan gdags pa'i phyir rang gi lus khyad du bsad nas sems can rnams la phan 'dogs par byed do/_/gzhan yang 'di snyam du bdag gi lus 'di ni tshe rabs brgya stong du ma'i bar du don med par rul cing myags te bor bas phan pa ci yang byas pa med na/_ci'i phyir deng mchil 
[\[139b.4\]]snabs bzhin du yongs su spangs nas bkres pa dag gis nyen pa'i sdug bsngal sel bar mi byed snyam mo/_/de'i tshe rgyal bu de dag tshig de lta bu dag smras nas so so nas byams shing brtse ba'i sems bskyed de/_stag mo nyam chung ba de la mig mi g.yeng bar bltas nas ring 
[\[139b.5\]]zhig tu bskor te cig char spangs nas dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal bu sems can chen po 'di snyam du bdag gis lus dang srog btang ba'i dus ni deng yin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_bdag gis yun ring lus 'di rab bzung yang /_/mi gtsang mnam la rnag 'dzag yid mi 'ong /_/yo 
[\[139b.6\]]byad gos zas shing rta glang po rta/_/nor dang rin chen rim gro byas kyang ni/_/'gyur zhing 'jig chos ngo bo nyid mi rtag_/rtag tshol dgang dka' bsrung bar rab tu dka'/_/rtag tu mchod cing rim gro byas kyang ni/_/nams kyang bdag 'dor byas pa'i drin mi shes/_/
[\[139b.7\]]gzhan yang lus 'di ni mi brtan pas bdag la phan pa med pa/_'jigs su rung bas dgra dang 'dra ba/_mi gtsang bas lud dang mtshungs pa yin pas/_deng bdag gi lus 'dis yangs shing rgya che ba'i las mngon par bsgrubs nas skye shi'i rgya mtshor gru gzings chen 
[\[140a\]]
[\[140a.1\]]po byas te/_'khor ba yongs su spangs nas nges par 'byung ba thob par bya'o snyam mo/_/gzhan yang 'di snyam du gal te lus 'di spangs par gyur na 'di nyid 'bras dang /_nad ma rungs pa tshad med pa dang /_'jigs shing skrag pa brgya stong du ma spangs pa yin 
[\[140a.2\]]no/_/lus 'di ni bshang gci 'ba' zhig dang ldan pa/_chu bur lta bur mi brtan pa/_srin bu mang po 'dus pa/_rtsa rgyus dang rus pa phan tshun 'brel pa/_shin tu yongs su skyo bar bya ba/_nyes dmigs dang bcas pa yin pas de'i phyir deng bdag gis lus yongs su spangs nas 
[\[140a.3\]]bla na med pa mthar phyin pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa yongs su btsal te/_mya ngan gyi nyes pa dang /_mi rtag pa'i sdug bsngal dang /_'khrug pa gtan du spangs nas 'khor ba rgyun bcad de/_nyes pa rnams spangs nas ting nge 'dzin dang /_shes rab kyi stobs kyis phun sum tshogs 
[\[140a.4\]]par bsgoms nas bsod nams brgya stong mang pos brgyan pa/_thams cad mkhyen par gyur pa/_sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags pa'i chos kyi sku shin tu gya nom pa 'thob par bya'o/_/thob par gyur nas kyang sems can rnams la chos kyis sman tshad med pa gtang bar bya'o 
[\[140a.5\]]snyam mo/_/de'i tshe rgyal bu de shin tu brtul ba'i dpa' sran dang /_smon lam chen po btab nas snying rje chen po'i bsam pas sems rtas shing 'phel par gyur kyang phu bo gnyis skrag cing dngangs pas bar chad kyi bgegs byas nas smon pa mi 'grub par dogs pas/_phu bo 
[\[140a.6\]]gnyis la gcen gnyis slar gshegs shig_/bdag ni re zhig slar mchi'o zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal bu sems can chen po slar tshal gyi nang du zhugs nas stag mo'i drung du phyin te/_gos phud nas 'od ma'i steng du bzhag ste smon lam 'di skad du btab bo/_/bdag ni ches 
[\[140a.7\]]mkhas sems can kun gyi phyir/_/bla med byang chub gnas ni gnyer bas na/_/snying rje chen po'i sems bskyed g.yo ba med/_/skye bos phangs pa'i lus ni gtong bar byed/_/byang chub nad med gdung ba med pas na/_/blo dang ldan pa kun gyis rab tu mos/_/khams gsum 
[\[140b\]]
[\[140b.1\]]sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i sems can kun/_/deng bdag drangs nas bde la 'god par shog_/de nas rgyal bus tshig de skad smras nas stag mo ltogs pa'i mdun du lus bor te nyal ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' de'i byams pa dang snying rje'i gzi byin gyi mthus stag 
[\[140b.2\]]mos ci yang byed ma nus so/_/byang chub sems dpas de lta bu mthong ba dang ri mthon po'i steng du 'dzegs te lus bor nas yang 'di snyam du stag mo 'di ni nyam chung zhing dma' bas bdag la bza' bar mi nus so snyam du bsams nas langs te mtshon btsal na yang ma rnyed 
[\[140b.3\]]pas 'od ma skam po'i tshal bas lkog mar khrag phyung ste/_mthar gyis stag mo'i drung du nye bar bsnyen pa dang /_de'i tshe ji ltar rlung gis chu bo bskyod pa bzhin du sa chen po yang rnam pa drug tu rab tu g.yos par gyur/_nyi ma yang sgra gcan gyis bsgribs pa bzhin du 'od dang mi 
[\[140b.4\]]ldan pas phyogs bcu kun du mun nag tu gyur nas lha rnams kyis kyang me tog dam pa dang /_spos mchog dam pa'i phye ma'i char yang mngon par phab pas tshal gyi nang du kun du khyab cing gang bar gyur to/_/de'i tshe bar snang la gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs mang po rnams kyis dngos 
[\[140b.5\]]po de lta bu mthong ba dang /_rjes su yi rang ba'i sems bskyed nas sngon chad nam yang 'di lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod de thams cad kyis skyes bu chen po legs so legs so zhes bsngags pa brjod nas tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_skyes chen yongs skyob snying rje'i 
[\[140b.6\]]sems bskyed nas/_/bu gcig bzhin du sems can mnyam par lta/_/rab dpa' dga' chen sems la 'jungs med pas/_/lus spangs phongs skyob bsod nams dpag par dka'/_/nges par rtag bde gya nom gnas phyin nas/_/'khor ba'i 'ching ba mang po gtan du spong /_/
[\[140b.7\]]ring por mi thogs byang chub 'bras 'thob nas/_/nyer zhi bde ba skye med mngon rtogs 'gyur/_/de'i tshe stag mo ltogs pa des byang chub sems dpa'i lkog ma nas khrag zag pa mthong ba dang khrag bldags te sha ma lus par zos pas rus pa 'ba' zhig lus par byas so/_/
[\[141a\]]
[\[141a.1\]]de nas rgyal bu chen pos sa g.yos pa mthong ba dang nu bo la smras pa/_sa chen ri [{]klungs [,]klung [}]kun kyang rab tu g.yos/_/phyogs kun mun nag nyi ma'i 'od mi ldan/_/lha yi me tog lhung bas mkha' khyab pas/_/'di ni nu bos nges par lus spangs rtags/_/rgyal 
[\[141a.2\]]bu 'bring pos phu bos de skad smras pa thos pa dang tshigs su bcad de smras pa/_stag mo lus ltogs shin tu nyam chung ba/_bkres gzir bu phrug bza' dogs mthong nas ni/_/sems can chen po smre ba dag thos pas/_/nu bos lus btang deng bdag the tsom 'tshal/_/de 
[\[141a.3\]]nas rgyal bu gnyis mya ngan dang /_sdug bsngal chen po skyes pas smre sngags bton te ngus nas gnyis ka lhan cig tu slar stag mo'i drung du phyin te/_nu bo'i gos ni 'od ma'i yal ga la bkal/_rus pa dang /_skra ni kun du 'thor/_khrag babs pas ni rdzab tu gyur nas 
[\[141a.4\]]sa gzhi kun du khyab par gyur pa mthong ba dang brgyal nas rang gi lus kyang gzung ma nus pas rus pa'i drung du lus brdabs te/_ring zhig lon nas dran pa slar thob pa dang /_langs nas lag pa bteg ste rab tu ngus nas smre sngags bton pa/_bdag cag nu bo byad 
[\[141a.5\]]sdug mdzes/_/pha ma gnyi ga lhag par byams/_/ci phyir lhan cig phyir byung nas/_/lus spangs slar ni ma log gyur/_/gal te pha mas dris gyur na/_/bdag cag lan ni ji skad gdab/_/lhan cig srog ni btang sla na/_/rang gi lus ni ci phyir bzhag_/
[\[141a.6\]]de nas rgyal bu gnyis smre sngags bton te ngus nas yid la gcags bzhin du mthar gyis spangs te dong ngo /_/de'i tshe rgyal bu tha [{]chungs kyis [,]chung gis [}]khrid pa'i g.yog 'khor rnams phan tshun gcig la gcig 'di skad du rgyal bu gang na yod pa lhan cig btsal ba'i rigs so zhes 
[\[141a.7\]]smras par gyur to/_/de'i tshe rgyal po'i btsun mo dam pa yang thog mthon po'i steng du nyal ba'i rmi lam na ltas ngan gyi mtshan ma mthong ba 'di lta ste/_nu ma gnyis gzhan gyis bcad pa dang /_so lhung ba dang /_phug ron gyi phru gu gsum thob pa las gcig ni khras 
[\[141b\]]
[\[141b.1\]]khyer/_gnyis ni dngangs shing skrag par gyur pa dag mthong bar gyur to/_/sa g.yos pa'i tshe btsun mo sad de sems la mya ngan chen po skyes nas 'di skad du smras so/_/ci phyir deng ni sa chen rab tu g.yos/_/chu klung nags tshal ljon shing kun kyang 'gul/_/nyi 
[\[141b.2\]]ma'i 'od med g.yogs shing bsgribs pa 'dra/_/mig 'gul nu g.yo sngon chad yang mi 'dra/_/snying la mdas phog bzhin du sdug bsngal gzir/_/lus kun rab g.yo bde ba ci yang med/_/bdag gis rmi lam ltas ngan mthong bas na/_/nges par sngon 
[\[141b.3\]]med ltas ngan dngos po yod/_/btsun mo'i nu ma gnyis las zho zags pa dang 'di snyam du 'di ni gdon mi za bar ltas ngan kyi dngos po ston pa yin no snyam mo/_/de'i tshe nang 'khor ma zhig phyi rol gyi mi rnams rgyal bu btsal ba las da dung ma rnyed do zhes zer ba thos 
[\[141b.4\]]pa dang /_sems la shin tu skrag cing 'jigs pa skyes pas pho brang gi nang du song ste btsun mo la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha mo mkhyen lags sam slad rol gyi mi rnams las kun du so sor rgyal bu btsal ba las da dung ma rnyed ces mchi ba thos lags so/_/de nas 
[\[141b.5\]]btsun mo des tshig de skad smras pa thos pa dang /_mya ngan chen po skyes pas smre sngags bton te/_mig mchi mas gang bzhin du rgyal po'i drung du phyin nas rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha chen po bdag gis slad rol gyi mi rnams las 'di skad du bdag gi bu 
[\[141b.6\]]sdug tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]stor ces mchi ba thos lags so/_/rgyal pos tshig de thos pa dang shin tu skrag par gyur pas brnangs bzhin du smre tshig 'di skad du kyi hud sdug bsngal lo/_/deng nga'i bu yid du 'ong ba stor bar gyur to zhes smras nas mchi ma phyis te/_btsun mo 
[\[141b.7\]]la spro ba bskyed nas 'di skad du bzhin bzang ma khyod mya ngan ma byed cig_/ngas deng lhan cig phyir byung ste bu sdug btsal bar bya'o zhes smras nas/_rgyal po btsun mo dang /_skye bo'i tshogs mang po dang lhan cig tu grong khyer nas phyir byung ste/_so sor gyes te 
[\[142a\]]
[\[142a.1\]]phyogs kun du btsal ba las ring po ma lon par blon po chen po zhig nye bar mdun du 'ongs te rgyal po la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/lha rgyal bu mi bzhugs zhes thos pas thugs ngan mi mdzad du gsol/_rgyal bu tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]ni da dung mi gda' 
[\[142a.2\]]lags so/_/rgyal pos tshig de thos pa dang smre sngags bton nas 'di skad du kyi hud nga'i bu yid du 'ong ba stor bar gyur to zhes smras par gyur to/_/dang po bu yod tshe na dga' ba chung /_/phyis ni bu stor tshe na sdug bsngal che/_/gal te nga'i bu'i srog ni slar thob na/_/
[\[142a.3\]]nga'i lus shi yang sdug bsngal ci yang med/_/btsun mos de skad thos pa dang /_/dper na mdas phog pa bzhin du mya ngan gyis kun du dkris par gyur pas smre tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/bdag gi bu gsum 'khor dang bcas par ni/_/nags tshal dong ste lhan cig rtse 
[\[142a.4\]]ba las/_/bu sdug tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]gcig pu ma 'ongs pas/_/nges par 'bral ba'i ltas ngan dngos yod 'gyur/_/de'i 'og tu yang blon po 'bring po rgyal po'i drung du nye bar 'ongs pa la rgyal pos blon po de la bu sdug gang na 'dug ces smras pa las/_blon po 'bring pos de yid la 
[\[142a.5\]]gcags te ngus pas lkog ma dang lce yang skams nas tshig 'byin cing lan 'debs kyang ma nus pa dang btsun mos 'di skad ces dris so/_/bu chung da ltar gang na myur du smros/_/bdag gi lus kun rab tu bsregs par gyur/_/myos 'khrugs rmongs pas nang gi sems nyid stor/_/
[\[142a.6\]]bdag gi brang ni de ring gas snyam byed/_/de nas blon po 'bring pos rgyal bus lus yongs su btang ba'i dngos po de dag zhib tu rgyal po la gsol te shes par byas pa dang /_rgyal po dang /_btsun mos gtam de thos nas smre zhing mchi mas brnangs bzhin du lus yongs su btang ba'i 
[\[142a.7\]]sa phyogs su myur zhing rings par dong ste/_'od ma'i tshal byang chub sems dpas lus btang ba'i gnas su phyin nas rus pa rnams kun du 'thor ba mthong ba dang cig car sa la 'gyel te/_shi ba dang 'dra bar brgyal bar gyur pas dper na rlung drag pos ljon shing chen po bsgyel bzhin 
[\[142b\]]
[\[142b.1\]]du sems rmongs shing dran pa stor bas shes pa ci yang med par gyur to/_/de nas blon po chen po la sogs pas chus kun du gtor ba dang /_rgyal po dang btsun mo ring zhig lon nas gdod dran pa thob par gyur to/_/de nas lag pa bteg ste 'dug nas smre tshig smras pa/_kyi hud bu 
[\[142b.2\]]sdug mdzes pa'i mtshan dang ldan/_ci'i phyir 'chi ba'i sdug bsngal sngar 'ongs gtses/_gal te khyod kyi mdun du bdag shi na/_/'di 'dra'i sdug bsngal mthong bar ga la 'gyur/_/de nas btsun mo myos shing brgyal ba khad kyis zhi bar gyur nas kyang skra long long por 
[\[142b.3\]]gyur te lag pa gnyis kyis brang brdungs nas nya skams la 'gre ba bzhin du sa la 'gres te/_ba bu stor ba bzhin du ngus nas smre tshig smras pa/_bdag gi bu ni sus gtubs na/_/rus pa lhag ma sa la gtor/_/bdag gi bu sdug stor bas na/_/mya ngan smre ba rang mi theg_/
[\[142b.4\]]kyi hud bu ni sus bsad na/_mya ngan dngos po 'di 'dra myong /_/bdag snying rdo ni ma yin na/_/ci yi phyir na gas ma gyur/_/bdag gi rmi lam nu ma gnyis/_/gzhan dag gis ni bcad pa dang /_/so rnams lhung bar mthong bas na/_/deng ni sdug bsngal chen po myong /_/phug 
[\[142b.5\]]ron phru gu gsum las ni/_/gcig ni khras khyer mthong bas na/_/deng ni bu sdug stor gyur pas/_/ltas ngan ston la mi bden med/_/de nas rgyal bu chen po de btsun mo dang /_bu gnyis dang bcas par brtse bas gtugs te ngus nas rgyan thams cad bkrol te skye bo'i 
[\[142b.6\]]tshogs mang po dang lhan cig tu byang chub sems dpa' bzhag pa'i lus kyis ring bsrel bsdus te mchod pa bya ba'i phyir mchod rten gyi nang du bzhag go/_/kun dga' bo khyod kyis 'di nyid ni byang chub sems dpa' de'i ring bsrel yin par rig par bya'o/_/yang tshe dang ldan pa 
[\[142b.7\]]kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_nga sngon 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa dang ldan pa'i tshe na yang sems can dmyal ba dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas la sogs pa'i 'gro ba lnga po dag tu yang rkyen ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su 
[\[143a\]]
[\[143a.1\]]bskyabs nas phan btags te nges par 'byung ba thob par byas na/_/da ltar nyon mongs pa thams cad zad nas bag chags kyi lhag ma med de/_lha dang mi'i ston par gyur nas thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pas sems can re re'i phyir yang bskal pa mang po'i bar du sems can 
[\[143a.2\]]dmyal ba dang /_gnas gzhan dag tu gnas te/_sdug bsngal sna tshogs dang du blangs nas skye shi dang nyon mongs pa'i 'khor ba las nges par 'byung ba 'thob par byed pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don de nyid yang bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad de 
[\[143a.3\]]bka' stsal pa/_nga sngon 'das pa'i dus kyi tshe/_/bskal pa grangs med tshad med snyed/_/res 'ga' yul gyi rgyal po byas/_/res 'ga' rgyal bu byas pa na/_/rtag par sbyin pa cher btang bas/_/shin tu phangs pa'i lus btang nas/_/'khor ba las ni nges byung ste/_/byang chub 
[\[143a.4\]]dam par phyin par smon/_/sngon byung yul chen zhig tu ni/_/yul bdag shing rta che zhes bya/_/rgyal bu dpa' bo zhes bya ba/_/rtag par sbyin gtong ser sna med/_/de la phu bo gnyis yod de/_/sgra chen lha chen po zhes bya/_/gsum po lhan cig phyir byung ste/_/mthar gyis ri dang nags tshal 
[\[143a.5\]]phyin/_/stag mo bkres pas nyen mthong nas/_/'di 'dra'i sems ni skyes par gyur/_/stag mo bkres mes rab bsregs kyang /_/gzhan bzar rung ba ci yang med/_/skyes chen de 'dra mthong nas ni/_/de yis bu ni zos dogs phyir/_/chags med lus ni rab btang nas/_/bu skyabs smas 
[\[143a.6\]]pa med par byas/_/sa chen dang ni ri rnams kyang /_/dus gcig thams cad rab tu g.yos/_/chu klung rgya mtsho shin tu 'khrugs/_/rlabs drag chu ni gyen du 'bab/_/gnam sa 'od ni stor bas na/_/mun nag ci yang mthong ba med/_/nags tshal dgon pa'i gcan gzan rnams/_/
[\[143a.7\]]'phur rgyug gnas ni yongs su spangs/_/phu gnyis ci phyir ma log ces/_/mya ngan brtse ba'i sdug bsngal skyes/_/g.yog 'khor mang po rnams dang ni/_/nags tshal kun du yongs su btsal/_/spun gnyis lhan cig rab 'grogs te/_/ri gzar nags su phyin nas ni/_/phyogs bzhir 
[\[143b\]]
[\[143b.1\]]bltas kyang ci ma mthong /_/stag mo mthong ba'i nags stong du/_/ma dang bu bdun bcas par ni/_/thams cad khrag gis kha bskus dang /_/rus pa lhag ma skra rnams ni/_/sa la kun du 'thor ba mthong /_/gzhan yang khrag ni zags pa rnams/_/'od ma'i tshal kun sbags pa 
[\[143b.2\]]dag_/phu bo gnyis kyis mthong nas ni/_/sems la 'jigs skrag chen po skyes/_/gnyi ga brgyal nas sa la 'gyel/_/'khrugs myos ci yang mi dran pas/_/sa rdul dag gis lus kun gos/_/rnam shes drug ni dran pa nyams/_/rgyal bu g.yog ni mang po rnams/_/cho nge sems 
[\[143b.3\]]la mya ngan skyes/_/chus gtor dran pa thob nas kyang /_/lag bteg skad cher phyung ste ngus/_/byang chub sems dpas lus btang tshe/_/byams pa'i ma ni pho brang na/_/bud med lnga brgya rnams dang ni/_/lhan cig longs spyod myong ba las/_/btsun mo dam pa'i nu ma gnyis/_/rang gi nu zho 
[\[143b.4\]]zags gyur pas/_/lus kun khab kyis phug pa bzhin/_/shin tu sdug bsngal rab mi bde/_/bu stor 'du shes skyes pas na/_/mya ngan zug rngu sems la zug_/rgyal po chen po shes byas nas/_/sdug bsngal dngos po de dag bshad/_/cho nges sme ba mi bzod pas/_/brtse ba'i skad 
[\[143b.5\]]kyis rgyal po la/_/rgyal po chen po mkhyen par mdzod/_/deng bdag sdug bsngal chen po skyes/_/nu zho gnyis ni rang byung pas/_/bkag kyang bsam pa bzhin ma grub/_/khab kyis lus kun phug pa bzhin/_/mya ngan brang ni gas la thug/_/bdag gi g.yar lam snga ltas ngan/_/nges 
[\[143b.6\]]par bu sdug stor bar gyur/_/lhas ni bdag gi srog skyobs la/_/bu ni gum gson mkhyen par mdzod/_/g.yar lam phug ron gsum mthong ba/_/chung ngu de ni bu sdug lags/_/khras ni phrogs te 'tshal bas ni/_/mya ngan rdzogs par gsol bar dka'/_/deng bdag mya ngan mtshor 
[\[143b.7\]]bying bas/_/'chi bar 'gyur ba ring mi thogs/_/bu srog mi gson blo ba chung /_/myur ba nyid du btsal bar gsol/_/gzhan yang slad rol mi rnams las/_/bu chung ma rnyed thos pas na/_/deng bdag sems ni rab mi bde/_/lhas ni bdag la brtse bar mdzod/_/btsun mos de skad smras 
[\[144a\]]
[\[144a.1\]]nas ni/_/lus bteg sa la rab tu brdabs/_/rab brtse na bas sems brgyal myos/_/rab rmongs shes pa ci yang med/_/nang 'khor bud med btsun mo de/_/brgyal te sa la 'gyel mthong ste/_/skad chen phyung ste rab tu ngus/_/mya ngan dngangs skrag gnas kyang 
[\[144a.2\]]stor/_/rgyal pos tshig de thos pas na/_/mya ngan rang nyid gzung ma nus/_/blon po thams cad bkug nas ni/_/bu sdug tshol ba yongs su bkye/_/thams cad grong khyer phyir byung ste/_/de dang de dag kun du btsal/_/ngus nas mi ni mang po la/_/rgyal bu gang na yod ces smras/_/da ltar 
[\[144a.3\]]gson nam 'on te shi/_/gang du song ba su yis shes/_/ji ltar byas na mthong gyur nas/_/bdag cag mya ngan bsal bar 'gyur/_/skye bo mang po thams cad kun/_/rgyal bu de ni shi zer bas/_/thos pa thams cad rab tu gdung /_/smre sngags sdug bsngal brjod par dka'/_/
[\[144a.4\]]de tshe rgyal po shing rta che/_/cho nges smras nas stan las langs/_/btsun mo'i drung du nyer song ste/_/de yi lus la chus kyang gtor/_/btsun mo chus ni gtor bas na/_/ring zhig lon nas dran pa thob/_/rab smres rgyal po la zhus pa/_/bdag bu da lta gang na mchis/_/rgyal pos 
[\[144a.5\]]btsun mo la bsgo ba/_/ngas ni pho nya mang bkye ste/_/phyogs bzhir rgyal bu tshol bcug na/_/da dung gtam skyes yong ma 'ongs/_/rgyal pos btsun mo yang bsgo ba/_/khyod ni mya ngan ma byed par/_/re zhig rang nyid bde bar byos/_/lhan cig phyir byung btsal bar bya/_/de nas rgyal po 
[\[144a.6\]]btsun mor bcas/_/bzhon pa zhon nas mdun du chas/_/smre ba'i skad kyis cho nges btab/_/gdung sems me ni 'bar ba 'dra/_/ya rabs ma rabs brgya stong rnams/_/rgyal po'i rjes su grong khyer byung /_/brtse ba'i ngu sgra mi 'chad par/_/so sor rgyal bu yongs su btsal/_/
[\[144a.7\]]rgyal pos bu sdug btsal ba'i phyir/_/mig gis phyogs bzhir bltas pa las/_/skra bshig khrag gis lus bskus te/_/lus kun rdul gyis gos pa dang /_/ngus nas mdun bcad 'ong ba yi/_/mi zhig kyang ni mthong bar gyur/_/rgyal pos ltas ngan de mthong nas/_/lhag par 
[\[144b\]]
[\[144b.1\]]mya ngan skyes par 'gyur/_/rgyal pos lag pa gnyis bteg nas/_/brtse bas ngus te bkug ma nus/_/thog mar blon po chen po zhig_/[{]rings [,]ring [}]brtabs rgyal po'i drung 'ongs nas/_/rgyal po de la 'di skad smras/_/lha ni thugs ngan mi mdzad gsol/_/lha yi thugs brtse 
[\[144b.2\]]sras bu de/_/da dung rnyed par ma gyur kyang /_/ring por mi thogs phyin par mchi/_/lha ni thugs ngan mi mdzad gsol/_/rgyal po yang ni song ba las/_/blon po 'bring po 'ongs pa mthong /_/blon po rgyal po'i drung 'ongs nas/_/ngus te rgyal la 'di skad smras/_/rgyal bu gnyis ni 
[\[144b.3\]]bzhugs pa yang /_/mya ngan zhugs kyis yongs su gdungs/_/rgyal bu tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]gang lags pa/_/de ni mi rtag pa yis zin/_/bu btsas stag mo ltogs pa zhig_/bu 'tshal snyam pa gzigs nas ni/_/rgyal bu sems can chen po yis/_/thugs rje chen po'i sems 
[\[144b.4\]]bskyed de/_/bla med lam ni gnyer ba dang /_/mang po thams cad bzla ba'i slad/_/byang chub mchog la 'du shes bcings/_/shin tu zab yangs rgya mtsho bzhin/_/ri mtho rtse la 'dzegs nas ni/_/stag mo ltogs mdun sku yang bor/_/nyam chung 'tshal rngo ma thogs nas/_/
[\[144b.5\]]'od mas mgul du khrag phyung bas/_/rgyal bu'i sku ni 'tshal bas na/_/sku gdung lhag ma tsam zhig lus/_/de tshe rgyal po btsun mor bcas/_/de skad thos nas brgyal bar gyur/_/sems ni mya ngan mtshor bying ste/_/nyon mongs me yis rab tu bsregs/_/blon pos tsan+dan 
[\[144b.6\]]chu dag gis/_/rgyal po btsun mo gtor bas na/_/cig char langs nas rab tu ngus/_/lag btegs brang dag la yang brdungs/_/blon po chung ngu 'ongs nas ni/_/rgyal po de la 'di skad smras/_/bdag gis rgyal bu gnyis po ni/_/tshal na brgyal bar gyur pa mthong /_/
[\[144b.7\]]bdag gis chab grang gtor bas na/_/dran pa cung zad thob par gyur/_/phyogs bzhi dag tu gzigs pa ni/_/rab tu 'bar me kun khyab 'dra/_/skad cig bzhengs kyang slar yang 'gyel/_/cho nges bdag nyid 'dzin mi spyod/_/phyag bteg brtse ba'i tshig dag gis/_/gcung gi ya 
[\[145a\]]
[\[145a.1\]]mtshan bsngags par mdzad/_/rgyal pos de skad thos nas kyang /_/mya ngan me yis lhag par btsos/_/btsun mos rab tu ngus nas ni/_/skad cher phyung ste 'di skad smras/_/bdag gi bu sdug lhag par byams pa de/_/mi rtag srin po dag gis mid par gyur/_/da ltar bu gnyis 
[\[145a.2\]]lus par gyur pa yang /_/mya ngan me yis rab bsregs nyon yang mongs/_/bdag deng ri drung dag tu myur song la/_/spro bskyed srog gi lhag ma bsrung bar bya/_/de nas bzhon zhon lam du myur zhugs nas/_/rtse gcig sems kyis lus spangs brag drung song /_/bu gnyis yid gcags 
[\[145a.3\]]brang brdungs spyod tshul nyams/_/'gro bzhin ngu ba dag dang lam du phrad/_/pha mas pang blangs mya ngan smre sngags bton/_/cig car lus btang ri dang nags su dong /_/byang chub sems dpas lus spangs nags phyin nas/_/lhan cig 'dus nas rab ngus sdug bsngal che/_/rgyan phreng 
[\[145a.4\]]bkrol te snying tshim ngus nas ni/_/byang chub sems dpa'i rus bu lhag ma bsdus/_/skye bo mang pos lhan cig mchod pa byas/_/rin chen sna bdun mchod rten brtsigs nas ni/_/ring bsrel de ni sgrom gyi nang du bzhag_/mya ngan bcas bzhin slar ni grong khyer dong /_/kun dga' la ni 
[\[145a.5\]]bka' stsal pa/_/sngon byung sems can chen po ni/_/shAkya thub pa nga yin pas/_/gzhan yin snyam du bsam mi bya/_/rgyal po zas gtsang yab yin te/_/btsun mo nga yum sgyu 'phrul yin/_/rgyal bu chen po byams pa yin/_/rgyal bu 'bring po 'jam dpal yin/_/stag mo skye dgu'i bdag 
[\[145a.6\]]mo yin/_/bu lnga dge slong lnga po yin/_/gcig ni maud gal chen po'i bu/_/gcig ni shA ri'i bu yin no/_/ngas ni khyed cag thams cad la/_/sngon gzhan phan btags pa yi gtam/_/byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bshad/_/sangs rgyas 'grub rgyu 'di slob byos/_/byang chub sems dpas lus 
[\[145a.7\]]btang tshe/_/smon lam rgya chen 'di skad btab/_/bdag lus rus pa lhag ma yis/_/ma 'ongs sems can phan 'dogs shog_/'di ni lus btang gnas yin te/_/rin chen sna bdun mchod rten de/_/lo ni tshad med bar du gnas/_/de nas sa 'og bying bar gyur/_/sngon gyi smon lam mthu stobs kyis/_/
[\[145b\]]
[\[145b.1\]]rkyen ni ji bzhin sems can zlos/_/lha mi kun la phan gdags phyir/_/sa las 'phags te byung ba yin/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis sngon gyi rgyud 'di bstan pa na lha dang mi'i skye bo'i tshogs tshad med grangs med pa snyed yongs su gdung ba dang dga' ba chen po skyes te/_sngon chad nam yang 
[\[145b.2\]]'di lta bu ma byung ngo zhes bsngags pa brjod nas thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur to/_/byang chub kyi shing gi lha mo la yang bka' stsal pa/_ngas ni drin la lan glan pa'i phyir gus pas phyag byas pa yin no/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis rdzu 'phrul gyi 
[\[145b.3\]]mthu mngon par bsdus pa dang /_mchod rten de yang slar sa'i 'og tu bying bar gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las lus yongs su btang ba'i le'u ste nyi shu drug pa'o//_//de'i tshe de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bka' 
[\[145b.4\]]stsal ba na/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshad med pa snyed so so nas rang rang gi zhing khams nas bya rgod phung po'i rir phyin te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar lhags nas yan lag lnga sa la gtugs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[145b.5\]]la phyag byas nas sems rtse gcig tu thal mo sbyar te mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_/bcom ldan sku mchog gser gyi kha dog ldan/_/'od zer kun gsal gser gyi ri bo 'dra/_/rnam dag rab mnyam pad+ma dag dang mtshungs/_/mtshan mchog dam pa 
[\[145b.6\]]tshad med kun du bkod/_/mtshan ni sum cu rtsa gnyis rab brgyan te/_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cu yongs su rdzogs/_/'od zer rab gsal dpe zla yong ma mchis/_/dri bral dper na rnam dag zla nya 'dra/_/gsung dbyangs rab dang shin tu gya nom pas/_/seng ge bzhin du 'brug sgra sgrogs par mdzad/_/
[\[145b.7\]]dam pa rnam brgyad dbang po mthun mdzad pas/_/ka la ping ka'i sgra sgrogs kun las 'phags/_/bsod nams brgya yi mtshan mchog sku brgyan pas/_/'od zer phun tshogs dri ma yongs mi mnga'/_/mkhyen blo rab gsal dper na rgya mtsho 'dra/_/yon tan rgya chen nam mkha' dag dang mtshungs/_/yongs rdzogs 
[\[146a\]]
[\[146a.1\]]'od zer phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten bkang /_/rkyen ni ji bzhin sems can sgrol bar mdzad/_/nyon mongs sred pa'i bag chags kun bsal bas/_/chos kyi sgron ma rtag par rgyun mi 'chad/_/thugs brtses sems can dag la phan 'dogs pas/_/da ltar slad 
[\[146a.2\]]ma'i dus tshe bde ba stsol/_/rtag par don mchog dam pa rab bshad nas/_/yang dag rab dben mya ngan 'das la 'god/_/bcom ldan bdud rtsi'i chos mchog rab bstan nas/_/bdud rtsi'i gya nom don ni stsol mdzad pas/_/bdud rtsi'i grong khyer dag tu rab drangs nas/_/bdud rtsi 'dus 
[\[146a.3\]]ma bgyis kyi bde la 'god/_/rtag par 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho chen po nas/_/sdug bsngal sems can thams cad thar bar mdzad/_/de dag bde ba'i shul du rab btsud de/_/yid bzhin bde ba bsam mi khyab pa stsol/_/bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho zab la yangs/_/dpe ni mang po dag 
[\[146a.4\]]gis rig mi 'gyur/_/rtag par kun la thugs rje cher gzigs pas/_/thabs mkhyen brtson 'grus dag ni rgyun mi 'chad/_/bcom ldan yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' ma mchis/_/bskal pa bye ba brgya stong bar du ni/_/lha mi thams cad lhan cig dpag bsams kyang /_/cha shas tsam yang rig 
[\[146a.5\]]par yong mi 'gyur/_/bdag cag sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho las/_/thigs pa 'ga' zhig bsngags pa brjod pa yi/_/bsod nams de dag skye dgu yongs bsngos nas/_/thams cad byang chub 'bras bu myur thob smon/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems 
[\[146a.6\]]dpa' mang po de dag la bka' stsal pa/_legs so legs so/_/khyed kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa nyid kyis sems can la phan 'dogs shing sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa rgya cher byed par 'gyur bas sdig pa rnams yongs su byang nas 
[\[146a.7\]]bsod nams tshad med pa snyed skye bar 'gyur ro/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las phyogs bcu'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu bdun pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes 
[\[146b\]]
[\[146b.1\]]pa'i tog stan las langs te bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod pa/_thub pa bsod nams brgya yi mtshan rdzogs 
[\[146b.2\]]shing /_/yon tan tshad ma mchis pas sku rab brgyan/_/rnam dag rgya chen sems can lta mos pas/_/nyi ma stong bzhin 'od kyis snang bar mdzad/_/kha dog mtha' yas 'od ni rab tu rgyas/_/rin chen pad+ma'i phung bzhin mtshan rnams mdzes/_/dper na gdugs
