[\[146b.3\]]shar nam mkha' snang bgyid bzhin/_/kha dog dkar gsal gser gyi mdog kyang gnon/_/gser gyi ri bzhin 'od kyis gsal mdzad pas/_/zhing ni brgya stong mang po kun du khyab/_/sems can sdug bsngal tshad med zhi mdzad nas/_/bde ba dam pa mtha' yas 
[\[146b.4\]]stsal bar mdzad/_/mtshan rnams phun tshogs rnam dag rab mdzes pas/_/sems can lta mos skyo ba yong ma mchis/_/dbu skra rab mnyen kha dog mthon mthing gnas/_/bung ba nag po me tog bsdus pa 'dra/_/dgyes dang btang snyoms chen po dag pas brgyan/_/
[\[146b.5\]]byams dang thugs rje chen po phun sum tshogs/_/mtshan dang dpe byad dam pa rab mdzes pa/_/byang chub yan lag chos las grub pa lags/_/bcom ldan bsod nams phan pa mang btang bas/_/de dag rtag tu bde ba chen po 'thob/_/yon tan rnam pa sna 
[\[146b.6\]]tshogs rab brgyan pas/_/'od kyi zhing ni brgya stong snang bar mdzad/_/bcom ldan 'od zer shin tu rdzogs pas na/_/dper na gdugs kyis nam mkha' kun khyab 'dra/_/bcom ldan ri rab bzhin du yon tan ldan/_/phyogs bcu kun du khyab par ston pa mdzad/_/
[\[146b.7\]]bcom ldan gser zhal dam pa rab tu mdzes/_/tshems dkar gtams pa dung gi kha dog 'dra/_/bcom ldan zhal mdzes dpe zla yong ma mchis/_/smin mtshams ba spu rtag par g.yas su 'khyil/_/'od mnyen dkar gsal chu shel dag dang mtshungs/_/
[\[147a\]]
[\[147a.1\]]dper na zla nya nam mkha'i khams gnas 'dra/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la bka' stsal pa/_/khyod kyis 'di ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan gyi bsngags pa brjod pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa yin 
[\[147a.2\]]pas thams cad la phan 'dogs par 'gyur zhing /_gang dag khong du ma chud pa de dag kyang rjes su mthun par rnal 'byor sgom pa la slob par 'gyur ro/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog 
[\[147a.3\]]gis bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu brgyad pa'o//_//de nas byang chub kyi shing gi lha mos kyang tshigs su bcad pa dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/_/bcom ldan rnam dag blo la gus phyag 'tshal/_/rnam dag chos gnyer 
[\[147a.4\]]blo la gus phyag 'tshal/_/yang dag chos gnyer blo la gus phyag 'tshal/_/chos min spong ba'i blo la gus phyag 'tshal/_/rnam rtog mi mnga' blo la gus phyag 'tshal/_/kye ma ngo mtshar bcom ldan mtha' yas spyod/_/kye ma mthong dka' u dum bA ra 
[\[147a.5\]]'dra/_/kye ma ngo mtshar rgya mtsho'i ri rgyal 'dra/_/kye ma ngo mtshar bde gshegs 'od tshad med/_/kye ma ngo mtshar kha bsgyur smon lam che/_/kye ma ngo mtshar shAka rigs nyi ma 'dis/_/'di 'dra'i mdo sde dkon mchog bkas bshad nas/_/brtse bas skye dgu 
[\[147a.6\]]rnams la phan 'dogs mdzad/_/thub pa rab dben dbang po mnyam 'jog pas/_/rab zhi mya ngan 'das pa'i grong khyer gshegs/_/rab dben gzungs kyi sgo la bzhugs pas na/_/rab dben spyod yul zab mo dag kyang mkhyen/_/rkang gnyis gtso bo rab 
[\[147a.7\]]dben bzhugs pas na/_/nyan thos slob ma lus kyang de bzhin stong /_/chos rnams thams cad ngo bo ma mchis pas/_/sems can thams cad kyang ni stong zhing dben/_/bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan dran par bgyid/_/bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan 
[\[147b\]]
[\[147b.1\]]mthong bar mos/_/bdag ni rtag tu gus sems bskyed pas na/_/rtag par de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdugs dang mjal/_/bdag ni rtag tu bcom ldan phyag bgyis nas/_/rtag par zhal lta sems kyis mi spong smon/_/rab tu gdung sems bar chad 
[\[147b.2\]]ma mchis par/_/rtag par rim gro bgyis kyang skyo mi bgyid/_/bcom ldan thugs rje'i thugs ni rab bskyed nas/_/mdangs ldan zhal ni bdag gis rtag mthong mdzod/_/bcom ldan nyan thos dge 'dun rnam dag pas/_/rtag par lha mi dag ni bsgral 
[\[147b.3\]]bar smon/_/sku ni rang bzhin rnam dag nam mkha' 'dra/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu chab kyi zla ba mtshungs/_/bdud rtsi mya ngan 'das pa'i chos bshad nas/_/yon tan phung po thams cad skyed par smon/_/bcom ldan rnam dag spyod yul byams pa dang /_/thugs 
[\[147b.4\]]rje yang dag spyod yul bsam mi khyab/_/nyan thos rang rgyal gzhal bar mi 'gyur zhing /_/drang srong byang chub sems dpas dpog mi 'gyur/_/de bzhin gshegs pas bdag la thugs brtse nas/_/thugs rje chen po'i sku ni rtag mthong smon/_/
[\[147b.5\]]las gsum ngal med byams gtso mchod nas ni/_/myur du nges 'byung yang dag mtha' phyogs smon/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bsngags pa brjod pa gsan pa dang /_/tshangs pa'i dbyangs kyis shing gi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/_/rigs 
[\[147b.6\]]kyi lha mo khyod kyis nga'i yang dag pa'i mi [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'i chos kyi sku rnam par dag pa'i bsngags pa brjod nas bdag dang gzhan la phan gdag pa'i phyir mtshan mchog gya nom pa yang dag par bsgrags pa legs so legs so/_/bsod nams 'dis khyod myur du bla na med 
[\[147b.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing sems can thams cad mtshungs par rnal 'byor bsgom par 'gyur la/_gang gis thos pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa'i bdud rtsi'i chos kyi sgor 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[148a\]]
[\[148a.1\]]gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las byang chub kyi shing gi lha mos bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste nyi shu dgu pa'o//_//de nas lha mo spobs pa chen mo stan las langs te gus pas thal mo sbyar nas 
[\[148a.2\]]yang dag pa'i tshig gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa sku yang dag par gser gyi kha dog dang ldan pa/_mgur dung gi dbyibs dang 'dra ba/_zhal zla ba nya 
[\[148a.3\]]ba lta bu spyan pad+ma sngon po dang mtshungs pa/_sgros dmar zhing bzang ba/_chu shel gyi kha dog dang 'dra ba/_shangs kyi dbyibs mtho zhing drang bas gser gyi gar bu bcad pa lta bur gyur pa/_tshems dkar zhing thags bzang ba me tog ku mu da dang mtshungs pa/_'od 
[\[148a.4\]]kyis kun du snang bar mdzad pas nyi ma brgya stong lta bur gyur pa/_'od kyi kha dog kun du khyab pas 'dzam bu'i gser dang 'dra ba/_tshig gsung ba la nor zhing 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba/_rnam par thar pa'i sgo gsum yang dag par bstan nas/_byang chub 
[\[148a.5\]]rnam pa gsum gyi lam yang dag par 'byed pa/_thugs rtag tu rnam par dag cing thugs kyi mos pa yang de bzhin du gyur pa/_bcom ldan 'das bzhugs pa'i gnas dang spyod yul rnams rtag par rnam par dag par gyur pa/_spyod lam ma lags pa spangs 
[\[148a.6\]]pas gshegs shing bzhugs pa dag la 'khrul pa mi mnga' ba/_lo drug dka' ba mdzad nas chos kyi 'khor lo lan gsum du bskor ba/_sdug bsngal ba'i sems can yongs su bzlas nas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin par mdzad pa/_sku'i mtshan yongs 
[\[148a.7\]]su rdzogs pa n+ya gro d+ha'i ljon shing lta bur gyur pa/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug yongs su bsgoms pas phrin las rnam pa gsum la skyon mi mnga' ba/_thams cad mkhyen pa dang ldan pas bdag dang gzhan gyi don phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa/_gang 
[\[148b\]]
[\[148b.1\]]ci gsung yang rung ste/_rtag par sems can gyi don du 'gyur bar mdzad pas don ma mchis par mi gsung ba/_shAkya'i rigs kyi nang nas seng ge chen por gyur pas rab tu brtan zhing dpa' ba/_rnam par thar pa brgyad phun sum tshogs par gyur 
[\[148b.2\]]pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/deng bdag gi nyams kyis ji tsam lcogs pa'i rjes su de bzhin shegs pa'i yon tan gyi phyogs las cung zad tsam zhig bsngags pa brjod pa ni 'di lta ste/_dper na sbrang bus rgya mtsho chen po'i chab 'tshal ba dang 'dra yang bsod nams de'i 
[\[148b.3\]]dbang gis sems can thams cad 'khor ba gtan du spangs nas bla na ma mchis pa'i lam mngon par grub par smon to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo spobs pa chen mo la bka' stsal pa/_khyod kyis yun ring po nas bsgoms pas spobs pa chen po dang ldan 
[\[148b.4\]]par gyur nas/_deng nga'i yon tan rgya cher bsngags pa brjod pa legs so legs so/_/'di'i dbang gis khyod myur du bla na med pa'i chos kyi sgo mo mngon par rtogs nas mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po phun sum tshogs par gyur te/_thams cad la rgya cher 
[\[148b.5\]]phan 'dogs par 'gyur ro/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po las lha mo spobs pa chen mos bsngags pa brjod pa'i le'u ste sum cu pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa 
[\[148b.6\]]snyed rnams dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams dang /_'khor mang po thams cad la bka' stsal pa/_khyed kyis 'di ltar rig par bya ste/_ngas bskal pa chen po tshad med grangs med pa nas nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba spyad de thob pa'i chos shin 
[\[148b.7\]]tu zab pa byang chub kyi rgyu yang dag pa gang yin pa de ni khyed la yang dag par bstan zin na/_khyed cag las su zhig rab tu brtul ba'i sems bskyed nas nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di gus pas yongs su bsrungs nas 
[\[149a\]]
[\[149a.1\]]rgya cher yang dag par spel te/_yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas par byed/_de nas 'khor mang po'i nang nas byang chub sems dpa' chen po bye ba phrag drug cu dang /_lha'i 'khor phal mang po bye ba phrag drug cus mgrin 
[\[149a.2\]]gcig tu 'di skad ces/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag thams cad la yang mos pa'i sems mchis pas bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa chen po tshad ma mchis pa nas nan tan brtson 'grus kyis dka' ba mdzad de/_brnyes pa'i chos shin tu zab pa byang chub kyi 
[\[149a.3\]]rgyu yang dag pa gang lags pa de la gus pas yongs su bsrungs nas/_bcom ldan 'das yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i slad na yang lus dang srog la phangs pa ma mchis par chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rgya cher spel te/_yang dag pa'i chos 'jig rten 
[\[149a.4\]]na yun ring du gnas par bgyid do zhes gsol to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_bcom ldan yang dag bden tshig gsung /_/yang dag chos la 
[\[149a.5\]]rab tu bzhugs/_/yang dag bden pa de dbang gis/_/mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid/_/thugs rje chen po'i go mnabs nas/_/thugs rje che la rab tu bzhugs/_/byams dang thugs rje de stobs kyis/_/mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid/_/
[\[149a.6\]]bsod nams tshogs ni yongs rdzogs nas/_/ye shes tshogs ni rab tu bskyed/_/tshogs rnams yongs su rdzogs pa'i slad/_/mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid/_/bdud rnams thams cad rab brtul te/_/log smra thams cad rnam par bshig_/
[\[149a.7\]]ngan lta thams cad bsal ba'i slad/_/mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid/_/'jig rten skyong dang brgya byin dang /_/tshangs pa dang ni lha ma yin/_/klu dang gnod sbyin la sogs pas/_/mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid/_/sa yi steng 
[\[149b\]]
[\[149b.1\]]dang mkha' gnas pa/_/yun ring 'dir ni gnas pa rnams/_/bcom ldan bstan pa 'dzin bgyid pa/_/mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid/_/tshangs pa'i bzhugs bzhi mtshungs ldan zhing /_/'phags bden bzhi yis rab 
[\[149b.2\]]brgyan nas/_/bdud bzhi dag ni pham mdzad slad/_/mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid/_/nam mkha' thogs bcas 'gyur yang srid/_/thogs bcas nam mkhar 'gyur srid kyi/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bsrungs bzung ba/_/
[\[149b.3\]]sus kyang bsgul zhing bskyod mi 'gyur/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa'i chos 'di bsrung ba bkas bshad pa thos pa dang /_so so nas rjes su yi rang ba'i sems bskyed nas yang dag pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba'i sems 
[\[149b.4\]]kyis cig car mgrin gcig tu tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_bdag cag mdo sde 'di la ni/_/bu dang bu mo 'khor dang bcas/_/thams cad rtse gcig rab bsrungs nas/_/rgya cher yang dag spel bar bgyid/_/gang zhig mdo 'di rab bzung 
[\[149b.5\]]nas/_/byang chub rgyu ni sgrub bgyid na/_/bdag cag rtag par phyogs bzhi nas/_/srung skyob rim gro dag kyang bgyid/_/de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang pos gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad pa gsol pa/_sangs rgyas chos ni thugs chud nas/_/
[\[149b.6\]]drin ni bsab par bzhed pa dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' phan gdags slad/_/'jig rten 'das kyang mdo sde gsungs/_/bdag kyang sangs rgyas de dag la/_/drin bsab slad du rtag mchod nas/_/'di 'dra'i mdo sde 'di dang ni/_/mdo sde 
[\[149b.7\]]'di la srung bar bgyid/_/de nas dga' ldan pa'i lha'i bu rnams kyis gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_bcom ldan gsungs pa'i mdo sde 'di/_/gang zhig 'dzin par bgyid pa ni/_/byang chub gnas skabs gnas pas na/_/
[\[150a\]]
[\[150a.1\]]dga' ldan lhar ni rab tu 'gyur/_/bcom ldan bdag cag rab dga' nas/_/lha yi rnam smin mchog spangs nas/_/'dzam gling dag tu gnas nas ni/_/mdo sde 'di ni sgrogs par bgyid/_/de nas mi mjed kyi 
[\[150a.2\]]'jig rten gyi khams kyi bdag po tshangs pa lha'i rgyal pos/_gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_bsam gtan rnams dang theg rnams dang /_/rnam thar tshad med thams cad kyang /_/mdo sde 'di las byung bas na/_/de 
[\[150a.3\]]slad mdo 'di rab tu gsungs/_/mdo sde 'di ni ston pa'i gnas/_/tshangs pa'i bde ba bdag spangs nas/_/mdo sde 'di ni mnyan pa'i slad/_/rtag par yongs su srung skyob bgyid/_/de nas bdud kyi rgyal po'i bu tshong dpon zhes bya bas yang gus 
[\[150a.4\]]pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_yang dag don dang ldan pa'i mdo/_/bdud spyod rjes su mi 'brang zhing /_/bdud kyi las ngan sbyong bgyid pa/_/'di ni gang zhig 'dzin bgyid na/_/bdag kyang mdo sde 'di la ni/_/brtson pa 
[\[150a.5\]]dag gis rab bsrungs nas/_/brtson 'grus chen po'i sems bskyed de/_/kun du rgya cher spel bar bgyid/_/de nas bdud kyi rgyal pos gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_gang zhig mdo sde 'di bzung nas/_/nyon mongs 
[\[150a.6\]]rnams ni pham bgyid pa/_/de 'dra'i sems can de dag la/_/srung skyob bde la 'god par bgyid/_/mdo sde 'di ni gang 'chang ba/_/bdud rnams kyis ni glags mi rnyed/_/bcom ldan byin gyis brlabs kyi mthus/_/bdag gis de la srung 
[\[150a.7\]]bar bgyid/_/de nas lha'i bu bkra shis dam pas bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_sangs rgyas rnams kyi byang chub mchog_/mdo sde 'di las bstan pas na/_/gang zhig mdo sde 'dzin bgyid pa/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[150b\]]
[\[150b.1\]]la mchod par 'gyur/_/bdag gis mdo sde 'di bzung nas/_/bye ba'i lha la rab bshad nas/_/gus pas nyan par bgyid pa dag_/byang chub gnas su bskul bar bgyid/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' byams pas gus pas thal mo sbyar nas 
[\[150b.2\]]tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_byang chub la ni rab gnas nas/_/gsol ba ma btab grogs mthong na/_/lus srog dag kyang rab spangs nas/_/mdo sde rgyal po 'di srung bgyid/_/'di 'dra'i chos ni bdag thos nas/_/dga' ldan lha gnas 
[\[150b.3\]]mchis nas kyang /_/bcom ldan byin brlabs dbang gis na/_/lha mi rgya chen ston par bgyid/_/de nas gnas brtan 'od srung chen pos gus pas thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_bcom ldan nyan thos theg par ni/_/bdag ni shes 
[\[150b.4\]]rab chung bar gsungs/_/deng bdag rang gi stobs kyi mthus/_/mdo sde 'di ni srung 'dzin bgyid/_/gang zhig mdo 'di 'dzin bgyid na/_/bdag gis de ni rab bsrungs te/_/tshig dang spobs pa'i mthu stsal nas/_/rjes 'brang rtag par legs 
[\[150b.5\]]zhes brjod/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar nas tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_bdag gis bcom ldan mngon sum du/_/mdo sde tshad med thos gyur kyang /_/chos mchog rgyal po 'di 'dra ba/_/nam yang thos par yongs ma gyur/_/
[\[150b.6\]]deng bdag mdo 'di bcom ldan las/_/mngon thos yongs su bzung bas na/_/gang dag byang chub mos pa la/_/rgya chen rab tu spel bar bgyid/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang /_lha dang /_mi'i 'khor mang po de dag so so 
[\[150b.7\]]nas mdo sde 'di rgya cher spel zhing rgyas pa dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su bsrung bar sems bskyed nas byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang dag par bskul te/_sems can la rgya cher phan 'dogs pa gzigs pa dang /_legs so legs so/_/
[\[151a\]]
[\[151a.1\]]zhes bsngags pa brjod nas/_/khyod kyis 'di ltar mdo sde'i rgyal po mchog dam pa 'di/_sems rtse gcig tu rgya cher spel nas/_nga yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa'i 'og tu yang /_/'thor zhing nub par mi 'gyur bar 
[\[151a.2\]]byed pa de ni/_bla na med pa'i byang chub kyi rgyu yang dag pa yin pas/_bsod nams ji snyed cig 'thob par 'gyur ba ni/_bskal pa gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed du brjod kyang mthar thug par mi 'gyur ro/_/dge slong ngam/_dge slong 
[\[151a.3\]]ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma'am/_gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la sogs pa/_gang la la zhig mchod pa dang /_bkur sti byas nas/_yi ger bris te/_rgya cher spel ba dang /_gzhan dag la yang 
[\[151a.4\]]dag par ston par byed pas thob pa'i/_bsod nams gang yin pa de yang de bzhin no/_/de lta bas na khyed kyis yang dag pa'i brtson pas rnal 'byor bsgom par bya'o zhes bka' stsal to/_/de nas tshad med mtha' med pa'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma dang mnyam pa'i 
[\[151a.5\]]'khor mang po rnams bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa thos pas thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/_shin tu dang ba'i dad pas yang dag par blangs nas bka' bzhin du spyod par gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba 
[\[151a.6\]]mdo sde'i rgyal po las yongs su gtad pa'i le'u ste sum cu gcig pa'o//_//'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mchog tu rnam par rgyal ba mdo sde'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//zhu chen gyi mkhan po 
[\[151a.7\]]dang lots+tsha ba bcom ldan 'das kyi ring lugs pa ban+de chos grub kyis rgya'i dpe las bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa//_//
[\[151b\]]
[\[151b.1\]{D556}]@##/_/rgya gar skad du/_Ar+ya su war+N+Na pra b+hA sot+ta ma sU tren+d+ra rA dza nA ma ma hA yA na sU tra/_bod skad du/_'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo/_/bam po dang po/_/'das pa dang /_ma byon pa dang /_da ltar 
[\[151b.2\]]byung ba'i sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa nyan thos thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'di skad bdag gis thos pa dus gcig na/_bcom ldan 'das rgyal po'i khab bya rgod phung po'i ri'i zom shin tu rnam par dag pa chos kyi 
[\[151b.3\]]dbyings zab mo/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod yul dam pa na/_dge slong gi dge 'dun chen po dge slong dgu khri brgyad stong dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa chen po/_glang po che'i rgyal po ltar shin tu dul ba/_zag pa zad pa/_nyon mongs pa med 
[\[151b.4\]]pa/_sems shin tu rnam par grol ba/_shes rab shin tu rnam par grol ba/_bya ba byas pa/_khur bor ba/_bdag gi don rjes su thob pa/_srid par sbyor ba yongs su bcad pa/_dbang phyug dam pa'i mchog thob pa/_tshul khrims rnam par dag pa la rab tu gnas pa/_thabs 
[\[151b.5\]]dang shes rab kyis yongs su bkod pa/_rnam par grol ba brgyad mngon du gyur cing /_pha rol gyi mthar phyin par gyur pa sha stag la 'di lta ste/_tshe dang ldan pa kun shes kauN+Di n+ya dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rta thul dang /_tshe dang ldan pa rlangs pa dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ming chen dang /_tshe 
[\[151b.6\]]dang ldan pa bzang po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa 'od srung chen po dang /_tshe dang ldan pa lteng rgyas 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa ga yA 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa chu bo 'od srung dang /_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu dang /_tshe dang ldan pa maud gal gyi bu chen po dang /_dga' bo dang 'di dag la sogs 
[\[151b.7\]]pa nyan thos chen po rnams phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/_so so nas nang du yang dag par 'jog pa las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der dong nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gzhan yang byang 
[\[152a\]]
[\[152a.1\]]chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bye ba brgya stong dang yang thabs cig pa de dag kyang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po ltar dpal dang gzi brjid chen por ldan pas kun du grags pa/_sbyin pa dang /_tshul khrims rnam par dag pa/_rtag tu srung bar mos pa dang /_
[\[152a.2\]]bzod pa dang /_brtson 'grus bskal pa grangs med par spyod pa bsam gtan kun las 'das pa'i dran pa mngon du gyur pa/_shes rab kyi sgo rnam par phye ba thabs mkhas pa shin tu bsgrubs pa/_dbang dam pas rnam par rol cing mngon par shes pa dam pa brnyes pa/_gzungs chen 
[\[152a.3\]]po thob pa/_spobs pa mi zad pa/_nyon mongs pa dang /_kun nas nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pas/_myur du rnam pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob cing bdud dang phyir rgol ba'i dpung 'joms pa chos kyi rnga chen po rdung bas mu stegs can thams cad 'dul zhing sems rnam par 
[\[152a.4\]]dang ba skyed par byed pa/_dam pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo bskor nas lha dang mi rnams sgrol bar byed pa/_phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad brgyan par byed pa/_'gro ba drug na gnas pa rnams la phan dam pa 'dogs pa/_ye shes chen po phun sum tshogs pa/_bzod pa 
[\[152a.5\]]chen po dang ldan pa/_byams pa dang ldan pa/_snying rje chen po'i sems la gnas pa/_mthu chen po brtan pa dang ldan pa/_sangs rgyas thams cad la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_yongs su mya ngan las mi 'da' zhing ma 'ongs pa'i mtha' klas pas gnas par yi dam chen po 'cha' ba/_sangs 
[\[152a.6\]]rgyas mang po la rgyu rnam par dag pa bskyed pa/_dus gsum gyi chos mi skye bar bzod pa thob pa/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul las shin tu 'das pa/_thabs mkhas pa chen pos 'jig rten 'dren pa ston pa chen pos bstan pa'i chos zab mo'i dgongs pa 'grel pa la mkhas 
[\[152a.7\]]pa/_stong pa nyid mngon du gyur pas the tsom yongs su chad par gyur pa la 'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' thogs pa med par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtag par chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar sems bskyed pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[152b\]]
[\[152b.1\]]rtag tu brtson pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mi gtong brtson pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gzungs kyi dbang 
[\[152b.2\]]phyug rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' spobs pa chen pos bkod pa'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lhun po'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho zab mo'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin po che'i tog chen 
[\[152b.3\]]po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rin chen dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lag na rdo rje dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dga' ba'i stobs dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[152b.4\]]dpa' chos chen mthu dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shin tu 'od bkod dang /_byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od chen pos bkod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' tshul khrims rnam dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ting nge 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' shin tu rnam 
[\[152b.5\]]dag blo gros dang /_byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus brtan dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sems nam mkha' bzhin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' smon lam chen po mi gtong ba dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sman sbyin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' nyon mongs nad sel 
[\[152b.6\]]dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sman pa'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dga' bas mtho ba'i rgyal po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' lung bstan mchog thob dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnam dag 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen 
[\[152b.7\]]chos 'dzin dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen grags dga' dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen grags pa mtha' med ston dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen seng ge'i sgra dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen khyu mchog sgra dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[153a\]]
[\[153a.1\]]dpa' sprin chen bkra shis dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rin chen dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen nyi ma'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen zla ba'i snying po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen skar ma'i 'od dang /_
[\[153a.2\]]byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen me'i 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen glog gi 'od dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen 'brug sgra dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen shes rab kun du 'char dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rnam dag char pa'i rgyal 
[\[153a.3\]]po dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen me tog shing rgyal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen ut+pa la'i dri dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen rin po che tsan+dan dri bsil sku dang /_byang chub sems dpa' sprin chen mun sel dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[153a.4\]]sprin chen rab rib sel ba la sogs pa/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po tshad med grangs med pa rnams so so nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/_nang du yang dag par 'jog pa las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi 
[\[153a.5\]]bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas yang lits+tsha bI gzhon nu rnams la 'di lta ste/_gzhon nu seng ge'i 'od dang /_gzhon nu seng ge'i blo gros dang /_gzhon nu chos sbyin dang /_gzhon nu dbang po sbyin dang /_gzhon nu 'od chen dang /_
[\[153a.6\]]gzhon nu dpal chen dang /_gzhon nu sangs rgyas skyong dang /_gzhon nu chos skyong dang /_gzhon nu dge 'dun skyong dang /_gzhon nu rdo rje skyong dang /_gzhon nu nam mkha' skyong dang /_gzhon nu nam mkha' sgrogs dang /_rin chen snying po gzhon nu dang /_bkra shis mchog gi snying po gzhon 
[\[153a.7\]]nu la sogs pa lnga 'bum brgyad stong de dag kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la bde bar gnas pa/_theg pa chen po la rab tu mos pa de dag so so nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos 
[\[153b\]]
[\[153b.1\]]phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/gzhan yang lha'i sras po la 'di lta ste/_lha'i sras po dga' ba mthong ba dang /_lha'i sras po rab dga' dang /_lha'i sras po nyi 'od dang /_lha'i sras po zla ba'i gtsug phud dang /_lha'i 
[\[153b.2\]]sras po shes rab gsal dang /_lha'i sras po nam mkha' rnam dag shes rab dang /_lha'i sras po nyon mongs nad sel dang /_lha'i sras po bkra shis dang /_de dag la sogs pa lha'i sras po bzhi khri nyis stong yang /_theg pa chen po srung ba dang /_yang dag pa'i chos rjes 
[\[153b.3\]]su 'dzin cing /_rgyun mi 'chad par bya bar smon lam rgya chen po btab pa de dag thams cad kyang phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_phyogs gcig 
[\[153b.4\]]tu 'khod do/_/gzhan yang klu'i rgyal po la 'di lta ste/_klu'i rgyal po pad+mo dang /_klu'i rgyal po e la'i 'dab ma dang /_klu'i rgyal po stobs chen dang /_klu'i rgyal po sgra chen dang /_klu'i rgyal po dba' rlabs chung dang /_klu'i rgyal po klung 'dzin dang /_klu'i rgyal po gser 
[\[153b.5\]]gdong dang /_klu'i rgyal po gzi can la sogs pa/_klu'i rgyal po nyi khri brgyad stong po de dag kyang theg pa chen po'i chos 'chang zhing 'dzin par mos pa dang /_yongs su rgyas pa dang /_bsrung bar sems bskyed pa sha stag ste/_de dag thams cad kyang so so nas phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/_bcom 
[\[153b.6\]]ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu la sogs pa sum khri drug stong la 'di lta ste/_gnod sbyin 
[\[153b.7\]]a mra dang /_gnod sbyin a mra 'chang dang /_gnod sbyin pad+mo'i 'od kyi snying po dang /_gnod sbyin pad+mo'i gdong dang /_gnod sbyin khro gnyer can dang /_gnod sbyin 'jigs pa chen po ston dang /_gnod sbyin sa g.yo byed dang /_gnod sbyin zas 'phrog la sogs pa'i gnod 
[\[154a\]]
[\[154a.1\]]sbyin de dag kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos yang dag pa la dad cing bsrung ba la brtson pa sha stag ste/_de dag thams cad kyang phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_lan 
[\[154a.2\]]gsum bskor ba byas nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/gzhan yang nam mkha' lding gi rgyal po spos kyi glang po che mthu stobs rgyal po la sogs pa bzhi khri dgu stong dang /_gzhan yang dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po la sogs pa dang /_
[\[154a.3\]]ri dang /_nags tshal dang /_chu bo dang /_rgya mtsho'i lha'i drang srong rnams dang /_rgyal po chen po dang /_de'i 'khor dang /_btsun mo dang /_sras dang /_rigs kyi bu dang /_rigs kyi bu mo dang /_lha dang /_mi la sogs pa de dag thams cad bla na med pa'i theg pa chen po 'di 
[\[154a.4\]]klog cing 'don pa dang /_'chang zhing 'dzin pa dang /_'dri ba dang /_rgyas par byed pa dang /_srung zhing skyob par smon lam yongs su 'debs pa de dag thams cad kyang phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 
[\[154a.5\]]'tshal nas/_lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de ltar nyan thos dang /_byang chub sems dpa' dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding la sogs pa sde brgyad po de dag sprin bzhin du 'dus pa/_sems rtse gcig tu byas 
[\[154a.6\]]nas thal mo sbyar te/_mig mi 'dzums pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhal du blta zhing /_dam pa'i chos bstan par mos pas gsol ba 'debs so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das phyi dro'i dus kyi tshe/_ting nge 'dzin las bzhengs te/_'khor 'dus pa mang po la gzigs nas 
[\[154a.7\]]tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/mdo sde'i rgyal po'i dbang po ste/_/mnyan na shin tu zab pa dang /_/yongs su brtags na zab pa nyid/_/gser 'od dam pa 'di 'chad do/_/phyogs bzhir sangs rgyas rnams kyis ni/_/byin gyis rlabs kyis byin brlabs pa/_/
[\[154b\]]
[\[154b.1\]]mi 'khrugs pas ni shar phyogs su/_/rin chen rtog gis lho phyogs su/_/'od dpag med kyis nub phyogs su/_/rnga sgra yis ni byang phyogs su/_/sdig pa thams cad gzhig pa'i phyir/_/bshad pa dam pa bkra shis pa/_/sdig pa'i las rnams zad byed pa/_/bde ba thams 
[\[154b.2\]]cad sbyin byed pa/_/sdug bsngal thams cad 'jig byed pa/_/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gzhi/_/dpal kun gyis ni legs par brgyan/_/byin gyis brlabs te brjod par bya/_/sems can gang dag dbang po nyams/_/tshe zad pa dang tshe nyams dang /_/phun sum tshogs min 
[\[154b.3\]]gang chags dang /_/lha rnams rgyab kyis phyogs pa dang /_/mdza' sdug skye bo sdang ba dang /_/bran gza' la sogs gtses pa dang /_/phan tshun mthun pa ma yin dang /_/nor 'gribs pas ni gnod pa dang /_/mya ngan ngal dang gnod pa dang /_/'jigs pa dang ni phongs pa dang /_/
[\[154b.4\]]gza' dang rgyu skar byad stems dang /_/mi bzad gdon gyis nyen pa dang /_/mya ngan ngal las byung ba yi/_/rmi lam sdig pa mthong na yang /_/des ni rab bkrus gtsang ma yin/_/mdo sde dam pa mnyan par bya/_/gang dag yid dge sems dang zhing /_/gos gtsang 
[\[154b.5\]]rnams kyis rab brgyan te/_/zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/_/mdo 'di nyan par byed na ni/_/mdo sde 'di yi gzi brjid kyis/_/srog chags kun gyi gnod pa dag_/shin tu mi bzad 'di 'dra ba/_/de dag rtag tu zhi bar 'gyur/_/'jig rten skyong ba bdag nyid dang /_/blon 
[\[154b.6\]]po tshogs kyi dbang phyug bcas/_/gnod sbyin bye ba du ma yis/_/de dag la ni srung bar byed/_/lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang /_/nai rany+dza nar gnas pa dang /_/'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog ma dang /_/sa yi lha mo brtan ma dang /_/tshangs pa'i dbang dang lha dbang dang /_/klu dbang mthu chen 
[\[154b.7\]]rnams dang ni/_/mi 'am ci dbang lha min dbang /_/de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang rnams/_/sde dang stobs dang bzhon pa dang /_/bcas te de dag der lhags nas/_/nyin dang mtshan mo mi g.yel bar/_/de dag la ni srung bar byed/_/zab mo sangs rgyas spyod yul ba/_/sangs 
[\[155a\]]
[\[155a.1\]]rgyas kun gyi gsang ba ste/_/bskal pa bye bar rnyed dka' ba/_/mdo 'di rab tu bshad par bya/_/gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa dang /_/gang dag gzhan la thos byed dang /_/gang dag rjes su yi rang dang /_/gang dag mchod pa byed pa rnams/_/de dag lha dang 
[\[155a.2\]]klu dag dang /_/mi dang mi 'am ci dag dang /_/lha min gnod sbyin du ma yis/_/bskal pa bye bar mchod par 'gyur/_/srog chags bsod nams byed pa rnams/_/de dag bsod nams phung po ni/_/mtha' yas grangs kyang med pa dang /_/bsam gyis mi khyab skye bar 'gyur/_/
[\[155a.3\]]phyogs bcu'i rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas dang /_/de bzhin zab mor spyod pa yi/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis kyang /_/rab tu gzung bar 'gyur ba yin/_/gtsang ma'i gos rnams rab bgos la/_/dri zhim pa yi gos 'chang zhing /_/byams pa'i sems ni nyer bzhag nas/_/
[\[155a.4\]]g.yel ba med pas mchod par bya/_/rang gi sems ni dri med cing /_/rgya che bar yang rab byed la/_/sems kyang shin tu dang byed kyis/_/mdo sde'i dam pa mnyan par gyis/_/gang dag mdo 'di nyan pa ni/_/de dag mi nang legs par 'ongs/_/mi yi srid pa legs par thob/_/
[\[155a.5\]]'tsho ba bde bas 'tsho bar 'gyur/_/gang gi rna ba'i bu gar yang /_/bshad pa 'di ni grag gyur pa/_/de dag dge rtsa sbyangs pa ste/_/sangs rgyas mang pos rab tu bsngags/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las gleng gzhi'i le'u ste dang po'o//_//
[\[155a.6\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba/_sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag mang po la rim gro byas pa 
[\[155a.7\]]zhig gnas pa de 'di snyam du sems te/_rgyu gang dang rkyen gang gis/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di lta ste/_lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste/_'di ltar sku tshe thung snyam nas/_de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis kyang 'di skad du/_rgyu dang rkyen gnyis kyis tshe 
[\[155b\]]
[\[155b.1\]]ring bar 'gyur te/_gnyis gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_srog gcod pa spangs pa dang /_kha zas rab tu sbyin pa'o/_/zhes gsungs te/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ni bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong grangs med pa mang po nas/_srog gcod pa spangs par gyur pa nas/_
[\[155b.2\]]dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyi bar du yang dag par blangs te gnas par gyur/_kha zas kyang phyi nang gi dngos po rnams sems can dag la yongs su btang ste/_cher na rang gi lus kyi sha dang /_khrag dang /_rus pa dang /_rkang gis kyang sems can ltogs pa rnams tshim par mdzad 
[\[155b.3\]]na/_zas gzhan gyis lta ci smos snyam mo/_/de nas skyes bu dam pa des/_sangs rgyas la song ba'i yid la byed pa dag las 'di lta bu'i tshul gyi bsam pa 'di dag sems pa na/_de'i khyim yangs shing rgya che ba/_bai DUr+ya sngon po las grub pa/_lha'i rin po che du mas spras pa/_de 
[\[155b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba/_lha rdzas las 'das pa'i spos kyis khyab par gyur to/_/khyim de'i phyogs bzhi nas/_lha'i rin po che'i khri bzhi byung bar gyur te/_khri de dag las kyang lha'i ras bcos bu rin po che'i phrugs rnams bting ba dag byung bar gyur to/_/khri de dag 
[\[155b.5\]]las kyang lha'i me tog pad+ma rin po che du mas spras pa/_de bzhin gshegs pas kha dog bsgyur ba dag byung ngo /_/pad+ma de dag las kyang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das bzhi byung bar gyur to/_/shar phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa byung /_lho phyogs nas ni de 
[\[155b.6\]]bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog byung /_nub phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med byung /_byang phyogs nas ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra byung ste/_seng ge'i khri de dag las/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag byung ma thag tu de nas de'i tshe rgyal po'i khab kyi grong 
[\[155b.7\]]khyer chen po snang ba chen pos khyab par gyur to/_/stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bar dang /_phyogs bcu kun du 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyi bar dag snang bas khyab par gyur/_lha'i me tog dag gi char yang bab/_lha'i sil snyen dag gi 
[\[156a\]]
[\[156a.1\]]sgra yang byung ngo /_/sangs rgyas kyi mthus stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'dir sems can thams cad kyang lha'i bde ba dang ldan par gyur te/_sems can dbang po ma tshang ba rnams ni/_dbang po thams cad dang ldan par gyur/_sems 
[\[156a.2\]]can dmus long rnams ni mig gis gzugs rnams mthong /_sems can 'on pa dag gis ni rna bas sgra rnams thos/_sems can smyon pa dag ni dran pa so sor rnyed/_sems can sems rnam par g.yengs pa dag ni sems rnam par mi g.yeng bar gyur/_sems can sgren mo rnams 
[\[156a.3\]]ni gos bgos par gyur/_sems can bkres pa dag ni lto 'grangs par gyur/_sems can skom pa rnams ni skom dang phrad par gyur/_sems can nad kyis btab pa dag ni nad dang bral bar gyur/_sems can dbang po nyams pa dag ni dbang po rnams tshang bar gyur te/_'jig 
[\[156a.4\]]rten du ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams rgya cher byung bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mthong nas ngo mtshar rmad du gyur te/_de tshim zhing mgu la yi rangs shing rab tu dga' ste/_dga' ba dang /_yid 
[\[156a.5\]]bde ba skyes nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag rnams las rjes su dran la/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i yon tan rjes su dran zhing /_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku 
[\[156a.6\]]tshe'i tshad la the tshom za bar gyur te/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar lo brgyad cu zhig thub ste/_sku tshe thung ba 'di ji lta bu 'di ci zhig snyam du bsam pa de sems shing 'dug par gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dgongs shing mkhyen bzhin du/_byang 
[\[156a.7\]]chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu khyod 'di snyam du/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa 'di ltar sku tshe thung ngo snyam du ma sems shig_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[156b\]]
[\[156b.1\]]sangs rgyas rnams ma gtogs par/_lha dang bcas pa/_bdud dang bcas pa/_tshangs pa dang bcas pa/_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze'i skye dgu dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin du bcas pa na/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[156b.2\]]pa shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad kyi mtha'/_phyi ma'i mtha'i mu'i bar du yang rtogs par nus pa nged kyis su yang ma mthong ngo /_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa brjod ma thag tu de nas de'i mod la sangs rgyas kyi mthus/_
[\[156b.3\]]lha'i bu 'dod pa na spyod pa rnams dang /_gzugs na spyod pa rnams dang /_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i bar dag dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du 
[\[156b.4\]]ma 'dus nas/_byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gi khyim der lhags so/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa'i tshigs su bcad de mdor bka' stsal pa/_/rgya mtsho'i chu rnams 
[\[156b.5\]]thams cad kyi/_/thigs pa dag ni bgrang bar nus/_/shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/_/sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so/_/ri rab rnams ni thams cad kyang /_/phra rab rdul brlags bgrang bar nus/_/shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/_/sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so/_/sa la 
[\[156b.6\]]gang dag yod pa yi/_/rab tu phra rdul ji snyed pa/_/thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi/_/rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tshad mi nus/_/gal te la las nam mkha' la/_/sna 'ga' zhig gis dpag 'dod kyang /_/shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad/_/sus kyang bgrang bar mi nus so/_/
[\[156b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'di srid bzhugs/_/bskal pa dag ni de snyed cig_/bskal pa bye ba brgya dag ces/_/grangs ni rnyed par mi rung ngo /_/gang phyir de yi byed rgyu gnyis/_/rgyu yang rnam pa gnyis gsungs te/_/gzhan la 'tshe ba spangs pa dang /_/kha zas mang po byin 
[\[157a\]]
[\[157a.1\]]pa ste/_/de phyir bdag nyid chen po de'i/_/sku tshe'i tshad grangs mi rnyed de/_/bskal pa 'di snyed cig ce 'am/_/grangs med pa yang de bzhin te/_/de bas the tsom med par 'gyur/_/the tsom cung zad ma za shig_/rgyal ba'i sku tshe'i tha ma yi/_/grangs ni 
[\[157a.2\]]gang du'ang mi dmigs so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bshad pa de thos nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/ji ltar na bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin 
[\[157a.3\]]gshegs pas/_de ltar sku tshe'i tshad thung bar bstan par gyur ces de skad ces gsol ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/_byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa de 
[\[157a.4\]]ni snyigs ma rnam pa lnga'i 'jig rten du skye dgu'i tshe'i tshad lo brgya thub pa'i dus su bltams nas/_sems can mos pa dman pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba dang /_dad pa chung ba'i sems can de dag bdag tu lta ba dang /_sems can du lta ba dang /_srog tu lta ba dang /_gso bar lta 
[\[157a.5\]]ba dang /_gang zag tu lta ba dang /_log par lta ba dang /_bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa dag dang /_rtag pa dang chad par lta ba la sogs pa'i byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams la phan gdags pa dang /_gzhan yang mu stegs can rnams la yang dag pa'i lta ba bskyed pas myur 
[\[157a.6\]]du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par bya ba'i phyir/_de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des sku tshe'i tshad thung ba bstan to/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa de mya ngan las 'da' ba bstan pas/_sems can rnams de la dkon pa dang phrad par dka' ba'i 'du 
[\[157a.7\]]shes dang /_mya ngan dang /_sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes la sogs pa bskyed pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i mdo 'di dag myur du 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa la 
[\[157b\]]
[\[157b.1\]]skur pa 'debs pa med par 'gyur bas/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs pas sku tshe thung bar bstan to/_/de yang de bzhin gshegs pa rtag tu bzhugs shing mya ngan las mi 'da' na/_sems can rnams gus pa med pa dang /_phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes kyang mi skyed pas/_
[\[157b.2\]]de bzhin gshegs pas gsungs pa'i mdo zab mo dag 'dzin cing /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston par mi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni bcom ldan 'das rtag tu 'jig rten na bzhugs par 'dzin pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs 
[\[157b.3\]]kyi bu dper na/_gang la la zhig pha ma la nor bu rin po che rgyas pa mang du yod pa mthong na/_nor de la dkon pa dang /_ngo mtshar gyi 'du shes mi skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_pha ma'i nor rdzas de la rtag tu yod pa'i 'du shes skye ba'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin du bcom ldan 'das rtag tu mya ngan 
[\[157b.4\]]las mi 'da' na/_de la dkon pa dang /_phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes mi 'byung ba'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dper na gang la la zhig pha ma dbul zhing nor dang mi ldan pa zhig de rgyal po'am/_blon po chen po zhig gi gnas su phyin te/_de dag gi bang mdzod dang /_nor dang /_
[\[157b.5\]]rin po che la sogs pa mang po rgyas pa mthong na/_de dkon pa dang /_rnyed par dka' ba'i 'du shes skye ste/_dbul po de nor btsal ba'i thabs bsgrub pa la brtson par byed do/_/de ni dbul ba dang phongs pa spangs te/_bde ba dang 'byor pa bsgrub par 'dod pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs 
[\[157b.6\]]kyi bu de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'da' ba mthong na/_de dkon pa dang /_phrad par dka' ba dang /_mya ngan dang sdug bsngal gyi 'du shes kyang skyed cing /_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten du 'byung ba yang /_bskal pa grangs med pa na 
[\[157b.7\]]lan 'ga' zhig 'byung ste/_ji ltar me tog u dum bA ra brgya lam na lan 'ga' zhig 'byung ba bzhin pas/_sems can rnams de la dkon pa dang phrad par dka' ba'i 'du shes bskyed cing /_bcom ldan 'das de la gus pa skye bar 'gyur/_zhal nas gsungs pa'i mdo rnams 
[\[158a\]]
[\[158a.1\]]la yang bden pa'i 'du shes dang /_yongs su gzung ba'i 'du shes bskyed cing skur pa 'debs par mi byed do/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bas na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rgyu de dang rkyen de'i phyir/_'jig rten na yun ring du mi bzhugs shing myur du mya ngan las 'da' 
[\[158a.2\]]bar mdzad pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni thabs mkhas pa phun sum tshogs pa de lta bus/_sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad do/_/de nas de bzhin gshegs pa bzhi po de dag kyang mi snang bar gyur to/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[158a.3\]]mdzes pa'i tog dang /_byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong tshad med pa dang /_gzhan yang srog chags bye ba brgya stong tshad med pa dang /_thabs cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba der song ste/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[158a.4\]]te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis ji ltar gyur pa de dag gsol nas/_de nas de bzhin gshegs pa de bzhi yang bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri la bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa bzhugs par byon nas/_phyogs so so'i gdan gyi steng 
[\[158a.5\]]na bzhugs te/_'khor gyi byang chub sems dpa' la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu song la/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa la gnod pa dang /_nyam nga ba chung ngam/_bskyod pa yang ngam/_bde ba la reg par gnas sam zhes gsol cig_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das 
[\[158a.6\]]de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa la/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po shin tu zab pa 'di/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_mu ge'i ya nga ba yongs su bsal te/_thams cad bde ba dang ldan pa'i phyir 'di bstan pa legs te/_rjes su dgyes par mdzad do zhes 
[\[158a.7\]]kyang gsol cig_/de nas so so'i zham ring nas mchis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das bzhi po de dag gis ji skad 
[\[158b\]]
[\[158b.1\]]bka' stsal pa de bzhin du gsol to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_byang chub sems dpa' de dag la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/_legs so legs so/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[158b.2\]]pa bzhis kyang sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i don du dam pa'i chos 'di bshad par nga la bskul ba mdzad pas/_de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/bya rgod phung po'i ri la nga bzhugs te/_/mdo sde rin chen 'di ni 'chad 
[\[158b.3\]]mdzad kyang /_/skye bo mang po 'di dag bsgral ba'i phyir/_/yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba'ang ston pa mdzad/_/byis pa lta ba log par gyur pa rnams/_/nga yi bstan la mos par mi byed pa/_/de dag kun du bsgral ba'i don gyi phyir/_/yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba'ang ston mdzad 
[\[158b.4\]]do/_/de nas de'i tshe/_'khor der slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+ya zhes bya ba dang /_bram ze stong phrag du mas/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa byas te/_de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po'i sgra thos nas/_'phral du ngus te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[158b.5\]]kyi zhabs gnyis la gtugs nas/_bcom ldan 'das la gsol pa/_gal te bcom ldan 'das sems can thams cad la thugs brtse ba/_thugs rje chen po dang ldan pa phan par bzhed pa/_sems can thams cad la pha ma lta bu mi mnyam pa dang mnyam par gyur pa/_zla ba lta 
[\[158b.6\]]bu snang ba mdzad pa/_shes rab dang ye shes chen po'i nyi ma shar ba lta bu lags shing /_gal te khyod sems can thams cad la sgra gcan zin bzhin du gzigs na/_bdag la dam pa zhig stsal du gsol/_bcom ldan 'das cang mi gsung bar gyur to/_/de nas sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[158b.7\]]mthus 'khor der lits+tsha bI gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba zhes bya ba de spobs pa skyes nas/_slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ci bram ze chen po khyod bcom ldan 'das la dam pa gcig gsol lam/_bdag gis khyod la 
[\[159a\]]
[\[159a.1\]]dam pa sbyin no/_/bram zes smras pa/_lits+tsha bI gzhon nu bdag ni/_bcom ldan 'das la mchod pa dang /_ring bsrel gyi phye ma dgos pa'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam la brten par 'dod do/_/ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam de mngon 
[\[159a.2\]]par mchod na/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi bdag po 'ba' zhig 'thob ces grag go/_/kye lits+tsha bI gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis shes par dka' ba/_khong du chud par dka' ba de lta bu'i mtshan nyid dang yon 
[\[159a.3\]]tan dang ldan pa/_gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'chad ces grag gis nyon cig_/kye lits+tsha bI gzhon nu gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'di ni de ltar shes par dka' zhing rtogs par dka' bas na/_kho bo cag mtha' 'khob kyi gling gi bram ze rnams ni gang bcangs nas/_sems can 
[\[159a.4\]]rnams myur du sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i bdag po thob par 'gyur ba'i ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam za ma tog gi nang du bcug la bcangs kyang rung ngo /_/kye lits+tsha bI gzhon nu khyod ci de bzhin gshegs pa las ring bsrel yungs 'bru tsam gsol nas/_ring bsrel za ma tog gi nang du 
[\[159a.5\]]bcug ste/_bcangs pas sems can rnams sum cu rtsa gsum gyi bdag po thob par mi 'dod dam/_kye lits+tsha bI gzhon nu kho bos ni dam pa de lta bu gsol to/_/de nas lits+tsha bI gzhon nu sems can thams cad kyis mthong na dga' bas/_slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di 
[\[159a.6\]]n+ya la tshigs su bcad pa dag gis slar smras pa/_nam zhig gang gA'i chu rgyun las/_/me tog rnams ni skye ba dang /_/bya rog dmar por 'gyur ba dang /_/khu byug dung mdog 'drar 'gyur dang /_/'dzam bur ta la'i 'bru chags dang /_/bra gor a mra'i dog pa chags/_/
[\[159a.7\]]de yi tshe na yungs 'bru tsam/_/ring bsrel du ni stsal bar 'gyur/_/nam zhig ru sbal spu rnams las/_/gos su legs par btags gyur te/_/dgun gyi grang ba sel byed pa/_/de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/_/nam zhig sbrang bu'i rkang lag las/_/yang 
[\[159b\]]
[\[159b.1\]]thog legs par byas gyur te/_/brtan zhing rab tu mi g.yo na/_/de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/_/nam zhig srin bu pad+ma kun/_/so ni dkar por skyes gyur te/_/rno zhing chen por gyur pa na/_/de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/_/mtho ris su ni 'dzeg pa'i phyir/_/
[\[159b.2\]]nam zhig ri bong rwa rnams las/_/skas ni legs par byas gyur pa/_/de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/_/nam zhig skas ni der 'dzegs te/_/byi bas zla ba za ba dang /_/sgra gcan la yang gnod byed pa/_/de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/_/grong du rgyu ba'i 
[\[159b.3\]]sbrang bu yis/_/nam zhig rdza ma'i chang 'thungs te/_/khyim na gnas par byed gyur pa/_/de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/_/nam zhig bong bu bder gyur la/_/mchu dmar bim pa 'drar gyur zhing /_/glu gar rnams la mkhas gyur pa/_/de tshe ring bsrel yod 
[\[159b.4\]]par 'gyur/_/nam zhig 'ug pa bya rog rnams/_/dben par dong nas rtse ba dang /_/phan tshun mthun par 'gyur ba na/_/de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/_/ba la sha yi lo ma rnams/_/rin chen sna gsum gdugs gyur te/_/char 'bab skyabs su nam 'gyur ba/_/
[\[159b.5\]]de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/_/nam zhig rgya mtsho'i gru bo tshe/_/'khrul 'khor dang ni g.yor mor bcas/_/thang la phyung ste 'gro ba na/_/de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/_/nam zhig bya ni 'ug pa rnams/_/ri bo spos kyi ngad ldang ba/_/mchu la thogs te 'gro 
[\[159b.6\]]'gyur ba/_/de tshe ring bsrel yod par 'gyur/_/slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+yas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag thos nas/_lits+tsha bI gzhon nu 'jig rten thams cad kyis mthong na dga' ba la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis slar smras pa/_/legs so 
[\[159b.7\]]legs so gzhon nu mchog_/rgyal ba'i sras po tshig po che/_/dpa' zhing thabs la mkhas ldan pa/_/lung bstan pa ni dam pa thob/_/'jig rten mgon po skyob pa po/_/de bzhin gshegs pa che ba nyid/_/bsam gyis mi khyab [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]bzhin/_/gzhon nus bdag 
[\[160a\]]
[\[160a.1\]]la mnyan par gyis/_/sangs rgyas yul ni bsam mi khyab/_/de bzhin gshegs rnams mtshungs pa med/_/sangs rgyas thams cad rtag tu zhi/_/sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag 'byung /_/sangs rgyas thams cad kha dog mtshungs/_/'di ni 
[\[160a.2\]]sangs rgyas chos nyid yin/_/bcom ldan 'di ni bcos ma min/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ma skyes te/_/rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i sku/_/sprul pa'i sku ni ston par mdzad/_/drang srong chen po'i ring bsrel ni/_/yungs 'bru tsam zhes bya ba med/_/sku la rus pa khrag med na/_/ring 
[\[160a.3\]]bsrel yod par ga la 'gyur/_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/thabs kyis ring bsrel bzhag par mdzad/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas chos kyi sku/_/de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings/_/chos ston mdzad pa ci 'dra ba/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi sku de 
[\[160a.4\]]'dra/_/bdag gis 'di thos shes nas ni/_/bdag gis dam pa gsol bar byas/_/de nyid kho na lung bstan phyir/_/gtam gleng ba ni bdag gis byas/_/de nas lha'i bu sum khri nyis stong gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa zab mo de lta bu 'di thos 
[\[160a.5\]]nas/_thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_de dag yid kyi kun du rtog pa rab tu dga' nas/_sgra skad mthun par tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/sangs rgyas mya ngan yongs mi 'da'/_/chos kyang nub 
[\[160a.6\]]par mi 'gyur te/_/sems can yongs su smin mdzad phyir/_/yongs su mya ngan 'da' ba ston/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan bsam mi khyab/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rtag pa'i sku/_/sems can rnams la phan pa'i phyir/_/bkod pa rnam pa sna tshogs ston/_/
[\[160a.7\]]de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog gis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag dang /_skyes bu dam pa de gnyis las/_bcom ldan 'das shAkya thub pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan pa thos nas yang stan las langs te/_thal mo sbyar 
[\[160b\]]
[\[160b.1\]]ba btud nas/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das de ltar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag mya ngan las mi 'da' la/_ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag pa yang ma mchis na/_ci'i slad du mdo sde dag las sangs rgyas mya ngan las 'da' zhing /_ring bsrel 
[\[160b.2\]]'jig rten du bzhag pa la lha dang mis gus pa dang bcas/_bkur sti dang bcas pas 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag pa la lha dang mir bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyis mchod pa byas na/_bsod nams dpag tu med pa 
[\[160b.3\]]'thob po zhes kyang gsungs la/_da 'dir ni de dag med do zhes kyang gsungs pa de ji lta bu lags/_bcom ldan 'das thugs brtse bas rnam par dbye zhing bshad par gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mdzes pa'i tog 
[\[160b.4\]]la sogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/_bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las 'das te/_ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag ces gsungs pa yang dgongs pa'i don du bstan par shes par bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 
[\[160b.5\]]'di bcus de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dag pa dang /_bden pa'i tshul du mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yod par gsungs par shes par bya'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams 
[\[160b.6\]]kyis nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa dang /_shes bya'i sgrib pa yongs su spangs pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis gang zag la bdag med pa dang /_chos la bdag med pa mngon du mkhyen pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_lus 
[\[160b.7\]]kyi gnas dang /_chos kyi gnas su gyur pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_sems can rnams 'dul ba'i mdzad pa lhun gyis grub pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_yang dag pa nyid mngon du gyur pas mtshan nyid tha dad pa med pas chos kyi skur mnyam 
[\[161a\]]
[\[161a.1\]]pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i rang bzhin gnyis su med par mngon du gzigs pas/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_chos thams cad kyi ngo bo nyid rtogs pas/_rnam par dag pa mngon du gyur 
[\[161a.2\]]pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_chos thams cad skye ba dang /_'jig pa med pa'i sgrub pa la mkhas pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_chos kyi dbyings dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' mnyam pa'i ye shes thob pa'i phyir mya ngan las 
[\[161a.3\]]'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_chos thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid dang mya ngan las 'da' ba'i de bzhin nyid la bye brag med par mkhyen pas mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos 'di bcus ni/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[161a.4\]]pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis yang dag pa dang /_bden pa'i tshul du mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yod par gsungs so/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyon mongs pa thams cad kyi gzhi ni mos pa dang /_'dod pa ste/_gang la mos pa 
[\[161a.5\]]la 'dod pa skye'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni mos pa dang /_'dod pa las bral ba'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni mos pa dang /_'dod pa thams cad dang bral nas/_chos gang yang mi len pa'i phyir gzung 
[\[161a.6\]]ba med pa dang /_'gro ba dang /_'ong ba dang /_len pa med pa ste/_de'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_'gro ba dang /_'ong ba dang /_blang bar bya ba med pa de ni chos kyi sku ste/_skye ba dang /_'gog pa med pa'o/_/skye ba dang /_'gog pa med pa de nyid la/_mya 
[\[161a.7\]]ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_skye ba dang /_'gog pa med pa de tshig gis mi brjod pa tshig gi lam chad pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_bdag dang gang zag med cing skye ba dang /_'gag pa'i chos tsam las gnas 'pho ba thob pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das 
[\[161b\]]
[\[161b.1\]]pa zhes bya ba dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_nye ba'i nyon mongs pa dag blo bur nyid du gzigs shing /_gang chos nyid de ni gnas pa ste/_'gro ba dang 'ong ba med par sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis mngon du gyur pa'i phyir/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_yang 
[\[161b.2\]]dag pa ni bden pa ste/_de las gzhan pa ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa'o/_/gang bden pa de nyid ni yang dag pa ste/_yang dag pa nyid ni de bzhin gshegs pa nyid pas/_de la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_yang dag pa'i mtha' nyid ni spros pa med pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[161b.3\]]nyag gcig gis yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon du gyur cing /_spros pa nye bar zhi ba de nyid la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_mi skye ba ni bden pa/_skye ba ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa yin pas/_byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'dam du bying ba/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[161b.4\]]pa'i sku ni bden pa yang dag pa ma yin pa med pa'i phyir/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_yang dag pa ma yin pa'i chos ni rkyen las skye ba/_yang dag pa bden pa'i chos ni rkyen gyis bskyed pa ma yin pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi sku yang yang dag pa/_
[\[161b.5\]]bden pa nyid yin pas de la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po chos rnam pa 'di bcus ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang dag pa dang /_
[\[161b.6\]]bden pa'i tshul rtogs pas/_mya ngan las 'das pa chen por shes par 'gyur ro/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_de bzhin gshegs pas sbyin pa dang /_sbyin pa'i 'bras bu la bdag dang /_bdag gir bya ba med par rab tu shes pas sbyin pa de dang /_de'i 'bras 
[\[161b.7\]]bu la log pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su spangs pas/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas tshul khrims dang /_tshul khrims kyi 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag gir bya ba med par rab tu shes pas/_tshul khrims de dang de'i 'bras bu la log 
[\[162a\]]
[\[162a.1\]]pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su spangs pas/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas bzod pa dang /_bzod pa'i 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag gir bya ba med par rab tu shes pas/_bzod pa de dang de'i 'bras bu la log pa'i 
[\[162a.2\]]rnam par rtog pa yongs su spangs pas/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas brtson 'grus dang /_brtson 'grus kyi 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag gir bya ba med par rab tu shes pas/_brtson 'grus de dang de'i 'bras bu la log pa'i rnam par 
[\[162a.3\]]rtog pa yongs su spangs pas/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas bsam gtan dang /_bsam gtan gyi 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag gir bya ba med par rab tu shes pas/_bsam gtan de dang de'i 'bras bu la log pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs 
[\[162a.4\]]su spangs pas/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas shes rab dang /_shes rab kyi 'bras bu la bdag dang bdag gir bya ba med par rab tu shes pas/_shes rab de dang de'i 'bras bu la log pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su spangs pas/_mya ngan 
[\[162a.5\]]las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis sems can dang /_sems can med par rab tu mkhyen pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin med pa la/_log pa'i rnam par rtog pa yongs su spangs pas/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_gang 
[\[162a.6\]]sred pa'i bdag nyid can ni tshor ba la nan tan byed do/_/tshor ba la nan tan byed pa'i dbang gis sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni bdag dang bdag gir 'dzin pa yongs su bcad cing tshol ba mi mnga' bas/_mya ngan las 
[\[162a.7\]]'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_'dus byas kyi chos thams cad ni bgrang zhing dpag tu yod la/_'dus ma byas kyi chos ni bgrang zhing dpag pa thams cad dang bral ba ste/_sangs rgyas kyis 'dus byas kyi chos spangs shing /_'dus ma byas kyi chos mngon du mdzad de/_bgrang 
[\[162b\]]
[\[162b.1\]]ba dang dpag pa mi mnga' bas de'i phyir/_mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pas sems can dang /_chos kyi rang bzhin kun stong pa dang /_stong pa de las gzhan pa la'ang yod pa ma yin pa dang /_stong pa'i rang bzhin de nyid yang dag pa'i chos 
[\[162b.2\]]kyi sku yin pas de'i phyir/_de la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya ste/_rigs kyi bu chos bcu po de dag gis ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes bya'o/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las mi 'da' ba de 'ba' zhig ngo mtshar che ba ma yin gyis/_gzhan yang 
[\[162b.3\]]ngo mtshar du bya ba chos rnam pa bcu yod pa/_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o/_/bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_'khor ba ni skyon dang ldan pa mya ngan las 'das pa ni zhi zhing dben pa yin na/_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa de gnyis mnyam par mkhyen pas/_
[\[162b.4\]]'khor ba la yang mi gnas/_mya ngan las 'das pa la yang mi bzhugs shing /_gang sems can rnams kyi don la mi skyo ba de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas byis pa so so'i skye bo phyin ci log tu spyod pa dang /_nyon mongs pa 
[\[162b.5\]]sna tshogs kyis glags par gzigs kyang 'di dag rnam par grol bar bya'o/_/snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi/_sngon gyi thugs rje dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus sems can 'di dag so so'i dbang po dang /_rang bzhin can dang /_bsam pa ci la mos pa rtog pa mi mnga' 
[\[162b.6\]]bar lhun gyis grub pa'i tshul gyis/_phyi ma'i mthar thug pa med par phan 'dogs shing /_ston pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas sems can rnams la gsung rab yan lag bcu gnyis rgyas par bstan pas/_phan gdags 
[\[162b.7\]]so snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi/_sngon gyi thugs rje dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus sems can 'di dag la phyi ma'i mthar thug pa med par chos rgyas par ston pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong 
[\[163a\]]
[\[163a.1\]]'dab tu gshegs shing /_rgyal po dang /_blon po dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal rigs dang /_rje'u rigs dang /_dmangs rigs la sogs pa'i khyim du bsod snyoms blang ngo snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi/_sngon gyi sku dang /_gsung dang /_thugs kyi spyod 
[\[163a.2\]]pa la goms pa'i mthus/_lhun gyis grub par bsod snyoms la gshegs shing phan pa'i don mdzad pa de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku la sbrebs pa dang skyems pa yang mi mnga'/_bshang gci dang /_sku nyam chung ba yang 
[\[163a.3\]]mi mnga' bar bsod snyoms len par snang yang /_de la gsol ba yang med/_de'i rnam par rtog pa yang mi mnga' mod kyi/_sems can la phan gdags pa'i phyir/_bsod snyoms gsol bar yang snang ba de ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod pa lhun gyis grub 
[\[163a.4\]]pa'o/_/gang de bzhin gshegs pas sems can 'di dag gi dbang po rab dang /_'bring dang /_tha ma ji lta ba bzhin du chos bstan to snyam du mi dgongs mod kyi/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyis so so'i dbang po dang snod ji lta bu yin pa rtog pa mi mnga' bar rab tu 
[\[163a.5\]]mkhyen cing /_de dag la chos ston pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas sems can 'di dag ni/_gus pa med pa rtag tu tshig rtsub pos ngan du smra ba yin pas/_'di dag dang /_lhan cig mi smra'o/_/sems can 'di dag ni nga 
[\[163a.6\]]la rtag tu gus par byed pa/_bstod cing snyan par smra ba yin pas/_'di dag dang lhan cig smra bar bya'o zhes de bzhin gshegs pa mi dgongs te/_byams pa dang /_thugs rjes mnyam par dgongs shing gnyis su med pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o/_/
[\[163a.7\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la byams sdang dang /_nga rgyal dang /_'dod pa dang /_ser sna la sogs pa'i nyon mongs pa mi mnga' mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa ni rtag par dben pa la dgyes shing /_'du 'dzi thams cad spangs te/_'dod pa chung ba la bsngags pa mdzad 
[\[163b\]]
[\[163b.1\]]pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa ni chos 'ga' tsam yang mi mkhyen pa'am/_thugs su ma chud pa mi mnga' ba dang /_gnas thams cad du me long lta bu'i ye shes mngon du gyur pas/_rnam par mi rtog mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[163b.2\]]pas sems can 'di dag gi las dang spyod pa la gzigs nas/_de dag gi bsam pa dang mthun par sbyor bas/_thabs kyis 'dren cing 'khor ba las sgrol ba de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pas sems can gang dag phyug cing dar ba gzigs 
[\[163b.3\]]na yang dgyes pa mi skye/_rgud pa dang dma' ba gzigs na yang thugs ngal mi mdzad mod kyi/_de bzhin gshegs pa sems can de dag yang dag pa'i spyod pa sgrub pa gzigs nas/_thogs pa med pa'i thugs rje chen pos skyob par mdzad do/_/sems can la la log par spyod 
[\[163b.4\]]pa gzigs na yang /_chags pa med pa'i thugs rje chen pos skyob cing 'dzin pa de ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi spyod pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yang dag pa'i spyod pa mtha' med par 
[\[163b.5\]]bstan pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa yang dag pa bden pa'i mtshan nyid du 'du shes par gyis shig_/skabs gzhan dag tu mya ngan las 'da' ba dang /_ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag ces bya ba de ni thabs mkhas pa bstan pa ste/_sems can rnams kyi mchod 
[\[163b.6\]]pa dang /_rim gro byed pa de dag kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i thugs rje dang dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthu yin par blta bar bya'o/_/de la gang zhig mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed pa de ni/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_mi khom pa brgyad yongs su spangs te/_de bzhin gshegs pa 
[\[163b.7\]]rnams dang phrad cing /_dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang ldan pa dang /_byang chub kyi sems mi gtong ba dang /_bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'phel ba dang /_'khor ba las myur du 'da' zhing 'khor ba'i 'ching bas glags par mi 'gyur ba'i spyod pa dam pa 'di yin pas/_khyed 
[\[164a\]]
[\[164a.1\]]kyis nan tan du bsgrub cing g.yel ba med par bya'o/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/_bcom ldan 'das mya ngan las mi 'da' ba'i don dang /_bzod pa zab mo bstan pa/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon du thos nas/_thal mo sbyar ba 
[\[164a.2\]]btud de/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/deng gzod bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa ston pa chen po mya ngan las mi 'da' ba dang /_ring bsrel 'jig rten du bzhag cing /_sems can rnams la phan pa rgya cher mdzad pa/_'di 'tshal bar gyur nas/_lus dang sems dga' zhing 
[\[164a.3\]]rangs pa ngo mtshar du gyur to/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad 'di bstan pa na/_grangs med dpag tu med cing mtha' yas pa'i sems can de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems skyes so/_/de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang mi snang 
[\[164a.4\]]bar gyur nas/_byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog kyang stan las langs nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_slar yang rang gi gnas de nyid du 'dug go/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tshe'i tshad bstan 
[\[164a.5\]]pa zhes bya ste le'u gnyis pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te thal mo sbyar nas/_
[\[164a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la phyag 'tshal te/_gser dang rin po che'i me tog dang /_rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang /_gdugs dam pas mchod pa byas nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de 
[\[164a.7\]]bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi dgongs pa shin tu zab pa de/_tshul bzhin ji ltar bsgrub par bgyi zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu legs par rab tu nyon la yid la zung shig dang /_khyod la de'i don rnam par phye ste bstan par 
[\[164b\]]
[\[164b.1\]]bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la sku rnam pa gsum mnga' ste/_gsum gang zhe na/_sprul pa'i sku dang /_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /_chos kyi sku'o/_/'di lta bu sku gsum lhun gyis grub pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[164b.2\]]byang chub 'dzin te/_gang gis de mngon du gyur pa rnams 'khor ba las 'byung bar byed do/_/de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas sprul pa'i sku shes par bya zhe na/_rigs kyi bu de ni de bzhin gshegs pa sngon sa rnam par sbyong ba'i dus na/_skye bo thams cad kyi phyir chos rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[164b.3\]]sgrub bo/_/de ltar spyod pa sbyangs pas rnal 'byor gyi mthar phyin pa yin no/_/rnal 'byor de'i stobs kyis dbang chen po thob bo/_/dbang chen po'i mthus skye bo'i bsam pa ji lta ba dang /_spyod pa ji lta ba dang /_khams ji lta ba bzhin du thams cad mngon du gyur nas/_dus la mi gzhes 
[\[164b.4\]]dus las mi 'da'/_gnas dang mthun pa/_dus dang mthun pa/_spyod pa dang mthun pa/_chos bshad pa dang yang mthun par sku rnam pa sna tshogs ston pa de ni sprul pa'i sku zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na byang chub sems dpas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku shes par bya zhe na/_de bzhin 
[\[164b.5\]]gshegs pa thams cad kyis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la thogs pa med pa thob par bya ba'i phyir/_don dam pa'i bden pa ston te/_'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'da' ba ro gcig pa nyid du shes par bya ba dang /_'jig tshogs la lta ba bsal nas/_sems can 'jigs par gyur pa 
[\[164b.6\]]rnams dga' bar bya ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams mtha' yas pa'i rgyur gyur pas/_bden pa nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes dang mthun par sngon gyi smon lam gyi mthus/_sku de ston par 'gyur te/_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang /_dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus 
[\[164b.7\]]brgyan pa/_'od sku la 'khor ba grub pa de ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la ji ltar na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen pos chos kyi sku shes par bya zhe na/_nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa thams cad dang bral ba/_dge ba'i chos thams cad rdzogs pa'i phyir/_
[\[165a\]]
[\[165a.1\]]de kho na nyid dang yang dag pa'i ye shes nyid tsam du gnas pa/_de ni chos kyi sku zhes bya'o/_/sku snga ma de gnyis ni btags pa tsam mo/_/chos kyi sku ni yang dag pa ste/_sku de gnyis kyi gzhi byed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_chos kyi sku de bzhin nyid dang /_rnam 
[\[165a.2\]]par mi rtog pa'i ye shes las gud na sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos gang yang med pa'i phyir ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni ye shes phun sum tshogs pa nyon mongs pa thams cad spangs pa'i phyir mthar phyin pas/_sangs rgyas kyi rnam par dag pa brnyes pa'i phyir chos kyi de kho na nyid dang 
[\[165a.3\]]yang dag pa'i ye shes kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams yongs su 'dzin to/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad ni bdag dang gzhan gyi don gyi mthar phyin pa ste/_de la chos kyi de bzhin nyid kyis ni bdag gi don mdzad/_de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyis ni gzhan gyi don mdzad do/_/
[\[165a.4\]]bdag dang gzhan la phan pa'i don mdzad pa la dbang brnyes pa'i phyir mdzad pa mtha' yas pa sna tshogs lhun gyis grub bo/_/de bas na sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos dpag tu med pa mtha' yas pa/_rnam pa mang po khyad par du bstan to/_/rigs kyi bu dper na rnam par rtog pa'i sems 
[\[165a.5\]]la brten nas/_nyon mongs pa rnam pa mang po dang /_las rnam pa mang po dang /_'bras bu rnam pa mang po ston pa de bzhin du/_chos kyi chos nyid dang de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la brten nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_rang sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_nyan 
[\[165a.6\]]thos kyi chos rnam pa sna tshogs mang po ston to/_/chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la brten nas/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos la dbang phun sum tshogs pa brnyes pa de ni dam pa dpag par dka' ba yin no/_/dper na nam mkha' la ri mo bris te/_rgyan du byas pa de 
[\[165a.7\]]ni dpag par dka' ba yin no/_/de bzhin du yang dag pa'i chos dang /_yang dag pa'i ye shes la brten nas/_sangs rgyas kyi chos rnams bsgrub pa yang dpag par dka' ba yin no/_/rigs kyi bu ji ltar na/_chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la rnam par 
[\[165b\]]
[\[165b.1\]]rtog pa mi mnga' zhing /_phrin las la mnga' brnyes pa yin zhe na/_rigs kyi bu dper na de bzhin gshegs pa mya ngan las 'das kyang smon lam la mnga' brnyes pas phrin las kyi rnam pa thams cad kyang mdzad de/_de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes kyis don 
[\[165b.2\]]thams cad grub par mnga' mdzad pa'ang de bzhin no/_/gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po ting nge 'dzin du snyoms par zhugs pa las sngon gyi smon lam gyi dbang gis/_bsam gtan de las bzhengs te/_don dang phrin las thams cad mdzad pa ltar chos 
[\[165b.3\]]rnam pa gnyis kyang rnam par rtog pa med par don thams cad mdzad pa la mnga' brnyes pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu dper na/_nyi ma dang /_zla ba la yang rnam par rtog pa med/_chu dang me long la yang rnam par rtog pa med/_snang ba la yang rnam par rtog pa med mod kyi/_gsum 'dus 
[\[165b.4\]]pa las gzugs brnyan 'byung ngo /_/de bzhin du chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la yang rnam par rtog pa med mod kyi/_smon lam gyi dbang gis sems can skal ba can dag la longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku dang /_sprul pa'i sku yang nyi zla'i gzugs brnyan bzhin/_
[\[165b.5\]]rgyu dang rkyen 'dus pa las 'byung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang dper na/_tshad med grangs med pa'i chu dang me long dag ni snang ba la brten nas/_stong pa'i gzugs brnyan mtshan nyid tha dad pa dag snang ngo /_/stong pa zhes bya ba ni mtshan nyid med pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de bzhin du longs spyod 
[\[165b.6\]]rdzogs pa'i sku dang /_sprul pa'i skus ni 'khor rnams la chos kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan ston par smon lam gyi dbang gis sku de gnyis snang ste/_mtshan ma sna tshogs su snang yang chos kyi sku'i gnas la ni mtshan nyid tha dad pa med do/_/rigs kyi bu sku de gnyis la gnas te/_sangs rgyas 
[\[165b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams phung po lhag ma dang bcas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes gsung ngo /_/chos kyi sku las dgongs te/_phung po'i lhag ma med pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa zhes gsung ngo /_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_der ni chos thams cad zad pa'i mthar gyur pa'i phyir sku 'di gsum 
[\[166a\]]
[\[166a.1\]]la brten nas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams mi gnas pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa zhes bshad do/_/sku gnyis la ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes mi gsung ste/_chos kyi sku las gzhan pa'i sangs rgyas med pa'i phyir ro/_/ci'i phyir sku gnyis 
[\[166a.2\]]po la mya ngan las 'das pa zhes mi bya zhe na/_sku de gnyis ni yang dag pa ma yin pa btags pa tsam pas/_skad cig tu skye zhing 'gag pa rtag par mi gnas pa dang /_yang dang yang du 'byung bas ma nges pa ltar chos kyi sku ni de lta ma yin no//_//bam po gnyis pa/_/de'i 
[\[166a.3\]]phyir sku de gnyis ni mya ngan las 'das pa zhes mi bya'o/_/chos kyi sku yang de dang mi gnyis pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa la gnas pa ma yin pas/_sku de gsum la brten te/_mi gnas pa'i phyir mya ngan las 'das pa zhes gsung ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de la byis pa so so'i skye bo 
[\[166a.4\]]rnams ni mtshan nyid gsum gyi phyir 'ching ba dang /_sgrib pa yod pas sku gsum las ring du gyur to/_/gsum gang zhe na/_kun brtags pa'i mtshan nyid dang /_gzhan gyi dbang gi mtshan nyid dang /_yongs su grub pa'i mtshan nyid do/_/mtshan nyid de rnams shes pa dang /_
[\[166a.5\]]'gog pa dang /_dag par ma gyur pa de'i phyir sku gsum ma thob bo/_/de lta bu'i mtshan nyid gsum shes pa dang /_'gog pa dang rnam par byang bar gyur pas/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams sku gsum yongs su rdzogs par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu byis pa so so'i skye bo 
[\[166a.6\]]rnams kyis/_rnam par shes pa gsum ma spangs pa'i phyir sku gsum las ring du gyur to/_/gsum gang zhe na/_dngos po la 'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa dang /_kun gzhi la gnas pa'i yid dang /_kun gzhi rnam par shes pa'o/_/lam sbyong ba dag la gnas pas 'jug pa'i 
[\[166a.7\]]rnam par shes pa sbyong ngo /_/gcod pa'i lam la gnas pas/_kun gzhi la gnas pa'i yid sbyong ngo /_/mchog tu rgyal ba'i lam la gnas pas/_kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa sbyangs so/_/'jug pa'i rnam par shes pa sbyangs na/_sprul pa'i sku mngon du 'gyur ro/_/kun gzhi 
[\[166b\]]
[\[166b.1\]]la gnas pa'i yid sbyangs pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ston to/_/kun gzhi'i rnam par shes pa sbyangs pas ni/_chos kyi sku 'thob ste/_de ltar na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad sku gsum lhun gyis grub pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i sku ni 
[\[166b.2\]]sangs rgyas thams cad dang /_spyod pa mthun pa'o/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang dgongs pa mthun pa'o/_/chos kyi sku ni sangs rgyas thams cad dang sku mthun pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa'i sku ni skye bo so so'i yid dang mthun par rnam pa mang pos 
[\[166b.3\]]mtshan ma sna tshogs ston pa'i phyir mang po zhes bya'o/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni 'khor rnams kyi bsam pa gcig pas/_mtshan nyid gcig pa'i phyir mtshan nyid gcig ces bya'o/_/chos kyi sku ni mtshan ma sna tshogs las yang dag par 'das pa/_mtshan mar gzung ba'i spyod 
[\[166b.4\]]yul ma yin pa ste/_de bas na gcig pa yang ma yin/_tha dad pa yang ma yin pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu/_sprul pa'i sku ni longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten te mngon par snang ngo /_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni chos kyi sku la brten te mngon par snang ngo /_/chos kyi sku ni 
[\[166b.5\]]yang dag pa ste/_ci la yang mi gnas pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu sku de gsum ni rtag par bshad pa'i rnam grangs kyang yod/_mi rtag par bshad pa'i rnam grangs kyang yod do/_/sprul pa'i sku ni thabs mkhas pas rnam pa thams cad du dmigs pa ji lta ba bzhin du rgyun mi 'chad par chos kyi 
[\[166b.6\]]'khor lo bskor ba'i phyir rtag pa zhes bya'o/_/de gzhir ma gyur pas mdzad pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa mngon du mi ston pa'i phyir mi rtag pa zhes bya'o/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ni thog ma med pa'i dus nas rgyun mi 'chad cing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos ma 'dres pas yongs su 'dzin cing sdud 
[\[166b.7\]]pa'i phyir/_sems can zad pa med pas/_spyod pa yang mi zad de/_de'i phyir rtag pa zhes bya'o/_/de yang gzhir ma gyur pa'i phyir mdzad pa chen po phun sum tshogs pa mngon du mi ston pas mi rtag pa zhes bya'o/_/chos kyi sku ni 'du byed kyi chos ma yin pa mtshan ma tha dad pa med pa rtsa ba dang 
[\[167a\]]
[\[167a.1\]]gzhir gyur pa'i phyir/_nam mkha' ji lta ba bzhin pas de ni rtag pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes las gud na 'phags pa'i ye shes med do/_/de bzhin nyid kyi chos nyid las kyang lhag pa'i spyod yul med do/_/de ni chos kyi de 
[\[167a.2\]]bzhin nyid dang /_ye shes kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid de gnyis kyi de bzhin nyid ni gcig pa yang ma yin tha dad pa yang ma yin pas de'i phyir chos kyi sku ni ye shes rnam par dag pa dang /_spangs pa rnam par dag pa gnyis kyi phyir/_chos kyi sku ni rnam par dag pa phun sum 
[\[167a.3\]]tshogs pa zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang sku 'di gsum dbye ba la yang rnam pa bzhi ste/_sprul pa'i sku yin la/_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa yang yod/_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin la/_sprul pa'i sku ma yin pa yang yod/_sprul pa'i sku yin la/_longs 
[\[167a.4\]]spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin pa yang yod/_sprul pa'i sku yang ma yin la/_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang ma yin pa'o/_/sprul pa'i sku yin la/_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku ma yin pa gang zhe na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mya ngan las 'das su zin kyang /_smon lam gyi dbang 
[\[167a.5\]]gis skal ba ji lta ba bzhin phan 'dogs pa ni sprul pa'i sku zhes bya'o/_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yin la/_sprul pa'i sku ma yin pa gang zhe na/_sa'i snga rol pa'i sku'o/_/sprul pa'i sku yang yin la/_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang yin pa de gang zhe na/_lhag ma dang bcas 
[\[167a.6\]]pa'i mya ngan las 'das pa'i sku'o/_/sprul pa'i sku yang ma yin la/_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku yang ma yin pa de ni chos kyi sku'o/_/rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku de ni chos gnyis su med pa mngon du gyur pa'o/_/gnyis gang zhe na/_chos kyi sku de la mtshan nyid dang /_mtshan nyid kyi gzhi 
[\[167a.7\]]gnyi ga med pa ste/_yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin/_gcig pa yang ma yin/_tha dad pa yang ma yin/_bgrang ba yang ma yin/_bgrang bar mi bya ba yang ma yin/_snang ba yang ma yin/_mun pa yang ma yin pa ste/_de lta bu'i de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes la mtshan nyid dang /_
[\[167b\]]
[\[167b.1\]]mtshan nyid kyi gzhir yang mi dmigs/_yod pa dang med par yang mi dmigs/_gcig pa dang tha dad par yang mi dmigs/_bgrang bar yang mi dmigs/_bgrang bar mi bya bar yang mi dmigs/_snang ba dang mun par yang mi dmigs pa ste/_'di ltar spyod yul rnam par dag 
[\[167b.2\]]pa dang /_ye shes rnam par dag pa de dbyer med pa/_bar mtshams med pa 'gog pa dang lam gyi gzhir gyur pa ste/_de'i phyir na chos kyi sku de ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzad pa sna tshogs mngon du gyur pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu sku 'di ni rgyu dang rkyen dang spyod yul dang /_gnas dang 'bras 
[\[167b.3\]]bu dag gzhi nyid la brten pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_don de mngon par shes na/_sku de nyid theg pa chen po'o/_/de nyid de bzhin gshegs pa'i ngo bo nyid do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i snying po ste/_sku de la brten nas/_sems dang po skyed pa dang /_sa yongs su sbyangs pa'i sems 
[\[167b.4\]]mngon par 'byung ste/_sa las phyir mi ldog pa'i sems kyang mngon du 'gyur ba dang /_skye ba gcig gis thogs pa la gnas pa'i sems dang /_rdo rje lta bu'i ting nge 'dzin dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs pa yang mngon par 'byung /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i dam pa'i chos tshad med
