[\[167b.5\]]grangs med pa thams cad kyang mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi sku la brten nas bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po yang mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi sku 'di la brten nas ye shes chen po thams cad kyang snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na sku gnyis ni ting nge 'dzin 
[\[167b.6\]]dang ye shes la brten nas 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi sku 'di ni rang gi ngo bo nyid la brten pas rtag pa zhes bya'o/_/bdag ces bya'o/_/ting nge 'dzin chen po la brten pas na bde ba zhes bya'o/_/ye shes chen po la brten pas na rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/_de'i phyir de bzhin gshegs 
[\[167b.7\]]pa rtag par bde ba dang /_rnam par dag pa la mnga' brnyes shing bzhugs pa'o/_/ting nge 'dzin chen po la brten nas/_dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin la sogs pa'i ting nge 'dzin thams cad dang /_chos dran pa nye bar gzhag pa la sogs pa/_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa thams 
[\[168a\]]
[\[168a.1\]]cad dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_gzungs thams cad dang /_mngon par shes pa thams cad dang /_dbang thams cad dang /_mnyam pa nyid kyi chos thams cad 'dzin pa la sogs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon par 'byung ngo /_/
[\[168a.2\]]ye shes chen po la brten pas ni stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa bzhi dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi la sogs pa ma 'dres pa'i chos brgya brgyad cu dang /_rmad du byung ba thams cad dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i chos thams cad mngon du 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste dper na/_
[\[168a.3\]]yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che la brten nas rin po che rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med grangs med pa thams cad snang bar 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin du ting nge 'dzin chen po'i rin po che dang ye shes chen po'i rin po che la brten pas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dam pa'i chos rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med grangs med pa 
[\[168a.4\]]mngon du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na chos kyi sku dang /_ting nge 'dzin dang /_ye shes ni mtshan ma thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/_mtshan mas mi gos pa/_rnam par mi rtog pa/_rtag pa'ang ma yin/_chad pa'ang ma yin pa ste/_de ni dbu ma'i lam sgrub 
[\[168a.5\]]pa zhes bya'o/_/rnam par rtog pa yod par snang yang /_ngo bo nyid la ni rnam par rtog pa yang med/_gsum du bgrang ba yang yod mod kyi/_dngos po gsum du'ang med do/_/'phel ba dang 'grib pa med pa de ni rmi lam dang sgyu ma lta bu ste/_gzung ba yang med/_'dzin pa yang med 
[\[168a.6\]]do/_/chos kyi ngo bo'i de bzhin nyid ni rnam par grol ba'i gnas te/_'chi bdag gi spyod yul las yang dag par 'das pa/_'khor ba'i mun pa las mngon du rgal ba/_skye bo thams cad kyis bsgrub par mi nus pa/_mthar phyin par mi nus pa/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub 
[\[168a.7\]]sems dpa' thams cad kyis bzhugs par bya ba'i gnas so/_/rigs kyi bu dper na/_gang la la zhig gser 'dod de/_gnas kun du btsal ba las gser gyi sbram bu rnyed nas sbram bu de zhib tu btags te/_snying po bzhu zhing sbyangs nas rnam par byang bar gyur pa dang /_gser de 
[\[168b\]]
[\[168b.1\]]gdu bu la sogs pa/_rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs pa yid bzhin du bsgyur te/_spyad kyang gser gyi rang bzhin nyid ni mi 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang 'jig rten gyi dge bar spyod par mos pa des/_de bzhin 
[\[168b.2\]]gshegs pa'am/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor de dag mthong ste/_nye bar bsnyen nas de la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das dge ba ni gang /_mi dge ba ni gang /_yang dag pa'i bsgrub pa gang bgyis pas/_rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa thob par 'gyur/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams 
[\[168b.3\]]dang /_de'i 'khor dag gis de skad ces 'dri ba la 'di snyam du dgongs te/_rigs kyi bu dang rigs kyi bu mo 'di dag ni/_dam pa'i chos nyan par mos pa dang /_rnam par byang bar 'dod pa ste/_'di dag la yang dag pa'i chos bstan to snyam mo/_/de thos nas kyang tshul bzhin 
[\[168b.4\]]du yid la bya ste/_nan tan gyis bsam pa skyes shing /_brtson par gyur pa'i mthus/_le lo'i sgrib pa dang /_sdig pa mi dge ba'i chos thams cad bsal te/_bslab pa'i gnas thams cad la rab tu gus par gnas shing /_sems bying ba dang /_rgod pa dag bsal te sa dang 
[\[168b.5\]]po la 'jug go/_/sa dang po'i sems la brten nas/_sems can mang po'i don la brtson pa la sgrib pa spangs pas/_sa gnyis pa la 'jug go/_/sa de las nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa spangs nas/_sa gsum pa la 'jug go/_/sa de las sems rnam par sbyong ba la sgrib pa spangs 
[\[168b.6\]]nas/_sa bzhi pa la 'jug go/_/sa de las thabs mkhas pa'i sgrib pa spangs nas/_sa lnga pa la 'jug go/_/sa de las don dam pa dang kun rdzob tu dmigs pa'i sgrib pa spangs nas/_sa drug pa la 'jug go/_/sa de las mtshan ma dang spyod pa la dmigs pa'i sgrib pa spangs nas/_/
[\[168b.7\]]sa bdun pa la 'jug go/_/sa de las mtshan ma 'gog par yang mi dmigs pa'i sgrib pa spangs nas/_sa brgyad pa la 'jug go/_/sa de las mtshan ma skye bar yang mi dmigs pa'i sgrib pa spangs nas/_sa dgu pa la 'jug go/_/sa de las drug pa mngon par shes pa'i sgrib pa 
[\[169a\]]
[\[169a.1\]]spangs nas/_sa bcu pa la 'jug go/_/sa de las shes bya'i sgrib pa dang /_kun gzhi rnam par shes pa spangs pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa la 'jug go/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa ni rnam par dag pa gsum gyi phyir/_rab tu rnam par dag pa 
[\[169a.2\]]zhes bya'o/_/gsum gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_nyon mongs pa rnam par dag pa dang /_sdug bsngal rnam par dag pa dang /_mtshan ma rnam par dag pa ste/_ji ltar gser bzang po bzhu zhing btul te/_sbyangs pa la rdul dang dri mas phyir mi gos shing /_rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i 
[\[169a.3\]]gser nyid du snang ste/_gser gyi dngos po rnam par dag pa yang med par gyur pa ma yin pa bzhin no/_/dper na chu rnyog pa can dngas te/_rnam par dngas nas chu'i rang bzhin nyid gsal bar gyur pa yin gyi/_chu de nyid med par gyur pa yang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chos kyi sku yang nyon 
[\[169a.4\]]mongs pa dang /_sdug bsngal sna tshogs 'dus pa spangs nas/_bag chags ma lus par bsal te/_sangs rgyas kyi ngo bo nyid rnam par dag pa nyid snang bar gyur pa yin gyi/_dngos po med par gyur pa nyid ni ma yin no/_/yang dper na nam mkha' la du ba dang /_sprin dang /_rdul 
[\[169a.5\]]dang /_na bun gyis bsgribs pa de med par gyur na/_nam mkha'i khams de rnam par dag par gyur pa yin gyi/_nam mkha' de nyid med par gyur pa ni ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chos kyi sku nyon mongs pa thams cad zad pa'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya'i/_sku nyid med par gyur pa ni ma 
[\[169a.6\]]yin no/_/gzhan yang dper na 'ga' zhig gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na chu chen pos khyer nas/_lus dang rkang lag bskyod de/_lus dang sems 'bad pa dang bcas pas pha rol gyi 'gram du phyin pa rmi'o/_/rmi lam de las sad pa dang /_chu dang phan tshun gyi 'gram tha dad par yod 
[\[169a.7\]]pa mthong ba med kyang /_sems nyid med pa ni ma yin no/_/'khor bar rnam par rtog pa zad pa yang blo rnam par dag pa ste/_sangs rgyas pa de med pa yang ma yin no/_/de bzhin du chos kyi dbyings la rnam par rtog pa thams cad mi skye ba'i phyir rnam par dag pa zhes bya ste/_sangs 
[\[169b\]]
[\[169b.1\]]rgyas rnams kyi yang dag pa'i sku ni med pa ma yin no/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi bu chos kyi sku ni nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa rnam par dag pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku snang bar 'gyur ro/_/las kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag pas sprul pa'i sku snang bar 'gyur ro/_/ye shes kyi sgrib pa rnam par dag 
[\[169b.2\]]pas chos kyi sku snang bar 'gyur ro/_/dper na nam mkha' stong pa la brten nas glog 'byung ngo /_/glog la brten te 'od snang ngo /_/de bzhin du chos kyi sku la brten te/_longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku snang ngo /_/longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku la brten te sprul pa'i sku snang ngo /_/de la rang bzhin rnam 
[\[169b.3\]]par dag pa'i phyir chos kyi sku snang ngo /_/ye shes rnam par dag pas longs spyod rdzogs pa'i sku snang ngo /_/ting nge 'dzin rnam par dag pas sprul pa'i sku snang ngo /_/de gsum rnam par dag pa ni chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_gzhan ma yin pa'i de bzhin nyid dang /_ro gcig pa'i de bzhin nyid 
[\[169b.4\]]dang /_rnam par grol ba'i de bzhin nyid dang /_mthas klas pa'i de bzhin nyid kyi phyir/_sangs rgyas thams cad ni sku tha mi dad pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang /_de bzhin gshegs pa ni bdag gi ston pa chen po'o/_/zhes smra zhing mos pa de ni/_de bzhin 
[\[169b.5\]]gshegs pa'i sku gnyis su med par bsam pa thag pas shes pa yin no/_/rigs kyi bu de'i phyir spyod yul thams cad la yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rtog pa yongs su bsal bas/_chos de dag la mtshan nyid gnyis su med pa dang /_rnam par rtog pa med pa 'phags pa rnams kyis bsgrub par 
[\[169b.6\]]bya ba de la ji lta ji ltar gnyis su med pa'i tshul gyis yang dag par bsgrubs pas/_de lta de ltar sgrib pa thams cad sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_/ji tsam du sgrib pa byang bar gyur pa de tsam du chos kyi de bzhin nyid dang /_de bzhin nyid kyi ye shes rnam par dag pa mchog thob par 'gyur ro/_/ci tsam du 
[\[169b.7\]]chos kyi dbyings dang /_de bzhin nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i ye shes rnam par dag pa de bzhin du dbang phun sum tshogs pa thams cad kyang 'dzin cing yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa thams cad kyang sbyong bar 'gyur ro/_/sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_de ni yang dag 
[\[170a\]]
[\[170a.1\]]pa nyid dang /_yang dag pa'i ye shes dang /_bden pa'i mtshan nyid du mthong na/_de ni yang dag pa zhes bya/_'phags pa'i gzigs pa zhes bya/_yang dag pa bden pa'i tshul du sangs rgyas mthong ba zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshul bzhin du 
[\[170a.2\]]chos nyid mthong ba'i phyir/_sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gzigs pa zhes bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas ni khams gsum las mngon par 'byung zhing yang dag pa'i mtha' las gzhol bas/_
[\[170a.3\]]'phags pa'i gang zag de lta bus mthong bar mi nus so/_/de ma mthong bas byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams ni thams cad kyang phyin ci log gis bslad pa dang /_log pa'i rnam par rtog pas shes par mi nus te/_dper na shin tu mthu chung ba'i ri bong gi rkyal gyis rgya mtsho mi rgal ba 
[\[170a.4\]]bzhin du byis pa so so'i skye bo'i shes pas chos kyi de bzhin nyid mngon par shes par mi nus so/_/'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par rtog pa med par chos thams cad la dbang chen po brnyes pa/_rnam par dag pa'i ye shes zab mo dang ldan pa rnams kyi rang gi spyod yul yin te/_gzhan 
[\[170a.5\]]dang thun mong du ma gyur pa'o/_/de'i phyir sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni bskal pa tshad med grangs med par sku dang srog mi phangs par dka' ba spyad pas shin tu mchog dam pa/_bla na med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_tshig dang brjod pa'i spyod yul las 'das pa/_shin tu zhi ba/_
[\[170a.6\]]'jigs pa thams cad dang bral ba'i sku de brnyes par gyur to/_/rigs kyi bu de lta bu'i chos kyi chos nyid shes shing mthong ba ni/_skye ba dang /_rga ba dang /_na ba dang /_'chi ba med pas/_yun ring du 'tsho ba'o/_/gnyid kyis log pa dang /_bkres pa dang /_skom pa med par sems 
[\[170a.7\]]rtag par ting nge 'dzin du gnas te/_g.yo zhing spros pa med pa'o/_/gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa la spros pa dang bcas pa'i sems bskyed na/_des ni de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gang zhig de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis/_bshad pa 'di ni phan pa dang bcas 
[\[170b\]]
[\[170b.1\]]pa ste/_sus mdo 'di thos pa de gcan gzan dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_skye bo mi bgrungs pa rnams dang yang phrad par mi 'gyur ro/_/chos 'di thos pa'i 'bras bu rnam par smin pa yang zad par mi 'gyur ro/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni lung du mi ston pa dang yul thams 
[\[170b.2\]]cad la mkhyen par bzhed pa'i dgongs pa mi mnga'o/_/'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa la dgongs pa tha dad pa mi mnga'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa la ma brtags pa'i lung ston pa mi mnga'o/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams ni spyod lam rnam pa bzhir ye shes kyis ma bzung ba 
[\[170b.3\]]med do/_/chos thams cad la thugs rjes ma zin pa med do/_/sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde bas ma bzung ba med do/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las gser 'od dam pa'i mdo sde 'di thos te mos na de sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /_yi 
[\[170b.4\]]dgas dang /_lha ma yin gyi gnas su nam yang mi ltung ngo /_/rtag tu lha dang /_mi'i gnas su skye ste/_dman par mi skye ba dang /_rtag tu sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la bsnyen bkur byed cing /_dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang /_'dzin pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa 
[\[170b.5\]]dag tu skye bar yang 'gyur te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_de ni chos shin tu zab mo 'di thos pa'i phyir ro/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pas/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par yang mkhyen cing /_lung 
[\[170b.6\]]yang ston to/_/gang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo la las shin tu zab mo dam pa'i chos 'di rna lam du lan cig tsam thos na yang /_de ni de bzhin gshegs pa la dbang za bar mi 'gyur/_dam pa'i chos la mi dmod/_'phags pa rnams la mi brnyas/_skye dgu thams 
[\[170b.7\]]cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba ma skyes pa ni skyed par byed/_dge ba'i rtsa ba skyes pa rnams ni 'phel ba dang /_yongs su smin par byed cing /_'jig rten gyi khams na sems can ji snyed pa de dag pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ston par byed do/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i snying po 
[\[171a\]]
[\[171a.1\]]dang /_brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'i lha rnams stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu byas te/_thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_shin tu gus pa dang bcas pas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal 
[\[171a.2\]]nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'chad pa'i gnas de dang yul de dag tu phan pa'i yon tan rnam pa 'di bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_yul der rgyal po pha rol po'i dgra dang dpung dar bas mi tshugs 
[\[171a.3\]]pa dang /_nad thams cad bsal cing tshe ring ba dang /_bkra shis shing bde bas yang dag pa'i chos ston par byed do/_/btsun mo dang /_slas dang /_sras dang /_sras mo dang /_blon po rnams kyang 'dum zhing rtsod pa med pa dang /_gcam bu dang /_sgyus 'tsho ba spangs pas/_rgyal 
[\[171a.4\]]pos gnang zhing /_bkur bar 'gyur ba dang /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze la sogs pa rnams dam pa'i chos spyod cing /_nad med pa dang /_bde bas glo bur du 'chi ba med pa dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs thams cad sgrub cing yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_gang dus thams cad du 'byung ba 
[\[171a.5\]]chen po bzhi mi 'phrod pa med pa dang /_rtag par lha rnams kyis srung zhing skyob pa dang /_byams pa dang /_snying rje mnyam pas/_gnod pa med pa dang /_'tshe ba'i sems med pa dang /_sems can rnams dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su 'gro zhing /_byang chub sems 
[\[171a.6\]]dpa'i spyod pa sgrub par smon lam 'debs so/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag kyang rtag tu mdo sde 'di rgyas par bgyi ba'i slad du/_mdo sde 'di su 'dzin pa'i gang zag de'i gnas su mchi zhing phan gdags par bgyi'o zhes gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so 
[\[171a.7\]]zhes bka' stsal te/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin du khyod kyis kyang mdo sde'i rgyal po dam pa 'di 'jig rten na yun ring du gnas par bya ba'i phyir spel ba dang /_rgyas par bya ba la brtson par gyis shing /_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal 
[\[171b\]]
[\[171b.1\]]po las/_sku gsum rnam par dbye ba'i le'u ste gsum pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gnyid log pa'i rmi lam na/_gser gyi rnga kun du snang ba/_dper na nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo /_/phyogs thams cad na yang /_
[\[171b.2\]]sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das grangs med dpag tu med pa dag rin po che'i shing drung na/_rin po che bai DUr+ya'i khri rnams la bzhugs shing /_'khor brgya stong du mas yongs su bskor te/_mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston pa mthong ngo /_/de nas yang skyes bu bram ze'i gzugs lta bu 
[\[171b.3\]]zhig rnga de rdung ba mthong ste/_rnga'i sgra de las bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu dag byung ba thos so/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog sad ma thag tu bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag rjes su dran no/_/rjes su dran nas kyang /_de'i mtshan mo zad pa dang 
[\[171b.4\]]rgyal po'i khab kyi grong khyer chen po nas byung ste/_srog chags stong phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu bya rgod kyi phung po'i ri ga la ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba 
[\[171b.5\]]byas nas/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas/_byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog gis/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_rmi lam na rnga'i sgra las bstan pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gang dag thos pa de dag gsol 
[\[171b.6\]]to/_/nub gcig g.yel ba med par yang /_/bdag gi rmi lam rmis pa ni/_/mdzes pa'i rnga chen mthong ba ste/_/thams cad du ni gser gyi 'od/_/nyi ma ji lta bzhin du 'bar/_/kun du rnam par lhang nge ste/_/phyogs bcu rnams su snang bar 'gyur/_/kun du rin chen 
[\[171b.7\]]shing drung na/_/rin chen bai DUr+ya dag gi/_/khri la sangs rgyas rnams bzhugs te/_/brgya stong phrag ni du ma yi/_/'khor dbus mdun gyis bltas pa mthong /_/bram ze'i gzugs ni 'dra ba zhig_/rnga chen rab tu rdung bar mthong /_/de yis de la brdungs pa dang /_/tshigs 
[\[172a\]]
[\[172a.1\]]su bcad pa 'di dag byung /_/gser 'od dam pa'i rnga chen sgra yis ni/_/stong gsum 'jig rten 'jig rten gsum 'di na/_/ngan song sdug bsngal gshin rje'i sdug bsngal dang /_/dbul ba'i sdug bsngal sdug bsngal zhi bar shog_/rnga bo che yi sgra 
[\[172a.2\]]skad 'di yis ni/_/'jig rten rmongs pa thams cad zhi gyur cig_/ji ltar thub dbang 'jigs med 'jigs zhi ltar/_/sems can 'jigs med 'jigs dang bral bar shog_/ji ltar 'khor bar kun mkhyen thub dbang po/_/'phags pa'i yon tan kun dang 
[\[172a.3\]]ldan pa ltar/_/skye dgu ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag gi/_/yon tan ldan zhing yon tan rgya mtshor gyur/_/rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/_/sems can thams cad tshangs pa'i sgra ldan gyur/_/sangs rgyas byang chub dam pa mchog reg shog_/chos kyi 'khor lo dge 
[\[172a.4\]]ba bskor gyur cig_/bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab bzhugs par shog_/'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig_/nyon mongs 'joms gyur sdug bsngal sel bar shog_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi gyur cig_/sems can gang dag ngan song sar 
[\[172a.5\]]gnas te/_/rus pa'i lus la me lce rab 'bar ba/_/de dag rnga chen bsgrags pa thos gyur cig_/sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi gyur nas/_/sangs rgyas phyag 'tshal lo zhes tshig thos shog_/sems can kun gyi tshe rabs brgya dag dang /_/tshe rabs stong 
[\[172a.6\]]phrag bye bar skye dran shog_/thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig_/de dag gi ni rgya chen gsung thos shog_/rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang rtag tu 'grogs rnyed gyur/_/sdig pa'i las rnams rnam par spong bar shog_/bya ba dge ba 
[\[172a.7\]]rnams ni spyod gyur cig_/mi dang lha dang srog chags thams cad kyi/_/de dag bsam dang smon lam gang yin pa/_/rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/_/de dag rnams kyi re kun rdzogs gyur cig_/sems can gang dag sems dmyal mi bzad skyes/_/lus la me lce kun du rab tu 
[\[172b\]]
[\[172b.1\]]'bar/_/skyabs med mya ngan bcas shing yongs 'khyam pa/_/me rnams de dag rab tu zhi bar shog_/sems dmyal [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]mi yi 'jig rten na/_/sems can sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po gang /_/rnga bo che yi sgra skad 'di yis ni/_/de dag rnams kyi sdug 
[\[172b.2\]]bsngal kun zhi shog_/rten med dpung gnyen med pa dang /_/skyabs med par ni gyur pa dag_/de rnams la ni skyob pa dang /_/dpung gnyen rten mchog bdag gyur cig_/sangs rgyas rkang gnyis dam pa dag_/thugs brtse thugs rje ldan pa'i thugs/_/gang dag 
[\[172b.3\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/_/bzhugs pa bdag la dgongs su gsol/_/bdag gis sngon chad sdig pa'i las/_/shin tu mi bzad gang bgyis pa/_/stobs bcu'i spyan sngar bdag mchis te/_/de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/_/pha ma dag tu mi 'dzin 
[\[172b.4\]]dang /_/sangs rgyas rnams su mi 'dzin dang /_/dge ba dag tu mi 'dzin pas/_/sdig pa bdag gis gang bgyis dang /_/phyug cing rgyags pas dregs pa dang /_/rigs dang longs spyod rgyags pa dang /_/gzhon pa'i rgyags pas dregs pa yis/_/bdag gis 
[\[172b.5\]]sdig pa gang bgyis dang /_/nyes bsams nyes par smras pa dang /_/nyes par bgyis pa'i las rnams dang /_/nyes pa'i dmigs su ma bltas pas/_/bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang /_/byis pa'i blo yis 'jug pa dang /_/mi shes mun pa'i sems dang 
[\[172b.6\]]ni/_/sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang gyur dang /_/nyon mongs rnam par 'khrug sems dang /_/rtsed mo dga' ba'i dbang nyid dang /_/mya ngan dang ni nad dbang dang /_/nor gyi mi chog nyes pa yis/_/bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang /_/'phags min skye bo 'dre 
[\[172b.7\]]ba dang /_/phrag dog ser sna'i rgyu dang ni/_/g.yo dang dbul ba'i nyes pa yis/_/bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang /_/phongs pa 'byung ba'i dus kyi tshe/_/'dod pa rnams kyi 'jigs rgyu dang /_/phyug po ma yin gyur pa yis/_/bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis 
[\[173a\]]
[\[173a.1\]]dang /_/g.yo ba'i sems kyi dbang nyid dang /_/'dod dang khro ba'i dbang dag dang /_/bkres dang skom gyis nyen pa yis/_/bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang /_/bza' ba dag dang btung ba dang /_/bud med sgyu dang gos kyi phyir/_/nyon mongs 
[\[173a.2\]]gdung ba sna tshogs kyis/_/bdag gis sdig pa gang bgyis dang /_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis sdig_/nyes par spyad pa rnam gsum bsags/_/'di 'dra'i tshul gyis gang bgyis pa/_/de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang chos rnams 
[\[173a.3\]]dang /_/de bzhin nyan thos rnams la yang /_/gus pa ma lags gang bgyis pa/_/de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/gang yang rang sangs rgyas rnams dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yang /_/gus pa ma lags bgyis pa rnams/_/de dag 
[\[173a.4\]]thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/dam chos smra ba rnams la yang /_/gus pa ma lags bgyis pa dang /_/chos la'ang gus par ma bgyis pa/_/de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/bdag gis rtag tu mi shes pas/_/dam pa'i chos ni spangs pa dang /_/pha ma rnams 
[\[173a.5\]]la ma gus pa/_/de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/blun pa dang ni byis pa dang /_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug dang /_/nga rgyal dregs pas bsgribs bgyis pa/_/de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/bdag ni phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten du/_/stobs bcu rnams 
[\[173a.6\]]la mchod par shog_/bdag ni phyogs bcur 'jig rten rnams/_/sdug bsngal kun las 'don gyur cig_/sems can bsam gyis mi khyab kun/_/sa bcu dag la 'god par shog_/sa bcu dag la gnas nas kyang /_/thams cad de bzhin gshegs gyur cig_/
[\[173a.7\]]ji srid sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las/_/de kun thar bgyid nus srid du/_/sems can re re'i phyir yang ni/_/bskal pa bye bar spyod par shog_/gser 'od dam pa zhes bgyi ba/_/las rnams thams cad byang byed pa/_/zab mo dag ni ston pa 'di/_/sems can de dag ston gyur 
[\[173b\]]
[\[173b.1\]]cig_/gang gis bskal pa stong rnams su/_/sdig pa shin tu mi bzad bgyis/_/lan cig rab tu bshags pa yis/_/de dag thams cad byang bar 'gyur/_/gang gis las kyi sgrib pa rnams/_/myur du yang dag zad 'gyur ba/_/gser 'od dam pa dge ba yis/_/
[\[173b.2\]]bshags pas 'di dag bshags nas ni/_/rin chen 'byung gnas mchog bcu po/_/sa bcu la ni gnas par shog_/sangs rgyas yon tan snang gyur cig_/srid pa'i mtsho las sgrol bar shog_/sangs rgyas rgya mtsho chu bo dang /_/yon tan rgya mtsho zab mo de/_/sangs 
[\[173b.3\]]rgyas yon tan bsam yas kyis/_/thams cad mkhyen du rdzogs par shog_/ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong rnams dang /_/gzungs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab dang /_/dbang stobs byang chub yan lag gis/_/stobs bcu dam par 'gyur bar shog_/dgongs pa'i 
[\[173b.4\]]thugs kyis sangs rgyas rnams/_/bdag la rnam par gzigs su gsol/_/thugs rjer ldan pa'i thugs kyis ni/_/nongs pa rab tu gzung du gsol/_/bdag gis bskal pa brgya rnams su/_/sngon chad sdig pa gang bgyis pa/_/de phyir bdag ni mya ngan sems/_/
[\[173b.5\]]phongs dang mya ngan 'jigs pas gzir/_/sdig pa'i las la 'jigs par bgyid/_/yid ni rtag tu dman par gyur/_/gang dang gang du 'gro bgyid pa/_/bdag ni gang du'ang dga' ma mchis/_/sangs rgyas thams cad thugs rjer ldan/_/'gro ba kun gyi 'jigs 
[\[173b.6\]]sel bas/_/nongs pa rab tu gzung du gsol/_/'jigs pa dag las bdag thar mdzod/_/bdag gi nyon mongs las rnams kyi/_/dri ma de bzhin gshegs pas sol/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis bdag la ni/_/thugs rje chu yis bkru bar gsol/_/sdig pa 
[\[173b.7\]]thams cad bshags par bgyi/_/sngon chad bdag gis gang bgyis dang /_/da ltar bdag gis sdig pa gang /_/de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/nongs par bgyis pa'i las rnams kun/_/slan chad mi bgyi bsdam par bgyi/_/bdag gis nongs par bgyis 
[\[174a\]]
[\[174a.1\]]pa gang /_/sdig de bcab par mi bgyi'o/_/lus kyi las ni rnam gsum dang /_/ngag gi rnam pa bzhi dag dang /_/yid kyi rnam pa gsum po rnams/_/de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/lus kyis bgyis dang ngag gi las/_/yid kyis rnam 
[\[174a.2\]]par bsams pa dang /_/las rnams bcu po bgyis pa dag_/de dag thams cad bdag 'chags so/_/mi dge las bcu spangs nas su/_/dge ba bcu po bsten bgyis la/_/sa bcu la ni bdag gnas shing /_/stobs bcu mchog tu gyur par shog_/bdag gis 
[\[174a.3\]]sdig pa'i las gang dag_/mi 'dod 'bras bu thob bgyid pa/_/sangs rgyas spyan sngar mchis nas ni/_/de dag thams cad bshags par bgyi/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir gang dag dang /_/'jig rten khams ni gzhan dag tu/_/gang rnams dge ba'i las bgyid pa/_/
[\[174a.4\]]de dag kun la yi rang ngo /_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis kyang /_/bdag gis bsod nams gang bsgrubs pa/_/bdag ni dge ba'i rtsa ba des/_/byang chub mchog la reg par shog_/srid 'gro nyam ngar byis pa'i blo yis ni/_/shin tu mi bzad sdig pa gang bgyis pa/_/stobs bcu 
[\[174a.5\]]mi mnyam spyan sngar mchis nas ni/_/sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi/_/skye ba nyam nga srid pa nyam nga dang /_/'jig rten nyam nga g.yo sems nyam nga bar/_/lus kyi spyod pa nyam nga sna tshogs kyis/_/bdag gis sdig pa gang bsags de 'chags so/_/byis pa blun byas 
[\[174a.6\]]nyon mongs nyam nga dang /_/sdig pa'i grogs dang phrad pa nyam nga dang /_/srid pa nyam nga 'dod chags nyam nga dang /_/zhe sdang gti mug mun pa'i nyam nga dang /_/ngal ba'i nyam nga dus kyi nyam nga dang /_/bsod nams bsgrub pa nyam nga dag gis kyang /_/rgyal ba mi mnyam mngon 
[\[174a.7\]]sum mchis nas ni/_/sdig pa de kun so sor bshags par bgyi/_/sangs rgyas gser mdog ri snang ri rab 'dra/_/yon tan rgya mtsho 'dra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba de dag rnams la skyabs su mchi/_/rgyal ba de dag kun la mgos phyag 'tshal/_/gser mdog 
[\[174b\]]
[\[174b.1\]]gser ni dri ma med pa'i gser gyi 'od/_/dri med rnam dag bai DUr+ya yi yan lag spyan/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma dpal gzi grags 'bar 'byung ba'i gnas/_/thugs rje'i 'od zer dag gis mun pa mun nag bsal/_/yan lag rab tu dri med rab bzang rnam par mdzes/_/sangs 
[\[174b.2\]]rgyas nyi ma yan lag dri med gser 'dras khyab/_/nyon mongs mes gdungs yid can 'bar ba'i me 'dra la/_/thub pa zla ba'i 'od zer dra bas tshim par mdzad/_/mtshan mchog sum cu gnyis kyis dbang po yan lag mdzes/_/dpe byad bzang po dag gis yan lag rnam par mdzes/_/
[\[174b.3\]]dpal gzi bsod nams 'bar 'khrungs 'od zer dra ba yis/_/'jig rten gsum na mun khrod nyi ma bzhin du bzhugs/_/dri med rgya chen kha dog sna tshogs bai DUr+ya/_/skya rengs dmar dang dngul dang shel bzhin yan lag dmar/_/'od zer dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs legs brgyan pa/_/
[\[174b.4\]]thub chen khyod ni nyi ma bzhin du de yis mdzes/_/mya ngan 'khrugs pa'i 'chi chu rga ba'i dba' rlabs can/_/'khor ba'i klung chen phongs pa'i chu bor lhung ba la/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho'i mchog tu rtsub cing shugs drag pa/_/bde gshegs nyi ma'i 'od zer mang po rnams 
[\[174b.5\]]kyis skoms/_/yan lag gser gyi mdog tu rnam par snang /_/ye shes 'byung gnas 'jig rten gsum kun mchog_/rab mdzes mtshan gyis yan lag rnams spras pa/_/sangs rgyas gser sku 'bar la phyag 'tshal lo/_/ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chu ni dpag med dang /_/
[\[174b.6\]]ji ltar sa la sa rdul mtha' yas dang /_/ji ltar ri rab rdo mtha' mtshungs med dang /_/ji ltar nam mkha'i mtha' ma mtha' yas pa/_/de bzhin sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas te/_/sems can kun gyis shes par mi nus so/_/bskal pa du mar gzhal zhing 
[\[174b.7\]]bsams kyang ni/_/yon tan mtha' ma shes par mi nus so/_/chu ni skra yi rtse mo'i tshad tsam dang /_/rdor bcas rir bcas rgya mtshor bcas pa ni/_/bskal par bgrangs na shes par nus kyang srid/_/sangs rgyas yon tan shes par mi nus so/_/yon tan kha dog snyan 
[\[175a\]]
[\[175a.1\]]dang grags pa dang /_/dge ba'i mtshan gyis brgyan pa'i sku lus dang /_/dpe byad bzang po brgyad cus brgyan pa yis/_/sems can thams cad de 'drar gyur par shog_/bdag ni dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/_/'jig rten mi ring sangs rgyas 
[\[175a.2\]]'gyur bar shog_/'gro la phan phyir chos kyang ston gyur cig_/sems can sdug bsngal mang gzir thar byed shog_/stobs bcas sder bcas bdud las rgyal gyur cig_/chos kyi 'khor lo dge ba bskor bar shog_/bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab gnas gyur cig_/
[\[175a.3\]]bdud rtsi chu yis sems can tshim byed shog_/ji ltar sngon gyi rgyal ba rdzogs pa ltar/_/pha rol phyin drug bla med rdzogs par shog_/nyon mongs bcom zhing sdug bsngal sel gyur cig_/'dod chags zhe sdang gti mug zhi byed shog_/tshe rabs brgya dang tshe rabs bye ba 
[\[175a.4\]]stong /_/bdag ni rtag tu tshe rabs dran par shog_/thub pa'i dbang po rtag tu dran gyur cig_/de dag rnams kyi gsung rgya che thos shog_/bdag gi dge ba'i las rnams 'di dag gis/_/rtag tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa rnyed par shog_/sdig pa'i las rnams rnam 
[\[175a.5\]]par spong gyur cig_/dge ba'i 'byung gnas dge rnams spyod par shog_/zhing rnams kun na srog chags thams cad kyang /_/'jig rten dag na sdug bsngal kun zhi gyur/_/sems can dbang po ma tshang yan lag nyams/_/de kun de ring dbang po tshang bar shog_/gang dag 
[\[175a.6\]]nad btab nyam chung lus nyams dang /_/phyogs bcu dag na skyabs med gyur pa rnams/_/de kun myur du nad las thar gyur cig_/nad med stobs dang dbang po rnyed par shog_/gang dag rgyal po chom rkun dgras bsdigs bsad thug dang /_/sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[175a.7\]]brgya yis phongs gyur pa/_/sems can nyam thag gyur cing sdug bsngal de dag kun/_/'jigs mchog mi bzad brgya po de las thar gyur cig_/gang dag brdegs shing bcings pas bcings gzir ba/_/phongs pa sna tshogs dag na gnas gyur cing /_/nyon mongs stong 
[\[175b\]]
[\[175b.1\]]phrag du mas dkrugs nas kyang /_/'jigs pa mi bzad mya ngan sna tshogs rnyed/_/de dag thams cad bcings las grol gyur cig_/brdegs pa dag ni brdegs las thar bar shog_/bsad pa rnams kyang srog dang ldan gyur cig_/phongs gyur thams cad 'jigs 
[\[175b.2\]]pa med par shog_/sems can gang dag bkres sred skom gyis gzir/_/de dag zas skom sna tshogs rnyed par shog_/long bas gzugs rnams sna tshogs mthong gyur cig_/'on pas yid 'ong sgra rnams thos par shog_/gcer bu rnams kyis sna tshogs gos rnyed 
[\[175b.3\]]gyur/_/sems can dbul pos gter rnams rnyed par shog_/nor 'bru rin chen sna tshogs mang po yis/_/sems can thams cad bde dang ldan par shog_/gang yang sdug bsngal tshor bas gnod ma gyur/_/sems can thams cad blta na sdug pa dang /_/gzugs 
[\[175b.4\]]bzang mdzes shing tshul du shis par shog_/rtag tu bde ba du ma sogs gyur cig_/yid kyi zas skom rab 'byor bsod nams dag_/bsams ma thag tu de dag grub gyur cig_/rdza rnga cang te'u pi bang sgra snyan dang /_/chu mig mtshe'u dang rdzing bu lteng ka dag_/gser gyi 
[\[175b.5\]]pad+ma ut+pal 'dab ma can/_/zas skom gos nor mu tig nor bu dbyig_/rgyan gser rin chen sna tshogs bai DUr+ya/_/de dag bsams ma thag tu grub gyur cig_/'jig rten gang na'ang sdug bsngal sgra ma byung /_/sems can gcig kyang mi 'phrod mthong ma gyur/_/de dag 
[\[175b.6\]]thams cad kha dog rgya chen dang /_/phan tshun du ni 'od byed gyur par shog_/mi yi 'jig rten phun sum tshogs gang yod/_/de dag bsams par skye bar de dag gyur/_/bsam pa thams cad bsams ma thag tu yang /_/bsod nams 'bras bu yongs su rdzogs par shog_/spos dang 
[\[175b.7\]]phreng ba dag dang byug pa dang /_/gos dang phye ma me tog sna tshogs dag_/ljon shing dag las dus gsum 'bab par shog_/sems can de dag len cing dgar gyur cig_/de bzhin gshegs pa bsam yas thams cad dang /_/rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' nyan thos 
[\[176a\]]
[\[176a.1\]]dang /_/rdul bral dri med brtan pa'i chos la yang /_/phyogs bcu rnams su mchod pa byed par shog_/'gro ba dman pa thams cad spong gyur cig_/mi khom brgyad po dag las 'das par shog_/dal ba'i rgyal po dam pa thob gyur cig_/rtag 
[\[176a.2\]]tu sangs rgyas 'grogs pa thob par shog_/rtag tu mthon po'i rigs su skye bar shog_/nor dang 'bru yi mdzod rnams 'byor gyur cig_/snyan dang grags dang gzugs dang kha dog gis/_/bskal pa du mar legs par brgyan par shog_/bud med thams cad 
[\[176a.3\]]rtag tu phor gyur te/_/dpa' zhing rtul phod mkhas shing gsal bar shog_/de kun rtag tu byang chub phyir spyod gyur/_/pha rol phyin pa drug la spyod par shog_/phyogs bcu dag na rin chen shing dbang drung /_/sangs rgyas bde bzhugs rin chen bai DUr+ya'i/_/khri la 
[\[176a.4\]]bzhugs pa dag ni mthong gyur cig_/chos bstan pa yang de dag thos par shog_/bdag gis sdig pa'i las rnams bsgrubs pa ni/_/srid pa nyam ngar sngon cad gang bsgrubs pa/_/sdig las gang dag mi 'dod 'bras thob pa/_/de dag thams cad ma lus zad gyur cig_/
[\[176a.5\]]sems can gang dag srid par bcings gnas kun/_/'khor ba'i zhags pa'i thag pas dam bcings pa/_/shes rab lag gis bcings pa bkrol bar shog_/sdug bsngal rnams las thar gyur thob gyur cig_/sems can gang dag 'dzam bu gling 'di dang /_/gang 
[\[176a.6\]]dag 'jig rten khams ni gzhan rnams na/_/bsod nams sna tshogs zab mo rnams byed pa/_/de dag kun la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/lus dang ngag dang yid kyis bsgrubs pa yi/_/bdag gi rjes su yi rang bsod nams des/_/bdag ni smon grub 'bras bu yod par 
[\[176a.7\]]shog_/byang chub rdul bral bla med thob gyur cig_/gang dag rtag dang dri ma bral ba dang /_/dri med yid kyis phyag 'tshal bstod pa dang /_/yongs su bsngo ba brjod pa 'di yis ni/_/bskal pa drug cur ngan song spong bar 'gyur/_/tshigs su bcad pa brjod pa 'di dag 
[\[176b\]]
[\[176b.1\]]gis/_/skyes pa bud med bram ze rgyal rigs las/_/thal sbyar 'dug ste rgyal ba gang bstod pa/_/tshe rabs kun du skye ba dran par 'gyur/_/yan lag dbang po kun gyis yan lag brgyan/_/bsod nams yon tan sna tshogs rnams dang ldan/_/mi dbang rgyal 
[\[176b.2\]]pos rtag tu de mchod de/_/de dang de dag tu ni de 'drar 'gyur/_/gang dag rna ba'i bu gar bshags pa 'di ni grags 'gyur ba/_/de dag sangs rgyas gcig gi gan nas dge ba byas ma yin/_/gnyis la ma yin bzhi la ma yin lnga min bcu la min/_/de ltar sangs rgyas 
[\[176b.3\]]stong gi gan nas dge ba byas pa yin/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dag gsan nas/_byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyi rmi lam na/_gser gyi rnga las de bzhin 
[\[176b.4\]]gshegs pa'i yang dag pa'i yon tan bsngags pa dang /_sdig pa bshags pa 'di dag gang gis thos pa de dag thams cad bsod nams kyi phung po rgya chen po dang ldan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_bde bas tshim par byed de/_sgrib pa thams cad byang bar 'gyur bar shes 
[\[176b.5\]]par gyis shig_/'di lta bu'i spyod pa khyad par can dang ldan pa 'di dag ni/_thams cad kyang sngon 'das pa'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dag la bstod pa dang /_smon lam rgya chen po btab pa'i rgyu dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis de dag thos par gyur 
[\[176b.6\]]pa yin no zhes bka' stsal nas/_de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_rmi lam na bshags pa'i le'u ste bzhi pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[176b.7\]]yang dag par rnam par dbye ba la bzhugs te/_shin tu zab mo mchog tu gyur pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs ma thag tu sku'i ba spu'i bu ga nas/_'od zer kha dog rnam pa sna tshogs brgya stong tshad med pa byung bas/_sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad 'od de'i nang du snang bar 
[\[177a\]]
[\[177a.1\]]gyur pa ni/_phyogs bcu'i gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed kyis kyang dpe dang tshad kyis bskrun par mi nus so/_/snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'od zer des snang bar gyur pa'i sems can de dag mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang /_mtshams med pa lnga 
[\[177a.2\]]byed pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la skur pa 'debs pa dang /_bla ma dang gnyen pa la sri zhu chung ba dang /_slob dpon dang /_bram ze la bkur sti mi byed pa rnams/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi gnas su ltung bar 'gyur ba de dag gi 
[\[177a.3\]]gnas su 'od des reg ma thag tu bde ba so sor myong bar gyur to/_/gang gis 'od de mthong ba dang /_'od de'i mthus thams cad kyang bde zhing nyams dga' ba dang /_kha dog dang dbyibs legs pa'i mchog thob pas/_mtshan phun sum tshogs pa dang /_bsod nams dang /_ye 
[\[177a.4\]]shes kyi tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pas/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong bar gyur to/_/de nas brgya byin lha'i dbang po lha'i tshogs mang po dang /_gang gA'i lha mo la sogs te/_'khor 'dus pa de dag ya mtshan du gyur pa'i 'od des bskul nas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la 
[\[177a.5\]]ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das la lan gsum bskor ba byas te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[177a.6\]]ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_
[\[177a.7\]]theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/_las kyi sgrib pa rnams ji ltar so sor bshags par bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa 
[\[177b\]]
[\[177b.1\]]dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg pa 
[\[177b.2\]]chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_nyin lan gsum mtshan lan gsum du/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus 
[\[177b.3\]]mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/_skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/_sangs rgyas 
[\[177b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das gang dag da lta na/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu skor ba/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu ston pa/_chos kyi tshul rab tu 'dzin pa/_chos kyi sbyin pa 
[\[177b.5\]]rab tu mdzad pa/_chos kyi sgron ma rab tu 'bar bar mdzad pa/_chos kyi char rab tu 'bebs pa/_chos kyi rnga rab tu rdung ba/_chos kyi rnga bo che rab tu rdung ba/_chos kyi dung rab tu 'bud pa/_chos kyi srog shing rab tu sgreng ba/_sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim 
[\[177b.6\]]par mdzad pa/_nyam bag tu spyod du 'jug pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la bdag phyag 'tshal lo//_//bam po gsum pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mchod pa'i gnas/_phyag bgyi ba'i gnas/_ri mo bgyi ba'i gnas/_mkhyen 
[\[177b.7\]]par gyur pa/_spyan du gyur pa/_dpang du gyur pa/_tshad mar gyur pa/_mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/_gzigs pa dang ldan pa de dag la/_bdag mgo dang /_ngag dang yid kyis phyag 'tshal lo/_/thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/_bdag 
[\[178a\]]
[\[178a.1\]]'dod chags kyis gzir ba'am/_zhe sdang gis gzir ba'am/_gti mug gis gzir ba'i lus dang /_ngag dang yid kyis las kyi sgrib pa gang mngon par 'dus bgyis pa/_sangs rgyas su ma 'tshal ba dang /_chos su ma 'tshal ba dang /_dge 
[\[178a.2\]]'dun du ma 'tshal ba dang /_dge ba dang mi dge bar ma 'tshal ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa la ngan sems kyis khrag phyung ba dang /_chos spangs pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi dbyen bgyis pa dang /_dge slong dgra bcom pa bkum pa dang /_pha ma bkum pa dang /_lus 
[\[178a.3\]]kyi rnam pa gsum/_ngag gi rnam pa bzhi/_yid kyi rnam pa gsum ste/_mi dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam bgyis pa dang /_bgyid du stsal ba dang /_bgyid pa la rjes su yi rang ba dang /_sems can kha cig la ngag rtsub po smras pa dang /_skur pa btab pa dang /_srang la g.yo 
[\[178a.4\]]bgyis pa dang /_gzhal ba la g.yo bgyis pa dang /_'gro ba drug tu 'khor bar 'khor ba na/_pha ma mi dga' bar bgyis pa dang /_gang zag gi'am/_mchod rten gyi'am/_dge 'dun gyi'am/_phyogs bzhi'i dge slong gi dge 'dun gyi nor brkus pa dang /_ji ltar bslab 
[\[178a.5\]]pa'i gzhi bcas pa rnams kyi 'dul ba dang /_'gal bar bgyis pa dang /_mkhan po dang /_slob dpon gyis bsgo ba ma mnyan pa dang /_nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg pa chen 
[\[178a.6\]]po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams la mi snyan pa bgyis pa dang /_spyos pa dang /_brdegs pa dang /_de dag la tha ba dang /_zhe sdang bskyed pa dang /_phrag dog dang /_ser sna las byung ba'i sems kyis/_sangs rgyas 
[\[178a.7\]]bcom ldan 'das rnams la tshig rtsub po smras pa dang /_dam pa'i chos la chos ma lags zhes bgyis pa dang /_chos ma lags pa la/_dam pa'i chos lags zhes bgyis pa de dag sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par gyur pa/_spyan du gyur pa/_dpang du gyur 
[\[178b\]]
[\[178b.1\]]pa/_tshad mar gyur pa/_mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/_gzigs pa dang ldan pa/_de dag gi spyan sngar so sor 'chags so/_/mthol lo mi 'chab bo/_/slan cad kyang mi bgyid do/_/bdag las kyi sgrib pa gang gis bsgribs te/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i 
[\[178b.2\]]skye gnas dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul dang /_lha ma yin gyi tshogs kyi nang du mchi bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas dang /_chos dang /_dge 'dun mnyes par bgyid par mi 'gyur ba dang /_mi khom pa rnams su skye bar 'gyur ba'i las de lus 'di nyid la rnam par smin te/_
[\[178b.3\]]gzhan du mi myong bar shog cig_/de yang sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das mkhyen par gyur pa/_spyan du gyur pa/_dpang du gyur pa/_tshad mar gyur pa/_mkhyen pa dang ldan pa/_gzigs pa dang ldan pa de dag gi spyan sngar so sor 'chags so/_/mthol lo mi 'chab po 
[\[178b.4\]]slan cad kyang mi bgyid do/_/ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/_las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags pa dang /_ma bcabs pa de bzhin du bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags so/_/mthol 
[\[178b.5\]]lo mi 'chab bo/_slan cad kyang mi bgyid do/_/ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags par 'gyur ba dang /_mi 'chab par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_
[\[178b.6\]]bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags so/_/mthol lo mi 'chab bo/_slan cad kyang mi bgyid do/_/ji ltar da ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/_las kyi sgrib pa rnams so 
[\[178b.7\]]sor 'chags pa dang /_mi 'chab pa de bzhin du/_bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags so/_/mthol lo mi 'chab bo/_/slan cad kyang mi bgyid do/_/ji ltar 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[179a\]]
[\[179a.1\]]sems dpa' chen po dag byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags pa dang /_so sor 'chags pa dang /_so sor 'chags par 'gyur ba de bzhin du/_bdag kyang las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 'chags 
[\[179a.2\]]so/_/mthol lo mi 'chab bo/_slan cad kyang mi bgyid do/_/zhes brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo chos thams cad la sgrib pa med pa rnam par dag pa thob par 'dod pas/_'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor 
[\[179a.3\]]bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/su rgyal rigs kyi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu phyug pa nor che ba/_longs spyod che ba/_sa le sbram dang /_nor dang /_yo byad mang ba/_shin tu skyid pa/_bzhon pa chen po la zhon pa rnams 
[\[179a.4\]]kyi nang du skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/su bram ze'i rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu rnams dang /_khyim bdag gi rigs shing sA la chen po lta bu phyug pa/_nor che ba/_
[\[179a.5\]]longs spyod che ba/_sa le sbram dang /_nor dang /_yo byad mang ba/_shin tu skyid pa/_bzhon pa chen po la zhon pa rnams kyi nang du skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du/_las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/
[\[179a.6\]]su rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang /_mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/su sum cu rtsa gsum pa'i lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs 
[\[179a.7\]]dang /_mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/de bzhin du su 'thab bral dang /_dga' ldan dang /_'phrul dga' dang /_gzhan 'phrul dbang byed dang /_/
[\[179b\]]
[\[179b.1\]]tshangs ris dang /_tshangs pa'i mdun na 'don dang /_tshangs pa kun 'khor dang /_tshangs chen dang /_'od chung dang /_tshad med 'od dang /_'od gsal dang /_dge chung dang /_tshad med dge dang /_dge rgyas dang /_sprin med dang /_bsod nams skyes dang /_'bras bu 
[\[179b.2\]]che dang /_sems can 'du shes med pa dang /_gya nom snang ba dang /_shin tu mthong ba dang /_mi che ba dang /_mi gdung ba dang /_'og min gyi lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang /_mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par 
[\[179b.3\]]bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/su gzugs med pa nam mkha' mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang /_rnam shes mtha' yas skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang /_ci yang med pa'i skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba rnams dang /_'du shes 
[\[179b.4\]]med 'du shes med min skye mched du nye bar 'gro ba'i lha rnams kyi brtul zhugs dang /_mtshungs par skye bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/su rgyun du zhugs pa'i 'bras bu 
[\[179b.5\]]dang /_lan cig phyir 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_phyir mi 'ong ba'i 'bras bu dang /_dgra bcom pa nyid mngon sum du byed par 'dod pa des kyang /_'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/su rig pa 
[\[179b.6\]]gsum mam/_mngon par shes pa drug gam/_stobs rnams sam/_dbang po rnams sam/_nyan thos kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'am/_nyan thos dbang che bar grags pa'am/_rang byang chub mngon sum du bya bar 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so 
[\[179b.7\]]sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/su thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes dang /_rnam par dag pa'i ye shes dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ye shes dang /_mtshungs pa med pa'i ye shes dang /_yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[180a\]]
[\[180a.1\]]pa'i sangs rgyas kyi ye shes mngon par bsgrub par 'dod pa des kyang 'di bzhin du las kyi sgrib pa rnams so sor bshags par bya'o/_/mi bcab par bya'o/_/phyin cad kyang mi bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas 
[\[180a.2\]]chos thams cad ni rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'o/_/zhes gsungs pa'i phyir te/_rgyu dang rkyen gzhan dang /_gzhan gyis gzhan skye'o gzhan 'gog go/_/de la 'das pa'i chos gang yin pa de dag ni 'gags pa zad pa dang bral ba rnam par gyur pa ste/_de dag 
[\[180a.3\]]la yang las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do/_/de ltar na 'du byed gang yin pa rnams kyang med pa las byung ba ste/_de dag la yang las kyi sgrib pa cung zad kyang med do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu de bzhin gshegs pas chos thams cad ni stong pa/_sems can 
[\[180a.4\]]med pa/_srog med pa/_gang zag med pa/_ma skyes pa/_ma 'gags pa/_'dus ma byas pa/_zhes gsungs pa'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu chos thams cad bdag las byung ba yang bdag kyang yod pa yin no/_/shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo 
[\[180a.5\]]gang la la zhig 'di lta ste/_sems can med pa'i mtha'i chos kyi tshul 'di la 'jug pa 'di ni/_las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba ste/_shA ri'i bu 'di ni so sor bshags pa'o/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das la/_tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces 
[\[180a.6\]]gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_sems can gzhan dag 
[\[180a.7\]]kyang rung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/_ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams la rjes su yi rang bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di 
[\[180b\]]
[\[180b.1\]]skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mos/_nyin lan gsum/_mtshan lan gsum du/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar la/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/_
[\[180b.2\]]phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'dus bgyis pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang 
[\[180b.3\]]ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/rjes su yi rang ba dam pa dang /_gtso bo dang /_khyad par can dang /_rab dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na med pa dang /_ltag na med pa dang /_mnyam pa med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pas 
[\[180b.4\]]rjes su yi rang ngo /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bgyid par 
[\[180b.5\]]'gyur ba/_de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas/_rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na sems can gang su dag sbyin pa las byung ba'i bsod nams 
[\[180b.6\]]bgyi ba'i dngos po dang /_tshul khrims las byung ba dang /_bsgom pa las byung ba'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po mngon par 'du bgyid pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas/_rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam 
[\[180b.7\]]pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' gang dag da ltar na/_sems dang po bskyed pa de dag gi dang po byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' bskal pa brgyas byung ba rnams kyi 
[\[181a\]]
[\[181a.1\]]bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang /_phyir mi ldog pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa dang /_byang chub sems 
[\[181a.2\]]dpa' skye ba gcig gis thogs pa rnams kyi bsod nams kyi phung po gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas/_rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/byang chub sems 
[\[181a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/rjes su yi rang ba dam pa 
[\[181a.4\]]dang /_gtso bo dang /_khyad par can dang /_rab dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na med pa dang /_ltag na med pa dang /_mnyam pa med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems 
[\[181a.5\]]dpa' chen po de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa spyod pa na/_pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mngon par 'du bgyid par 'gyur ba gang lags pa/_de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/rjes su yi rang ba dam pa dang /_
[\[181a.6\]]gtso bo dang /_khyad par can dang /_rab dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na med pa dang /_ltag na med pa dang /_mnyam pa med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po gang dag da 
[\[181a.7\]]ltar phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na de dag pha rol tu phyin pa drug dang ldan pa'i bsod nams kyi phung po mngon par 'du bgyid pa gang lags pa de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/rjes su yi rang ba dam pa dang /_gtso 
[\[181b\]]
[\[181b.1\]]bo dang /_khyad par can dang /_rab dang /_phul dang /_gya nom pa dang /_bla ma dang /_bla na med pa dang /_ltag na med pa dang /_mnyam pa med pa dang /_mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pas rjes su yi rang ngo /_/skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig 
[\[181b.2\]]rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/_sngon gyi de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag gis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon 
[\[181b.3\]]par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bstan pa/_chos kyi tshul rab tu bzung ba/_chos kyi char rab tu phab pa/_chos kyi char rab tu btang ba/_chos kyi rnga rab tu brdungs pa/_chos kyi rnga bo che brdungs pa/_
[\[181b.4\]]chos kyi dung bus pa/_chos kyi srog shing bsgreng ba/_chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa/_sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par mdzad pa nyam bag tu spyod du 'dzud pa gang lags pa dang /_de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa 
[\[181b.5\]]pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am/_de las gzhan pa'i sems can rnams kyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang lags pa/_de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas/_rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam 
[\[181b.6\]]pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du/_ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[181b.7\]]ldan 'das/_de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar 'gyur ba'i bar dag gang lags pa dang /_de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_byang 
[\[182a\]]
[\[182a.1\]]chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am/_de las gzhan pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed par 'gyur ba gang lags pa/_de dag thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas/_rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa 
[\[182a.2\]]dang /_mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo /_/skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang /_mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du/_da ltar phyogs bcu'i 
[\[182a.3\]]'jig rten na/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu ston pa/_chos kyi tshul rab tu 'dzin pa/_chos kyi char rab 
[\[182a.4\]]tu 'bebs pa/_chos kyi char rab tu gtong ba/_chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad pa/_chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad pa/_chos kyi rnga brdung ba/_chos kyi rnga bo che brdung ba/_chos kyi dung 'bud pa/_chos kyi srog shing sgreng ba/_sems can thams cad la chos kyi sbyin pas tshim par 
[\[182a.5\]]mdzad pa/_nyam bag tu spyod du 'dzud pa gang lags pa dang /_de la nyan thos kyi theg pa pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa pa'am/_byang chub sems dpa'i theg pa pa'am/_de las gzhan pa'i sems can de dag dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa gang lags pa/_de dag 
[\[182a.6\]]thams cad la yang rjes su yi rang ba'i mchog gis rjes su yi rang ba nas/_rjes su yi rang ba mi mnyam pa dang /_mnyam pa'i bar gyis rjes su yi rang ngo zhes brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po'o/_/rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[182a.7\]]kyi bu mo rjes su yi rang ba'i bsod nams kyi phung po 'dis rjes su yi rang na/_bsod nams kyi phung po mang po grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do/_/shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can nas/_'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma 
[\[182b\]]
[\[182b.1\]]snyed kyi sems can ji snyed pa de dag thams cad dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad par gyur la/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis de dag la ji srid 'tsho'i bar du/_gos dang /_zas dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis bsnyen 
[\[182b.2\]]bkur byas pa bas/_gang zhig rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang na/_de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do/_/shA ri'i bu de lta bas na rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs 
[\[182b.3\]]par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/bud med skyes pa'i lus kyi dbang po thob par 'dod cing /_bud med kyi dbang po brje bar 'dod pas kyang rjes su yi rang ba 'dis rjes su yi rang bar bya'o/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[182b.4\]]bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ba dang /_da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams mos pa skyed par 'gyur ba'i 
[\[182b.5\]]bskul ba'i phung po yang bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang 
[\[182b.6\]]sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_nyin lan gsum mtshan 
[\[182b.7\]]lan gsum du/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar la/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gang dag da lta na/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[183a\]]
[\[183a.1\]]pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar bskul gyis/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis skye bo 
[\[183a.2\]]mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor du gsol/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bstan du 
[\[183a.3\]]gsol/_chos kyi tshul rab tu gzung du gsol/_chos kyi sbyin pa mdzad du gsol/_chos kyi sgron ma 'bar bar mdzad du gsol/_chos kyi char dbab tu gsol/_chos kyi char gtang du gsol/_chos kyi rnga brdung du gsol/_chos kyi rnga bo che brdung du gsol/_
[\[183a.4\]]chos kyi dung 'bud du gsol/_chos kyi srog shing bsgreng du gsol zhes brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu gzhan yang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg 
[\[183a.5\]]pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_nyin lan gsum/_mtshan lan gsum du/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar nas tshig 'di skad du/_sangs rgyas 
[\[183a.6\]]bcom ldan 'das gang dag da lta na phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sku tshe'i 'du byed btang ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag la phyag 'tshal nas/_gsol ba 'debs kyis/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[183a.7\]]ldan 'das de dag skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/_chos kyi 'khor lo ni rab tu bskor/_chos kyi sgron ma ni rab tu 'bar bar 
[\[183b\]]
[\[183b.1\]]mdzad/_chos kyi char ni rab tu 'bebs/_chos kyi char ni rab tu gtong /_chos kyi rnga ni rab tu rdung /_chos kyi rnga bo che ni rab tu rdung /_chos kyi dung ni rab tu 'bud/_chos kyi srog shing ni sgreng /_chos kyi sgron ma ni mched par mdzad/_sems can thams cad la chos 
[\[183b.2\]]kyi sbyin pas ni tshim par mdzad/_nyam bag tu spyod du 'dzud cing re zhig bzhugs su gsol/_gsol ba btab pa'i phung po 'di yang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngos te/_ji ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 
[\[183b.3\]]tu yongs su bsngo ba de bzhin du 'di yongs su bsngo'o zhes brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni gsol ba gdab pa'i phung po ste/_rigs kyi bu'am rigs kyi bu mo gsol ba gdab pa'i phung po 'dis gsol ba 'debs na/_bsod nams mang po grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do/_/shA 
[\[183b.4\]]ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams ji snyed pa de dag rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas/_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la/_chos 
[\[183b.5\]]kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul na/_de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do/_/shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lta zhog ste/_shA ri'i bu 'jig rten gyi khams gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dang mnyam pa ji snyed pa de 
[\[183b.6\]]dag rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la dbul ba phul ba bas/_gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la gsol ba btab na/_de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du grangs 
[\[183b.7\]]med dpag tu med pa skyed do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba btab ste/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des na nga la lha'i dbang po brgya byin dang /_mi 
[\[184a\]]
[\[184a.1\]]mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/_bcom ldan 'das skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/_chos kyi 
[\[184a.2\]]'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol zhes chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor bar gsol ba btab bo/_/shA ri'i bu ngas sngon byang chub kyi phyir spyad pa spyod pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa rnams la ring du bzhugs par gsol te/_dge ba'i rtsa ba des ni nga mi 'jigs pa bzhi 
[\[184a.3\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad dang /_so so yang dag par rig pa bzhi dang /_byams pa chen po dang /_snying rje chen po dang /_yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa thob ste/_nga'i dam pa'i chos kyang yun 
[\[184a.4\]]ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus yang 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs 
[\[184a.5\]]rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'tshal bas/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 
[\[184a.6\]]'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams ji ltar yongs su bsngo bar bgyi/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/shA ri'i bu 'di la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo nyan thos kyi 
[\[184a.7\]]theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_theg pa chen po la yang dag par zhugs pa'am/_sems can gzhan dag kyang rung ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 
[\[184b\]]
[\[184b.1\]]'tshang rgya bar 'dod pas/_nyin lan gsum/_mtshan lan gsum du tshig 'di skad ces/_thog ma dang tha ma ma mchis pa'i 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/_bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon par 'dus bgyis par gyur pa/_sangs rgyas sam/_chos sam/_dge 
[\[184b.2\]]'dun nam/_gang zag gam/_tha na dud 'gro'i skye gnas su song ba rnams sam/_sems can gzhan dag la yang rung ste/_zan changs gcig tsam stsal bar gyur pa dang /_'chags pa gang lags pa dang /_gsol ba gdab pa gang lags pa dang /_skyabs su 
[\[184b.3\]]mchi ba gang lags pa dang /_bslab pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_so sor 'chags pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa dang /_rjes su yi rang ba dang ldan pa'i bsod nams bgyi ba'i dngos po gang lags pa dang /_gsol ba gdab 
[\[184b.4\]]pa dang ldan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba gang lags pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus/_gzhal bzlums te sems dul zhing rnam par grol ba dang /_gzung ba ma mchis pas/_sems can thams cad la stsal to/_/ji ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams sems can thams cad la 
[\[184b.5\]]gtang bar bgyi ba/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/_sangs rgyas kyi ye shes chags pa mi mnga' bas/_ji ltar mkhyen pa de lta bus/_bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba de btang ste/_sems can thams cad lag na rin po che dang ldan par gyur cig_/nam 
[\[184b.6\]]mkha'i mdzod dang /_longs spyod zad mi shes pa dang /_bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang /_chos zad mi shes pa dang /_ye shes zad mi shes pa dang /_spobs pa zad mi shes pa dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par byang chub 
[\[184b.7\]]pa dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes thob par gyur cig_/bdag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba 'di sems can thams cad la stsal ba las byung ba'i bsod nams gang yin pa de dag thams cad gcig tu bsdus/_gzhal bzlums te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[185a\]]
[\[185a.1\]]pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur 
[\[185a.2\]]cig_/ji ltar sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag gis byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/_de thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngos pa de bzhin du/_bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen 
[\[185a.3\]]pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang /_sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i 
[\[185a.4\]]ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig_/ji ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus kyi byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo bar 'gyur ba de bzhin du 
[\[185a.5\]]bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur cig_/
[\[185a.6\]]thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig_/ji ltar de lta na da ltar byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po de dag byang chub kyi phyir spyod pa na/_thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo ba de 
[\[185a.7\]]bzhin du/_bdag gis kyang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'gyur bar bgyi ba'i slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams yongs su bsngo'o/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis bdag dang sems can thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 
[\[185b\]]
[\[185b.1\]]gyur cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa des byang chub kyi snying po la bzhugs te/_sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_dri ma med pa/_shin tu dkar ba 
[\[185b.2\]]la bzhugs nas/_bdud sdig can bcom ste/_shes par bgyi ba dang /_blta bar bgyi ba dang /_rtog par bgyi ba dang /_mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par bgyi ba gang ci yang rung ste/_de thams cad nam gyi tho rangs skya rengs 'char kar skad cig 
[\[185b.3\]]gcig dang ldan pa'i shes rab kyis bdud rtsi brnyes te/_'chi ba med par 'gro ba'i lam mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa de bzhin du/_bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar gyur 
[\[185b.4\]]cig_/thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyang thob par gyur cig_/ji ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa 'od dpag med dang /_'od mchog dang /_'od dge dang /_bsod nams 'od dang /_mi 'khrugs pa dang /_seng ge dang /_'od zer brgya pa dang /_
[\[185b.5\]]'od zer mtho ba dang /_'od kyi dra ba can dang /_rin chen 'od 'phro dang /_'od 'bar dang /_snang ba'i rgyal po dang /_shin tu brgyan dang /_rin chen tog dang /_chos kyi rgyal mtshan dang /_yan lag mchog ces bya ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag 
[\[185b.6\]]par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas de dag dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gzhan dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_ji tsam du skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la 
[\[185b.7\]]thugs brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang bde ba'i slad du/_chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskor ba de bzhin du/_bdag dang sems can thams cad kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par 
[\[186a\]]
[\[186a.1\]]rdzogs par sangs rgyas nas/_skye bo mang po la sman pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba dang /_skye bo phal po che dang /_lha dang mi rnams kyi don dang /_sman pa dang /_bde ba'i slad du/_chos kyi 'khor 
[\[186a.2\]]lo rab tu bskor bar shog cig ces brjod par bya'o/_/shA ri'i bu 'di ni yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po ste/_bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas yongs su bsngo ba'i phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/shA ri'i bu rigs 
[\[186a.3\]]kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig mdo 'di len tam/_kun chub par byed dam/_'dzin tam/_klog gam/_gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston na/_de ni bsod nams kyi phung po de bas ches mang du grangs med dpag tu med pa skyed do/_/
[\[186a.4\]]shA ri'i bu stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob par gyur la/_snga phyi med par mi'i lus thob nas kyang /_rang byang chub thob par gyur te/_de dag la rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs 
[\[186a.5\]]kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis bsti stang dang /_phu dud du bya ba'i phyir/_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_yo byad rnams kyis ji srid 'tsho'i bar du bsnyen bkur byas te/_rim gro bya ba la lan cig tsam yang rin po che'i phung po ri rab tsam gyi rin 
[\[186a.6\]]po che rnams yongs su zad par byas la/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas kyang /_de dag gi mchod rten rin po che sna bdun te/_gser dang /_dngul dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_shel dang /_spug dang /_mu tig dmar po las 'phang du dpag tshad bcu pa 
[\[186a.7\]]byas te/_de dag la gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba dan dang /_ba dan phra mo rnams kyis mchod pa byas na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ji snyam du sems/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gzhi de las bsod nams mang du skyed dam/_gsol pa/_bcom ldan 
[\[186b\]]
[\[186b.1\]]'das mang lags so/_/bde bar gshegs pa mang lags so/_/bka' stsal pa/_shA ri'i bu rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang mdo 'di 'dzin tam/_kun chub par byed dam/_'don par byed dam/_klog gam/_skye bo mang po la yang dag par rab tu ston 
[\[186b.2\]]tam/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu smon lam 'debs na/_de ni de bas bsod nams ches mang du skyed do/_/bsod nams kyi phung po snga mas bsod nams kyi phung po 'di'i brgya'i char yang nye bar mi 'gro ba nas/_dpe'i bar du yang mi bzod do/_/
[\[186b.3\]]de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shA ri'i bu 'di ltar rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo bsgrub pa 'di la gnas nas/_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar bskul ba'i phyir ro/_/shA ri'i bu sbyin pa rnams kyi 
[\[186b.4\]]nang na 'di lta ste/_chos kyi sbyin pa mchog ces ngas bshad do/_/de nas 'khor de las srog chags khri stan las langs te/_so so nas bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal 
[\[186b.5\]]mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis mdo 'di gzung bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan dag la yang rgya cher yang dag par bstan par bgyi'o/_/bsgrub pa la gnas par bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni dge ba'i 
[\[186b.6\]]chos de lta bu dag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur zhing don du gnyer ba lags so/_/de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das dang /_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la lha'i me tog man dA ra bas mngon 
[\[186b.7\]]par gtor to/_/mngon par gtor nas kyang /_tshig 'di skad ces/_bcom ldan 'das chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa dang /_las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa'i gces spras bgyid pa lags so/_/bcom 
[\[187a\]]
[\[187a.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin no/_/kau shi ka de de bzhin te/_de ci'i phyir zhe na/_lha'i dbang po ngas mngon par shes te/_'di nas bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med par gyur pa na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra 
[\[187a.2\]]bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi phung po chen po zhes bya ba rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom 
[\[187a.3\]]ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/lha'i dbang po de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi phung po chen po de'i sku tshe'i tshad ni lo bye ba phrag drug cu thub par gyur to/_/de'i nyan thos thog mar 'dus pa ni/_bye ba phrag 'bum 
[\[187a.4\]]yod de/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa sha stag go/_/de'i nyan thos 'dus pa gnyis pa ni bye ba brgya stong phrag dgu bcu rtsa brgyad yod de/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa sha stag go/_/de'i nyan thos 'dus pa gsum pa ni bye ba brgya stong 
[\[187a.5\]]phrag dgu bcu rtsa dgu yod de/_thams cad kyang dgra bcom pa/_zag pa zad pa sha stag go/_/lha'i dbang po de nas de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer gyi phung po chen po de lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang /_tshangs pa dang 
[\[187a.6\]]bcas pa dang /_dge sbyong dang bram zer bcas pa'i skye dgu'i don gyi phyir rgyu'o/_/lha'i dbang po de'i tshe/_bud med gang gA'i lha mo zhes bya ba zhig 'khor 'dus pa de nyid kyi nang du 'dus par gyur te/_'dug pa des chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs 
[\[187a.7\]]pa 'od zer gyi phung po chen po las mngon sum du bzung /_kun chub par byas/_blangs nas skye bo mang po la yang dag par bstan te/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub la yang dag par zhugs par gyur to/_/de de nas shi 'phos nas bud med kyi lus spangs te/_
[\[187b\]]
[\[187b.1\]]skyes pa'i dbang po thob nas/_rtag par rgyun du lha dang mi rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_lan brgyad khri bzhi stong du 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po byas nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 'od 'phro zhes bya bar gyur to/_/kau shi ka 'di nas shar phyogs na sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye 
[\[187b.2\]]ba stong phrag brgya na chos ston te ngas da lta na yang mthong ngo /_/kau shi ka su dag bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de'i ming thos pa de dag thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'das pa nges par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[187b.3\]]bud med gang la la zhig gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen 'od 'phro de'i ming thos sam 'chi kar yang mngon sum du byed na de nyid de'i bud med kyi lus kyi tha ma yin no/_/rigs kyi bu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di'i phan 
[\[187b.4\]]yon rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur te/_byang chub kyi dge ba'i chos rnams yongs su rgyas par 'gyur ba dang /_las kyi sgrib pa'i rgyun thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro/_/yang dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang la la zhig 
[\[187b.5\]]gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'chad cing ston pa'i gnas dang /_yul 'khor der phan yon rnam pa 'di bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/bzhi gang zhe na/_yul de'i rgyal po nad med cing gnod pa thams cad dang bral bar 'gyur ba dang /_tshe ring zhing bar chad 
[\[187b.6\]]mi 'byung ba dang /_dgra dang pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis 'joms par mi 'gyur ba dang /_bde bar longs spyod cing dam pa'i chos yongs su rgyas par byed pa de ni/_mi'i rgyal po de la brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin gyi bdag 
[\[187b.7\]]po la sogs pas yongs su bsrungs pa'i phyir ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i 'khor de dag la rigs kyi bu dag_/de de lta yin nam zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_de nas brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pa tshad med pa'i 'khor de dag gis so so nas tshig 
[\[188a\]]
[\[188a.1\]]'di skad ces gsol to/_/de de lta lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das yul 'khor gang du mdo sde'i dbang po 'di klog cing 'don pa dang /_ston pa de'i rgyal po dang /_yul 'khor der mchis te/_de la bdag cag gis rtag tu bsrung ba dang /_lhan 
[\[188a.2\]]cig gnas par bgyis te/_rgyal po de'i phas kyi dgra dang /_gnod pa dang /_bar chad dang /_nad dang /_mya ngan la sogs pa thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/tshe ring ba dang /_bde ba dang /_bkra shis su ldan zhing bsam pa thams cad 'grub pas/_rtag par sems 
[\[188a.3\]]dga' bar yang bgyi'o/_/rgyal po'i 'khor de'i dmag rnams kyang dpa' zhing rtul phod par bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis legs so zhes bka' stsal te/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu dag ji skad smras pa de bzhin du sgrubs shig 
[\[188a.4\]]dang /_rgyal po de chos bzhin du spyod pas/_de'i 'bangs rnams kyang rgyal po bzhin chos bzhin spyod par 'gyur ro/_/de la khyed kyi mthu dang kha dog phun sum tshogs pas bstang zhing phan pa dam pas gnas dang /_'khor la sogs pa 'od can du gyis shig_/de nas brgya byin 
[\[188a.5\]]dang /_tshangs pa la sogs pas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis ji skad bka' stsal pa bzhin du bgyi'o zhes gsol to/_/de nas yang bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gang mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ston pa dang /_rgyas par byed pa'i gnas dang /_yul der rgyal po'i 
[\[188a.6\]]blon po rnams la phan yon rnam pa 'di bzhi 'byung bar 'gyur te/_bzhi gang zhe na/_gcig la gcig gus shing /_mdza' ba'i sems su 'gyur ba dang /_rtag tu rgyal pos gnang zhing /_dge sbyong dang /_bram ze dang /_rgyal phran la sogs pas btsun par 'dzin pa 
[\[188a.7\]]dang /_dam pa'i chos don du gnyer zhing khe dang grags pa mi tshol bas grags pa chen po phyogs su rgyas shing kun gyis bstod pa dang /_tshe ring zhing bde bar longs spyod pa ste/_bzhi po de dag go/_/gzhan yang dam pa'i chos 'di ston pa'i yul de'i dge sbyong dang /_bram ze rnams 
[\[188b\]]
[\[188b.1\]]la phan yon 'di bzhi 'byung ste/_bzhi gang zhe na/_gos dang /_bsod snyoms dang /_mal cha dang /_sman la sogs pas phongs par mi 'gyur ba dang /_de dag kun kyang klog pa dang /_'don pa'i bsam pas sems bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_ri dang nags tshal la sogs 
[\[188b.2\]]par gnas pas bde bar gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_gang brnag par bya ba'i bsam pa de yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dang bzhi po de dag go/_/gzhan yang mdo 'di 'don pa'i yul de'i skye bo de dag nad med cing bde ba 'phel ba dang /_nor dang yo byad dang /_rin po che la 
[\[188b.3\]]sogs pa bsgrub pa myur du 'grub cing /_bsod nams 'phel ba la sogs te/_phan yon rnam pa de dag dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/de nas brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi la sogs pa'i 'khor de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[188b.4\]]'das don zab mo ston pa'i mdo sde 'di ji srid 'jig rten na gnas kyi bar du byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos sum cu rtsa bdun gyi chos rnams kyang gnas par 'gyur ro/_/mdo sde 'di nam mi bzhugs par gyur pa'i dus der/_dam pa'i chos rnams kyang med par 'gyur ro zhes gsol 
[\[188b.5\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de lta'o/_/rigs kyi bu dag de lta bas na khyod kyis gser 'od dam pa'i mdo 'di las tha na tshig gcig gam/_tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/_le'u gcig gam/_sde tshang bar yang rung ste/_yang dag par gdon par 
[\[188b.6\]]bya/_gzung bar bya/_bsam par bya/_yongs su bsgrub par bya'o/_/sems can mang po'i yun gyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir kun la ston cing rgyas par byed na/_de bsod nams kyi phung po tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/zhes bka' stsal pa dang /_
