[\[188b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_las kyi sgrib pa rgyun gcod pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste lnga pa'o//_//bam po bzhi pa/_de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo 
[\[189a\]]
[\[189a.1\]]gros mi zad pa stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la rin po che sna tshogs kyi 
[\[189a.2\]]me tog gi gdugs dang /_me tog gi phur mas mchod nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems byang chub kyi sems zhes bgyi ba/_bcom ldan 'das ji tsam gyis na/_byang chub sems dpa' byang chub kyi 
[\[189a.3\]]sems dang ldan pa lags/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub kyi sems gang lags/_bcom ldan 'das byang chub la ni sems sam/_byang chub sems dpa' ma dmigs/_mi dmigs dmigs par yang mi 'gyur ro/_/byang chub las gud na yang byang chub kyi sems 
[\[189a.4\]]mi dmigs te/_byang chub ni brjod du ma mchis/_sems ni gzugs ma mchis/_bstan du ma mchis/_thogs pa ma mchis/_rnam par rig pa ma mchis shing /_sems dpa' yang mi dmigs na/_bcom ldan 'das ji ltar chos 'di dag gi don rtogs par bgyi/_
[\[189a.5\]]bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu 'di la byang chub ni brda'am/_gdags pa'am/_tha snyad du mi dmigs shing /_byang chub las gud na/_byang chub kyi sems kyang mi dmigs la/_byang chub ni brjod du med/_sems ni gzugs med/_bstan du med/_
[\[189a.6\]]thogs pa med/_rnam par rig pa med de/_sems dpa' yang mi dmigs so/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_byang chub ni brjod du med pa ste/_byang chub ji lta bar sems kyang de bzhin no/_/sems ji lta bar byang chub kyang de bzhin no/_/byang chub dang sems ji lta bar sems dpa' 
[\[189a.7\]]rnams kyang de bzhin no/_/sems dpa' rnams ji lta bar 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i chos thams cad kyang de bzhin no/_/rigs kyi bu de ltar na/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byang chub sems dpa'i ming 'thob bo/_/chos thams 
[\[189b\]]
[\[189b.1\]]cad kyi rjes su song ba'i sems de ni/_byang chub kyi sems zhes bya'o/_/byang chub ni 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin te/_sems kyang de bzhin no/_/chos thams cad mi dmigs pa'i phyir 'di la ci yang rnyed pa med de/_byang chub kyang med/_
[\[189b.2\]]byang chub tu gdags pa yang med/_sems can yang med/_sems can du gdags pa yang med/_nyan thos kyang med/_nyan thos su gdags pa yang med/_rang sangs rgyas kyang med/_rang sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang med/_byang chub sems dpa' yang med/_byang 
[\[189b.3\]]chub sems dpar gdags pa yang med/_sangs rgyas kyang med/_sangs rgyas su gdags pa yang med/_'dus byas kyang med/_'dus byas su gdags pa yang med/_'dus ma byas kyang med/_'dus ma byas su gdags pa yang mi dmigs dmigs par mi 'gyur ba'o/_/
[\[189b.4\]]rigs kyi bu 'on kyang dper na ri rab kyi tshul du dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis yang dag par 'phags pa'i sems dang po skyes te/_de la rgyu ni sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni chos thams cad kyi bya ba'i gnas kyi tshul gyis sa lta bur blta ste de la rgyu ni 
[\[189b.5\]]tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni 'jigs pa med pa dang /_bag tsha ba med pa dang /_skrag pa med pa'i tshul gyis/[ {]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can gyi rtsal lta bur blta ste/_de la rgyu ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sems 
[\[189b.6\]]bskyed pa bzhi pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i tshul gyis/_sred med kyi bu'i mthu dang /_stobs dang /_drag shul dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_brtul ba lta bur blta ste/_de la rgyu ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa lnga pa ni bsod nams kyis chog mi 
[\[189b.7\]]shes pa'i tshul gyis/_dge ba sna tshogs kyis yang dag par 'phags pa lta bur blta ste/_de la rgyu ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa drug pa ni mun pa mun nag chen po sel ba'i tshul gyis nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'od gsal ba lta bur blta ste/_/
[\[190a\]]
[\[190a.1\]]de la rgyu ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni ded dpon mdzod chen pos phyug pa lta bur 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon pa las sgrol ba'i tshul gyis/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pas de la legs par 
[\[190a.2\]]brgyan pa lta bur blta ste/_de la rgyu ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa brgyad pa ni zla ba nya ba'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i dpe'i tshul gyis sgrib pa thams cad rnam par dag pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa lta bur blta ste/_de la rgyu ni 
[\[190a.3\]]smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa dgu pa ni sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan bkod pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor gyi tshul gyis/_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par byed pa lta bur blta ste/_de la rgyu ni stobs kyi pha rol 
[\[190a.4\]]tu phyin pa'o/_/sems bskyed pa bcu pa ni/_yon tan dang /_ye shes dang /_chos thams cad la dbang sgyur bar dbang bskur ba thob pas 'khor los sgyur ba'i mtshan gyi dpe'i tshul gyis/_nam mkha' dang mtshungs pa lta bur blta ste/_de la rgyu ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu 
[\[190a.5\]]phyin pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems bskyed pa ni bcu po 'di dag yin te/_'di dag dang ldan pas byang chub sems dpa' zhes bya'o/_/don dam par na 'di la byang chub kyang med/_byang chub sems dpa' yang med/_byang chub kyi sems kyang med 
[\[190a.6\]]do/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_dad pa'i dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang /_bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_pha rol 
[\[190a.7\]]tu phyin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang /_snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sems can gyi rten sngon du 'gro ba dang /_bsdu ba'i dngos po sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_thams cad mkhyen pa'i 
[\[190b\]]
[\[190b.1\]]ye shes 'dod pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i/_sngon du 'gro ba'i chos 
[\[190b.2\]]rnam pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na 'di lta ste/_lus kyi las yongs su dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_ngag gi las yongs su dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_yid kyi las yongs su dag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_rnam par mi 'tshe ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_ngan song thams cad rnam par 
[\[190b.3\]]spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_mi khom pa brgyad rnam par spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa las 'das pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan la dgod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_smon 
[\[190b.4\]]lam yongs su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa 'di bcu'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam 
[\[190b.5\]]pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_rjes su 'chags pa spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_khong khro ba spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_lus la mi lta ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_srog la yid mi rton pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sems can 
[\[190b.6\]]yongs su smin par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_byams pa'i stobs sngon du 'gro ba dang /_zab mo'i chos la bzod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_rgya chen po la mos pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_mi shes pa bsal ba sngon du 'gro ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[190b.7\]]rnams kyi bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad 
[\[191a\]]
[\[191a.1\]]kyi bya ba ci yod snyam pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_dge ba'i lus dang /_ngag dang yid mngon par bsgrub pa la rjes su yi rang ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_zhum pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa la bsdu ba thob par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_
[\[191a.2\]]yang dag pa'i rtsol ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_dran pa nye bar gzhag pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'dul ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_chos thams cad kyis dben pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_thams cad 
[\[191a.3\]]mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par sgrub pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu 
[\[191a.4\]]phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_dge ba'i chos la gnas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin sngon du 'gro ba dang /_snyoms par 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sngon du 'gro ba dang /_
[\[191a.5\]]bsam gtan dang rnam par thar pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa spong ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi phung po yongs su rdzogs par byed pa sngon du 'gro 
[\[191a.6\]]ba dang /_dam pa'i chos yongs su bsrung ba sngon du 'gro ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 
[\[191a.7\]]'gro ba'i chos rnam pa 'di bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_phung po la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_khams la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_skye mched la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba la mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_bden pa la 
[\[191b\]]
[\[191b.1\]]mkhas pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_lta bar gyur pa thams cad bsal ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_shes rab kyi dbang po sngon du 'gro ba dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_
[\[191b.2\]]sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba sngon du 'gro ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs la mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon 
[\[191b.3\]]du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can gyi bsam pa dang spyod pa la 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sems can gyi rten sngon du 'gro ba dang /_byams pa dang snying rje chen po sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sems can yongs su smin par bya ba la mi 
[\[191b.4\]]skyo ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad la 'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_khyad par can gyi ye shes mthong ba khong du chud pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su byang bar bya ba yongs su smin par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_dngos po ji lta ba 
[\[191b.5\]]bzhin du yongs su rtog pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sems kyi stobs nye bar bsgrub pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yongs su thob par byed pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro 
[\[191b.6\]]ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi spyod pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba 
[\[191b.7\]]dang /_sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa'i thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi dbang po thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang mos pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa 
[\[192a\]]
[\[192a.1\]]sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_lhag pa'i bsam pa dang /_mos pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams tha dad pa dang /_khams gsum gyi thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_
[\[192a.2\]]sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang /_bag la nyal gyi thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi 'chi 'pho dang /_skye ba thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sems can thams cad kyi phung po gsum du rnam par 
[\[192a.3\]]gzhag pa thibs po nye bar rgyu ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_dbang po mi skyo ba'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba shes pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/_/rigs 
[\[192a.4\]]kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad gzod ma nas 'byung ba med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_chos thams cad gzod ma nas mtshan nyid med pa sngon du 
[\[192a.5\]]'gro ba dang /_chos thams cad gzod ma nas skye ba med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_chos thams cad gzod ma nas yod pa ma yin pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_chos thams cad gzod ma nas chags pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_chos thams cad 'jug pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba 
[\[192a.6\]]dang /_chos thams cad ldog pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_chos thams cad dngos po med pa'i ngo bo nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang /_chos thams cad kyi thog ma dang bar ma dang tha ma mnyam pa nyid sngon du 'gro ba dang /_chos thams cad de bzhin nyid la 'jug pa'i rtog pa dang /_rnam 
[\[192a.7\]]par rtog pa med pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu 
[\[192b\]]
[\[192b.1\]]ste/_bcu gang zhe na/_'di lta ste/_chos thams cad rnam par dbye ba la shin tu rnam par brtags pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_dkar po'i chos shin tu yongs su rdzogs pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_byang chub kyi tshogs bsags pa dpag tu med pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_bsod nams 
[\[192b.2\]]dang ye shes kyi tshogs chen po yongs su bzung ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_snying rje chen po yangs pa khong du chud par bya ba sngon du 'gro ba dang /_'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dbye ba'i rim pa shes pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_sems can gyi khams dang /_nyon mongs pa'i spyod pa la 
[\[192b.3\]]'jug pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa'i spyod yul la 'jug cing rjes su 'gro ba shes pa yid la byed pa sngon du 'gro ba dang /_stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa la lhag par dmigs shing kun shes par bya ba sngon 
[\[192b.4\]]du 'gro ba dang /_rnam pa thams cad kyi mchog dang ldan pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la dbang bskur ba'i sa thob pa sngon du 'gro ba ste/_rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'di'i sngon du 'gro ba'i chos rnam pa bcu'o/_/de la pha rol 
[\[192b.5\]]tu phyin pa'i don gang zhe na/_spyod pa'i khyad par yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/ye shes zab cing rgya che ba yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/'dus byas dang 'dus ma byas la chags pa med pa'i don 
[\[192b.6\]]ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/'khor ba'i nyes pa ji lta ba bzhin du rtogs pa'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/skye bo mi mkhas pa rnams khong du chud par byed pa'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/chos kyi mdzod zad mi shes pa yang dag par ston pa'i don ni/_
[\[192b.7\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/sgrib pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/sems can gyi khams rab tu shes par bya ba'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/sbyin pa mnyam pa nyid rjes su rtogs pa'i don ni/_
[\[193a\]]
[\[193a.1\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes par mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/brtson 'grus mnyam pa nyid 
[\[193a.2\]]yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/bsam gtan mnyam pa nyid yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la shes par mkhas pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni/_pha 
[\[193a.3\]]rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/chos thams cad rab tu shes par bya ba'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa yongs su rdzogs par byed pa'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/phyir mi ldog pa'i sa yang dag par thob par byed pa'i don ni/_pha rol 
[\[193a.4\]]tu phyin pa'i don no/_/sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su sbyang ba'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/byang chub kyi snying po la sangs rgyas kyi ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don ni/_
[\[193a.5\]]pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/bdud thams cad gdul bar bya ba'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa gnyis su med par ston cing sgrol ba'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/yon tan thams cad kyi pha rol tu 'gro ba'i don ni/_pha rol 
[\[193a.6\]]tu phyin pa'i don no/_/phas kyi rgol ba thams cad tshar gcod pa'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/stobs bcu dang /_mi 'jigs pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi chos ma 'dres pa [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/sangs rgyas 
[\[193a.7\]]kyi chos thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par byang chub par byed pa'i don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/chos kyi 'khor lo rnam pa bcu gnyis su bskor ba'i 
[\[193b\]]
[\[193b.1\]]don ni/_pha rol tu phyin pa'i don no/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po'i snga ltas ni stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams gter bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis yongs su gang bar mthong ngo /_/rigs 
[\[193b.2\]]kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa gnyis pa'i snga ltas ni/_gang stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams lag mthil lta bur gyur pa la rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong du mas legs par brgyan par mthong ngo /_/rigs 
[\[193b.3\]]kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa gsum pa'i snga ltas ni/_bdag nyid dpa' zhing lag cha dang go cha sra ba thogs nas phas kyi rgol ba thams cad 'dul bar mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[193b.4\]]chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bzhi pa'i snga ltas ni/_phyogs bzhi nas rlung gi dkyil 'khor bzhis thams cad dang ldan pa'i sa'i dkyil 'khor chen po la me tog sna tshogs kyis mngon du 'thor bar mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[193b.5\]]po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa lnga pa'i snga ltas ni/_rgyan thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i bud med kyis mgo la me tog tsam pa ka'i phreng ba 'dogs par mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa drug pa'i snga ltas 
[\[193b.6\]]ni/_rdzing them skas bzhi dang ldan pa gser gyi bye ma bdal ba rnyog pa med cing dang la yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba me tog ut+pa la dang /_ku mu da dang /_pad+ma dkar pos brgyan pa'i chu mthong ste/_de la bdag nyid rtse dga' zhing yongs su spyod par 
[\[193b.7\]]mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bdun pa'i snga ltas ni/_phyogs g.yas g.yon gnyis na/_sems can dmyal ba'i g.yang sa mthong ste/_de nas bdag nyid ma rmas ma nyams par slar ldog pa mthong 
[\[194a\]]
[\[194a.1\]]ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa brgyad pa'i snga ltas ni/_phrag pa gnyis na [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi rgyal po seng ge ral pa can cod pan thogs pa/_gcan gzan phra mo thams cad skrag par byed cing 
[\[194a.2\]]'dug par mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dgu pa'i snga ltas ni/_'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por mthong ste skye bo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas la mgo'i 
[\[194a.3\]]steng na rin po che sna tshogs kyis spras pa'i gdugs dkar po 'dzin pa mthong ngo /_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu pa'i snga ltas ni/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mthong ste/_kha dog gser lta bu'i 'od 'dom 
[\[194a.4\]]gang ba tshangs pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag du mas yongs su bskor cing mdun gyis bltas nas chos ston par mthong ste/_rigs kyi bu bcu po 'di dag ni/_byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi/_byang chub sems dpa'i sa bcu po'i snga ltas yin 
[\[194a.5\]]no/_/de la rigs kyi bu de ci'i phyir sa dang po la rab tu dga' ba zhes bya zhe na/_de ni thog mar 'jig rten las 'das pa'i sems sngon ma thob pa de mngon du gyur te/_don chen po'i bsam pa phun sum tshogs pa'i phyir/_rab tu dga' ba chen po skye bas sa dang po la rab tu 
[\[194a.6\]]dga' ba zhes bya'o/_/ltung ba phra mo'i dri ma dang /_tshul khrims kyi nyes pa thams cad rnam par dag pa'i phyir/_sa gnyis pa ni dri ma med pa zhes bya'o/_/tshad med pa'i ye shes dang /_ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes 'od snang ba de bskyod par mi nus shing gang gis kyang zil gyis mi 
[\[194a.7\]]non pa dang /_thos pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs la gnas pa'i phyir sa gsum pa ni 'od byed pa zhes bya'o/_/shes rab kyi mes nyon mongs pa thams cad sreg cing byang chub kyi phyogs kyi chos bsgoms pa'i me'i 'od 'phro ba cher gyur pas sa bzhi pa la ni 'od 'phro ba zhes bya'o/_/de bsgom pa'i 
[\[194b\]]
[\[194b.1\]]thabs dang /_mchog gi ye shes la dbang sgyur bar dka' ba dang /_mthong ba dang /_bsgoms pas spangs pa'i nyon mongs pa thul bar dka' ba thul ba'i phyir sa lnga pa la shin tu sbyang dka' ba zhes bya'o/_/'du byed kyi chos bar chad med par mngon du gyur te/_mtshan ma med 
[\[194b.2\]]pa yid la byed pa thams cad mngon du byed pas/_sa drug pa la mngon sum pa zhes bya'o/_/zag pa med pa'i chos rnams la bar chad med cing mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pas/_rnam par grol ba'i ting nge 'dzin la rgyun ring du bsgoms pas/_sa de rnam par dag cing thogs pa 
[\[194b.3\]]med pa'i phyir/_sa bdun pa ni ring du song ba zhes bya'o/_/mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pa bsgom pa la dbang thob ste/_nyon mongs pa rnams kyis g.yo bar mi nus pas na/_sa brgyad pa ni mi g.yo ba zhes bya'o/_/rnam pa thams cad du chos ston pa la dbang du gyur pas/_
[\[194b.4\]]kha na ma tho ba med cing /_blo gros shin tu yangs pa thogs pa med pa thob pa'i phyir/_sa dgu pa ni legs pa'i blo gros zhes bya'o/_/chos kyi sku nam mkha' lta bu la/_ye shes chen po'i sprin lta bus khyab par 'gebs pa'i phyir/_sa bcu pa ni chos kyi sprin ces bya'o/_/
[\[194b.5\]]de la rigs kyi bu chos dang gang zag la/_mtshan ma can du mngon par zhen pa'i rmongs pa dang /_'khor ba dang ngan song gi nyon mongs pas 'jigs pa'i rmongs pa dang /_rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa dang po la sgrib bo/_/ltung ba phra mo'i 'khrul pa la rmongs pa dang /_las 
[\[194b.6\]]dang spyod pa rnam pa sna tshogs mngon par skyed pa'i rmongs pa dang /_rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa gnyis pa la sgrib po/_/ma thob pa thob par 'dod pa'i rmongs pa dang /_gzungs dam pa'i mchog thob pa la rmongs pa dang /_rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa gsum pa 
[\[194b.7\]]la sgrib bo/_/mnyam par gzhag pa'i ro'i dga' ba la sred pa'i rmongs pa dang /_chos rnam par dag pa la sred pa'i rmongs pa dang /_rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa bzhi pa la sgrib po/_/'khor ba la shin tu skyo ba'i rmongs pa dang /_mya ngan las 'das pa la mngon 
[\[195a\]]
[\[195a.1\]]par gzhol ba'i rmongs pa dang /_rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa lnga pa la sgrib po/_/'du byed kyi rgyu ba mngon du gyur pa'i rmongs pa dang /_mtshan ma sbom po mngon du gyur pa'i rmongs pa dang /_rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa drug pa la sgrib po/_/
[\[195a.2\]]mtshan ma phra mo mngon du gyur pa'i rmongs pa dang /_mtshan ma med pa yid la byed pa'i rmongs pa dang /_rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa bdun pa la sgrib po/_/mtshan ma med pa la ched du rtsol ba'i rmongs pa dang /_mtshan mar 'dzin pa la dbang thob pa'i rmongs pa dang /_
[\[195a.3\]]rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa brgyad pa la sgrib po/_/gang chos ston pa tshad med pa dang /_tshig dang yi ge tshad med pa la mkhas par ma gyur pa'i rmongs pa dang /_spobs pa la dbang ma thob pa'i rmongs pa dang /_rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa dgu pa la sgrib po/_/mngon par shes pa 
[\[195a.4\]]chen po la dbang sgyur ba ma thob pa'i rmongs pa dang /_don dang /_las gsang ba phra mo la mkhas par ma gyur pa'i rmongs pa dang /_rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sa bcu pa la sgrib bo/_/spyod yul shin tu phra ba thams cad la/_shes bya'i sgrib pa'i rmongs pa dang /_nyon mongs 
[\[195a.5\]]pa shin tu phra ba'i gnas ngan len la rmongs pa dang /_rmongs pa 'di gnyis kyis sangs rgyas kyi sa la sgrib pa'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ni/_sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/_/byang chub sems dpa'i 
[\[195a.6\]]sa gnyis pa la ni/_tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/_/sa gsum pa la ni bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/_/sa bzhi pa la ni brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/_/sa lnga pa la ni bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/_/sa drug pa la ni 
[\[195a.7\]]shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/_/sa bdun pa la ni thabs mkhas pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/_/sa brgyad pa la ni smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/_/sa dgu pa la ni stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gnon to/_/sa bcu pa la ni ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin 
[\[195b\]]
[\[195b.1\]]pa gnon to/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i sems bskyed pa dang po ni/_rin po che yang dag par 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/_/sems bskyed pa gnyis pa ni gnas pa med pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 
[\[195b.2\]]yongs su bzung ste skye'o/_/sems bskyed pa gsum pa ni rab tu mi g.yo ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/_/sems bskyed pa bzhi pa ni phyir mi ldog pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/_/sems bskyed pa lnga pa ni rin po che'i me tog gi ting 
[\[195b.3\]]nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/_/sems bskyed pa drug pa ni nyi ma'i 'od kyi gzi brjid kyi ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/_/sems bskyed pa bdun pa ni don thams cad grub pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/_/sems bskyed pa 
[\[195b.4\]]brgyad pa ni da ltar gyi sangs rgyas mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/_/sems bskyed pa dgu pa ni ye shes sgron ma'i ting nge 'dzin gyis yongs su bzung ste skye'o/_/sems bskyed pa bcu pa ni dpa' bar 'gro ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyis 
[\[195b.5\]]yongs su bzung nas skye ste/_rigs kyi bu 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams kyi sems bskyed pa bcu'o/_/rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po'i byang chub sems dpa'i sa dang po la khyad par gyis byin gyis 
[\[195b.6\]]brlabs pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye ste gzungs la/_tad+ya thA/_pUr+Na ma no ra the/_du hu du hu du hu/_yA bta sUr+ya a ba b+hA sa tA/_yA bta tsan+d+ra dau dat+te/_dA bA da rak+Sha mAn/_daN+Da pa ri hA ram ku ru swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung gcig gi 
[\[195b.7\]]bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa dang po'i byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs te/_su zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'dzin na/_'jigs pa thams cad las grol bar 'gyur ba ni/_'di lta ste/_stag dang 
[\[196a\]]
[\[196a.1\]]seng ge la sogs pa gcan gzan ma rungs pa'i rigs dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]thams cad dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/_dgra dang /_rkun po dang /_gza' dang /_nyon mongs pa rnams dang /_sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las rnam par grol te/_sa 
[\[196a.2\]]dang po rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa gnyis pa la gzhan gyis mi thub pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o/_/gzungs la/_tad+ya thA/_ut+to li/_tsi ri tsi ri/_ut+to rA/_to ra NaM/_shAn+to shAn+to/_at+to li/_
[\[196a.3\]]hu lu hu lu swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung gnyis kyi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa gnyis pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs so/_/gang la la zhig gzungs sngags 'di klog cing 'dzin na/_
[\[196a.4\]]'jigs pa thams cad las rnam par grol te/_de gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs pas gtse ba dang /_pha rol gyi dgra dang /_gza' dang /_nyon mongs pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_sgrib pa 
[\[196a.5\]]rnam pa lnga las rnam par grol te/_sa gnyis pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sa gsum pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rab tu gnas pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o/_/gzungs la/_tad+ya thA/_daN+Thi ke/_baN+Thi ke/_
[\[196a.6\]]ka ra ThI/_kau ra Thi/_kai yU re dan+ti li swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung gsum gyi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/_sa gsum pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs te/_su gzungs sngags 
[\[196a.7\]]'di 'chang ba dang /_'don pa de 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gcan gzan ma rungs pa dang /_gdon ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa thams cad la sogs pas gtse ba dang /_gza' dang /_pha rol gyi dgra dang /_sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_
[\[196b\]]
[\[196b.1\]]sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las rnam par grol te/_sa gsum pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sa bzhi pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la gdul dka' ba zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o/_/gzungs la/_tad+ya thA/_shi ri shi ri/_
[\[196b.2\]]di mi di mi ni/_da ri da ri Ni/_shi ri shi ri Ni/_bi shA lA/_bi shI lA/_pa sha pa sha ni/_ban+d+ha ni ye swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung bzhi'i bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa bzhi pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsrung 
[\[196b.3\]]ba'i phyir gsungs te/_sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don pa dang /_'chang ba de 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gcan gzan khro bo dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/_pha rol gyi dgra dang /_sdug bsngal mang pos gtse ba dang /_gza' 
[\[196b.4\]]dang /_sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/_sa bzhi pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sa lnga pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la yon tan sna tshogs kyis bkod pa ces bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o/_/gzungs la/_
[\[196b.5\]]tad+ya thA/_ha ri ha ri Ni/_tsi ri tsi ri Ni/_ka ri mA Ni/_sang ka ri mA Ni/_sam+bA sa ni/_dzam+b+ha ni/_stam+b+ha ni/_mo ha ni/_swa ya mUk+ke swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung lnga'i bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa lnga pa la gnas 
[\[196b.6\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs te/_sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/_'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gcan gzan khro bo dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/_pha rol gyi dgra dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[196b.7\]]rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtse ba dang /_gza' dang /_sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las rnam par grol te/_sa lnga pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sa drug pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor sgron ma zhes bya ba'i gzungs 
[\[197a\]]
[\[197a.1\]]'di skye'o/_/gzungs la/_tad+ya thA/_bi to ri/_bi to ri/_ma ri Ni/_ka li ka li/_bi d+ho han ti/_lu lu lu lu/_tsu lu tsu lu/_to lu ba to lu ba/_sha sha/_shats+tsha/_ba ri sha swa sti/_sarba satwa naM/_sid d+h+yan+tu mA ma/_man+t+ra bA dA ni swA hA/_rigs kyi bu 
[\[197a.2\]]gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung drug gi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa drug pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs te/_sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/_'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gcan gzan khro 
[\[197a.3\]]bo dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/_pha rol gyi dgra dang /_sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtse ba dang /_gza' dang /_sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/_sa drug pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sa 
[\[197a.4\]]bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la khyad par du 'phags pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o/_/gzungs la/_tad+ya thA/_dza ha dza ha ru/_dza ha dza ha dza ha ru/_bai lu ke/_bai lu ke/_a mr-i tag+ha Ne/_pa ru sha Ne/_bai ru ti ke/_ba ru bat+te/_
[\[197a.5\]]bi d+hi hi ke/_bin+da bi li ni/_a mr-i lu ti ke/_b+hai dzu yu/_b+hai dzu yu swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung bdun gyi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa bdun pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs 
[\[197a.6\]]te/_sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/_'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gcan gzan khro bo dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/_pha rol gyi dgra dang /_sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtse ba dang /_gza' dang /_
[\[197a.7\]]sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/_sa bdun pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sa brgyad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la rnyog pa med pa'i rtog pa zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o/_/gzungs la/_tad+ya thA/_shi ri 
[\[197b\]]
[\[197b.1\]]shi ri/_shi ri Ni/_mi te mi te/_ka ri ka ri/_he ru he ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_ban+d+ha ni swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung brgyad kyi bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa brgyad pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i 
[\[197b.2\]]phyir gsungs te/_sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/_'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gcan gzan khro bo dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/_pha rol gyi dgra dang /_sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtse ba dang /_
[\[197b.3\]]gza' dang /_sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/_sa brgyad pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sa dgu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la sgo mtha' yas pa'i rgyun ces bya ba'i gzungs 'di skye'o/_/gzungs la/_tad+ya thA/_
[\[197b.4\]]ha ri tsaN+Da li ke/_ku la mA b+ha te/_to ra shi pa ta pa ta si/_shi ri shi ri/_ga shi ri/_ga bi shi ri/_swa sti sarba satwA nAM swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni gang gA'i klung dgu'i bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sa dgu pa la gnas 
[\[197b.5\]]pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs te/_sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/_'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gcan gzan khro bo dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/_pha rol gyi dgra dang /_sdug bsngal 
[\[197b.6\]]rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtse ba dang /_gza' dang /_sgrib pa rnam pa lnga las kyang rnam par grol te/_sa dgu pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/rigs kyi bu sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po la zad mi shes pa'i za ma tog ces bya ba'i 
[\[197b.7\]]gzungs 'di skye ste/_gzungs la/_tad+ya thA/_sid+d+he sud+d+he/_mo tsa ni/_mo k+Sha ni/_muk+te/_bi muk+te/_a ma le/_bi ma le/_da ma le/_mAng+ga le/_hi ra N+ya gar+b+he/_rat+na gar+b+he/_sa man+ta b+ha dre/_sarba ar+thA/_sA d+ha ni/_ma na si ma hA ma na si/_ad+d+hu te/_a t+yad+d+hu te/_a ra dze/_
[\[198a\]]
[\[198a.1\]]bi ra dze/_u ts+yute/_a mr-I te/_a ra dze/_bi ra dze/_bra h+me bra h+ma/_sA re pU ra Ni pU ra Na/_ma no ra the swA hA/_rigs kyi bu gzungs 'di ni bkra shis pa dang spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba ste gang gA'i klung bcu'i bye ma snyed las 'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 
[\[198a.2\]]'das rnams kyis sa bcu pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bsrung ba'i phyir gsungs te/_sus gzungs sngags 'di 'don cing 'chang na/_'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gcan gzan khro bo dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]ma rungs pa dang /_mi dang mi ma yin pa la sogs te/_
[\[198a.3\]]pha rol gyi dgra dang /_sdug bsngal rnam pa sna tshogs kyis gtse ba dang /_gza' dang /_gdug pa can thams cad dang /_sgrib pa rnam pa lnga la sogs pa las rnam par grol te/_sa bcu pa rjes su dran par 'gyur ro/_/de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen 
[\[198a.4\]]po seng ge'i tog gi 'od zer snang ba thogs pa med pa zhes bya bas/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs 'di dag bshad pa thos nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar ba btud 
[\[198a.5\]]nas zhabs la phyag 'tshal te tshigs su bcad pa 'dis bstod do/_/zab mo mtshan nyid med chos la/_/skye bo shes pa nyams pa rnams/_/bcom ldan nyag gcig sgrol mdzad pa/_/dpe med khyod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i shes rab spyan/_/
[\[198a.6\]]chos kyi mtshan nyid gcig mi gzigs/_/yang dag chos kyi spyan gyis ni/_/kun du gsal ba bsam mi khyab/_/chos 'ga'ang skye ba med pa ste/_/'gog par yang ni mi 'gyur ro/_/de ltar mnyam par gzigs pas na/_/bla med gnas su bzhugs par 'gyur/_/
[\[198a.7\]]'khor ba dag kyang mi 'jig la/_/mya ngan 'das la'ang mi bzhugs shing /_/mtha' gnyis la ni mi gnas te/_/de'i phyir mya ngan 'da' ba brnyes/_/dag dang ma dag phyogs la yang /_/rnam par dbye ba med pa'i phyir/_/bcom ldan ro gcig mkhyen 
[\[198b\]]
[\[198b.1\]]pas na/_/rnam par dag pa'i mchog brnyes so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyi tshad med skus/_/tshig gcig ston pa med par yang /_/'khor mang 'di dag thams cad la/_/chos kyi char gyis tshim par mdzad/_/sems can 'di dag thams cad kyi/_/mtshan 
[\[198b.2\]]nyid rnam par gzigs med kyang /_/nyon mongs sdug bsngal thams cad las/_/bcom ldan rtag tu skyob par mdzad/_/bde dang sdug bsngal rtag mi rtag_/bdag dang bdag med la sogs dang /_/gcig dang tha dad ma yin dang /_/skye ba med dang 'gog 
[\[198b.3\]]med pa'i/_/de 'dra'i don gyi rnam pa la/_/rnam par dbye zhing ston par mdzad/_/dper na brag ca stong par ni/_/de don sangs rgyas rnams kyis mkhyen/_/chos kyi dbyings ni dbyer med pas/_/theg pa mi mthun gzhan med de/_/sems can rnams ni 
[\[198b.4\]]bsgral ba'i phyir/_/gsum du rnam par dbye ba mdzad/_/de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po dbang phyug chen po stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom 
[\[198b.5\]]ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di shin tu dkon zhing /_dpag par dka' ba/_thog mar yang dge ba/_bar du yang dge ba/_tha mar yang dge ba/_
[\[198b.6\]]don bzang po/_tshig 'bru bzang po/_ma 'dres pa yongs su rdzogs pa/_sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad phun sum tshogs par mdzad pa 'di gang zhig 'chang ba dang /_'dzin pa de/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi mdzad pa gzo ba lags so/_/de skad 
[\[198b.7\]]ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu ji skad smras pa de bzhin te/_rigs kyi bu gang mdo sde 'di nyan par byed pa ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_
[\[199a\]]
[\[199a.1\]]rigs kyi bu 'dis ni/_sa las phyir mi ldog pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mchog tu smin par byed pa dang /_chos kyi phyag rgya dam pa yin pa dang /_mdo sde kun gyi rgyal por gyur pa ste/_de'i phyir mnyan pa dang /_gzung ba 
[\[199a.2\]]dang /_bklag pa dang /_gdon par bya'o/_/de yang rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma smin pa dang /_sangs rgyas mang po la bsnyen bkur ma byas pa'i sems can de dag gis ni dam pa'i chos 'di mnyan par mi nus so/_/rigs kyi 
[\[199a.3\]]bu chos kyi rnam grangs 'di thos pa tsam gyis/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dag lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su dag cing sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/dam pa'i chos nyan pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_dge 'dun la bsnyen bkur byed 
[\[199a.4\]]pa dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_rgya mtsho'i phyag rgya mi zad pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_sems can gyi bsam pa dang /_spyod pa dang /_sgra la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_nyi ma'i tog snang ba'i gzungs dang mi 
[\[199a.5\]]'bral bar 'gyur/_zla ba'i tog snang ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_kun nas ldang ba thams cad rnam par gnon pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_rdo rje ltar sra zhing brtan pa'i ri rnam par 'joms pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_
[\[199a.6\]]brjod du med pa'i don bstan pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_tshig dang spyod pa dang /_sgra thams cad la 'jug pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor dri ma med pa bsgrub pa'i phyag rgyas btab pa'i 
[\[199a.7\]]gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur/_sangs rgyas kyi sku mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs pa bsgrub pa'i gzungs dang mi 'bral bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bu gzungs 'di dag thob pas byang chub sems dpa' rnams phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams su sangs rgyas kyi 
[\[199b\]]
[\[199b.1\]]sku mngon par sprul nas chos ston to/_/chos nyid las kyang mi g.yo la/_'gro ba yang med/_'ong ba yang med do/_/sems can rnams yongs su smin par byed kyang /_sems can du dmigs pa yang med do/_/chos ston kyang yi ge mnyam pa nyid las g.yo ba med do/_/
[\[199b.2\]]'chi 'pho ba dang skye ba ston kyang 'pho ba yang med/_skye ba yang med do/_/chos thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa'i phyir/_'du byed rnams gang du yang 'gro bar mi 'gyur/_gang nas kyang 'ong bar yang mi 'gyur ro/_/chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa na/_byang chub sems 
[\[199b.3\]]dpa' sum stong gis/_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par gyur to/_/byang chub sems dpa' tshad med pa rnams kyis ni/_byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/dge slong dang /_dge slong ma tshad med pa rnams kyis ni/_chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag 
[\[199b.4\]]pa thob bo/_/sems can tshad med pa rnams kyis ni/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed par gyur pa dang /_de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/'khor ba'i rgyun gcod dam chos 'di/_/zab 
[\[199b.5\]]cing phra la blta dka' ste/_/'dod pas bsgribs pa'i dmus long dag_/de ma mthong bas sdug bsngal len/_/de nas 'khor 'dus pa de dag stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[199b.6\]]gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di klog cing 'don pa dang /_ston cing gnas pa der bdag cag thams cad mchis nas/_chos ston pa'i 'khor du bgyis te/_de la phan pa dang /_bde ba stsal cing lus dang sems bde bar bgyi'o/_/bdag cag gis 
[\[199b.7\]]sems rtse gcig tu gyur pas mchod par bgyi'o/_/nyan pa'i 'khor rnams kyang bde bas tshim par bgyi'o/_/rgyal po'i yul der yang pha rol gyi dgra'i 'jigs pa dang /_'tshe ba dang /_mu ge'i ya nga bas sdug bsngal ba ma mchis pa dang /_skye bo mang pos rgyas shing 
[\[200a\]]
[\[200a.1\]]yongs su dar bar bgyi'o/_/chos 'di bshad pa'i gnas kyi dkyil 'khor 'di lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin la sogs pa thams cad dang /_sems can thams cad kyis mi brdzi zhing gtsang mar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_chos bshad pa'i gnas 
[\[200a.2\]]'di ni mchod rten lags pa'i slad du/_gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_lhab lhub kyis yongs su mchod par bgyi'o/_/bdag cag gis kyang rtag tu bsrung zhing bskyabs te nyams pa ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[200a.3\]]kyis 'khor 'dus pa de dag la bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi bu khyed kyis mdo sde dam pa 'di bsgrub pa la brtson par gyis shig dang /_dam pa'i chos 'di 'jig rten 'dir yun ring du gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_sa rnam par 
[\[200a.4\]]sbyong ba zhes bya ba'i le'u zhes bya ste drug pa'o//_//bam po lnga pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po gser gyi lag pa'i dbang 
[\[200a.5\]]po zhes bya ba des/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa/_pad+mo'i 'byung gnas 'dis 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la mngon par bstod do/_/rgyal ba gang dag sngar 'gyur gang byung dang /_/phyogs bcu'i 
[\[200a.6\]]'jig rten dag na gang 'tsho ba/_/rgyal ba de dag rnams la phyag bgyi'o/_/rgyal ba de dag kun la bdag gis bstod/_/thub dbang zhi zhing rab zhi rnam par dag_/sku ni gser gyi mdog tu rab tu gda'/_/dbyangs rnams kun pas sangs rgyas gsung snyan te/_/tshangs 
[\[200a.7\]]pa'i sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrags pa'i gsung /_/bung ba rma bya ut+pal sngon po'i dbu/_/mthon mthing lcang lo bya ni tsa sha 'dra/_/kha ba dung ltar rab tu dkar ba'i tshems/_/rtag tu gser ltar rnam par mdzes par gda'/_/spyan ni ring zhing mthon mthing dri ma med/_/
[\[200b\]]
[\[200b.1\]]ut+pal sngon po rab tu rgyas pa 'dra/_/ljags ni che zhing legs pa pad+ma'i mdog_/pad+ma 'drar snang pad+ma'i ze ba 'dra/_/zhal gyi mdzod spu pad rtsa dung dang 'dra/_/bai DUr+ya yi mdog 'dra g.yas su 'khyil/_/thub pa'i sku ni zla ba phra 'dra zhing /_/zla ba zad 'dra spyan bkrag 
[\[200b.2\]]bung ba bzhin/_/zhal mtho shangs ni rtag tu lhang nge ste/_/'jam zhing sa yi gser ltar kha dog bzang /_/rtag par rgyun du rgyal ba thams cad kyi/_/ro mchog 'jam zhing dam pa'i mchog rab 'phags/_/spu yi bu ga nas ni re re skyes/_/spu rnams skyes pa g.yas 
[\[200b.3\]]su 'khyil pa ste/_/mthon mthing 'dra bar 'tsher zhing lcang lo can/_/rma bya'i mgrin sdug 'dra bar sngo la mdzes/_/bltams ma thag tu sku yis snang bar bgyis/_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten dag ni thams cad gang /_/'jig rten gsum na sdug bsngal mtha' yas zhi/_/
[\[200b.4\]]bde ba kun gyis sems can rnams kyang tshim/_/sems dmyal 'gro dang dud 'gror 'gro ba dang /_/[{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]lha gnas mi yi 'gro rnams su/_/sems can de dag thams cad bde bas tshim/_/ngan song 'gro ba rnams ni thams cad zhi/_/kha dog bzang ba gser dang 
[\[200b.5\]]'dra ba'i 'od/_/btso ma'i gser ltar rab tu snang ba'i sku/_/bde gshegs zla ba rab tu dri med zhal/_/'dzum zhing rnam mdzes shin tu dri med zhal/_/gzhon nu btsas 'drar sku lus yan lag 'jam/_/seng ge 'dra bar rtsal gyis gnon pa'i mchog_/phyag ring phyag ni rab tu 
[\[200b.6\]]ring ba ste/_/sA la'i lcug ma rlung gis bskyod pa bzhin/_/'dom gang 'od 'bar 'od zer rab tu gtong /_/nyi ma stong ltar rab tu lhang nge'o/_/thub pa'i dbang po'i sku mchog dri ma med/_/zhing rnams mtha' yas thams cad rab tu snang /_/sangs rgyas 'od ni rnam par lhang 
[\[200b.7\]]nge bas/_/zhing rnams mtha' yas brgya stong rnams su yang /_/mtshan byad zla ba nyi ma mang po dag_/de dag thams cad 'od ni med par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma 'jig rten sgron ma ste/_/sangs rgyas nyi ma brgya phrag stong rnams ni/_/zhing rnams mtha' yas stong phrag 
[\[201a\]]
[\[201a.1\]]brgya dag na/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma sems can mthong /_/bsod nams stong phrag brgya dang ldan pa'i sku/_/yon tan kun gyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sku/_/glang chen dbang po'i sna 'dra rgyal ba'i phyag_/phyag dang zhabs 'od rab mdzes dri ma 
[\[201a.2\]]med/_/sa yi steng gi rdul dang mtshungs 'dra snyed/_/phra ba'i rdul snyed sangs rgyas gang 'das dang /_/gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed byung ba dang /_/gang dag phra ba'i rdul snyed bzhugs pa yi/_/rgyal ba de dag la ni rab dang ba'i/_/ngag yid lus kyis me tog dbul 
[\[201a.3\]]ba dang /_/spos rnams dbul dang bsngags pa brgya dag dang /_/dge ba'i sems kyis kyang ni phyag 'tshal lo/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan gang dag dge gyur pa/_/snying po mchog rab sna tshogs du ma ste/_/bdag gis bskal pa stong du lce brgya yis/_/sangs rgyas yon 
[\[201a.4\]]tan brjod par mi nus so/_/rgyal ba gcig gi yon tan rnams kyang ni/_/lce stong gis kyang cung zad brjod mi nus/_/bdag gis rgyal ba dag ni thams cad kyi/_/yon tan gcig rgyas brjod par ga la nus/_/lhar bcas 'jig rten thams cad mtshor gyur te/_/srid 
[\[201a.5\]]pa'i rtse mo man chad chus gang ba/_/skra yi rtse mos dpag par nus srid kyis/_/bde gshegs rnams kyi yon tan gcig la min/_/lus dang ngag dang yid rab dang ba yis/_/rgyal ba kun la bdag gis bsngags bstod pas/_/bdag gis bsod nams 'bras 
[\[201a.6\]]bu mchog bsags gang /_/des ni sems can rgyal ba reg gyur cig_/de ltar rgyal pos sangs rgyas rnams bstod nas/_/rgyal po 'di ltar smon lam 'debs pa ni/_/ma 'ongs bskal pa mtha' yas rnams su yang /_/gang dang gang du bdag ni skye ba na/_/rmi 
[\[201a.7\]]lam du ni 'di 'dra'i rnga mthong zhing /_/der ni bshags pa 'di 'dra thos par shog_/rgyal bstod pad+ma 'byung rgyal 'di 'dra ba/_/tshe rabs de dang der ni rnyed gyur cig_/sangs rgyas yon tan mtha' yas mtshungs med dang /_/gang yang bskal pa stong du rnyed dka' 
[\[201b\]]
[\[201b.1\]]ba/_/de dag rmi lam na yang thos par shog_/nyin gyur tshe yang de dag ston gyur cig_/sems can sdug bsngal mtsho las thar byed shog_/pha rol phyin pa drug po rdzogs bgyis nas/_/phyin chad bla med byang chub thob par shog_/bdag gis zhing ni 'gran zla med gyur 
[\[201b.2\]]cig_/rnga phul rnam par smin pa'i 'bras bu dang /_/rgyal ba thams cad la yang bstod pa'i rgyus/_/shAkya thub dbang mngon du mthong bar shog_/der ni bdag gis lung bstan thob gyur cig_/gser gyi lag pa'i dbang dang gser gyi 'od/_/bdag gi khye'u ni 
[\[201b.3\]]gang yin 'di gnyis kyang /_/der ni bu pho de dag gnyi ga yang /_/byang chub bla med lung bstan thob par shog_/sems can gang dag gnas med rten med cing /_/skyabs dang bral nas phongs par gyur pa dag_/de dag la yang ma 'ongs dus rnams na/_/skyob dang 
[\[201b.4\]]dpung gnyen skyabs dang rten gyur shog_/sdug bsngal kun 'byung zad par byed gyur cig_/bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas gyur par shog_/sngon mtha' 'das pa de dag ji srid pa/_/ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyod gyur cig_/gser 'od dam pa yi ni bshags pa 
[\[201b.5\]]yis/_/bdag gi sdig pa'i rgya mtsho skems par shog_/bdag gi las kyi rgya mtsho zad gyur cig_/bdag gi nyon mongs rgya mtsho chad par shog_/bdag gi bsod nams rgya mtsho rdzogs gyur cig_/ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis/_/bdag gi ye shes rgya 
[\[201b.6\]]mtsho rnam dag shog_/yon tan kun gyi rgya mtshor 'gyur bar shog_/byang chub yon tan yon tan rin chen rdzogs/_/gser 'od dam pa'i bshags pa'i stobs kyis ni/_/bdag gi bsod nams rab tu snang bar shog_/bdag gi byang chub snang ba rnam dag 
[\[201b.7\]]gyur/_/ye shes dri med snang ba dam pa yis/_/bdag gi lus kyi 'od ni snang bar shog_/bsod nams snang ba lhang nger bya ba'i phyir/_/'jig rten gsum na khyad par 'phags gyur cig_/bsod nams stobs dang rtag tu ldan par shog_/sdug bsngal rgya 
[\[202a\]]
[\[202a.1\]]mtsho las ni sgrol ba dang /_/bde ba kun gyi rgya mtsho 'dra ba yis/_/ma 'ongs bskal par byang chub spyod par bgyi/_/'jig rten gsum na sngon mthar ji snyed gshegs/_/de dag zhing ni rgyal ba thams cad kyi/_/yon tan mtha' yas khyad 
[\[202a.2\]]'phags ci 'dra ba/_/yon tan mtha' yas rnams kyis bdag gi zhing /_/ma 'ongs dus na de 'drar 'gyur bar shog_/mdzes pa'i tog gis shes par byos/_/rgyal po gser gyi lag dbang gis/_/sngon tshe smon lam 'di btab ste/_/de nyid da ltar khyod 
[\[202a.3\]]yin no/_/sngon gyi dus kyi bu gnyis ni/_/gser gyi lag dang gser gyi 'od/_/de nyid dngul tog dngul 'od ces/_/ngas ni de tshe lung bstan to/_/'khor mang de dag 'di thos nas/_/kun gyis byang chub sems bskyed pa/_/da ltar ma 'ongs dus dag tu/_/
[\[202a.4\]]rtag par bshags pa 'di byed shog_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad la bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste bdun pa'o//_//de nas bcom 
[\[202a.5\]]ldan 'das kyis 'khor de'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po bde bar gnas pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi bu gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs 'di gang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la las 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_
[\[202a.6\]]da ltar gyi sangs rgyas thams cad mngon du mchod cing bkur sti byed 'dod pas gzungs 'di bcang zhing gzung bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gzungs 'di 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir/_
[\[202a.7\]]gzungs 'di 'dzin pa ni bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya cher 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/'das pa'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dpag tu med pa dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa rnams kyis 'dzin cing 'chang bar 'gyur ro/_/tshul khrims rnam par dag pa ma nyams shing skyon med 
[\[202b\]]
[\[202b.1\]]pa rnams kyis/_chos kyi rnam grangs shin tu zab mo 'di la 'jug nus par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_gzungs sngags bsgrub pa'i cho ga ni/_sngar sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan 'di dag brjod cing /_
[\[202b.2\]]sems rtse gcig pas phyag 'tshol la de nas sngags 'di gdon par bya'o/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas dang /_'phags pa 
[\[202b.3\]]thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shar phyogs kyi sangs rgyas mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lho phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rin po che'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nub phyogs kyi sangs rgyas 'od dpag med la phyag 
[\[202b.4\]]'tshal lo/_/byang phyogs kyi sangs rgyas rnga sgra'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/steng gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas yangs pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'og gi phyogs kyi sangs rgyas snang ba dam pa'i dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin chen snying po la phyag 'tshal 
[\[202b.5\]]lo/_/sangs rgyas kun tu 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas kun tu snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas spos mchog brtsegs pa'i rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas pad+ma dam pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas mnyam par gzigs la 
[\[202b.6\]]phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin chen bla ma la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rin chen 'od la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dri med 'od snang la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas spobs pas bkod par 
[\[202b.7\]]dgongs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas zla 'od rnam dag grags pa'i tog gi rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas me tog 'od bkod la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'od snang rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dge 'od dri ma med par grags pa'i 
[\[203a\]]
[\[203a.1\]]rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas spyan ras gzigs dbang mi 'jigs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas 'jigs med grags pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas rab mchog rgyal po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' 
[\[203a.2\]]chen po spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po sa'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nam mkha'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po 
[\[203a.3\]]'jam dpal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po phyag na rdo rje la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po blo gros mi zad pa la phyag 
[\[203a.4\]]'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po mthu chen thob pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po legs pa'i blo gros la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag 
[\[203a.5\]]la phyag 'tshal nas gzungs 'di gdon par bya'o/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ku Ti ku Ti ni/_i mi ri to/_ko Sha Ni/_i mi ri Ni/_i rI swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' bde bar gnas pa la bka' stsal pa/_gzungs 'di ni dus 
[\[203a.6\]]gsum gyi sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum yin pa'i phyir/_rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis gzungs 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na/_bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med dpag tu med pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/grangs med pa'i sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti 
[\[203a.7\]]dang /_mchod pa dang /_rim gro dang /_bsngags par byas par 'gyur ro/_/sangs rgyas de rnams kyis kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu de la lung ston par 'gyur ro/_/bde bar gnas pa gang zhig gzungs sngags 'di 'chang ba des gos dang /_bsod 
[\[203b\]]
[\[203b.1\]]snyoms dang /_rin po che dang /_mang du thos shing mkhas pa dang /_nad med cing tshe ring ba la sogs pa yid bzhin du 'thob ste/_bsod nams shin tu mang du 'phel lo/_/ci dang ci 'dod pa de dang de dag thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bde bar gnas nas sngags 'di 'chang 
[\[203b.2\]]zhing 'dzin na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub ma thob kyi bar du/_rtag par byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi grong khyer ri bo dang /_byang chub sems dpa' byams pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho dang /_byang chub sems dpa' kun tu spyan ras 
[\[203b.3\]]gzigs dbang phyug dang /_byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal dang /_byang chub sems dpa' ping ga la chen po la sogs pa dang lhan cig tu gnas te/_byang chub sems dpa' de rnams kyis srung bar byed do/_/bde bar gnas pas gzungs 'di 
[\[203b.4\]]sgrub pa'i cho ga ni 'di yin par shes par bya'o/_/thog mar bzlas brjod khri rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas pas bsnyen par bya'o/_/de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du/_dkyil 'khor byas te/_tshes bcu drug gi nyin par khrus byas gos sar pa gyon te/_bdug pa dang /_me tog dang /_zhal zas 
[\[203b.5\]]sna mang po la sogs pas/_mchod pa bya zhing dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/_thog mar sngar smos pa'i sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mtshan nas brjod de/_gus par phyag 'tshal zhing sdig pa bshags nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la 
[\[203b.6\]]btsugs te/_sngags de stong rtsa brgyad tshang bar bzlas so/_/de nas lus bsrang ste 'dug nas ci 'dod pa de bsam par bya'o/_/de nas nyi ma ma shar bar dkyil 'khor gyi nang du kha zas gtsang ma za gcig tu bza'o/_/de nas zhag [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga lon pa dang /_gzod dkyil 
[\[203b.7\]]'khor de nas byung bar byas te/_mi de ni bsod nams dang gzi brjid kyi mthu bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan zhing /_bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gal te bsam pa ma grub na yang dkyil 'khor der zhugs na/_bsam pa yongs su 
[\[204a\]]
[\[204a.1\]]rdzogs par 'gyur bas/_de phyin cad kyang rtag tu rjes su dran par bya'o/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las gser can zhes bya ba'i gzungs te le'u brgyad pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gzungs de gsungs nas/_/
[\[204a.2\]]gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po dang /_lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'khor 'dus pa de dag la phan pa dang /_bde ba'i phyir don dam pa'i bden pa stong pa'i mtshan nyid de bstan pa'i phyir de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gsungs so/_/bsam gyis mi khyab 
[\[204a.3\]]mdo rnams gzhan dag tu/_/stong pa'i chos rnams rab tu rgyas bshad de/_/de lta bas na mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/_/stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam bshad par bya/_/sems can blo chung rnam par mi shes pas/_/chos rnams thams cad shes par mi nus te/_/de lta bas na 
[\[204a.4\]]mdo mchog dam pa 'dir/_/stong pa'i chos rnams mdo tsam rab tu bshad/_/sems can kun gyis ci nas shes 'gyur dang /_/sems can 'byung bya'i phyir ni snying rje'i dbang /_/thabs dang tshul dang rgyu gzhan rnams kyis ni/_/mdo mchog dam pa dbang po 'di bshad do/_/lus 
[\[204a.5\]]'di grong khyim stong pa ji bzhin te/_/dbang po rnams ni dmag dang chom rkun 'dra/_/de dag thams cad grong gcig gnas mod kyi/_/de dag phan tshun rnam par mi shes so/_/mig gi dbang po gzugs gyur rnams la rgyug_/rna ba'i dbang po sgra la rnam par dpyod/_/sna yi 
[\[204a.6\]]dbang po sna tshogs dri rnams 'phrog_/lce yi dbang po rtag tu ro la rgyug_/lus kyi dbang po reg pa dag la rgyug_/yid kyi dbang po chos rnams rnam par dpyod/_/dbang po drug po 'di dag phan tshun du/_/rang rang yul la rab tu 'jug par byed/_/sems ni sgyu ma lta bur 
[\[204a.7\]]g.yo ba yin/_/dbang po drug ni yul la rnam dpyod de/_/ji ltar mi zhig grong stong rgyug pa dang /_/dmag dang chom rkun dag dang gnas pa bzhin/_/ji ltar bya zhig yul drug gnas bcas shing /_/dbang po'i spyod yul dag kyang rab shes pa/_/de ltar sems ni yul 
[\[204b\]]
[\[204b.1\]]'jug gnas bcas te/_/dbang po'i spyod yul rnams kyang rab tu shes/_/gzugs dang sgra dang de bzhin dri rnams dang /_/ro dang reg bya de bzhin spyod yul chos/_/sems ni dbang po drug po thams cad la/_/dbang por zhugs par bya bzhin g.yo bar gyur/_/dbang po 
[\[204b.2\]]gang dang gang du gnas bcas pa/_/dbang po de ni shes pa bdag nyid byed/_/lus ni g.yo ba med cing byed pa med/_/snying po med cing rkyen las byung ba yin/_/yang dag ma yin yongs su rtog las byung /_/grong stong las kyi 'khrul 'khor 'dra bar gnas/_/sa dang me 
[\[204b.3\]]dang chu dang rlung rnams ni/_/grong gzhan gnas te phyogs dang phyogs na gnas/_/dper na sbrul gdug gnas gcig ji bzhin te/_/rtag tu phan tshun mthun pa ma yin bzhin/_/khams kyi sbrul rnams bzhi po de dag kyang /_/gnyis ni steng 'gro gnyis ni thur du 
[\[204b.4\]]'gro/_/phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su gnyis gnyis te/_/khams sbrul de dag thams cad 'jig par 'gyur/_/sa yi sbrul dang chu yi sbrul dag dang /_/'di gnyis [(]'go [,]'og [)]tu zad par 'gyur ba yin/_/me yi sbrul dang rlung gi sbrul dag dang /_/'di gnyis 
[\[204b.5\]]steng gi nam mkhar 'gro ba yin/_/ji ltar sngon chad byas pa'i las rnams kyis/_/sems dang rnam shes kun tu gnas nas dong /_/lha dang mi dang ngan song gsum dag tu/_/ji ltar byas pa'i las kyis srid par skye/_/bad kan rlung dang mkhris pa zad gyur na/_/
[\[204b.6\]]lus ni gcin dang ngan skyugs rnams kyis gang /_/mngon par mi dga' srin bu'i phung por gyur/_/dur khrod dag na 'thor ba shing bzhin gyur/_/lha mo khyod ni chos 'di rnams la ltos/_/'di la sems can gang zag gang zhig yod/_/chos rnams 'di dag thams cad 
[\[204b.7\]]stong pa ste/_/ma rig pa yi rkyen las byung ba yin/_/'byung ba chen po 'di dag che 'byung min/_/ma byung ba las byung zhing mi 'byung ste/_/gang gi phyir ni 'byung ba mi 'byung ba/_/de phyir 'byung ba che zhes ngas brjod do/_/yod pa min zhing nam yang yod min la/_/ma rig 
[\[205a\]]
[\[205a.1\]]pa yi rkyen las 'byung ba yin/_/ma rig 'di ni yod pa ma yin te/_/de bas ngas ni ma rig 'di bshad do/_/'du byed rnam shes ming dang gzugs bcas dang /_/skye mched drug dang reg dang tshor ba dang /_/sred dang len dang de bzhin srid pa dang /_/skye 
[\[205a.2\]]dang rga shi mya ngan gnod pa rnams/_/'khor ba'i sdug bsngal bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/'khor ba'i 'khor lo ji ltar gnas pa dag_/ma byung ba las byung dang mi 'byung dang /_/tshul bzhin ma yin sems kyis rnam dpyad dang /_/bdag gi lta bar gyur pa gcad par 
[\[205a.3\]]bgyis/_/ye shes ral gris nyon mongs rgya mo drol/_/phung po'i gnas la stong par gyur par ltos/_/byang chub yon tan rgya chen reg par gyis/_/ngas ni bdud rtsi grong khyer sgo yang phye/_/bdud rtsi'i khu ba'i snod kyang kun tu bstan/_/ngas ni bdud rtsi'i grong khyer gnas 
[\[205a.4\]]der 'jug_/ngas ni bdud rtsi'i khu bas bdag tshim byas/_/ngas ni chos kyi rnga chen dam pa brdungs/_/ngas ni chos kyi dung gi mchog kyang bus/_/ngas ni chos kyi sgron ma mchog 'bar byas/_/ngas ni chos kyi char pa dam pa phab/_/ngas ni nyon mongs dgra tshogs rnams las rgyal/_/
[\[205a.5\]]ngas ni chos kyi rgyal mtshan dam pa bsgreng /_/srid pa'i mtsho las sems can rab tu bsgral/_/ngas ni ngan song gsum gyi lam rnams bkag_/sems can nyon mongs me yis gdungs gyur pa/_/rten med gyur cing dpung gnyen med pa dag_/srog chags nyon mongs 
[\[205a.6\]]mes gdungs zhi byas nas/_/bdud rtsi khu ba bsil bas tshim par byas/_/gang phyir bskal ba du mar sngon chad ngas/_/'dren pa bsam gyis mi khyab mchod pa byas/_/chos kyi sku de yongs su tshol ba na/_/brtul zhugs brtan pas byang chub phyir spyad de/_/lag 
[\[205a.7\]]pa dang ni mig dang rkang pa dang /_/yan lag mchog dang bu sdug bu mo dang /_/nor dbyig nor bu mu tig rgyan dang gser/_/bai DUr+ya dang rin chen sna tshogs btang /_/stong gsum shing ljon thams cad dang /_/rtswa dang rtswa rnams thams cad dang /_/nags tshal dag 
[\[205b\]]
[\[205b.1\]]dang sa las ni/_/'khrungs pa thams cad gcad gtubs te/_/de dag thams cad phyer brlags nas/_/rab tu phra ba'i rdul 'drar byas/_/nam mkha'i dkyil 'khor ji tsam par/_/phye ma'i phung po spungs nas ni/_/'di la cha gsum dbye bar nus/_/sa la 
[\[205b.2\]]rdul ni yod pa rnams/_/stong gsum dag ni thams cad kyi/_/rdul khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/sems can kun gyis shes pa gang /_/de ni sems can gcig gir gyur/_/shes pa de yis rdul rnams kyi/_/phye ma bgrang bar byed na ni/_/sems 
[\[205b.3\]]can kun las rab 'phags pa/_/ye shes rab ldan mi rnams kyis/_/thams cad bgrang bar nus srid kyi/_/rgyal ba'i mkhyen pa mi nus so/_/thub pa chen po'i ye shes gang /_/skad cig gcig la 'jug pa yang /_/bskal pa bye ba du mar ni/_/gang du'ang 
[\[205b.4\]]bgrang bar mi nus so/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_stong pa nyid kyi le'u zhes bya ste dgu pa'o//_//de nas lha mo rin chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa shin tu zab mo de thos nas/_dga' ba dang rangs pa skyes te/_'khor 'dus 
[\[205b.5\]]pa de'i nang nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bstan pa zab mo 'di la ji ltar rnal 'byor du bya ba zhu ba'i phyir/_bcom 
[\[205b.6\]]ldan 'das la tshigs su bcad de gsol pa/_rgyal ba rkang gnyis gtso lags te/_/'jig rten kun tu snang mdzad pa/_/byang chub spyod pa yang dag tshul/_/bdag la thugs rjes bshad du gsol/_/rigs kyi lha mo la bka' stsal pa/_khyod la the tshom ci 
[\[205b.7\]]yod pa/_/'dri ba'i don de zhus shig dang /_/rnam par phye ste bstan par bya/_/de nas yang rigs kyi lha mos bcom ldan 'das la gsol ba/_bdag dang gzhan la phan gdags phyir/_/byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ni/_/'khor dang mya ngan 'das bral 
[\[206a\]]
[\[206a.1\]]ba'i/_/byang chub spyod pa ji ltar spyad/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/lha mo chos kyi dbyings la gnas te/_byang chub kyi spyod pa spyad pas na/_mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du bya'o/_/de skad 
[\[206a.2\]]ces bka' stsal pa dang /_rigs kyi lha mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar na chos kyi dbyings la gnas te/_byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod cing mnyam pa nyid la nan tan du bgyi ba lags/_bka' stsal pa/_lha 
[\[206a.3\]]mo de ni phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su 'dogs te/_chos kyi dbyings ni phung po lnga nyid do/_/phung po lnga yang brjod du med pa/_phung po lnga ma yin pa yang brjod du med pa ste/_de la chos kyi dbyings de nyid phung po lnga yin na ni chad par 'gyur ro/_/gal te phung po 
[\[206a.4\]]lnga las gzhan par 'dod na ni rtag par 'gyur te/_mtshan ma gnyis dang bral ba/_mtha' gnyis la mi gnas pa/_bltar med pa/_blta bar bya ba las 'das pa/_ming dang mtshan ma med pa de ni chos kyi dbyings zhes brjod do/_/rigs kyi lha mo phung po lnga la chos kyi 
[\[206a.5\]]dbyings su ji ltar gdags zhe na/_phung po lnga de ni rgyu dang rkyen gyis ma bskyed pa de/_de yang gal te rgyu dang rkyen las skye ba zhig yin na ni/_skyes zin pa skye'am/_mi skye ba skye zhes bya/_gal te skyes zin pa skye na ni/_rgyu dang rkyen kyang mi dgos pa'i rigs so/_/gal te 
[\[206a.6\]]ma skyes pa skye na ni/_skye ba dmigs su med pa'i phyir ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gang ma skyes pa'i chos rnams ni yod pa ma yin pa nyid pas ming med pa mtshan ma med pa/_gzhal ba dang /_dpag pa dang /_dper bya bas mi brjod pa ste/_rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed par bya ba 
[\[206a.7\]]ma yin no/_/rigs kyi lha mo dper na/_rnga'i sgra ni shing dang /_ko ba dang /_lag pa la brten te sgra 'byung mod kyi/_rnga'i sgra de ni 'das pa yang stong /_ma 'ongs pa yang stong /_da ltar gnas pa yang stong ste/_rnga'i sgra de ni shing las ma byung /_ko ba dang lag pa las 
[\[206b\]]
[\[206b.1\]]kyang ma byung /_dus gsum gyis ma bskyed pas mi skye ba ste/_gang mi skye ba de ni mi 'gog pa'o/_/gang mi [(]'ogs [,]'gog [)]pa de ni gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa'o/_/gang nas kyang ma 'ongs pa de ni gang du yang mi 'gro ba'o/_/gang du yang mi 'gro ba de ni rtag pa dang chad pa 
[\[206b.2\]]ma yin pas gcig pa yang ma yin/_tha dad pa yang ma yin pa'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_gal te gcig pa yin na/_chos kyi dbyings dang tha mi dad pas/_'o na ni byis pa so so'i skye bo rnams kyis kyang /_don dam pa'i bden pa mngon du gyur pas/_mya ngan 
[\[206b.3\]]las 'das pa'i bde ba dam pa thob par 'gyur ba zhig na/_de lta ma yin pas de gcig pa ma yin no/_/gal te de tha dad pa yin na ni/_sangs rgyas dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yang /_mtshan ma de nyid 'dzin pa yin pas/_rnam par grol bar 
[\[206b.4\]]yang mi 'gyur zhing /_nyon mongs pa'i 'ching ba dang ma bral bas/_de bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang mi rgya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'phags pa rnams ni 'du byed dang /_'du byed ma yin pa yang dag pa'i ngo bor gcig pa'i phyir tha 
[\[206b.5\]]dad pa ma yin no/_/de bas na phung po lnga po de ni yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin/_rgyu dang rkyen gyis bskyed pa yang ma yin/_rgyu dang rkyen med pas bskyed pa yang ma yin pa/_tshig gis thog tu mi phebs pa/_ming dang mtshan ma med pa/_rgyu dang rkyen med 
[\[206b.6\]]pa/_dpes bstan du med pa/_thog ma dang tha mar dben pa/_rang gi ngang gis stong pa ste/_de ni 'phags pa rnams kyis mkhyen par bya ba yin gyi/_gzhan gyi spyod yul du ma gyur pa'o/_/de bas na phung po lnga la chos kyi dbyings su ston to/_/gzhan yang rigs kyi lha mo gang rigs 
[\[206b.7\]]kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub don dam pa dang /_kun rdzob gzhan dang gzhan ma yin par 'dod pa de ni dpag par dka' ba ste/_'phags pa dang /_ma rabs kyi spyod yul ni gcig 
[\[207a\]]
[\[207a.1\]]pa dang /_tha dad pa'i rang bzhin ma yin te/_kun rdzob kyang ma spangs/_don dam pa dang yang bral bar ma gyur pa de ni/_chos kyi dbyings la gnas shing byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'o/_/de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_
[\[207a.2\]]rigs kyi lha mo de rab tu dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes nas stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs nas/_thal mo sbyar bas btud de/_spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[207a.3\]]to/_/bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa de la bdag gis bslab par 'tshal lo/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa chen po 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na 'dug pas/_rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phro la 'di skad ces 
[\[207a.4\]]dris so/_/lha mo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa shin tu bsgrub par dka' ba 'di khyod ji ltar spyod pas de la dbang thob par 'gyur/_de nas rigs kyi lha mos tshangs pa chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po ji ltar bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa'i don 
[\[207a.5\]]de shin tu zab pas so so'i skye bo thams cad kyis de'i don mi shes te/_'phags pa rnams kyi spyod yul bas/_mchog tu phra ba shes par dka' ba'o/_/bdag ni chos 'di la brten te/_bde bar gnas pa thob bo/_/gal te tshig de bden pa lta na/_snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams 
[\[207a.6\]]'di dag na/_tshad med grangs med dpag tu med pa'i sems can de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog can du gyur te/_mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis dang ldan pa/_skyes pa yang ma yin/_bud med kyang ma yin pa sha stag tu gyur te/_rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug cing /_bde ba 
[\[207a.7\]]tshad med pa la longs spyod pa dang /_lha'i me tog mchog gi char 'bab cing /_lha'i sil snyan dang /_rol mo ma dkrol bar rang byung ba'i mchod pa de lta bu dang ldan par shog cig ces smras ma thag tu/_snyigs ma lnga'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad na/_sems 
[\[207b\]]
[\[207b.1\]]can ji snyed 'khod pa de dag thams cad gser gyi kha dog can/_skyes bu chen po'i mtshan dang ldan pa/_skyes pa yang ma yin/_bud med kyang ma yin par gyur nas/_rin po che'i pad+ma la 'dug cing /_bde ba tshad med pas longs spyod par gyur pa ni/_ji ltar gzhan 
[\[207b.2\]]'phrul dbang byed lha'i gzhal med khang pa na/_ngan 'gro thams cad med cing rin po che'i ljon shing sna tshogs bres pa/_rin po che sna bdun gyi pad+mas 'jig rten gyi khams khyab par byas pa/_rin po che sna bdun dang /_lha'i me tog gi char 'bab pa/_lha'i rol mo sna 
[\[207b.3\]]tshogs kyis longs spyod par gnas pa bzhin du gyur to/_/de nas rigs kyi lha mo rin chen 'od 'phro yang bud med kyi lus las/_tshangs pa'i lus su bsgyur cing 'dug go/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro la tshangs pa'i rgyal pos 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa khyod 
[\[207b.4\]]ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod/_smras pa/_tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po chu'i zla ba byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/_bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/_/rmi lam byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/_bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/_/smig rgyu byang chub kyi 
[\[207b.5\]]spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/_bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/_/sgra brnyan byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod pa bzhin/_bdag kyang byang chub kyi spyad pa spyod do/_/de skad ces bshad pa tshangs pa chen pos thos nas/_byang chub sems dpa' la 'di skad ces smras so/_/btsun pa khyod don 
[\[207b.6\]]gang la gnas te tshig de skad ces smra/_lha mos smras pa/_tshangs pa'i rgyal po chos gang yang bden pa'i mtshan nyid du ma grub cing /_rgyu dang rkyen la brten nas grub pa'i phyir ro/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/_gal te de lta na so so'i skye bo thams cad kyang /_bla na med 
[\[207b.7\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba'i rigs so/_skyes bu khyod ci'i phyir/_de skad ces smra/_byis pa yang gzhan/_mkhas pa yang gzhan/_byang chub kyang gzhan/_byang chub ma yin pa yang gzhan/_rnam par 
[\[208a\]]
[\[208a.1\]]grol ba yang gzhan/_rnam par grol ba ma yin pa yang gzhan ma yin mod kyi tshangs pa chen po de dag thams cad ni/_chos kyi dbyings su mnyam pa nyid de so so ma yin pa/_yang dag par dbyer med pa/_bar mtshams med pa/_'phel ba dang /_
[\[208a.2\]]'grib pa med pa la mngon par chags shing 'dzin to/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal po dper na/_sgyu ma mkhan nam/_de'i slob ma sgyu ma sprul pa la mkhas shing byang bar gyur pa zhig gis/_lam gyi bzhi mdor/_sa dang /_bye ma dang /_shing dang /_rtswa dang /_lo ma la sogs 
[\[208a.3\]]pa gnas gcig tu bsdus te/_sgyu ma sprul pa 'di lta ste/_rta dang glang po che'i tshogs dang /_dmag dang shing rta la sogs pa'i tshogs dang /_rin po che sna bdun gyi phung po dang /_bang ba dang mdzod la sogs pa rnam pa sna tshogs kun la ston to/_/de la sems can byis 
[\[208a.4\]]pa blun po mi shes pa'i rang bzhin can dag gis mthong na/_sgyu ma sprul par mi shes te/_rta dang glang po che la sogs pa mthong ba dang /_thos pa 'di dag ni yang dag par yod pa yin te/_gzhan ni [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa snyam du sems shing /_phyis kyang de la zhib tu rtog 
[\[208a.5\]]par mi byed do/_/de la mkhas pa shes pa'i rang bzhin can rnams ni de lta ma yin te/_sgyu ma sprul pa yin par shes nas/_thos pa dang mthong ba de dag la 'di snyam du sems te/_rta dang glang po che la sogs pa bdag gis mthong ba 'di dag ni yang dag pa ma yin pa/_
[\[208a.6\]]sgyu ma sprul pas 'gro ba'i mig slu bar byed pa ste/_rta dang glang po che dang /_bang mdzod la sogs pa 'di dag ni der snang ba tsam du zad de/_bdag gis mthong ba dang thos pa bzhin du bden pa ma yin par yang 'dzin la/_phyis zhib tu brtags na yang [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa slu ba'i 
[\[208a.7\]]chos su shes so/_/de lta bas na thabs mkhas pa rnams kyis ni/_chos 'di dag thams cad ni yang dag pa ma yin pa'i rang bzhin du rtogs te/_ji ltar mthong ba dang thos pa yang kun rdzob tsam du de dag gi don mtshon pa dang tshig gi tha snyad la brten nas/_yang dag 
[\[208b\]]
[\[208b.1\]]pa'i don shes par bya ba tsam du zad kyi don dam pa ni de lta ma yin no snyam mo/_/yang tshangs pa chen po byis pa so so'i skye bo 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i shes rab kyi mig ma thob pa rnams kyis ni/_chos 'di dag thams cad kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med par yang mi shes la/_
[\[208b.2\]]gang mthong ba dang /_thos pa dang /_'du byed dang /_'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams ji ltar brtags pa ltar bden pa nyid du mngon par zhen te/_chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa don dam pa'i tshul de shes par mi nus so/_/de la 'phags pa rnams kyis ni 
[\[208b.3\]]gang gzigs shing gsan pa dang /_'du byed dang /_'du byed ma yin pa'i chos rnams kyis mthu dang /_las ji lta bu yin pa de la bden pa'o zhes mngon par mi zhen te/_'du byed kyi chos kyang mi bden pa/_'du byed ma yin pa'i chos kyang mi bden pa/_yang dag pa 
[\[208b.4\]]ma yin pa'i rtog pas brtags pa tsam du 'du byed dang /_'du byed ma yin pa'i mtshan nyid kyang ming tsam du zad pa/_bden pa'i rang bzhin du mi grub pa ste/_'phags pa rnams kyis kun rdzob kyi tha snyad la brten nas/_yang dag pa'i bden pa'i don de ston par byed do/_/de 
[\[208b.5\]]bzhin du tshangs pa chen po gang 'phags pa rnams ni/_'phags pa'i ye shes dang /_'phags pa'i gzigs pas chos rnams kyi de bzhin nyid brjod du med pa bzhin/_'du byed dang /_'du byed ma yin pa'i chos kyang de bzhin du lta ste/_kun rdzob tu ming dang mtshan ma sna 
[\[208b.6\]]tshogs la brten nas/_gzhan la ston par byed do/_/de nas yang byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro la tshangs pa chen pos 'di skad ces smras so/_/sems can ji snyed cig gis chos zab mo 'di lta bu rtogs shing shes par nus/_smras pa/_tshangs pa chen po gang 
[\[208b.7\]]sprul pa mang po'i sems dang sems las byung bas chos zab mo 'di yang dag par shes par gyur pa de snyed kyis shes so/_/tshangs pa'i rgyal pos smras pa/_sprul pa de dag nyid kyang rang bzhin yod pa ma yin na/_de dag gis sems dang /_sems las byung ba gang 
[\[209a\]]
[\[209a.1\]]nas skye bar 'gyur/_smras pa/_gang chos kyi dbyings yod pa yang ma yin/_med pa yang ma yin par yang dag par shes pa de dag gis/_zab mo de'i don shes par nus so/_/de nas tshangs pa chen pos/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad 
[\[209a.2\]]ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa ste/_chos kyi gzhung zab mo 'di la mkhas pa lags so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_de de bzhin te/_tshangs pa chen po de ji ltar khyod kyis 
[\[209a.3\]]smras pa de bzhin no/_/byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'dis khyed la ji skad bstan pa bzhin du nan tan du sgrubs shig dang /_mi skye ba'i chos la bzod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po dang /_gzhan yang tshangs pa'i 
[\[209a.4\]]'khor de dag stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar bas byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_tshig 'di skad ces smras so/_/
[\[209a.5\]]deng skyes bu chen po khyod dang phrad cing bdag cag gis dam pa'i chos 'di lta bu thos par gyur pa ngo mtshar che ba lags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshangs pa chen po la bka' stsal pa/_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phro 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_rin po 
[\[209a.6\]]che'i 'od dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_bla na med pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_lha dang mi rnams 
[\[209a.7\]]kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur ro zhes bka' stsal to/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa de'i tshe/_byang chub sems dpa' khri phrag sum stong gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to/_/lha'i bu khri phrag brgyad 
[\[209b\]]
[\[209b.1\]]stong dang /_rgyal po dang /_blon po la sogs pa/_tshad med grangs med pa rnams kyis rdul med cing rdul dang bral ba'i chos la chos kyi mig rnam par dag par gyur to/_/de nas 'khor 'dus pa de'i nang na/_dge slong khri phrag lnga bcu byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod 
[\[209b.2\]]pa byang chub kyi sems las phyir mi ldog par sems pa de dag kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' rin chen 'od 'phros chos bstan pa 'di thos nas/_byang chub kyi sems phyir zhing brtan pa dang /_bsam gyis mi khyab pa bla na med pa'i smon lam yongs su rdzogs nas yang 
[\[209b.3\]]byang chub tu sems bskyed de/_so so nas rang rang gi gos gyon pa phud de/_byang chub sems dpa' la gsol nas/_bla na med pa mchog dam pa'i sems bskyed de smon lam 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bdag cag gis dge ba'i rtsa ba ci mchis pa de dag thams cad bla na med 
[\[209b.4\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yongs su bsngo'o zhes smon lam btab bo/_/tshangs pa chen po dge slong de dag gis/_bsod nams de la brten nas/_ji skad smras pa bzhin nan tan du bsgrubs nas/_bskal pa chen po dgu bcu 'das pa na/_'khor ba las 
[\[209b.5\]]yongs su 'das pa'i shes pa skyes par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dge slong de dag la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed bskal pa grangs med pa sum cu 'das pa'i 'og tu/_bla na med pa'i sangs rgyas su 'gyur te/_bskal pa'i ming ni rgyal bar dga'
