[\[209b.6\]]ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/_yul gyi ming ni dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya bar dus gcig tu kun kyang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de dag kun kyang mtshan smon lam rnam par bkod pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba yon 
[\[209b.7\]]tan gyi mtshan bcu yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/zhes lung bstan to/_/gzhan yang tshangs pa chen po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po gang nyan pa dang 'dzin pa de dag ni mthu dang /_gzi brjid chen po dang ldan par 'gyur te/_dper na gang la la zhig 
[\[210a\]]
[\[210a.1\]]gis/_thabs dang mi ldan pas pha rol tu phyin pa drug_/bskal pa chen po brgyad stong du spyod pa bas/_gang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di glegs bam du bris te/_zla 
[\[210a.2\]]ba phyed phyed cing sems rtse gcig tu byas te klog cing 'don na/_bsod nams kyi phung po 'di la/_bsod nams kyi phung po snga ma des brgya'i char yang nye bar mi phod pa nas/_grangs su bgrang ba dang dper bsgrun par yang mi bzod do/_/tshangs pa chen po de lta bas na/_
[\[210a.3\]]khyod kyis rtag tu yid la bya zhing /_nan tan du bsgrub pa dang /_gzung zhing gzhan la yang yang dag par rgya cher bstan par bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sngon 'das pa'i dus na nga byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshe/_ji ltar skyes bu dpa' bo g.yul ngor 
[\[210a.4\]]lus dang srog la mi lta ba bzhin du/_ngas kyang mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gzung zhing 'dzin pa dang /_klog cing 'don pa dang /_gzhan la yang rgya cher yang dag par ston pa la thogs pa med par gyur to/_/tshangs pa chen po dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po 
[\[210a.5\]]nam 'jig rten na gnas kyi bar du rin po che sna bdun yang med par mi 'gyur ro/_/gal te rgyal po mi bzhugs na/_rin po che sna bdun yang mod la med par 'gyur ro/_/tshangs pa chen po de ltar de bzhin du/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'jig rten 
[\[210a.6\]]na gnas kyi bar du/_bla na med pa'i chos rin po che thams cad kyang nub par mi 'gyur ro/_/mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di nam med pa na gzhan dag kyang nub par 'gyur ro/_/de lta bas na mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di sems rtse gcig tu byas te/_mnyan pa dang /_gzung ba dang /_
[\[210a.7\]]klog pa dang /_gzhan la yang rgya cher bshad pa dang /_yi ger 'drir 'jug pa dang /_lus dang srog la mi blta bas ngal ba dang /_dub pa khyad du gsod cing brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la spyad par bya ste/_bsod nams kyi nang na mchog yin par nga'i 'khor rnams 
[\[210b\]]
[\[210b.1\]]kyis kyang de bzhin du bslab cing nan tan du bya'o/_/de nas tshangs pa'i rgyal po chen po la sogs te/_tshangs pa'i 'khor grangs med pa dang /_brgya byin lha'i dbang po dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gzhan yang gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la sogs pa de dag thams 
[\[210b.2\]]cad stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang 
[\[210b.3\]]po'i rgyal po 'di bsrung ba dang yongs su rgyas par bgyi'o/_/chos 'di ston pa'i tshe bgegs dang bar chad kun bsal te/_dge bar 'gyur ba dang /_kha dog dang /_mthu yongs su rdzogs pa dang /_spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang /_lus dang sems bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[210b.4\]]de'i 'khor rnams kyang bde ba nyams su myong ba dang /_gang na gnas pa'i yul 'khor de yang mu ge dang dgra'i 'jigs pa dang /_mi ma yin pas 'tshe ba zhig mchis na yang bdag cag lha'i 'khor gyis yongs su bsrungs pas/_de dag bde zhing skyid pa dang /_gnod 
[\[210b.5\]]pa rnams ma byung bar gyur na/_de dag kyang bdag cag lha'i mthu lags par 'tshal bar bgyi'o/_/gang la la zhig mdo sde 'di la mchod cing rim gro bgyid na/_de la bdag cag gis sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das dang 'dra bar mchod cing rim gro bgyi'o/_/de 
[\[210b.6\]]nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i rgyal po tshangs pa chen po la sogs te/_tshangs pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin gyi dbang po la sogs pa rnams la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/_legs so legs so/_/rigs kyi bu khyod kyis 
[\[210b.7\]]dam pa'i chos zab mo 'di yang thos/_mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dang 'di 'dzin pa la bsrung ba dang /_bskyab pa'i sems bskyed pa des bsod nams kyi khyad par tshad med pa dang ldan pas myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang 
[\[211a\]]
[\[211a.1\]]rgya'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_tshangs pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las stong pa nyid la brten nas 
[\[211a.2\]]bsam pa yongs su rdzogs pa zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu pa'o//_//de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /_rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /_rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/_bla 
[\[211a.3\]]gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo 
[\[211a.4\]]sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gsungs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis gzigs pa/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis dgongs pa/_byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su bzung ba/_
[\[211a.5\]]lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa/_lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis mchod pa/_lha'i dbang po'i tshogs thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/_'jig rten skyong ba thams cad kyis mchod cing bsngags te/_brjod nas rab tu bkur ba/_lha'i khang khyim 
[\[211a.6\]]thams cad snang bar bgyid pa/_sems can thams cad la mchog tu bde ba thams cad rab tu sbyin par bgyid pa/_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad skems pa/_'jigs pa thams cad kyi 
[\[211a.7\]]rgyun gcod pa/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad rab tu zlog pa/_mu ge'i ya nga ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/_nad kyi ya nga ba thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/_gza'i gnod pa thams cad sel ba/_mchog tu zhi bar bgyid pa/_mya ngan dang nyon 
[\[211b\]]
[\[211b.1\]]mongs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/_gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa/_gnod pa 'bum rab tu 'joms par bgyid lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'khor gyi nang du rgya 
[\[211b.2\]]cher yang dag par rab tu bshad na/_chos mnyan pa chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi'i lha'i lus 'di gzi byin chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag cag gi lus la brtson pa dang /_stobs 
[\[211b.3\]]dang mthu yang bskyed par 'gyur/_gzi brjid dang /_dpal dang /_phun sum tshogs pa yang bdag cag gi lus la 'jug par 'gyur te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi ni chos dang ldan pa/_chos smra ba chos kyi rgyal po lags te/_
[\[211b.4\]]btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag ni chos kyis/_lha dang /_klu dang /_gnod sbyin dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_dri za dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po rnams kyi rgyal po bgyi'o/_/'byung po'i tshogs mi bzad pa/_snying rje ma mchis pa/_
[\[211b.5\]]gzhan gyi gzi byin 'phrog pa rnams bzlog par bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_gnod sbyin 'bum 'phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu rtag par rgyun du lha'i mig rnam par 
[\[211b.6\]]dag pa/_mi'i las 'das pas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad la blta bar bgyi/_bsrung bar bgyi/_yongs su bskyang bar bgyi ste/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das de'i slad du/_bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi/_'jig rten skyong zhes ming du chags so/_/btsun 
[\[211b.7\]]pa bcom ldan 'das gang su dag 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur ram/_mu ge'i ya nga ba'am/_nad kyi ya nga ba'am/_gnod pa sna tshogs brgya dang /_gnod pa stong dang /_gnod pa 'bum dag gis gtses par 'gyur ba 
[\[212a\]]
[\[212a.1\]]na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag la bskul bar bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam bdag cag rgyal po chen po 
[\[212a.2\]]bzhis/_rdzu 'phrul dang /_byin gyis rlabs kyis dge slong chos smra ba de dag bskul ba na/_yul gang dang gang du mchis par gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yul de dang de dag tu rgya cher yang dag par ston par 'gyur te/_gang dag gnod 
[\[212a.3\]]pa sna tshogs brgya dang /_gnod pa sna tshogs stong yul du 'byung ba 'di lta bu 'di dag rab tu zhi bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang gi yul du mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong chos smra ba de dag mchi bar 'gyur ba'i yul de dag tu/_gser 'od 
[\[212a.4\]]dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang bsnyen par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam mi'i rgyal pos gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan te thos nas/_mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa'i dge slong de dag phyir rgol ba thams cad las 
[\[212a.5\]]kun tu srung bar bgyid/_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su 'dzin pa dang /_yongs su skyong bar bgyid na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/_mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kun tu bsrung bar 
[\[212a.6\]]bgyi/_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal pos nam/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma 
[\[212a.7\]]mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa la bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar bgyid na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/_mi'i rgyal po de'i yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams la/_bde ba'i yo byad thams cad kyis bde ba dang 
[\[212b\]]
[\[212b.1\]]yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs par bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/_nam mi'i rgyal pos dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa la/_bsti stang bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_rim gror bgyid cing 
[\[212b.2\]]mchod na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhis/_mi'i rgyal po chen po de la/_rgyal po thams cad pas ches bsti stang du bgyi/_ches bla mar bgyi/_ches rim gror bgyi/_ches mchod par bgyi ste/_yul thams cad du yang rab tu 
[\[212b.3\]]bsngags par bgyi'o/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_rgyal po chen po bzhis lha dang mi la rnam par lta ba zhes bya ste le'u bcu gcig pa'o//_//bam po drug pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la legs 
[\[212b.4\]]so zhes bya ba byin te/_rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so/_/rgyal po chen po khyed yang legs so legs so/_/'di lta ste/_khyod ni sngon gyi rgyal ba la lhag par bya ba byas pa/_dge ba'i rtsa ba rnams bskyed pa/_sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 
[\[212b.5\]]mang po la bsnyen bkur byas pa/_chos dang ldan pa/_chos smra ba/_chos kyi rgyal po/_chos kyis lha dang mi rnams kyi rgyal po byed pa'o/_/'di lta ste/_khyod ni yun ring por sems can thams cad la phan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/_bde ba dang byams pa'i sems 
[\[212b.6\]]dang ldan pa/_sems can thams cad la phan pa dang /_bde bar bya ba'i lhag pa'i bsam pa la zhugs pa mi phan pa thams cad 'gog pa/_sems can thams cad la bde ba thams cad nye bar bsgrub par brtson pa yin te/_rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis mi'i rgyal 
[\[212b.7\]]po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa dang /_rim gro byed par brtson pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shig_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar 
[\[213a\]]
[\[213a.1\]]gyis shig_/des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang /_gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang /_bcas pa khyed bzhis/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyi chos kyi tshul kun 
[\[213a.2\]]tu bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/yongs su bskyang ba dang /_yongs su gzung bar yang 'gyur ro/_/des na rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog dang /_gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang bcas pa khyed bzhis/_lha dang /_lha ma yin du g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal bar 'gyur 
[\[213a.3\]]ro/_/lha ma yin rnams pham par 'gyur ro/_/'di ltar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad 'dul bar byed pa 'di'i phyir/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 
[\[213a.4\]]'dzin pa de dag la kun tu bsrung ba gyis shig_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig_/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung 
[\[213a.5\]]dang /_rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /_rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom 
[\[213a.6\]]ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_yul 'khor ram/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor gang du spyod 
[\[213a.7\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_mi'i rgyal po gang dang gang gi yul du spyod par 'gyur ba dang /_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal por 'gyur ba gang la la zhig_/lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig rgyal po'i bstan bcos 'dis rgyal po bgyid cing /_rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa 
[\[213b\]]
[\[213b.1\]]mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan tam/_rim gro bgyid dam/_mchod pa bgyid dam/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_gang dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang du bgyid/_btsun par bgyid/_rim gro 
[\[213b.2\]]bgyid cing mchod de rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan na/_chos mnyan pa'i chu bo'i chus/_chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis bdag cag rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa bzhi dang /_gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma'i lha'i lus 'di 
[\[213b.3\]]dag gzi byin chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_bdag cag la brtson 'grus dang mthu stobs chen por yang bgyid par 'gyur/_bdag cag gi gzi brjid dang dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag 
[\[213b.4\]]cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lus bltar mi gda' bar bgyis te/_da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_yul 'khor ram/_pho brang 'khor gang na 
[\[213b.5\]]gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di spyod par 'gyur ba de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o/_/mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang /_rim gro bgyid pa dang /_mchod pa bgyid pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/
[\[213b.6\]]yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang /_yul 'khor de dag dang /_yul de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar 
[\[213b.7\]]bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su 
[\[214a\]]
[\[214a.1\]]thar bar bgyi'o/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang slar bzlog par bgyi'o/_/mi'i rgyal po gang la la gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang /_rim gro bgyid pa dang /_mchod pa bgyid pa de'i dgra zla 'dab nye 
[\[214a.2\]]ba'i rgyal po gzhan zhig mchis la/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba de'i rgyal po de 'di snyam du bdag dpung gi tshogs yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der song ste/_yul de rnam par gzhig go snyam du sems bskyed na/_btsun 
[\[214a.3\]]pa bcom ldan 'das de'i tshe de'i dus na/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rgyal po gzhan dag dang g.yul 'gyed par 'gyur/_rang gi yul du phyin na yang yul 'khrug par 'gyur/_rgyal po'i 'khrug 
[\[214a.4\]]pa mi bzad pa yang 'byung bar 'gyur/_yul du gza' dang /_nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_yul du brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das nam dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de rang gi yul du phyin na/_gnod pa sna 
[\[214a.5\]]tshogs brgya dang /_brel ba sna tshogs brgya 'di lta bu 'byung ngo /_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dgra zla 'dab nye ba'i rgyal po de yan lag bzhi pa'i dmag bsogs te/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs su mchi ba'i slad du/_rang gi yul nas byung ste/_dpung gi tshogs 
[\[214a.6\]]yan lag bzhi pa dang lhan cig tu yul der mchi 'tshal ba dang /_gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gnas pa'i yul de rnam par gzhig par 'tshal bar gyur na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang 
[\[214a.7\]]g.yog tu bcas pa/_gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang lhan cig tu lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/_der mchi bar bgyi'o/_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de shul du zhugs pa las kyang /_de nyid nas ldog par bgyi'o/_/brel ba sna tshogs brgya dag kyang nye bar bsgrub 
[\[214b\]]
[\[214b.1\]]par bgyi'o/_/bgegs kyang bgyi'o/_/'di lta ste/_yul der pha rol gyi dmag tshogs de mchir yang mi nus na/_yul gzhig par bgyid par lta ga la 'gyur/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba byin te/_
[\[214b.2\]]rgyal po chen po dag legs so legs so/_/rgyal po chen po dag khyed yang legs so/_/khyed bskal pa grangs med pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar yang dag par bsgrubs pa/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub 'di'i phyir/_mi'i rgyal po 
[\[214b.3\]]gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang /_rim gro byed pa dang /_mchod pa byed pa de dag la kun tu bsrung bar gyis shig_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_
[\[214b.4\]]bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig_/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de dag dang /_grong khyer de dag dang /_yul 'khor de dag dang /_yul de dag kyang kun tu srungs shig_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_chad pa 
[\[214b.5\]]spang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur bar gyis shig_/yul de dag kyang 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar gyis shig_/pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams kyang zlog par gyis shig_/'dzam bu'i gling 
[\[214b.6\]]thams cad na gnas pa'i mi'i rgyal po de dag mi 'thab pa dang /_mtshang mi 'dru ba dang /_mi rtsod pa dang /_mi 'gyed par bya ba la spro bar gyis shig_/rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir nam grong khyer brgyad khri bzhi 
[\[214b.7\]]stong de dag na/_rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong po de dag rang rang gi yul la mngon par dga' ba dang /_rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug des mngon par dga' ba dang /_rang gi nor gyi phung pos phan tshun rnam par mi 'tshe ba dang /_phan tshun rnam par 'tshe ba mi skyed pa dang /_rang gis 
[\[215a\]]
[\[215a.1\]]ji ltar sngon gyi las bsags pas rgyal po thob pa'i rang gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug gis dga' ba dang /_phan tshun du yul 'jig par mi byed pa dang /_yul gzhig pa'i phyir pha rol gyis mi gnod pa dang /_nam 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir grong 
[\[215a.2\]]khyer brgyad khri bzhi stong dag na/_rgyal po brgyad khri bzhi stong de dag phan tshun du byams pa'i sems su 'gyur/_byams pa'i sems dang /_phan pa'i sems su 'gyur te/_phan tshun du mi 'thab/_mtshang mi 'dru/_mi rtsod mi 'gyed par rang rang gi yul dag na 
[\[215a.3\]]dga' bar 'gyur na/_de'i phyir rgyal po chen po dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa khyed bzhis/_'dzam bu'i gling 'di rgyas par 'gyur/_lo legs par 'gyur/_nyams dga' bar 'gyur/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/_sa yang byin can du 'gyur/_
[\[215a.4\]]dus dang /_zla ba dang /_zla ba phyed dang /_lo khyud kor thams cad kyang yang dag pa'i dus dang ldan par 'gyur/_gza' dang /_rgyu skar dang /_zla ba dang /_nyi ma yang nyin mtshan du legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/_char pa'i rgyun kyang sa la dus dus su 'bab par 'gyur/_
[\[215a.5\]]'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can rnams kyang /_nor dang 'bru thams cad 'byor par 'gyur/_longs spyod che ba dang /_ser sna med par 'gyur/_gtong ba dang ldan par 'gyur/_dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par 'gyur/_phal cher 
[\[215a.6\]]bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye bar 'gyur/_lha'i khang khyim rnams kyang /_lha dang lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po dag gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur te/_
[\[215a.7\]]rim gro byas/_mchod pa byas/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang byed/_bla mar byed/_rim gror byed/_mchod par byed cing rgyal po chen po khyod bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas 
[\[215b\]]
[\[215b.1\]]par gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma la snying brtse ba'i phyir/_rtag par rgyun du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan na/_chos mnyan pa'i chu klung /_chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis/_khyed cag gi lus 'di dag tshim par 'gyur ro/_/khyed kyi lha'i lus 
[\[215b.2\]]'di dag gi gzi byin chen po yang rnam par 'phel lo/_/khyed kyi brtson 'grus dang mthu stobs kyang skyed do/_/khyed kyi gzi brjid dang /_dpal dang /_phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/mi'i rgyal po des de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom 
[\[215b.3\]]pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa nga la yang mchod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rgya chen po yangs pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/mi'i rgyal po de 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la 
[\[215b.4\]]yang yo byad bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_rgya che ba yangs pa thams cad kyis mchod pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/des na mi'i rgyal po de la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/_/des na mi'i rgyal po de la kun tu bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung 
[\[215b.5\]]ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/btsun mo dam pa dang /_rgyal bu rnams dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor thams cad dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad kyang bsrung ba chen po 
[\[215b.6\]]byas par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa'i lha thams cad kyang ches gzi brjid dang 
[\[215b.7\]]ldan pa dang /_ches stobs dang ldan pa dang /_bde ba dang yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/_grong khyer de dag dang /_yul 'khor de dag kyang kun tu bsrung bar 'gyur/_yongs su bskyang bar 'gyur/_gnod 
[\[216a\]]
[\[216a.1\]]pa med par 'gyur/_dgra med par 'gyur/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po rnam 
[\[216a.2\]]thos kyi bu dang /_rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /_rgyal po chen po 'phags skyes po dang /_rgyal po chen po mig mi bzang dang /_de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gang la la zhig gis gser 'od dam pa 
[\[216a.3\]]mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang nyan 'tshal bar 'gyur/_bdag nyid la yang bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/_btsun mo dam pa dang /_rgyal bu rnams dang /_rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang /_btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs rnams la yang /_
[\[216a.4\]]bsrung ba chen po bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor de thams cad la yang zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur ba chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa/_bla na med pa bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/_tshe 'di nyid la bdag 
[\[216a.5\]]gi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par 'phel bar bgyid 'tshal bar 'gyur/_rgyal po nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yang yongs su 'dzin 'tshal bar 'gyur/_bdag gi yul 
[\[216a.6\]]thams cad kyang kun tu bsrung 'tshal bar 'gyur/_yongs su bskyang 'tshal bar 'gyur/_rang gi yul na gnod pa ma mchis pa dang /_dgra ma mchis pa dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis mi brdzi ba dang /_nad 'go ba ma mchis pa dang /_'khrug pa ma mchis 
[\[216a.7\]]par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des g.yeng ba ma mchis pa'i sems dang /_gus pa dang bcas pa'i sems dang /_rim gro dang bcas pas gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/_bsti stang du bgyis te 
[\[216b\]]
[\[216b.1\]]mnyan par bgyi'o/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan pa'i slad du/_mi'i rgyal po des/_rgyal po'i pho brang khyad par du 'phags par mchi bar bgyi'o/_/der mchis nas kyang /_rgyal po'i pho brang spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag 
[\[216b.2\]]chag gdab cing /_me tog sil ma sna tshogs dgram par bgyi'o/_/spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag btab pa der chos kyi khri mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa bsham par bgyi'o/_/phyogs der gdugs dang /_rgyal mtshan dang /_ba 
[\[216b.3\]]dan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan par bgyi'o/_/mi'i rgyal po des lus bkru bar bgyi'o/_/gos dri rab tu bda' ba/_gos sar pa mdzes pa bgos nas/_rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan par bgyi'o/_/bdag gi stan rab tu dma' ba gding 
[\[216b.4\]]bar bgyi ste/_stan de la mchis nas/_rgyal po'i rgyags pas dregs par mi bgyi'o/_/der rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug la chags par mi bgyi'o/_/rgyags pa dang /_nga rgyal dang /_dregs pa thams cad rnam par spangs pa'i sems kyis/_gser 'od dam 
[\[216b.5\]]pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi'o/_/dge slong chos smra ba de la yang ston par 'du shes bskyed par bgyi'o/_/mi'i rgyal po des de'i tshe de'i dus na/_btsun mo dam pa dang /_rgyal bu rnams dang /_rgyal po'i bu mo rnams dang /_btsun mo'i 
[\[216b.6\]]'khor gyi tshogs rnams la sdug pa dang /_phan pas blta bar bgyi'o/_/btsun mo dam pa rnams dang /_rgyal bu rnams dang /_rgyal po'i bu mo rnams la tshig snyan pa smra bar bgyi'o/_/btsun mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la yang tshig snyan pa smra bar 
[\[216b.7\]]bgyi'o/_/chos mnyan pa'i phyir mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs sbyor du stsal bar bgyi'o/_/dga' ba bsam gyis mi khyab cing mtshungs pa ma mchis pas/_bdag tshim par bgyi'o/_/dga' ba dang bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pas bde bar bgyi'o/_/dbang po bde 
[\[217a\]]
[\[217a.1\]]bar bgyi'o/_/bdag nyid don chen po thob par bsam par bgyi'o/_/bdag dga' ba chen pos dga' bar bgyi'o/_/rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas/_chos smra ba bsu bar bgyi'o/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das 
[\[217a.2\]]kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po dag de'i tshe de'i dus na/_mi'i rgyal po des gos thams cad dkar po sar pa mdzes pa bgo bar bya'o/_/spud pa dang /_rgyan sna tshogs kyis bdag legs par brgyan par bya'o/_/gdugs 
[\[217a.3\]]dkar po yang gzung bar bya'o/_/rgyal po'i mthu chen po dang /_rgyal po'i bkod pa chen pos bkra shis tha dad pa sna tshogs thogs te/_rgyal po'i pho brang de nas byung la chos smra ba de bsu ba'i phyir der 'gro bar bya'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_mi'i rgyal pos der gom pa ji 
[\[217a.4\]]snyed bor ba/_de snyed kyi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum gyi 'khor ba phyir bsnyil bar 'gyur/_de snyed kyi 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal rigs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 'thob par 'gyur/_der gom pa ji snyed bor ba de snyed du tshe 'di la rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po 
[\[217a.5\]]bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'phel bar 'gyur/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar gnas yangs shing rgya che ba/_lha'i gzhal med khang rin po che sna bdun las byas pa dag 'thob par 'gyur/_mi rnams kyis rgyal rigs dang /_lha'i rgya che zhing rgya che ba 'bum 
[\[217a.6\]]phrag du ma 'thob par 'gyur/_skye ba thams cad du dbang phyug chen po thob par 'gyur/_tshe ring bar 'gyur/_yun ring du 'tsho bar 'gyur/_spobs pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_tshig gzung bar 'os par 'gyur/_grags pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_brjod pa shin tu rgya 
[\[217a.7\]]che bar 'gyur/_bsngags par 'os par 'gyur/_lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten la phan par 'gyur/_lha dang mi rnams kyi bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba thob par 'gyur/_stobs che bar 'gyur/_tshan po che chen po'i stobs kyi shugs dang ldan zhing gzugs 
[\[217b\]]
[\[217b.1\]]bzang bar 'gyur/_mdzes pa dang /_blta na sdug pa dang /_kha dog bzang po rgyas pa mchog dang ldan par 'gyur/_skye ba thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa dang phrad par 'gyur/_dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams rnyed par 'gyur/_bsod nams kyi phung po dpag 
[\[217b.2\]]tu med pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur te/_rgyal po chen po dag yon tan gyi phan yon 'di lta bu dag mthong nas/_mi'i rgyal po des dpag tshad tsam du chos smra ba la bsu bar bya/_dpag tshad brgya dang /_dpag tshad stong du yang bsu bar bya/_chos smra ba de la ston 
[\[217b.3\]]par 'du shes bskyed par bya'o/_/yang 'di snyam du de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa deng bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/deng de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs 
[\[217b.4\]]pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa/_bdag gi rgyal po'i pho brang 'dir bshos gsol bar 'gyur ro/_/deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas shAkya thub pa'i chos 'jig rten thams cad dang mi mthun pa mnyan par bya'o/_/
[\[217b.5\]]deng bdag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par bya'o/_/deng bdag gis de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma mnyes par byas par 'gyur ro/_/deng bdag gis 'das pa dang /_ma byon 
[\[217b.6\]]pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/_mchod pa chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yangs shing rgya che ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/deng bdag gis sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug 
[\[217b.7\]]bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ro/_/deng bdag gis tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/deng bdag gis brgya byin nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum 
[\[218a\]]
[\[218a.1\]]phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/deng bdag gis 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po nyid kyi lus bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'thob pa dag gi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i sa bon bskyed par 'gyur ro/_/deng bdag gis 
[\[218a.2\]]bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar byas par 'gyur ro/_/deng bdag gis bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa bla na med pa yangs shing rgya che ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su gzung bar 'gyur ro/_/deng bdag gis btsun 
[\[218a.3\]]mo'i 'khor gyi tshogs thams cad la bsrung ba chen po byas par 'gyur ro/_/deng bdag gis rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor 'dir zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_mchog tu khyad par du 'phags pa bla na med pa byas par 'gyur ro/_/deng bdag gis yul 
[\[218a.4\]]'di dag thams cad kun tu bsrungs par 'gyur ro/_/yongs su bskyangs pa dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_dgra med pa dang /_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs thams cad kyis mi brdzi ba dang /_nad 'go ba med pa dang /_'khrug pa med par 'gyur ro snyam du sems bskyed 
[\[218a.5\]]par bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa/_de dag la mi'i rgyal po de dam pa'i chos la gus pa de lta bus bsti stang byed/_bla mar byed/_rim gror 
[\[218a.6\]]byed/_mchod par byed cing /_rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang /_lha'i tshogs de dag dang gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dag la shas kyis dam pa byin na/_mi'i rgyal po de bsod nams mngon par 'du byed pa dang /_dge ba mngon par 'du byed pa de 
[\[218a.7\]]dang /_tshe 'di'i lus kyi rgyal srid kyi dbang phyug chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa des rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_tshe 'di la rgyal po'i gzi brjid chen po bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/dpal dang /_phun sum tshogs pa dang /_gzi brjid kyis kyang 
[\[218b\]]
[\[218b.1\]]brgyan par 'gyur ro/_/phyir rgol ba thams cad dang /_dgra thams cad chos dang mthun par shin tu tshar chod par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 
[\[218b.2\]]'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/_de chos la gus pa de lta bus/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po nyan la/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa de dag la yang 
[\[218b.3\]]bsti stang bgyid/_bla mar bgyid/_rim gror bgyid/_mchod par bgyid cing /_rgyal po chen po bdag cag gi slad du/_rgyal po'i pho brang de shin tu dag par phyag dar bgyid/_spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par 'debs la/_bdag cag rgyal po 
[\[218b.4\]]chen po bzhi dang /_lhan cig tu thun mong du chos mnyan pa de nyan cing bdag dang lha thams cad kyi slad du dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shas cung zad cig sbyin par bgyid na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das dge slong chos smra ba de chos kyi stan la mchis ma thag tu/_mi'i rgyal po des 
[\[218b.5\]]bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi'i don gyi slad du/_spos sna tshogs kyis bdug par bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de la mchod pa'i slad du/_bdug pas bdugs ma thag tu spos sna tshogs rnams las/_
[\[218b.6\]]spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la/_rgyal po chen po bdag cag bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la/_spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs rnams su gnas 
[\[218b.7\]]par 'gyur ro/_/spos kyi dri rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/_gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des bdag cag gi khang pa rnams kyang snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das spos dang /_bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri 
[\[219a\]]
[\[219a.1\]]shing dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang po brgya byin dang /_lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang /_lha mo chen mo brtan ma dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang /_gnod sbyin gyi 
[\[219a.2\]]sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang /_'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya 'khor dang ldan pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po chen po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po 
[\[219a.3\]]chen po rgya mtsho dang /_de dag rang rang gi khang pa'i steng gi bar snang la byung ste/_spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing gi gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/_spos dri sna tshogs rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/_khang pa rnams kyi nang du gser du snang ba 'byung bar 
[\[219a.4\]]'gyur zhing /_snang ba des gnas thams cad snang ba bgyis par 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rgyal po chen po dag rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi'i rang rang gi khang pa rnams kyi steng gi bar 
[\[219a.5\]]snang la/_spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par ma zad do/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po chen po dag_/mi'i rgyal po des gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/_spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma thag 
[\[219a.6\]]tu lag na pog snod cig thogs pa de las/_spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dag thams cad na gang na zla ba bye ba phrag brgya dang /_nyi ma bye ba phrag 
[\[219a.7\]]brgya dang /_rgya mtsho chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang /_ri'i rgyal po ri rab bye ba phrag brgya dang /_ri'i rgyal po 'khor yug dang /_'khor yug chen po bye ba phrag brgya dang /_gling chen po bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgya dang /_rgyal chen bzhi'i ris kyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang 
[\[219b\]]
[\[219b.1\]]sum cu rtsa gsum bye ba phrag brgya nas/_'du shes med 'du shes med min du nye bar song ba'i bar gyi lha bye ba phrag brgya dang /_stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams de dag thams cad du sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i ris bye ba phrag brgya po thams cad na/_lha dang /_klu dang /_
[\[219b.2\]]gnod sbyin dang /_dri za dang /_lha ma yin dang /_nam mkha' lding dang /_mi 'am ci dang /_lto 'phye chen po'i tshogs rnams kyi rang rang gi khang pa dag gi steng gi bar snang la/_spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas par 'gyur/_spos dri 
[\[219b.3\]]rgya chen po yang mnam par 'gyur/_lha'i khang pa rnams su gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba yang 'byung bar 'gyur zhing snang ba des kyang lha'i khang pa rnams snang ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po dag 'di ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/_
[\[219b.4\]]lha'i khang pa thams cad kyi steng gi bar snang la/_spos dang bdug pa'i 'khri shing de dag gdugs rnams su gnas pa de bzhin du/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di la mchod pa'i phyir/_mi'i rgyal po des/_spos sna tshogs de dag gis bdugs ma 
[\[219b.5\]]thag tu/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i gzi brjid kyi mthus/_spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de dag skad cig thang cig yud tsam de la kun tu phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams du ma/_gang gA'i klung gi 
[\[219b.6\]]bye ma snyed dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag rnams su de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma/_gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag gi bar snang la/_spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing rnams su gnas par 'gyur/_de dag 
[\[219b.7\]]kyang sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la/_spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs rgya che zhing rgya che ba mnam par 'gyur/_gser gyi kha dog lta bu'i snang ba 'byung bar 'gyur zhing /_snang ba des kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi 
[\[220a\]]
[\[220a.1\]]bye ma snyed dag snang ba byas par 'gyur ro/_/rgyal po chen po dag cho 'phrul chen po de lta bu de dag byung ma thag tu de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag chos smra ba de la dgongs par 'gyur te/_
[\[220a.2\]]skyes bu dam pa legs so legs so/_/skyes bu dam pa khyod gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i tshul 'di lta bu zab mo'i don 'di lta bu zab mor snang ba 'di lta bu yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pa 'di lta bu 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 
[\[220a.3\]]'chad par 'dod pa khyod yang legs so legs so/_/zhes bya ba sbyin par 'gyur ro/_/su tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa'i sems can de dag kyang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba ngan ngon dang ldan par mi 'gyur na/_gang dag 'dzin pa dang /_'chang 
[\[220a.4\]]ba dang /_'chad pa dang /_klog pa dang /_kun chub par byed pa dang /_'khor la rgya cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa lta smos kyang ci dgos/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_skyes bu dam pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas thos ma thag tu/_byang chub sems dpa' 
[\[220a.5\]]bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba'i phyir ro/_/de nas phyogs bcu kun du sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma gang gA'i klung gi bye ma snyed dag na/_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba 
[\[220a.6\]]khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma rang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing na bzhugs pa dag gis/_de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshig mthun pa dang /_ngag mthun pa dang /_sgra skad mthun pas dge slong chos smra ba chos kyi khri stan la 'dug pa de la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/skyes bu dam pa 
[\[220a.7\]]khyod ma 'ongs pa'i dus na byang chub kyi snying por 'gro bar 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/_shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug nas/_'jig rten gsum po thams cad las khyad par du 'phags pa sems can thams cad las rab tu 
[\[220b\]]
[\[220b.1\]]'das pa'i brtul zhugs dang /_dka' thub spyod pa'i stobs skyed pa'i byin gyis brlabs dka' ba spyod pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag ston par 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying por legs par brgyan par byed par 'gyur/_skyes bu 
[\[220b.2\]]dam pa khyod stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod shing gi rgyal po'i drung du 'dug ste/_bdud kyi sde bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_gzugs rab tu 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa/_
[\[220b.3\]]mi sdug pa ston pa/_gzugs mi sdug pa sna tshogs dag las rgyal bar 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod byang chub kyi snying po mchog dam par song ste/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dpe med par rab tu zhi ba rdul dang bral ba zab mo mngon par 
[\[220b.4\]]rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod rdo rje'i gdan snying po brtan pa la 'dug ste/_chos kyi 'khor lo rgyal ba thams cad kyis mngon par bstod pa/_mchog tu zab pa/_bla na med pa rnam pa bcu gnyis rab tu bskor bar 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa 
[\[220b.5\]]khyod chos kyi rnga chen po bla na med pa brdung bar 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi dung bla na med pa 'bud par 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi rgyal mtshan chen po bsgreng bar 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi sgron ma bla na med pa 'bar ba byed par 'gyur/_
[\[220b.6\]]skyes bu dam pa khyod chos kyi char bla na med pa 'bebs par 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod nyon mongs pa'i dgra 'bum phrag du ma las rgyal bar 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma shin tu 'jigs su rung ba/_'jigs pa chen po'i rgya 
[\[220b.7\]]mtsho las sgrol bar 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag_/'khor ba'i 'khor ba las yongs su thar bar byed par 'gyur/_skyes bu dam pa khyod sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par byed par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[221a\]]
[\[221a.1\]]de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la rgyal po chen po bzhi po de dag gis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i yon tan tshe 'di dang /_ma 'ongs pa na 'byung 
[\[221a.2\]]ba 'di lta bu 'di dag mthong ba/_sangs rgyas 'bum phrag du ma la dge ba'i rtsa ba skyed pa/_bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu ma mchis pa yongs su 'dzin pa mthong nas/_snying brtse ba'i slad du/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang 
[\[221a.3\]]g.yog tu bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma rang rang gi khang pa na mchis pa dag_/spos dang bdug pa sna tshogs kyi 'khri shing dag gi gdugs kyis bskul ma thag tu/_lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/_mi'i rgyal po de'i khang pa brtsegs pa phyag dar ma mchis 
[\[221a.4\]]pa/_legs par phyag dar bgyis pa/_spos chab sna tshogs kyis chag chag legs par btab pa rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa'i rgyal po'i pho brang ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchis par bgyi'o/_/mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pa dang /_lha rnams kyi dbang 
[\[221a.5\]]po brgya byin dang /_lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dang /_lha mo chen mo dpal dang /_sa'i lha mo brtan ma dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_lha'i bu dbang phyug chen po dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde 
[\[221a.6\]]dpon chen po lag na rdo rje dang /_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nor bu bzang dang /_'phrog ma'i bu lnga brgya'i 'khor can dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_lha bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/_mi'i rgyal po de'i 
[\[221a.7\]]pho brang rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa de ga la ba dang /_chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri stan mthon po rgyan sna tshogs kyis legs par brgyan pa/_me tog bkram pa'i sa la bshams par 'gyur ba ga la ba der chos mnyan pa'i slad du mchis par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[221b\]]
[\[221b.1\]]bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa/_gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma de dag thams cad mthun par bgyis te/_mi'i rgyal po dge ba'i grogs bgyid pa/_dge ba thob par bgyid pa/_bla na med pa chos kyi sbyin pa chen po sbyin pa de la/_chos bdud 
[\[221b.2\]]rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur ma thag tu/_mi'i rgyal po de la kun du bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/mi'i rgyal po'i pho brang de dang /_grong khyer de dang /_
[\[221b.3\]]yul de yang kun du bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/chad pa spang bar yang bgyi'o/_/yul der yang 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_
[\[221b.4\]]'khrug pa thams cad las yongs su thar bar bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur te/_mi'i rgyal po de'i yul du/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'byung la/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po de/_dge slong 
[\[221b.5\]]ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzin pa dag la bsti stang mi bgyid/_bla mar mi bgyid/_rim gror mi bgyid/_mchod par mi bgyid na/_bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dang /_
[\[221b.6\]]gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma la chos mnyan pa 'di dang chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par mi bgyid/_rim gror mi bgyid/_lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid do/_/bdag cag gi brtson 'grus dang /_mthu dang stobs 
[\[221b.7\]]kyang mi skyed/_bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang /_dpal dang phun sum tshogs pa yang rnam par 'phel bar mi bgyid pa lags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin bye ba khrag khrig 
[\[222a\]]
[\[222a.1\]]'bum phrag du ma dag gis yul de yal bar dor bar bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis yul de yal bar bor na/_yul na gnas pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad kyis kyang /_yul de yal bar 'dor bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa 
[\[222a.2\]]bcom ldan 'das lha rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/_yul der yul rnam par 'khrug pa sna tshogs 'byung bar 'gyur/_rgyal po'i 'khrug pa mi bzad pa dag 'byung bar 'gyur/_yul gang na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyang 'thab pa skye ba dang /_mtshang 
[\[222a.3\]]'dru ba skye ba dang /_rtsod pa skye bar 'gyur/_dngogs pa dang 'gyed par 'gyur ba dang /_gza' dang nad rnam pa sna tshogs yul du 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/phyogs tha dad pa nas skar mda' ltung bar 'gyur/_gza' dang rgyu skar rnams kyang phan tshun mi mthun par gda' bar 'gyur/_
[\[222a.4\]]dgung zla 'char ba na nyi ma lta bur gda' bar 'gyur/_zla ba'i gza' dang /_nyi ma'i gza' 'byung bar 'gyur/_nyi ma dang zla ba nam mkha' la gnas pa yang rtag par rgyun du sgra gcan gyi gnod pa dang ldan par 'gyur/_dus dus su nam mkha' la 'ja'i kha dog lta bu 'khyil bar 'gyur/_
[\[222a.5\]]sa yang g.yo bar 'gyur/_sa la gnas pa'i khron pa yang sgra 'byin pa grag par 'gyur/_yul du rlung drag po ldang bar 'gyur/_char pa drag po 'bab par 'gyur/_yul du mu ge'i ya nga ba 'byung bar 'gyur/_pha rol gyi dmag tshogs kyis yul 'joms par 'gyur/_
[\[222a.6\]]yul de phung bar 'gyur sems can de dag kyang nyon mongs pa mang bar 'gyur/_yul de nyams mi dga' bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog du bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang yul na gnas 
[\[222a.7\]]pa'i lha dang klu rnams kyis yul de yal bar bor na/_yul der 'di lta bu'i gnod pa rnam pa sna tshogs brgya dang /_gnod pa stong 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/_gang la la zhig mi'i rgyal por gyur la/_de bdag nyid la kun du bsrung ba chen po 
[\[222b\]]
[\[222b.1\]]bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/_rgyal po'i bde ba sna tshogs yun ring por myong bar 'tshal bar gyur/_bde ba thams cad bstabs pa'i sems kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/_yul na gnas pa'i sems can thams cad bde bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/_pha rol gyi dmag 
[\[222b.2\]]tshogs thams cad pham par bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/_yul thams cad du yun ring du yongs su skyong 'tshal bar gyur/_chos kyi rgyal po nyid bgyid 'tshal bar gyur/_rang gi yul yang 'jigs pa dang /_gnod pa dang /_nad 'go ba dang /_'khrug pa thams cad las 
[\[222b.3\]]yongs su thar bar bgyid 'tshal bar gyur na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang 
[\[222b.4\]]po 'dzin pa de dag la yang bsti stang bgyi/_bla mar bgyi/_rim gror bgyi/_mchod pa bgyi/_bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa rnams kyang /_chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang /_chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/_
[\[222b.5\]]bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gi gzi byin chen po yang rnam par 'phel bar bgyi'o/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das/_mi'i rgyal po des gdon mi 'tshal bar/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bgyi ste/_btsun pa 
[\[222b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang pos 'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa bstan pa dag dang /_lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed pa bstan pa dag dang /_drang srong mngon par shes pa 
[\[222b.7\]]lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs dag gis sems can dag gi don gyi slad du/_'jig rten pa dang /_'jig rten las 'das pa'i bstan bcos rnam pa sna tshogs ji snyed bstan pa dag pas ches mchog ches khyad par du 'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di ni/_btsun 
[\[223a\]]
[\[223a.1\]]pa bcom ldan 'das tshangs pa'i dbang po 'bum phrag de dag dang /_brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dang /_drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad pas ches mchog ches khyad par du 'phags pa'i de bzhin 
[\[223a.2\]]gshegs pas/_sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad pa lags so/_/ci nas kyang 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas pa'i mi rnams kyi rgyal pos rgyal po nyid bgyi ba dang /_ci nas sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas rang 
[\[223a.3\]]gi yul kun du bsrungs par 'gyur ba dang /_yongs su bskyangs par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas yul thams cad na gnod pa dang /_dgra ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas pha rol gyi dmag tshogs rnams pham ste/_phyir phyogs par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas yul de dag 
[\[223a.4\]]na nad 'go ba ma mchis shing /_'khrug pa ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas yul thams cad chos kyis 'khrug pa ma mchis shing /_mi rdzi bar 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas mi'i rgyal po de dag gis/_rang rang gi yul rnams su chos kyi sgron ma chen po 'bar bar bgyis shing /_
[\[223a.5\]]snang bar bgyis par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas lha'i khang khyim thams cad lha dag dang /_lha'i bu rnams kyis gang bar 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pa dang /_gnod sbyin 'bum phrag du ma dang /_'dzam bu'i gling na gnas 
[\[223a.6\]]pa'i lha'i tshogs thams cad tshim pa dang /_rim gro bgyid par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas bdag cag gi lha'i lus 'di dag gzi byin chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas bdag cag gi lus la brtson 'grus dang stobs dang /_mthu chen po skyed par 'gyur ba dang /_ci 
[\[223a.7\]]nas bdag cag gi lus la gzi brjid dang /_dpal dang /_phun sum tshogs pa rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad du lo legs shing nyams dga' la/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na gnas 
[\[223b\]]
[\[223b.1\]]pa'i sems can rnams bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_dga' ba sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_ci nas sems can thams cad bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i bde ba rgya che zhing rgya che ba dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 
[\[223b.2\]]rnams dang lhan cig gnas par 'gyur ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad/_da lta na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[223b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis tshangs pa'i dbang po bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag pas ches 'phags pa'i thugs rje chen po'i stobs dang ldan pa'i byin gyis brlabs dang /_brgya byin bye ba khrag khrig phrag 'bum dag gi lha'i shes pa bas/_ches 'phags pa de 
[\[223b.4\]]bzhin gshegs pa'i mkhyen pa bla na med pa dang /_drang srong mngon par shes pa lnga can rnam pa sna tshogs kyi tshogs bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma thams cad bas ches 'phags pa'i byin gyis brlabs kyis/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i 
[\[223b.5\]]sangs rgyas kyis/_sems can thams cad kyi don gyi slad du/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/_'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad do/_/mi'i rgyal po'i dgos pa dang /_rgyal po'i bstan bcos dang /_rgyal po'i bgyi ba 
[\[223b.6\]]gang dag 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad na mchis pa dang /_gang dag gis sems can 'di dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur ba de dag thams cad/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i 
[\[223b.7\]]dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nye bar bstan/_yongs su brjod/_yang dag par rab tu bshad do/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu de dang rkyen des mi'i rgyal po des/_gdon mi 'tshal bar/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di gus par mnyan par bgyi/_gus par rim gror 
[\[224a\]]
[\[224a.1\]]bgyi/_gus par mchod par bgyi'o//_/de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po chen po bzhi la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/de'i phyir rgyal po chen po khyed bzhi dpung dang g.yog tu bcas pas/_gdon mi za bar mi'i rgyal po gser 
[\[224a.2\]]'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan pa dang /_rim gro byed pa dang mchod pa byed pa de dag kun tu bsrung ba'i phyir spro ba rgya cher gyis shig_/rgyal po chen po dag dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma gang mdo sde'i dbang po 'di 'dzin pa 
[\[224a.3\]]de dag kyang /_sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa 'dzin du chug cig dang /_de dag lha dang mi dang lha ma yin du bcas pa'i 'jig rten 'di la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa byed par 'gyur/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur te/_
[\[224a.4\]]rgyal po chen po khyed bzhis ci nas mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa'i dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma bsrung ba dang /_gnod pa med pa dang /_nad med pa dang /_'khrug pa med pa dang /_sems bde bar 'gyur zhing /_gser 'od dam 
[\[224a.5\]]pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yang dag par rab tu ston par 'gyur bar/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag kun du bsrung bar bya/_yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs 
[\[224a.6\]]su bskyang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur bar bya'o/_/de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu stan las langs te/_'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs mchis pa 'di/_sems can gang la 
[\[224a.7\]]la dag 'dzin cing 'chang bar mos pa de la/_bsod nams dpag tu ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_rtag tu de la bdag gis bsrung zhing bskyabs pas/_de'i sdug bsngal thams cad bsal te/_bde bar gnas par bgyi'o/_/bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs kyang 
[\[224b\]]
[\[224b.1\]]bskyed par bgyi'o/_/gang gzungs sngags 'di 'dzin par 'dod pas lus bsrung ba'i phyir sngags 'di sngar brjod par bya'o/_/na mo bai shra ba NA ya/_ma hA rA dzA ya/_tad+ya thA/_ra ra ra ra/_ku no ku no/_khu no khu no/_ru no ru no/_sa ba sa ba/_ka ra ka ra/_ma hA bi 
[\[224b.2\]]ka raM/_ma hA bi ka raM/_ma hA kA la/_ma hA rA dza/_rak+Sha rak+Sha tu mAM/_sarba satwA nAny+tsa swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das sngags 'di skud pa dkar po la sngags lan re bzlas shing mdud pa lan re bor te/_de ltar lan bdun byas nas/_dpung pa la btags na don de nges par 
[\[224b.3\]]'grub par 'gyur ro/_/de nas khang pa dben pa'i nang du khrus byas la gos gtsang ma gyon te/_spos gu gul dang /_tsan+dan dang /_ga bur dang /_du ru ska dang /_a ga ru dang /_spos dkar po la sogs pa 'di dag cha mnyam par sbyar ba'i spos kyis mchod cing /_sngags 'di 
[\[224b.4\]]bzlas pas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang bar bya'o/_/na mo bai shra ba NA ya/_ma hA d+ha na dA ya/_tsaN+De shwa rA ya/_A kar+Sha/_a pa ra dzi ta/_tsaN+De shwa ra/_pa ra ma/_kA ru Ni ka_/sarba satwA/_hi ta tsin+tA/_ma ma d+ha na bar d+ho/_par+ye shwa ra swa yam/_A kar+Sha ya swA hA/_
[\[224b.5\]]sngags 'di lan bdun bzlas pa'i 'og tu rtsa ba'i sngags bzlas par bya'o/_/sngags 'di 'don pa'i dus su dkon mchog gsum dang /_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu la sngar phyag 'tshal bar bya'o/_/rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu ni sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa 
[\[224b.6\]]skong zhing nor sbyin pas sems can thams cad bde bar mdzad pa'i phyir yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bya ba'i sngags 'di bzlas na/_sems can de dag yid bzhin du bde ba rnyed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bus bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes 
[\[224b.7\]]bya ba'i sngags kyi snying po 'di smras so/_/na mo rat+na tra yA ya/_na mo bai shra ba NA ya/_ma hA rA dzA ya/_tad+ya thA/_si mi si mi/_su mu su mu/_tsaN+Da tsaN+Da/_tsa ra tsa ra/_sa ra sa ra/_ka ra ka ra/_ki li ki li/_ku ru ku ru/_mu ru mu ru/_tsu ru tsu ru/_san+d+hu ya/_At+ma nAM/_
[\[225a\]]
[\[225a.1\]]ni ta t+ya na/_an+tar+d+hA tu swA hA/_na mo bai shra ba NA ya swA hA/_d+ha na dA ya swA hA/_ma no ra tha pa ri pU ra ya swA hA/_sngags 'di sngar lan stong bzlas pa'i 'og tu khang pa dben pa'i nang du lci bas dkyil 'khor chung ngu zhig byas te bshos ci 'byor pas mchod par 
[\[225a.2\]]bya'o/_/spos dam pa bsregs pa'i du ba'i rgyun mi 'chad par bya zhing nyin mtshan du sems rtse gcig pas sngags kyi snying po 'di bdag nyid kyis thos pa tsam du bzlas pa byas na/_de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu'i sras dzi nar sha b+ha zhes bya ba gzhon nu'i gzugs kyis 
[\[225a.3\]]de'i gan du mchis te nga'i yab la ci zhig gsol zhes dri bar byed do/_/de nas des bdag ni dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir/_nor zhig gsol gyis stsol cig ces smros shig_/de nas sras dzi nar sha b+has yab la gsol ba/_skyes bu dam pa zhig dkon 
[\[225a.4\]]mchog gsum la mchod pa'i phyir/_nor zhig gsol lo zhes gsol pa dang /_yab kyis khyod myur du song la nyin gcig bzhin du kA pa Na brgya brgya byin cig ces bka' stsal to/_/de nas sngags sgrub pa des ltas de lta bu mthong nas/_don de grub par shes te/_
[\[225a.5\]]gnas dben par bdag gcig pu spos bsregs la nyal khar sngas su dri'i za ma tog gcig bzhag ste nyal bar bya'o/_/de phyin chad nang gcig bzhin du za ma tog de'i nang nas nor ci 'byung ba las nor de de'i nyin par dkon mchog gsum la mchod pa'i yo byad me tog 
[\[225a.6\]]dang /_spos dang /_zhal zas la sogs par sbyar ba dang /_brel cing phongs pa rnams la yang sbyin zhing zad par bya'o/_/sems can thams cad la byams par bsam mo/_/khro ba dang 'tshe ba'i bsam pa bskyed na/_de nyams par 'gyur bas/_khro ba'i 
[\[225a.7\]]sems mi skye bar rtag tu bsrung bar bya'o/_/de nas yang sngags 'di 'dzin pa des nyin gcig bzhin du lha'i rgyal po rnam thos kyi bu dang /_gzhan yang sras dang /_sras mo'i 'khor du bcas pa la/_rtag par bsam zhing /_bstod pa dang /_bsngags pa 
[\[225b\]]
[\[225b.1\]]bya'o/_/rtag par dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam gyis gtong zhing lha la sogs pa rnams kyi mthu dang bsod nams mngon par 'phel bar 'gyur ba dang /_dge ba rgyas pa dang /_bla na med pa'i byang chub kyang 'thob par 'gyur ro/_/lha de dag gis de ltar byed pa 
[\[225b.2\]]de mthong nas kun dga' zhing mgu rangs pas 'ong zhing de la bsrung ba dang /_skyob par byed do/_/sngags mkhan de nyid kyang tshe lo dpag tu med par gnas shing /_ngan song gsum yongs su spong ba dang bgegs dang /_bar chad thams cad kyang med par 
[\[225b.3\]]'gyur ro/_/yid bzhin gyi nor bu 'di dang /_gter gzhan dag kyang thob par 'gyur ro/_/rdzu 'phrul la dbang sgyur zhing bsam pa thams cad kyang grub par 'gyur ro/_/gal te longs spyod can du 'dod na yang yid bzhin du grub pa dang /_bya dang 
[\[225b.4\]]gcan gzan gyi skad thams cad kyang shes par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das sngags sgrub pa des bdag mthong bar 'tshal na/_tshes brgyad dam/_tshes [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga'i nyin par ras dkar po la bcom ldan 'das kyi sku gzugs ka pi ta dang sbyar ba'i tshon rtsis 
[\[225b.5\]]rgyan sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/_ri mo mkhan gso sbyong gi yan lag brgyad dang ldan pas/_sangs rgyas kyi g.yon phyogs su ni dpal gyi lha mo'i gzugs bri/_sangs rgyas kyi g.yas phyogs su ni rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu bdag bu smad dang 'khor du 
[\[225b.6\]]bcas pa bris te/_gnas der bkram nas/_me tog sna tshogs dang /_dri sna mang po dang /_mar me dam pa dang /_zhal zas bda' ba sna tshogs kyis/_nyin mtshan rgyun mi 'chad par mchod par bya'o/_/sngags 'di zlos pas sems mi g.yeng bar bya zhing /_
[\[225b.7\]]rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bu spyan drang ba'i sngags 'di bzlas par bya'o/_/na maHshrI kaN ThA ya/_bud d+hA ya/_na mo bai shra ba NA ya/_yak+Sha rA dzA ya/_ma hA rA dzA ya/_a ti rA dzA ya/_na maHshrI/_ma hA de byai/_tad+ya thA/_ta ra ta ra/_tu ru tu ru/_ba ra ba ra/_su 
[\[226a\]]
[\[226a.1\]]shud+d+ho su shud+d+ho/_ha na ha na/_ma Ni ka na ka_/badzra bai DUr+ya/_muka ti ka_/a laM kr-i krI ta sha rI rA ya/_sarba satwA/_hi ta kA ma/_bai shra ba Na shrI ya de bI pra b+hA ya/_e hi e hi/_mA bi lam+ba/_g+hUr+Na g+hUr+Na/_pa ra s+ya pa ra s+ya/_da dA hi ma mA/_
[\[226a.2\]]dar+sha na kA ma s+ya/_dar+sha na~M/_ma ma ma na/_pra la ha dA ya swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sngags zlos pa de dang /_mchod pa rgya chen po mthong nas/_bdag byams pa dang /_dga' ba'i bsam pa skyes nas/_bdag de'i mdun du byis pa gzhon nu'i 
[\[226a.3\]]gzugs sam/_yang na rgan po'am/_dge slong gi gzugs su byas te/_bdag lag na yid bzhin gyi nor bu gser gyi snod dang bcas pa thogs te/_dkyil 'khor gyi nang du zhugs nas/_lus kyis gus pa ston cing /_sangs rgyas kyi mtshan gcig tu 
[\[226a.4\]]brjod de/_sngags mkhan de la 'di skad ces smra'o/_/khyod ci dang ci slong ba de dag thams cad grub par byas te/_nags tshal dben par 'gro 'dod pa'am/_nor bu rin po che 'dod pa'am/_mi mang po'i yid du 'ong bar 'dod pa'am/_gser dang /_dngul 
[\[226a.5\]]la sogs pa'i nor 'dod pa'am/_sngags gzhan sgrub pa'i dngos grub 'dod pa'am/_rdzu 'phrul dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_tshe ring bar 'dod pa dang /_sman bcud kyis len 'dod pa la sogs pa thams cad bsam pa bzhin du grub par bya'o/_/bdag 
[\[226a.6\]]gis dngos po de dag la sogs pa mdo tsam zhig smos par zad kyi/_de ma yin pa gzhan zhig 'dod na yang thams cad bsam pa bzhin du yongs su grub par bya ste/_rin po che'i gter mi zad pa dang /_bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[226a.7\]]dper na nyi zla 'di sa la lhung bar 'gyur ba dang /_sa chen po 'di gzhan du 'gyur ba'i dus ni yod kyang srid kyi/_bden pa'i tshig 'di ni nam yang slu bar mi 'gyur bas rtag tu bde ba dang /_yid bzhin du skyid pa dang longs spyod pa thob par 'gyur ro/_/gzhan 
[\[226b\]]
[\[226b.1\]]yang bcom ldan 'das mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di gang zhig 'dzin cing 'chang ba dang /_klog cing 'don pa yang rung /_sngags 'di sgrub pa yang rung ste/_tshegs chung ngus myur du 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis sems can dbul zhing phongs 
[\[226b.2\]]pa'i sdug bsngal gyis nyen pa'i sems can rnams kyi ched du sngags 'di bshad pas/_de phyug cing bde ba'i mchog dang phun sum tshogs pa tshe gcig tu 'byor bar 'gyur ro/_/bdag gis kyang de yongs su bsrung zhing bskyab pa'i phyir/_rjes su 'brang zhing gnod pa 
[\[226b.3\]]dang /_'tshe ba thams cad ma mchis par bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po de 'dzin cing rgyas par byed pa dang /_sngags 'di 'chang ba'i gang zag de gom pa brgya tshun chad 'od kyis snang bar byas te/_bdag gi 'khor gnod sbyin stong 
[\[226b.4\]]rnams kyis kyang rtag tu de'i g.yog tu bsko zhing mngag gzhug yid bzhin du byed du gzhug go/_/bdag gi bden pa'i tshig 'di slu ba med par yang bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs su gsol/_de nas rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus sngags de skad ces smras pa dang /_bcom 
[\[226b.5\]]ldan 'das kyis legs so legs so zhes bka' stsal te/_rgyal po chen po khyod kyis sems can thams cad sred pas gdungs pa'i sdug bsngal gyi dra ba thams cad bral bas phyug cing bde bar bya ba'i phyir sngags 'di smras pa dang /_gzhan yang mdo sde 'di 'jig rten du 
[\[226b.6\]]yongs su rgyas par bya ba'i phyir/_sngags 'di bshad pa ni legs so legs so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhi stan las langs nas/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu gzar nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_zhabs 
[\[226b.7\]]gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/_de'i tshe mngon sum du tshul dang mthun pa'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis/_bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/rgyal ba zla ba dri ma med pa'i sku/_/rgyal ba nyi ma 'od zer stong gi 'od/_/rgyal ba pad+ma dri ma med pa'i spyan/_/rgyal ba 
[\[227a\]]
[\[227a.1\]]me tog pad rtsa rdul med tshems/_/rgyal ba'i yon tan rgya mtsho lta bu ste/_/rin po che ni du ma'i 'byung gnas gyur/_/rgyal ba rgya mtsho ye shes chu yis gang /_/ting 'dzin brgya phrag stong gis kun du gang /_/rgyal ba'i zhabs ni 'khor los bris 'dra 
[\[227a.2\]]ste/_/khor yug mu khyud de bzhin rtsib ma stong /_/phyag dang zhabs ni dra bas spras pa ste/_/zhabs kyi dra ba ngang pa'i dbang po bzhin/_/gser gyi ri bo lta bur rab tu gda'/_/rgyal ba dri med gser gyi ri dbang rgyal/_/yon tan thams cad ri dbang 'dra ba ste/_/
[\[227a.3\]]sangs rgyas ri dbang rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa'i zla ba chu zla 'dra/_/nam mkha' dang yang mtshungs shing 'dra ba ste/_/sgyu ma smig rgyu lta bur chags med pa/_/rgyal ba dri ma med la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rgyal po 
[\[227a.4\]]chen po bzhi la tshigs su bcad de bka' stsal pa/_stobs bcu dag gis gser 'od dam pa yi/_/mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rab mchog 'di/_/'jig rten skyong ba khyed cag rnams kyis ni/_/brtson 'grus rab tu brtan pas bskyang bar bya/_/'di ltar 
[\[227a.5\]]mdo sde dkon mchog zab mo 'di/_/sems can kun la bde ba sbyin byed pa/_/sems can rnams la phan dang bde ba'i phyir/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'dir yun ring gnas par 'gyur/_/'di ltar stong gsum gyi ni stong chen gyi/_/'jig rten dag na ngan song sdug bsngal 
[\[227a.6\]]dang /_/sems can dmyal ba'i sems can rnams kyi ni/_/sdug bsngal thams cad zhi bar byed pa yin/_/'dzam gling 'di na 'dzam gling gnas pa yi/_/rgyal po gang dag yin pa thams cad kyis/_/rab tu dga' ba chen po bskyed nas ni/_/chos rnams kyis ni 
[\[227a.7\]]yul dag bskyang bar gyis/_/gang gis 'dzam bu'i gling 'di bde ba dang /_/shin tu lo legs nyams kyang dgar 'gyur zhing /_/'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad dag na yang /_/sems can thams cad bde bar 'gyur bar gyis/_/'di na mi yi dbang po gang rnams ni/_/
[\[227b\]]
[\[227b.1\]]yul la dga' dang bdag bde dga' ba dang /_/rgyal srid rnam par 'byor pa dga' ba des/_/mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni mnyan par bya/_/mdo sde'i dbang 'di mchog tu dge bar byed/_/pha rol dgra ni yang dag zad par byed/_/pha rol dmag tshogs zlog byed dge ba 
[\[227b.2\]]byed/_/mchog tu 'jigs pas phongs pa sel bar byed/_/dper na rin chen shing ljon rab mdzes pa/_/yon tan kun 'byung khyim na yod pa ltar/_/rgyal po yon tan 'dod pa rnams kyis kyang /_/mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de ltar blta/_/dper na 
[\[227b.3\]]chu grang skom pa sel byed pa/_/tsha bas nyam thag de ni rnyed pa ltar/_/yon tan dag gis skom pa'i rgyal po la/_/mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/_/dper na rin chen thams cad 'byung ba'i gnas/_/rin chen snod ni lag mthil yod pa ltar/_/
[\[227b.4\]]mi yi dbang po tshogs la gser 'od mchog_/mdo sde'i dbang po'i mchog 'di de bzhin no/_/'di ni lha yi tshogs kyis mngon mchod pa/_/mdo sde'i dbang po lha dbang phyag byas pas/_/'jig rten skyong ba rdzu 'phrul chen po pa/_/bzhi po dag gis kun du bsrungs pa 
[\[227b.5\]]yin/_/phyogs bcu dag na sangs rgyas rnams kyis kyang /_/mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni rtag tu dgongs/_/mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni bshad pa na/_/sangs rgyas rnams kyis legs zhes brjod pa byin/_/gnod sbyin bye ba stong phrag brgya rnams kyis/_/phyogs bcu 
[\[227b.6\]]dag tu yul yang srung bar byed/_/rab tu dga' zhing rab tu mgu sems kyis/_/mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed/_/'dzam bu'i gling na gnas par gyur pa yi/_/lha yi tshogs rnams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_/lha tshogs de dag kun kyang rab dga' bas/_/
[\[227b.7\]]mdo sde'i dbang po 'di ni nyan par byed/_/chos rnams mnyan par bya ba 'di yis ni/_/gzi brjid dang ni stobs dang brtson 'grus thob/_/gzi byin chen po yis ni lha yi lus/_/shin tu rgyas shing rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_/de nas rgyal po chen po bzhis bcom ldan 'das 
[\[228a\]]
[\[228a.1\]]la tshigs su bcad pa 'di lta bu 'di dag thos pa dang ngo mtshar du gyur/_rmad du byung bar gyur/_dga' bar gyur te/_de dag chos kyi shugs kyis yud tsam zhig tu ngus nas mchi ma phyis te/_de dag lus 'phar yan lag 'dar zhing dga' ba dang /_bde 
[\[228a.2\]]ba dang /_yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur nas/_yang bcom ldan 'das la lha'i me tog man dA ra ba dag gis gtor/_mngon par gtor to/_/mngon par gtor nas kyang stan rnams las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/_
[\[228a.3\]]pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag cag rgyal po chen po bzhi rgyal po chen po re re la yang gnod sbyin lnga 
[\[228a.4\]]brgya lnga brgya dang /_chos smra ba de la bsrung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba'i slad du/_rtag tu dge slong chos smra ba'i slad bzhin 'brang bar bgyi'o/_/gal te mdo sde 'di las tshig gi don 'ga' zhig brjed par gyur na yang /_bdag cag gis de la dran pa dang /_mi brjed 
[\[228a.5\]]pa'i mchog gi gzungs chos kyi rnam grangs yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dag gang na bzhugs pa'i gnas de dag gi sems can rnams kyis yongs su rgyas par byed pas/_nam yang nub par mi 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor 
[\[228a.6\]]'dus pa de dag la chos kyi rnam grangs 'di bshad pa'i tshe/_sems can de dag gis ye shes dang /_spobs pa dang /_bsod nams kyi tshogs tshad med pa thob pas/_nyon mongs pa spangs pa'i bde ba dang ldan te/_bstan bcos thams cad la mkhas shing 'khor ba 
[\[228a.7\]]yongs su spangs te/_bla na med pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa myur du thob par 'gyur ro/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las rgyal po chen po bzhis yul 'khor yongs su skyong ba'i le'u zhes bya ste/_bcu gnyis pa'o//_//
[\[228b\]]
[\[228b.1\]]bam po bdun pa/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la bka' stsal pa/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di lta ste/_chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di ni/_byang chub sems dpa' chos thams cad la bsgoms 
[\[228b.2\]]pa rnams kyi ma dang /_byang chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi spyod pa dang /_byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis yongs su 'dzin pa yin no/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom 
[\[228b.3\]]ldan 'das gzungs ni yul na mi gnas/_phyogs na mi gnas pa lags na/_bcom ldan 'das gzungs gzungs zhes bgyi ba'i gzungs kyi tshig gi don de gang lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad 
[\[228b.4\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar khyod theg pa chen po la gnas pa dang /_theg pa chen po la mos pa dang /_theg pa chen po la lhag par bya ba byas pa yin na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu ji ltar khyod gzungs ni yul na mi gnas phyogs na mi gnas shing /_chos kyang ma yin/_
[\[228b.5\]]chos ma yin pa yang ma yin/_'das pa yang ma yin/_ma 'ongs pa yang ma yin/_da ltar byung ba yang ma yin/_dngos po can yang ma yin/_dngos po med pa can yang ma yin/_rkyen las byung ba yang ma yin/_rkyen med pa las byung ba yang ma yin/_'gro ba las byung 
[\[228b.6\]]ba yang ma yin/_'gro ba med pa las byung ba yang ma yin/_chos gang gi skye ba yang ma yin/_'gog pa yang ma yin par chos ston mod kyi/_byang chub sems dpa' rnams la phan par bya ba'i phyir/_'di lta ste/_sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang /_sangs rgyas kyi tshul khrims 
[\[228b.7\]]dang /_sangs rgyas kyi bslab pa dang /_sangs rgyas kyi dgongs pa dang /_sangs rgyas 'byung ba 'di lta ste/_chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs sgrub pa'i lam gyi rig pa dang /_stobs kyi gnas ston pa legs so legs so/_/de skad ces bka' stsal 
[\[229a\]]
[\[229a.1\]]pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bus 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di lta ste/_gzungs thob pas gang la gnas na/_byang chub sems dpa' bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi 
[\[229a.2\]]ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par dam bcas par 'gyur ba dang /_rten med pa'i chos kyi rang bzhin gyi spobs pa can gyi slob dpon dang /_lam la shin tu gnas par 'gyur ba'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs bshad du gsol/_bde bar gshegs pa 
[\[229a.3\]]bshad du gsol/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu legs so legs so/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu de de bzhin te gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de la sangs rgyas 
[\[229a.4\]]nyid du brjod par bya ste/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang la la gzungs thob pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la bkur stir byed pa dang /_bla mar byed pa dang /_rim gror byed pa dang /_mchod par byed pa des sangs rgyas la bkur stir byas par 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang la 
[\[229a.5\]]la gzungs 'di nyan par byed pa dang /_gang dag gzungs 'di 'chang bar byed pa dang /_gang dag mos par byed pa de rnams la byang chub kyi sems dang ma bral bas/_sangs rgyas la ji ltar mchod pa de bzhin du 'gyur ro/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gzungs de ni 'di yin te 
[\[229a.6\]]tad+ya thA/_san d+hA ra Ni/_uta d+hA ra Ni/_su saM pra tiSh+Thi te/_su nA ma/_su pra tiSh+Thi te/_bi dza ya ba la/_sat+t+ya pra ti dz+nyA/_su A ro ha/_dz+nyA na pra ti/_ut+pA da ni/_a ba nA ba ni/_a b+hi Shiny+tsa ni/_a b+hi bya hA ra/_shu b+ha ba ti/_su niHshri ta/_ba hu guM b+ha/_a b+hi ba dA swA hA/_
[\[229a.7\]]sha ra dwa ti'i bu chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi tshig 'di byang chub sems dpa' gang gis shin tu gnas pa dang /_legs par gzung ba byas nas/_'chang bar byed pa de bskal pa'am/_bskal pa las lhag pa'am/_bskal pa stong ngam/_bskal pa brgya phrag stong 
[\[229b\]]
[\[229b.1\]]du yang smon lam zad par mi 'gyur la/_de'i lus la mtshon gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur te/_dug gis ma yin zhing sbrul gyis tshugs par mi 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_sha ra dwa ti'i bu chags pa med pa'i gzungs 'di ni/_'das pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[229b.2\]]rnams kyi yum/_ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum/_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi yum ste/_'di lta ste/_chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs yin no/_/sha ra dwa ti'i bu gang dag gis stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig 
[\[229b.3\]]rten gyi khams grangs med pa phrag bcu rin po che sna bdun gyis bkang ste/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yon du phul zhing sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de rnams la bskal pa grangs med par na bza' dang /_zhal zas gya nom pas bzhugs par byed pa bas/_
[\[229b.4\]]gang dag gis chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di las tshig gcig tsam 'dzin par byed pa'i sems can de dag de bas ches bsod nams mang du skyed par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_tshe dang ldan pa sha ra dwa ti'i bu 'di la chags pa med pa'i gzungs kyi chos kyi 
[\[229b.5\]]rnam grangs 'di ni/_sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yum yin no/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las chags pa med pa'i gzungs zhes bya ba'i le'u ste bcu gsum pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' 
[\[229b.6\]]stsal pa/_kun dga' bo khyod kyis glog thams cad zlog pa/_so sor 'brang ba sngon gyi yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyis gsungs pa/_nga yang da ltar 'chad kyis zung shig_/kun dga' bo shar phyogs na 'ong ba zhes bya ba'i glog yod/_kun dga' bo lho 
[\[229b.7\]]phyogs na skad brgya pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/_kun dga' bo nub phyogs na 'od nyams pa zhes bya ba'i glog yod/_kun dga' bo byang phyogs na rgyun gyi bdag po zhes bya ba'i glog yod de/_kun dga' bo gang la la glog 'di rnams kyi ming shes pa dang /_phyogs rnam par gnas 
[\[230a\]]
[\[230a.1\]]pa shes pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad mi 'byung bar shes par bya'o/_/glog gi ming 'di dag yi ger bris te/_gnas gang du bzhag pa'i gnas de dag tu/_glog thams cad mi 'bab bo/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe/_
[\[230a.2\]]drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/tad+ya thA/_ni mi ni mi/_ni min d+ha ri/_'jig rten gsum snang bar byed pa/_lag na rtse gsum pas phyogs 'dir glog thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig swA hA/_yang de'i tshe byang chub sems 
[\[230a.3\]]dpa' sems dpa' chen po 'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug 'khor de nyid du 'dus par gyur te/_'dug pa des bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/_drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi 
[\[230a.4\]]tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ka Te bi ka Te/_ni ka Te/_pra t+ya r+thi ke_/prat+ya mi tre/_shud+d+he/_muk+te/_bi ma le/_pra b+hA swa re/_aN+Da re/_paN+Da re/_shwe te/_paN+Da ra bA si ni/_ha ri kaN+Da ri/_ka pi li/_piM ga la/_ak+Shi da d+hi mu khi/_dus ma yin 
[\[230a.5\]]par 'chi ba thams cad las bdag la srungs shig srungs shig_/'phags pa spyan ras gzigs dbang phyug gi gzi brjid kyis/_bdag dus ma yin par 'chi ba thams cad mthong bar ma gyur cig swA hA/_de nas gsang ba pa'i bdag po lag na rdo rjes/_bcom 
[\[230a.6\]]ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_mu ni mu ni/_mu ni na d+ha ri mu ni/_
[\[230a.7\]]ma ti ma ti/_su ma ti/_ma hA ma ti/_hA hA hA hA/_khyod la sdig pa med kyis ma 'jigs shig ces lag na rdo rjes smras kyis drA bi Da swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das bdag gi bsrung ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di su'i snying la 'dzin tam/_yi ger bris pa de bdag gis rtag 
[\[230b\]]
[\[230b.1\]]par rgyun du/_'jigs pa thams cad las bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las thar bar bgyi'o/_/de nas mi mjed kyi bdag po tshangs pas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[230b.2\]]bdag gis kyang /_sems can thams cad kyi don dang /_phan pa dang /_bde ba bskyed pa'i slad du/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la/_gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li mi li/_tsi li swA hA/_brah+ma pU re swA hA/_
[\[230b.3\]]brah+ma swa re swA hA/_brah+ma b+hi su gar+b+he/_puSh+pa saM sta re swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'di ni bdag gi bsrung ba tshangs pa'i chad pa zhes bgyi ste/_dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa/_sdig pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyid pa lags so/_/
[\[230b.4\]]de nas lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyis bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag gis kyang chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams 
[\[230b.5\]]brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_ni ba rA Ni/_ban+d+ha mA ran+te ma ti ti/_ti ti/_gau rI/_gan+d+ha ri/_tsaN+DA li/_mA tang+gi/_pa r+Na le/_hi na ma d+h+ya ma d+ha ri Ni ma la ni/_da la mad de/_tsakra bA krI/_sha ba ri/_sha ba ri swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 
[\[230b.6\]]'di ni bdag gi rig sngags rdo rje'i lce 'bebs pa zhes bgyi ste/_'jigs pa thams cad las thar bar bgyid pa/_dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so/_/de nas rgyal po chen po yul 'khor srung dang /_'phags skyes po 
[\[230b.7\]]dang /_mig mi bzang dang /_rgyal po chen po rnam thos kyi bus/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gis kyang /_skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo 
[\[231a\]]
[\[231a.1\]]mang po la bde ba dang /_'jig rten la snying brtse ba'i slad du/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di la gzungs kyi gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams brjod par bgyi'o/_/tad+ya thA/_puSh+pe su puSh+pe/_d+hu ma pa ri hA re/_Ar+ya pu sha ste/_shAn ti/_nirmuka te/_
[\[231a.2\]]mang+ga l+ya/_hi ra N+ya gad+d+he stu te/_sta bi te swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'di ni rgyal po chen po bzhi po bdag cag gi bsrung ba 'jigs pa ma mchis pa zhes bgyi ste/_'jigs pa thams cad las mi 'jigs par bgyid pa/_tshe skyong ba dus ma lags
