[\[231a.3\]]par 'gum pa thams cad las yongs su skyob pa lags so/_/de nas klu'i rgyal po rgya mtsho dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog 'od dang /_klu'i rgyal po ma dros pa dang /_klu'i rgyal po glog lce dang /_klu'i rgyal po 'od zer brgya pas/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de 
[\[231a.4\]]logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag cag gi srung ba chen po yid bzhin gyi nor bu zhes bgyi ba/_glog thams cad zlog pa/_dus ma lags par 'gum pa thams cad sel ba/_dug 
[\[231a.5\]]rnams mi gdug par bgyid pa/_gshed byed dang /_byad stems dang /_ro langs dang /_bkra mi shis pa'i 'jigs pa zhi bar bgyid pa mchis na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu'i skye gnas 'di nas dbyung ba dang /_ser sna spang ba'i slad du thugs brtse bar dgongs 
[\[231a.6\]]te bzhes su gsol/_de ci'i slad du zhe na/_bcom ldan 'das bdag cag klu rnams ni ser sna can te sems ser snas bskor ba lags so/_/tad+ya thA/_Ar+ya dze a ma re a mr-i te/_ak+Sha ye/_a b+hi ye/_puN+yai/_bar+ya ba te/_sarba pA pa~M/_pra sha mA ni ye swA hA/_Ar+ya puN+ya 
[\[231a.7\]]so pA kI ye swA hA/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di dag skyes pa'am/_bud med gang la la'i lce la 'don pa'am/_yi ger bris pa de la glog gi 'jigs pa thams cad ma mchis par rig par bgyi'o/_/rtsa ba'i dug gam/_mche ba'i 
[\[231b\]]
[\[231b.1\]]dug gam/_dbyig dug gam/_gang dag gzhan yang yan lag las byung ba'i dug de dag gis de 'gum pa'i dus bgyid par mi 'gyur ro/_/bdag 'jigs pa thams cad dang /_gnod pa thams cad las bde legs su gyur cig_/de nas bcom ldan 
[\[231b.2\]]'das kyis brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba dang /_klu'i dbang po de dag la legs so zhes bya ba gnang ste/_bzhin [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]dag khyed skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhus te/_chos kyi rnam grangs 'di rjes su yongs su bzung ba'i phyir/_
[\[231b.3\]]drA bi Da'i gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams bshad pa legs so legs so/_/phyogs rnams ni gnyid log pa dang /_myos pa dang /_rab tu myos pa rnams bsrung bar 'gyur ro/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_dge slong de dag dang /_
[\[231b.4\]]brgya byin dang /_tshangs pa dang /_'jig rten skyong ba de dag dang /_klu'i dbang po de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/gser 'od dam 
[\[231b.5\]]pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_yid bzhin gyi nor bu'i gzungs kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu bzhi pa'o//_//de nas lha mo chen mo dbyangs can gyis bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos te/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom 
[\[231b.6\]]ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud de/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dbyangs can bdag gis kyang /_dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan pa'i slad du/_spobs pa nye bar bsgrub 
[\[231b.7\]]par bgyi/_gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi/_nges pa'i tshig gis brjod pa kun tu gzhag par bgyi/_dge slong chos smra ba de la shes pa'i snang ba chen po bgyi/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig 'ga'am/_yi ge gang yang rung ba dag 
[\[232a\]]
[\[232a.1\]]gcig_/yongs su nyams par gyur tam/_bskyud na bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i nges pa'i sgra dang tshig dang /_yi ge de dag thams cad bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/ci nas sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun 
[\[232a.2\]]pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling na yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sems can du ma dag gis gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos nas/_
[\[232a.3\]]shes rab rno ba bsam gyis mi khyab par 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /_tshe 'di la tshe phun sum tshogs pa rab tu thob par 'gyur ba dang /_srog la phan gdags pa dang /_bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu 
[\[232a.4\]]ma mchis pa rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_thabs sna tshogs rab tu 'tshal bar 'gyur ba dang /_bstan bcos thams cad la rab tu mkhas par 'gyur ba dang /_bzo'i bgyi ba sna tshogs phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_bskyud pa ma mchis 
[\[232a.5\]]par bgyi ba'i slad du/_de la gzungs kyang stsal bar bgyi'o/_/dge slong chos smra ba de dang /_sems can chos nyan pa de dag gi don gyi slad du/_sngags dang /_sman dang ldan pa'i khrus kyi las brjod par bgyi ste/_gza' dang /_rgyu skar dang /_skye ba dang /_
[\[232a.6\]]'chi ba'i gnod pa dang /_'thab pa dang /_rnyog pa dang /_'khrug glong dang /_khrag khrug dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang /_byad dang ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/_gang gis mkhas pa dag khrus bgyid du 
[\[232a.7\]]stsal ba'i sman dang sngags ni 'di dag ste/_shu dag gi'u wang spr-i ka dang /_/sha mya sha [{]myi [,]mi [}]shI ri shA/_/in+d+ra hasta skal ba che/_/dz+ha ma shing tsha a ga ru/_/shi ri bi sta sra rtsi pog_/gu gul ra sa sha la ki/_/rdo dreg lo ma rgya spos dang /_/tsan+dan dang ni ldong ros dang /_/
[\[232b\]]
[\[232b.1\]]gi'u wang bcas dang ru rta dang /_/gur gum gla sgang yungs kar dang /_/dbyi mo sug smel na la dang /_/nA ga ge sar u shi ra/_/'di dag cha ni mnyam bgyis nas/_/skar ma rgyal la btag par bgyi/_/phye ma la ni sngags tshig 'di/_/lan brgya mngon par 
[\[232b.2\]]gdab par bgyi/_/tad+ya thA/_su te kr-i te/_ka ma ta li/_na le dza na ka ra te/_hang+ka ra te/_in+d+ra dza li ni/_shaM ka ra dri pa shad dri/_a brta ka_/se ke na ku tra ku/_/ka bi la/_ka bi la ma ti/_shI la ma ti/_shI la ma ti/_san+d+hi/_d+hu d+hu ma ba ti/_
[\[232b.3\]]shi ri shi ri/_sad t+ya s+thi ti swA hA/_lci bas dkyil 'khor bgyis nas ni/_/me tog sil ma dgram par bgyi/_/gser gyi snod dang dngul snod du/_/mngar ba'i khu ba gzhag par bgyi/_/skyes bu go cha bgos pa ni/_/bzhi zhig der yang gzhag par bgyi/_/
[\[232b.4\]]rab tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bzhi/_/bum pa thogs pa gzhag par bgyi/_/rtag tu gu gul bdug par bgyi/_/sil snyan sna lnga bgyid du stsal/_/gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan gyis/_/lha mo de ni legs par brgyan/_/bar bar dag tu me long bzhag_/
[\[232b.5\]]mda' dang mdung rtse sne sprad bzhag_/de nas mtshams kyang gcad par bgyi/_/de yi 'og tu dgos pa brtsam/_/sngags kyi las ni 'di dag gis/_/mtshams gcad pa yang brtsam par bgyi/_/sAd+ya thed na/_a ka ra ke/_na ya ne/_hi le mi le/_gi le/_khi 
[\[232b.6\]]khi le swA hA/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi sna ma logs su khrus bgyis nas/_sngags 'di bzlas brjod bgyis na khrus kyis zhi bar sbyar ro/_/tad+ya thA/_sa ga De/_bi ga De/_bi ga ta ba ti swA hA/_phyogs bzhi dag na gang gnas pa'i/_/rgyu skar dag gis tshe 
[\[232b.7\]]srungs shig_/btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang /_/phung po'i las kyi 'jigs 'byung dang /_/'byung po'i khams rnams 'khrugs bgyid pa/_/'jigs pa mi bzad zhi gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_sa me bi sha me swA hA/_sa ga De/_bi ga De swA hA/_bi ga De ba te 
[\[233a\]]
[\[233a.1\]]swA hA/_sA ga ra sa~M b+hu tA ya swA hA/_skan+d+ha mA tA ya swA hA/_nI la kaN+ThA ya swA hA/_a pa ra dzi ta/_bir+ya ya swA hA/_hI ma ban+d+ha sa~M b+hu tA ya swA hA/_i ni bi la bag trA ya swA hA/_na mo b+ha ga ba te/_brah+mA Ne/_na ma swa ra swa t+yai/_ma hA de bai sin tu mAM/_man+t+ra 
[\[233a.2\]]pa dA/_ta ra tu bi tsi ta~M/_bra h+mA nu ma n+ya tu swA hA/_dge slong chos smra ba de la bsrung ba dang /_chos mnyan pa de dag dang /_yi ger 'dri ba de dag gi don gyi slad du/_khrus kyi las 'dis bdag nyid der mchis par bgyi'o/_/lha'i tshogs thams cad dang lhan cig tu grong 
[\[233a.3\]]ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_gtsug lag khang der nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/_/ci nas dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag gi srog la phan gdags par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[233a.4\]]'khor ba las 'byung ba thob par 'gyur ba dang /_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par 'gyur ba dang /_myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[233a.5\]]gza' dang /_'thab pa dang /_rnyog pa dang /_btsas pa'i skar ma'i gnod pa dang /_rmi lam ngan pa dang /_log 'dren gyi gnod pa thams cad dang /_byad dang /_ro langs thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo 
[\[233a.6\]]dbyangs can la/_lha mo chen mo dbyangs can khyod skye bo mang po la phan pa dang /_skye bo mang po la bde ba'i phyir zhus te/_khyod kyi sngags dang /_sman dang ldan pa'i tshig 'di 'dra ba bshad pa ni/_legs so legs so/_/zhes bya ba byin te/_lha mo chen mo 
[\[233a.7\]]dbyangs can gyis/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'dug go/_/de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kau N+Di n+yas lha mo dbyangs can de bkug go_/lha mo chen mo dbyangs can mchod 'os dka' thub che/_/'jig rten kun du 
[\[233b\]]
[\[233b.1\]]rnam grangs mchog sbyin yon tan che/_/rtser gnas mdzes ma dUr ba rtswa yis gos bskus pa/_/dUr ba'i rtswa yi gos gyon rkang pa gcig gi gnas/_/lha rnams thams cad lhags nas 'di skad tshig smras te/_/sems can rnams la dge ba'i tshig shod 
[\[233b.2\]]lce khrol mdzod/_/sAd+ya the dan/_mu re/_tsi re/_a ba dze/_a ba dza ba ti/_hing+gu le/_mid+gu le/_ping+ga la ba te/_mung+ga She/_ma ma rI ts+yai/_swa ma ti/_da sha ma ti/_a g+h+ri ta ma g+h+ri/_ta ra tsi/_ta ra tsa ba ti/_tsi tsi tsi ri/_shi ri mi ri/_ma ri ts+yai/_
[\[233b.3\]]prA na pri ye/_lo ka dz+yeSh+The/_lo ka shreSh+The/_lo ka pre ya/_sid+d+ha pra te/_b+hI ma mu khi/_shu tsi tsa ri/_a pra ti ha te/_a pra ti ha ta bud+d+hi/_na mu tsi/_ma hA na mu tsi/_ma hA de byi/_pra ti grI hA/_na ma ska rA na/_bdag gi blo thogs pa med par gyur cig_/bstan bcos 
[\[233b.4\]]dang /_tshigs su bcad pa'i rgyud dang /_sde snod dang /_snyan dngags la sogs pa la/_bdag gi rig sngags dngos grub tu gyur cig_/tad+ya thA/_ma hA pra b+hA be/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo dbyangs can gyi mthus bdag rnam 
[\[233b.5\]]par rgyal bar gyur cig_/kA ra te/_ke yU re/_ke yU ra ma te/_hi li mi li/_hi li mi li/_sangs rgyas kyi bden pa dang /_chos kyi bden pa dang /_dge 'dun gyi bden pa dang /_dbang po'i bden pa dang /_chu lha'i bden pas lha mo chen mo dgug par bya'o/_/
[\[233b.6\]]gang dag 'jig rten na bden pa smra ba de dag gi bden pa dang /_bden pa'i tshig gis lha mo chen mo dbyangs can dgug par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_hi li mi li/_hi li mi li/_hi li mi li/_bdag rnam par rgyal bar gyur cig_/bcom ldan 'das ma lha mo chen mo dbyangs can 
[\[233b.7\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag la gsang sngags kyi tshig rnams grub par gyur cig swA hA/_de nas lha mo dbyangs can gyi gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag smras nas/_yang bram ze kau N+Di n+ya la 'di skad ces smras so/_/skyes bu chen po khyod sems can thams cad la spobs pa 
[\[234a\]]
[\[234a.1\]]dam pa dang /_rdzu 'phrul dang /_mngon par shes pa dang /_shes rab che ba dang /_nor dang /_dbyig la sogs pa sbyin pas phan 'dogs shing /_myur du bla na med pa'i byang chub thob par byed pa legs so legs so/_/mdo sde 'di 'dzin pa'i cho ga 
[\[234a.2\]]bstan pa'i phyir tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so/_/gzungs 'di dang por su 'don pas/_/dkon mchog gsum la phyag 'tshal te/_/'khrul pa med par bzlas byas na/_/dngos grub dam pa thob par 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas rnams dang dam chos 
[\[234a.3\]]dang /_/byang chub rang rgyal nyan thos dang /_/tshangs pa dang ni brgya byin dang /_/rgyal chen bzhi la phyag 'tshal zhing /_/rtag tu tshangs par spyod pa yang /_/rim gro gus par bsam byas te/_/zhi la dben pa'i gnas su ni/_/sgra bskyed gzungs dang bstod pa brjod/_/
[\[234a.4\]]ji snyed sangs rgyas lha klu la/_/mchod pa rgya cher bsham par bya/_/skye bo'i rigs ni mang po la/_/snying rje'i sems kyang bskyed par bya/_/bcom ldan gser mdog mtshan rab can/_/rtse gcig sems kyis bsam bya zhing /_/bcom ldan 
[\[234a.5\]]gsung rab dam chos kyis/_/dbang po so sor nges mdzad pa'i/_/de yi tshig don legs bsams te/_/stong nyid bsgrub la'ang gnas par byos/_/bcom ldan thams cad mngon sum du/_/rtse gcig sems kyis bsam byas na/_/ting nge 'dzin dang ye shes dang /_/
[\[234a.6\]]gzungs mchog dam pa thob par 'gyur/_/bcom ldan dpal mgur gsung chos kyis/_/dam pa'i dbyangs des 'khor rnams 'dul/_/ljags kyis stong gsum khebs mdzad cing /_/so sor ci rigs ya mtshan ston/_/de lta'i gsung mchog dam pa la/_/
[\[234a.7\]]rtag par bsam zhing 'jigs pa spongs/_/bsam gyis mi khyab ljags mtshan 'di/_/smon lam rgya chen dbang gis brnyes/_/chos rnams med par ston mdzad pa/_/ji ltar mkha' la ma chags bzhin/_/sangs rgyas ljags mtshan gsung sgra la/_/de bsams 
[\[234b\]]
[\[234b.1\]]smon lam tshad med 'grub/_/gang zhig dbyangs can mngon mchod dam/_/yang na slob mas man ngag bzhin/_/lung bzhin chos de gang sgrub pa/_/bkur sti'i mchog rnams thob par 'gyur/_/gang zhig ye shes mchog sgrub pa'ang /_/rtse gcig sems kyis chos 'di 
[\[234b.2\]]gzung /_/bsod nams ye shes tshogs 'phel zhing /_/nges par 'grub la yid gnyis spongs/_/gang zhig nor sgrub nor dang ldan/_/khe dang grags pa'ang de bzhin 'grub/_/'byung bar 'dod pa'ang rnam grol bar/_/nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs/_/
[\[234b.3\]]yon tan mang po tshad med pa'ang /_/bsam pa bzhin du kun grub pas/_/'di la tshul bzhin gang gnas pa/_/nges par 'grub pas yid gnyis spongs/_/dben par gtsang ma'i gos gyon te/_/dkyil 'khor ci ran byas pa der/_/bum pa rgyas pa bzhi bzhag 
[\[234b.4\]]ste/_/dus bzhin me tog bdug pas mchod/_/ba dan gdugs dang lda ldi bre/_/phye ma byug pas rgyas par brgyan/_/sangs rgyas dang ni dbyangs can mchod/_/lha de mthong 'dod mthong bar 'gyur/_/dbyangs can lha mo de mdun du/_/zhag bdun gsum du 
[\[234b.5\]]bzlas brjod de/_/gal te lha de ma mthong na/_/bsam pa brtan pas zhag dgur bzlas/_/de yi nub mo'ang ma mthong na/_/gzhan du shis pa'i gnas btsal te/_/tshul bzhin lha mo'i gzugs bris la/_/mchod cing bzlas brjod rgyun mi gcad/_/
[\[234b.6\]]bdag dang gzhan don tshad med la/_/nyin mtshan rgyun tu brtson bskyed de/_/de yi 'bras bu gzhan la stobs/_/de ni bsam pa 'grub par 'gyur/_/de ste'ang bsam pa ma grub na/_/zla ba gsum dang drug dang dgu/_/yang na brtson pas lor bzlas na/_/
[\[234b.7\]]mngon shes drug la sogs pa'ang 'thob/_/de nas bram ze kauN+Di n+yas/_de skad ces bshad pa thos nas dga' ba dang /_rangs pa tshad med pa skyes te/_'khor 'dus pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha dang mi la sogs pa'i 'khor thams cad kyis/_
[\[235a\]]
[\[235a.1\]]sems ma g.yeng bar bdag la nyon cig dang /_bdag gis kun rdzob kyi bden pa la brten te/_dbyangs can lha mo mchog la bstod pa'i phyir/_tshigs su bcad de smra bar bgyi'o/_/phyag 'tshal lha mo mthu chen la/_/'jig rten khams 
[\[235a.2\]]'dir dbang brnyes par/_/sngon gyi drang srong gis bshad pas/_/de phyir bdag gis khyod la bstod/_/dpal ldan thugs ni bde ba dang /_/thos 'dzin mdzes ldan grags ldan pa/_/'jig rten 'di skyed yum yang yin/_/rtag tu dpal la brtson chen 
[\[235a.3\]]spyod/_/g.yul gyi gnas las rtag tu rgyal/_/snying rje bzod la dul bas bskyed/_/gshin rje'i sring mor lus ston cing /_/rtag tu dar gos sngon po mnabs/_/mdzes dang mi mdzes kun ston cing /_/spyan mig sus mthong dang ba skyed/_/spyod pa tshad med 
[\[235a.4\]]'jig rten 'das/_/skyabs su su 'ongs rjes su 'dzin/_/bar 'ga' ri dang brag la gnas/_/bar 'ga' phug dang chu bo'i 'gram/_/yang na ljon sdong nags rnams su/_/gnas de dag ni lha mo'i rten/_/ci ltar ri brags mi rnams kyis/_/rma bya'i mdongs las 
[\[235a.5\]]gdugs byas shing /_/rtag tu lha mo de mchod na/_/thams cad dus su 'jig rten skyob/_/stag dang seng ges 'khor byas shing /_/bya dang phyugs kyang de la brtan/_/dril chen sgra dag mngon bsgrags pas/_/bin d+hu'i ri la'ang grag par gyur/_/phyag na rtse gsum 
[\[235a.6\]]thor tshugs dbu/_/yang na nyi zla'i ru mtshon bsnams/_/zla ba mar ngo bcu gcig gam/_/dgu yi dus su mchod pa bya/_/g.yul 'gyed dus su thugs brtse bas/_/'jig rten kun la gzigs pa'i phyir/_/lha mo ba su'i gzugs ston pas/_/lha mo'i mchog ste dpe med pa'o/_/
[\[235a.7\]]phyugs rdzi rgan mo'i gzugs ston cing /_/lha dag 'thab pa'ang rtag tu rgyal/_/yun ring 'jig rten bde bar gnas/_/bar 'ga' khros shing bar 'ga' zhi/_/bram zer smra zhing chos bzhi dang /_/rdzu 'phrul gsang sngags kun la mkhas/_/drang srong lha yi dbang brnyes pas/_/
[\[235b\]]
[\[235b.1\]]sa chen 'di dang sa bon byed/_/lha mo 'du ba'i dus su yang /_/rgya mtsho lud bzhin nges par 'du/_/gnod sbyin klu la sogs rnams kyis/_/kun gyi gtso byed 'dul bar nus/_/mo rnams kun gyi tshangs spyod mchog_/'jig rten gtso sbyin bdag la 
[\[235b.2\]]dgongs/_/rgyal po'i gnas la'ang pad+mo bzhin/_/chu bo la yang gru dang gzings/_/zla ba nya bzhin zhal yang rgyas/_/mang du thos ldan rten yang byed/_/ri bo'i rtse bzhin spobs pa 'phags/_/bsams pas gling dang rab kyang ston/_/lha min la sogs 
[\[235b.3\]]lha rnams kyis/_/kun gyis yon tan bstod cing bsngags/_/spyan stong brgya byin lha rgyal yang /_/gus pa'i sems kyis zhal du lta/_/sems can gang dag ci 'dod pa/_/de kun bsam pa myur du skong /_/blo myur thos pa 'dzin pa yang /_/sa chen 'di 
[\[235b.4\]]gnas kun gyi mchog_/phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten khams dag tu/_/rtag tu sgron chen snang byed bzhin/_/bya dang gcan gzan [{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]kyi'ang /_/kun gyi bsam pa yongs su skong /_/bud med kyi mchog ri bo bzhin/_/drang srong 'jig rten ri gnas 
[\[235b.5\]]bzhin/_/lha mo gzhon bzhin 'dod dang bral/_/mi mjed bdag bzhin bden par smra/_/'jig rten mthun par gzugs ston cing /_/'dod khams bar gyi lha gnas su'ang /_/khyod ni lha mo'i gtso yin pas/_/de las mchog pa'i sems can med/_/
[\[235b.6\]]gal te g.yul dang 'jigs pa'i gnas/_/me yi dong du lhung 'gyur ram/_/chu bo g.yang sa mi rgod las/_/'jigs pa de las sgrol bar mdzad/_/rgyal po'i chad pas bcings pa'am/_/yang na dgra yis bsad par yang /_/rtse gcig sems ni ma g.yos na/_/
[\[235b.7\]]sdug bsngal dag las thar bar 'gyur/_/dge dang mi dge kun la skyob/_/byams dang brtse bas mdun du gnas/_/de phyir bdag ni sems btud de/_/phyag 'tshal lha mo chen mo la'o/_/de nas yang slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+yas/_lha mo chen mo 
[\[236a\]]
[\[236a.1\]]dbyangs can la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/'byung po'i tshogs rnams thams cad nga la nyan par gyis/_/lha dang dri za lha dbang bcas pa'i 'jig rten na/_/bud med dam pa lha mo mchog gi rab gang yin/_/
[\[236a.2\]]lha mo dam pa mchog tu mdzes pa'i zhal la bstod/_/yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs bsags pas yan lag brgyan/_/dbyangs can zhes bya spyan ni yangs shing bsod nams 'bar/_/dri med ye shes yon tan rnams kyis rnam par brgyan/_/rin chen 
[\[236a.3\]]sna tshogs tha dad lta bur blta ba'i phyir/_/mchog rab ngag gi yon tan khyad par de bstod do/_/dam pa mchog gi dngos grub byed pa dang /_/yang dag bsngags pa yon tan byed pa dang /_/dri med mchog dang pad+ma 'bar ba dang /_/mig mchog dang ni mig gi dam pa dang /_/dge ba'i 
[\[236a.4\]]gnas dang dge ba mthong ba dang /_/yon tan bsam mi khyab pas brgyan pa dang /_/zla ba 'dra dang dri ma med 'od dang /_/ye shes 'byung gnas dran pa dam pa dang /_/seng ge mchog dang mi la zhon pa dang /_/lag pa brgyad rnams kyis ni brgyan pa la/_/mda' gzhu mdung 
[\[236a.5\]]thung ral gri dgra sta dang /_/be con lcags kyi 'khor lo zhags pa bsnams/_/zla ba nya ba lta bur snang ba'i zhal/_/yid du 'ong ba'i ngag dang dbyangs snyan dang /_/shes rab zab mo dang ni ldan pa dang /_/dgos mchog sgrub byed sems can dam pa dang /_/lha dang 
[\[236a.6\]]lha min dbang pos mchod pa dang /_/lha dang lha min tshogs kun gnas brjod dang /_/'byung po'i tshogs kyi gnas rtag mchod pa'i phyir/_/swA hA bdag cag lha mo 'di la phyag bya'o/_/bdag la yon tan khyad par kun stsol cig_/dgos pa kun tu bdag la dngos 
[\[236a.7\]]grub stsol/_/dgra rnams khrod na bdag la rtag tu srungs/_/yi ge rdzogs shing tshig rgyas 'di dag ni/_/nang par langs nas gtsang mar brjod par bya/_/bsam pa dang ni nor 'bru thams cad rnyed/_/dngos grub dge ba rgya chen thob par 'gyur/_/de nas bcom 
[\[236b\]]
[\[236b.1\]]ldan 'das kyis bram ze kauN+Di n+ya la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/_khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/_lha mo dbyangs can la bstod pa dang /_dngos grub dam pa slong bas bsod nams tshad med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro//_//
[\[236b.2\]]bam po brgyad pa/_de nas slob dpon lung ston pa bram ze kauN+Di n+yas bstod pa dang /_gsang sngags kyi tshig gis/_lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la gsol nas/_yang 'khor de dag la smras pa/_skyes bu khyed kyis lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba dang /_de'i thugs rjes 
[\[236b.3\]]bskyab cing /_tshe 'di nyid la spobs pa thogs pa med pa dang /_thos pa 'dzin cing shes rab chen po dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_gtsug lag thams cad la mkhas shing /_tshig sbyor ba'i rgyan la gsal zhing thogs pa med pa grub par 'dod pas/_bsam pa de 
[\[236b.4\]]des shing gus pa'i sems kyis lha mo dbyangs can spyan drang ba'i tshig 'di brjod par bya'o/_/sangs rgyas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/chos la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dge 'dun la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' dang /_nyan thos dang /_rang sangs rgyas la sogs 
[\[236b.5\]]pa/_'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar bzhugs pa'i 'phags pa thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das yang dag par bden pa'i gsung la gnas pa/_so so'i dbang po dang mthun pa/_bden pa ston pa la mi slu bar 
[\[236b.6\]]gsung ba/_bskal pa bye ba tshad med par yang dag par bden pa'i tshig rtag tu ston cing /_gsung ba de dag la rjes su yi rang ngo /_/bden pa gsung bas ljags yangs la ring ba bkram ste/_zhal dang 'dzam bu'i gling dang /_rgyal chen bzhi dang /_stong gcig dang /_
[\[236b.7\]]stong gnyis dang /_stong gsum gyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di dang /_phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa thams cad rgyas par 'gengs shing /_nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad sel ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das thams cad la lus btud de phyag 'tshal 
[\[237a\]]
[\[237a.1\]]lo/_/ljags kyi mtshan dam pa de 'dra ba dang /_spobs pa tshad med pa dang bdag ldan par gyur cig_/phyag 'tshal bcom ldan dbyangs can mchog_/byang chub chen po dbyangs can mchog_/'phags pa rang rgyal dbyangs can mchog_/zung 
[\[237a.2\]]bzhi ya brgyad dbyangs can mchog_/bden pa bzhi gsung dbyangs can mchog_/yang dag gzigs pa dbyangs can mchog_/drang srong tshangs 'khor dbyangs can mchog_/lha mo u ma dbyangs can mchog_/skem byed lha yang dbyangs can mchog_/
[\[237a.3\]]gzi can klu yang dbyangs can mchog_/mtshan mo lha mo dbyangs can mchog_/rgyal chen bzhi po dbyangs can mchog_/bde gnas lha sras dbyangs can mchog_/rdo rje gsang bdag dbyangs can mchog_/khyab 'jug lha yang dbyangs can mchog_/lha mo 
[\[237a.4\]]pe ma dbyangs can mchog_/tshogs bdag lha yang dbyangs can mchog_/dpal gyi lha mo dbyangs can mchog_/dpal gyi blo gros dbyangs can mchog_/hi ri tshig 'chang dbyangs can mchog_/ma mo kun mchog dbyangs can mchog_/'phrog ma mo 
[\[237a.5\]]yang dbyangs can mchog_/gnod sbyin kun kyang dbyangs can mchog_/phyogs bcu'i rgyal po dbyangs can mchog_/bdag la las mchog kun gyis stobs/_/mtha' med dbyangs can mchog thob mdzod/_/slu med pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnam par 
[\[237a.6\]]grol la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'dod chags bral la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcings pa bcad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rnam dag sems la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'od snang mdzad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bden tshig gsung la phyag 'tshal lo/_/rdul dang bral la phyag 'tshal 
[\[237a.7\]]lo/_/don dam gnas la phyag 'tshal lo/_/'khor mang gtso la phyag 'tshal lo/_/dbyangs can lha la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bdag ni tshig la thogs med mdzod/_/bdag gi bsam pa ci mchis pa/_/thams cad myur du grub par mdzod/_/nad med rtag tu bde ba 
[\[237b\]]
[\[237b.1\]]dang /_/tshe ring ba yang thob par shog_/rig pa'i gnas la mkhas pa dang /_/byang chub lam la brtson pa dang /_/skye bo kun la phan mang mdzod/_/re ba thams cad myur du skong /_/bdag gi yang dag bden tshig dang /_/bdag gis mi slu tshig smras pa/_/
[\[237b.2\]]dbyangs can lha mo mchog gis ni/_/bdag gi don de grub par mdzod/_/lha mo 'dir ni gshegs par gsol/_/bdag gi tshig la thogs med mdzod/_/lus dang ngag la myur zhugs shing /_/yid myur spobs pa rdzogs par mdzod/_/bdag gi lce yi dbang po 
[\[237b.3\]]la/_/bde gshegs spobs pa ldan par mdzod/_/tshig gi gzi brjid mthu des ni/_/sems can thams cad 'dul bar mdzod/_/bdag gis tshig ni ci smras pa/_/don de thams cad grub par shog_/tshig la thams cad gus skyed cing /_/byed pa thams cad chud ma 
[\[237b.4\]]gzon/_/nam zhig bdag gi spobs 'dod pa/_/don de grub par ma gyur na/_/lha mo khyod kyi bden tshig ni/_/thams cad [{]brdzun [,]rdzun [}]pa nyid du 'gyur/_/mtshams med lnga yi sdig bgyis pa/_/sangs rgyas bkas ni 'dul bar 'gyur/_/gang yang dgra bcom pa dag dang /_/
[\[237b.5\]]byas pa gzo ba'i tshig rnams dang /_/shA ri'i bu dang maud gal dang /_/bcom ldan 'khor gyi gtso bo ste/_/de la sogs pa'i bden tshig kyang /_/thams cad bdag la grub par shog_/sangs rgyas nyan thos 'khor rnams dag_/bdag gis deng 'dir spyan drang gis/_/
[\[237b.6\]]bdag gi re ba bskang ba'i phyir/_/thams cad myur du gshegs par mdzod/_/yang dag bden pa'i tshig gsol ba/_/thams cad slu ba med par shog_/srid pa'i rtse mo man chad dang /_/gtsang ma'i gnas ni thams cad dang /_/tshangs pa tshangs chen mdun 'don dang /_/
[\[237b.7\]]tshangs pa'i rgyal 'khor thams cad dang /_/stong gsum 'khor ba'i bar dag dang /_/mi mjed 'jig rten gtso bo dang /_/de dang de yi 'khor rnams dang /_/de kun deng 'dir spyan drangs te/_/thugs rjes bdag la dgongs mdzad cing /_/brtse ba kun gyis gzung 
[\[238a\]]
[\[238a.1\]]bar mdzod/_/gzhan 'phrul dbang byed lha dag dang /_/gzhan yang 'phrul dga'i lha dag dang /_/byams pa mngon par 'tshang rgya'i gnas/_/dga' ldan gnam gyi lha rnams dang /_/'thab bral gyi ni lha rnams dang /_/sum cu rtsa gsum lha 
[\[238a.2\]]rnams dang /_/rgyal chen bzhi yi lha rnams dang /_/gzhan yang lha 'khor thams cad dang /_/sa chu me rlung lha dag dang /_/ri rab lhun la gnas pa dang /_/chu bdun ri bo lha rnams dang /_/de kun 'khor dang bcas pa dang /_/zur phud lnga can 
[\[238a.3\]]nor rgyas dang /_/nyi zla gza' dang rgyu skar dang /_/de la sogs pa'i lha rnams dang /_/'jig rten bde bar mdzad pa'i gnas/_/de la sogs pa'i lha thams cad/_/sdig pa'i las la ma mos pa/_/sangs rgyas la gus 'byung ba'i ma/_/bu rab 
[\[238a.4\]]gzhon la byams pa dang /_/lha dang klu dang gnod sbyin rnams/_/dri za dang ni lha ma yin/_/gzhan yang mi 'am ci dag dang /_/lto 'phye che la sogs pa rnams/_/kun kyang bcom ldan mthu yis ni/_/bdag gis deng 'dir spyan drangs te/_/thugs 
[\[238a.5\]]rje brtse ba'i dgongs pa yis/_/bdag la thogs med spobs pa skyed/_/lha dang mi rnams thams cad kyis/_/gzhan gyi sems rig mkhyen pa rnams/_/kun gyi mthu yis byin brlabs shing /_/bdag la spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig_/ji snyed nam 
[\[238a.6\]]mkha'i mthas gtugs shing /_/chos kyi dbyings kyi mus klas pa'i/_/sems can de dag thams cad kyis/_/bdag la spobs pa'i mchog stsol cig_/de nas dbyangs can lha mo la bram ze kauN+Di n+yas de skad ces gsol pa dang /_lha mos skyes bu chen po de la 
[\[238a.7\]]dge'o zhes smras te/_gang rigs kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo gang la la zhig gis tshigs su bcad pas bstod pa dang /_gsang sngags kyi tshig de dag 'chang zhing 'dzin pa dang /_dkon mchog gsum la skyabs su song ste/_sems 'dun pas rjes su dmigs 
[\[238b\]]
[\[238b.1\]]shing /_ci 'dod pa'i don cho ga bzhin du bsgrubs na/_chud za bar mi 'gyur ro/_/gzhan yang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po shin tu phra zhing /_zab pa 'di 'dzin pa dang /_'chang ba dang /_klog pa dang /_'don pa de bsam pa thams cad 
[\[238b.2\]]myur du 'grub par 'gyur te/_sems g.yeng bas byas pa ni ma gtogs so/_/de skad ces smras pa dang /_bram ze kauN+Di n+ya rab tu dga' ba dang /_yid bde ba skyes te/_thal mo sbyar ba byas nas rjes su 'dzin to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha mo dbyangs can 
[\[238b.3\]]la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/_lha mo khyod kyis dam pa'i chos 'di yongs su bsrung zhing /_yongs su rgyas par bya ba dang /_mdo 'di 'dzin pa'i sems can thams cad la chos 'di lta bu bstan pas bde ba dang /_bsod nams dang /_spobs pa tshad med pa 
[\[238b.4\]]'phel bar 'gyur te/_gang sems bskyed pa rnams kyang myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub thob par byas pa legs so legs so/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_lha mo dbyangs can gyi le'u zhes bya ste 
[\[238b.5\]{]bcwa [,]bco [}]lnga pa'o//_//de nas bcom ldan 'das la lha mo chen mo dpal gyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das lha mo chen mo dpal bdag gis ci nas kyang /_chos smra ba'i dge slong de yo byad thams cad phun sum tshogs 
[\[238b.6\]]par 'gyur ba dang /_brel phongs pa ma mchis pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_sems brtas pa 'thob par 'gyur ba dang /_sems bde bar gdugs mtshan bas par 'gyur ba dang /_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tshig dang /_yi 
[\[238b.7\]]ge rnam pa tha dad pa dag chub par 'gyur ba dang /_rnam par rtog par 'gyur ba dang /_yang dag par brjod par 'gyur ba dang /_sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la/_dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i 
[\[239a\]]
[\[239a.1\]]dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas par 'gyur zhing /_myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rnams kyang /_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[239a.2\]]bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang /_mi'i bde ba myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_mu ge ma mchis par 'gyur ba dang /_lo legs par 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rnams kyang bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ba 
[\[239a.3\]]dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_
[\[239a.4\]]gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur ba 'di lta ste/_gos dang /_zas dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_na ba'i gsos sman dang /_sman zong dang /_yo byad dang /_'tshog chas kyi bye brag gzhan dag gis kyang 
[\[239a.5\]]dge slong chos smra ba de spro bar bgyi'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang /_gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba de la/_lha mo chen mo dpal 
[\[239a.6\]]gyis dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de/_des da ltar phyogs gang dang /_gang du sems pa dang /_phyogs gang dang gang du lta ba dang /_phyogs gang dang /_gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de dang /_der sems can bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag bde bar sbyar 
[\[239a.7\]]ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur/_zas dang /_skom dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_dngul dang /_sa le sbram dang /_yo 
[\[239b\]]
[\[239b.1\]]byad gzhan dag gis kyang mi phongs par 'gyur/_sems can de dag yo byad thams cad 'byor bar 'gyur ro/_/lha mo chen mo dpal gyi mthus de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod par bya/_spos dang /_me tog dang /_bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/_lha mo 
[\[239b.2\]]chen mo dpal gyi ming nas lan gsum brjod cing /_de la spos dang /_bdug pa dang /_me tog kyang byin la/_ro sna tshogs kyang byin na/_de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/de la 'di skad ces bya ste/_sa la sa yi bcud 
[\[239b.3\]]dag rnam par 'phel/_/lha rnams rtag tu rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/'bras bu lo thog ldum sdong ljon shing rnams/_/lo thog shin tu sna tshogs rnams kyang skyed/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming brjod pa'i sems can de dag la lha 
[\[239b.4\]]mo chen mo dpal ni sems par 'gyur/_de dag la dpal chen por byed par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis dpal lha mo chen mo la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/_legs so legs so/_/lha mo khyod kyis sngon byas pa rjes su dran pas/_de 
[\[239b.5\]]bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang /_sems can tshad med pa rnams la phan pa dang /_bde bas phan 'dogs shing /_mdo sde 'di yang yongs su rgyas par byed pa'i bsod nams zad mi shes pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i 
[\[239b.6\]]dbang po'i rgyal po las/_lha mo dpal gyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu drug pa'o//_//de nas lha mo dpal chen mos bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 'di nas byang phyogs su mi ring ba zhig na/_lha'i rgyal po rnam thos 
[\[239b.7\]]kyi bu'i pho brang lcang lo can gyi 'khor na skyed mos tshal dam pa bsod nams kyi me tog 'od ces bya ba na/_rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'i khang [{]bzangs [,]bzang [}]pad+ma dam pa gser gyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba na bdag gnas te/_mi gang la la 'bru'i phung po spel bar 'dod pa 
[\[240a\]]
[\[240a.1\]]des rang gi khyim phyag dar legs par bya/_khrus legs par bya/_gos dkar po gtsang ma bgo bar bya/_gos dri rab tu zhim pa bgo bar bya'o/_/de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas 
[\[240a.2\]]rin chen me tog yon tan rgya mtsho bai DUr+ya dang /_gser gyi ri kha dog bzang po gser du snang ba'i dpal de la phyag 'tshal zhing mtshan nas kyang lan gsum brjod/_lha mo chen mo dpal gyi lag nas/_de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa byed/_me tog 
[\[240a.3\]]dang /_bdug pa dang /_spos kyang 'bul/_ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bul/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po'i ming yang lan gsum brjod/_bden pa'i tshig kyang brjod/_lha mo chen mo dpal la yang mchod cing /_me tog dang /_
[\[240a.4\]]bdug pa yang 'bul/_ro bro ba sna tshogs kyang 'bul na/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di yi mthus/_de'i tshe lha mo chen mo dpal khyim de la sems par 'gyur/_de'i 'bru'i phung po chen po yang 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/lha mo chen mo 
[\[240a.5\]]dpal 'gugs par 'dod pa des rig pa'i gsang sngags 'di dag dran par bya'o/_/'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad la phyag 'tshal lo/_/sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad la phyag 
[\[240a.6\]]'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can la phyag 'tshal lo/_/bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med par 'bar ba rin chen 'od zer snang ba'i rtog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam 
[\[240a.7\]]bu gser gyi rgyal mtshan gser du snang ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser du snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa nyi ma brgya'i 'od zer snang ba'i snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser ri rin 
[\[240b\]]
[\[240b.1\]]chen 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa gser gyi me tog 'bar ba'i 'od zer gyi tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa sgron ma chen po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen 
[\[240b.2\]]tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/lho phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/nub phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa tshe dpag med la phyag 'tshal 
[\[240b.3\]]lo/_/byang phyogs kyi de bzhin gshegs pa rnga sgra la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' byams pa la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gser 'od dam pa 
[\[240b.4\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' gser gyi snying po la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rtag tu ngu la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' chos 'phags la phyag 'tshal lo/_/byang chub sems dpa' rab gnas 
[\[240b.5\]]la phyag 'tshal lo/_/de dag la phyag 'tshal nas rig pa 'di dag la sbyor bar bya ste/_/rig sngags 'di bdag la 'byor bar gyur cig_/sAd+ya the dan/_pra ti pUr+Na tsa re/_sa man+tA dar+sha Ne/_ma hA bi hA ra ga ti/_sa man ta/_bi mA na ga te/_
[\[240b.6\]]ma hA kAr+ya/_pra ti prA ba Ni/_sa twA/_ar+tha sa ma tA nu/_pra pU re/_a yA na d+harma tA/_ma hA b+ho gi ni/_ma hA mai tri/_u pa sang hi te/_hi tai Shi/_sang gr-i hI te/_sa mar thA nu pA la ne swA hA/_'di dag ni spyi bo nas dbang bskur ba'i chos nyid kyi 
[\[240b.7\]]gsang sngags kyi tshig gcig tu de kho na yang dag par grub pa sbyin pa mi slu ba'i don gyi tshig ste/_sems can bar ma la spyod pa rnams dge ba'i rtsa ba kha na ma tho ba med pa dag gis/_lo bdun du 'don cing /_'dzin pa dag yan lag brgyad pa'i bsnyen 
[\[241a\]]
[\[241a.1\]]par gnas pa la bsnyen te/_bdag dang sems can kun/_thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongs su rdzogs par bya ba yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir/_snga dro dang /_phyi dro sangs rgyas thams cad la me tog dang /_
[\[241a.2\]]spos rnams kyis mchod nas/_des bdag gi bsam pa 'di 'byor par gyur cig_/myur du 'byor par gyur cig_/gtsug lag khang ngam/_dgon pa'i gnas kyang rung ste/_khyim de shin tu gtsang mar byas la/_lci bas dkyil 'khor byas te/_
[\[241a.3\]]spos dang /_bdug pa yang dbul bar bya/_stan gtsang ma yang gding bar bya'o/_/sa la me tog sil ma bkram ste bsdad par bya'o/_/de nas skad cig de nyid la/_lha mo chen mo dpal 'ongs nas/_der gnas par 'gyur ro/_/de phyin chad 
[\[241a.4\]]khyim mam/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_dgon pa'i gnas su nam yang brel cing phongs pa med par 'gyur ro/_/'gron bu dang /_gser dang /_rin po che dang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_yo byad 
[\[241a.5\]]thams cad 'byor pa dang /_bde bar sbyar ba thams cad kyis bde bar 'gyur ro/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba gang dag byed pa de dag thams cad las/_lha mo chen mo dpal la shas kyi mchog sbyin par bya ste/_des na de ci srid 'tsho ba'i bar du de na gnas par 
[\[241a.6\]]'gyur/_'phang bar mi 'gyur/_de dag gi bsam pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ro/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_lha mo chen mo dpal gyis nor yongs su spel ba'i le'u zhes bya ste bcu bdun pa'o//_//
[\[241a.7\]]de nas bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di/_da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_
[\[241b\]]
[\[241b.1\]]ljongs sam/_dgon pa'i phyogs sam/_ri'i sman ljongs sam/_pho brang 'khor gang du gnas par 'gyur ba'i grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_dgon pa'i phyogs sam/_ri'i sman ljongs sam/_pho brang 'khor 
[\[241b.2\]]der/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag mchi bar bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu 'chad par 'gyur ba dang /_sa phyogs gang dang gang 
[\[241b.3\]]na/_dge slong chos smra ba de'i chos kyi khri shom par 'gyur ba dang /_gang dang gang du chos smra ba stan la mchis nas/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan par 'gyur ba der/_btsun pa bcom 
[\[241b.4\]]ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma dag sa phyogs de dang de dag tu mchi bar bgyi'o/_/lus mi gda' bar chos kyi khri'i 'og logs su mchis te/_yan lag gi dam pa mgos dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang mthil nas brten par bgyi'o/_/bdag kyang 
[\[241b.5\]]chos mnyan pa dang /_chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par bgyi/_yang dag par rim gror bgyi/_yang dag par mchod par bgyi'o/_/bdag tshim par gyur/_rim gro bgyi ba bgyis par gyur/_rab tu dga' bar gyur nas/_sa'i phung 
[\[241b.6\]]po dpag tshad stong phrag drug cu brgyad po 'di nas/_sa'i gzhi rdo rje la thug pa'i bar du/_sa'i bcud kyis rnam par 'phel bar bgyi/_yang dag par ni rim gro bgyi/_yongs su rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/steng du yang rgya mtsho'i mtha' la thug pa'i sa'i 
[\[241b.7\]]dkyil 'khor 'di/_sa'i bcud kyi snum gyis brlan par bgyi'o/_/sa chen po 'di rab tu gzi byin dang ldan par bgyi'o/_/de nas 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir rtswa dang /_shing gel pa dang /_sman dang /_nags tshal sna tshogs rnams gzi byin dang rab tu ldan par 
[\[242a\]]
[\[242a.1\]]'khrung bar 'gyur/_kun dga' ra ba dang /_nags tshal dang /_shing ljon pa thams cad dang /_lo ma dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_lo thog rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyang /_rab tu gzi byin dang ldan par 
[\[242a.2\]]'gyur ba dang /_dri dang rab tu ldan pa dang /_snum pa dang rab tu ldan pa dang /_ro zhim por 'gyur/_blta na rab tu sdug pa dang /_rab tu che bar 'gyur ro/_/sems can de dag kyang btung ba dang /_bza' ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag 'tshal 
[\[242a.3\]]nas/_tshe dang /_stobs dang /_kha dog dang /_dbang po rnams rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/gzi byin dang /_stobs dang /_kha dog dang /_gzugs dang rab tu ldan par gyur nas kyang /_sa la mchis pa'i dgos pa rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[242a.4\]]tha dad pa 'bum phrag du ma dag bgyid par 'gyur/_brtson par 'gyur/_'bad par 'gyur/_stobs su bgyi ba'i las rnams bgyid par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba dang /_lo legs pa 
[\[242a.5\]]dang /_rgyas pa dang /_nyams dga' bar 'gyur/_skye bo dang mi mang pos gang bar 'gyur/_'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can de dag thams cad bde bar 'gyur/_dga' ba rnam pa sna tshogs myong bar 'gyur/_sems can de dag gzi byin dang /_stobs 
[\[242a.6\]]dang /_kha dog dang /_gzugs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i slad du/_dge slong ngam/_dge slong ma 'am/_dge bsnyen nam/_dge bsnyen ma mdo sde'i dbang po 'dzin pa de dag chos kyi khri stan la mchis 
[\[242a.7\]]pa'i gan du mchi bar 'gyur/_mchis nas kyang sems rab tu dang bas sems can thams cad kyi don dang phan pa dang bde ba dang /_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bshad par bgyi ba'i slad du/_chos smra ba de dag 
[\[242b\]]
[\[242b.1\]]la gsol ba 'debs par 'gyur ro/_/de ci'i slad du zhe na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rab tu bshad pa na sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag g.yog dang bcas te/_rab tu gzi byin dang ldan pa dang /_rab tu 
[\[242b.2\]]stobs dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/bdag cag gi lus la stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_mthu chen po bskyed par 'gyur/_bdag cag gi lus la gzi byin dang /_dpal dang /_phun sum tshogs pa yang 'jug par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa 
[\[242b.3\]]bcom ldan 'das sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag chos bdud rtsi'i khu ba 'dis tshim par gyur/_gzi byin dang /_/stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang /_mthu dang /_shugs chen po thob par gyur na/_sa chen po dpag tshad stong phrag bdun pa'i 'dzam bu'i 
[\[242b.4\]]gling 'di sa'i bcud chen pos rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/sa chen po gzi byin dang rab tu ldan par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das sa la brten pa'i sems can 'di dag thams cad kyang 'phel zhing rgyas la yangs par 'gyur/_rgya chen por yang 
[\[242b.5\]]'gyur ro/_/sa la gnas pa'i sems can de dag chen por gyur nas kyang /_longs spyod dang /_yongs su spyod pa sna tshogs la spyod par 'gyur/_bde ba dag kyang myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de dag thams cad bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang bca' ba rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[242b.6\]]dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_gnas dang /_khang pa dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_chu bo dang /_rdzing dang /_chu mig dang /_mtshe'u dang /_mtsho dang /_lteng ka dang /_'di lta bu'i yo byad bde ba rnam pa sna tshogs sa la 
[\[242b.7\]]gnas pa sa las 'byung ba sa la rten pa 'di dag la spyod par 'gyur ro/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu des sems can de dag thams cad kyis bdag la byas pa gzo bar bgyi'o/_/gdon mi 'tshal bar gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di bsti stang du 
[\[243a\]]
[\[243a.1\]]bgyis te/_mnyan par bgyi/_bkur stir bgyi/_bla mar bgyi/_rim gror bgyi/_mchod par bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gang gi tshe sems can de dag chos smra ba'i gan du mchi ba'i slad du/_rigs tha dad pa dang /_khyim 
[\[243a.2\]]tha dad pa dag nas byung ste mchis nas/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par gyur la/_thos nas kyang rang rang gi rigs dang /_khyim dang /_grong dang /_grong rdal tha dad pa dag tu zhugs nas/_rang rang gi khyim na gnas pa 
[\[243a.3\]]dag phan tshun du 'di skad ces bdag cag gis de ring chos mnyan pa zab mo thos so/_/de ring bdag cag gis bsod nams kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bzung ngo /_/bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa des/_de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba 
[\[243a.4\]]khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma dag mnyes par byas so/_/deng bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis sems can dmyal ba las yongs su thar to/_/dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten dang /[ {]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]kyi yul las yongs su thar ro/_/
[\[243a.5\]]deng bdag cag gis chos mnyan pa 'dis ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_tshe rabs 'bum phrag du mar lha dang mi'i skye ba yongs su bzung bar 'gyur ro zhes gtam zer bar 'gyur ro/_/khyim tha dad pa na gnas par gyur pa de dag sems can gzhan dag la/_gser 
[\[243a.6\]]'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na dpe gcig tsam brjod dam/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na le'u gcig gam/_sngon byung ba gcig gam/_tha na byang chub sems dpa'i ming ngam/_de bzhin gshegs 
[\[243a.7\]]pa'i mtshan gcig gam/_tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig gam/_tshig gcig cig sems can gzhan dag la thos par bgyid dam/_tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i mtshan gzhan dag la rab tu ston tam/_btsun 
[\[243b\]]
[\[243b.1\]]pa bcom ldan 'das gang dang gang na sems can rnam pa tha dad pa de dag phyogs rnam pa tha dad pa dag tu mdo sde'i gtan tshigs rnam pa sna tshogs 'di lta bu 'di dag gcig la gcig brjod dam/_thos par bgyid dam/_gtam rgyud brjod na/_btsun pa 
[\[243b.2\]]bcom ldan 'das sa phyogs de dag thams cad shin tu gzi byin dang ldan pa dang /_shin tu snum par 'gyur ro/_/sa phyogs de dang de dag tu sems can de dag thams cad kyi phyir/_sa'i bcud rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_yo byad thams cad rgyas par skye bar 
[\[243b.3\]]'gyur/_rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur/_shin tu rgyas par 'gyur/_sems can de dag thams cad kyang bde bar 'gyur ro/_/nor che ba dang /_longs spyod che ba dang /_sbyin pa la mos par 'gyur/_dkon mchog gsum la mngon par dad par 'gyur ro/_/
[\[243b.4\]]de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig gcig nyan na/_de dag mi'i 'jig 
[\[243b.5\]]rten 'di nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum lha'i ris kyi nang du lha'i ris gang yang rung ba zhig tu skye bar 'gyur ro/_/sa'i lha mo sems can gang la la dag_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di dag la mchod pa'i phyir/_gnas de dag legs 
[\[243b.6\]]par brgyan par byed dam/_tha na gdugs gcig gam/_ba dan gcig gam/_ras bcos bu gcig gis g.yogs na/_sa'i lha mo rtag tu brgyan pa'i gnas de dag 'dod pa na spyod pa'i lha'i ris bdun po de dag tu lha'i rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal 
[\[243b.7\]]med khang rgyan thams cad kyis legs par brgyan pa dag tu gnas par 'gyur ro/_/gang gi tshe sems can de dag mi'i 'jig rten 'di nas shi 'phos te/_rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal med khang de dag tu skye ba de'i tshe/_sa'i lha mo rin po che sna bdun gyi gzhal 
[\[244a\]]
[\[244a.1\]]med khang re rer yang lan bdun bdun du skye bar 'gyur ro/_/lha'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang myong bar 'gyur ro/_/de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol 
[\[244a.2\]]to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das des na sa'i lha mo brtan ma bdag dge slong chos smra ba/_chos kyi khri stan la mchis pa de'i tshe chos kyi stan gyi 'og logs kyi sa phyogs de dang de dag tu gnas par bgyi'o/_/ci nas kyang sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag 
[\[244a.3\]]la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i sems can de dag gi don gyi slad du/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang 
[\[244a.4\]]po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang /_mi'i bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i 
[\[244a.5\]]dus na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad shin tu rgyun chad par 'gyur bar 
[\[244a.6\]]lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/_dge slong chos smra ba de'i rkang pa la yan lag gi dam pa mgos brten par bgyi'o/_/de nas sa'i lha mo brtan mas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la sngags kyi snying po zhig mchis pa 'di lha dang mi 
[\[244a.7\]]thams cad la phan pa dang bde bar 'gyur ba ste/_gang skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_'khor bzhi po gang la la zhig gis/_bdag mngon sum du mthong bar 'dod pa dang /_nor dang /_nor bu rin po che dang /_dbyig la sogs pa 'dod pa dang /_
[\[244b\]]
[\[244b.1\]]sman bzang pos tshe ring zhing nad med par 'dod pa dang /_phas kyi dgra thams cad dang /_phyir rgol ba thams cad 'jil bar 'dod na/_gnas dben par dkyil 'khor byas te/_khrus byas gos sar pa bgos te/_rtswa bting ba'i steng du 'dug 
[\[244b.2\]]nas/_sku gzugs ring bsrel can gyi mdun nam/_mchod rten ring bsrel can gyi mdun du/_me tog dang /_bdug pa dang /_zhal zas sna tshogs kyis mchod de/_skar ma rgyal dang sbyar ba'i tshes brgyad la sems rtse gcig gis gzungs 
[\[244b.3\]]sngags 'di bzlas pas spyan drangs par 'gyur te/_sngags la/_tad+ya thA/_tsi li tsi li/_tsu ru tsu ru/_ku ru ku ru/_ku Tu ku Tu/_to Tu to Tu/_ba ha ba ha/_ba ri she/_ba ri she swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das 'khor bzhi po gang la la zhig gis/_bdag spyan 
[\[244b.4\]]drang ba'i phyir sngags kyi tshig 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas na/_bdag de'i gan du mchi bar bgyi'o/_/gzhan yang bcom ldan 'das sems can gang la la zhig bdag dang mjal zhing smra bar 'tshal na/_cho ga snga ma'i tshul du bshams te/_sngags 'di 
[\[244b.5\]]bzlas par bya'o/_/tad+ya thA/_any+tsa ni/_kya lik+Sha ni/_shi shi d+ha ri/_ha ha/_hi hi/_ku ru ba re swA hA/_bcom ldan 'das sngags kyi tshig 'di brgya rtsa brgyad bzlas te/_sngags snga ma bzlas pa byas na/_de'i mdun du lus bstan te/_nges par 
[\[244b.6\]]bsam pa rdzogs par bgyi'o/_/gang sngags 'di zlos par 'dod pas/_sngar lus bsrung ba'i phyir sngags 'di brjod do/_/tad+ya thA/_shi ri shi ri/_bA sha ka ti/_ta ti/_kuT+Ti/_pU ta/_pU de ri/_pu de ri Ti Te/_pa Ti ku ku Ti/_ka pa tsi li swA hA/_
[\[244b.7\]]bcom ldan 'das gzungs sngags 'di bsgrub pa'i tshe tshon skud sna lnga la sngags lan re gdab cing mdud pa re re bcing ngo /_/de 'dra ba lan nyi shu rtsa gcig bzlas te/_dpung pa g.yon pa la btags na 'jigs pa thams cad bsal te/_lus bsrungs par 
[\[245a\]]
[\[245a.1\]]'gyur ro/_/sems mi g.yeng bar sngags 'di bzlas na/_bsam pa thams cad 'grub par 'gyur ro/_/bdag gi tshig 'di mi bslu bar ni sangs rgyas dkon mchog dang /_chos dkon mchog dang /_dge 'dun dkon mchog rnams bdag 
[\[245a.2\]]la mngon du gzigs shing dgongs par gsol/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis sa'i lha mo brtan ma la legs so zhes bka' stsal te/_gang khyod kyi bden pa'i sngags kyi tshig 'dis mdo sde'i dbang po 'di dang /_chos smra ba de la bsrung ba byas pa de ni 
[\[245a.3\]]legs so legs so/_/de'i phyir khyod kyang bsod nams kyi tshogs dpag tu med pa dang ldan par 'gyur ro/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_sa'i lha mo brtan ma'i le'u zhes bya ste [{]bcwa [,]bco [}]brgyad pa'o//_//de nas 
[\[245a.4\]]gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes/_gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang lhan cig tu stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu bgos nas/_pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs 
[\[245a.5\]]su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das da ltar dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs 
[\[245a.6\]]sam/_dgon pa'i phyogs sam/_ri'i sman ljongs sam/_pho brang 'khor gang du 'byung bar 'gyur ba der/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po nyi shu rtsa brgyad po de dag dang lhan cig tu 
[\[245a.7\]]grong ngam/_grong khyer ram/_grong rdal lam/_ljongs sam/_dgon pa'i phyogs sam/_ri'i sman ljongs sam/_pho brang 'khor der mchi bar bgyi'o/_/lus mi gda' bar bgyis te/_dge slong chos smra ba de bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_
[\[245b\]]
[\[245b.1\]]yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_zhi ba dang bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/skyes pa'am/_bud med dam/_khye'u 'am/_bu mo chos nyan pa de dag thams cad dang /_gang su dag gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang 
[\[245b.2\]]po'i rgyal po 'di las tha na tshig bzhi pa'i tshigs su bcad pa gcig nyan pa dang /_tha na tshig gcig gam/_tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las byang chub sems dpa'i ming gcig gam/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan gcig 
[\[245b.3\]]tsam thos par gyur te/_gzung ba dang /_tha na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di'i ming thos par gyur te/_gzung ba de dag thams cad kun tu bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_
[\[245b.4\]]zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/rigs de dag dang /_khyim de dag dang /_grong de dag dang /_grong khyer de dag dang /_grong rdal de dag dang /_dgon pa de dag dang /_pho brang 'khor de dag kyang kun du bsrung bar bgyi'o/_/yongs su bskyab pa dang /_yongs 
[\[245b.5\]]su gzung ba dang /_yongs su bskyang ba dang /_chad pa spang ba dang /_zhi ba dang /_bde legs su 'gyur bar bgyi'o/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang gis bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes ming du chags par gyur ce na/_'di ni btsun pa 
[\[245b.6\]]bcom ldan 'das nyid kyi mngon sum lags te/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis chos thams cad 'tshal to/_/chos thams cad yongs su 'tshal to/_/chos thams cad khong du chud do/_/chos thams cad ji snyed pa dang /_chos thams cad ji lta ba 
[\[245b.7\]]dang /_chos thams cad gnas pa gang lags pa dang /_chos thams cad gang dag lags pa dang /_chos thams cad kyi rigs gang dag lags pa dang /_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams cad bdag la mngon sum mo/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos 
[\[246a\]]
[\[246a.1\]]thams cad la bdag gi ye shes snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/ye shes kyi gsal ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/ye shes kyi rgyu ba bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/ye shes kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das chos thams 
[\[246a.2\]]cad la bdag gi ye shes kyi yul 'jug pa bsam gyis mi khyab bo/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das ji ltar bdag chos thams cad yang dag par 'tshal ba dang /_yang dag par yongs su brtags pa dang /_yang dag par yongs su 'tshal ba dang /_yang dag par 
[\[246a.3\]]rnam par bltas pa dang /_yang dag par khong du chud pa'i rgyu des na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes zhes ming du chags so/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das bdag gis dge slong chos smra ba de'i tshig brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad 
[\[246a.4\]]du spobs pa nye bar bsgrub par bgyi'o/_/ci nas dge slong chos smra ba de'i lus mi ngal bar 'gyur ba dang /_lus kyi dbang po bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_rab tu dga' ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang /_gang gi slad du sangs rgyas 'bum phrag dag la dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun pa'i 
[\[246a.5\]]sems can rnams kyi don gyi slad du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di 'dzam bu'i gling du yun ring du gnas shing /_myur du nub par mi 'gyur ba dang /_sems can rnams kyang gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di nyan par 'gyur ba dang /_
[\[246a.6\]]ye shes kyi phung po bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob par 'gyur ba dang /_shes rab dang ldan par 'gyur ba dang /_bsod nams kyi phung po rab tu 'dzin par 'gyur ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du mar lha dang /_mi'i bde ba bsam 
[\[246a.7\]]gyis mi khyab pa dag myong bar 'gyur ba dang /_de bzhin gshegs pa dang 'grogs par 'gyur ba dang /_ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ba dang /_sems can dmyal ba dang /_dud 
[\[246b\]]
[\[246b.1\]]'gro'i skye gnas dang /_gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyi ba'i slad du/_de'i spu'i bu ga rnams su gzi byin stsal bar bgyi'o/_/de'i lus la mthu dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus chen po bskyed par bgyi'o/_/de'i ye shes kyi 
[\[246b.2\]]snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab par bgyi'o/_/de'i dran pa khong du chud par bgyi'o/_/de cher spro bar bgyi'o/_/de nas gnod sbyin bdag po chen po yang dag shes kyis 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das bdag la gzungs sngags shig mchis pa 'di sems 
[\[246b.3\]]can thams cad la phan pa dang snying brtse ba'i phyir/_bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sngar bdag nyid kyis sngags 'di gdon par bgyi'o/_/sngags la/_na mo bud+d+hA ya/_na mo d+harmA ya/_na maHsaM g+hA ya/_na mo brah+ma ya/_na ma in+d+rA ya/_na mash+tsa tur Na~M/_ma hA rA 
[\[246b.4\]]dzA nA~M/_tad+ya thA/_hi li hi li/_mi li mi li/_gau ri/_ma hA gau ri/_gan+d+ha ri/_ma hA gan+d+ha ri/_dri mi Di/_ma hA dri mi Di/_dan+Da khu khun ti/_ha ha ha ha/_hi hi hi hi/_hu hu hu hu/_ha lo d+ha me/_gu d+ha me/_tsa tsa tsa tsa/_tsi tsi tsi tsi/_tsu tsu tsu tsu/_tsaN+De shwa ra/_shi kha 
[\[246b.5\]]ra/_shi kha ra/_u tiSh+Tha he b+ha ga bAn/_saM bid dz+nyA ye swA hA/_gang la la zhig gis rig sngags 'di 'chang zhing 'dzin na bdag gis de la 'tsho ba'i yo byad bsod snyoms dang /_gos dang /_me tog dang /_'bras bu dang /_nor dang /_rin po che la sogs pa thams cad 
[\[246b.6\]]stsal bar bgyi'o/_/gang la la zhig bu pho mo smos pa dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_gser dang /_dngul dang /_rin po che dang /_rgyan la sogs pa'i yo byad 'dod na yang /_bdag gis de la yid bzhin du so sor stsal bar bgyi'o/_/rig sngags 'di'i mthu dang /_gzi 
[\[246b.7\]]brjid chen po dang ldan pa'i phyir/_gang gsang sngags 'di zlos pa'i tshe/_bdag myur du de'i gan du mchi ste/_ci yang thogs pa med par 'grub par bgyi'o/_/gsang sngags 'di sgrub pa'i cho ga ni/_thog mar gnod sbyin gyi bdag po chen po yang dag shes kyi gzugs/_srid 
[\[247a\]]
[\[247a.1\]]chag bzhi pa'am/_lnga pa lag na dgra sta thogs pa bris pa'i mdun du dkyil 'khor gru bzhir byas pa'i grwa bzhir sbrang rtsi'am/_bu ram chus gang ba'i bum pa bzhi zhog la/_byug pa dang /_phye ma dang /_bdug pa bsreg cing /_me tog gi phreng 
[\[247a.2\]]bas kyang mchod par bya'o/_/yang dkyil 'khor de'i mdun du sbyin sreg gi thab khung brkos pa la dud pa med pa'i me'i nang du/_mar dang yungs kar du bsres la/_sngags lan re bzlas shing thab de'i nang du sbyin sreg bya'o/_/de ltar lan brgya rtsa brgyad 
[\[247a.3\]]bsregs pa dang /_bdag de la lus mngon par bstan te/_khyod ci 'dod ces dri bar bya'o/_/de nas sgrub pa po des kyang ci 'dod pa de la smros shig dang /_ci 'dod pa de dag sbyin par byed do/_/gang gser dngul 'dod pa dang /_gter tshol bar 'dod pa dang /_lha'i drang 
[\[247a.4\]]srong 'dod pa yang 'grub ste/_nam mkha' la 'gro'o/_/gzhan yang lha'i mig dang /_pha rol gyi sems shes pa la sogs pa'i mngon par shes pa thams cad kyang thob par byed do/_/sems can thams cad la yid bzhin du dbang sgyur zhing nyon mongs pa thams cad 
[\[247a.5\]]kyi rgyun bcad de/_rnam par grol ba thob par 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis gnod sbyin gyi sde dpon chen po yang dag shes la legs so zhes bka' stsal te legs so legs so/_/gang khyod kyis sems can thams cad la phan zhing bde ba dang /_dam pa'i 
[\[247a.6\]]chos 'di yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/_gsang sngags kyi tshig 'di smras pas bsod nams dpag tu med pa 'phel bar 'gyur ro/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las gnod sbyin gyi dbang po yang dag shes kyi le'u zhes bya ste bcu dgu pa'o//_//
[\[247a.7\]]de nas sa'i lha mo brtan ma zhes bya ba de 'khor mang po de'i nang na 'dug pa stan las langs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal nas/_thal mo sbyar ba btud de 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gang yul 'khor na mi'i rgyal po byed pas yang dag pa'i 
[\[247b\]]
[\[247b.1\]]chos mi spyod na/_yul gyi srid 'dzin cing sems can mang po la bde ba dang rang gi lus rgyal thabs mthon po'i sa na yun ring por gnas par mi 'gyur bas/_bcom ldan 'das thugs rje dang ldan pas rgyal po'i bstan bcos yang dag pas/_yul gyi srid ji ltar 'dzin pa bshad par 
[\[247b.2\]]gsol/_de thos pas mi'i rgyal po rnams chos de lta bus 'jig rten skyong zhing rgyal thabs dam pa la yun ring du gnas pas bde bar 'gyur ba dang /_yul 'khor gyi skye bo de dag thams cad kyang yongs su bde bar 'gyur ro/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis 'khor mang po'i 
[\[247b.3\]]tshogs kyi nang na sa'i lha mo la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/sa'i lha mo khyod de'i phyir shin tu legs par nyon cig_/sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog ces bya ba la bu mdzes pa'i tog ces bya ba de/_spyi bo nas dbang bskur nas ring por ma lon pa 
[\[247b.4\]]zhig na/_yab mchog gi rgyal po dbang po'i tog las blangs pa/_rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba zhig yod de/_ngas sngon rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig des lo nyi khri'i bar du rgyal po nyid byas par gyur te/_tha na sems kyi skad 
[\[247b.5\]]cig gcig tsam gyi tshod kyang sngon chos ma yin pa'i phyogs 'ga' zhig la gnas par ma shes so/_/bu rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba de gang zhe na/_de nas rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po stobs kyi dbang po'i tog gis/_bu rgyal po 
[\[247b.6\]]mdzes pa'i tog la/_rgyal po'i bstan bcos lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis/_rgya cher yang dag par rab tu bstan to/_/sems can kun la phan byed pa/_/the tshom thams cad gcod pa po/_/nyes byas thams cad 'jig byed 
[\[247b.7\]]pa/_/rgyal po'i bstan bcos bshad par bya/_/rgyal po thams cad so so nas/_/dga' ba'i sems su 'gyur byos la/_/lha yi dbang po'i dam tshig kun/_/thal mo sbyar te mnyan par byos/_/rdo rje'i 'byung gnas ri dbang 'dir/_/lha yi dbang po 'dus pa na/_/tshangs dbang la ni dri ba'i phyir/_/'jig rten 
[\[248a\]]
[\[248a.1\]]skyong ba rnams kyang langs/_/khyod ni lha gtso tshangs pa ste/_/khyod ni lha rnams dbang phyug lags/_/khyod ni bdag cag the tshom gcod/_/bdag cag dogs pa bcad du gsol/_/mir skyes pa yi rgyal po la/_/ji lta bur na lha zhes bgyi/_/gang gi rgyus na rgyal 
[\[248a.2\]]po la/_/lha sras zhes ni bgyi bar 'gyur/_/gal te lha ni ji lta bur/_/mi yi 'jig rten 'dir skye zhing /_/mi bdag gyur te mi rnams la/_/rgyal po nyid ni bgyid par 'gyur/_/'jig rten skyong bas tshangs dbang la/_/de skad yongs su dris pa dang /_/lha yi gtso bo tshangs pa des/_/
[\[248a.3\]]'jig rten skyong la 'di skad smras/_/de ltar 'jig rten skyong rnams kyis/_/de ltar bdag la dris pas na/_/sems can kun la phan pa'i phyir/_/bstan bcos dam pa kho bos bstan/_/mi yi gnas su skyes pa ni/_/rgyal po rnams kyi skye ba dang /_/rgyu gang gis na yul rnams su/_/
[\[248a.4\]]rgyal por gyur pa bshad par bya/_/lha dbang rnams kyi byin brlabs kyis/_/ma yi rum du 'jug 'gyur te/_/lha yis sngar ni byin brlabs nas/_/phyi nas mngal du 'jug par 'gyur/_/mi yi 'jig rten skyes kyang ni/_/mi yi dbang por gyur pa yin/_/lha las skyes par gyur 
[\[248a.5\]]pas na/_/de ni lha yi sras zhes bya/_/khyod ni lha kun bu yin zhes/_/sum cu rtsa gsum lha dbang gis/_/rgyal po'i skal ba byin nas ni/_/mi rnams kyi ni dbang por sprul/_/nyes par byas pa rnams 'gog pa/_/chos ma yin pa gzhig pa dang /_/sems can legs byed 
[\[248a.6\]]dgod pa dang /_/lha yi gnas su dgye ba'i phyir/_/mi yi dbang po mi shas dang /_/lha yi shas dang dri za'i shas/_/gdol pa'i shas dang srin shas kyis/_/nyes par byed pa zlog par byed/_/legs par bya ba byed rnams la/_/mi yi dbang po pha ma'i shas/_/rnam smin 'bras 
[\[248a.7\]]bu bstan pa'i phyir/_/lha yis rgyal por byin gyis brlabs/_/tshe 'di legs par byas pa dang /_/nyes par byas pa'i las rnams kyis/_/rnam smin 'bras bu bstan pa'i phyir/_/lha yis rgyal por byin gyis brlabs/_/yul na nyes byed gnas pa dag_/gang tshe rgyal pos 
[\[248b\]]
[\[248b.1\]]yal bor zhing /_/sdig pa can gyi skye bo la/_/mthun pa'i chad pas mi gcod cing /_/nyes par byed pa yal bor ba/_/de tshe chos min shin tu 'phel/_/thab mo dang ni g.yo rnams kyang /_/yul 'khor der ni phyi phyir 'byung /_/sum cu rtsa gsum khang pa na/_/lha yi dbang po 
[\[248b.2\]]'khrug par 'gyur/_/yul na nyes byed gnas pa dag_/gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor ba/_/de tshe g.yo ni mi bzad pa/_/drag po rnams kyis yul 'joms 'gyur/_/pha rol dmag tshogs lhags nas su/_/yul 'khor de ni rnam par 'jig_/longs spyod rnams dang rigs 
[\[248b.3\]]kyang 'jig_/gang gi nor bsags yod pa yang /_/g.yo byed rnam pa mang po yis/_/phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur/_/bya ba gang gis rgyal po nyid/_/bya ba de ni mi byed na/_/glang chen dbang pos rdzing bu bzhin/_/rang gi yul 'khor rnam par 'jig_/ma rungs pa yi rlung 
[\[248b.4\]]ldang zhing /_/ma rungs pa yi char pa 'bab/_/nyi ma dang ni zla ba dang /_/gza' dang rgyu skar ma rungs 'gyur/_/rgyal pos yal bar bor na der/_/sa bon lo tog me tog 'bras/_/legs par smin par mi 'gyur zhing /_/mu ge dag kyang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/yul na nyes byed 
[\[248b.5\]]gnas pa dag_/gang tshe rgyal pos yal bor na/_/de tshe lha rnams khang pa na/_/yid ni dga' bar mi 'gyur ro/_/lha rgyal dbang po de dag kun/_/rgyal 'di chos dang mi ldan te/_/chos min phyogs la gnas pa'o zhes/_/phan tshun du ni smra bar 'gyur/_/rgyal 'dis ring por 
[\[248b.6\]]mi thogs par/_/lha rnams 'khrug par byed par 'gyur/_/lha rnams rab tu 'khrugs pas na/_/de yi yul ni rnam par 'jig_/yul du chos min 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/mtshon chas kyang ni 'jig par 'gyur/_/g.yo rnams dang ni thab mo dang /_/nad kyang kun tu 'byung 
[\[248b.7\]]bar 'gyur/_/lha dbang rnams ni rab khros shing /_/lha rnams kyis kyang yal bar 'dor/_/yul 'khor de ni 'jig par 'gyur/_/rgyal po de ni mya ngan rnyed/_/spun nam yang na bu yang rung /_/sdug pa rnams dang bral bar 'gyur/_/sdug pa'i chung ma dang yang bral/_/yang na 
[\[249a\]]
[\[249a.1\]]bu mo 'chi bar 'gyur/_/skar mda' dag kyang lhung bar 'gyur/_/de bzhin nyi ma 'dra ba 'byung /_/pha rol gyi ni dmag tshogs dang /_/mu ge shin tu 'byung bar 'gyur/_/de yi glang po phangs pa dang /_/blon po phangs pa 'chi bar 'gyur/_/de yi 'og tu rnga mo 
[\[249a.2\]]ni/_/phangs pa dag kyang 'chi bar 'gyur/_/khyim dang longs spyod nor rnams kyang /_/phan tshun du ni 'phrog par 'gyur/_/yul yul du ni mtshon cha yis/_/phan tshun du ni 'debs par 'gyur/_/thab mo dag dang rtsod dang g.yo/_/yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/yul 
[\[249a.3\]]'khor du ni gdon 'jug cing /_/mi bzad pa yi nad kyang 'byung /_/de yi 'og tu sbyin gnas kyang /_/chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur/_/de yi 'khor dang blon po yang /_/chos dang ldan pa ma yin 'gyur/_/chos dang mi ldan skye bo la/_/de yi 'og tu mchod byed 'gyur/_/chos dang 
[\[249a.4\]]ldan pa'i sems can la/_/rtag tu chad pas gcod par 'gyur/_/chos dang mi ldan skye bo bkur/_/chos ldan chad pas bcad pas na/_/der ni chu dang rgyu skar rlung /_/rnam gsum rnam par 'khrug par 'gyur/_/chos min skye bo bzung bas na/_/dam chos ro yi snying po mdangs/_/
[\[249a.5\]]sems can mdangs dang sa yi bcud/_/dngos po rnam gsum rnam par 'jig_/skye bo ngan pa rab bkur cing /_/skye bo dam pa smad pas na/_/'chi dang lce 'bab mu ge dang /_/rnam pa gsum ni der 'byung 'gyur/_/'bras bu lo thog ro dang mdangs/_/de yi 'og tu med 
[\[249a.6\]]par 'gyur/_/sems can nad pa mang po dag_/yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/mngar zhing che ba'i 'bras bu dag_/yul rnams na ni yod pa yang /_/kha ba dang ni tsha ba dang /_/chung ba dag ni nyid du 'gyur/_/rtse dang dgod dang dga' ba dang /_/sngan chad dga' 
[\[249a.7\]]ba'i dngos po dang /_/dga' ba nyams shing mi dgar 'gyur/_/nyon mongs brgya yis rnam par 'khrugs/_/lo thog rnams dang 'bras bu yi/_/snum dngos khu ba zad pas na/_/lus dang khams dang dbang po la/_/de ltar tshim par mi 'gyur ro/_/sems can 
[\[249b\]]
[\[249b.1\]]rnams ni mdog ngan cing /_/mthu chung shin tu rid par 'gyur/_/kha zas mang po zos kyang ni/_/tshim par 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/stobs dang mthu dang brtson 'grus kyang /_/de yi 'og tu med par 'gyur/_/sems can brtson 'grus nyams pa dag_/yul rnams 
[\[249b.2\]]su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/sna tshogs nad kyis gzir ba yi/_/sems can nad mang 'byung bar 'gyur/_/srin po sna tshogs las gyur pa'i/_/gza' dang rgyu skar 'byung bar 'gyur/_/chos min phyogs la rab gnas te/_/rgyal po chos dang mi ldan pas/_/'jig rten 
[\[249b.3\]]gsum gyi dkyil 'khor na/_/khams gsum rnam par 'jig par 'gyur/_/gang tshe rgyal po phyogs gnas te/_/nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe/_/'di 'dra'i nyes pa du ma dag_/yul rnams su ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/lha dbang rnams kyis dgos gang phyir/_/
[\[249b.4\]]rgyal po'i byin gyis brlabs pa yi/_/rgyal po nyid ni mi byed cing /_/nyes byed yal bar 'dor na ni/_/legs par byas pas sems can rnams/_/lha yi gnas su lhar yang skye/_/nyes par byas pas [{]yi dgas [,]yi dwags [}]dang /_/sems can dmyal dang dud 'gror skye/_/gang 
[\[249b.5\]]tshe rgyal po yul rnams na/_/nyes byed yal bar 'dor ba'i tshe/_/sum cu gsum gyi lha gnas nas/_/nyes pa byas pas ltung bar 'gyur/_/rgyal po nyid ni mi byed na/_/de yi bu yang ma yin la/_/lha yi rgyal po pha rnams kyi/_/gnas la nyes dang bcas par 'gyur/_/
[\[249b.6\]]g.yo ni shin tu mi bzad pas/_/gang tshe yul 'khor 'jig 'gyur ba/_/de phyir lha yi dbang rnams kyis/_/mi'i gnas rgyal po byin gyis brlabs/_/nyes par byas pa zhi bya'i phyir/_/legs par byed la 'dzud pa ste/_/tshe 'di la ni sems can la/_/yul gyi 
[\[249b.7\]]chos kyi don gyi phyir/_/rnam smin skyed pa rgyal po yin/_/legs byas dang ni nyes byas kyi/_/las kyi rnam par smin pa'i 'bras/_/rnam pa tha dad bstan pa'i phyir/_/byed pa gang yin rgyal por brjod/_/bdag gi don dang gzhan don dang /_/yul gyi chos 
[\[250a\]]
[\[250a.1\]]kyi don gyi phyir/_/lha tshogs rnams kyis byin gyis brlabs/_/lha rnams dag kyang rjes yi rang /_/yul 'khor rnams na skye bo ni/_/sdig can g.yon can 'dul ba dang /_/yul gyi chos kyi don gyi phyir/_/srog dang rgyal srid rnams kyang btang /_/chos ma yin 
[\[250a.2\]]pa bzod byed cing /_/shes bzhin yal bar 'dor ba ni/_/yul na 'jigs pa mi bzad pa/_/de 'dra gzhan du yod ma yin/_/ji ltar g.yo rnams byung ba la/_/g.yo byed chad pas ma bcad na/_/yul du shin tu mi bzad pa'i/_/g.yo rnams phyir ni 'byung bar 'gyur/_/
[\[250a.3\]]glang chen rnams kyis rdzing chen bzhin/_/yul 'khor der ni rnam par 'jig_/lha dbang rnams kyang 'khrug par 'gyur/_/lha yi gnas ni rnam par 'jig_/yul du dngos po thams cad ni/_/ma rungs par yang 'gyur bas na/_/de phyir sdig pa byed pa rnams/_/nyes pa'i 
[\[250a.4\]]rim bzhin gdul bar bya/_/chos kyis yul 'khor bskyang bar bya/_/chos ma yin pa spyad mi bya/_/srog kyang yongs su gtang bya zhing /_/nyes mgon bya bar mi bya'o/_/skye bo gnyen dang skye bo gzhan/_/yul 'khor skye bo thams cad la/_/rgyal pos phyogs kyang gcig bya yi/_/
[\[250a.5\]]phyogs su lhung bar gyur ta re/_/rgyal po chos dang ldan pa yi/_/grags pa 'jig rten gsum gang ste/_/sum cu gsum gyi gnas rnams na/_/lha yi dbang po dgar gyur te/_/'dzam bu'i gling na nged kyi bu/_/'di ltar chos ldan rgyal po yin/_/chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan 
[\[250a.6\]]nas/_/legs par byung la skye bo bkod/_/rgyal po de ni legs byed pas/_/skye bo dag ni 'dir 'gyed de/_/lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis/_/lha gnas gang bar byed snyam mo/_/chos kyi yul 'khor der bstan nas/_/rgyal po rnams ni rab tu dga'/_/lha dbang rab 
[\[250a.7\]]tu dad gyur pas/_/mi yi rgyal po de la srung /_/nyi zla dang ni de bzhin du/_/rgyu skar legs par rgyu bar 'gyur/_/rlung yang dus su ldang 'gyur zhing /_/char pa'ang dus su 'bab par 'gyur/_/lha gnas rnams dang de bzhin du/_/yul 'khor rnams su lo legs byed/_/
[\[250b\]]
[\[250b.1\]]lha dang lha yi bu rnams kyis/_/lha yi gnas rnams gang bar byed/_/de lta bas na rgyal po yis/_/bdag gi phangs pa'i srog btang gis/_/gang gis 'jig rten bder 'gyur ba/_/dkon mchog chos ni mi btang ste/_/yon tan rnams kyis gang brgyan pa/_/chos dang ldan 
[\[250b.2\]]pa bsten par bya/_/rang gi skye bos rtag dga' ba/_/rtag par sdig pa rnam par spongs/_/chos kyis yul 'khor bskyang bar bya/_/chos kyang yang dag bstan par bya/_/legs par byed la sems can dgod/_/nyes byed las ni bzlog par bya/_/gang tshe sdig pa byed pa 
[\[250b.3\]]rnams/_/tshul bzhin gdul bar byed pa'i tshe/_/yul 'khor du ni lo legs shing /_/rgyal po gzi brjid ldan par 'gyur/_/rgyal po grags dang ldan 'gyur zhing /_/skye dgu rnams kyang bde bar skyong /_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las rgyal po'i bstan bcos 
[\[250b.4\]]lha'i dbang po'i dam tshig ces bya ba'i le'u ste nyi shu pa'o//_//bam po dgu pa/_de nas de'i tshe bcom ldan 'das kyis tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang tshe 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal por gyur/_/de tshe rgya mtshor bcas pa'i sa rnams dang /_/gling 
[\[250b.5\]]bzhi rin chen gang bar bcas pa yang /_/sngon gyi rgyal ba dag la ngas phul lo/_/chos kyi sku de yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/_/gang sngon yid du 'ong zhing phangs pa yi/_/dngos po de dag ngas ni ma btang med/_/bskal pa du mar phangs pa'i srog kyang btang /_/ji ltar sngon gyi bskal 
[\[250b.6\]]pa bsam yas na/_/rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bde bar gshegs/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i bde bar gshegs de yi/_/bstan la legs byung zhes bya'i rgyal po byung /_/de ni gling bzhi'i dbang phyug 'khor los sgyur/_/rgya mtshor thug pa'i sa la rab tu ston/_/rgyal dbang gsung 
[\[250b.7\]]phyir rgyal po'i pho brang na/_/de tshe rgyal po dam pa gnyid kyis log_/rmi lam du ni sangs rgyas yon tan thos/_/chos smra rin chen sogs kyi rmi lam na/_/rnam par lhang nger mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di/_/rab tu 'chad cing 'dug pa mthong bar gyur/_/rgyal po de ni gnyid 
[\[251a\]]
[\[251a.1\]]kyis log las sad/_/de yi lus kun dga' bas khyab par gyur/_/mgu nas rgyal po'i khab nas mngon byung ste/_/nyan thos dge 'dun mchog gi gnas su song /_/rgyal ba'i nyan thos rnams la mchod byed cing /_/'phags pa'i dge 'dun 'di ni rin chen 
[\[251a.2\]]sogs/_/yon tan ldan pa'i dge slong gang yod ces/_/chos smra rin chen sogs pa kun tu dris/_/de yi tshe na rin chen sogs pa ni/_/phug gzhan zhig gi nang na 'dug gyur te/_/mdo sde'i rgyal po 'di ni rnam sems la/_/kha ton byed cing bde bar rab tu 'dug_/dge 
[\[251a.3\]]slong chos smra rin chen sogs pa de/_/phun sum gzi brjid dpal gyis rab 'bar zhing /_/phug gzhan zhig na 'dug par gyur pa des/_/de yi tshe na rgyal po de la bstan/_/'di na chos smra rin chen sogs pa 'di/_/rgyal po'i spyod yul zab mo 'dzin pa ste/_/gser 
[\[251a.4\]]'od dam pa zhes ni bya ba yi/_/mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po rtag tu ston/_/rin chen sogs pa'i rkang la phyag 'tshal te/_/rgyal po legs par byung bas 'di skad smras/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal/_/zla ba nya ba'i zhal 'dra bshad du gsol/_/rgyal po legs 
[\[251a.5\]]par byung ba de nyid la/_/rin chen sogs pas khas ni blangs pas na/_/stong gsum pa yi 'jig rten thams cad du/_/lha rnams thams cad rab tu dga' bar gyur/_/de tshe mi yi dbang pos sa phyogs gzhi/_/gtsang zhing mchog tu khyad par 'phags pa der/_/rin chen chu dang 
[\[251a.6\]]spos chus chag chag btab/_/me tog sil ma bkram ste khri bshams nas/_/rgyal pos khri de gdugs dang rgyal mtshan dang /_/dar yug stong phrag du mas legs par brgyan/_/rgyal pos khri der tsan+dan dam pa dag_/rnam pa sna tshogs rnams kyang mngon par gtor/_/lha dang 
[\[251a.7\]]klu dang lha min mi 'am ci/_/gnod sbyin dbang dang gnod sbyin lto 'phye ches/_/lha yi me tog man dA ra ba'i char/_/khri de la ni mngon par rab tu phab/_/chos 'dod lha ni bye ba khrag khrig stong /_/bsam gyis mi khyab gang dag lhags gyur pa/_/rin chen sogs pa mngon par byung 
[\[251b\]]
[\[251b.1\]]ba na/_/sa la me tog dag gis mngon par 'thor/_/chos smra rin chen sogs pa de nyid kyang /_/shin tu lus bkrus gtsang ma'i gos bgos te/_/khri der nye bar song ba byas nas ni/_/thal mo sbyar ba byas te phyag kyang 'tshal/_/lha dbang dang ni lha dang lha mo rnams/_/bar snang 
[\[251b.2\]]'dug nas me tog man dA ra'i/_/char pa 'bebs shing sil snyan brgya stong phrag_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag rab tu sgrogs/_/rin chen sogs pa dge slong chos smra des/_/phyogs bcu dag gi sangs rgyas bye ba stong /_/bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag dran byas nas/_/de ni mngon par 
[\[251b.3\]]'dzegs te 'dug par gyur/_/sems can kun la snying brtse bskyed nas ni/_/snying rje'i sems kyang yang dag bskyed byas te/_/rgyal po legs par byung ba de la ni/_/de yi tshe na mdo sde 'di bstan te/_/rgyal pos thal mo sbyar byas 'dug nas su/_/tshig gcig gis ni rjes su yi rang 
[\[251b.4\]]ste/_/chos kyi shugs kyis mig nas mchi ma byung /_/de yi lus ni dga' bas khyab par gyur/_/mdo sde 'di la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir/_/de tshe rgyal po legs par byung ba yis/_/yid bzhin nor bu rin chen rgyal po blangs/_/sems can rnams phyir smon lam btab pa ni/_/rin 
[\[251b.5\]]chen bdun dang ldan pa'i rgyan rnams dang /_/gang yang 'dzam bu'i gling 'dir sems can rnams/_/bde bar gyur pa'i nor bu rin po che'i/_/char pa de ring 'dzam bu'i gling du phob/_/de yi tshe na rin chen sna bdun dang /_/dpung rgyan dang ni do shal rna cha mchog_/de bzhin zas dang 
[\[251b.6\]]gos dang skom rnams kyang /_/gling bzhi dag tu rab tu bab par gyur/_/rgyal po legs par byung bas 'dzam gling du/_/rin chen char pa 'bab pa de mthong nas/_/gling bzhi rin chen gang bar bcas pa ni/_/rin chen gtsug tor can gyi bstan la phul/_/de bzhin gshegs 
[\[251b.7\]]pa shAkya thub pa nga /_/rgyal po legs par byung zhes bya ba gyur/_/gling bzhi dag ni rin chen gang bcas kyi/_/sa 'di de tshe nga yis yongs su btang /_/gang gis rgyal po legs par byung de la/_/de tshe mdo sde 'di ni rab bstan pa/_/rin chen sogs pa chos smra dge slong de/_/
[\[252a\]]
[\[252a.1\]]de bzhin gshegs pa mi 'khrugs der gyur to/_/ngas gang de tshe mdo sde 'di thos shing /_/tshig gcig gis ni rjes su yi rangs te/_/nga ni dge ba'i las ni de nyid dang /_/chos nyan pa dang rjes su yi rang bas/_/gser gyi mdog dang bsod nams brgya yi mtshan/_/
[\[252a.2\]]blta na sdug cing mig tu mngon mdzes la/_/lha stong bye ba rab tu dga' byed pa/_/skye bos mthong na dga' lus rtag tu 'thob/_/bskal pa dag ni bye ba brgya stong phrag_/dgu bcu rtsa dgur 'khor los sgyur rgyal gyur/_/bskal pa brgya stong du ma mang por yang /_/ngas ni khams 
[\[252a.3\]]kyi rgyal po myong bar gyur/_/bskal pa bsam gyis mi khyab brgya byin gyur/_/tshangs pa'i dbang po yid bzhin de bzhin no/_/gang dag tshad ni nam yang yod min pa'i/_/stobs bcu dpag med ngas ni mnyes par byas/_/ngas gang mdo thos rjes su yi rang ba/_/bsod nams 
[\[252a.4\]]phung po de ltar tshad med mang /_/bsam pa ji bzhin ngas ni byang chub thob/_/chos sku dam pa yang ni ngas thob bo/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_legs par byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa gcig pa'o//_//dpal ldan lha mo rigs 
[\[252a.5\]]kyi bu'am/_rigs kyi bu mo dad pa gang la la zhig 'das pa dang /_ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la/_yo byad thams cad kyis mchod pa chen po shin tu rgyas shing rgya che ba/_bsam gyis mi khyab pa byed par 'dod cing /_'das pa dang /_
[\[252a.6\]]ma 'ongs pa dang /_da ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis/_sangs rgyas kyi spyod yul zab mo yongs su shes par 'dod pa des/_gtsug lag khang ngam/_dgon pa'i phyogs kyang rung ste/_gang na gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di rgya 
[\[252a.7\]]cher yang dag par rab tu ston pa'i sa phyogs der/_des gdon mi za bar g.yeng ba med pa'i sems kyis rna ba blags te/_gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di mnyan par bya'o/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis don 'di nyid 'khor la rgya cher brjod pa'i phyir/_de'i 
[\[252b\]]
[\[252b.1\]]tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/gang zhig sangs rgyas thams cad la/_/bsam yas mchod pa byed 'dod cing /_/sangs rgyas kun gyi spyod yul ba/_/zab mo rab tu shes 'dod pas/_/gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang ngam/_/gang na gser 'od dam pa 
[\[252b.2\]]yi/_/mdo sde dam pa 'di ston pa/_/sa phyogs der ni 'gro bar bya/_/mdo 'di bsam gyis mi khyab ste/_/yon tan rgya mtsho mtha' yang yas/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho du ma las/_/sems can thams cad thar bar byed/_/mdo sde yi ni thog ma dang /_/dbus dang de bzhin tha ma mthong /_/
[\[252b.3\]]mdo sde'i dbang po rab zab ste/_/'di la dpe ni yod ma yin/_/gang gA dang ni sa rnams dang /_/rgya mtsho dang ni nam mkha' la/_/gnas pa'i rdul ni gang yang rung /_/dper bya bar ni mi nus so/_/chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yis/_/de yi tshe na 'jug par bya/_/chos kyi bdag 
[\[252b.4\]]nyid mchod rten ni/_/zab mor rab brtan gang yin pa/_/mchod rten de yi dbus na ni/_/rgyal ba shAkya thub pa mthong /_/yid du 'ong ba'i dbyangs kyis su/_/mdo sde 'di ni rab tu ston/_/grangs med bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i/_/bskal pa bye ba ji snyed par/_/lha yi dang ni mi rnams 
[\[252b.5\]]kyi/_/bde ba dag ni rjes su myong /_/gang zhig mdo sde 'di nyan pa/_/de ltar bdag gi bsod nams kyi/_/phung po bsam yas bsgrub snyam du/_/de tshe des ni de ltar shes/_/mes gang 'obs kyis bskor ba yi/_/dpag tshad brgya dag 'da' byed cing /_/tshor ba drag po bzod byas 
[\[252b.6\]]nas/_/mdo sde nyan par gang nus pa/_/gtsug lag khang ngam gnas khang du/_/zhugs nas de ma thag tu ni/_/sdig pa rnams ni med par 'gyur/_/rmi ngan mtshan nyid thams cad dang /_/gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dang /_/byad dang gdon ni mi bzad kyang /_/zhugs nas 
[\[252b.7\]]de ma thag tu ni/_/thams cad gzhan du phyogs par 'gyur/_/klu yi rgyal po rnams kyis ni/_/rmi lam bstan pa ci 'dra bar/_/der ni pad+ma 'dra ba'i khri/_/de lta bur yang bsham par bya/_/khri de la ni 'dug nas su/_/mdo sde 'di ni rab tu bstan/_/yi ger bris pa bklag 
[\[253a\]]
[\[253a.1\]]par bya/_/de bzhin yongs su chub par bya/_/khri de las ni babs nas su/_/yul gzhan song bar gyur na yang /_/khri de la ni yod pa yi/_/cho 'phrul rnams kyang snang bar 'gyur/_/chos smra ba yi gzugs su yang /_/de na res 'ga' snang bar 'gyur/_/res
