[\[253a.2\]]'ga' sangs rgyas gzugs su ste/_/res 'ga' byang chub sems dpar yang /_/res 'ga' kun tu bzang po dang /_/de bzhin 'jam dpal gzugs su ste/_/res 'ga' byams pa'i gzugs su yang /_/khri de la ni snang bar 'gyur/_/res 'ga' 'od ni 'ba' zhig snang /_/res 
[\[253a.3\]]'ga' lha rnams snang bar 'gyur/_/yud tsam zhig ni der snang nas/_/de nas mi snang bar yang 'gyur/_/sangs rgyas mthong na bsngags par 'gyur/_/thams cad du yang grub par byed/_/dpal yon bkra shis phun sum tshogs/_/mtshan ma sangs rgyas sprul pa yin/_/rgyal 
[\[253a.4\]]dang dpal dang grags par byed/_/phyir rgol ba yang zlog par byed/_/pha rol dgra tshogs rab tu 'joms/_/g.yul du dgra rnams phung bar byed/_/rmi ngan thams cad zhi bar byed/_/sdig pa thams cad rab tu 'jig_/sdig pa thams cad rab zhi byed/_/g.yul 'gyed pa na rgyal 
[\[253a.5\]]bar byed/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad du/_/grags pas rab tu gang bar 'gyur/_/de yi dgra rnams thams cad ni/_/shin tu pham pa nyid du 'gyur/_/rtag tu dgra ni choms par 'gyur/_/sdig pa thams cad rnam par spangs/_/g.yul ngo'i gdong las rnam par rgyal/_/
[\[253a.6\]]dgra dang bral zhing mchog tu dga'/_/tshangs dbang sum cu rtsa gsum dbang /_/de bzhin 'jig rten skyong rnams dang /_/lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang /_/rgyal ba khyu mchog yang dag shes/_/klu yi dbang po ma dros dang /_/de bzhin du ni rgya mtsho dang /_/mi 'am ci dbang lha 
[\[253a.7\]]min dbang /_/de bzhin nam mkha' lding dbang po/_/de dag la ni sogs pa dang /_/lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang /_/chos kyi mchod rten bsam yas la/_/rtag tu mchod pa byed par 'gyur/_/zhe sar bcas pa'i sems can rnams/_/mthong nas shin tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/
[\[253b\]]
[\[253b.1\]]lha yi dbang po mchog de dag_/thams cad 'di snyam sems par 'gyur/_/lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang /_/phan tshun du ni smra byed pa/_/bsod nams dpal dang gzi brjid dag_/bsags pa de dag kun la ltos/_/gang dag mdo sde zab mo 'di/_/nyan pa'i don 
[\[253b.2\]]du 'dir lhags pa/_/mi de dag ni rab sbyangs ba'i/_/dge ba'i rtsa bas 'dir lhags so/_/dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas/_/chos kyi mchod rten gus dang bcas/_/de dag 'jig rten snying rjer ldan/_/de dag sems can phan byed pa/_/de dag zab mo'i chos rnams 
[\[253b.3\]]kyi/_/dam pa'i chos kyi ro yi snod/_/chos kyi dbyings la 'jug pa yis/_/de dag rab tu 'jug pa yin/_/gang dag gser 'od dam pa'i mdo/_/dge ba dam pa 'di nyan pas/_/de dag sngon chad sangs rgyas ni/_/brgya stong rnams la mchod pa yin/_/dge ba'i rtsa ba 
[\[253b.4\]]'di yis ni/_/mdo 'di nyan pa de dag la/_/lha dbang rgyal po de kun dang /_/dbyangs can dang ni de bzhin du/_/dpal ldan rnam thos bu dang ni/_/de bzhin rgyal po bzhi rnams dang /_/gnod sbyin brgya phrag stong po dag_/stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis/_/phyogs 
[\[253b.5\]]bzhi dag ni kun nas kyang /_/srung ba shin tu byed par 'gyur/_/dbang po zla ba gshin rje dang /_/rlung dang chu lha nyid dang ni/_/skem byed 'jug sel dbyangs can dang /_/bsreg bya za dang skye dgu dang /_/stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa/_/'jig rten skyong ba de kun kyang /_/
[\[253b.6\]]nyin mtshan g.yel ba med par ni/_/de dag rnams la srung bar byed/_/stobs chen gnod sbyin dbang gnyis dang /_/sred med bu dang dbang phyug che/_/yang dag shes la sogs pa dag_/gzhan yang nyi shu rtsa brgyad dang /_/gnod sbyin brgya phrag stong po dag_/stobs 
[\[253b.7\]]chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis/_/'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad las/_/de dag la ni srung bar byed/_/lag na rdo rje gnod sbyin dbang /_/gnod sbyin dag ni lnga brgya dang /_/byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyang /_/de dag la ni srung bar byed/_/gnod sbyin dbang 
[\[254a\]]
[\[254a.1\]]po nor bu bzang /_/de bzhin gang ba bzang po dang /_/ji 'jigs dang ni 'brog gnas dang /_/dmar ser dang ni ser skya dang /_/gnod sbyin dbang po re re yang /_/gnod sbyin lnga brgya dag gis ni/_/gang dag mdo sde 'di thos pas/_/de dag rnams la srung byed 
[\[254a.2\]]'gyur/_/dri za sna tshogs sde dang ni/_/rgyal ba khyu mchog rgyal ba'i rgyal/_/nor bu'i mgul dang nges mgrin dang /_/de bzhin char pa'i bdag po dang /_/kham po che dang nag po dang /_/de bzhin gser 'dra'i skra dang ni/_/lngas rtsen dang ni ra rkang dang /_/de bzhin skal ba chen po 
[\[254a.3\]]dang /_/yur ba can dang chos skyong dang /_/spre'u dang de bzhin 'khri byed dang /_/khab kyi spu dang gnyen bshes dang /_/de bzhin rin chen skra dang ni/_/yul chen can dang khyim med dang /_/'dod pa'i mchog dang tsan+dan dang /_/mthu bo che dang gangs can dang /_/bde ba'i ri nyid de 
[\[254a.4\]]bzhin te/_/stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang /_/gang dag mdo sde 'di dga' ba/_/de dag la ni srung bar byed/_/klu yi dbang po ma dros dang /_/de bzhin du ni rgya mtsho dang /_/e la'i 'dab dang btang bzung dang /_/dga' bo nye dga' gnyis 
[\[254a.5\]]ka dang /_/klu ni brgya phrag stong po dag_/stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis/_/'jigs shing skrag pa thams cad las/_/de dag la ni srung bar byed/_/stobs chen sgra gcan mi gtong dang /_/thags zangs ris dang bde mchog dang /_/rab tshim byed dang phrag rtsub dang /_/de 
[\[254a.6\]]bzhin lha min dbang gzhan dang /_/lha min brgya phrag stong po dag_/stobs chen rdzu 'phrul ldan rnams kyis/_/'jigs skrag byung bar gyur pa las/_/de dag la ni srung bar 'gyur/_/'byung po'i ma mo 'phrog ma ni/_/lnga brgya'i bu dang bcas pa yang /_/'dug dang nyal dang 
[\[254a.7\]]ra ro'i tshe/_/de dag la ni srung bar byed/_/gdol pa mo dang gtum mo dang /_/de bzhin gnod sbyin gtum mo dang /_/dung can dang ni so brtsegs dang /_/sems can kun gyi gzi 'phrog ma/_/stobs chen pha rol gnon byed pa/_/rdzu 'phrul ldan pa de kun kyang /_/phyogs 
[\[254b\]]
[\[254b.1\]]bzhi dag ni kun nas su/_/de dag rnams la srung bar byed/_/dbyangs can dag la sogs pa rnams/_/lha mo bsam gyis mi khyab dang /_/dpal la sogs pa de bzhin du/_/lha mo dag ni thams cad dang /_/sa yi lha mo nyid dang ni/_/lo thog 'bras bu nags lha dang /_/
[\[254b.2\]]kun dga' shing ljon mchod rten la/_/gnas pa dag dang rlung lha dang /_/lha rnams de dag thams cad 'dir/_/rab tu dga' ba'i sems kyis ni/_/gang dag mdo sde 'di dga' ba/_/de dag rnams la srung bar byed/_/tshe dang mdog dang stobs rnams la/_/sems can dag 
[\[254b.3\]]ni sbyor bar byed/_/dpal dang bsod nams gzi brjid kyi/_/phun sum tshogs pas rtag tu brgyan/_/gza' dang rgyu skar gnod pa dag_/de dag thams cad zhi bar byed/_/rgud dang sdig dang rmi ngan pa/_/de dag thams cad zhi bar byed/_/zab cing stobs chen ldan pa yi/_/
[\[254b.4\]]sa yi lha mo nyid kyang ni/_/gser gyi 'od kyi dam pa yi/_/mdo sde'i dbang po'i ro yis tshim/_/dpag tshad dag ni brgya yi phrag_/stong phrag drug cu rtsa brgyad nas/_/rdo rje'i gdan la thug bar du/_/sa yi bcud ni rab tu 'phel/_/dpag tshad brgyar ni tshang ba yi/_/'og 
[\[254b.5\]]tu sa yi bcud song ste/_/de ni phyir yang log nas su/_/sa yi steng dag snum par byed/_/mdo 'di mnyan pa'i stobs kyis ni/_/lha rnams de dag thams cad kyang /_/gser gyi 'od ni dam pa yi/_/mdo sde'i dbang po'i ros tshim 'gyur/_/gzi byin ldan par rab 'gyur 
[\[254b.6\]]zhing /_/de bzhin rab tu stobs ldan 'gyur/_/bde bar 'gyur zhing tshim par 'gyur/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad na/_/'bras bu lo thog nags lha rnams/_/sna tshogs ro yis tshim 'gyur zhing /_/shin tu rab tu dga' bar 'gyur/_/mdo 'di'i ro yis tshim gyur nas/_/
[\[254b.7\]]'bras bu rnams dang lo thog dang /_/me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/'bras bu'i shing ljon sna tshogs kyang /_/kun nas rab tu skye bar byed/_/'bras bu'i shing ljon thams cad dang /_/kun dga' dag dang nags tshal rnams/_/me tog rab tu 'chag byed cing /_/sna tshogs 
[\[255a\]]
[\[255a.1\]]dri ni rab tu 'byin/_/me tog rnam pa sna tshogs dang /_/'bras bu sna tshogs ldan pa yi/_/rtsa dang nags tshal thams cad dag_/sa yi steng na skye bar byed/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad na/_/klu yi bu mo bsam mi khyab/_/rab tu dga' ba'i sems gyur 
[\[255a.2\]]nas/_/rdzing bu'i drung du nyer song ste/_/rdzing bu rnams ni thams cad du/_/ku mu da dang pad+ma dang /_/ut+pa la dang de bzhin du/_/pad+ma dkar po sna tshogs skye/_/nam mkha' la ni du ba dang /_/sprin gyi dra ba med cing dag_/mun pa dang ni rdul med cing /_/phyogs rnams rab tu 'od 
[\[255a.3\]]gsal lo/_/nyi ma 'od zer stong ldan yang /_/'od zer dra bas 'od kyang 'gyed/_/snang ba dag ni zab mo yis/_/rab tu dga' ba 'char bar 'gyur/_/dbang po nyi ma lha yi bu/_/'dzam bu'i gling gi gser gyi ni/_/gzhal med khang na 'dug pa yang /_/mdo sde 'dis ni rab tu 
[\[255a.4\]]tshim/_/dbang po nyi ma rab dga' nas/_/'dzam bu'i gling du 'char byed cing /_/'od zer mtha' yas dra ba yis/_/kun nas rab tu snang bar byed/_/de ni shar ba tsam gyis kyang /_/'od zer dra ba rab gtong zhing /_/rdzing bu sna tshogs khengs pa yi/_/pad+ma dag ni kha yang 
[\[255a.5\]]'byed/_/'dzam bu'i gling 'di thams cad du/_/me tog 'bras bu sman sna tshogs/_/yang dag yongs su smin byed cing /_/sa rnams thams cad sim par byed/_/zla ba dang ni nyi ma yang /_/de tshe khyad 'phags snang bar 'gyur/_/rgyu skar yang dag 'byung 'gyur zhing /_/rlung yang de bzhin 
[\[255a.6\]]ldang bar 'gyur/_/'dzam bu'i gling ni thams cad du/_/kun tu lo yang legs 'gyur te/_/gang na mdo sde 'di yod pa/_/yul 'khor der ni khyad par 'phags/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_gnod sbyin gyi gnas zhes bya ba kun tu srung ba'i le'u zhes 
[\[255a.7\]]bya ste nyi shu rtsa gnyis pa'o//_//de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_/bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa/_lha'i bu khri po dag 
[\[255b\]]
[\[255b.1\]]rgyu gang dang /_rkyen gang dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa ci 'dra ba dang /_gang bgyis shing bsags pas/_skyes bu dam pa gsum po 'di dag byang chub tu lung bstan pa thos nas/_da ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas lhags te/_bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa'i slad du mchis 
[\[255b.2\]]te/_'di lta ste/_byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog_/skyes bu dam pa 'di ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bgrang ba las 'das pa grangs ma mchis pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag du ma 'das pa na/_'jig rten gyi khams gser du snang zhes bya bar/_bla na med pa yang dag par 
[\[255b.3\]]rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_/bla na med pa/_lha dang 
[\[255b.4\]]mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas/_gdugs brtsegs zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/ji tsam na bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser dang rin po che'i 'byung 
[\[255b.5\]]gnas gdugs brtsegs pa de/_yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas dam pa'i chos nub ste/_de'i bstan pa yong ye thams cad du nub par gyur pa na/_khye'u dngul gyi tog 'di de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshams sbyor zhing /_'jig rten gyi khams rdul med pa'i rgyal mtshan de 
[\[255b.6\]]nyid du/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'dzam bu'i gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od ces bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo /_/ji tsam na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas gser 'dzam bu'i 
[\[255b.7\]]gser gyi rgyal mtshan gyi 'od de yongs su mya ngan las 'das nas/_de'i bstan pa yong ye thams cad du nub pa'i bar du gyur pa na/_khye'u dngul gyi 'od 'di de bzhin gshegs pa de'i mtshams sbyor zhing /_'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal mtshan de nyid du/_bla 
[\[256a\]]
[\[256a.1\]]na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ste/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul 
[\[256a.2\]]ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das gser brgya'i 'od zer du snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba 'jig rten du 'byung ngo zhes de dag thams cad bcom ldan 'das kyis/_de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung 
[\[256a.3\]]bstan to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das la rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pas 'di skad ces gsol to/_/btsun pa bcom ldan 'das 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri po de dag ni de tsam du/_byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rlabs po 
[\[256a.4\]]cher yang ma gyur/_sngon pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag la spyad skad kyang mi gda'/_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bu mo phangs pa dag sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'/_nor dang /_'bru dang /_'gron 
[\[256a.5\]]bu dang /_gser dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_dngul dang /_sa le sbram dang /_rin po che rnams sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'/_/bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_
[\[256a.6\]]mal cha dang /_stan dang /_khang khyim dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_kun dga' ra ba dang /_rdzing bu dang /_ldeng ka dag sngon yongs su btang skad kyang mi gda'/_glang po che dang /_ba lang dang /_rta pho rgod dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo sna tshogs sngon yongs su btang 
[\[256a.7\]]skad kyang mi gda'/_'di lta ste byang chub sems dpa' bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa du ma de dag ni/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams las/_de bzhin gshegs pa'i ming du lung bstan pa ma thob kyi bar du sngon bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag 
[\[256b\]]
[\[256b.1\]]grangs ma mchis pa du ma nas/_de dag ni de bzhin gshegs pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs ma mchis pa du ma dag la mchod pa sna tshogs tha dad pa 'bum phrag bsam gyis mi khyab pa du ma dag dang /_yo byad thams cad kyis mchod par bgyis/_yongs su gtang bar 
[\[256b.2\]]bgyi ba'i dngos po thams cad yongs su btang /_lag pa dang /_rkang pa dang /_mig dang /_yan lag gi dam pa mgo dang /_bu dang /_chung ma dang /_bu mo phangs pa yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongs su btang /_nor dang /_'bru dang /_'gron bu dang /_gser 
[\[256b.3\]]dang /_nor bu dang /_mu tig dang /_bai DUr+ya dang /_dung dang /_man shel dang /_byi ru dang /_dngul dang /_sa le sbram rnams yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongs su btang /_bza' ba dang /_btung ba dang /_bzhon pa dang /_gos dang /_mal cha dang /_stan dang /_
[\[256b.4\]]khang khyim dang /_gzhal med khang dang /_kun dga' ra ba dang /_skyed mos tshal dang /_rdzing bu dang /_ldeng ka dang /_glang po che dang /_ba lang dang /_rta pho rgod dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo yongs su gtang bar bgyi ba rnams kyang yongs su btang zhing /_rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa 
[\[256b.5\]]drug po thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bgyid/_rim gyis pha rol tu phyin pa drug po dag yongs su rdzogs par bgyis nas/_bde ba 'bum phrag mang po yang 'byor bar 'gyur na/_btsun pa bcom ldan 'das rgyu gang dang /_rkyen gang dang /_dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa ci 'dra ba zhig 
[\[256b.6\]]gis/_'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa/_lha'i bu khri po 'di dag bcom ldan 'das la chos nyan pa'i slad du mchis pa/_'di dag bcom ldan 'das kyis 'di ltar ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig 'bum phrag grangs med pa du ma na/_'jig 
[\[256b.7\]]rten gyi khams sA la'i dbang po mthon po'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa zhes bya ba de nyid du rigs dang rus gcig pa dang ming gcig tu rim gyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur te/_rab tu dang ba'i zhal ut+pa la'i dri brtsegs 
[\[257a\]]
[\[257a.1\]]pa zhes bya ba sangs rgyas khri 'jig rten du 'byung ste/_rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das su 'gyur 
[\[257a.2\]]ro zhes da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa lags/_de skad ces gsol pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la 'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi lha mo 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi 
[\[257a.3\]]brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri po 'di dag gang byas shing bsags pas chos mnyan pa'i phyir/_da ltar sum cu rtsa gsum gyi gnas nas/_'dir lhags pa de'i dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa yod/_de'i rgyu yod/_de'i byed rgyu yod de/_rigs kyi lha mo skyes bu dam pa 
[\[257a.4\]]'di gsum gyis byang chub tu lung bstan pa 'di thos nas thos ma thag tu gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di las/_shin tu ri mor byed cing dga' ba dang dang ba thob par gyur to/_/de tsam du bai DUr+ya dri ma med pa ltar yongs su dag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur 
[\[257a.5\]]to/_/dri ma med la shin tu rgya che zhing rgyas pa'i nam mkha' ltar zab pa'i sems rab tu dang ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/bsod nams kyi phung po dpag tu med pa yongs su bzung ba dang ldan par gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs 
[\[257a.6\]]pa lha'i bu khri po 'di dag de tsam du gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po 'di thos ma thag tu/_lhag par ri mo byed pa dang /_rab tu dang ba thob par gyur to/_/de tsam du bai DUr+ya dri ma med pa ltar yongs su dag pa'i sems dang ldan par gyur te/_de'i phyir lung bstan pas rjes 
[\[257a.7\]]su ston to/_/rigs kyi lha mo chos mnyan pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pa 'di dang /_sngon gyi smon lam gyi stobs kyis 'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri po 'di dag_/da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/gser 
[\[257b\]]
[\[257b.1\]]'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_lha'i bu stong phrag bcu lung bstan pa'i le'u ste nyi shu rtsa gsum pa'o//_//rigs kyi lha mo sngon gyi smon lam de dag gang zhe na/_rigs kyi lha mo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_bskal pa grangs med pa'i yang ches grangs med pa 
[\[257b.2\]]rgyas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/_tshad med par gyur pa de'i tshe/_de'i dus na de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rig pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/_bde bar gshegs pa/_'jig rten mkhyen pa/_skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/_bla na med 
[\[257b.3\]]pa/_lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rin chen gtsug tor can zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ngo /_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de yongs su 
[\[257b.4\]]mya ngan las 'das nas/_dam pa'i chos nub par gyur te/_dam pa'i chos ltar bcos par gyur pa na/_rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya ba/_chos can chos kyi rgyal po/_chos kyis rgyal srid skyong gi_/chos ma yin pas ma yin te/_yul thams cad na gnas pa'i sems can 
[\[257b.5\]]rnams kyi pha ma lta bur gyur pa zhig byung ngo /_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya ba/_sman pa gso ba byed pa khams la mchog tu mkhas pa tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad kyi rgyud dang ldan pa zhig byung 
[\[257b.6\]]bar gyur to/_/kye rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya ba de'i bu tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs zhes bya ba/_gzugs bzang ba/_mdzes pa/_blta na sdug pa/_kha dog bzang po/_rgyas pa mchog dang ldan pa/_bstan bcos sna tshogs 
[\[257b.7\]]la mkhas pa/_bstan bcos thams cad rtogs par khong du chud pa/_yi ge dang /_grangs dang /_lag rtsis dang /_rtsis rnams shin tu bslabs par gyur pa zhig byung ngo /_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od de'i yul de na sems can 
[\[258a\]]
[\[258a.1\]]'bum phrag du ma nad sna tshogs kyis btab par gyur cing /_nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir bar gyur te/_sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_rtsub pa/_drag po yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshong dpon gyi bu 
[\[258a.2\]]chu 'bebs de sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/_'bum phrag du ma de dag gi don gyi phyir/_snying rje chen po'i sems skyes par gyur to/_/sems can 'bum phrag du ma de dag ni nad sna tshogs kyis btab cing nad sna tshogs kyis yongs su gzir 
[\[258a.3\]]te/_de ltar sdug bsngal mi bzad pa/_rtsub pa/_drag po yid du mi 'ong ba'i tshor ba rnams myong la/_bdag gi pha tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin sman pa gso bar byed pa khams la mchog tu mkhas pa/_tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad kyi rgyud dang ldan pa 'di ni/_rgas/_'khogs/_
[\[258a.4\]]gtugs/_lam du zhugs/_na tshod rjes su thob 'khar ba la brten cing 'dar te/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su 'gro bar mi nus na/_sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/_nad 
[\[258a.5\]]sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/_'bum phrag du ma de dag nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar bar bya ba'i phyir/_bdag nyid bdag gi pha ral pa 'dzin gyi gan du song la/_nad kyi phyir khams la mkhas par bya ba yongs su dris te/_khams la mkhas par bya ba dris pa des bdag 
[\[258a.6\]]grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su 'gro bar bya'o/_/song nas kyang sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/_nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba 'bum phrag du ma dag nad sna tshogs las 
[\[258a.7\]]yongs su thar bar bya'o snyam nas rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs rang gi pha ral pa 'dzin ga la ba der song ste/_phyin nas rang gi pha ral pa 'dzin gyi rkang pa la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_thal mo sbyar nas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go_/phyogs gcig 
[\[258b\]]
[\[258b.1\]]tu 'dug nas kyang /_tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis rang gi pha ral pa 'dzin la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis khams la mkhas par bya ba dris pa/_ji ltar dbang po 'jig 'gyur zhing /_/khams rnams kyang ni yongs su 'gyur/_/gang gi dus na lus can la/_/nad kyi rigs 
[\[258b.2\]]rnams 'byung bar 'gyur/_/dus dang dus min zas zos pa/_/ji lta bur na bde bar 'gyur/_/gang gi lus kyi nang du ni/_/lus kyi mi la gnod mi 'gyur/_/rlung las gyur dang mkhris gyur dang /_/'dus las gyur dang bad kan gyur/_/nad rnams zhi bar bgyi slad du/_/ci 
[\[258b.3\]]lta bur ni gso bar bgyi/_/gang gis mi la gnod 'gyur ba'i/_/rlung ni gang gi dus na g.yo/_/gang gi dus na mkhris pa g.yo/_/bad kan gang gi dus na g.yo/_/de nas tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la/_/tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis khams 
[\[258b.4\]]la mkhas par bya ba rnam par bstan to/_/zla gsum dbyar te zla gsum ston du shes/_/gsum ni dgun te gsum ni dpyid yin no/_/de ltar zla ba'i [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]dus ni drug_/lo gcig la ni zla ba bcu gnyis 'dod/_/gsum gsum du ni tshigs rnams sdud par shes/_/zla ba 
[\[258b.5\]]gnyis gnyis shing ni dus su bstan/_/zas dang skom ni de ltar 'ju bar 'gyur/_/sman pa dang ni khams dang dus kyang bstan/_/dbang po dang ni khams rnams de dag kyang /_/lo gcig nang gi tshigs tshigs yongs su 'gyur/_/dbang po dag ni yongs su 'gyur ba na/_/lus can 
[\[258b.6\]]rnams la sna tshogs nad kyang 'byung /_/de nyid la ni sman pas zla gsum bzhi/_/tshigs kyi bar dang dus drug rnams dang ni/_/khams drug mkhas par bya ba shes par bya/_/zas skom sman rnams [{]go rims [,]go rim [}]ji bzhin te/_/rlung gi shas che'i nad ni dbyar na ldang /_/ston du gyur pa na 
[\[258b.7\]]ni mkhris pa g.yo/_/dgun gyi dus su de bzhin 'dus pa ste/_/bad kan shas che'i nad ni dpyid ldang ngo /_/dbyar ni snum dro lan tshwa skyur ba'i ro/_/ston ni mngar dang snum dang bsil bag go/_/dgun ni mngar dang snum dang skyur bag ste/_/dpyid kyi dus na rtsub ro tshwa 
[\[259a\]]
[\[259a.1\]]ba'o/_/bad kan che ba zos ma thag tu ldang /_/mkhris pa che ba 'ju ba'i dus na ldang /_/rlung shas che ba zhu ma thag tu ldang /_/khams gsum g.yo ba de ni de lta'o/_/rlung gi bdag nyid la ni bcud kyis gso/_/bkru sman gyis ni mkhris pa bsal bar bya/_/'dus 
[\[259a.2\]]pa la ni gsum dang mthun ldan pa/_/bad kan tshigs su bab na skyugs sman gtang /_/rlung shas che dang mkhris dang 'dus pa dang /_/bad kan shas che'i tshigs rnams shes par bya/_/dus gang khams gang lus ni gang yin pa/_/de yi sman dang bza' btung bstan par bya/_/de 
[\[259a.3\]]nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis khams la mkhas par bya ba 'di lta bu de tsam zhig yongs su dris pa des/_tshe'i rig byed kyi yan lag brgyad po thams cad khong du chud par gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs/_rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od 
[\[259a.4\]]kyi yul na/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad du song nas/_sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/_nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba 'bum phrag du ma de dag la kho bo ni sman pa'o/_/
[\[259a.5\]]kho bo ni sman pa'o/_/zhes bdag nyid kyis khas 'ches te/_kho bos khyed rnams nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar bar bya'o zhes dbugs phyung ngo /_/rigs kyi lha mo tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis 'di lta bu'i tshig brjod pa de thos ma thag tu srog chags 'bum phrag du ma de 
[\[259a.6\]]dag thams cad rab tu dga' ba chen po skyes par gyur to/_/dbugs phyin pa rnyed nas kyang dga' ba dang /_bde ba dang /_yid bde ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/_nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba 
[\[259a.7\]]'bum phrag du ma de dag nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar te nad med par gyur to/_/nad med par gyur nas kyang snga ma kho na bzhin du/_mthu dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan par gyur to/_/de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/_nad 
[\[259b\]]
[\[259b.1\]]sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/_'bum phrag du ma de dag gi nang nas/_gang su dag nad drag pos btab pa/_de dag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs ga la ba der dong nas phyin pa dang /_sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/_nad sna tshogs kyis gzir ba/_'bum 
[\[259b.2\]]phrag du ma de dag la tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis/_sman dpyad gang ci bstan pa des sems can de dag thams cad kyi nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas so/_/nad med pa dang /_nad nyung bar gyur nas kyang snga mkho bzhin du mthu dang /_stobs dang /_brtson 'grus dang ldan 
[\[259b.3\]]par gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i che de'i dus na/_rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na/_grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor thams cad na/_sems can nad sna tshogs kyis btab pa/_nad sna 
[\[259b.4\]]tshogs kyis gzir ba/_'bum phrag du ma de dag thams cad tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis/_nad sna tshogs las yongs su thar bar byas par gyur to/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_nad thams cad rab tu zhi bar byas pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa 
[\[259b.5\]]bzhi pa'o//_//rigs kyi lha mo gzhan yang rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul du/_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis/_sems can thams cad nad med par byas pas/_na ba nyung zhing snga mkho bzhin du spro ba dang /_stobs dang ldan pa'i lus su gyur to/_/rgyal 
[\[259b.6\]]po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul na/_sems can thams cad dga' zhing rtse la dga' mgur spyod de/_sbyin pa dag kyang sbyin par byed bsod nams dag kyang byed de/_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs la yang /_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs rgyal bar gyur cig_/rgyal bar gyur 
[\[259b.7\]]cig_/sman pa'i rgyal po sems can thams cad kyi nad gso ba/_mngon sum du byang chub sems dpar nges pa/_tshe'i rig byed yan lag brgyad pa thams cad rtogs pa zhes mngon par 'du byed do/_/rigs kyi lha mo/_/tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs de la chung ma chu'i 
[\[260a\]]
[\[260a.1\]]pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya ba zhig yod de/_rigs kyi lha mo chu'i pad+ma'i snying po de la khye'u gnyis yod de/_gcig gi ming ni chu'i gos zhes bya/_gcig gi ming ni chu'i snying po zhes bya'o/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis khye'u de gnyis dang lhan cig 
[\[260a.2\]]tu mthar gyis grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal dang /_ljongs dang /_yul 'khor dang /_rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor rnams su 'gro'o/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas dus gzhan zhig na/_tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs 'brog khong khong zhig tu phyin to/_/de nas 'brog khong khong der sha 
[\[260a.3\]]za ba'i khyi dang /_spyang ki dang /_wa dang /_khwa dang /_bya dag 'brog khong khong na rdzing zhig yod pa ga la ba der rgyug pa mthong nas de 'di snyam du sems te/_ci'i phyir sha za ba'i khyi dang /_spyang ki nas bya'i bar dag 'di dag phyogs 'dir rgyug snyam mo/_/de nas yang 'di snyam du 
[\[260a.4\]]sems te/_bdag khyi dang /_spyang ki dang /_wa dang /_khwa dang /_bya rnams phyogs gang du rgyug pa'i phyogs der 'gro bar bya'o snyam mo/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs mthar gyis rgyu zhing song song nas/_'brog khong khong na rdzing zhig ga la yod pa der 
[\[260a.5\]]phyin to/_/rdzing chen po de na nya khri zhig gnas te/_des der nya brgya phrag mang po zhig chu dang bral ba mthong nas/_des de la snying rje ba'i sems skyes pa dang /_de na lha mo zhig shing las lus phyed tsam phyung ba zhig mthong ste/_lha mo des tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs la 'di skad ces 
[\[260a.6\]]smras so/_/rigs kyi bu legs so legs so/_/gang gi phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya ba khyod kyis nya 'di rnams la chu byin cig_/rnam pa gnyis kyi phyir chu 'bebs zhes bya ste/_gang chu 'bebs dang gang chu sbyin pa'o/_/de bas na rang gi ming dang mthun pa'i bya ba byos shig_/chu 
[\[260a.7\]]'bebs kyis slar smras pa/_lha mo nya 'di dag la nya ji snyed cig mchis/_lha mos smras pa/_nya khri tham pa'o/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs cher mchog tu snying rje ba'i sems skyes so/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe/_'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing chen 
[\[260b\]]
[\[260b.1\]]po na chu'i lhag ma cung zad tsam zhig lus te/_de nas nya khri 'chi ba'i sgor zhugs shing chu dang bral ba de dag rgyug cing rnam par rgyug go/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis phyogs bzhir brgyugs pa dang /_nya khri po de dag tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs phyogs 
[\[260b.2\]]gang du 'gro ba'i phyogs de logs su chu 'bebs la snying rje rje ltar ba lta'o/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis phyogs bzhir brgyugs te/_chu btsal kyang der chu ma rnyed nas phyogs bzhir bltas pa dang /_des ha cang yang thag mi ring ba zhig na shing ljon 
[\[260b.3\]]pa chen po mang po zhig mthong nas shing ljon pa de dag la 'dzegs te/_shing gi yal ga rnams bcad nas/_shing gi yal ga de dag khyer te/_rdzing chen po ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_shing gi yal ga de rnams kyis nya khri po de dag la shin tu bsil ba'i grib mar byas so/_/
[\[260b.4\]]rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs rdzing der chu 'bab pa tshol te/_gang nas chu 'bab ces phyogs bzhir brgyugs kyang chu ma rnyed nas/_der myur ba myur bar chu'i rgyun de nyid kyi srol du song ste/_rigs kyi lha mo 'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing der/_chu 'bab 
[\[260b.5\]]pa zhes bya ba'i chu klung chen po de las der chu 'bab pa'i klung de yang de'i tshe/_sdig pa can gyi sems can zhig gis nya khri po de dag gi phyir ci nas kyang phyis nya de dag la chu 'bab par mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i phyogs kyi grog po chen por klung de phab bo/_/des de mthong nas bsams 
[\[260b.6\]]pa klung 'di ni skye bo stong gis kyang /_srol de nyid du dbab par mi nus na/_bdag gis lta dbab par ga la nus snyam nas de phyir log go/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs rings pa rings par rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_
[\[260b.7\]]rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi rkang pa la mgo bos mchod de phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas de dag rgyus kyis smras te/_bdag gis lha'i chags 'og tu grong dang /_grong khyer dang /_grong rdal thams cad du sems can rnams kyi nad kyi rgyun ni bkum na/_gnas che ge 
[\[261a\]]
[\[261a.1\]]mo zhes bgyi ba de na 'brog khong khong na yod ces bgyi ba'i rdzing zhig mchis pa de na/_nya khri zhig gnas pa chab dang bral nas gdugs kyis gdungs shing mchis te/_ji ltar mi rnams la stsal ba ltar ci nas dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa/_de dag 
[\[261a.2\]]la yang srog stsol bar 'tshal na/_lhas glang po che nyi shu zhig bdag la stsal du gsol/_rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis/_sman pa'i rgyal po chen po la glang po che nyi shu zhig byin cig ces blon po rnams la bsgo'o/_/blon po rnams kyis smras pa/_sems can chen 
[\[261a.3\]]po glang po che'i lhas ga la bar song la glang po che nyi shu khrid de sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang /_bde ba gyis shig_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi bu khye'u chu 'bebs rang gi bu chu'i gos dang /_chu'i snying po dang lhan cig tu/_glang po che nyi shu khrid nas/_glang 
[\[261a.4\]]po che'i rdzi bo las ba lang gi rkyal pa brgya blangs te/_slar log nas chu 'bab ces bya ba'i klung chen po gang du 'bab pa der song ste/_rkyal pa de dag chus bkang nas/_glang po che'i rgyab tu chu bkal te/_myur ba myur bar 'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing ga la ba der song nas 
[\[261a.5\]]phyin pa dang chu de glang po che'i steng nas phab ste/_phyogs bzhi nas rdzing bu chus bkang nas/_phyogs bzhir 'gro ba dang /_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs gang dang gang du 'gro ba'i de dang de logs su nya khri po de dag rgyug go/_/rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs 
[\[261a.6\]]'di snyam du sems te/_ci'i phyir nya khri po 'di dag bdag ga la ba de logs su rgyug snyam mo/_/de yang 'di snyam du sems te/_nya khri po 'di dag ni bkres pa'i mes yongs su nyen nas/_bdag la bza' ba slong du nges kyis/_bdag gis kha zas sbyin par bya'o snyam nas/_
[\[261a.7\]]rigs kyi lha mo de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis rang gi bu chu'i gos la 'di skad ces smras so/_/bu glang po che thams cad kyi nang na mgyogs pa'i mchog la zhon te/_bdag cag gi khyim du myur ba myur bar song ste/_mes po tshong dpon la/_kye mes po chu 'bebs 
[\[261b\]]
[\[261b.1\]]kyi mchid nas/_khyim 'di na pha ma dang /_spun dang /_sring mo dang /_bran pho dang /_bran mo dang /_las bgyid pa rnams kyi kha zas sbyar ba gang ci mchis pa thams cad gcig tu bsdus te/_chu'i gos glang po che la zhon pa'i lag tu myur bar rdzongs shig ces mchi'o zhes de 
[\[261b.2\]]skad gyis shig_/de nas khye'u chu'i gos glang po che de la zhon nas myur ba myur bar rgyug cing rab tu rgyug ste/_rang gi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin pa dang /_de dag rgyus kyis zhib tu smras te/_de nas khye'u chu'i gos kyis sngar smos pa'i zas sbyar ba de dag thams cad glang po che'i rgyab 
[\[261b.3\]]tu bkal nas glang po che de la zhon te/_'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing ga la ba der song ba dang /_chu 'bebs kyis rang gi bu chu'i gos mthong nas dga' mgu ste/_bu las zas blangs nas phrul te rdzing der gtor nas/_nya khri po de dag tshim par byas te/_de 'di snyam du 
[\[261b.4\]]bdag gis dus gzhan zhig na dgon pa'i gnas shig na/_dge slong theg pa chen po klog pa las thos na su 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe/_de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan thos pa de bde 'gro mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du skye'o zhes thos kyis/_bdag gis nya de dag 
[\[261b.5\]]la rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i chos zab mo yang bshad la/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de'i mtshan kyang bsgrag par bya'o snyam mo/_/de'i tshe 'dzam bu'i gling de na/_sems can rnams kyi lta ba 
[\[261b.6\]]gnyis su gyur te/_kha cig ni theg pa chen po la mngon par da do/_/kha cig ni smod do/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyis de'i tshe rdzing der rkang pa gnyi ga'i pus mo nub tsam du 'bogs te/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par 
[\[261b.7\]]rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can de la phyag 'tshal lo zhes ched du brjod pa de skad du ched du brjod do/_/de bzhin gshegs pa rin chen gtsug tor can sngon byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa na/_phyogs bcu dag na gang su dag 'chi ba'i dus kyi tshe 
[\[262a\]]
[\[262a.1\]]nga'i ming thos pa de dag de nas shi 'phos nas sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skye bar gyur cig ces smon lam de skad ces btab bo/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag la chos 'di bshad de/_'di 
[\[262a.2\]]lta ste/_'di yod pa'i phyir 'di 'byung /_'di skyes pas 'di skye ba ste/_'di lta ste/_ma rig pa'i rkyen gyis 'du byed rnams/_'du byed kyi rkyen gyis rnam par shes pa/_rnam par shes pa'i rkyen gyis ming dang gzugs/_ming dang gzugs kyi rkyen gyis skye mched drug_/skye 
[\[262a.3\]]mched drug gi rkyen gyis reg pa/_reg pa'i rkyen gyis tshor ba/_tshor ba'i rkyen gyis sred pa/_sred pa'i rkyen gyis len pa/_len pa'i rkyen gyis srid pa/_srid pa'i rkyen gyis skye ba/_skye ba'i rkyen gyis rga shi dang /_mya ngan dang /_smre sngags 'don pa dang /_sdug bsngal ba dang /_
[\[262a.4\]]yid mi bde ba dang /_'khrug pa rnams 'byung bar 'gyur te/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig po 'di dag 'byung bar 'gyur ro/_/'di lta ste/_ma rig pa 'gags pas 'du byed rnams 'gag par 'gyur ba nas/_de ltar sdug bsngal gyi phung po chen po 'ba' zhig 
[\[262a.5\]]po 'di yang 'gag par 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i bar du'o/_/rigs kyi lha mo de ltar de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa de dag la/_chos dang ldan pa'i gtam 'di brjod nas/_rang gi bu chu'i gos dang /_chu'i snying po dang lhan cig tu 
[\[262a.6\]]rang gi khyim du phyin pa'i bar du'o/_/de nas dus gzhan zhig na/_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs dus ston chen po zos nas chang gis ra ro ste mal na nyal ba dang /_de'i tshe de'i dus na/_ltas chen po byung bar gyur te/_mtshan mo de 'das pa dang /_nya khri po de dag 'chi ba'i dus byas par 
[\[262a.7\]]gyur nas/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams dang skal ba mnyam par skyes so/_/skyes ma thag tu de dag 'di lta bu'i tshul gyi sems kyi rnam par rtog pa skyes te/_bdag cag dge ba'i las kyi rgyu gang gis sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes so snyam mo/_/de dag 
[\[262b\]]
[\[262b.1\]]yang 'di snyam du sems te/_bdag cag 'dzam bu'i gling de na nya khrir gyur te/_bdag cag dud 'gro'i skye gnas su gyur pa las/_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis/_chu mang po dang /_kha zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas te/_bdag cag la rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba zab 
[\[262b.2\]]mo'i chos kyang bstan/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan yang bsgrags pas/_dge ba'i chos kyi rgyu de dang /_rkyen des bdag cag lha rnams kyi nang 'dir skyes kyis/_bdag cag tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 
[\[262b.3\]]'bebs ga la ba der dong ste phyin nas/_de la mchod par bya'o snyam nas/_de nas lha'i bu khri bo de dag sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang nas/_mi snang bar gyur nas/_tshong dpon gyi bu chu 'bebs kyi khyim du lhags te/_de'i tshe tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs mal na nyal zhing 'dug pa 
[\[262b.4\]]de la/_lha'i bu de dag gis mu tig gi se mo do khri ni mgo'i thad kar bzhag_/mu tig gi se mo do khri ni rkang pa'i drung du bzhag_/mu tig gi se mo do khri ni g.yas logs su bzhag_/mu tig gi se mo do khri ni g.yon logs su bzhag ste/_pus mo nub tsam du me tog man dA ra ba'i 
[\[262b.5\]]char chen po yang phab/_lha'i sil snyan rnams kyang dkrol nas/_des 'dzam bu'i gling pa thams cad gnyid kyang sad/_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyang sad do/_/de nas lha'i bu khri bo de dag nam mkha' la dong ste/_lha'i bu de dag rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyi yul 
[\[262b.6\]]gyi gnas dang /_gnas gzhan du yang me tog man dA ra ba'i char 'bebs shing /_nags khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing chen po ga la ba der dong nas/_de dag gis rdzing chen po der me tog man dA ra ba'i char chen po mngon par phab ste/_de nyid du mi snang bar gyur nas slar yang lha'i 
[\[262b.7\]]gnas su dong ste/_de na 'dod pa'i yon tan lnga po dag gis dga' zhing rtse ste/_dga' mgur spyod cing dpal dang skal ba bzang po chen po dag kyang myong ngo /_/'dzam bu'i gling du nam langs pa dang /_de nas rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od kyis skar mkhan dang /_blon po 
[\[263a\]]
[\[263a.1\]]chen po rnams la smras pa/_ci'i phyir mdang sum ltas 'di dag byung /_de dag gis smras pa/_lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyi khyim du mu tig gi se mo do bzhi khri'i char bab cing /_me tog man dA ra ba'i char yang bab po zhes byas 
[\[263a.2\]]pa dang /_khyed deng la tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs la snyan pa'i tshig gis bos shig_/_de nas skar mkhan dang /_blon po chen po rnams chu 'bebs kyi khyim ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs la 'di skad ces smras so/_/rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od 
[\[263a.3\]]khyod la 'bod do/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs blon po chen po rnams dang lhan cig tu rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la ba der song ba dang /_rgyal pos smras pa/_chu 'bebs mdang sum de 'dra ba'i ltas byung ba 'di ci'i ltas shes sam/_de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis 
[\[263a.4\]]rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od la 'di skad ces smras so/_/lha bdag gis 'tshal te/_nya khri po de dag gum par gyur du nges so/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_ji ltar shes/_chu 'bebs kyis smras pa/_lha chu'i gos rdzing der nya khri po de dag gum mam ma gum ltar stsal to/_/rgyal pos smras pa/_
[\[263a.5\]]de ltar gyis shig_/de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis/_khye'u chu'i gos la 'di skad ces smras so/_/'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing gi nya khri po de dag shi 'am ma shi ltos shig_/de nas khye'u chu'i gos myur ba myur bar 'brog khong khong na yod pa'i rdzing chen po ga la ba der song ba 
[\[263a.6\]]dang /_nya khri po de dag shi ba'i dus byas par gyur cing /_me tog man dA ra ba'i char chen po bab pa yang mthong nas slar log ste pha la smras pa/_nya rnams gum par gyur to/_/de nas tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyis/_khye'u chu'i gos la tshig de thos pa dang rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ga la ba 
[\[263a.7\]]der song nas de dag rgyus nas zhib tu smras te/_lha mkhyen par mdzad du gsol/_nya khri po de dag thams cad ni gum par gyur nas/_sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha rnams kyi nang du skyes te/_de dag bdag gi mthus mdang sum de lta bu'i dge ba'i ltas de dag byung ste/_bdag gi 
[\[263b\]]
[\[263b.1\]]khyim du yang mu tig gi se mo do bzhi khri dang /_lha'i me tog man dA ra ba'i char yang bab bo/_/de nas rgyal po de mgu zhing dga' ste yi rangs par gyur to/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa la/_'di skad ces bka' stsal to/_/rigs kyi lha mo 
[\[263b.2\]]de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur pa de/_gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/_de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shAkya lag na be con can de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal po lha'i dbang phyug 'od ces bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe 
[\[263b.3\]]de'i dus na/_tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur pa de/_gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/_de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rgyal po zas gtsang ma de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin ces bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon gyi 
[\[263b.4\]]khye'u chu 'bebs zhes bya bar gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/_de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga de'i tshe de'i dus na tshong dpon ral pa 'dzin gyi khye'u chu 'bebs zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur 
[\[263b.5\]]pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/_de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_shAkya'i bu mo sa 'tsho ma de'i tshe de'i dus na/_tshong dpon gyi khye'u chu 'bebs kyi chung ma chu'i pad+ma'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/sgra gcan zin ni de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chu'i gos zhes bya bar gyur to/_/
[\[263b.6\]]kun dga' bo ni de'i tshe de'i dus na khye'u chu'i snying po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_nya khri por gyur pa de dag gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/_de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'bar ba'i khyad par gyi gzi brjid kyi rgyal po la sogs pa lha'i bu khri 
[\[263b.7\]]po 'di dag de'i tshe de'i dus na nya khrir gyur te/_gang dag ngas chu dang kha zas kyi mchog gis tshim par byas shing rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba/_zab mo'i chos kyang bstan/_de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rin chen gtsug tor can gyi mtshan kyang 
[\[264a\]]
[\[264a.1\]]bsgrags pa ste/_dge ba'i las kyi rgyu des nga'i gan du 'dir lhags te/_des na da ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan to/_/rab tu dga' ba dang /_rab tu dang ba dang /_mchog tu dga' ba dang /_gus par chos mnyan pas thams cad lung bstan pa zhes 
[\[264a.2\]]bya ba'i ming thob par gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_shing gi lha mor gyur pa de gzhan zhig yin snyam du khyod sems na/_de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_rigs kyi lha mo khyod de'i tshe de'i dus na/_shing gi lha mor gyur to/_/rigs kyi lha mo rnam grangs 'dis na 'khor 
[\[264a.3\]]ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/_ngas ji ltar sems can mang po byang chub tu yongs su smin par byas te/_de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu lung bstan pa'i sa thob par gyur par rig par bya'o/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_chu 'bebs kyis 
[\[264a.4\]]gdul ba'i nya'i sngon byung ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa lnga pa'o//_//bam po bcu pa/_rigs kyi lha mo gzhan yang byang chub sems dpa' ni gzhan la phan pa'i phyir/_lus kyang yongs su btang ngo /_/de ci lta zhe na/_dri ma med cing shin tu rgyas pa'i yon tan rnam pa sna tshogs 
[\[264a.5\]]brgya'i 'od zer snang ba dang lha yul du rnam par 'phro ba thogs pa med pa'i ye shes mthong ba dang /_stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa'i bcom ldan 'das dge slong stong gis yongs su bskor te/_yul lnga len gyi ljongs su/_ljongs rgyu zhing gshegs nas/_nags tshogs shig tu byon 
[\[264a.6\]]pa dang /_des der sngo zhing 'jam la mthing kar 'dug pa'i spang gi ngos la me tog dri zhim pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa'i sa phyogs zhig gzigs so/_/gzigs nas kyang bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo sa phyogs 'di ni 
[\[264a.7\]]mdzes pa ste/_'di na gtam gyi gnas kyi mtshan ma yod kyis da de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdan thing shig_/de nas des bcom ldan 'das kyi bka' bzhin du gdan bting ngo /_/gdan bting nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/gdan bting lags na bcom ldan gtso bo mchog_/
[\[264b\]]
[\[264b.1\]]mi la mchog stsol dam pa srid bcings grol/_/zhugs te mi la sman slad thar bgyid kyi/_/bka' mchid dam pa bdud rtsi gsung du gsol/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan de la bzhugs nas/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag khyed bya dka' ba byed pa'i byang 
[\[264b.2\]]chub sems dpa'i rus pa rnams blta bar 'dod dam/_de skad ces bka' stsal pa dang /_bcom ldan 'das la dge slong de dag gis 'di skad gsol to/_/drang srong dam pa sems can mchog gi snying po pa/_/bzod dang brtson 'grus che la zhi dang dul dga' zhing /_/blo gros dran dga' yon tan 
[\[264b.3\]]dpag med gnas gyur gyi/_/rus pa bdag cag blta ba'i dus lags de legs shod/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs kyi mthil 'khor lo rtsibs stong gi ri mo can dang me tog ka ma la gsar du kha phye ba ltar 'jam pa'i phyag gis/_sa'i ngos la brdabs te/_bsnun ma thag tu/_sa rnam pa drug 
[\[264b.4\]]tu g.yos te/_nor bu dang /_gser dang /_dngul las byas pa'i mchod rten zhig de nas byung ngo /_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo mchod rten 'di phye zhing /_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos/_bcom ldan 'das kyi ltar 
[\[264b.5\]]mnyan nas/_mchod rten de phye ba dang /_des der gser gyi 'od 'phro ba can gyi nor bu dang mu tig gis khebs par g.yogs pa'i gser gyi za ma tog cig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das gser gyi za ma tog dag cig 
[\[264b.6\]]mchis so/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_za ma tog bdun po 'di dag thams cad phye zhig_/de bzhin du thams cad kha phye ba dang /_des der rus pa'i kha dog kha ba dang /_me tog ku mu da 'dra ba dag cig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 'das 
[\[264b.7\]]rus pa dag cig gda'o/_/bcom ldan 'das kyis bka' stsal pa/_kun dga' bo skyes bu chen po'i rus pa rnams khyer te shog_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos rus pa de dag blangs te/_sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das la phul ba dang /_bcom ldan 'das kyis rus pa rnams 
[\[265a\]]
[\[265a.1\]]dge 'dun gyi mdun du bsnams te/_phyag tu bzhes nas bka' stsal pa/_rus pa 'di dag yon tan mchog rab tshogs ldan blo gros mchog_/dul dang bsam gtan bzod pa spro ba grags mchog dam pa ste/_/blo gros ldan rnams phyir zhing rtag tu byang chub 'di 
[\[265a.2\]]la ni/_/spro brtan mos dang blo gros mchog tu sbyin la dga' bar byas/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/_dge slong rnams la bka' stsal pa/_dge slong dag byang chub sems dpa'i rus pa tshul khrims dang yon tan gyis yongs su bsgos pa/_mchog tu mthong bar dka' ba/_bsod 
[\[265a.3\]]nams kyi zhing du gyur pa rnams la phyag 'tshol cig_/de nas dge slong de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/_'dun pa'i yid kyis rus pa rnams la phyag 'tshal to/_/de nas tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bos thal mo sbyar te/_bcom ldan 'das la 'di skad ces gsol to/_/bcom ldan 
[\[265a.4\]]'das de bzhin gshegs pa ni 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/_sems can thams cad kyis phyag bgyis pa lags na/_ji ltar de bzhin gshegs pa nyid rus pa 'di dag la phyag bzhes/_de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis tshe dang ldan pa kun dga' bo la 'di skad 
[\[265a.5\]]ces bka' stsal to/_/kun dga' bo rus pa 'di dag gis nga 'di ltar myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyas so/_/kun dga' bo sngon byung ba 'das pa'i dus na/_rgyal po shing rta chen po zhes bya ba bzhon pa dang /_stobs du 
[\[265a.6\]]ma dang ldan pa/_thogs pa med pa'i stobs kyis pha rol gnon pa zhig byung ste/_de la bu lha gzhon nu dang 'dra ba gsum zhig yod de/_sgra chen po dang /_lha chen po dang /_snying stobs chen po'o/_/de nas rgyal po rtse ba'i phyir skyed mos tshal gyi sar byung ba dang /_gzhon nu de dag 
[\[265a.7\]]skyed mos tshal de'i yon tan la chags shing me tog 'dod pas phan tshun du rgyu ste/_nags khrod chen po bcu gnyis su zhugs so/_/de nas rgyal po'i bu dag dong ba dang gzhon nu rim gro ba rnams kyang rgyal bus bskrad nas phan tshun du dong ste/_kun tu bsrungs pa'i skyed mos tshal chen 
[\[265b\]]
[\[265b.1\]]po'i nags khrod bcu gnyis su zhugs so/_/de nas sgra chen pos nu bo gnyis la smras pa/_kho bo'i snying la 'jigs pas non na/_'dir bdag cag gcan gzan gyis bsad du 'ong gis da tshur shog_/lha chen pos smras pa/_bdag la 'jigs pa ni ma mchis na/_skye bo sdug 
[\[265b.2\]]pa dang bral ba snyam bgyid pa'i snying du gyur to/_/snying stobs chen pos smras pa/_thub pas bsngags pa'i nags khrod dben pa 'dir/_/bdag ni mi 'jigs mya ngan ma mchis kyi/_/shin tu rgyas mchog don chen rnyed snyam ste/_/bdag gi snying 'dir rab tu dga' bar gyur/_/
[\[265b.3\]]de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag nags khrod bcu gnyis po de dag gi khrod du rgyu ba na/_stag mo bu byung nas zhag drug gam zhag bdun lon pa zhig_/bu lngas bskor te bkres shing skom pas nyams smad nas/_lus mchog tu nyam chung bar gyur pa de 'dra ba zhig mthong ngo /_/mthong nas 
[\[265b.4\]]kyang sgra chen pos smras pa/_kye ma'o nyon mongs ma 'di bu byung nas zhag drug gam/_zhag bdun zhig lon par gyur la/_da ltar zas ma rnyed pas/_yang na ni rang gi bu la za bar 'gyur/_yang na ni bkres pas 'chi ba'i dus byed par 'gyur ro/_/snying stobs chen pos smras pa/_nyon 
[\[265b.5\]]mongs ma 'di'i zas ni ci/_sgra chen pos smras pa/_'dir gang sha gsar pa dang khrag dron po yod na/_de ni stag dang /_dom dang /_dred dang /_seng ge rnams kyi zas yin no zhes zer ro/_/lha chen pos smras pa/_'dir nyon mongs ma 'di bkres pa dang /_skom pa dang ldan pa'i lus su gyur 
[\[265b.6\]]pas srog gi lhag ma cung zad cig lus te/_rab tu nyam chung ba 'dis/_gnas 'dir zas skom tshol ni mi nus na/_'di'i srog yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir/_su zhig rang gi lus yongs su gtong bar byed par 'gyur zhig gu/_sgra chen pos smras pa/_kye rang gi lus yongs su gtong 
[\[265b.7\]]ba ni bya dka' ba'o/_/snying stobs chen pos smras pa/_bdag cag lta bu srog dang lus la mngon par chags pa/_blo chung ba rnams la ni tshul 'di bya dka' ba lags kyi/_gzhan lus yongs su gtong ba la zhugs pa/_/gzhan la phan par brtson pa'i skyes bu dam pa rnams la ni bya 
[\[266a\]]
[\[266a.1\]]dka' ba ma lags so/_/yang snying brtse snying rje las byung 'phags pa'i sems can dag_/lha yul dang ni sa 'dir rang lus rnyed snyam ste/_/gzhan gyi srog phyir mthun par dga' ba'i yid kyis ni/_/'gyur ba med par 'dir ni rnam pa brgya yis brtse/_/de nas rgyal bu 
[\[266a.2\]]gzhon nu de shin tu mi dga' ste/_stag mo de la mig mi 'dzums par ring zhig tu bltas nas song ngo /_/de nas snying stobs chen po 'di snyam du sems te/_da ni bdag gi lus 'di yongs su gtang ba'i dus la bab bo/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_'jig cing 'gyes pa'i chos can mthar 'bye 
[\[266a.3\]]mtha' ngan pa/_/rnag can lus 'di zas dang skom dang mal cha dang /_/bzhon pa 'os pa chen po dag gis ring bsrungs kyang /_/sngar med rang gi rang bzhin mi 'dor byas don med/_/yang thams cad mi gtsang bar gyur pas na/_de'i 'tsho ba med kyis/_da bdag gis de las bzang po'i 
[\[266a.4\]]las sbyar bar bya'o/_/de'i phyir bdag skye ba dang /_'chi ba'i rgya mtsho las bsgral ba'i gru bo che lta bur 'gyur ro/_/yang snying po med lus dbu ba 'dra la srin bu brgyas gang byas pa chud gzon pa/_/'bras 'dra ba yi srid pa brgya ldan gcin dang phyi sas gang ba 'di btang ste/_/mya ngan med 
[\[266a.5\]]cing 'gyur med phung med dri med bsam gtan la sogs yon tan gyis/_/kun tu gang ba'i chos sku yon tan brgyas gang rdul dang bral ba thob par bya/_/de snying rje chen po mchog dang ldan pa'i snying du gyur pas de ltar btul nas/_khyed gnyis gshegs su gsol/_/bdag ni rang gi bgyi 
[\[266a.6\]]ba zhig gi slad du/_nags khrod bcu gnyis su 'jug go/_/zhes de gnyis bskrad do/_/de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu snying stobs chen po nags 'dab de nas slar log ste/_stag gi gnas su song nas/_nags kyi yal ga la gos gzar te/_bdag ni 'gro la phan phyir byang chub mtshungs 
[\[266a.7\]]pa med pa zhi ba thob 'dod de/_/gzhan gyis gtang bar dka' ba'i lus ni blo gros 'gyur ba med pa'i snying rjes sbyin/_/bdag gis skyon med byang chub ring med rgyal sras rnams kyis gnyer ba thob par shog_/bdag gis srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu 'jigs las 'jig rten gsum po bsgral 
[\[266b\]]
[\[266b.1\]]bar bya/_zhes smon lam btab bo/_/de nas snying stobs chen pos stag mo'i mdun du nyal ba dang /_de nas byams pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' la/_stag mos ci yang ma byas so/_/byang chub sems dpas/_kye ma'o 'di ni nyam chung bas mi nus so snyam nas langs te/_snying brtse 
[\[266b.2\]]ba'i blo gros kyis mtshon cha btsal na/_gang nas kyang mtshon cha ma rnyed nas/_des 'od ma'i yal ga lo brgya lon pa sra ba zhig blangs te/_bdag gi mgul pa bcad nas stag mo'i mdun du 'gyel to/_/byang chub sems dpa' 'gyel ma thag tu chu'i dbus su son pa'i gru rlung gis bskyod pa 
[\[266b.3\]]bzhin du sa 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos so/_/nyi ma yang sgra gcan gyis zin pa bzhin du 'od zer rnams kyis mdzes pa med do/_/lha'i spos dang /_phye ma dang 'dres pa'i me tog gi char yang bab bo/_/de nas lha zhig gis ngo mtshar du gyur pa'i yid kyis byang chub sems dpa' la bstod pa/_blo 
[\[266b.4\]]gros bzang po khyod 'dir ji ltar thugs rjes sems can rnams khyab ste/_/mi yi dpa' bo rab tu dgyes pas ji ltar sku 'di yongs su btang bas na/_/skye ba dang ni 'chi ba'i don dang bral ba zhi ba'i gnas kyi mchog_/zhi ba gtsang ma khyod kyis 'dir ni tshegs med ring por mi thogs brnyes/_/
[\[266b.5\]]de nas stag mo des byang chub sems dpa'i lus khrag gis sbags pa la bltas nas/_yud tsam gyis sha dang khrag med par rus pa tsam zhig lus par byas so/_/de nas sgra chen pos sa g.yos pa de la bsams nas lha chen po la 'di skad ces smras so/_/ji ltar phyogs bcur rgya mtsho mthar 
[\[266b.6\]]thug rgya mtshor bcas pa yi/_/sa 'di rab tu g.yos shing nyi ma 'ang 'od ni med gyur la/_/me tog char pa 'bab cing kho bo'i yid kyang 'khrugs pas na/_/da gzod bdag gi nu bos rang gi lus ni btang yang dag_/lha chen pos smras pa/_de ni ji ltar snying rje'i tshig smra la/_/
[\[266b.7\]]bkres dang ldan zhing sdug bsngal brgyas gtses pa/_/shin tu nyam chung rang gi bu la yang /_/za bar chas la blta bas bdag kyang dogs/_/de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis rab tu mya ngan gyis non nas mchi mas mig gang ste/_lam de nyid nas slar log nas stag mo'i drung du phyin 
[\[267a\]]
[\[267a.1\]]pa dang /_gos thams cad ni 'od ma'i yal ga dag la gzar/_rus pa rnams ni bye zhing bral/_khrag ni rdzab tu gyur/_skra ni phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'thor bar mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang brgyal te rus pa'i steng du 'gyel nas ring zhig lon pa dang /_'du shes 
[\[267a.2\]]rnyed de langs nas lag pa bsgreng ste nyam thag pa'i sgra phyung ngo /_/kye ma'o nu bo sdug pa dang ni rgyal po dang /_/de bzhin du ni bu la rab tu gdung ba'i ma/_/pad+ma 'dra mig de ring khyed kyis gar bzhag ces/_/ma ni bdag cag la yang tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]'dri bar 'gyur/_/kye ma bdag cag gnyis ni sa 
[\[267a.3\]]phyogs 'di nyid du/_/shi na legs kyis gson pa de lta ma yin no/_/snying stobs chen po med par gyur pas bdag cag la/_/pha ma dag gis ji ltar lto ba ster bar 'gyur/_/de nas rgyal bu gzhon nu de gnyis kyis snying rje rje'i skad du rnam pa mang por ngus nas dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal bu gzhon 
[\[267a.4\]]nu'i rim gro pa rnams kyang gzhon nu tshol zhing /_phyogs dang phyogs mtshams rnams su rgyug pa dang /_gcig gis gcig mthong nas/_gzhon nu ga re/_gzhon nu ga re zhes 'dri'o/_/de'i tshe btsun mo mal na nyal ba'i rmi lam na sdug pa dang bral bar rmis pa 'di lta ste/_nu ma gnyis 
[\[267a.5\]]bcad pa dang /_so phyung ba dang /_thi ba'i phru gu sdug pa gsum zhig rnyed pa las gcig khras khyer ba rmis so/_/de nas btsun mo sa g.yos pas snying dngangs te/_mod la sad nas sems pa la zhugs te/_'byung po'i rten ma rgya mtsho'i gos can 'di ni kun tu rab g.yo ci zhig gu/_/nyi ma'i 
[\[267a.6\]]'od zer med par gyur pas nga yi snying la mya ngan 'gyur ba ston/_/nga yi lus ni zhum zhing mig kyang g.yo la rang gi nu ma bcad rmis pa/_/nga yi bu rnams nags khrod 'dir ni rtser dong ba la dge bar gyur ram kye/_/de nas de snyam du bsams pa dang /_bran mo yang snying myos te 'ongs nas btsun 
[\[267a.7\]]mo la smras pa/_jo mo gzhon nu'i rim gro pa dag gzhon nu tshol zhing mchis na/_jo bo stor zhes gda'o/_/de skad thos ma thag tu btsun mo snying 'dar zhing /_mig dang gdong mchi mas gang ste/_rgyal po'i gan du song nas smras pa/_lha bdag gi bu sdug pa stor ces thos so/_/rgyal po yang snying 
[\[267b\]]
[\[267b.1\]]'dar zhing shin tu myos te/_kyi hud bdag gi bu sdug pa dang bral ba lta zhes smras so/_/de nas rgyal pos/_btsun mo dbugs dbyung ba'i phyir/_nga gzhon nu btsal ba la nan tan du byed kyis/_bzang mo mya ngan ma byed cig_/der gzhon nu tshol ba la zhugs pa dang skye bo'i tshogs dag rod rod por 
[\[267b.2\]]gyur to/_/de nas ring por ma lon par rgyal pos/_rgyal bu gzhon nu gnyis rgyang ring po nas 'ong ba mthong ngo /_/mthong nas kyang smras pa/_gzhon nu de dag ni 'ong na thams cad ni ma yin te/_kyi hud bu dang bral ba zhes bya ba ni sdug bsngal ba'o/_/ji ltar bu dang bral bar gyur na yid ni mi 
[\[267b.3\]]bde ba/_/mi rnams bu rnyed pa ni de ltar dga' ba ma yin no/_/'jig rten na ni gang dag bu med pa dang shi ba'am/_/mi rnams gang dag bu gson de dag bde ba yin nam ci/_/de nas btsun mo shin tu mya ngan gyis non nas/_rnga mo gnad du bsnun pa bzhin du/_shin tu mi bzad pa'i sgra phyung ngo /_/
[\[267b.4\]]de ltar bu gsum dag ni g.yog gi tshogs bcas te/_/me tog rnams kyis gang ba'i nags khrod zhugs pa las/_/bdag gi bu dge tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]'ongs par ma gyur na/_/bdag gi snying dang 'dra ba'i tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]de ga re/_/de nas de gnyis lhags pa dang /_rgyal pos bu la dris pa/_khye'u tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]
[\[267b.5\]]ga re zhes gzhon nu gnyis la dris pa dang /_de nas mya ngan gyis nyam thag cing mig mchi mas gang ste/_rkan dang /_mchu dang /_kha dang /_so skams nas cang mi zer ro/_/btsun mos smras pa/_kho mo'i bu sdug tha [{]chungs [,]chung [}]de ga re/_kho mo'i snying 'di gas la thug gyur cing /_/lus ni mi 
[\[267b.6\]]bzad rab tu gzir gyur te/_/kho mo'i dran pa nyams gyur myur du smros/_/de nas gzhon nu de gnyis kyis ji ltar gyur pa de zhib tu smras so/_/de thos ma thag tu rgyal po dang /_btsun mo myos par gyur te/_myos pa sangs nas snying rje rje'i skad du ngu zhing phyogs der dong ngo /_/de nas rgyal po 
[\[267b.7\]]dang btsun mos rus pa de dag_/sha dang /_khrag dang /_rgyus pa med cing /_skra phyogs dang phyogs mtshams su 'thor ba mthong nas shing rlung gis btab pa bzhin du 'gyel to/_/de nas mdun na 'don pa dang /_blon po dag gis de ltar gyur pa de mthong nas/_chu dang ri ma la ya'i tsan+dan 
[\[268a\]]
[\[268a.1\]]gyi lde gus/_rgyal po dang btsun mo'i lus sim par byas so/_/de nas ring zhig lon pa dang /_'du shes rnyed nas/_rgyal po langs te snying rje rje'i skad du 'bod pa/_kyi hud bu sdug yid 'ong mthong dga' ba/_/'chi bdag dbang du ci phyir myur du song /_/'chi bdag ci phyir 
[\[268a.2\]]nga la sngar ma 'ongs/_/nga la sdug bsngal 'di las gzhan mi 'byung /_/btsun mo yang myos pa las langs nas/_skra zhig cing lag pa gnyis kyis brang brdungs te/_nya thang la phyung ba bzhin du sa'i steng na 'gre ldog cing ma he'i be'u stor ba dang /_rnga mo rnge'u stor ba bzhin du snying rje rje'i skad du 
[\[268a.3\]]ngu'o/_/kyi hud sdug cing gces pa'i bu ni pad+ma 'di/_/su yis sa yi steng du bshig nas rab tu gtor/_/yid 'ong mig ldan zla 'dra'i bzhin can bdag gi bu/_/bdag gi dgra bo gang gis de ring sa 'dir bcom/_/kyi hud sa 'dir bu mchog bsad mthong ba/_/lus 'di ci phyir 
[\[268a.4\]]de ring zhig ma gyur/_/sdug bsngal 'di 'dra mthong yang ma gas pas/_/bdag gi snying 'di lcags ni yin yang dag_/de ring rmi lam du ni bdag gi nu ma 'ga' zhig gis ni ral gris bcad/_/so yang phyung bas de ring bdag gi bu sdug de ni myur du ma rung gyur/_/bdag gis thi 
[\[268a.5\]]ba'i phru gu gsum zhig rnyed pa gcig 'dir ji ltar khras khyer bzhin/_/bdag ni bu gsum dag gis bskor ba las kyang gcig ni de ring 'chi bdag khyer/_/kyi hud sdig pa can gyi rmi lam de yi 'bras bu grub pa 'di yin no/_/de nas rgyal po dang btsun mo snying rje rje'i skad du rnam 
[\[268a.6\]]pa mang pos smre zhing rgyan thams cad bkrol nas/_skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas/_gzhon nu'i rus pa rnams sa phyogs 'dir bzhag go/_/kun dga' bo de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal bu gzhon nu snying stobs chen po zhes bya bar gyur pa 
[\[268a.7\]]de gzhan yin pa snyam du khyod sems na de de ltar mi blta'o/_/de ci'i phyir zhe na/_nga nyid de'i tshe de'i dus na/_rgyal bu gzhon nu snying stobs chen po zhes bya bar gyur to/_/kun dga' bo 'dod chags dang /_zhe sdang dang /_gti mug las yongs su ma grol ba de'i tshe yang 
[\[268b\]]
[\[268b.1\]]sems can dmyal ba la sogs pa'i sdug bsngal las/_ngas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags nas skyon thams cad dang bral te/_yang dag par rdzogs par sangs rgyas pa da ltar lta smos kyang ci dgos/_de ltar sems can re re'i phyir yang sems can dmyal ba rnams su bskal 
[\[268b.2\]]par gnas par spro zhing /_skye ba'i 'khor ba las rnam par dgrol lo/_/sems can gyi snying pos shin tu bya dka' ba rnam pa sna tshogs pa du mas 'gro ba mtha' dag la phan btags so/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag bka' stsal to/_/byang chub 
[\[268b.3\]]mchog 'di yongs su tshol ba na/_/bskal pa mang por ngas ni lus btang ste/_/ji ltar rgyal po dang ni rgyal bur gyur/_/de ltar ngas ni lus rnams yongs su btang /_/sngon gyi tshe rabs rnams ni rjes dran te/_/shing rta chen po zhes bya'i rgyal po byung /_/de la bu ni gtong ba che ldan pa/_/
[\[268b.4\]]snying stobs che zhes bya ba dam pa yod/_/de la phu bo dag ni gnyis yod de/_/ming ni sgra chen po dang lha chen po/_/spun tshogs de dag nags tshal khrod du dong /_/de dag stag mo bkres pas gzir ba mthong /_/de la sems can mchog de snying rje skyes/_/stag mo 'di ni bkres skom 
[\[268b.5\]]gzir bas na/_/bdag bu de dag za bar 'gyur 'ong gis/_/de ltar bdag lus da ni gtang bar bya/_/shing rta che yi bu ni snying stobs che/_/stag mo bkres mthong stag phrug rnams/_/thar bar bya phyir snying rje yis/_/ri ngos gzar nas mchongs pa dang /_/sa ni ri dang bcas su 
[\[268b.6\]]g.yos/_/bya tshogs rnam mang rnam par mthong /_/[{]ri dgas [,]ri dwags [}]tshogs skrag 'jig rten 'di/_/mun pas thibs por gnas par gyur/_/de yi phu bo sgra chen dang /_/de bzhin lha chen de gnyis kyis/_/nags tshogs chen po der bltas na/_/snying stobs chen po ma rnyed nas/_/shin 
[\[268b.7\]]tu mya ngan zug rngus snying /_/dran med nags kyi nang du rgyu/_/nu bo de ni yongs tshol zhing /_/gdong la mchi zag nags khrod rgyu/_/sgra chen de bzhin lha chen po/_/rgyal bu gzhon nu de dag gnyis/_/stag mo nyam chung gar nyal ba/_/der ni nye bar song ba dang /_/stag mo dang ni 
[\[269a\]]
[\[269a.1\]]stag phrug gi/_/stag gi mchu la khrag chags mthong /_/skra dang rus pa cung zad cig_/sa la rnam par 'thor ba mthong /_/de yi khrag gi thigs pa ni/_/nyung zhig sa la yod par gyur/_/rgyal po'i bu ni de gnyis kyis/_/khrag chags pa yi sa de mthong /_/
[\[269a.2\]]rab tu brgyal te sa de la/_/'gyel nas yid ni nyams par gyur/_/lus rnams la ni rngul gyis gos/_/dran dbang nyams shing sems kyang myos/_/de dag gi ni 'khor rnams kyang /_/snying rjer ngu zhing mya ngan non/_/de dag chus ni rab 'thor zhing /_/lag pa bsgreng ste ngu zhing 
[\[269a.3\]]gnas/_/de ni 'gyel ma thag tu yang /_/btsun mo gces mchog skyed pa'i ma/_/bud med dag ni lnga brgya dang /_/pho brang nang na bder 'dug pa/_/nu sor gnyi ga'i rtse mo nas/_/'o ma khrag tu 'byung zhing 'dzag_/de yi lus dang yan lag kun/_/khab kyis btsags pa bzhin 
[\[269a.4\]]du tsha/_/snying ni rab tu mya ngan gang /_/bu bral mya ngan drag mdas phog_/rgyal po'i gan du nyer song ste/_/mya ngan rab gdungs yid mi dga'/_/snying rje'i sgra yis rab ngu zhing /_/rgyal po shing rta che la smras/_/mi dbang rgyal po bdag la gson/_/bdag lus mya ngan me yis tshig_/
[\[269a.5\]]bdag gi nu sor rtse gnyis nas/_/'o ma khrag tu rab tu 'byung /_/bdag lus khab kyis btsags bzhin tsha/_/bdag gi snying yang gas la thug_/ji ltar sdug pa'i bu rnams ni/_/phyin cad mi mthong 'di 'dra'i ltas/_/bdag gi bu rnams de ltar 'tshal/_/thugs rje mdzod de 
[\[269a.6\]]bdag srog stsol/_/de ring bdag gi rmi lam na/_/thi ba'i phru gu gsum rnyed na/_/bdag gi thi ba'i phru gu ni/_/sdug cing yid 'ong gang lags pa/_/der ni khra mchis bdag gi ni/_/thi ba'i phru gu de khras 'tshal/_/bdag gi rmi lam 'di 'dra yi/_/mya ngan snying 'dir rab 
[\[269a.7\]]tu zhugs/_/sems ni mya ngan rab gdungs pas/_/bdag ni ring por mi thogs 'gum/_/bdag gis bu rnams de ltar 'tshal/_/thugs rje ldan pa bdag srog stsol/_/de skad smras nas btsun mo mchog_/brgyal nas sa der 'gyel bar gyur/_/dran pa'i dbang po rnam par 
[\[269b\]]
[\[269b.1\]]nyams/_/sems kyang stor zhing dran pa med/_/btsun mo'i 'khor tshogs thams cad kyang /_/snying rje'i skad kyis rab tu ngu /_/btsun mo dam pa brgyal gyur te/_/sa la 'gyel ba mthong nas ni/_/de ma thag tu rgyal dbang de/_/bu dang bral ba'i mya ngan non/_/blon po dang ni 
[\[269b.2\]]'khor rnams kyang /_/gzhon nu rnams ni btsal phyir dong /_/grong khyer kun gyi skye bo dag_/tha dad khyim nas byung zhing 'khod/_/ngu zhing gdong nas mchi ma zag_/lam kar snying stobs che de 'dri/_/gson tam 'on te shi 'am ci/_/snying stobs chen po de gar song /_/bdag 
[\[269b.3\]]cag de ring mthong zhig gam/_/yid 'ong sems can mthong re dga'/_/de'u re mi snyan thos 'gyur zhing /_/yul 'dir mya ngan mi bzad rlung /_/sgra mi phyin cing sgyu mtha' yas/_/drag po'i sgrar bcas ldang zhig gam/_/rgyal po shing rta che langs te/_/mya ngan non cing ngu bzhin 
[\[269b.4\]]du/_/btsun mo dam pa sar 'gyel la/_/bdag nyid chu yi rgyun kyang 'thor/_/ji srid dran rnyed ldan 'gyur ba/_/de srid du ni chu yis gtor/_/bdag bu gum mam gson zhig ces/_/zhum pa'i yid kyis 'dri bar byed/_/rgyal po shing rta chen po yis/_/btsun mo mchog 
[\[269b.5\]]la 'di skad smras/_/blon po dag dang 'khor rnams kyang /_/gzhon nu rnams ni tshol phyir dong /_/khyod ni rab tu yid zhum zhing /_/rtag tu mya ngan snying ma byed/_/de ltar shing rta chen po yis/_/btsun mo dam pa spro bsrings te/_/rgyal po'i pho brang nas byung nas/_/mya 
[\[269b.6\]]ngan non cing ngu bzhin du/_/blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor te/_/yid ni rab zhum lus kyang zhan/_/srog chags brgya phrag mang po yang /_/ngu zhing mchi ma zag bzhin rgyug_/rgyal bu rnams ni btsal ba'i phyir/_/grong khyer gyi ni mchog nas byung /_/rgyal po byung 
[\[269b.7\]]ba mthong nas ni/_/rgyal po'i phyi bzhin kun tu 'brang /_/rgyal po shing rta chen po ni/_/grong khyer nas byung de ma thag_/sdug pa'i bu ni blta ba'i phyir/_/rgod pa'i mig gis phyogs su bltas/_/mgo bregs yan lag khrag sbags shing /_/lus la rdul gyis gos 
[\[270a\]]
[\[270a.1\]]gyur la/_/gdong la mchi zag ngu bzhin du/_/'ong ba'i mi zhig mthong nas ni/_/shing rta chen po'i snying la yang /_/rab tu mi bzad mya ngan gnas/_/ngu zhing gdong la mchi ma zag_/lag pa bsgreng ste ngu zhing 'dug_/de nas blon po gzhan zhig ni/_/
[\[270a.2\]]rgyang ring myur du rings par 'ong /_/'ongs nas mi dbang rgyal po ni/_/shing rta che la 'di skad smras/_/mi dbang thugs ngan ma mdzad cig_/khyod sras yid du 'ong ba mchis/_/ring por mi thogs khyod kyi gnas 'dir ni/_/sras mchog yid 'ong mchi ba khyod kyis gzigs/_/
[\[270a.3\]]rgyal po yud tsam lam du zhugs pa dang /_/de nas blon po chen po gnyis pa 'ongs/_/rdul chags dri ma can gyi gos gyon cing /_/mchi ma'i gdong gis rgyal la 'di skad smras/_/rgyal po chen po khyod kyi sras gnyis ni/_/mya ngan me yis rab tu gdungs shing gnas/_/rgyal po khyod 
[\[270a.4\]]kyi sras mchog gcig mi gda'/_/snying stobs chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin/_/stag mo bu byung ring por ma lon pa/_/rang gi bu rnams za bar 'dod pa mthong /_/de dag la ni gzhon nu sems can ches/_/snying rje chen po ldan pas sems bskyed nas/_/byang chub tu ni 
[\[270a.5\]]smon lam che btab pa/_/sems can thams cad bdag gis dgrol bar bya/_/byang chub zab mo rgya chen 'dod pa la/_/ma 'ongs dus na bdag gis rig par bya/_/sems can chen po ri ngos gzar nas mchongs/_/stag mo bkres pas non pa de langs te/_/yud tsam gyis 
[\[270a.6\]]ni lus la sha med byas/_/rgyal po'i bu ni rus pa nyi tse lus/_/ma rungs pa yi tshig ni de thos nas/_/rgyal po shing rta chen po brgyal gyur te/_/sa la 'gyel nas sems kyang stor bar gyur/_/mya ngan me ni shin tu mi bzad 'bar/_/'khor dang blon pos snying rje'i skad 
[\[270a.7\]]kyis ni/_/ngu zhing mya ngan non bzhin de dag kyang /_/chus gtong lag pa bsgreng ste rab tu ngu /_/blon po gsum pas rgyal la smras pa ni/_/bdag gis de ring gzhon nu gnyis po dag_/nags chen de na rab tu brgyal gyur zhing /_/sa la 'gyel te sems kyang stor 
[\[270b\]]
[\[270b.1\]]mthong nas/_/dran pa rnyed de langs kyi bar du ni/_/bdag cag rnams kyis chab kyis rab tu gtor/_/phyogs bzhi dag na kun nas 'bar bar mthong /_/yud tsam 'greng nas slar yang sa la 'gyel/_/snying rje'i skad kyis smre sngags rab tu 'don/_/rtag par lag pa 
[\[270b.2\]]bsgreng ste gnas nas ni/_/nu bo de yi bsngags pa rab tu brjod/_/rgyal po de ni rab tu sems zhum zhing /_/bu dang bral bas non nas sems kyang 'khrugs/_/mya ngan rab tu gdungs shing smre sngags 'don/_/rgyal po de ni 'di snyam yongs su sems/_/bdag bu sdug cing 
[\[270b.3\]]yid 'ong gcig po ni/_/sems can chen po mi rtag nyid kyis zin/_/bdag gi bu ni gnyis po de dag kyang /_/mya ngan me yis srog ni zad 'ong gis/_/'di ltar bdag ni myur du der song la/_/mthong na dga' ba'i bu dag blta bar bya/_/bzhon pa mgyogs pas rgyal po'i pho brang gi_/rgyal po'i 
[\[270b.4\]]khab tu myur du bkri bar bya/_/de dag rnams ni skyed pa'i ma yi snying /_/mya ngan me yis gas par 'gyur du 'ong /_/bu gnyis mthong nas zhi ba thob 'gyur te/_/srog dang bral bar 'gyur ba ma yin no/_/rgyal po blon po'i tshogs kyis yongs bskor 
[\[270b.5\]]nas/_/glang chen zhon te bu rnams blta phyir song /_/bu gnyis snying rje'i skad kyis rab ngu zhing /_/nu bo'i ming 'bod lam nas 'ong ba mthong /_/rgyal pos bu de gnyis ni khrid nas su/_/rab tu ngu zhing khyim du song nas ni/_/de yis skyen par la gor myur du yang /_/btsun mo 
[\[270b.6\]]la ni rang gi bu rnams bstan/_/shAkya thub pa de bzhin gshegs pa nga /_/sngon gyi rgyal po shing rta chen po yi/_/bu ste snying stobs chen po mchog gyur cing /_/gang gis stag mo bde bar byas pa yin/_/rgyal po'i dbang po dam pa zas gtsang ni/_/shing rta che zhes 
[\[270b.7\]]bya ba'i rgyal por gyur/_/btsun mo'ang btsun mo dam pa sgyu 'phrul gyur/_/sgra chen po ni byams par gyur pa yin/_/rgyal bu lha chen po yang de bzhin du/_/de ni 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa yin/_/stag mor gyur pa skye dgu'i bdag mo che/_/stag phrug rnams ni 
[\[271a\]]
[\[271a.1\]]dge slong lnga por gyur/_/de nas rgyal po shing rta chen po dang /_/btsun mo snying rje bar smre sngags rnam pa mang po bton nas rgyan thams cad bkrol te/_/skye bo'i tshogs chen po dang lhan cig tu bu'i rus pa la mchod pa byas nas/_snying stobs chen po de'i rus pa 'di 
[\[271a.2\]]dag sa phyogs 'di nyid du bzhag ste/_rin po che sna bdun gyi mchod rten 'di byas so/_/snying stobs chen po 'dis stag mo la lus yongs su btang nas/_lus yongs su btang ba 'dis phyi ma ma 'ongs pa'i dus na/_bskal pa bgrang ba las shin tu 'das pa rnams su yang 
[\[271a.3\]]sems can rnams la sangs rgyas kyi mdzad pa bya'o zhes smon lam de skad btab bo/_/bstan pa 'di bshad pa na lha dang mir bcas pa'i skye dgu'i sems can grangs med dpag tu med pa dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed do/_/mchod rten 
[\[271a.4\]]'di 'dir bstan pa'i rgyu ni 'di yin no/_/rkyen ni 'di yin no/_/mchod rten de yang sangs rgyas kyi byin gyis brlabs kyis sa de nyid kyi nang du zhugs so/_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_stag mo la lus yongs su btang ba'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu 
[\[271a.5\]]rtsa drug pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'bum phrag du ma de dag de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/_bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs 
[\[271a.6\]]brtsegs kyi zhabs la mgo bos phyag 'tshal te/_phyogs gcig tu 'khod do/_/phyogs gcig tu 'khod nas kyang /_byang chub sems dpa' brgya stong phrag du ma de dag gis thal mo sbyar te/_de bzhin gshegs pa gser dang rin po che'i 'byung gnas gdugs brtsegs de 
[\[271a.7\]]la tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do/_/rgyal ba'i sku mchog btso ma'i gser 'dra ste/_/sku lus gser gyi mdog tu rnam par gda'/_/gser gyi ri dbang lta bur gser gyi mdog_/thub pa pad+ma dkar po gser mdog can/_/bzang po'i mtshan 
[\[271b\]]
[\[271b.1\]]gyis sku lus rnam par brgyan/_/dpe byad sna tshogs bzang pos sku lus spras/_/gser gyi 'od ltar mdzes pa rnam par 'bar/_/shin tu dri med zhi ba ri dbang 'dra/_/tshangs pa'i sgra dang sgra snyan tshangs pa'i dbyangs/_/seng ge'i sgra dang 'brug sgra bsgrags pa'i dbyangs/_/
[\[271b.2\]]yan lag drug cu'i bsgrags sgra dri med sgra/_/rgyal dbyangs rma bya ka la ping ka'i sgra/_/shin tu dri med dri bral gzi 'od mdzes/_/rgyal ba bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan gyis brgyan/_/mkhyen pa'i rgya mtsho dri med dri bral mchog_/rgyal ba yon tan kun ldan ri rab 'dra/_/
[\[271b.3\]]sems can rnams la phan par thugs brtse mchog_/'jig rten dag na bde ba sbyin pa'i mchog_/rgyal ba dam pa'i don rnams ston pa ste/_/mya ngan 'das pa'i bde la 'dzud pa lags/_/'chi ba med pa'i bde ba stsol ba ste/_/rgyal ba'i bdud rtsi'i chos ni rab tu ston/_/
[\[271b.4\]]'chi ba med pa'i grong khyer 'dzud pa ste/_/bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas bde ba'i gnas/_/rgyal ba 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal thar bar mdzad/_/sdug bsngal rgya mtsho las ni skye dgu sgrol/_/zhi ba'i lam la skye dgu rab tu 'dzud/_/skye dgu rnams la bde ba kun stsol ba/_/khyod la 
[\[271b.5\]]dpe ni bgyi bar mi nus te/_/ji snyed 'dren pa'i ye shes yon tan mtsho/_/srog chags kun la khyod kyi thugs rje dang /_/byams pa'i stobs dang thabs dang brtson 'grus dang /_/khyod kyi yon tan ye shes rgya mtsho las/_/bskal pa bye ba stong phrag mang por yang /_/yon tan 
[\[271b.6\]]thigs pa gcig tsam rab bstan par/_/lhar bcas 'gro ba'i nang na nus ma mchis/_/yon tan mtsho las yon tan thigs blangs te/_/de ltar bdag gis mdor bsdus cung zad bshad/_/bdag gis bsod nams gang bsags de yis ni/_/sems can de dag byang 
[\[271b.7\]]chub mchog reg shog_/gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa bdun pa'o//_//de nas byang chub sems dpa' mdzes pa'i tog stan las langs te/_bla gos phrag pa gcig tu 
[\[272a\]]
[\[272a.1\]]gzar nas pus mo g.yas pa'i lha nga sa la btsugs te/_bcom ldan 'das ga la ba de logs su thal mo sbyar ba btud nas tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la mngon par bstod do/_/thub dbang khyod ni bsod nams brgya pa'i mtshan/_/dpal stong mdzes 
[\[272a.2\]]pa'i yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/_/kha dog rgya chen mchog tu zhi ba ston/_/nyi ma stong ltar 'od ni rnam par 'phro/_/'od zer du ma 'bar ba'i 'od kyis khyab/_/kha dog sna tshogs gang bas rin chen 'dra/_/sngon po dkar po gser 'od bai DUr+ya/_/zangs dang skya rengs shel gyi 'od 
[\[272a.3\]]lta bus/_/rdo rje ri dbang ri rab thal mdzad cing /_/zhing rnams bye ba du mar snang mdzad de/_/sdug bsngal mi bzad drag po zhi bar mdzad/_/bde ba'i mchog gis sems can tshim par mdzad/_/mdog dang dbang po gsal bag blta na mdzes/_/gzugs bltas mi ngoms skye 
[\[272a.4\]]bos blta na dga'/_/rma bya'i mdog 'dra'i dbu skra rnam par mdzes/_/bung pa mang pos gang ba'i 'od dang 'dra/_/thugs rje rnam dag yon tan rnams kyis brgyan/_/ting 'dzin byams pa bsod nams dam pa bsags/_/dpe byad bzang dang kha dog sna tshogs ldan/_/
[\[272a.5\]]ting 'dzin byang chub yan lag yon tan brgyan/_/khyod ni rab tu tshim mdzad phan pa mdzad/_/bde mdzad bde ba kun gyi 'byung gnas 'byung /_/yon tan zab mo sna tshogs rnams kyis brgyan/_/zhing rnams bye ba dag tu lhang nge ste/_/me yi 'od ltar 'od zer rnams kyis 
[\[272a.6\]]mdzes/_/ji ltar nam mkha' nyi dkyil rdzogs pa bzhin/_/ri rab lta bur yon tan kun ldan par/_/'jig rten khams rnams kun tu rab tu gda'/_/ba zho ku mu da dang zla 'dra zhing /_/kha ba'i mdog dang dkar po bzang 'dra ba'i/_/tshems kyi phreng bas khyod kyi 
[\[272a.7\]]zhal mdzes pa/_/ngang pa'i rgyal po bar snang ji bzhin no/_/khyod kyi zhi zhal mtshams gnas zla ba 'dra/_/g.yas su 'khyil zhing khong chud 'dra ba lags/_/bai DUr+ya 'dra'i sku 'od dkar rnams kyis/_/nam mkha'i dkyil na nyi ma lta bur mdzes/_/gser 'od dam pa 
[\[272b\]]
[\[272b.1\]]mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa brgyad pa'o//_//de nas rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pas/_de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis bcom ldan 'das la bstod pa/_rnam par 
[\[272b.2\]]dag pa'i chos la spobs pa'i blo mnga' ba/_/las ngan lam dang bral ba'i bdag nyid blo mnga' zhing /_/srid dang srid min mkhyen pa rnam dag blo mnga' ba/_/sangs rgyas rnam dag blo mnga' ba la phyag 'tshal lo/_/kye ma'o kye ma'o sangs rgyas gzi brjid mtha' yas te/_/
[\[272b.3\]]kye ma'o kye ma'o rgya mtsho dang ni ri rab 'dra/_/kye ma'o kye ma'o sangs rgyas spyod yul mtha' yas te/_/u dum bA ra'i me tog bzhin du shin tu dkon/_/sems can dag ni thams cad rjes su gzung slad du/_/gang gis mdo sde dam pa 'di 'dra rab gsungs pa/_/mi dbang 
[\[272b.4\]]nyi ma shAkya'i dbang po rigs kyi tog_/kye ma'o kye ma'o de bzhin gshegs pa thugs rje ldan/_/de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pa dbang po zhi/_/zhi ba dam pa zhi ba'i grong khyer rab tu zhugs/_/ting 'dzin zab cing zhi la rdul dang bral ba ni/_/rgyal ba sangs rgyas 
[\[272b.5\]]spyod yul der yang rab tu zhugs/_/de ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa ste/_/rkang gnyis dam pa rnams kyi gnas pa'ang stong pa lags/_/chos rnams de dag thams cad rang bzhin stong lags na/_/sems can rnams ni stong pa'i bdag nyid ma 'tshal 
[\[272b.6\]]to/_/rtag par khor zug tu ni rgyal ba dran par bgyid/_/rgyal ba mthong bar yang ni rtag tu mya ngan bgyid/_/rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas nyi ma mthong bar bgyi slad du/_/rtag par yang ni smon lam rab tu 'debs par bgyid/_/bdag ni rtag tu dog sar pus mo 
[\[272b.7\]]btsugs nas su/_/rgyal ba'i gzugs kyis skom pas rab tu mya ngan sems/_/'dren pa'i slad du snying rje'i skad kyis ngu bar bgyid/_/bdag ni bde bar gshegs pa mthong bar rab tu skom/_/mya ngan me yis kun tu rab tu 'bar bar 'gyur/_/mthong ba'i 
[\[273a\]]
[\[273a.1\]]chu bsil bdag la rtag par stsal du gsol/_/bdag ni khyod kyi gzugs la lta bas rab tu skom/_/thugs rje'i chab kyis bdag la rab tu tshim par mdzod/_/'dren pa khyod ni bdag la thugs rje mdzad du gsol/_/zhi ba'i gzugs mthong ba ni 
[\[273a.2\]]bdag la stsal du gsol/_/khyod ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'gro ba'i skyob pa ste/_/'di ltar nyan thos rnams kyi lus ni stong pa lags/_/sems can thams cad dag ni rmi lam rang bzhin te/_/nam mkha' 'dra zhing nam mkha'i ngo bo nyid kyang lags/_/sgyu ma smig 
[\[273a.3\]]rgyu dang ni chu yi zla ba 'dra/_/'dren pa khyod kyi stong pa che dang ldan pa lags/_/de nas bcom ldan 'das gdan las bzhengs te/_tshangs pa'i sgra skad kyis bka' stsal pa/_rigs kyi lha mo khyod legs so legs so/_/khyod yang legs so/_/bcom ldan 
[\[273a.4\]]'das kyis de skad ces bka' stsal nas/_rigs kyi lha mo byang chub yang dag par bsdus pa dang /_lha mo chen mo dbyangs can la sogs pa'i lha'i bu mo de dag thams cad dang /_lha mo chen mo dpal la sogs pa lha mo'i tshogs de dag thams cad dang /_rnam thos kyi bu la 
[\[273a.5\]]sogs pa lha'i rgyal po de dag thams cad dang /_thams cad dang ldan pa'i 'khor de dag dang /_lha dang /_mi dang /_lha ma yin dang /_dri zar bcas pa'i 'jig rten yi rangs te/_bcom ldan 'das kyis gsungs pa la mngon par bstod do/_/gser 'od 
[\[273a.6\]]dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po las/_mjug sdud kyi le'u zhes bya ste nyi shu rtsa dgu pa'o//_//'phags pa gser 'od dam pa mdo sde'i dbang po'i rgyal po zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo rdzogs so//_//paN+Di ta dzi na mi dra dang /_shi len+d+ra bo 
[\[273a.7\]]d+hi dang /_zhu chen gyi lo ts+tsha ba ban+de ye shes sdes bsgyur cing zhus te skad gsar chad kyis gtan la phab pa//_//
